Aberrant Tumor.name: 异变疖体 Aberrant Tumor
Aberrant Tumor.description:
令人畏惧的是，你躯体上的畸怪组织事实上是你用来引导魔法能量的节点。

先决条件: 异怪（Aberrant）血统（Bloodline）。

专长效果: 你获得一个囊肿魔宠（Tumor Familiar）UM，如同同名的炼金术士发现，将你获得此血统的等级视为你的炼金术士等级以决定该魔宠的能力。如果有多个职业均给予你异怪血统能力，那么这些职业等级可以叠加起来视为你对炼金术士等级。

资源出处: Advanced Class Guide pg. 136

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Aberrant%20Tumor

Aberration-Bane Caster.name: Aberration-Bane Caster
Aberration-Bane Caster.description:
You can apply your specialized knowledge of hunting aberrations to make your spells harder for these monsters to resist.

Prerequisites
Caster level 4th, gillman, favored enemy (aberrations) class feature.

Benefits
Add half of your favored enemy bonus against aberrations to the saving throw DC of spells that you cast against aberrations and on caster level checks to overcome the spell resistance of aberrations.

Abeyance.name: 延缓诅咒 Abeyance
Abeyance.description:
延缓诅咒会压制接触到生物身上的单一个诅咒效果。诅咒造成的伤害或吸取不会被回复。延缓诅咒不能压制那些无法被移除诅咒移除的诅咒，但是能压制例如兽化症（Lycanthropy）这类需要移除诅咒和额外措施同时使用才能解除的效果。同一个诅咒一次只能被一个延缓诅咒压制，哪怕它被另一个施法者施放。

延缓诅咒不会使得生物得以脱下诅咒物品，但是它能压制一个来自物品上的诅咒。



资源出处: Pathfinder #82: Secrets of the Sphinx pg. 74

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/SpellDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Abeyance

Ability Focus.name: 能力专攻 Ability Focus
Ability Focus.description:
专长类型：Monster

这个生物的某种特殊攻击能力极难抵抗。

先决条件: 拥有特殊攻击。

专长效果: 选择一项该生物拥有的特殊攻击能力，其他生物对抗这项特殊攻击能力的所有豁免DC+2。

特殊说明: 你可以多次选择本专长，但其效果不能叠加。每次你选择此专长时，它的效果将应用在另一个特殊攻击能力上。

资源出处: Pathfinder RPG Bestiary pg. 314

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Ability%20Focus

Ability Mastery.name: 能力掌握 Ability Mastery
Ability Mastery.description:
专长类型：Item Mastery

你能用变化系魔法物品增强你天生的能力。

先决条件: 使用魔法装置技能3级，基础强韧豁免加值+4。

专长效果: 每天一次，你可以花费10分钟将你的思维集中在一套魔法护甲或者一件制造条件中列有2环或更高环数变化系法术的占用你一个装备栏位的奇物中。当你结束冥想时，你在自选一项属性值上获得+2增强加值。这个效果持续24小时。你必须穿戴这件物品才能获得这个好处；如果这个物品在该专长效果结束前被移除，则这个效果会马上消失，并且从专长最后一次激活24小时内无法重新获得。你同一时间只能从该专长获得一种好处。

资源出处: Magic Tactics Toolbox pg. 30

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Ability%20Mastery

Aboleth Deceiver.name: Aboleth Deceiver
Aboleth Deceiver.description:
You have mastered mental tricks to help you combat aboleths and avoid mind-controlling magic.

Prerequisites
Iron Will, gillman, enchantment resistance racial trait.

Benefits
Once per day, if you fail a Will save against a compulsion spell or effect, you can reroll that saving throw but must take the second result, even if it's worse. If the compulsion spell or effect originates from an aboleth, you do not apply your racial -2 penalty on such saving throws, and the reroll does not count against your daily use of this feat.

Absorb Spirit.name: Absorb Spirit
Absorb Spirit.description:
You absorb restless spirits into your body at the cost of your own life force and sanity.

Prerequisites
Con 13, must have died at least once or been possessed by an undead creature.

Benefits
When an incorporeal undead with the rejuvenation special ability or a haunt is reduced to 0 or fewer hit points within 30 feet of you, you can attempt to absorb its spirit into your body as an immediate action. You must attempt a Will save with a DC equal to 5 + twice the CR of the undead creature or haunt. If you are a medium with the haunt channeler class feature, you receive a +2 bonus on this saving throw. If you succeed, you harbor the undead or haunt's essence, and it cannot continue to rejuvenate or manifest until you release it. For every 24 hours that you harbor the entity, you must attempt a Constitution check (DC = 10 + the CR of the undead or haunt).
If you are a medium with the haunt channeler class feature, you receive a +2 bonus on this check. If you fail the check, you take 1d4 points of Constitution and Wisdom damage. If you succeed, you take 1 point of Constitution and Wisdom damage. No effect can prevent or reduce this ability damage, nor can the ability damage be healed or suppressed by any means until you release the spirit. You can release the spirit at any time as a standard action, at which point the spirit returns to its former location and begins rejuvenating or manifesting again as normal. If you die from the Constitution damage, the spirit is released, and if you become comatose from the Wisdom damage, the spirit gains control of your body (and can release itself whenever it desires).

Special
If you are using the sanity system (page 12) and fail your Constitution check while harboring the spirit, you take sanity damage equal to 1/2 the spirit's CR (minimum 1) instead of 1d4 points of Wisdom damage. If you succeed at the Constitution check, you take sanity damage equal to 1/4 the spirit's CR instead of 1 point of Wisdom damage. Either way, you still take the normal amount of Constitution damage. No effect can prevent or reduce the damage, nor can it be healed or suppressed by any means until you release the spirit.

Abundant Revelations.name: 丰足启示 Abundant Revelations
Abundant Revelations.description:
你能探寻秘示的根源，从而使用更多的启示。

先决条件: 【秘示域】职业特性。

专长效果: 选择一个拥有每日使用次数的启示。这个启示的每日使用次数+1。

特殊说明: 你可以多次选择这一专长。这个专长的效果不累加。每次你选择这个专长时，其效果适用于一个新的启示。

资源出处: Ultimate Magic pg. 142

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Abundant%20Revelations

Accomplished Sneak Attacker.name: 催命 Accomplished Sneak Attacker
Accomplished Sneak Attacker.description:
只要能偷袭的，就是神也杀给你看！

先决条件: 偷袭职业能力。

专长效果: 你的偷袭伤害上升+1d6，但是你的偷袭伤害骰数最多不超过你的角色等级的一半（向上取整）。

资源出处: Dirty Tactics Toolbox pg. 10

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Accomplished%20Sneak%20Attacker

Accursed.name: 诅咒缠身 Accursed
Accursed.description:
专长类型：Story

如同颈挂巨石，你的灵魂承受着诅咒的重负。

先决条件: 你必须承受一项仅能通过冒险任务或类似巨大付出才可摆脱的诅咒；或拥有“降生诅咒（Cursed Birth）”角色背景。

专长效果: 魔法的诅咒作用在你身上，使获得等同于“5+角色等级”的法术抗力。与多数法术抗力不同，它无法被主动降低；尽管你自己的法术和魔法物品依然能自动对自己生效。

专长目标: 摆脱诅咒，或者你找到了净化自身魔族血统的手段（基于诅咒的本质、此净化过程的细节甚为多样，此由GM决定）。

完成收益: 你失去上述法术抗力。你获得等同于“11+角色等级”的法术抗力，但仅能用于对抗有害的惑控、死灵和变化学派法术或类法术能力——你的灵光抵抗着这些诅咒。若你自愿，无害法术可自动通过该法术抗力。该法术抗力可以被主动降低。

资源出处: Ultimate Campaign pg. 67

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Accursed

Accursed Critical.name: 诅咒重击 Accursed Critical
Accursed Critical.description:
专长类型：Critical

你将诅咒嵌入了你的法术，并且在攻击时引发。

先决条件: 重击专攻，可以使用‘降咒’或者‘高等降咒’，施法者等级9级。

专长效果: 当你使用法术或者类法术能力并且确认重击后，你可以以一个直觉动作对目标施展‘降咒’或者‘高等降咒’。远程法术也可造成这个效果。你必须准备了‘降咒’或者‘高等降咒’或者其他的能力使你足以施展法术，使用这个能力会消耗相应的法术位。

资源出处: Ultimate Magic pg. 142

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Accursed%20Critical

Accursed Hex.name: 诅咒巫术 Accursed Hex
Accursed Hex.description:
在巫术失败的时候，你可以再试一次。

先决条件: 【巫术】职业特性。

专长效果: 当你对目标使用了一个至少一日才能生效一次的巫术，并且目标在对抗巫术的豁免中成功时，你可以在下一轮中对目标再使用一次相同的巫术。如果第二次巫术也失败了，你在一日之内不能再对目标使用相同的巫术。

通常状况: 这些巫术你每天只能对目标使用一次。

资源出处: Ultimate Magic pg. 143

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Accursed%20Hex

Accursed Hex (Mythic).name: 诅咒巫术(神话) Accursed Hex (Mythic)
Accursed Hex (Mythic).description:
先决条件：诅咒巫术

你的巫术顽强而持续地闪耀着。

神话专长效果：当你使用诅咒巫术专长，对目标第二次使用巫术时，该名生物必须进行两次豁免检定并且取较低的结果。

资源出处: Mythic Adventures pg. 54

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Accursed%20Hex

Ace Disarm.name: 神射卸武 Ace Disarm
Ace Disarm.description:
专长类型：TargetingWeapon Mastery

你可以射飞敌人手中的装备，然后自己抓住它们。

先决条件: 敏捷13，致命瞄准，远程卸武RTT 远程战术工具匣，BAB+6，对所选远程武器拥有战士武器训练（Weapon Training）职业能力。

专长效果: 当你使用远程卸武专长以远程武器发动卸武战技攻击时，你不会在攻击检定上承受-2减值。除此之外，你可以使用远程卸武专长来尝试发动偷窃战技攻击而非卸武战技攻击。另外，如果你成功地从对手那里卸除或偷窃了一件物品，这件武器将会掉在目标所占据的方格。你的战技攻击检定结果每超过目标的CMD5点，这件物品就会飞离他5尺远（最远不超过这次攻击的最大射程，或是你这次射击的弹药携带着它击中一个无法穿越的障碍物为止）。如果你在拥有回弹投射专长的同时使用本专长的效果，那么你的武器和被卸除/偷窃的物品会一起返回你的手中。

资源出处: Weapon Masters Handbook pg. 20

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Ace%20Disarm

Ace Trip.name: 神射摔绊 Ace Trip
Ace Trip.description:
专长类型：TargetingWeapon Mastery

你可以射击飞行的敌人，让他们无力维持悬空。

先决条件: 敏捷13，致命瞄准，远程摔绊RTT，BAB+6，对所选远程武器拥有战士武器训练（Weapon Training）职业能力。

专长效果: 当你使用远程摔绊专长以远程武器发动摔绊战技攻击时，你不会在攻击检定上承受-2减值。除此之外，你可以使用远程摔绊专长来尝试对一个飞行的敌人发动一次特殊的摔绊战技攻击。如果这次战技攻击成功命中，飞行中的目标就必须以每轮100尺的速度下坠（假定他仍然承受停留空中并且保有意识；若非如此，他会以每轮500尺的速度下坠）直到摔到地上。如果他摔落，该生物受到坠落伤害并被击倒至俯卧（如果它以每轮100尺的速度坠落则坠落伤害减半；若非如此则受到全额坠落伤害）。坠落的生物在摔倒地面上以前视为被纠缠状态，但他仍然可以在自己的回合开始时进行一个飞行技能检定（DC=15+你的基本攻击加值）来将自己拉起以避免坠地；如果他不尝试将自己拉起，那么该生物无法进行移动（除了坠落以外），但可以正常进行其他动作。

资源出处: Weapon Masters Handbook pg. 20

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Ace%20Trip

Acrobatic (Mythic).name: 特技专家(神话) Acrobatic (Mythic)
Acrobatic (Mythic).description:
先决条件：特技专家

你的灵动与优雅举世无双。

神话专长效果：特技专家专长对特技动作与飞行技能检定带来的加值增加2点。此外，你能够花费1次神话之力，使得1次特技动作或者飞行检定就好像自然掷出20一般。你必须在进行检定之前决定使用该能力。

资源出处: Mythic Adventures pg. 54

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Acrobatic

Acrobatic Spellcaster.name: 特技施法者 Acrobatic Spellcaster
Acrobatic Spellcaster.description:
专长类型：Combat

你能够通过纯熟的动作来避免施法受到敌人的干扰。

先决条件: 战斗施法，技能专攻（特技）。

专长效果: 若你通过受威胁的区域或者敌人占据的空间时，成功以1次特技动作检定来免受借机攻击的话，那么在你的剩余回合中，由于你的特技动作检定而无法进行借机攻击的生物也无法在你施法时对你进行借机攻击。

通常状况: 在敌人的触及范围内施法会引起借机攻击，即便你成功通过特技动作检定通过对方的威胁区域也是如此。

资源出处: Ultimate Intrigue pg. 75

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Acrobatic%20Spellcaster

Acupuncture Specialist.name: Acupuncture Specialist
Acupuncture Specialist.description:
You can use the art of acupuncture to heal spiritual woes as well as physical ailments.

Prerequisites
Heal 5 ranks.

Benefits
You can incorporate the art of acupuncture into your healing procedures, allowing you to use physical means to cleanse spiritual ailments. Doing so requires that you have an acupuncture kit (same as a healer's kit) and takes 1 hour. Attempt a Heal check, and compare the result to a single curse or spell with the curse descriptor that the patient is suffering from. If the result of your Heal check exceeds the DC of the curse by 10 or more, the curse's effects are suppressed for 1d4 days. If the result of your Heal check exceeds the DC of the curse by 20 or more, the curse is removed.

Acute Shot.name: 敏锐射击 Acute Shot
Acute Shot.description:
当魔法援助你的远程攻击时，你几乎从不失手。

先决条件: 远距射击，精确射击。

专长效果: 每当你使用远程武器并在攻击骰上获得魔法加值时，你可以将任何远程攻击距离减值转为伤害减值。另外，每当你在远程攻击骰上获得魔法加值时，你可以对有隐蔽的目标造成偷袭伤害（但不能是全隐蔽），只要该攻击满足造成偷袭伤害的其他要求。你能用该方式造成的最高偷袭伤害骰数等于你此次攻击骰上的魔法加值数。

（译者注：原文是magic bonces，然而并不存在这种加值。。。个人理解为由法术或类法术效果造成的加值（包括增强，士气，神圣等））

资源出处: Magic Tactics Toolbox pg. 5

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Acute%20Shot

Adaptive Fortune.name: 万用强运 Adaptive Fortune
Adaptive Fortune.description:
你拥有近乎传奇一般的运气。

先决条件: 幸运儿，【万用幸运】种族特性，角色等级10，半身人。

专长效果: 你的【万用幸运】种族特性的每日使用次数增加1次。此外，当你使用万用幸运时，你获得的加值额外+2。

资源出处: Advanced Race Guide pg. 66

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Adaptive%20Fortune

Adder Strike.name: 虺蛇打击 Adder Strike
Adder Strike.description:
专长类型：Combat

你可以快速的将毒药涂抹在手套、腿甲或其他护具上，让你的徒手打击可以传递这些毒药。

先决条件: 【用毒】职业特性，精通徒手打击，工艺（炼金）1级。

专长效果: 以一个迅捷动作，你可以将身体的两个用于进行徒手打击的部位涂上毒药。在通过这种方式涂毒时你也必须保护自己免于直接暴露在毒药下。

通常状况: 给武器或弹药涂毒是一个标准动作。

资源出处: Ultimate Combat pg. 89

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Adder%20Strike

战策增益：你可以消耗2点耐力来以迅捷动作将毒药涂抹在人造武器上。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 113

Additional Affiliations.name: Additional Affiliations
Additional Affiliations.description:
You have an expansive personality and can forge more affiliations than normal.

Benefits
Increase your affiliation slot total by 2.

Normal
You have a number of affiliation slots equal to your Charisma modifier + 1 (minimum 1).

Special
You can take this feat multiple times; each time you do so, your number of affiliation slots increases by 2.

Additional Traits.name: 额外背景 Additional Traits
Additional Traits.description:
你有更多的背景特性。

专长效果: 你获得两个自选的角色背景特性。这些背景特性必须从不同的列表中选择，并且无法使用之前已经选取背景特性的列表。你必须满足自行选择的背景特性中，任何额外的先决条件。

资源出处: Advanced Players Guide pg. 150Second Darkness Players Guide pg. 12Pathfinder #16: Endless Night pg. 15

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Additional%20Traits

Adept Champion.name: 巧技勇士 Adept Champion
Adept Champion.description:
你可以改变你制裁邪恶的能力，引导神力以赋予你神圣的灵感，让你在战斗技巧方面表现出更高的才能。

先决条件: 【制裁邪恶】职业特性，基本攻击加值+5。

专长效果: 当你使用【制裁邪恶】职业能力，在你行动开始时，你能以一个迅捷动作放弃伤害加值，转而在针对制裁目标的战技检定中获得相当于伤害加值一半的加值奖励。你的【制裁邪恶】效果将在你下次行动时自动恢复正常。

资源出处: Ultimate Combat pg. 89

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Adept%20Champion

Adept Channel.name: Adept Channel
Adept Channel.description:
Some orc adepts enjoy a greater connection to their gods, and can channel their faith through their unholy symbols. You gain the ability to channel energy as a cleric.

Prerequisites
Ability to cast divine spells, summon familiar class ability, caster level 4th, Cha 13.

Benefits
You gain the channel energy class feature, as a cleric, usable 2 times per day. This ability otherwise functions like the cleric's channel energy ability, except that your effective cleric level is equal to your divine spellcasting class level -3. Unlike a cleric, however, the number of times per day you may channel energy is not affected by your Charisma modifier.

Advanced Armor Training.name: Advanced Armor Training
Advanced Armor Training.description:
You are specially trained to use your armor proficiencies in new ways.

Prerequisites
Armor training class feature, fighter level 3rd.

Benefits
Select one advanced armor training option.

Special
This feat can be taken more than once, but at most once per 3 fighter levels.

Advanced Defensive Combat Training.name: Advanced Defensive Combat Training
Advanced Defensive Combat Training.description:
You are a master at defending yourself from all manner of combat maneuvers.

Prerequisites
Defensive Combat Training, Bellflower Network 10 TPA.

Benefits
You gain a +4 bonus to your CMD.

Advanced Gathlain Magic.name: Advanced Gathlain Magic
Advanced Gathlain Magic.description:
You have developed your innate magical abilities.

Prerequisites
Cha 13, character level 3rd, gathlain.

Benefits
You gain the following spells as spell-like abilities, each of which are usable 1/day: wood meld (as meld with stone, but only with wood), wood shape.

Advanced Ranger Trap.name: 进阶游侠陷阱 Advanced Ranger Trap
Advanced Ranger Trap.description:
你的游侠陷阱特别难被发现和避开。

先决条件: 【设置陷阱】职业特性，游侠等级5级。【编注：【设置陷阱（Trap）】是陷阱师（Trapper, UM游侠变体）5级的职业能力。】。

专长效果: 发现或者解除你的游侠陷阱的察觉或解除装置的DC+1。对抗你的游侠陷阱的豁免DC+1。

资源出处: Ultimate Magic pg. 143

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Advanced%20Ranger%20Trap

Advanced Weapon Training.name: 进阶武器训练 Advanced Weapon Training
Advanced Weapon Training.description:
专长类型：Combat

你已经学到了使用老武器的新方法。

先决条件: 战士等级5，战士武器训练（Weapon Training）职业能力。

专长效果: 你可以获得一个进阶武器训练选项，该进阶武器训练必须属于你已拥有武器训练的战士武器组。

特殊说明: 你可以多次选择本专长，但每5个战士等级仅可选择一次。

拥有武器大师（Weapon Master）APG职业变体的战士可以在4级时选择本专长。武器大师选择的进阶武器训练只对他所选的单件武器而非整个战士武器组生效，并且他不可选择百兵一心进阶武器训练。不过，武器大师可以选择本专长作为战士奖励专长，并且这样做的话他不会受到每5个战士等级仅可选择一次本专长的限制。

资源出处: Weapon Masters Handbook pg. 19

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Advanced%20Weapon%20Training

Aerial Roll.name: Aerial Roll
Aerial Roll.description:
By spinning through the air, you are able to avoid your opponents' attacks.

Prerequisites
Fly 10 ranks.

Benefits
You can perform a defensive roll while in the air. As an immediate action, you can attempt a Fly check when you are attacked while flying. If the result of the check is greater than the result of the attack roll, you dodge the attack, causing it to miss automatically. Whether you succeed or fail at the Fly check, the barrel roll leaves you off-balance and vulnerable, causing you to take a -10 penalty on Fly checks until the end of your next turn.

Agent of Fear.name: 恐惧化身 Agent of Fear
Agent of Fear.description:
你所带来的恐惧是如此深邃，摆脱这种脊背发凉的感觉简直难上加难。

先决条件: 谈判专家，骇人现身（Frightening Appearance）职业能力。

专长效果: 当你以对1个目标使用骇人现身（Frightening Appearance）或震撼现身（Stunning Appearance）时，它无法在接下来的24小时内免疫这些效果，不过在这段时间内，它在对抗这些职业能力时豁免检定会获得+2加值。如果你在24小时内对相同的目标重复使用这些能力的话，上述豁免加值会与自身叠加。由于这些能力会让目标生物意识到你的存在，因此在特定的战斗结束之前，你仍旧无法对这些目标使用这些能力。

通常状况: 当生物成为了骇人现身（Frightening Appearance）或震撼现身（Stunning Appearance）的目标时，它会在24小时内免疫这些职业能力的效果。

资源出处: Ultimate Intrigue pg. 75

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Agent%20of%20Fear

Agent of Purity.name: Agent of Purity
Agent of Purity.description:
You have devoted your life to purging blight from the world.

Prerequisites
A friend or ally must have been significantly corrupted by a specific natural or supernatural blight, or you must have a regional background trait tied to a specific blight.

Benefits
Choose one type of terrain affiliated with the relevant blight. You gain a +1 bonus on Knowledge (geography) and Knowledge (nature) checks regarding the blighted terrain and can attempt those Knowledge checks untrained. You also gain a +1 bonus on attack rolls against creatures corrupted by the relevant blight, and you gain a +1 bonus on saving throws against the abilities of such creatures.Goal: Slay or cure at least 50 creatures corrupted by the relevant blight, and then slay a challenging foe closely connected to spreading the blight.

 

Goal
Slay or cure at least 50 creatures corrupted by the relevant blight, and then slay a challenging foe closely connected to spreading the blight.

Special
Once per day, you can cast any one of the following spells as a spell-like ability, using your character level as your caster level: consecrate, neutralize poison, remove curse, or remove disease.

Agile Maiden.name: 灵巧少女 Agile Maiden
Agile Maiden.description:
专长类型：Combat

灰少女的标志性盔甲对你的妨碍会比其他盔甲小的多。

先决条件: 力量13；敏捷13；坚忍或盔甲训练（armor training）职业能力；擅长重甲。

专长效果: 在判断职业能力的前提时（比如游侠的战斗流派（combat style），野蛮人的快速移动（fast movement），或是魔战士的施法能力（spellcasting）），你可以把灰少女全身甲视为中甲和重甲中对你较为有利的一种。这个并不会影响盔甲的属性，并且在决定其他效果的前提时它依旧视为重甲。

资源出处: Adventurers Guide pg. 84

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Agile%20Maiden

Agile Tongue.name: 巧舌 Agile Tongue
Agile Tongue.description:
你能够用粉红色的长舌操控小物品，甚至可以用来偷窃。

先决条件: 树蛙人。

专长效果: 你有一条能够伸长10尺并且适于抓取的舌头。你能够用其抓取不高于5磅的物品，进行盗取或卸武战技，也可以使用舌头进行近战接触攻击。

资源出处: Advanced Race Guide pg. 191

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Agile%20Tongue

Agonizing Obedience.name: 痛苦仪典 Agonizing Obedience
Agonizing Obedience.description:
出于对痛苦的狂热，你糟蹋自己的身体来获得特殊的恩惠（boons）。

先决条件: 医疗3级。

专长效果: 当你选择这个专长时，选择一种痛苦（agony）。你可以多次获得这个专长，但每次都要选择不同的痛苦，不过你在24小时内只能对一种痛苦进行服从仪典。每一种痛苦都需要不同的服从仪典，但所有的仪典只需要一个小时就能完成。一旦仪典被执行，你就会受到一些轻微的惩罚，并获得与你的痛苦相关的某些元素或攻击的抵抗力，如下所述。此外，你还可以获得进行【痛苦打击】的能力，每日使用次数为每5个HD1次+1次。当你对一个生物造成伤害时，你可以宣言该攻击为【痛苦打击】。除了攻击造成的正常伤害外，你还会导致目标在1分钟内受到与你的痛苦相关的惩罚。虚体生物和对重击免疫的生物也免疫【痛苦打击】。

如果你拥有至少12个HD，你会在服从时获得痛苦所给予的第一个恩惠（boon）。如果你拥有至少16个HD，你还会获得痛苦的第二个恩惠。如果你拥有20个HD或更多，你也会获得痛苦的第三个恩惠。除非列出具体的持续时间或每天的使用次数，否则恩惠的影响是恒定的。

If you ever fail to perform a daily obedience, or if you are healed of damage, conditions, or penalties caused in the course of performing your obedience, you lose all access to resistances and boons granted by this feat until you next perform the obedience.

截肢

你已经截断了你的一根手指并治疗了伤口从而让它再也不能完全愈合。

服从仪典：操控你截断的手指的血痂、疤痕和开放的伤口，阻止它闭合，并把一些金属或玻璃强行弄进伤口。你会在解除装置、易容、逃脱、巧手检定以及你对抗卸武的CMD上承受-2减值。当尝试施放带有姿势成分的法术时，你需要通过DC为（5+2×法术环位）的施法者等级检定（甚至不是专注），否则失去该法术。

你在对抗变化系法术的豁免投骰上获得+2加值；如果这个法术是变形子学派的则加值提高到+4。

第一恩惠：除了痛苦打击的正常效果外，目标还可能在你用痛苦打击击中它后立即掉落手中的一个物体。成功的反射豁免（DC为10+1/2HD+你的敏捷调整值）可以避免此效果。

第二恩惠：你得到一只“魅影手臂”的使用权，它的功能就像炼金术士的畸变之臂科研发现（Pathfinder RPG Ultimate Magic 18）。但鉴于它是一种看不见的力场效果，它不能获得额外的戒指魔法装备栏，也不能作出攻击。

第三恩惠：你免疫使你恶心的效果，并且你在对抗任何使你反胃的情形的豁免中获得+4加值。

致盲

你暂时用血液使自己失明，来增强其他的感官。

服从仪典：用指甲、锯齿状的金属屑和多刺的树枝抓挠眼睛，使伤口的血液在眼睑和泪管上形成厚厚的结痂。你在基于视觉的察觉检定中获得-4的减值，并且每当你对受益于隐蔽（concealment）的目标进行攻击时，失手率增加10%（最多50%）。

你在对抗心灵幻觉子学派和凝视攻击的豁免投骰上获得+4加值。

第一恩惠：被你的痛苦打击影响的生物在昏暗和黑暗区域的能见距离减少50%。

第二恩惠：你获得30尺范围的凝视攻击，以标准动作启动。你可以每天使用这个能力的分钟数相当于你HD的一半；这些时间不必连续，但你必须以1分钟为单位。受你凝视攻击影响的敌人会惊惧1分钟。成功的意志豁免（DC为10+1/2HD+你的魅力修正）会无效化此效果。一个成功豁免你的凝视攻击的生物在24小时内对其效果免疫。

第三恩惠：你对痛苦的亲和力让你能感觉到别人的痛苦。你获得60尺远的生命感知。

剥皮

剥皮痛苦的服从者擅长从活生生的肉体上精细地去除皮肤，露出下面脆弱的组织。

服从仪典：用一把剥皮刀取下你自己至少3平方英寸的皮肤，同时小心避免损伤下面的肌肉、静脉和其他组织。让这片暴露的神经不被衣服或盔甲遮住，让它暴露在元素中，并向你遇到的所有人展示你的牺牲。你在对疾病的豁免中承受-2的减值，并且每个偷袭骰额外承受1点伤害。

你在对抗痛苦（pain）效果的豁免投骰上获得+4加值。

第一恩惠：你对遭受痛苦打击影响的生物进行的所有攻击都会造成1d6的流血伤害。

第二恩惠：你对解剖学的了解赋予你一种对他人的脆弱性的认识。你在确认重击的攻击检定中获得+4加值。

第三恩惠：频繁的皮肤去除和随后的愈合让你的你的身体复盖了厚厚的疤痕。你的AC增加2点天生护甲加值。此外，重击和偷袭有25%的几率不会影响你，就好像你穿着带有次等护命附魔的盔甲一样。

资源出处: Occult Mysteries pg. 45

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Agonizing%20Obedience

Airy Step.name: 轻灵步 Airy Step
Airy Step.description:
空气回应着你内在的元素本质，在你坠落时帮助缓冲，保护你免受伤害。

先决条件: 风元素裔。

专长效果: 你在对抗带有〔气〕与〔电〕描述符的效果，以及造成闪电伤害的效果时豁免检定+2。在计算坠落对你造成的伤害时视为比原高度低30尺。

资源出处: Advanced Race Guide pg. 159

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Airy%20Step

Al-Zabriti-Trained Horse.name: Al-Zabriti-Trained Horse
Al-Zabriti-Trained Horse.description:
This horse was trained by the Al-Zabriti tribespeople. It knows more tricks and is more loyal to its rider than most mounts.

Prerequisites
Horse.

Benefits
This horse automatically knows the tricks included in the combat riding trick (attack, come, defend, down, guard, and heel), and these tricks do not count against the normal maximum number of tricks the horse can learn. The Handle Animal DC to get the horse to perform a trick is reduced by 5, and the DC to teach the horse new tricks is reduced by 5.

Alchemical Strike.name: 炼金打击 Alchemical Strike
Alchemical Strike.description:
专长类型：Combat

你专注于一次攻击中，大幅度提升了你投掷的炼金物品的效果。

先决条件: 随手投掷，BAB+6。

专长效果: 你可以以一个全回合攻击动作投掷一个炼金物品，提升该炼金物品的效果。当你用全回合攻击动作投掷单一个炼金物品时，该物品造成的所有效果DC+2。当你的BAB加值达到+11以及之后的每多5点，DC就再增加2.该专长不能应用在炼金术师的炼金炸弹上。

特殊说明: 炼金术师可以选择该专长来取代一个炼金术士科研发现。他不需要达到该专长的先决条件。炼金术士使用他的职业等级而非BAB来计算该专长中涉及BAB的效果。

资源出处: Magic Tactics Toolbox pg. 12

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Alchemical%20Strike

Aldori Artistry.name: 奥多里战斗技艺 Aldori Artistry
Aldori Artistry.description:
专长类型：Combat

先决条件：异种武器擅长（奥多里决斗剑），武器娴熟，BAB+2。

先决条件: 异种武器擅长（奥多里决斗剑），武器娴熟，BAB+2。

专长效果: 选择以下战技之一：卸武，移位、偷盗、破武或摔绊。当你挥舞着奥多里决斗剑进行选择的战技时，你会获得+2加值。这个加值不会与“精通”类的战技专长相叠加（如精通摔绊）。

特别的：你可以多次选择这个专长，每次选择额外选择一项战技。

资源出处: Adventurers Guide pg. 24

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Aldori%20Artistry

Aldori Dueling Disciple.name: 奥多里决斗学徒 Aldori Dueling Disciple
Aldori Dueling Disciple.description:
专长类型：Combat

先决条件：异种武器擅长（奥多里决斗剑），武器娴熟，武器专攻（奥多里决斗剑）。

先决条件: 异种武器擅长（奥多里决斗剑），武器娴熟，武器专攻（奥多里决斗剑）。

专长效果: 你可以在威吓鉴定中获得+2的士气加值，而任何试图降低你士气的DC都会增加2。当你参加一场决斗时，这些奖励就会增加到+4。

资源出处: Adventurers Guide pg. 24Inner Sea Combat pg. 10

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Aldori%20Dueling%20Disciple

战策增益：在任何并非决斗的战斗中，你可以在你回合开始的时候消耗1点耐力来在决定获得奥多里战斗学徒专长好处的时候将这场战斗视为决斗，这将持续到你的下一回合开始。

战策资源出处: Weapon Master's Handbook pg. 24

Aldori Dueling Mastery.name: 奥多里决斗大师 Aldori Dueling Mastery
Aldori Dueling Mastery.description:
专长类型：Combat

你熟练掌握被奥多里利剑之王所完善的激烈的战斗技巧。

先决条件: 擅长异种武器（奥多里决斗剑），即时备战，武器娴熟，武器专攻（奥多里决斗剑）。

专长效果: 只要你在手持奥多里决斗剑时开始战斗，你便能在先攻检定上获得+2加值。只要你持有且仅用一只手持有一把奥多里决斗剑，你在AC上获得+2盾牌加值——若你用双手持用该剑，AC加值下降为+1盾牌加值。尽管决斗剑造成的是挥砍伤害，你在决定由决斗家持用武器的效果时，也会同时将其视为一把穿刺武器。

资源出处: Adventurers Guide pg. 24Pathfinder Campaign Setting pg. 67Inner Sea World Guide pg. 284

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Aldori%20Dueling%20Mastery

战策增益：你可以在你回合开始的时候消耗至多6点耐力来提升你从奥多里决斗大师专长上获得的盾牌加值，每消耗2点耐力就能提升1点，这将持续到你的下一回合开始。

战策资源出处: Weapon Master's Handbook pg. 24

Aldori Style.name: 奥多里决斗流 Aldori Style
Aldori Style.description:
专长类型：CombatStyle

你已经学会了基础的奥多里决斗架势。

先决条件: 警觉，异种武器擅长（奥多里决斗剑），武器娴熟，武器专攻（奥多里决斗剑）。

专长效果: 使用奥多里决斗流并持有且仅用一只手持有一把奥多里决斗剑（不使用盾牌，副手武器，甲刺，徒手攻击或天生武器）时，你进行防御式战斗或使用寓守于攻时，你的武器伤害检定获得+2加值。

资源出处: Adventurers Guide pg. 24

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Aldori%20Style

Aldori Style Aegis.name: 奥多里神盾 Aldori Style Aegis
Aldori Style Aegis.description:
专长类型：Combat

阿尔多里男爵的决斗风格在一对一的决斗中最为强大。将剑柄反握并保持你的剑刃灵动，你可以轻松地招架你对手的攻击。

先决条件: 奥多里决斗流，警觉，战斗反射，异种武器擅长（奥多里决斗剑），武器娴熟，武器专攻（奥多里决斗剑）。

专长效果: 当你使用奥多里决斗流，在回合开始时，你以迅捷动作选择一个目标。这个选择将持续到你的下一个回合开始，在此期间你在对抗来自于目标之外的生物的攻击时，你的AC承受-2减值。以一个直觉动作，当你进行防御式战斗或使用寓守于攻时，你可以尝试格挡目标的攻击。它的作用如同游荡剑客的适时格挡反击opportune parry and riposte炫技，除了它无需花费时髦值以及你无法进行反击。

资源出处: Adventurers Guide pg. 24

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Aldori%20Style%20Aegis

Aldori Style Conquest.name: 奥多里征服 Aldori Style Conquest
Aldori Style Conquest.description:
专长类型：Combat

防御成为了你的本能，你的剑将惩罚那些试图攻击且失败的人。

先决条件: 奥多里决斗流，奥多里神盾，警觉，战斗反射，异种武器擅长（奥多里决斗剑），武器娴熟，武器专攻（奥多里决斗剑）。

专长效果: 但你试图使用奥多里神盾招架一次攻击时，你不会受到任何因进行防御式战斗或使用寓守于攻而招致的攻击检定减值。

资源出处: Adventurers Guide pg. 25

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Aldori%20Style%20Conquest

Alertness (Mythic).name: 警觉(神话) Alertness (Mythic)
Alertness (Mythic).description:
先决条件：警觉

你的觉察力超越众人，无论是用来感知周遭环境还是用来判断他人的意图。

神话专长效果：警觉专长对察觉与察言观色技能检定带来的加值增加2点。此外，你能够花费1次神话之力，使得1次察觉或者察言观色检定就好像自然掷出20一般。你必须在进行检定之前决定使用该能力。

资源出处: Mythic Adventures pg. 54

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Alertness

Alien Mindpaths.name: Alien Mindpaths
Alien Mindpaths.description:
When you're in the company of other aliens, your thoughts become difficult to follow.

Prerequisites
Android, kasatha, lashunta, or Triaxian.

Benefits
Whenever you're adjacent to at least one other android, kasatha, lashunta, or Triaxian ally who also has this feat, you gain a +4 circumstance bonus on saves against mind-affecting effects and divination (scrying) effects, unless the effect comes from an android, kasatha, lashunta, or Triaxian.

Align Equipment.name: 阵营武具 Align Equipment
Align Equipment.description:
祝福武具能力在对抗异界生物时更加有效。

先决条件: 阵营导能、祝福武具、施法者等级3、引导能力职业特性。

专长效果: 在祝福武具的能力表之外，你可以给武器、盾牌、护甲灌入更多种类的能力，见表。你所附加的额外能力必须符合你的引导能量能力和阵营导能能力。例如，只有阵营导能（善良）的角色才能给武器附加神圣holy特殊能力。阵营导能（秩序）的角色才能给盾牌附加机警vigilant特殊能力。其它规则等同于祝福武具专长。

阵营武器祝福使用引导次数施法者等级需求
混沌（混乱）36
秩序（守序）36
神圣（善良）36
邪恶（邪恶）36

阵营护甲/盾牌祝福使用引导次数施法者等级需求
勇士（善良）23
卑劣（邪恶）23
挑战（限单一阵营异界生物）*23
正义（善良）610
无拘（混乱）610
邪道（邪恶）610
机警（守序）610
* 你所选的类型必须符合你的引导能量能力。


资源出处: Undead Slayers Handbook pg. 6

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Align%20Equipment

Alignment Channel (Mythic).name: 阵营导能(神话) Alignment Channel (Mythic)
Alignment Channel (Mythic).description:
先决条件：阵营导能

你的信仰之力会伤害所有遵循着敌对阵营的生物。

神话专长效果：当你进行阵营导能时，你的引导能量能够影响任何具有你所选择的阵营的生物（不光是异界生物，也不仅仅是那些具有阵营亚种的生物），但是只对这些目标造成一半的治疗或伤害。除此之外，你也能够在使用阵营导能花费2次神话之力，以此来影响所有你所选择的阵营的目标，就如同他们具有与之相符的阵营亚种一般。

资源出处: Mythic Adventures pg. 54

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Alignment%20Channel

All-Consuming Swing.name: All-Consuming Swing
All-Consuming Swing.description:
You deliver unchecked destruction when you stand against multiple foes, sometimes to your own detriment.

Prerequisites
Str 13, Power Attack, Cleave, Vital Strike, base attack bonus +8.

Benefits
Whenever you use Cleave or Great Cleave, you can apply the additional damage you would gain from Vital Strike, Improved Vital Strike, or Greater Vital Strike to the initial target of your attack. When you do so, the strain on your body causes you to take an amount of damage equal to the extra damage dealt by your Vital Strike feat. This self-inflicted damage is not reduced by damage reduction.

Allied Spellcaster.name: 团队法师 Allied Spellcaster
Allied Spellcaster.description:
专长类型：Teamwork

你十分擅长在盟友的帮助下，使用自身的法术突破其他生物的防护。

先决条件: 施法者等级1级。

专长效果: 若你邻近一名同样拥有该专长的盟友，那么你在克服法术抗力的施法者等级检定中获得+2表现加值。如果你的盟友准备了相同的法术（或者在盟友为自发施法者的情况下，他的已知法术有这个法术并且还有可用法术位），这个加值会提升至+4，并且在确定所有与CL相关的变量（如持续时间，范围和效果）时，你的CL获得+1加值。

资源出处: Advanced Players Guide pg. 150

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Allied%20Spellcaster

Ally Caller.name: Ally Caller
Ally Caller.description:
You can draw upon aid from the ocean more frequently.

Prerequisites
Triton, summon nature's ally II spell-like ability, character level 3rd.

Benefits
You gain two additional uses of summon nature's ally II per day.

Special
You may take this feat multiple times. Each time you select it, you gain two additional uses of summon nature's ally II.

Ally Shield.name: 友身作盾 Ally Shield
Ally Shield.description:
专长类型：BetrayalTeamwork

你乐意使用你的盟友作为盾牌以抵挡攻击。

专长效果: 无论何时当你成为一个近战攻击或远程攻击的目标时且邻接一个同样拥有此专长的盟友，你可以以一个直觉动作激活这个专长扑进牺牲者的怀里或躲到牺牲者的身后。

你针对这次攻击获得遮蔽。如果此次攻击没能击中你且如果没获得遮蔽加值会击中你时，牺牲者会成为此次攻击的目标。攻击者必须投一次新的攻击骰（使用同样的调整）对抗牺牲者的AC.

资源出处: Champions of Corruption pg. 20

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Ally%20Shield

Alter Binary Mindscape.name: 强势异能宣战 Alter Binary Mindscape
Alter Binary Mindscape.description:
在一场异能决斗中，你能够变换并改变并行式心像结界来为自身创造优势。

先决条件: 智力 13，能够施放异能宣战（Instigate Psychic Duel）。

专长效果: 当你施放异能宣战（Instigate Psychic Duel）并创造出一个并行式心像结界（binary mindscape）时，可以将敌人至于不利地位。当你的敌人创造任何防御幻形（Defensive Manifestations）时，它必须比正常额外花费1点幻形点数（Manifestation Points，MP）。

资源出处: Occult Adventures pg. 129

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Alter%20Binary%20Mindscape

Altitude Affinity.name: 高原适应力 Altitude Affinity
Altitude Affinity.description:
你拥有一副坚韧的身体，能够在高原的严酷环境中生存下来。

先决条件: 坚忍。

专长效果: 你自动适应高海拔地区的环境（high altitudes，核心规则书 430页）。此外，你在海拔5000尺或更高环境所进行的生存检定获得+2表现加值。

资源出处: Inner Sea World Guide pg. 284Pathfinder #6: Spires of Xin-Shalast pg. 68Pathfinder Campaign Setting pg. 218

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Altitude%20Affinity

Amateur Gunslinger.name: 业余铳士 Amateur Gunslinger
Amateur Gunslinger.description:
专长类型：Combat

虽然你并不是一个铳士，但你仍拥有并可以使用勇毅能力。

先决条件: 在拥有【勇毅】能力的职业上没有等级。

专长效果: 你获得少量的勇毅点，并且可以使用一项1级铳士铳技。在一天的开始，你获得1点勇毅点，不过在这一天里你仍然可以通过额外奖励获得最大为感知修正的勇毅点数（最低为1）。你像其他铳士一样适用勇毅点恢复的规则。你可以花费这些勇毅点来使用你在获得该专长时选择的1级铳士铳技，或通过专长或魔法物品获得的其他铳技。

特殊说明: 如果你在拥有【勇毅】能力的职业上获得了等级，你可以立刻将本专长替换为“额外勇毅（Extra Grit, UC）”专长。

资源出处: Ultimate Combat pg. 89

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Amateur%20Gunslinger

战策增益：选择第二个1级铳士铳技。你可以花费勇毅点数来使用此铳技，或以5点耐力为代价使用这两个铳技。如果你在提供勇毅点的职业上升了级，你可以选择花费5点耐力而非勇毅点来使用任何一种你的1级铳技。该战策也适用于额外勇毅专长。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 113

Amateur Investigator.name: 业余调查员 Amateur Investigator
Amateur Investigator.description:
你拥有的知识和灵感已经足够用来解决神秘事件。

先决条件: 智力13，至少在一个知识技能上拥有技能等级，在拥有灵感（Inspiration）职业能力的职业上不具有任何等级。

专长效果: 你获得一个大小等同于你智力调整值的灵感池，如同调查员的灵感一样，你可以以一个自由动作使用一点灵感点数，再已受训的知识，语言学或辨识法术技能检定上增加1d6点结果（即使你在这项检定上取10或取20也可以），但你必须在进行检定但得出结果以前使用此能力。你在每次技能检定上只能使用最多1点灵感点数。你的灵感池会在每天的完整休息以后得到恢复。

特殊说明: 如果你在拥有灵感职业能力的职业上获得了职业等级，那么本专长将立刻替换为额外灵感专长。

资源出处: Advanced Class Guide pg. 141

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Amateur%20Investigator

Amateur Swashbuckler.name: 业余剑客 Amateur Swashbuckler
Amateur Swashbuckler.description:
专长类型：Combat

虽然不经常搏命，但你的派头已经超越了普通的决斗者。

先决条件: 在拥有派头（Panache）职业能力的职业上不具有任何等级。

专长效果: 你获得少量的时髦值，并且可以选择学会一项1级游荡剑客炫技（不能选择适时格挡反击），一旦选择即不能更改。在一天的开始，你获得1点时髦值，不过在这一天里你仍然可以通过额外奖励获得最大为魅力调整值的时髦值（最低为1）。你像其他游荡剑客一样适用时髦值恢复的规则。你可以花费这些时髦值来使用你在获得该专长时选择的1级炫技，或通过专长或魔法物品获得的其他炫技。

特殊说明: 如果你在拥有派头职业能力的职业上获得了职业等级，那么本专长将立刻替换为额外时髦值专长。

资源出处: Advanced Class Guide pg. 141

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Amateur%20Swashbuckler

战策增益：选择第二个1级游荡剑客派头。你可以花费时髦值来使用此炫技，或以5点耐力为代价使用这两个派头。如果你在提供时髦值的职业上升了级，你可以选择花费5点耐力而非时髦值来使用任何一种你的1级派头。该战策也适用于额外派头专长。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 113

Ambuscading Spell.name: 伏击施法 Ambuscading Spell
Ambuscading Spell.description:
你的魔法在打击那些浑然不觉的目标时特别有效。

专长效果: 当处于突袭轮时，你的对手会在对抗你的法术效果的豁免检定上承受-2减值；即使这些生物已经行动过，它们也会在对抗你的法术效果的豁免检定上承受-1减值。

资源出处: Dirty Tactics Toolbox pg. 12

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Ambuscading%20Spell

Ambush Awareness.name: 突袭警惕 Ambush Awareness
Ambush Awareness.description:
你极少会被打个措手不及。

先决条件: 警觉。

专长效果: 如果你因为察觉检定失败而在突袭轮中无法行动，你仍然可以正常进行先攻检定并且可以在轮到你的先攻位时行动——但是，你只能进行全防御。

资源出处: Ultimate Wilderness pg. 106Dirty Tactics Toolbox pg. 12

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Ambush%20Awareness

战策增益：你可以消耗3点耐力来将该专长的好处赋予一名临近的盟友。

战策资源出处: Armor Master's Handbook pg. 20

Ambush Sense.name: 伏击感知 Ambush Sense
Ambush Sense.description:
专长类型：Combat

你时刻警惕周遭的威胁，没有任何袭击与背叛能把你打个措手不及。

先决条件: 智力13，陷阱感知职业能力。

专长效果: 你在避免在战斗开始时被突袭的察觉检定获得加值，在突袭轮中时的防御等级上也会获得闪避加值，这个加值的数量等同于你的陷阱感知加值。

资源出处: Advanced Class Origins pg. 26

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Ambush%20Sense

Ambush Squad.name: Ambush Squad
Ambush Squad.description:
You know that the keys to victory are sudden attacks and even more sudden retreats.

Prerequisites
Base attack bonus +1, kobold.

Benefits
When you're adjacent to an ally who also has this feat at the beginning of a surprise round, and both you and that ally can act during that surprise round, you can take both a standard action and a move action during that surprise round.

Normal
You can take only a standard action or a move action during a surprise round.

Ammo Drop.name: 快速装弹 Ammo Drop
Ammo Drop.description:
专长类型：Combat

你的协调技巧超赞，可以让你随手抛入石弹，却让他完美的填装在投石索里且满足力矩需求。

先决条件: 巧手1级，擅长投石索。

专长效果: 你可以以移动动作或迅捷动作，单手为投石索，或双头投石索的一头装弹。这不会引发借机攻击。

资源出处: Halflings of Golarion pg. 23

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Ammo%20Drop

Amplified Hex.name: 强能巫术 Amplified Hex
Amplified Hex.description:
你可以将魔法能量导入自己的巫术，增强它们的力量。

先决条件: 巫术职业能力。

专长效果: 你可以将至少为1环的法术位或已准备的法术消耗掉从而强化你的巫术。在一天之中，每次你使用本能力都必须消耗一个比第一次高一环的法术位或已准备法术（第二次使用时消耗2环，第三次消耗3环，以此类推）。你可以选择增强一个巫术的以下效果：增加它的豁免DC1点，增加它的有效距离30尺（前提是这个巫术拥有至少30尺基本距离）或是增加它的持续时间1轮（前提是它至少持续1轮）。

资源出处: Advanced Class Origins pg. 26

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Amplified%20Hex

Amplified Radiance.name: Amplified Radiance
Amplified Radiance.description:
The vicinity of another of your kind ignites your inner light into a shining aurora.

Prerequisites
Aasimar, daylight racial spell-like ability.

Benefits
Whenever you are within 15 feet of an aasimar ally who has both the daylight racial spell-like ability and this feat, you gain an aura of radiance. You and your ally must both have at least one use of your daylight racial spell-like ability available to gain this benefit. This aura functions as per the daylight spell, except that it's a 10-foot-radius emanation centered on you without additional areas of weaker illumination. Creatures within this aura who take penalties in bright light double those penalties. The effects of overlapping auras of radiance don't stack. You can activate or suppress this aura as a swift action.

Amplified Rage.name: Amplified Rage
Amplified Rage.description:
When adjacent to other raging allies, your rages become even more powerful.

Prerequisites
Half-orc or orc, rage class feature.

Benefits
Whenever you are raging and adjacent to a raging ally who also has this feat or flanking the same opponent as a raging ally with this feat, your morale bonuses to Strength and Constitution increase by +4. This feat does not stack with itself (you only gain this bonus from one qualifying ally, regardless of how many are adjacent to you).

Anatomical Savant.name: Anatomical Savant
Anatomical Savant.description:
You know how to perform deadly strikes against even the most nebulous of targets.

Prerequisites
Weapon Focus, base attack bonus +12.

Benefits
Choose one weapon with which you have the Weapon Focus feat. When you strike an opponent that has a chance of negating critical hits or sneak attacks, such as from the fortification armor special ability, reduce that chance by 25%. Treat creatures that are normally immune to critical hits and sneak attacks as instead having a 75% chance to negate the critical hit or sneak attack, taking only the attack's normal damage.

Special
You can take this feat multiple times. Each time you take the feat, it applies to a different weapon.

Ancestral Enmity.name: 有仇报仇 Ancestral Enmity
Ancestral Enmity.description:
专长类型：Combat

你熟知那些矬子对巨人的憎恨，并研究了针对这些家伙的战术。

先决条件: 巨人生物亚种。

专长效果: 你在对矮人或侏儒发动的近战攻击检定上获得+2加值。

特殊说明: 你可以多次选择本专长，它们的效果叠加。

资源出处: Monster Codex pg. 68

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Ancestral%20Enmity

Ancestral Scorn.name: Ancestral Scorn
Ancestral Scorn.description:
The fury you harbor for your fiendish ancestors gives evil outsiders great reason to fear you.

Prerequisites
Intimidate 5 ranks, tiefling.

Benefits
Whenever you successfully demoralize an outsider of the evil subtype with an Intimidate check, it becomes sickened for 1 round in addition to being affected by the normal effects of being demoralized. If you beat the DC by 5 or more, the creature is nauseated for 1 round instead.

Normal
Demoralizing a foe with a successful Intimidate check causes it to become shaken for 1 round, +1 round for every 5 by which you beat the DC.

Ancestral Weapon Mastery.name: Ancestral Weapon Mastery
Ancestral Weapon Mastery.description:
You have mastered ancient techniques that increase the effectiveness of your race's ancestral weapons.

Prerequisites
Base attack bonus +1, weapon familiarity racial trait.

Benefits
You're proficient with all of your race's racial weapons (the weapons mentioned in your race's weapon familiarity racial trait). If you're already proficient with any of those weapons, you instead gain Weapon Focus for one of those weapons as a bonus feat. Furthermore, if you gain Weapon Focus as a bonus feat with one of your racial weapons as a result of this feat, you can change which racial weapon your bonus Weapon Focus feat applies to by engaging in 10 minutes of practice with the new weapon. The benefits of this bonus Weapon Focus feat last until you choose to practice and apply it to a different racial weapon.

Ancient Draconic.name: Ancient Draconic
Ancient Draconic.description:
You empower spells using the ancient language of dragons.

Prerequisites
Arcane caster level 5th, speaks Draconic.

Benefits
You gain a +1 bonus on caster level checks to overcome spell resistance when casting arcane spells that have a verbal component. If you speak Draconic when casting an arcane language-dependent spell, all intelligent creatures with a language can understand your words.

Ancient Tradition.name: Ancient Tradition
Ancient Tradition.description:
You have devoted yourself to keeping the traditions of an ancient or lost culture alive and well, and you gain strength from your devotion to the old ways.

Prerequisites
Knowledge (history) 3 ranks, must have a connection to a lost culture (see text).

Benefits
Each lost culture has its own daily ritual, but none of them take more than 1 hour per day to perform. Once you've performed the daily ritual, you gain the benefit of a special ability or resistance as indicated in the Daily Ritual entry for the culture in question. Specific cultures and their rituals are listed below.
If you have at least 12 Hit Dice, you also gain the first boon granted by your lost culture upon undertaking its daily ritual. If you have at least 16 Hit Dice, you also gain the lost culture's second boon. If you have 20 Hit Dice or more, you also gain the lost culture's third boon. Each boon is a spell-like ability that you can cast once per day. Your caster level for these boons is equal to your Hit Dice, and the saving throw DC is based on your Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma modifier (whichever is highest).

For the purposes of this feat, you are considered to have a connection to a lost culture if you have a relic or object from that civilization, have extensively researched that culture, or are descended--directly or culturally--from that culture's people. Once you have chosen a lost culture, you cannot change it without your GM's permission. At the GM's discretion, other types of connections might also apply. Typically, you can have a connection to only one lost civilization. If you ever fail to perform a daily ritual, you lose all access to the benefits and boons granted by this feat until the time you next perform the daily ritual.

Lost Cultures
The following cultures have rich ancient traditions in which characters can invest.

Ancient Osirion

Founded by Azghaad, a prophet of Nethys who famously slew a Spawn of Rovagug and founded his capital within its carapace, Osirion is a nation with a long and proud history. The Ancient Osirians are best known today for their elaborate tombs, many of which have remained untouched for millennia.

Daily Ritual
Position yourself where you can watch the sun rise. As it does, briefly give thanks to each god in Ancient Osirion's pantheon. Reflect on your notable Osirian ancestors or other ancient heroes and their accomplishments. Then, leave a small offering of cooked food on a wooden plate (or, if none is available, on a large leaf ). You gain a +4 bonus on saving throws to resist death effects.

Boons
1: sepia snake sigil;
2: elemental body IV;
3: mage's disjunction.

Azlant

Azlant is considered by many to have been the pinnacle of human society, though the ancient empire's hubris brought about the calamity known as Earthfall.

Daily Ritual
Stand tall, with one arm outstretched, clutching a crystal, gem, or ioun stone in your fist. Keeping your arm outstretched, slowly turn three times in a counterclockwise circle, each time naming aloud one of your achievements or strengths. You gain a +2 bonus on Spellcraft and Use Magic Device checks.

Boons
1: arcane sight;
2: reverse gravity;
3: overwhelming presence.

Jistka Imperium

One of the first human civilizations to emerge after the devastation of Earthfall, Jistka was known for its advanced technologies and mighty legions. The Imperium eventually fell before the rising might of Ancient Osirion and the Tekritanin League.

Daily Ritual
Read sections from the Poleiheira, the journals of Arustun, the ancient hero who founded the Jistka Imperium. If you do not have any portions of these journals, you can instead meditate on the nature of civilization, the importance of structure and discipline to society, and the ways in which technology can improve the lives of the people. You gain a +1 bonus on damage rolls for nonmagical masterwork weapons and a +2 bonus on Craft checks to create golems.

Boons
1: keen edge;
2: control construct;
3: wooden phalanx.

Lung Wa

While not the largest empire in its region's history, Lung Wa was perhaps the most prosperous--and certainly the most recent, collapsing only about a century ago. The empire's reign is noted for its long periods of peace and stability, along with its state religion, which raised emperors to deities and banned the worship of other divine figures.

Daily Ritual
Carefully write your name in calligraphy in the center of a blank piece of parchment. Then, write around it the names of those to whom you have obligations: your family members, superiors, dependents, business partners, neighbors, and so on, mapping the personal connections in a wheel about yourself. If no paper is available, the writing can be performed in a patch of smooth sand or earth instead. You gain a +4 bonus on saving throws to resist emotion effects.

Boons
1: tongues;
2: form of the dragon I;
3: resplendent mansion.

Ninshabur

Situated around the Pit of Gormuz, the nation of Ninshabur boasted a warlike people, whose phalanxes spread far and wide to lay siege to other nations. Though their armies are said to have successfully done battle against the Spawn of Rovagug on many occasions, they met their end facing the wicked Tarrasque.

Daily Ritual
Recall a battle with a magical beast you participated in that occurred within the last week. Meditate on your technique and identify ways to improve for your next combat. If you have not fought a magical beast recently, instead train for 1 hour, chanting the war cries of Ninshabur while you do. You gain a +2 bonus on damage rolls against magical beasts.

Boons
1: monstrous physique I;
2: regenerate;
3: symbol of strife.

Sarkoris

The land that was once Sarkoris has always been unpredictable and wild--a place where borders between planes were naturally thin and whose ties to other planes of existence long predated the formation of the Worldwound. Before this land was invaded by demons and scoured of human life, it was home to a proud warrior culture ruled over by shamans.

Daily Ritual
With your back to the rising sun, travel directly westward (or as close to directly westward as you can manage). At the first signs of an animal you encounter, you must change your path to track it, and if you are able to catch up to it within an hour, you must attempt to slay or capture it. You gain a +2 bonus on Knowledge (planes) and Survival checks.

Boons
1: summon nature's ally III;
2: fairy ring retreat;
3: gate.

Shory

The aerial Shory Empire consisted of a collection of loosely aligned city-states that soared through the skies with the power of Shory's advanced aeromancy techniques.

Daily Ritual
Climb to the highest point available to you, where you have a clear and unobstructed view of the sky. If you are able to fly, you should fly as high as you reasonably can instead. Spread your arms wide and reflect on the openness and freedom of the skies, and the power of flight. Speak a blessing to each of the four winds and ask that they bring only good fortune your way this day. You gain a +2 bonus on Fly checks and treat your caster level as 1 higher when determining the duration of spells you cast with the air descriptor.

Boons
1: fly;
2: wind walk;
3: winds of vengeance.

Tar Taargadth

The dwarven empire of Tar Taargadth was the final product of the dwarves who undertook the Quest for Sky. The empire represented both the perseverance and the unity of the dwarves in ancient days.

Daily Ritual
Dig a hole that is at least 1 foot deep. Gather the dug up earth and create a small mound. Sit on the mound and meditate on the Quest for Sky. Reflect both on the life for those underground and the liberation granted to those above ground. Write a short prayer and bury it in the hole, covering it with the same earth. You gain a +2 bonus on Survival checks while underground and a +2 bonus on Fortitude saves.

Boons
1: meld with stone;
2: rampart;
3: clashing rocks.

Thassilon

Ruled over by powerful mages and built on the backs of enslaved giants, Thassilon was one of the great powers of the ancient world.

Daily Ritual
Meditate on an action you performed the previous day that particularly corresponds with one of the seven sins celebrated by Thassilonian rune magic. If you cannot think of any sinful actions you performed the previous day, you are unable to complete the ritual. Once your meditation is complete, draw the rune corresponding to the chosen sin in a prominent place on your body, such as the palm, the back of the hand, the forehead, or the chest. Choose a school of magic from the following list: abjuration, conjuration, enchantment, evocation, illusion, necromancy, or transmutation. Once you choose a school of magic, it cannot be changed. You gain a +2 bonus on saves against spells of the chosen school.

Boons
1: explosive runes;
2: symbol of stunning;
3: symbol of vulnerability.

Andoren Falconry.name: 安多安训鹰术 Andoren Falconry
Andoren Falconry.description:
你了解由暗月谷（Darkmoon Vale）的诺沃特尼安家族（Novotnian family）所发明的安多安（Andoren）训鹰技艺。

先决条件: 魅力13，动物亲善，动物伙伴职业能力（animal companion class feature）。

专长效果: 你改善了自身鹰（eagles）、隼（falcons）、猎鹰（hawks）以及猫头鹰（owls）之类的猛禽的亲和力。你在训练或者驾驭这些猛禽时的驯养动物检定中获得+2加值。此外，如果你拥有一只猛禽作为动物伙伴，那么你的动物伙伴同时获得后述奖励之一：AC获得+1闪避加值，所有攻击检定获得+1士气加值，或者所有意志豁免获得+2士气加值。

资源出处: Inner Sea World Guide pg. 284Pathfinder Campaign Setting pg. 63

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Andoren%20Falconry

Angel Wings.name: 天使之翼 Angel Wings
Angel Wings.description:
你背后生出一双羽翼。

先决条件: 天使之血，神裔，角色等级10。

专长效果: 你获得一双羽翼，这将给予你身着轻甲或无甲时的30尺飞行（机动性普通），中、重载或身着中、重甲时的20尺飞行（机动性较差）。飞行将成为你的本职技能。

资源出处: Advanced Race Guide pg. 87

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Angel%20Wings

Angelbane Strike.name: 屠圣之刃 Angelbane Strike
Angelbane Strike.description:
你呼唤来自深渊的大能，聚集邪力斩杀正义的使者。

先决条件: 引导打击，神术施法者5级，引导负能量职业能力，信仰恶魔领主之一。

专长效果: 当你使用引导打击攻击一个善良阵营的活物时，你可以将引导打击所有伤害骰中为1的结果视为2。

除此之外，如果你的目标是一个善良异界生物或是侍奉善良神祇的神术施法者，那么你在发动引导打击时，视为你的拥有引导能量的职业等级+2来决定你的引导能量骰数。

资源出处: Monster Codex pg. 32

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Angelbane%20Strike

Angelic Blood.name: 天使之血 Angelic Blood
Angelic Blood.description:
你的血液中蕴含着神圣的力量。

先决条件: 体质13，神裔。

专长效果: 你在面对〔邪恶〕描述符的法术或效果时的豁免检定，以及HP小于0（但还没死）时用于稳定伤势的体质检定+2。此外，每当你受到出血或吸血伤害，任何邻接你的不死生物、或拥有邪恶子类别的生物都会受到1点伤害。

资源出处: Advanced Race Guide pg. 88

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Angelic%20Blood

Angelic Flesh.name: 天使之躯 Angelic Flesh
Angelic Flesh.description:
你的皮肤如同金属一样闪闪发亮。

先决条件: 天使之血，神裔。

专长效果: 你的易容和隐匿检定受到-2罚值，但是获得下列好处之一，这取决于你的血肉对金属的亲和力（选择一项）。

金：你对抗目盲、目眩、心灵幻觉和〔光亮〕描述符效果时豁免+2。当你施放幻术（心灵幻觉）子类别或拥有〔光亮〕描述符的法术或类法术时，你视为CL比实际高1级。

银：你对抗麻痹、石化以及毒素时豁免+2。你的徒手攻击或天生武器在对抗伤害减免时被视为炼银武器。

钢：你获得AC天生护甲加值+1。你的徒手打击或天生武器在对抗伤害减免时被视为寒铁武器。

资源出处: Advanced Race Guide pg. 88

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Angelic%20Flesh

Animal Affinity (Mythic).name: 动物亲和(神话) Animal Affinity (Mythic)
Animal Affinity (Mythic).description:
先决条件：动物亲和

你与野生动物具有更强的亲和力，而且能够与它们进行沟通。

神话专长效果：动物亲和专长对驯养动物与骑术技能检定带来的加值增加2点。此外，你能够花费1次神话之力，使你能够如同动物交谈（Speak with Animals）法术一般交谈。该效果的施法者等级等同于你的阶层的两倍。

资源出处: Mythic Adventures pg. 55

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Animal%20Affinity

Animal Ally.name: 动物盟友 Animal Ally
Animal Ally.description:
你是如此尊敬自然因此你可以与一只动物缔结更加深层和长久的友谊。

先决条件: 自然之魂，角色等级4，必须没有如动物伙伴那样增长的动物伙伴或坐骑（must not have an animal companion or mount that advances as an animal）。

专长效果: 你从以下列表中选择一个动物伙伴，如同你是一个【你的角色等级-3】的德鲁伊：獾，禽，骆驼，猫（小型），凶暴鼠，狗，马，矮种马，蛇（毒蛇）或者狼。如果你之后通过其他途径获得了一个动物伙伴（例如动物领域，神契，猎手羁绊，坐骑或自然纽带职业特性），从这个专长中获得的有效德鲁伊等级会与其他来源叠加。

资源出处: Faiths and Philosophies pg. 11

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Animal%20Ally

Animal Call.name: Animal Call
Animal Call.description:
You've learn how to replicate a number of animal calls native to wilderness environments.

Prerequisites
Bluff 1 rank, Knowledge (nature) 1 rank.

Benefits
Pick one of the ranger's favored terrains. You can use your Bluff skill to mimic the calls of animals native to that terrain. Creatures with ranks in Knowledge (nature) can use that skill in place of Sense Motive to detect your mimicry and realize that the sound is false.

Special
You can take this feat multiple times. Each time you do, select an additional favored terrain to which this feat applies.

Animal Disguise.name: Animal Disguise
Animal Disguise.description:
With a little work, you can convincingly disguise yourself as an animal.

Prerequisites
Disguise 6 ranks, Knowledge (nature) 6 ranks.

Benefits
You can use Disguise to disguise yourself as an animal of your size category. You must have an appropriate pelt and any other animal parts needed to complete the disguise. You also gain a +2 bonus on Disguise checks when you disguise yourself as an animal. Creatures with ranks in Knowledge (nature) can use that skill in place of Sense Motive to detect this type of disguise.

Animal Ferocity.name: Animal Ferocity
Animal Ferocity.description:
When cornered and wounded, you fight like a feral beast.

Prerequisites
Base attack bonus +3, ferocity racial ability.

Benefits
When your hit points are reduced below 0, you can make attacks, but you take a -5 penalty on each attack roll.

Animal Soul.name: 动物之魂 Animal Soul
Animal Soul.description:
你与自然的紧密联系让无法影响你自然面的有害魔法被你忽略掉。

先决条件: 动物伙伴或坐骑职业能力。

专长效果: 如果一个法术或效果无法同时影响你原本的生物类型和动物类型，你就可以让那个法术或效果对你无效。

资源出处: Advanced Class Guide pg. 141

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Animal%20Soul

Ankle Biter.name: Ankle Biter
Ankle Biter.description:
You know how take a mouthful out of anyone who tries to overpower you.

Prerequisites
Goblin, Escape Artist 1 rank.

Benefits
If you are the target of a combat maneuver you can, as an immediate action, attempt to bite your opponent in addition to any attacks of opportunity or other consequences your opponent might incur from attacking you. This bonus natural attack does not provoke an attack of opportunity itself and deals base damage appropriate for a creature of your current size (usually 1d4 for Small creatures). If grappled or pinned, you can continue to make this additional bite attack each round as swift action on your turn. You gain a bonus on any attempt to break the grapple equal to the damage you dealt with your bite that round.

Special
You cannot make this bite attack when you are the aggressor, including if you manage to reverse a grapple or make any other attack of opportunity.


Pathfinder Society
Only legal goblin PCs are allowed to choose anything from this book

Antagonize.name: 嘲讽 Antagonize
Antagonize.description:
使用污辱或是伤人的词汇，你可以轻易的让对方对你发火。

专长效果: 你可以使用交涉或是威吓检定，让生物对你产生敌意。无论你选择哪种检定，使用此专长都必须消耗一个不引发借机攻击的标准动作，并通过DC为“10+目标HD+感知修正”的技能检定。你不能使用此专长影响无法理解你或是智力小于3的生物。在使用此专长前，你可以用迅捷动作做一个DC为20的察言观色检定，以在交涉或威吓上额外得到相当于你魅力修正的洞察加值，此加值将会持续到你下一轮开始为止。此专长的效果取决于你使用哪一种技能。此为〔影响心灵〕效果。

交涉：你让你的目标慌乱。在之后的1分钟之内，该生物攻击你之外的生物都必须在攻击检定上承受-2的惩罚，且任何没有以你为目标或包括你的法术必须承受10%的法术失败机率。

威吓：你让目标彻底的抓狂。他的下一轮目标必须对你发动近战攻击，对你发动远程攻击，以你为法术目标，或者施放一个包含你的范围法术。如果该生物无法攻击你或是如此做会让他受到伤害（例如你的周遭被火墙环绕）则此效果终止。如果他没有办法在他的行动回合中攻击到你，你可以用一个直觉动作再进行一次检定，让此效果额外维持一轮（但是延长之后就没办法继续延长了），此效果会在该生物对你进行攻击之后立刻结束。只要你针对一个目标使用过此专长，那么你在1天之内无法再对他使用此专长第二次。

资源出处: Ultimate Magic pg. 143

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Antagonize

Anticipate Dodge.name: 闪避捕捉 Anticipate Dodge
Anticipate Dodge.description:
专长类型：Combat

你对于闪身腾挪技术的理解可以让你轻松分辨对方躲闪的轨迹。

先决条件: 闪避，灵活移动，基础攻击加值+7或拳师或武僧等级4。

专长效果: 你可以立刻了解一个你可以看到的目标在防御等级上是否具有闪避加值，并且对于一个在防御等级上拥有闪避加值的生物，你对它的攻击检定获得+2加值，但是这个加值不能超过该生物拥有的闪避加值。

资源出处: Advanced Class Guide pg. 141

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Anticipate%20Dodge

战策增益：你可以花费一点耐力，将闪避捕捉所提供的奖励上限提升2（但依然不能超过生物的闪避加值）

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 113

Aphotic Explorer.name: Aphotic Explorer
Aphotic Explorer.description:
You have trained to steel yourself against the cold when in dark, lightless realms such as the deep ocean.

Prerequisites
Endurance, gillman.

Benefits
While you are in darkness or dim light, you can take a swift action to gain cold resistance 5 for 1 round. If you have 11 or more Hit Dice, you gain cold resistance 10 instead.

Apocalyptic Spell.name: 末日法术 Apocalyptic Spell
Apocalyptic Spell.description:
专长类型：Metamagic

你的法术获得了来自天启驭者的毁灭性恐怖之力，短暂的将现实变化为一片变幻莫测的废土。

专长效果: 你能够调整一个影响效果为区域，持续时间为立刻的法术，当你释放此法术，你法术效果影响的区域立刻化为一片饱受蹂躏的废土。在此区域的所有表面视为困难地形，并且在此区域进行的任何攀爬，飞行，游泳检定受到等同于法术初始环级的减值，困难地形与技能罚值效果持续等同于法术初始环级轮，一个末日法术获得[邪恶]描述符。

末日法术使用高于原本法术环级1环的法术位。具有[善良]描述符的法术无法成为末日法术调整的目标。

资源出处: Planar Adventures pg. 22

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Apocalyptic%20Spell

Apotheosis.name: Apotheosis
Apotheosis.description:
You are marked by fate as a future deity--even before this destiny is realized, fate bends to your will.

Prerequisites
You must have had direct contact with a deity or godlike being, or have been risen from the dead at the personal behest of a deity or godlike being.

Benefits
You gain a +2 bonus on Constitution checks to stabilize while dying. Anytime you or an ally who worships the god that contacted you casts augury or a similar effect, your chance of receiving a meaningful reply is increased by 5% (to a maximum of 95%).

Goal
You must be acknowledged by another divine being (directly or through a representative) as a peer, even if only a minor one.

Completion Benefit
Once per day as an immediate action, you can cause any die roll made by a creature within 100 feet of you to be rerolled. You choose which result you prefer. You must decide to use this ability after the first roll is made but before the results are revealed by the GM.

 

Suggested Traits
Called, Fortunate, Inspiring.

Possible Apotheosis Quests

  d8 Quest

  1. You seek to prove your worth and acquire followers who will exalt you as a living ideal or preeminent martyr, like Kurgess (page 229).
  2. Omens indicate that if you give all in service to your deity, you will become his demigod servant, much as Hanspur was deified by Gozreh (page 229).
  3. You believe the mad whispers of those cultists who claim that if one were to travel far enough into the Dark Tapestry, one might tap into the divine power of the Great Old Ones (page 235).
  4. The Test of the Starstone is among the best-known paths to divinity; you adventure in preparation to take the test yourself and join the ranks of ascended deities (page 39).
  5. While studying the mysteries of Ancient Osirion, you stumble across clues to the mythic divination that elevated Nethys from mortal king to deity (page 223).
  6. You challenge yourself in the ways described in Irori’s holy book, Unbinding the Fetters, as you seek the mental and physical perfection that will lead you to divinity (page 222).
  7. By tracking down and confronting one of the legendary titans of Elysium, you hope to unlock the secret to achieving divinity in the celestial realms (page 243).
  8. You have learned that one of your ancestors was a deity (such as the prolific Cayden Cailean) and you now quest to get his attention and earn a similar station (page 219).

Aquadynamic Focus.name: Aquadynamic Focus
Aquadynamic Focus.description:
Your skill with your chosen weapons is so great that you can use them underwater without impediment.

Prerequisites
Weapon Focus, base attack bonus +1.

Benefits
You don't take additional penalties on attack and damage rolls for fighting underwater with bludgeoning and slashing melee weapons for which you have taken the Weapon Focus feat.

Normal
When using bludgeoning and slashing melee weapons underwater, you take a -2 penalty on attack rolls and deal half damage.

Aquadynamic Shot.name: Aquadynamic Shot
Aquadynamic Shot.description:
You use projectiles and special trick shots that lose less accuracy when underwater.

Prerequisites
Far Shot, Point-Blank Shot, base attack bonus +4.

Benefits
Your projectile attacks take a -1 penalty per 5 feet of water between you and the target. You still can't use thrown weapons effectively underwater except in special circumstances (see page 44).

Normal
Projectile attacks underwater take a -2 penalty per 5 feet of water between the shooter and the target.

Aquatic Adaption.name: 水生适应 Aquatic Adaption
Aquatic Adaption.description:
你身上产生了一种奇怪但却有用的突变——你可以在水下呼吸。

先决条件: 闭气（Hold Breath）。

专长效果: 你可以如常在水下呼吸。

资源出处: Monster Codex pg. 140

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Aquatic%20Adaption

Aquatic Advantage.name: 水战高手 Aquatic Advantage
Aquatic Advantage.description:
不识水性的对手和你在水里打斗时十分被动。

先决条件: 战斗反射，必须拥有天然的游泳速度。

专长效果: 一个没有游泳速度的对手在水中对你发动攻击时会引发你的借机攻击。如果该生物拥有法术行动自如的好处，那么他则不会因此触发借机攻击。

资源出处: Monster Codex pg. 188

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Aquatic%20Advantage

Aquatic Ancestry.name: 水栖世系 Aquatic Ancestry
Aquatic Ancestry.description:
你喜爱你的异界先祖，并且能够更好地适应水中生活。

先决条件: 水元素裔。

专长效果: 你获得“两栖”特殊能力。并且游泳速度提高10尺。

资源出处: Advanced Race Guide pg. 177

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Aquatic%20Ancestry

Aquatic Combatant.name: 水下战斗法 Aquatic Combatant
Aquatic Combatant.description:
专长类型：Combat

你受过水下战斗相关的训练。

先决条件: 游泳等级1。

专长效果: 你的游泳检定获得+2加值并且水下近战攻击不会受到水下减值。你的挥砍攻击和徒手钝击攻击在水下造成全额伤害。

通常状况: 在水下，大多数近战攻击都承受-2罚值并只造成一半伤害。

资源出处: Ultimate Wilderness pg. 106Melee Tactics Toolbox pg. 14

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Aquatic%20Combatant

Aquatic Spell.name: 辟水法术 Aquatic Spell
Aquatic Spell.description:
专长类型：Metamagic

你可以在水下正常施法。

专长效果: 一个辟水法术可以在水下正常生效，并且即便是火焰描述符的法术，也无需进行施法者等级检定。另外，辟水法术可以从陆地向水下发射，并正常生效。辟水的法术占据比原法术高1的环级的法术位。

资源出处: Ultimate Wilderness pg. 106Melee Tactics Toolbox pg. 14

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Aquatic%20Spell

Aquatic Squires.name: Aquatic Squires
Aquatic Squires.description:
When you call for aid from the sea, your summoned creatures remain to serve you longer.

Prerequisites
Triton, summon nature's ally II spell-like ability, character level 5th.

Benefits
The duration of your summon nature's ally II spell-like ability is 1 minute per level.

Normal
Summon nature's ally II has a duration of 1 round per level.

Arc Slinger.name: 弧线投石 Arc Slinger
Arc Slinger.description:
专长类型：Combat

你用最能发挥其性能的方式旋转你的投石索。

先决条件: 近距射击，擅长投石索或半身人投石杖（halfling sling staff）。

专长效果: 当你使用投石索或投石杖，你能减少2点由距离造成的远程攻击投骰减值。在投石武器的第一个射程增量里（投石索50尺，投石杖80尺），可以适用你的“近距射击”伤害加值。

资源出处: Ultimate Combat pg. 89

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Arc%20Slinger

战策增益：在使用投石索或半身人投石杖时，你可以花费一点耐力，在头两个射程增量中获得近距射击的效果

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 113

Arcane Armor Training (Mythic).name: 披甲奥术训练(神话) Arcane Armor Training (Mythic)
Arcane Armor Training (Mythic).description:
先决条件：披甲奥术训练

你让自身的施法动作客服了披甲带来的局限性。

神话专长效果：你不用花费迅捷动作就能够获得披甲奥术训练专长带来的奥术失败率降低效果。除此之外，若你穿着轻甲，那么你的奥术失败率降低20%。

资源出处: Mythic Adventures pg. 55

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Arcane%20Armor%20Training

Arcane Blast.name: 奥能爆发 Arcane Blast
Arcane Blast.description:
你能够将任何法术转化成射线攻击。

先决条件: 奥术施法者，施法者等级10级。

专长效果: 以标准动作，你能够牺牲一个1环或更高环级的已准备法术或者未使用法术位，并将其转化为射线，以远程接触攻击将30尺内的任意敌人作为目标。这个攻击造成2d6点伤害，外加每个被牺牲的已准备法术或者未使用法术位环级1d6点伤害。0环法术无法以此方式牺牲。

资源出处: Advanced Players Guide pg. 150

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Arcane%20Blast

Arcane Blast (Mythic).name: 奥能爆发(神话) Arcane Blast (Mythic)
Arcane Blast (Mythic).description:
先决条件：奥能爆发

你能够操纵可怕的原始能量做出比仅仅造成伤害更多的事情。

神话专长效果：当你使用奥能爆发专长时，你可以使伤害骰减半来执行战技对抗被奥能爆发的目标，你要从摔绊和冲撞战技中选择一种。你无法用此专长的冲撞来和敌人一同移动。这次战技检定尝试会获得加值，数值等同于你在奥能爆发专长中所牺牲的法术等级的一半，而且在确定你的战技加值时，你可以使用你的智力或魅力调整值替代你的力量调整值。

此外，你能够花费1次神话之力来将你的奥能爆发伤害骰从d6提升至d8。

资源出处: Mythic Adventures pg. 55

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Arcane%20Blast

Arcane Insight.name: 洞观奥秘 Arcane Insight
Arcane Insight.description:
奥术魔法的力量帮助你洞悉对手的招数。

先决条件: 信仰内希斯，奥能之盾，施法者等级10。

专长效果: 当你启动奥能之盾专长时，你还会在一轮内在AC上获得+1洞察加值。

资源出处: Inner Sea Gods pg. 207Faiths of Balance pg. 24

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Arcane%20Insight

Arcane Jinxer.name: Arcane Jinxer
Arcane Jinxer.description:
You can sacrifice arcane spells or spell slots in order to make it harder to resist your jinxes.

Prerequisites
Arcane spellcaster, Halfling Jinx trait.

Benefits
When you attempt to jinx a creature, you can expend one of your prepared arcane spells or available arcane spell slots to give your target a penalty on its jinx save equal to the level of the expended spell or spell slot. This does not alter the effect of the jinx, only the saving throw to resist the jinx.

Arcane School Spirit.name: Arcane School Spirit
Arcane School Spirit.description:
You can talk up the power of your own school of magic to such an extent that creatures find it more difficult to resist your spells.

Prerequisites
Bluff 1 rank, arcane school class feature, gnome.

Benefits
As a full-round action, you extol the virtues of your school of magic to one creature within 30 feet. Make a Bluff check opposed by a target's Sense Motive check; if you win the check, the target takes a -2 penalty on saving throws made to resist the next spell of this school that you cast. If your chosen school is universalist, choose a specific school each time you use this ability. If your Bluff check succeeds, however, your lack of true commitment to the school means the target takes only a -1 penalty on its saving throw.

Arcane Shield.name: 奥能之盾 Arcane Shield
Arcane Shield.description:
你能够将任何法术转化为护盾。

先决条件: 奥术施法者，施法者等级10级。

专长效果: 以直觉动作，你能够牺牲一个1环或更高环级的已准备法术或者未使用法术位，并将其转化为AC上的偏斜加值，数值等同于被牺牲的已准备法术或者未使用法术位环级，持续1轮。0环法术无法以此方式牺牲。

资源出处: Advanced Players Guide pg. 150

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Arcane%20Shield

Arcane Shield (Mythic).name: 奥能之盾(神话) Arcane Shield (Mythic)
Arcane Shield (Mythic).description:
先决条件：奥能之盾

你能够将法术塑造成强大、持久的奥术屏障。

神话专长效果：当你使用奥能之盾专长时，你可以将自身阶层的一半加到你的AC所获得的偏斜加值上。在使用该专长时，你能够花费1次神话之力来将专长效果的持续时间延长，延长到等同于你的阶层的轮数。

资源出处: Mythic Adventures pg. 55

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Arcane%20Shield

Arcane Strike (Mythic).name: 奥术打击(神话) Arcane Strike (Mythic)
Arcane Strike (Mythic).description:
先决条件：奥术打击

利用你那强大的奥术天赋，你能够挥出蕴含着魔法能量的毁灭性打击。

神话专长效果：每当你使用奥术打击专长增强你的武器时，效果会持续1分钟而非原本的1轮。若你在使用奥术打击专长时花费1次神话之力，你还能够将任何1个基本价值调整为+1的魔法武器特殊能力赋予到你的武器上。这个基本价格调整在4阶提升至+2。这个基本价格调整在7阶提升至+3。这个基本价格调整在10阶提升至+4。

资源出处: Mythic Adventures pg. 55

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Arcane%20Strike

Arcane Talent.name: 奥法天赋 Arcane Talent
Arcane Talent.description:
魔法流淌在你的血液中，环绕在你的指尖上。

先决条件: 魅力10；精灵、半精灵或侏儒。

专长效果: 从术士/法师列表中选择一个0环法术。每日你能够以类法术能力施放3次该法术。CL等同于你的角色等级。该豁免DC为“10+魅力修正”。

资源出处: Advanced Players Guide pg. 151

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Arcane%20Talent

Arcane Trap Suppressor.name: 奥法陷阱压制者 Arcane Trap Suppressor
Arcane Trap Suppressor.description:
你的法术可以长时间压制魔法陷阱。

先决条件: 可以施展或以类法术能力施放解除魔法或高等解除魔法。

专长效果: 你可以用解除魔法或高等解除魔法压制魔法陷阱，DC等于解除装置的DC，成功的话能使陷阱失效1d4分钟。

通常状况: 解除魔法可以压制物品的魔法特性1d4轮。

资源出处: Dungeoneers Handbook pg. 8

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Arcane%20Trap%20Suppressor

Arcane Vendetta.name: 奥术宿怨 Arcane Vendetta
Arcane Vendetta.description:
曾经有奥术团体的成员（诸如纽梅利亚Numeria的科技联盟Technic League，或者伊利森Irrisen的白女巫White Witches）虐待过你，这使得你极端希望把伤害加诸到那些使用奥术的人身上。

先决条件: 法术辨识1级。

专长效果: 在对抗任何5轮之内施放过奥术（而非使用类法术能力）的目标时，你的武器攻击造成的伤害提高2点。在这之前你必须成功使用法术辨识技能鉴别法术，用以确信目标所施放的确实是奥术。

资源出处: Inner Sea World Guide pg. 284Pathfinder Campaign Setting pg. 115

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Arcane%20Vendetta

Archon Diversion.name: 神使援护 Archon Diversion
Archon Diversion.description:
专长类型：Combat

你将自己置于攻向盟友的攻击面前，让那些盟友在敌人攻击你时有机会反击他们。

先决条件: 神使之型，寓守于攻，战斗反射，基础攻击加值+4或武僧等级3。

专长效果: 当你使用神使之型为你邻接的盟友提供针对单个敌人的AC加值时，你自己的AC减值降为-1。此外在你使用神使之型时，每轮一次，当你至少有一只手空闲或持用盾牌时，你可以将针对相邻盟友的近战武器攻击转移到自己身上。结算这次攻击后，受你保护的盟友可以对攻击被转移的敌人进行借机攻击。你无需花费任何动作来转移攻击，但你必须察觉到该攻击，且不能处于措手不及状态。你必须在敌人宣布近战攻击之后、进行攻击检定之前选择转移攻击。

资源出处: Planar Adventures pg. 25Blood of Angels pg. 24

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Archon%20Diversion

Archon Justice.name: 神使正义 Archon Justice
Archon Justice.description:
专长类型：Combat

在你警戒期间攻击你会让敌人受到盟友的攻击。

先决条件: 神使援护，神使之型，寓守于攻，战斗反射，基础攻击加值+8或武僧等级7。

专长效果: 你不再因为使用神使之型为邻接的盟友提供AC加值而受到AC减值，且你能以迅捷动作或移动动作激活此效果。每当你因使用神使援护后转移给自己的攻击而受到伤害时，每个威胁发起这次攻击生物的盟友都可以对该生物进行借机攻击。

资源出处: Planar Adventures pg. 25Blood of Angels pg. 24

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Archon%20Justice

Archon Style.name: 神使之型 Archon Style
Archon Style.description:
专长类型：CombatStyle

你保护你的盟友免受伤害，甚至不惜牺牲自己的安全。

先决条件: 寓守于攻，战斗反射，基础攻击加值+2或武僧等级1。

专长效果: 在使用这种流派时，以一个移动动作，你可以主动保护邻接的盟友免受你当前威胁的单个敌人的伤害。这使得相邻盟友在对抗该敌人的下一次近战攻击时的AC上获得 +2闪避加值（只要这次攻击发生在你的下个回合开始前），不过同时你在面对这个敌人的攻击时AC将会有-2罚值。即使此后你的盟友移动离开，闪避加值仍将持续，不过仍只对你指定的那个敌人有效。即使你的盟友远离你，针对指定敌人攻击的闪避加值仍然存在。

资源出处: Planar Adventures pg. 25Blood of Angels pg. 24

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Archon%20Style

Arcing Lob.name: Arcing Lob
Arcing Lob.description:
You can hurl a splash weapon high into the air to break atop large opponents, cascading its contents down on your target or using your opponent's bulk to shield the surrounding area from the spray.

Prerequisites
Dex 15, Point-Blank Shot, Precise Shot, Throw Anything.

Benefits
When you hit a target that is Large or larger with a splash weapon, you can choose to deal splash damage to all creatures within 5 feet of the target, splash damage to no creatures, or splash damage as normal.

Normal
If you hit a target that is Large or larger with a splash weapon, choose one of its squares--the splash damage affects creatures within 5 feet of that square.

Arcing Weapon.name: Arcing Weapon
Arcing Weapon.description:
You can send magical blasts through your weapon.

Prerequisites
Diverse training class feature.

Benefits
As a standard action, you can cast a ray spell that requires a ranged touch attack and deliver the effect through your melee weapon, either through a melee attack or as a ranged attack. If you deliver this spell as a melee attack, this functions as the magus spellstrike ability. If you deliver the spell as a ranged attack, the spell is a ranged touch attack that discharges from your weapon and applies the weapon's enhancement bonus to the spell's damage. When fired in this way, the spell uses the weapon's critical threat range, but the spell effect deals only x2 damage on a successful critical hit. You can use a ranged touch attack spell that targets more than one creature (such as scorching ray), but you make only one attack through your weapon to deliver one ranged touch effect; additional ranged touch attacks from the spell are wasted and have no effect.

Arctic Adaptation.name: Arctic Adaptation
Arctic Adaptation.description:
You are comfortable in the driving snow and glaring ice of frigid climes, and you can survive much longer in such harsh environments than those who are unaccustomed to the cold.

Prerequisites
Favored terrain (cold) class feature.

Benefits
You treat cold environments (Core Rulebook 442) as though they were one step less severe than they normally are. Additionally, you gain a +2 bonus on Perception checks against creatures that gain a racial bonus on Stealth checks in snowy conditions, and you gain a +4 bonus on saving throws and checks to avoid becoming blinded or dazzled by ice or snow glare.

Area Jinx.name: Area Jinx
Area Jinx.description:
You can jinx multiple creatures so long as they are near each other.

Prerequisites
Widen Spell, Halfling Jinx trait.

Benefits
When you use your jinx, you create an instantaneous invisible burst with a maximum radius of 10 feet anywhere within the normal range of your jinx, affecting multiple targets. Any creature within this burst, regardless of whether or not you can see it, must make a saving throw to resist your jinx. If you use your jinx again, all of your current jinxes immediately end.

Special
You can gain this feat multiple times. Each time you do, the maximum area of your jinx burst increases by an additional 10 feet.

Arisen.name: 重返人间 Arisen
Arisen.description:
专长类型：Story

逃脱死亡强化了你的生命联结，但也令你必须追寻一个答案。

先决条件: 你必须被杀害后复活；或拥有“生即待死（Left to Die）”或“降生诅咒（Cursed Birth）”角色背景。

专长效果: 你在生命负值达到“4+体质属性”以上时才会死亡。每日1次，你能够通过标准动作聚集意志力来驱动自己，获得等同HD点数的临时HP。这些临时生命持续10分钟。

专长目标: 你亲眼见到所信奉的神祇、或其选定的使者，并亲耳听到其教诲。若你崇拜一个神系，你必须见到和听到其中的一员——此种情况下一位使者并不能代劳。若你并无信仰，你必须根据GM的指示得到一位适当的特别存在的教诲。

通常状况: 你在生命负值达到“体质属性”时死亡。

完成收益: 你在对抗死亡和恐惧效果的豁免时获得+2加值。此外，任何作用于你的咒法系（医疗子学派）法术视为CL提高1级，只对你本人有效。

资源出处: Ultimate Campaign pg. 67

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Arisen

Arithmancy.name: 算术占卜 Arithmancy
Arithmancy.description:
通过将文字转化为数学等式，你可以解开文字内隐藏的秘密，以此强化你的法术效应。

先决条件: 智力13，法术专攻（预言系），法术辨识3级。

专长效果: 在施法前以一个迅捷动作，你可以尝试用算术占卜强化你的法术。如需这么做，要先决定你将要施展的法术名称的数字根。

要找到法术名称的数字根，首先要给法术名称的每个字母分配一个数值，如下表（字母数值表）。之后把所有字母代表的数值加起来，如果结果依然超过1位数，再将结果的每一位数字加起来，直到最终结果只有1位数字为止，该数字就是法术名称的数字根。

一旦你将法术名称转化为单一数字根，尝试一次法术辨识检定，DC为10+法术等级+数字根。如果检定成功，则施展该法术的施法者等级+1，否则施法者等级-1。如果你没有施展用算术占卜强化的法术，则该法术无效地花费了，虽然你也保留了准备施展该法术的动作。超魔的效果不会计入决定数字根时候的法术名称，但在决定法术辨识检定的DC时仍然会提升法术等级。你可以使用该能力的次数等同于你拥有的施法者等级。

举例说明，Ezren想要用算术占卜施展一个强化的火球术Fireball。首先，他要把法术名称转化为数字。Fireball转化为6，9，9，5，2，1，3，3。之后计算数字根，也就是6+9+9+5+2+1+3+3=38，3+8=11，1+1=2。2就是火球术Fireball的数字根。接下来他要尝试法术辨识检定，DC=15（10+3火球术法术等级+2数字根）。如果他成功通过了检定，在这轮内他施放的火球术的施法者等级+1，否则施法者等级-1。他也可以不施放火球术而尝试其他动作，但火球术也被浪费了。

数值关联字母
1ajs
2bkt
3clu
4dmv
5enw
6fox
7gpy
8hqz
9ir


资源出处: Occult Mysteries pg. 48

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Arithmancy

Arming Grab.name: Arming Grab
Arming Grab.description:
Opponents would be foolish to underestimate you, even if you appear unarmed and helpless. You are practiced at turning the tables on armed foes and using their own weapons against them.

Prerequisites
Int 13, Catch Off-Guard, Combat Expertise, Improved Disarm.

Benefits
You take no penalty on your attack roll when attempting to disarm an opponent while you are unarmed. If you succeed at a disarm attempt without using a weapon and choose to pick up the disarmed weapon, you can attack with that weapon as though you were proficient with it until the end of your next turn. If you are already proficient with that type of weapon, you gain a +2 morale bonus to your attack rolls with that weapon until the end of your next turn.

Normal
Attempting to disarm a foe while unarmed imposes a -4 penalty on the attack.

Armor Adept.name: Armor Adept
Armor Adept.description:
You are skilled at using customized armor.

Benefits
Choose two armor modifications (such as deflecting or jarring). You no longer suffer the drawbacks of wearing armor with those modifications.

Normal
Each type of armor modification imparts a drawback on a wearer.

Special
You can gain this feat multiple times, choosing two different armor modifications each time.

Armor Focus.name: 盔甲专攻 Armor Focus
Armor Focus.description:
专长类型：Combat

你特别擅长特定种类的盔甲，你从这类盔甲获得的防护得到了提升。

先决条件: 基本攻击加值+1，擅长选定盔甲。

专长效果: 选择一种盔甲，比如链甲衫或者板条甲。你从选定盔甲上获得的AC加值提升1点。

特殊说明: 你可以选取这个专长多次。但是其效果并不叠加。每次你选取这个专长时，它都会应用到一个新的盔甲类型上。盔甲专攻专长在满足盔甲掌握专长先决条件时视为盔甲训练职业能力，并且会决定你在什么种类的盔甲上可以使用盔甲掌握专长。

资源出处: Armor Masters Handbook pg. 16

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Armor%20Focus

战策增益：你可以消耗2点耐力来将该专长赋予的额外护甲加值提升至+2，持续1轮。

战策资源出处: Armor Master's Handbook pg. 20

Armor Material Expertise.name: 盔甲材料专家 Armor Material Expertise
Armor Material Expertise.description:
专长类型：Armor MasteryCombat

你学会了该如何利用你盔甲特殊材料的潜力。

先决条件: 基本攻击加值+6或者战士4级，盔甲训练职业特性。

专长效果: 当你穿着由下列材料制成的盔甲时，你可以使用下列能力每天2次（除非另有声明）。

精金：在受到一次攻击后，你可以以一个直觉动作将致命伤害一半转换成非致命伤害。

天使缎：以一个迅捷动作，你可以发出昼明术般明亮的光线，持续一轮。

暗叶布：以一个迅捷动作，你在1分钟内获得德鲁伊穿林步职业能力。

龙革：当你受到龙革盔甲所免疫的能量类型的能量伤害时，你可以以一个直觉动作使受到的伤害减少10点。

净土青铜：在受到魔法兽或者人形怪物的攻击后，你可以以一个直觉动作将致命伤害一半转换成非致命伤害。

火纹钢或者冰纹钢：以一个迅捷动作，任何你做出的徒手击打，盾击，以及用甲刺和带刺铁手套做出的攻击都会在1分钟内被视作拥有炽焰附魔（对于火纹钢）或者冻寒附魔（对于冰纹钢）。

时之合金（Horacalcum）（开拓者冒险之路#61：原罪碎片）：每天一次以一个迅捷动作，你可以在一轮内让自己获得加速术的好处。

活钢：在你受到一次来自金属武器的攻击后，你可以使用活钢的能力对该金属武器造成伤害，就如同攻击者在这次攻击上骰出了自然1一样。

秘银：以一个直觉动作，你在1轮内获得对抗变化系法术的法术抗力，这个法术抗力等于5+盔甲的增强加值+你的角色等级。

无痕钢（Noqual）（开拓者冒险之路#61：原罪碎片）：盔甲在豁免上的抗力加值在1轮内提升为+4。

资源出处: Armor Masters Handbook pg. 16

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Armor%20Material%20Expertise

战策增益：你可以使用5点耐力来使用一种材料的能力，即使你的盔甲并不是由它做成。这仍然会消耗你的每日盔甲材料能力的次数。

战策资源出处: Armor Master's Handbook pg. 20

Armor Material Mastery.name: 盔甲材料大师 Armor Material Mastery
Armor Material Mastery.description:
专长类型：Armor MasteryCombat

你引出你盔甲特殊材料几乎全部的潜力。

先决条件: 盔甲材料专家，基本攻击加值+11或者战士8级，盔甲训练职业特性。

专长效果: 你每天可以使用盔甲材料专家赋予的能力额外两次。

资源出处: Armor Masters Handbook pg. 16

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Armor%20Material%20Mastery

战策增益：你可以使用5点耐力来在不消耗每日盔甲材料能力使用次数的情况下使用它。

战策资源出处: Armor Master's Handbook pg. 20

Armor of the Pit.name: 深渊铠甲 Armor of the Pit
Armor of the Pit.description:
你污秽的特征体现在如同铠甲的鳞片皮肤上。

先决条件: 魔裔。

专长效果: 你获得+2天生防御加值。

通常状况: 如果你拥有【鳞片皮肤】种族特性，则在寒冷、闪电以及火焰这三种能量类型中选择两种并获得5点能量抗力取代该专长的奖励天防。你只能选择你还未获得抗力的能量类型。

资源出处: Advanced Race Guide pg. 173

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Armor%20of%20the%20Pit

Armor Trick.name: 护甲技法 Armor Trick
Armor Trick.description:
专长类型：Combat

选择一个护甲技法应用的类型（轻甲，中甲，重甲，或者盾牌）。当你装备对应护甲时可以在战斗中使用护甲技法。

先决条件: BAB+1。

专长效果: 只要满足对应技法的先决条件并且擅长该技法的护甲类型，你就可以使任何与选择的护甲类型相关的护甲技法。

特殊说明: 你可以多次选择本专长。每次选择本专长时，选择一个新的护甲技法。

重甲技法 Heavy Armor Tricks

这种护甲技法通常在各个地狱骑士团中最为常见，虽然他们的秘技已经传到了其他组织和战士学院。这类护甲技法利用重甲的体型和重量，当你使用重甲技法时，如果有任何魔法或者材料的效果让护甲在任何方面被视为中甲时，则技法无效，除非重甲技法中特别声明例外。

甲隙藏刃 Blade among the Folds (巧手 3 级)：你擅长在盔甲中隐藏小型武器。当你穿着重甲，在你的盔甲中隐藏轻型近战武器或者容易隐蔽的远程武器如飞镖、投石索或者手弩时，在巧手检定上获得+2加值。此外，只要你穿着你的盔甲，那么即使有人对你进行搜查，也无法在察觉检定上具有通常会有的+4加值。该技法即使在因魔法或材料被视为中甲时也依然效。

臂上铁甲 Protected Limbs (寓守于攻)：每当你尝试一次卸武、擒抱、破武或者摔拌战技是，你在对抗任何由你尝试战技导致的借机攻击上获得+4AC；并且在你下回合开始前任何敌人对你对你尝试战技时，你的CMD能获得该AC加值。

不过如此 Shrug It Off（强韧加强）：每天一次以一个直觉动作，当你受到重击确认或者偷袭时，你可以将攻击导向护甲最坚固的部分以减少伤害。这会导致该次攻击造成最低伤害，尽管这仍是一次重击或者偷袭。（最低伤害包括所有由重击或者偷袭导致的额外骰子，以及任何由于是重击或偷袭才会正常生效的能力）。当你的基本攻击加值达到+4，你每天可以第二次使用该能力，以后的每4点提升，你每天获得额外一次使用次数。

钢板猛击 Steel-Plated Smasher (猛力攻击)：你在破坏硬度小于你护甲的门或者物体时，力量检定获得等于你护甲1/4的防具检定减值（不包括任何来自职业能力或者专长带来的减值减少）的加值。当你的基本攻击加值达到+8，该力量加值等于你护甲1/2的防具检定减值。当你的基本攻击加值达到+16，该力量加值等于你护甲的防具检定减值。

轻甲技法 Light Armor Tricks

轻甲技法通常很少在正规学院里教授，虽然其中部分可以从卡尔玛加街道上老练的自由斗士或者位于艾巴萨罗姆的血腥理发师公会领袖那里习得。这些装备技法通常利用轻甲最优秀的灵活性和机动性来补充适当的防御力。

战斗特技 Combat Acrobatics (智力 13, 寓守于攻, 特技 3 级)：你训练自己在弹跳和翻滚时只暴露穿着盔甲的部位，让你在战斗中更少因为担心被击中而分心。你在使用特技避免在通过狭窄表面或光滑地面摔倒时，不被视为措手不及，并且当这么做时不会在AC上失去敏捷加值。此外，当你使用寓守于攻增加你的AC时，你为避免借机攻击用特技全速穿过一个威胁区域时，不会额外增加10DC。

灵活应变 Reactive Mobility (灵活移动, 灵狐步)：实践磨练了你的反应，使你反应迅速，本能地应对威胁。你导致的所有借机攻击都享受灵活移动提供的闪避加值，而非仅仅对抗当你离开敌人的威胁区域或在该范围内移动导致的借机攻击。

灵活闪躲 Reflexive Mobility (战斗反射, 灵活移动)：你学会了放弃伤害敌人的机会来避免自己受伤。当你遭到敌人的借机攻击，你可以花费你这轮一次潜在的借机机会，来将灵活移动提供的奖励AC翻倍加在你对抗这次攻击的AC上。这项增益适用于所有你由于同一个动作导致的所有借机攻击。如果你不能在这个回合中再进行任何借机攻击，你就不能使用这个能力。

滑铲 Sliding Charge (精通绊摔, 基本攻击加值 +4)：你运用你的机动力迷惑你的敌人，当你冲锋一个敌人并以一次近战攻击尝试一次摔拌战技，你可以以一个迅捷动作滑倒在地上，并且铲向你的敌人。当你这么做时，你将你的敏捷调整值（最高等于你护甲的最大敏捷加值）加到你的战技检定上。当你这么做时，无论成功与否，你在冲锋结束时都将处于俯卧状态。

中甲技法 Medium Armor Tricks

这些装备技法中的许多起源于安多安以及受各机构雇佣的雄鹰骑士，他们高度重视中甲所能提供的更好的防御力但是想保留战斗中的灵活性和敏捷性。盔甲专攻专长是两个技法的先决条件，可以在16页找到。

杂技起身 Acrobatic Sit-Up (灵活移动, 特技 5 级)：你开发出了从倒地中恢复并且在一次流畅移动中攻击敌人的能力。当你处于俯卧，你可以攻击一名敌人，并且起身时不会受到该敌人的借机攻击。进行一次攻击并且不会受到通常倒地会受到的罚值。如果你击中了该目标，你可以以一个直觉动作起身（通常是一个移动动作）并且不会受该敌人的借机攻击。任何其他威胁你的目标仍然可以尝试对你进行借机。如果你攻击落空，你会受到所有威胁你的敌人的借机，并且直到你的下一轮，无法起身。

重甲功能性 Heavy Versatility (盔甲专攻, 护甲技法 [重甲])：你可以完全利用你的盔甲所能提供的防御潜力。你可以将中甲视为重甲，用于护甲技法。

轻甲功能性 Light Versatility (盔甲专攻, 护甲技法 [轻甲])：你对你的盔甲如此适应，它似乎比实际要轻不少。你可以将中甲视为轻甲，用于护甲技法。

卷入锋中 Roll into the Blow (灵活移动)：当你遭到攻击时仍然头脑清明，并且将情况扭转向对你有利的方向。每天一次，被一次借机攻击命中时，你可以冲击你的目标，使其失去平衡，该攻击者在所有近战攻击检定上承受-4罚值直到他的下轮开始。你可以在你的基本攻击加值达到+4后每天使用两次该能力，并且以后的每4点提升，你每天获得额外一次使用次数。

多功能装甲 Versatile Armor (寓守于攻)：你可以调整自己的表现和策略，最大化你护甲的速度和灵活性或者最大化你的防御力。当你使用机动形态时，你的移动速度不受到护甲的影响，并且护甲的防具检定减值和护甲的AC加值都减少2。当你使用装甲形态时，你的防具检定减值增加3，护甲的AC加值增加1。调整你的护甲形态是一个移动动作，该调整会持续到你改变它，脱掉盔甲或者在AC上失去敏捷调整值（如果有）。

资源出处: Armor Masters Handbook pg. 8

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Armor%20Trick

战策增益：你可以花费5点耐力点数来在你装备不擅长的盔甲，或者不满足技法的额外先决条件时使用护甲技法。

战策资源出处: Armor Master's Handbook pg. 20

Armored Athlete.name: 着甲运动者 Armored Athlete
Armored Athlete.description:
专长类型：Combat

你对着甲时使用技能十分有心得。

先决条件: 轻甲擅长，中甲擅长，在任一基于敏捷或力量的技能上有3个等级。

专长效果: 选择一个你至少有3个等级的基于敏捷或力量的技能。当你进行所选技能检定时，你所穿轻甲和中甲对该技能的防具检定减值减少3（最低至0）。若你在所选技能上有至少10个等级，减值减少6而非3（最低至0）。若你有盔甲训练2职业能力并且擅长重甲，在穿戴重甲时依然可以适用该专长效果。

特殊说明: 你可以选择该专长多次。每次都需要选定一个不同的技能。

资源出处: Melee Tactics Toolbox pg. 9

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Armored%20Athlete

战策增益：你可以消耗3点耐力来在与该专长相关联的基于敏捷或力量的技能上取10，即使通常因为危险的环境而不能这样做。

战策资源出处: Armor Master's Handbook pg. 20

Armored Rider.name: Armored Rider
Armored Rider.description:
You are accustomed to riding while wearing armor, and your armor doesn't hinder your riding skills.

Prerequisites
Mounted Combat, Ride 3 ranks.

Benefits
You don't take the usual armor check penalty on Ride checks. If you are knocked unconscious while in a saddle, you always remain in the saddle.

Normal
If you are knocked unconscious while riding, you have a 50% chance to stay in the saddle (75% if you're in a military saddle).

Artful Dodge.name: 巧妙闪躲 Artful Dodge
Artful Dodge.description:
专长类型：Combat

你熟练于人数上处于劣势时的避战方式。

先决条件: 智力13。

专长效果: 若你是唯一一个威胁目标的单位，在对抗该目标时你的AC获得+1闪避加值。

特殊说明: 在计算满足先决条件时，巧妙闪躲专长可以视为闪避专长。你可以用智力而非敏捷来满足需要最低敏捷作为先决条件的专长。

资源出处: Melee Tactics Toolbox pg. 7

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Artful%20Dodge

战策增益：你可以消耗5点耐力来对所有你是唯一一个威胁他们的目标获得+1闪避加值。

战策资源出处: Armor Master's Handbook pg. 20

Artifact Hunter.name: Artifact Hunter
Artifact Hunter.description:
You seek an artifact--either a specific one or merely any item of legendary prowess--with dogged tenacity.

Prerequisites
You must have come within sight of a legendary artifact at some point in your past.

Benefits
You gain a +2 bonus on Use Magic Device checks when emulating a class feature, ability score, race, or alignment. If you have 10 or more ranks in Use Magic Device, this bonus increases to +4. In addition, once per day, instead of attempting a Use Magic Device check normally, you can choose to determine the result as if you had rolled a 15. If you have 10 or more ranks in Use Magic Device, you can use this ability twice per day.

Goal
Claim ownership of an artifact.

Completion Benefit
You learn how to coax the most out of your magic items. Three times per day when you activate a use-activated or command word magic item, you can increase the item's effective caster level by +2 as a free action. You can use this ability once per round.

Suggested Traits
Dangerously Curious, Fortunate, Secret-Keeper.

Artillery Team.name: Artillery Team
Artillery Team.description:
Together, you and an ally can operate an oversized and unwieldy weapon.

Prerequisites
Proficiency with light crossbow, heavy crossbow, or musket; size Small or Medium.

Benefits
When you're adjacent to an ally who also has this feat, together you count as being Large for the purpose of using Large light crossbows, Large heavy crossbows, and Large muskets. Firing such a weapon this way requires your ally to support the barrel or bow of the weapon. You must be able to trace a line from your space to the target's space in such a way that the line passes through the ally's space. The ally doesn't provide soft cover to your target. Your ally uses her actions to load the weapon, and you use your actions to make attacks.
