战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 114

Blood Drinker.name: 饮血者 Blood Drinker
Blood Drinker.description:
吸取鲜血使你重新振作起来。

先决条件: 吸血裔。

专长效果: 选择一种类人生物子类，比如地精（你无法选取吸血裔子类）。你偏好吸食这个子类生物的鲜血。每当你从这类生物身上吸食新鲜的血液之后，你获得5点临时生命，并且在所有基于体质的检定与豁免+1。该效果持续1小时。临时生命可以通过多次吸食叠加，你每拥有3个HD，可以获得的临时生命上限增加就会5点，但是基于体质的检定与豁免上的+1加值不会叠加。

通常你只能从无助、被擒抱、麻痹、被压制、昏迷或者类似的无法行动的敌人身上吸血。如果你拥有啮咬攻击，则可以将吸食血液作为你啮咬攻击动作的一部分，否则你必须用挥砍或穿刺武器对目标造成至少1点伤害以割伤他（尽管你可能能够对目标造成剧烈的伤害或出血效果而无须真正割伤他）。一旦你割伤目标，你能以一个标准动作从它的伤口吸血。吸血对被你吸食的生物造成2点体质伤害。

资源出处: Advanced Race Guide pg. 99

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Blood%20Drinker

Blood Feast.name: Blood Feast
Blood Feast.description:
You become more aggressive and vicious when you taste living flesh and blood.

Prerequisites
Bite attack.

Benefits
When you damage a living creature with your bite attack, you gain a +1 morale bonus on attack and damage rolls with your bite attack until the end of your next turn.

Blood Feaster.name: 宴血者 Blood Feaster
Blood Feaster.description:
吸食血液给予你超人般的力量。

先决条件: 饮血者，基本攻击加值+6，吸血裔。

专长效果: 如果你使用“饮血者”专长使一个活物流失至少4点体质，你就在伤害检定上获得+2加值，并且所有基于力量的检定+1。这个加值持续的轮数等同于你HD的一半。

资源出处: Advanced Race Guide pg. 100

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Blood%20Feaster

Blood for the Empire.name: Blood for the Empire
Blood for the Empire.description:
When fighting alongside your allies, the sight of a bloodied foe inspires you to greatness, while a martyred comrade compels you to vengeance.

Prerequisites
Base attack bonus +4.

Benefits
You gain a +2 morale bonus on attack and damage rolls against a target that was damaged by an ally with this feat within the last round. When an ally with this feat dies within 30 feet of you, you gain the effects of haste for 1 round.

Blood Frenzy Assault.name: Blood Frenzy Assault
Blood Frenzy Assault.description:
The scent of blood intensifies your fury, and every wound you tear into your foes increases both your drive and ability to wreak havoc.

Prerequisites
Str 17, Blood Frenzy Strike, Blood Frenzy Style, Bloody Assault, Improved Unarmed Strike, Power Attack, base attack bonus +6, aquatic subtype.

Benefits
While you are using Blood Frenzy Style, when you make a full attack, you can make an additional unarmed or natural weapon attack for each enemy within your reach that is affected by a bleed effect. Until your next turn, you take a -2 penalty to AC for each additional attack gained in this way. In addition, the bleed damage your unarmed strikes deal from Blood Frenzy Strike increases to 2d6 points of bleed damage.

Blood Frenzy Strike.name: Blood Frenzy Strike
Blood Frenzy Strike.description:
Your strikes tear at an opponent's flesh, inflicting serious wounds, and you can unleash all of your pent-up rage in a single powerful blow.

Prerequisites
Str 15, Blood Frenzy Style, Improved Unarmed Strike, Power Attack, base attack bonus +4, aquatic subtype.

Benefits
While you are using Blood Frenzy Style, when you damage an opponent with your unarmed strikes or natural attacks, you deal an extra 1d6 points of bleed damage; this bleed damage does not stack with itself. Once every 1d4 rounds, you can make an unarmed attack with a -5 penalty; if you hit, you deal an additional 2d6 points of bludgeoning damage.

Blood Frenzy Style.name: Blood Frenzy Style
Blood Frenzy Style.description:
You have learned to turn your pain into power, whipping yourself into a blood frenzy whenever you take damage.

Prerequisites
Str 13, Improved Unarmed Strike, base attack bonus +1, aquatic subtype.

Benefits
While you are using Blood Frenzy Style, you gain a +2 bonus to your Strength and Constitution, and you take a -2 penalty to AC.

Special
You can enter Blood Frenzy Style only as an immediate action when you take damage. You cannot enter this style as a swift action, as with other style feats.

Blood of Heroes.name: 碧血丹心 Blood of Heroes
Blood of Heroes.description:
专长类型：Hero Point

即便天意弄人，你却一次又一次看清命运向成功前进。

先决条件: 洪福齐天。

专长效果: 当你升级时获得2英雄点。

通常状况: 当你升级时获得1英雄点。

资源出处: Advanced Players Guide pg. 323

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Blood%20of%20Heroes

Blood Salvage.name: 残羹剩血 Blood Salvage
Blood Salvage.description:
你不需要通过吸食活物以获得治疗的好处。

先决条件: 饮血者，吸血裔。

专长效果: 你可以对已死的生物使用“饮血者”专长，只要他的生物类型为你所选择的类人生物子类。你只可以对死亡未满6小时的生物吸血。

通常状况: 你只能使用“饮血者”专长吸取活物的新鲜血液。

资源出处: Advanced Race Guide pg. 100

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Blood%20Salvage

Blood Spurt.name: 以血蒙眼 Blood Spurt
Blood Spurt.description:
专长类型：Combat

在战斗中被击中后，你把自己的血溅到敌人脸上。

先决条件: BAB+2，流血敏感（susceptibility to bleed damage）。

专长效果: 当一名邻近的敌人用一次造成流血伤害的近战攻击击中你时，他必须通过一次强韧豁免（DC=10+1/2你的角色等级+你的体质调整值），否则飞洒的血液会遮住他的眼睛导致他被目盲1d4轮。额外地，如果你具有一项能够造成流血伤害的特殊能力（比如盗贼的 流血偷袭 盗贼天赋【译注：此处原文为bleeding strike，但提及的天赋为bleeding attack】），以一个标准动作，你可以对自己造成一点流血伤害来将血液飞洒到你指定的一个邻近敌人脸上，造成上述的相同效果。只有你第一次受到一名生物的流血攻击时，他才需要通过该检定。

资源出处: Horror Adventures pg. 82

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Blood%20Spurt

Blood Tide.name: 血腥如潮 Blood Tide
Blood Tide.description:
在血性狂怒的驱使下，你化身为一团爪牙的风暴扑向对手。

先决条件: 寓守于攻，高等血性狂怒，基础攻击加值+6，血性狂怒能力，沙华鱼人。

专长效果: 每当你在处于血性狂怒的状态下发动攻击，你都可以放弃你的所有攻击次数而是对目标发动一次单次近战攻击，这次攻击使用你最高的攻击加值并且视为攻击每一个位于你的触及范围内处于流血状态或是已受伤的敌人你必须使用自己的天生武器，并且为每一个目标进行一次攻击检定。你不需要在发动这些攻击时仅使用一种天生武器。

如果你使用血腥如潮，那么你也不能从任何提供额外攻击次数的法术，专长和能力中收益。

资源出处: Monster Codex pg. 189

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Blood%20Tide

Blood Ties.name: 血浓于水 Blood Ties
Blood Ties.description:
专长类型：evil

这个法术的其中一位目标，必须是一个人质，这名人质需是在你法术范围内被绑住、被固定住或无助的生物(尽管之后这名人质移出了你的施法范围，此法术也不会结束)。第二目标必须是第一目标的家族成员。如果两个生物皆没有通过对此法术的豁免，那只要双方都还活着，那么人质所受到的任何伤害，第二目标也会承受，最大伤害为每天每施法者等级10点伤害(必然会杀死第一目标的过量伤害不会转移)。这种转移的伤害没有类型，并且会忽视第二目标的伤害减免以及抗性。如果两位目标中有一位通过豁免检定，则你永远不能再次尝试利用这两位生物之间的联系。如果目标之间的家族关系并非那么紧密，则你目标之间的连结会减弱。如果两个目标之间的关系是远亲又或是婚姻，那目标在此豁免检定上获得加+2加值。如果两个目标之间的关系是父母又或者是手足，则目标在伙豁免检定承受-2的减值。



资源出处: Horror Adventures pg. 110

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/SpellDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Blood%20Ties

Blood Vengeance.name: 血腥复仇 Blood Vengeance
Blood Vengeance.description:
盟友的倒下激起了你的狂暴并使你变得残忍愤怒。

先决条件: 半兽人或兽人，非秩序阵营。

专长效果: 每当你的盟友HP降低至负值或被杀害时，你能够在下一轮以自由动作进入类似于野蛮人【狂暴】职业特性的状态，但是这状态并没有那么强力。如果你拥有【狂暴】职业特性并且已经处于狂暴状态，那么在狂暴中你的力量以及体质额外获得+2士气加值。如果你没有【狂暴】职业特性、或者你当日已经用光狂暴轮数，这种弱效狂暴会给予你所有野蛮人狂暴带来的优势以及劣势，不过你的力量以及体质只会获得+2士气加值。无论何种情况，该状态只持续4轮。

如同野蛮人的狂暴一样，当这种弱效狂暴结束时，你会疲乏；如果在该效果结束之前有其他盟友被击败，弱效狂暴会额外持续4轮。该专长不会允许你在疲乏状态下进入狂暴。只有被击败的盟友拥有至少与你相同的HD时你才能使用该专长（不包含被魔法召唤的盟友）。

资源出处: Advanced Race Guide pg. 56Orcs of Golarion pg. 24

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Blood%20Vengeance

Blooded Arcane Strike.name: 血术之击 Blooded Arcane Strike
Blooded Arcane Strike.description:
专长类型：Combat

蕴藏在你鲜血之中的奥术能量伴随着你的每一次攻击而涌动

先决条件: 奥术打击，可以施放奥术魔法，血怒职业能力。

专长效果: 当你处于血怒状态下，你无需使用迅捷动作启动奥术打击——它将永久性生效。当你使用暴击（Vital Strike），精通暴击（Improved Vital Strike）或高等暴击（Greater Vital Strike）专长进行攻击时，你的奥术打击伤害也会随着暴击造成的额外伤害骰数而翻倍。

资源出处: Advanced Class Guide pg. 143

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Blooded%20Arcane%20Strike

战策增益：当你以奥术打击强化武器时，你可以通过花费5点耐力使其在持续时间内伤害+1。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 114

Bloodletting.name: 血溅五步 Bloodletting
Bloodletting.description:
专长类型：Combat

当你使用一件穿刺或挥砍武器攻击时，你得意于对手血如泉涌的窘境。

先决条件: 信仰宗-库山。

专长效果: 每当你使用穿刺或挥砍武器对目标造成了一次重击威胁（无论此次威胁是否确认）时，你会使目标流血，每轮在目标行动开始时对他造成1点流血伤害。

资源出处: Inner Sea Gods pg. 208Faiths of Corruption pg. 25

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Bloodletting

战策增益：当你使用穿刺或者挥砍武器确认一次重击时，你可以消耗至多2点耐力来提升血溅五步造成的流血伤害，每消耗1点就能提升1点流血伤害。

战策资源出处: Weapon Master's Handbook pg. 24

Bloodmarked Flight.name: Bloodmarked Flight
Bloodmarked Flight.description:
Your attunement to your werebat ancestry has allowed you to master a crude form of flight.

Prerequisites
Base attack bonus +5, werebat-kin.

Benefits
As an additional bestial feature, you can use your change shape ability to gain a fly speed of 30 feet with poor maneuverability if carrying a light load and wearing no armor or light armor, or a fly speed of 20 feet with clumsy maneuverability if carrying a medium or heavy load or wearing medium or heavy armor.

Bloodstone Manhunter.name: Bloodstone Manhunter
Bloodstone Manhunter.description:
You are skilled at fighting criminal humans such as bandits.

Prerequisites
Bloodstone Swords 10 TPA.

Benefits
You gain a +1 bonus on Bluff, Knowledge, Perception, Sense Motive, and Survival checks against humans, and a +1 bonus on weapon attack and damage rolls against humans. If you have a favored enemy bonus against humans, this feat does not stack with that bonus.

Bloody Assault.name: 血腥强袭 Bloody Assault
Bloody Assault.description:
专长类型：Combat

通过牺牲精度，你能够制造出难于愈合的流血伤口。

先决条件: 力量13，猛力攻击，基本攻击加值+6。

专长效果: 你可以选择让所有近战攻击检定与战技检定承受-5减值，使你的武器近战攻击在正常能够造成的伤害之外，额外造成1d4点流血伤害。受到流血伤害的生物会在其每行动轮开始时持续遭受这一伤害。通过DC15的医疗检定或者任何魔法治疗均可制止流血伤害。由此专长造成的流血伤害不会相互叠加。你必须在进行攻击检定之前选择使用该专长，并且该效果会持续至你的下一轮为止（不过流血会如常持续，直至被治愈为止）。

资源出处: Advanced Players Guide pg. 151

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Bloody%20Assault

战策增益：每轮你使用该专长时，你可以选择消耗最多不超过5点耐力，来消减等同于所消耗耐力点的命中惩罚，直至你下一轮结束。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 114

Bloody Mess.name: Bloody Mess
Bloody Mess.description:
Your recklessness often puts you in harm's way, and you are terrifying to behold when covered in your own blood.

Prerequisites
Skill Focus (Intimidate).

Benefits
Whenever you take an amount of piercing, slashing, or bleed damage equal to or greater than double your character level, you can attempt an Intimidate check as an immediate action to demoralize the creature that dealt the damage as long as it is within 30 feet of you. If the damage resulted from a critical hit, you can cause the target creature to be sickened instead of shaken if you successfully demoralize it. You can use this feat only once per round to attempt an Intimidate check to demoralize an opponent.

Bloody Sabres.name: 血腥双刀 Bloody Sabres
Bloody Sabres.description:
专长类型：Combat

模仿着螳螂神的威能，你的双刀削斩既深且狠，让对手鲜血喷涌。

先决条件: 敏捷15，擅长异种武器（锯齿刀），双武器战斗，信仰阿卡埃克克（Achaekek）。

专长效果: 每当你成功的同时以主手和副手武器攻击命中一个目标，并且这两把武器都是锯齿刀的话，你会在造成正常伤害以外多造成1点流血伤害。

资源出处: Inner Sea Gods pg. 208

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Bloody%20Sabres

战策增益：在使用血腥双刀造成流血伤害时，你可以消耗2点耐力提升你对对手造成的流血伤害1点。

战策资源出处: Weapon Master's Handbook pg. 24

Bloody Vengeance.name: 以血还血 Bloody Vengeance
Bloody Vengeance.description:
专长类型：Combat

你复仇的还击会对对手造成长久的痛苦。

先决条件: 信仰卡莉丝翠，基础攻击加值+1。

专长效果: 如果一个对手在之前的一分钟内对你造成过伤害，那么你可以花费一个标准动作度量这个对手，然后，如果你成功的对该对手发动的近战攻击命中，你会在造成正常伤害以外多造成1点流血伤害。

资源出处: Inner Sea Gods pg. 208Faiths of Balance pg. 24

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Bloody%20Vengeance

Blowout Shot Deed.name: Blowout Shot Deed
Blowout Shot Deed.description:
By using a specially prepared mix of reagents, you can create concussive blasts with your firearm.

Prerequisites
Craft (alchemy) 3 ranks, grit class feature or Amateur Gunslinger feat.

Benefits
Spend 1 grit point to retrieve a specially prepared dose of black powder from your person. The next time you use the firearm you've loaded with this special black powder, the concussive blast knocks you back 5 feet from the direction at which you were aiming. If there is no available space behind you, you brace yourself against the obstacle and do not move from your square. Any creatures within the first range increment of the firearm struck by this attack take damage as normal and must succeed at a Reflex save (DC = 10 + 1/2 your gunslinger level + your Int modifier) or be pushed back 10 feet. Creatures within two range increments are pushed back 5 feet, while creatures farther away than this are unaffected by the concussive blast.

Bludgeoner.name: 钝击士 Bludgeoner
Bludgeoner.description:
专长类型：Combat

你可以用任何钝器敲晕对手。

专长效果: 你可以在使用一种致命钝器的情况下造成非致命伤害，并且没有攻击检定罚值。

特殊说明: 一个拥有该专长的盗贼可以在使用钝器偷袭时造成非致命伤害。

通常状况: 你使用致命武器造成非致命伤害时攻击检定有-4罚值。你不能使用致命武器在偷袭中造成非致命伤害。

资源出处: Ultimate Combat pg. 90

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Bludgeoner

战策增益：当你用致命钝击造成瘀伤时，你可以花费2点耐力点，令武器的大小增大一级。该效果不与其他增大武器形体的效果叠加。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 114

Blundering Defense.name: 牵制防守 Blundering Defense
Blundering Defense.description:
专长类型：Combat

你出离常识的防守技术有的时候会对敌人造成足够的牵制，从而保护队友。

先决条件: 谨慎战斗，半身人。

专长效果: 当你使用防御式战斗或者完全防御时，你的队友获得你从该动作上得到的AC闪避加值一半的幸运加值，该幸运加值作用到AC和CMD上。你的队友只能在邻近你时获得该加值。

资源出处: Advanced Race Guide pg. 66

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Blundering%20Defense

战策增益：花费5点耐力令你10尺范围内的盟友获得该专长的益处。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 114

Blunt Blade.name: Blunt Blade
Blunt Blade.description:
With a single curse, you make your rival less fearsome in combat.

Prerequisites
Int 13, base attack bonus +6, Use Magic Device 1 rank.

Benefits
As a standard action, you can curse the accuracy of an enemy you have dealt damage to in the last minute. The target must succeed at a Fortitude save or it automatically fails to confirm all critical threats. This effect lasts for 1 round.

Special
If a shaman or witch uses this blood hex, the target is unable to deal precision damage or sneak attack damage for the hex's duration.

Blustering Bluff.name: 虚张声势 Blustering Bluff
Blustering Bluff.description:
你能够以强势的口吻让他人相信离谱的谎言。

先决条件: 魅力 13，唬骗1级，威吓1级。

专长效果: 当你使用唬骗欺骗1名敌人时，可以用盛气凌人地对该生物叫嚷，使得讲出不太可靠（unlikely）或过于牵强（far-fetched）的谎言带来的减值降低5点。若你这么做且检定并失败的话，在1d6 x 10分钟以后，被你愚弄的生物才会意识到你试图欺凌唬骗它，其对你的态度会变为不友善（treats you as unfriendly），而且可能会告发你或者对你采取其他行动。

通常状况: 说出不太可靠（unlikely）的谎言的减值为-5点，过于牵强（far-fetched）的谎言的减值为-10点。

资源出处: Ultimate Intrigue pg. 75

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Blustering%20Bluff

Boar Ferocity.name: 豭突刺 Boar Ferocity
Boar Ferocity.description:
专长类型：Combat

你撕裂肉体的徒手攻击让敌人胆寒。

先决条件: 精通徒手打击，豭突势，威吓6级。

专长效果: 你可以用你的徒手击打造成穿刺伤害。而且你在打击对手士气的威吓检定上获得+2加值。你采用豭突流派架势时，如果你成功撕裂对手，以一个自由动作，你可以进行一次打击敌人士气的威吓检定。

资源出处: Ultimate Combat pg. 90

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Boar%20Ferocity

战策增益：如果你的对手在你用豭突流派撕裂对手之前已被威吓，花费5点耐力可令其恶心（sicken）一轮。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 114

Boar Shred.name: 豭突千裂 Boar Shred
Boar Shred.description:
专长类型：Combat

你徒手撕开的伤口血流不止，让敌人闻风丧胆。

先决条件: 精通徒手打击，豭突刺，豭突势，威吓9级。

专长效果: 你可以用一个移动动作进行一次威吓检定打击对手的士气。你采用豭突流派架势时，如果你成功撕裂对手，对手会在之后每轮行动开始时受到1d6出血伤害。即使你之后切换成其他架势，造成的持续出血伤害仍会继续。

资源出处: Ultimate Combat pg. 90

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Boar%20Shred

战策增益：花费2点耐力，你可以用迅捷动作威吓对手。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 114

Boar Style.name: 豭突势 Boar Style
Boar Style.description:
专长类型：CombatStyle

你的尖牙和利爪撕裂你的敌人。

先决条件: 精通徒手打击，威吓3级。

专长效果: 你可以让徒手打击造成挥砍伤害——变更伤害类型是一个自由动作。当你采用豭突流派架势时，一轮内，如果你的徒手攻击命中同一敌人两次或以上，你可以撕裂敌人的血肉，对敌人造成2d6额外伤害，该伤害类似于【撕扯】能力，你每轮只能造成一次额外伤害。【编注：根据FAQ，此条已修正】

资源出处: Ultimate Combat pg. 90

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Boar%20Style

战策增益：花费3点耐力，即使你一轮内只命中敌人一次，你依然可以撕裂敌人并造成流血伤害。你一轮依然只能造成一次额外伤害。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 114

Body Control.name: 身体制御 Body Control
Body Control.description:
专长类型：Meditation

你可以立即调整你的自主神经功能。

先决条件: 感知11，冥想大师。

专长效果: 在你冥想后的24小时内，你在对抗毒素，疾病，饥饿和其他会令你疲乏或力竭的效果时强韧豁免获得+1加值。你只需要一半的食物就可以避免饥饿，一半的水分就可以避免脱水以及一半的睡眠时间来恢复伤害，避免疲乏或力竭以及重新准备法术。

资源出处: Faiths and Philosophies pg. 19

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Body%20Control

Body Mastery.name: 身体掌握 Body Mastery
Body Mastery.description:
专长类型：Meditation

冥想会加固你的身体来对抗物理攻击。

先决条件: 感知19，身体制御，冥想大师，角色等级15。

专长效果: 在你冥想后的24小时内，你获得伤害减免2/-。

资源出处: Faiths and Philosophies pg. 19

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Body%20Mastery

Body Shield.name: 化敌为盾 Body Shield
Body Shield.description:
专长类型：Combat

通过巧妙的施力，你将被擒抱的敌人转向攻击袭来的方位。

先决条件: 精通擒抱，基本攻击加值+6。

专长效果: 当你擒抱一个相邻生物时，以直觉动作，你可以对其进行一次擒抱战技检定使其为你抵挡一次攻击。如果你成功，这次攻击不会命中你，而是会以正被你擒抱的生物为目标，使用相同的攻击检定。你不能对正擒抱你的生物使用该专长，并且掩蔽效果将在你抵消该次攻击后消失。

资源出处: Ultimate Combat pg. 90

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Body%20Shield

战策增益：花费5点耐力，你可以对正擒抱你的生物使用该专长。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 114

Bodyguard.name: 保镖 Bodyguard
Bodyguard.description:
专长类型：Combat

你的快速攻击能够格挡开敌人对附近盟友的攻击。

先决条件: 战斗反射。

专长效果: 当邻近的盟友被攻击时，你能够使用借机攻击来尝试进行协助他人动作来增加盟友的AC。你无法以借机攻击来使用协助他人动作增加盟友的攻击检定。

通常状况: 协助他人是标准动作。

资源出处: Advanced Players Guide pg. 151

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Bodyguard

战策增益：你可选择花费1-2点耐力，并提升盟友的AC等同你花费的耐力点数。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 114

Bolster Jinx.name: Bolster Jinx
Bolster Jinx.description:
Your ability to resist certain effects somehow makes it even harder for creatures you jinx to do the same.

Prerequisites
Great Fortitude, Iron Will, or Lightning Reflexes; Halfling Jinx trait.

Benefits
A jinxed target's penalty on Fortitude, Reflex, or Will saves increases by 2 if you have the Great Fortitude, Lightning Reflexes, or Iron Will feat, respectively. If you have more than one of these feats, the additional penalties apply to all of the corresponding saves.

Bolster Undead.name: 支持亡灵 Bolster Undead
Bolster Undead.description:
你可以增强自己控制的不死者，让它们无惧正能量的效力。

先决条件: 引导能量6d6，信仰厄迦图娅。

专长效果: 每当你通过引导能量能量治疗不死生物时，你可以让所有被治疗的不死生物获得+1引导抗力（或是在现有的引导抗力上额外+1），效果持续等同于你的魅力调整值轮（最小1轮）。

资源出处: Inner Sea Gods pg. 208

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Bolster%20Undead

Bolstered Resilience.name: 鼓励恢复 Bolstered Resilience
Bolstered Resilience.description:
你可以以暂时的消耗为代价在短时间内大大提高伤害减免能力。

先决条件: 伤害减免能力。

专长效果: 以直觉动作，你可以在针对一次单独攻击时将伤害减免翻倍，最高为20。伤害减免的伤害类型不会发生改变。如果你试图抵挡的攻击未命中你，增加后的伤害减免会继续存在，直到你被命中或下一次轮到你行动，取其先者。下一轮你的行动开始时，你陷入疲乏状态。你不能在疲乏状态时使用该专长。

资源出处: Ultimate Combat pg. 90

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Bolstered%20Resilience

Bonded Mind.name: Bonded Mind
Bonded Mind.description:
You and your partner are so close that you can almost read each other's minds.

Benefits
As long as you can see each other, you and an ally who also has this feat can trade nonverbal messages. These function as the message spell, except that you don't need to whisper or point, and you cannot be overheard.


Pathfinder Society
A PC cannot benefit from the feat Bonded Mind or any teamwork feats that use it as a prerequisite unless he permanently possesses the feat; this is an exception to how an inquisitor's solo tactics ability, a cavalier's tactician ability, and similar abilities function.

Bonebreaker.name: 碎骨者 Bonebreaker
Bonebreaker.description:
专长类型：Combat

当你的对手无法进行防御时，你的徒手打击将会摧筋断骨。

先决条件: 敏捷13，精通擒抱，精通徒手打击，碎颚者，震慑拳，医疗9级。

专长效果: 当你对一个被擒抱、无助或震慑中的敌人成功施展了一次“震慑拳”，你可以放弃震慑拳的正常效果，转而对敌人造成1d6点敏捷伤害。

资源出处: Ultimate Combat pg. 90

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Bonebreaker

战策增益：如果你对眩晕或恍惚的敌人使用震慑拳，你可以花费5点耐力，选择放弃震慑拳的效果，转而造成1d6力量或敏捷伤害。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 114

Bookish Rogue.name: 秘术盗贼 Bookish Rogue
Bookish Rogue.description:
你在模仿法术之前经过精心准备，以获得更多魔法的资讯。

先决条件: 次级魔法（Minor Magic）游荡者天赋。

专长效果: 花费10分钟研究一本法术书，你可以将自己通过次级魔法或高等魔法（Major Magic）游荡者天赋获得的一个术士/法师法术更换为一个法术书中记载的同环法术。这个改变持续到你下次以本专长更换法术为止。

资源出处: Advanced Class Guide pg. 143

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Bookish%20Rogue

Boon Companion.name: 好伙伴 Boon Companion
Boon Companion.description:
你跟魔宠或动物伙伴之间的连结超乎寻常地强烈。

先决条件: 动物伙伴职业特性或魔宠职业特性。

专长效果: 在计算你的动物伙伴或魔宠所具有的能力时，视同你的职业高4级，最高有效德鲁伊等级等同于你的角色等级。如果你有超过一只动物伙伴或魔宠，那么选择一只获得此效果。如果你遣散（dismiss）或遗失了获得此效果的动物伙伴或魔宠，那么你可以将此专长效果用于它的后继者身上。

特殊说明: 你可以多次选择此专长。其效果不叠加。每次你选择此专长时，将其应用于一只不同的动物伙伴或魔宠身上。

资源出处: Ultimate Wilderness pg. 217Seekers of Secrets pg. 16Animal Archive pg. 18

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Boon%20Companion

Born Alone.name: 独生子 Born Alone
Born Alone.description:
你是如此地坚强和残忍，在子宫中就杀死并吃掉了你的弟妹。

先决条件: 兽人。

专长效果: 每当你以近战攻击杀死或击倒一名敌人，你获得相当于你体质加值的临时生命（最少1）直到你的下一回合。这些临时生命不会叠加。若敌人处于无助或生命骰不足你的一半，你不会获得该奖励。

资源出处: Advanced Race Guide pg. 141

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Born%20Alone

Born of Frost.name: 霜生种 Born of Frost
Born of Frost.description:
你身体萦绕的寒气足以冻伤其他生物。

先决条件: 霜巨人。

专长效果: 你的天生武器攻击和徒手击打可以造成1d6点额外的寒冷伤害，以天生武器或是徒手击打命中你的生物会承受1点寒冷伤害。

资源出处: Monster Codex pg. 68

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Born%20of%20Frost

Bouncing Spell.name: 弹性法术 Bouncing Spell
Bouncing Spell.description:
专长类型：Metamagic

你可以使用本已失败的法术对抗不同的目标。

专长效果: 当一个弹性法术选定一个目标生物，却没有对预期目标产生效果的话（无论是由于法术抗力还是成功的豁免），那么你能以迅捷动作将法术重定向到法术范围内的另一个合适生物身上。重定向的法术在所有方面都会将新目标视为最初的目标。能够以任何方式影响目标的法术（包括成功的豁免后会造成较弱效果的），均无法以此方式重新定向。弹性法术占用比法术的实际环级高1环的法术位。

资源出处: Advanced Players Guide pg. 151

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Bouncing%20Spell

Bouncing Spell-Like Ability.name: Bouncing Spell-Like Ability
Bouncing Spell-Like Ability.description:
You can retarget one of your spell-like abilities when it fails to affect its original target.

Prerequisites
Spell-like ability at caster level 4th or higher.

Benefits
Choose one of your spell-like abilities, subject to the restrictions described in this feat. You can use the chosen spell-like ability as a bouncing spell-like ability three times per day (or less, if the ability is normally usable only once or twice per day).

Whenever you use a bouncing spell-like ability against a single target and the ability has no effect on it (whether due to spell resistance or a successful saving throw), as a swift action, you can redirect the spell-like ability to target another eligible creature within range. The redirected spell-like ability behaves as if its new target were the original target for the spell-like ability. Spell-like abilities that affect a target in any way (including a lesser effect from a successful saving throw) can't be redirected in this manner.

You can only select a spell-like ability duplicating a spell with a level less than or equal to 1/2 your caster level (round down) - 1. For a summary, see Table 3-1.

Bouncing Trick.name: Bouncing Trick
Bouncing Trick.description:
Your mesmerist trick jumps to a new target after the trick is triggered.

Prerequisites
Mesmerist trick class feature.

Benefits
Whenever you implant a mesmerist trick in a target's mind, you can spend any number of additional uses of your mesmerist trick ability to transform the trick into a bouncing trick. The maximum number of uses of the mesmerist trick ability that you can spend on a single bouncing trick is equal to your Charisma modifier.

After you trigger a bouncing trick, you can redirect the trick to one target within 30 feet as an immediate action. The redirected trick is immediately implanted in the new target's mind, as if it were the original target. You can't implant a bouncing trick in a target that has been previously implanted with that same bouncing trick. You can't implant a creature with a bouncing trick in this manner if doing so would place it above the maximum number of mesmerist tricks that you can implant in a single target.

You can redirect the trick multiple times, up to the number of additional uses of the mesmerist trick ability that you spent on the bouncing trick. If you don't use an immediate action to redirect a bouncing trick as soon as the trick is triggered, any remaining uses of the mesmerist trick ability that you invested in the bouncing trick are lost.

Bounding Hammer.name: Bounding Hammer
Bounding Hammer.description:
You can throw a hammer so it rebounds near you.

Prerequisites
Proficiency with hammer, base attack bonus +6.

Benefits
As a standard action, you may throw a hammer at an opponent within 20 feet. If you hit (whether or not the attack damages the target), the hammer rebounds off of the creature and lands in your square. If you have the Snatch Arrows feat, you may choose to catch the hammer when it enters your square (though this does not give you the ability to immediately throw the hammer). This ability may not work against some creatures or in certain circumstances as determined by the GM; for example, your weapon does not bounce off incorporeal creatures (unless it has the ghost touch ability), it may stick to creatures with the adhesive ability, the slowing effect of fighting underwater prevents you from using this feat, and so on.

Normal
A thrown weapon drops in the square where it hit its target.

Bounding Step.name: Bounding Step
Bounding Step.description:
You can leap through difficult terrain like a deer or elk.

Prerequisites
Dex 15, Nimble Moves.

Benefits
You gain a +2 bonus on Acrobatics checks to keep your balance and Reflex saves to avoid falling. Additionally, select one terrain type from the ranger list of favored terrains. Within that terrain, the maximum number of feet of difficult terrain you can move through as if it were normal terrain increases by 10 feet.

Normal
Nimble Moves allows you to move through 5 feet of difficult terrain each round as if it were normal terrain.

Special
If you have the favored terrain class feature, you do not select a terrain with this feat. Instead, this feat's increased movement through difficult terrain applies to all of your favored terrains.

Bounteous Body.name: Bounteous Body
Bounteous Body.description:
Your body produces magical fruits of greater power.

Prerequisites
Character level 5th, grapevine or natural magic racial trait.

Benefits
You can spend 1 hour in concentration to grow a number of fist-sized fruits equal to one-third your character level. Eating a fruit grants the benefits of a lesser restoration spell. Fruits lose their magical potency after 24 hours. This ability is usable once per week plus one additional time per week equal to your Constitution modifier (minimum 0).

Brackish Spell.name: Brackish Spell
Brackish Spell.description:
You can conjure a seawater orb to protect yourself.

Benefits
This feat can be applied only to spells with the water descriptor. You can modify the spell to surround you with a thin sheath of brackish salt water in addition to the spell's normal effect. You gain DR/piercing equal to the spell's level for 1 round after you finish casting the spell. After this round, the water collapses into a briny puddle and the effect ends. A brackish spell does not use up a higher-level spell slot than the spell's actual level.

Brain Eater.name: Brain Eater
Brain Eater.description:
You gain some of the skills and knowledge of a consumed foe by eating its brain.

Prerequisites
Ghoul, Int 17.

Benefits
If you eat a portion of the brain of a creature with Intelligence 3 or higher, you gain a +2 insight bonus on all skill checks and Will saving throws for 1 hour. Eating a brain is a full-round action, and the target must be dead or helpless. If the target is living, you may attempt to eat its brain as a coup de grace attack on the target, but you gain the insight bonus only if your attempt results in the victim's death.

Branch Pounce.name: 树冠突袭 Branch Pounce
Branch Pounce.description:
专长类型：Combat

你擅长于在战斗中利用更高的位置，并且可以从高处扑下对你的敌人造成难以置信的伤害。

先决条件: 攀爬3级，潜行3级。

专长效果: 当你从高处跳下以进行一次冲锋时(比如从树上跳下来)，你可以通过一次近战攻击检定来缓冲。若本次攻击在你的冲锋结束时做出，则该次攻击将对你的冲锋目标造如同你坠落所受伤害值的伤害(10英尺坠落为1d6点，20英尺坠落为2d6点，等等)。这种坠落的伤害不会在重击时加倍。攻击结束后你降落在周围一个空置的方格中，你选择临接目标的位置，你会受到坠落的伤害，如同你坠落了10英尺。你可以进行一次特技动作检定以在你的坠落距离上额外增加10英尺以增加此次攻击的伤害。如果你的攻击失败了，你就会掉落在目标附近的随机方块中，并承担全部的坠落伤害。

资源出处: Ultimate Wilderness pg. 107Heroes of the Wild pg. 22

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Branch%20Pounce

Branded for Retribution.name: 惩戒烙印 Branded for Retribution
Branded for Retribution.description:
你用你的破敌武器为目标铸下烙印，使其更容易被你的盟友所伤害。

先决条件: 【破敌】职业特性。

专长效果: 以一个标准动作，通过消耗3轮的【破敌】职业能力，使用你附加了〔破敌〕能力的武器进行一次近战攻击。如果你命中，你的目标不会受到伤害，但会被打下一个持续到你下次行动的烙印。只要烙印存在，你的盟友在攻击被烙印的生物时，武器都被视为附加了与你的武器相同的〔破敌〕效果。

资源出处: Ultimate Combat pg. 90

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Branded%20for%20Retribution

Brash Stride.name: Brash Stride
Brash Stride.description:
You have studied the bold fighting style of Grand Prince Cyricas and emulate his intrepid tread through jungles and other dangerous lands.

Prerequisites
Dex 15, Acrobatic Steps, Nimble Moves.

Benefits
When you charge or run, you treat difficult terrain as normal terrain.

Bravery in Action.name: Bravery in Action
Bravery in Action.description:
Sometimes the key to bravery is acting before you have time to be scared.

Prerequisites
Bravery class feature, worshiper of Cayden Cailean.

Benefits
You can add the bonus from bravery to your initiative checks.

Breach.name: Breach
Breach.description:
Using its powerful tail to charge at an incredible speed, a bunyip can explode through the water's surface and get the jump on terrestrial prey.

Prerequisites
Str 15, bunyip.

Benefits
While underwater, the bunyip can make a special charge attack against a creature on land. As long as the target is no farther away than half the bunyip's swim speed (25 feet for most bunyips) from the body of water the bunyip is attacking from, the bunyip can break through the surface of the water and continue its charge as it soars through the air and toward the target of its attack. The bunyip can still only move up to twice its swim speed while making a breach attack. This attack otherwise follows all the normal rules for a charge attack.

Breadth of Experience.name: 生命历练 Breadth of Experience
Breadth of Experience.description:
尽管你在同族中还很年轻，却已经具备了相当程度的训练与知识。

先决条件: 矮人，精灵或侏儒；年龄100岁以上。

专长效果: 你的所有知识检定与专业检定获得+2加值，并且可以在未受训的情况下进行这些检定。

资源出处: Advanced Players Guide pg. 151

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Breadth%20of%20Experience

Break Guard.name: 破除防御 Break Guard
Break Guard.description:
专长类型：Combat

你用你两把武器的其中之一打乱了对方的防御，随之用另一把武器进行攻击。

先决条件: 精通卸武，双武器格斗。

专长效果: 当你装备两把武器，只要你成功的用其中一把卸除了敌人的武器，你可以消耗一次迅捷动作来用另一把武器立刻对其进行一次攻击。

资源出处: Ultimate Combat pg. 91

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Break%20Guard

战策增益：如果花费5点耐力，你可以用自由动作而非迅捷动作来发动攻击。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 114

Breaker of Barriers.name: 摧毁藩篱 Breaker of Barriers
Breaker of Barriers.description:
专长类型：Combat

击破任何护墙即是你的神圣使命。

先决条件: 力量17，信仰洛瓦古格。

专长效果: 你在击破门，墙体，水坝和其他类似的障碍物的力量检定以及进行冲撞和穿越的战技攻击检定上获得+2加值。当你击破门，墙体，水坝和其他类似的障碍物时，你忽略该物体的前5点硬度。

资源出处: Inner Sea Gods pg. 208

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Breaker%20of%20Barriers

Bred Commander.name: 将才 Bred Commander
Bred Commander.description:
你从小便熟读兵书军略，冷酷无情的战争与死亡对你来说只是统计数字的变化而已，而你的军团也学会更加服从和畏惧他们的指挥官——获得胜利的唯一保障。

先决条件: 大地精。

专长效果: 当你作为一支军队的指挥官，并应用极限战役中的集团战斗（Mass Combat）规则进行战斗时，你可以将自己的职业等级取代魅力调整值加到你的军队的士气检定上。

资源出处: Monster Codex pg. 116

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Bred%20Commander

Brewmaster.name: 酿造大师 Brewmaster
Brewmaster.description:
你能够酿造烈酒。

先决条件: 工艺（炼金）1级，专业（酿造）1级，矮人。

专长效果: 你在工艺（炼金）检定以及专业（酿造）检定上获得+2加值，同时所有你制作的毒素的豁免DC均会增加1点。

资源出处: Advanced Race Guide pg. 17

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Brewmaster

Brilliant Planner.name: 锦囊妙计 Brilliant Planner
Brilliant Planner.description:
凭藉自身的经验和聪明才智，你能够做出预备计划以应对突发事件。

先决条件: 智力 13，角色等级5级。

专长效果: 你能够为未来的突发事件做出准备，即便事先不知道这些突发情况会是哪方面的内容也不在话下。作为妙计（brilliant plan）的准备工作，你要在1个定居点内逗留至少24小时，你能花费8小时并且支付至多每角色等级50gp作为妙计的资金。当你的妙计没有付诸实施时，你总是被视为额外背负20磅重的物品，即便妙计的内容本身仍未敲定也是如此。

每日1次，你能够花费10分钟制定妙计，取得在之前造访的定居点内可以获取的1件物品，或者获得你的角色提前计划过的1项普通服务（mundane service）。一旦你制定了妙计之后，便可以从专长的资金中扣除物品或服务带来的开销。由妙计获取的任何物品的重量必须小于等于10磅。同样地，你通过该专长获得的任何非魔法服务是否在该地区内适用，必须由GM进行判定。

一旦你将为了妙计预存的资金用尽，或者使用该专长获取了共计20磅重的物体的话，则必须重新补满（replenish）妙计的资金才能够再次使用该专长。

资源出处: Ultimate Intrigue pg. 75

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Brilliant%20Planner

Brilliant Spell Preperation.name: Brilliant Spell Preperation
Brilliant Spell Preperation.description:
You have the foresight to prepare just the right spell for the troubles you face.

Prerequisites
Int 13, ability to prepare 3rd-level spells.

Benefits
Select one class for which you prepare spells of 3rd level or higher. Once you select a class, it can't be changed. When you prepare spells for that class, you can leave one spell slot open as a special slot. The slot must be at least 2 levels lower than the highest-level spell you can cast. You can then prepare a spell in this special open slot as a standard action instead of it taking 15 minutes.

Special
You can take this feat multiple times. Each time you do, you can leave an additional special slot open.

Brisk Spell.name: 轻快超魔 Brisk Spell
Brisk Spell.description:
专长类型：Metamagic

你的移动类魔法让盟友比平时更迅捷。

先决条件: 敏捷13。

专长效果: 你能调整一个提供给盟友正常所不具备的移动类型的法术，该法术提供的移动速度增加10尺。轻快超魔法术占用与原法术相同环级的法术位。

资源出处: Magic Tactics Toolbox pg. 5

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Brisk%20Spell

Bristling Bull Rush.name: Bristling Bull Rush
Bristling Bull Rush.description:
You deal damage to opponents when bull rushing them through difficult terrain, using the environment itself to harm your targets.

Prerequisites
Str 13, Improved Bull Rush, Power Attack, base attack bonus +3.

Benefits
When you successfully bull rush a creature, it takes 1d4 points of damage for every 5 feet it is pushed through naturally occurring difficult terrain. This damage is in addition to any damage the creature might normally take from moving through the difficult terrain. Creatures with the woodland stride special ability or who are otherwise unaffected by difficult terrain are immune to this extra damage.

Bristling Drag.name: Bristling Drag
Bristling Drag.description:
You deal damage to opponents when dragging them through difficult terrain.

Prerequisites
Str 13, Improved Drag, Power Attack, base attack bonus +3.

Benefits
When you successfully drag a creature, it takes 1d4 points of damage for every 5 feet it is dragged through naturally occurring difficult terrain. This damage is in addition to any damage the creature might normally take from moving through the difficult terrain. Creatures with the woodland stride special ability or who are otherwise unaffected by difficult terrain are immune to this extra damage.

Broken Wing Gambit.name: 弃兵断翼 Broken Wing Gambit
Broken Wing Gambit.description:
专长类型：CombatTeamwork

你假装虚弱，让自己成为诱人且让人分心的目标。

先决条件: 唬骗5级。

专长效果: 当你以近战攻击命中敌人时，你可以通过一个自由动作使该敌人对你的命中和伤害得到+2的加值，此加值持续到你的下一回合结束、或是该敌人对你进行攻击，以先发生者为准。一旦敌人以此加值发起攻击，拥有此专长的盟友就可以对该敌人发起借机攻击。

资源出处: Ultimate Combat pg. 90

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Broken%20Wing%20Gambit

战策增益：如果花费5点耐力，在敌人对你以此加值发起攻击时，你自己也可以发起借机攻击。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 114

Brood Defender.name: Brood Defender
Brood Defender.description:
When someone under your protection is set upon, you react viciously against the attacker.

Prerequisites
Bodyguard, Combat Reflexes, wyvaran.

Benefits
If an opponent misses its attack on an ally after you successfully used the aid another action to improve that ally's AC this round, you can attempt an Intimidate check as an immediate action to demoralize that opponent.

Brutal Coup de Grace.name: Brutal Coup de Grace
Brutal Coup de Grace.description:
Your killing blows are so brutal that they scare other foes.

Prerequisites
Dazzling Display, Weapon Focus, base attack bonus +5, proficiency with the selected weapon.

Benefits
When you deliver a coup de grace with the selected weapon and kill the target, enemies within 30 feet of you who can see or hear you must succeed at a Will saving throw (DC = 10 + 1/2 your character level + your Charisma bonus) or become shaken. This is a mind-affecting fear effect.

Brutal Grappler.name: Brutal Grappler
Brutal Grappler.description:
When helping an ally grapple, you can damage the target.

Prerequisites
Half-orc or orc.

Benefits
When you and an ally with this feat have grappled the same creature, you may attempt to damage the opponent on your turn (whether you were the one who first initiated the grapple or were assisting your ally in doing so). You and the ally are treated as aiding each other in the grapple (+2 bonus on your grapple combat maneuver) as long as you both decide to maintain the grapple.

Normal
When multiple creatures grapple one target, the creature that first initiates the grapple is the only one that makes a check to damage a grappled opponent, with a +2 bonus for each creature that assists the grapple using the Aid Another action.

Brute Assault.name: 残暴袭 Brute Assault
Brute Assault.description:
专长类型：Combat

凭借残暴的手段，你可以把敌人痛殴致残。

先决条件: 力量23，智力13，残暴流，残暴踏，战斗反射，精通闯越，精通绊摔，精通徒手打击，恶毒践踏，BAB+10。

专长效果: 当你使用残暴流时，每当你成功地对一名敌人施展了闯越或绊摔战技并使其俯卧时，该敌人承受1d6点力量伤害并且他的移动速度降至一半，直到该力量伤害痊愈。该敌人可通过一次（DC=10+你的BAB的）强韧豁免将该力量伤害减少到1点并避免移动速度降低的效果。

资源出处: Horror Adventures pg. 83

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Brute%20Assault

Brute Stomp.name: 残暴踏 Brute Stomp
Brute Stomp.description:
专长类型：Combat

很少有人能避开你残酷而暴力的碎骨踢击和踩踏。

先决条件: 力量19，智力13，残暴流，战斗反射，精通闯越，精通绊摔，精通徒手打击，恶毒践踏，BAB+8。

专长效果: 当你使用残暴流时，当你进行了一次含有至少一次徒手攻击的整轮攻击且有一名相邻的敌人正处于俯卧，你就可以以最高BAB对这名俯卧敌人发起一次额外攻击。该额外攻击不与万蛇出洞（Medusa’s Wrath）叠加，你也不能对一名被你该轮整轮攻击所绊摔的敌人发起这次额外攻击。另外，你可以对在你触及内的任一一名敌人【译注：此处应为俯卧的敌人】使用恶毒践踏专长，不管他是否是在相邻你的地方俯卧。

资源出处: Horror Adventures pg. 83

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Brute%20Stomp

Brute Style.name: 残暴流 Brute Style
Brute Style.description:
专长类型：CombatStyle

通过角力、研习和冥想，你已经成为殴打倒地对手的专家。

先决条件: 力量15，智力13，战斗反射，精通闯越，精通绊摔，精通徒手打击，恶毒践踏，BAB+6。

专长效果: 使用此流派时，只要敌人处于你的威胁范围内，你就可以对十尺以内的一名【译注：此处应为俯卧的敌人】敌人使用你的恶毒践踏专长。如果你不具有恶毒践踏专长，那么你不会获得该专长的好处。

通常状况: 恶毒践踏专长只能对一名与你相邻的俯卧敌人使用。

资源出处: Horror Adventures pg. 83

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Brute%20Style

Buffeting Wings.name: Buffeting Wings
Buffeting Wings.description:
You can create a gust of wind with your wings.

Prerequisites
Hover, Powerful Wings.

Benefits
As a full-round action, you can beat your wings to create a blast of air as the gust of wind spell. This is an extraordinary ability.

Bulette Charge Style.name: 鲨蜥流 Bulette Charge Style
Bulette Charge Style.description:
专长类型：CombatStyle

使用你盔甲的重量使你的冲锋更加凶猛。

先决条件: 力量13，精通闯越，猛力攻击，擅长重甲。

专长效果: 开启此流派后，在对对手进行闯越战技时获得+4加值。任何减少你防具检定减值的魔法能力或者材料特性同样会减少你从此流派获得的加值。

特殊情况：具有盔甲训练职业能力的角色可以穿着任何他擅长的盔甲来使用本流派。中甲的加值为+3，轻甲+2。

资源出处: Armor Masters Handbook pg. 10

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Bulette%20Charge%20Style

Bulette Leap.name: 鲨蜥·扑 Bulette Leap
Bulette Leap.description:
专长类型：Combat

跃入空中的你能够强行挤过多个敌人。

先决条件: 力量15，鲨蜥流，精通闯越，猛力攻击，擅长重甲。

专长效果: 开启鲨蜥流后，在跳跃的特技检定上获得等同于你力量调整值的加值。额外的，在你进行闯越战技时，你可以闯越多个目标，但该轮内的每个成功的闯越检定均会累积-2减值(you take a cumulative –2 penalty on each successive overrun attempt in the same round)。如果一次闯越失败，直到你的下一轮你都不能进行进一步尝试。

资源出处: Armor Masters Handbook pg. 10

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Bulette%20Leap

Bulette Rampage.name: 鲨蜥·狂 Bulette Rampage
Bulette Rampage.description:
专长类型：Combat

你能使用你猛烈的撞击对多个敌人造成难以置信的伤害。

先决条件: 力量15，鲨蜥流，鲨蜥·扑，精通闯越，猛力攻击，擅长重甲。

专长效果: 开启鲨蜥流后，每当你成功对一个目标进行闯越战技检定，该目标受到等于 1d8(若你是中体型)或1d6(若你是小体型)+你护甲AC加值的一半+1.5倍力量调整值 的伤害。

资源出处: Armor Masters Handbook pg. 10

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Bulette%20Rampage

Bull Rush Strike.name: 冲撞重击 Bull Rush Strike
Bull Rush Strike.description:
专长类型：Combat

你的重击能够推开敌人。

先决条件: 力量13，精通冲撞，猛力攻击，基本攻击加值+9。

专长效果: 当你的近战攻击成功重击时，除了攻击正常造成的伤害之外还能够将敌人推开。如果你的重击确认检定超过了敌人的CMD，那么你能够将敌人推开，就如同进行了冲撞战技检定一般。如果成功，你不需要与目标一同移动。这不会引起借机攻击。

特殊说明: 你只能将后述专长中的一个应用在一次确认的重击上：冲撞重击，移位重击，破武重击，卸武重击或者绊摔重击。你可以在重击确认检定之后选择使用该专长。

通常状况: 你必须进行冲撞战技检定才能冲撞敌人。

资源出处: Advanced Players Guide pg. 151

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Bull%20Rush%20Strike

战策增益：如果重击未能确认，你依然可以花费2点耐力尝试冲撞。重投重击确认骰来做冲撞战技检定。此次重投不会令重击确认，该战策同样对免疫重击的敌人无效。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 114

Bull-Catcher Style.name: Bull-Catcher Style
Bull-Catcher Style.description:
You brace yourself to catch oncoming foes.

Prerequisites
Dex 13, Improved Grapple, Improved Unarmed Strike.

Benefits
As a standard action, you can ready yourself against oncoming foes. Until the start of your next turn, if a creature moves at least 10 feet in your direction and enters a square you threaten, you can attempt a grapple combat maneuver against that creature. If the creature is charging, you gain a +2 bonus on the check. A creature you grapple with this style can make only a single natural attack after its movement or charge, even if it has the pounce ability. You can make only one grapple attempt in this manner per round.

Bull-Catcher Toss.name: Bull-Catcher Toss
Bull-Catcher Toss.description:
You can use a charging foe's momentum to throw them aside.

Prerequisites
Dex 13, Bull-Catcher Style, Improved Grapple, Improved Unarmed Strike; base attack bonus +8, brawler level 4th, or monk level 4th.

Benefits
When you successfully grapple a creature with the Bull-Catcher Style feat, you can immediately move that creature into any square you threaten. After it is placed, you can break your grapple as an immediate action to move the creature an additional 5 feet in any direction. You can't use this maneuver to move a foe into a space that is intrinsically dangerous or unstable, such as a pit, wall of fire, or midair.

Bull-Catcher Wrangler.name: Bull-Catcher Wrangler
Bull-Catcher Wrangler.description:
You can wrestle a charging foe to the ground.

Prerequisites
Dex 13, Bull-Catcher Style, Bull-Catcher Toss, Improved Grapple, Improved Unarmed Strike; base attack bonus +12, brawler level 8th, or monk level 8th.

Benefits
When a creature is charging you, and you successfully grapple it with the Bull-Catcher Style feat, you can immediately move it as per the Bull-Catcher Toss feat. Once the creature is moved, you can break your grapple as an immediate action. If you do, select another creature in the repositioned target's threatened area. That creature becomes the new target of the initial charge attack.

Bull's Eye.name: Bull's Eye
Bull's Eye.description:
Your ranged attacks unerringly seek those you have cursed.

Prerequisites
Dex 13, Int 13, Dodge, Mobility, Point-Blank Shot, Shot on the Run, base attack bonus +4, Use Magic Device 1 rank.

Benefits
As a standard action, you can curse a creature you've dealt damage to with a ranged weapon attack since the beginning of your last turn. The target must succeed at a Reflex save, or you don't take penalties on ranged weapon attacks against the creature for the first range increment and you ignore any bonus to the creature's Armor Class from cover. The creature still benefits from total cover. This effect lasts for 1 minute.

Special
A shaman or witch with this blood hex can use it against a target she has damaged with any ranged attack since her last turn, and applies its benefits to any ranged attack she makes against an affected creature.

Bullseye Shot.name: 中的射击 Bullseye Shot
Bullseye Shot.description:
专长类型：Combat

你知道如何在射击时调整呼吸，放松身体，以求一击命中。

先决条件: 近程射击，精准射击，基础攻击加值+5。

专长效果: 你可以花费一个移动动作校准自己的瞄线，如果你这样做，你将在本轮结束之前的下一次远程攻击投骰时获得+4加值。

资源出处: Inner Sea Gods pg. 208Faiths of Purity pg. 24

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Bullseye%20Shot

战策增益：你可以消耗5点耐力来以一个迅捷动作使用中的射击。

战策资源出处: Weapon Master's Handbook pg. 24

Bully Breed.name: Bully Breed
Bully Breed.description:
Your animal companion can terrify as well as fight.

Prerequisites
Handle Animal 4 ranks, Intimidate 4 ranks, animal companion or mount class feature.

Benefits
Your animal companion or mount gains Intimidate as a class skill. It can attempt to demoralize an opponent using the Intimidate skill as a move action on the same round that it damages an opponent with a natural attack.

Normal
Animal companions and mounts with an Intelligence score of 2 or less must select feats from a limited list.

Special
Your animal companion can select the Dazzling Display and Shatter Defenses feats if it meets the prerequisites. This feat does not allow your animal companion to use Intimidate to make a target friendly or gain their assistance.

Bullying Blow.name: 威吓猛击 Bullying Blow
Bullying Blow.description:
专长类型：Combat

借助简单的一击，你可以更容易地吓住敌人。

先决条件: 威吓1级，兽人。

专长效果: 以一个标准动作，你可以在攻击检定上承受-2罚值进行一次近战攻击。若该攻击对你的敌人造成伤害，你能以一个自由动作对该敌人进行一次挫败士气的威吓检定。

通常状况: 威吓一名敌人是一个标准动作。

资源出处: Advanced Race Guide pg. 141

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Bullying%20Blow

战策增益：花费2点耐力，你可以令全轮攻击中的一次攻击享受该专长效果。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 115

Burn It Down!.name: Burn It Down!
Burn It Down!.description:
Burning torches and the discordant symphony of riotous singing ignite the fervor within you.

Prerequisites
Base attack bonus +1, goblin.

Benefits
Whenever you make an attack with a torch, a flask of lamp oil fitted with a fuse, alchemist's fire, or a flaming weapon, you gain a morale bonus on your damage roll equal to the number of goblin allies within 30 feet who also have this feat (maximum +4). This bonus damage is fire damage.

Burn! Burn! Burn!.name: 烧！烧！烧！ Burn! Burn! Burn!
Burn! Burn! Burn!.description:
你对纵火及玩火的热爱上升到了一个新的高度。

先决条件: 解除装置1级，地精。

专长效果: 当你使用来源于炼金或非魔法的火焰攻击（比如炽火胶或火把）时额外获得1d4火焰伤害，在避免被火灼烧或者扑灭身上火焰时的反射豁免检定获得+4表现加值。该专长造成的额外伤害不适用于魔法性质的攻击（比如炼金术师的炼金炸弹）以及溅射伤害。

资源出处: Advanced Race Guide pg. 118Goblins of Golarion pg. 24

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Burn!%20Burn!%20Burn!

Burning Amplification.name: 燃烧扩增 Burning Amplification
Burning Amplification.description:
你能放大某些你火焰法术中的能量，使得火焰徘徊足够久到让你的对手着火。

专长效果: 每当你释放一个带有【火焰】描述符的法术，你可以选择在该法术攻击骰上承受-1罚值并降低法术豁免DC1，使得任何受到该法术火焰伤害的目标被点燃。目标直到他们下一轮前不会受到点燃伤害，并且每个目标每轮可以尝试一个反射豁免骰在被伤害前扑灭身上的火。取代正常扑灭火的DC15反射豁免，目标必须通过DC等于10+法术环级+你施法主属性调整值的反射豁免。你必须在进行攻击骰或在你的目标尝试进行豁免骰之前选择是否使用该专长。该专长对那些既不需要攻击骰又不需要进行豁免的法术无效。

资源出处: Magic Tactics Toolbox pg. 8

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Burning%20Amplification

Burning Spell.name: 燃烧法术 Burning Spell
Burning Spell.description:
专长类型：Metamagic

当你使用带有〔酸〕或〔火〕描述符的法术时能对目标造成额外的伤害。

专长效果: 法术所影响的生物被附上了酸或火，并且在下一轮中造成更多的伤害。当一个生物受到此超魔法术所造成的酸性或火焰伤害时，这个生物在下一轮的开始受到等同于法术原本环级2倍的强酸或火焰伤害。伤害的种类取决于法术的描述描述符。如果一个法术同时拥有〔酸〕和〔火〕描述符，则由施法者在准备超魔时选择造成哪种伤害。燃烧法术须占用高于原本2个环级的法术位。

资源出处: Ultimate Magic pg. 143

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Burning%20Spell

Burrowing Shot.name: 穿心射击 Burrowing Shot
Burrowing Shot.description:
专长类型：Weapon Mastery

你将自己射出的投射物留在敌人体内作为痛苦的纪念品。

先决条件: 敏捷13，致命瞄准，BAB+9，对所选远程武器拥有战士武器训练（Weapon Training）职业能力。

专长效果: 当你成功地以远程攻击命中一个生物时，以一个迅捷动作，你可以将武器（或是弹药）卡在这个生物体内，使它因为剧痛而在属性检定，攻击检定，豁免检定和技能检定上承受-2减值。多次穿心射击的效果无法叠加。如果穿心射击的目标是施法者，那么他还会在施放任何带有姿势成分的法术时承受25%的施法失败率，这个状态可以通过医疗技能的治疗致命伤害用法或是一个标准动作移除。移除会同时结束该减值的影响，并且生物再承受一次相当于武器基本伤害骰（不附加任何加值）的伤害。

资源出处: Weapon Masters Handbook pg. 21

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Burrowing%20Shot

Burrowing Teeth.name: 掘地利齿 Burrowing Teeth
Burrowing Teeth.description:
你拥有的利齿与锐爪很适合用来挖坑。

先决条件: 锐爪，坑道鼠，鼠族。

专长效果: 你获得等同于你1/2基本速度的掘地速度。你可以钻到沙子、泥土、粘土、沙砾或者其他类似的材质中，但是不能通过坚固的石头。你身后不会留下隧道，地表之上也不会出现痕迹。

资源出处: Advanced Race Guide pg. 154

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Burrowing%20Teeth

Bushwhack.name: 一扑即倒 Bushwhack
Bushwhack.description:
专长类型：Combat

你可以将一个措手不及的对手猛地压倒在地。

先决条件: 敏捷13，精通擒抱，精通徒手击打。

专长效果: 当你成功的擒抱了一个措手不及或是未意识到你存在的敌人时，你可以以一个自由动作，立刻尝试一次将这个目标定身的擒抱检定。如果你拥有锁喉（Chokehold）UC专长，那么你可以放弃第二次擒抱检定的压制尝试，而是进行一次锁喉。

资源出处: Monster Codex pg. 20

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Bushwhack

But a Scratch.name: 不痛不痒 But a Scratch
But a Scratch.description:
专长类型：Combat

你的虚张声势让敌人以为自己做出的猛烈攻击对你来说不值一提，让你看起来毫发无伤。

先决条件: 魅力 13，唬骗4级。

专长效果: 当1名敌人使用近战武器对你确认了重击时，你能够以直觉动作（immediate action）尝试1次特殊的唬骗检定对抗该名敌人。该检定的DC与使用威吓检定挫败士气（demoralize）的DC相同。若你的检定成功，攻击的敌人会颤栗（Shaken）1轮，就好像你成功使用威吓挫败了士气一般。检定结果比DC高5点或更多并不会延长颤栗状态的持续时间。若你在该专长提供的特殊唬骗中失败，则可以尝试用本专长提供的唬骗来对抗那些看到你之前的失败检定的敌人，但是你会在这次的唬骗检定、以及后续24小时内结合本专长对这些敌人做出的唬骗检定中承受累计的-2减值。

资源出处: Ultimate Intrigue pg. 79

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=But%20a%20Scratch

Butterfly's Sting.name: 彩蝶毒蛰 Butterfly's Sting
Butterfly's Sting.description:
专长类型：Combat

你懂得如何将自己造成的致命一击机会度让给更能有效发挥它们作用的队友。

先决条件: 寓守于攻，信仰戴斯娜。

专长效果: 当你成功对一个生物确认了一次重击时，你可以选择放弃这次重击机会，而是将其转让给在你的下一轮开始之前对同一生物近战攻击命中的队友。你的此次攻击造成普通伤害，而你选择的队友在他的下一次近战攻击命中时将自动确认重击。

资源出处: Inner Sea Gods pg. 208Faiths of Purity pg. 24

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Butterfly's%20Sting

战策增益：当你确认一次重击时，你可以消耗10点耐力来在不放弃自己重击的情况下使用彩蝶毒蛰。

战策资源出处: Weapon Master's Handbook pg. 24

Calculating Mind.name: 算术思维 Calculating Mind
Calculating Mind.description:
你可以看到其他人都无法注意到的世界潜质。你的数字占卜能力通过这种特殊的资质得到提高。

先决条件: 神圣几何学，知识（工程学）5级。

专长效果: 任何时候你使用神圣几何学专长，你可以使用d8骰代替d6骰构造你的骰池。你可以使用d8和d6骰的任意组合，只要骰子的总数不超过你的知识（工程学）的等级。

资源出处: Occult Mysteries pg. 49

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Calculating%20Mind

Call Out.name: Call Out
Call Out.description:
A well-crafted insult forces an opponent to duel you.

Benefits
As a standard action, you can make an Intimidate check against a hostile target within 30 feet that can clearly see and hear you. The DC of this check is equal to 10 + your opponent's Hit Dice + its Wisdom modifier. If the target is trained in Sense Motive, the DC is instead equal to 10 + your opponent's Sense Motive bonus, if higher. If you succeed at this check, the target enters a duel with you (Ultimate Combat 150). The target cannot withdraw from the duel for 1 round + 1 round for every 5 by which the check beat the DC.

Call Truce.name: 呼吁停战 Call Truce
Call Truce.description:
你诚恳地向敌人呼吁当前的战斗是毫无意义的。

先决条件: 魅力 15，谈判专家（Persuasive），交涉5级。

专长效果: 在战斗中以1轮的动作（1-round action；就如同该效果是施法时间为1轮的法术一样，详细见核心手册 213页），你能够向智力属性至少为4或更高、并且能够理解你的话语的任何生物呼吁停战（call for a truce）。当你这么做时，不能持用武器或具有威胁性的装备，比如已经充能的法术（charged spell）、魔杖（wand）或任何你所呼吁停战的对象会认为具有威胁性的任意事物。而你也必须位于大多数（most）被呼吁生物的视野之内。

一旦开始呼吁停战，那么直至你的下个回合开始之前，若你的盟友中有任何人对你呼吁停战的对象进行攻击或者进行任何具有威胁性的动作的话，呼吁停火的行为便会失败。在你的下个回合开始时，尝试单词交涉检定（DC = 30 + 敌对群体中魅力调整值最高生物的魅力调整值）。若你的检定成功，战斗便会停止1分钟，或者直至任何对方群体的生物被威胁或被攻击为止。

若你的检定失败了5点或更多的话，则在1d4小时内无法再次尝试对你呼吁停战的任何生物使用交涉技能。若你所在的群体内有任何人打算计划使用这次谈判来获得战斗优势的话，敌人可以尝试1次察言观色检定对抗你的团体中每一名领会此种行为（get a hunch）的成员，DC等同于20或者角色的唬骗检定结果，以较高者为准。

特殊说明: 如果谈判会直接导致敌人的投降或失败、敌人是狂信者或受到了精神控制、或者具有任何其他GM认为合适的理由，那么你便无法使用该专长。举例来说，如果敌对势力之所以比玩家的队伍强大，主要优势来源于持续时间极短的法术，而这法术会在谈判途中结束（详见186页的【Calling for a Cease-Fire】），那你便无法使用该专长。根据情况，检定DC的潜在难度可能会增加5、10、或者甚至20点。

资源出处: Ultimate Intrigue pg. 79

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Call%20Truce

Callous Casting.name: 残酷施法 Callous Casting
Callous Casting.description:
专长类型：BetrayalTeamwork

你从不关心你的法术会波及到你的盟友。聪明的家伙知道这点并随时做好躲避的准备。

专长效果: 你可以通过释放一个波及到牺牲者的伤害性法术来激活此专长。牺牲者不能免疫这个法术的伤害类型。

这种丧心病狂的举动会使得法术范围内的敌人失去勇气。他们将颤栗每法术等级1轮除非他们成功的通过了一个DC等同于法术DC的意志检定。当你结算完这个法术的效果之后，牺牲者可以用一个直觉动作移动最高相当于他移动速度的距离。任何以此方式进行的移动都会占用移动者下回合的移动力。这次移动如常提供借机攻击机会。一旦一个敌人因此专长而进行过一次意志豁免，他在接下来24小时免疫同一个行动者使用本专长时产生的效果。

资源出处: Champions of Corruption pg. 20

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Callous%20Casting

Calm Disposition.name: Calm Disposition
Calm Disposition.description:
You always appear to be in control of your situation.

Prerequisites
Prophets of Kalistrade 10 TPA.

Benefits
You gain +2 bonus on saving throws against effects that affect your composure. This includes all mind-affecting spells, as well as any spell or ability that would cause you to behave in an out-of-control manner, such as fear effects and nausea. This does not include physical effects such as fatigue, and does not reduce any damage taken from concurrent effects.

Camouflaged Trap.name: Camouflaged Trap
Camouflaged Trap.description:
You excel at hiding your traps in the wilderness, making them more difficult for your enemies to locate and avoid.

Prerequisites
Craft (traps) 4 ranks, Survival 4 ranks.

Benefits
When you craft and set a trap in a wilderness environment, you increase the DC of the Perception check required to find it by 5.

Cannon Master.name: 火炮大师 Cannon Master
Cannon Master.description:
专长类型：Combat

你明白如何在火炮本身状态不良的情况下准备战斗。

先决条件: 攻城技师，知识（工程）或专业（攻城技师）7级，至少擅长一种火器型攻城兵器。

专长效果: 你在用于修理火器型攻城兵器（firearm siege engine）的工艺（攻城兵器）检定中获得+2表现加值。此外，若你是攻城兵器的机师长（crew leader），而且你所负责的火器型攻城兵器具有破损（broken）状态，那么这架攻城兵器的哑火范围（misfire range）仅会增加2点，以取代正常的4点，而且破损的攻城兵器在炸膛之前必须先哑火两次。

资源出处: Inner Sea Combat pg. 17

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Cannon%20Master

战策增益：当你作为攻城器械队伍的领袖时，你可以在攻城器械哑火时以一个直觉动作消耗5点耐力来无视掉这次哑火。

战策资源出处: Weapon Master's Handbook pg. 24

Canny Tumble.name: 巧技寻机 Canny Tumble
Canny Tumble.description:
专长类型：Combat

你利用自己灵活的移动，探寻敌手防御中间的空隙

先决条件: 闪避，灵活移动，特技动作5级。

专长效果: 每当你通过特技动作检定移出敌人的威胁范围或占据空间而不引发借机攻击时，你对这个目标的下一次近战攻击检定获得+2环境加值，且目标对此次攻击失去AC上的敏捷加值，你必须在你的下一回合开始前进行此次攻击。

资源出处: Advanced Class Guide pg. 143

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Canny%20Tumble

战策增益：在以+2表现加值攻击目标前，你可以选择花费不超过5点耐力，如果成功命中，每点消耗的耐力提升2点造成的伤害。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 115

Careful Flyer.name: 谨慎飞行者 Careful Flyer
Careful Flyer.description:
你能够轻松地以缓慢速度进行飞行。

先决条件: 特技专家（Acrobatic），飞行5级。

专长效果: 只要你以移动动作进行飞行，即便速度低于你的速度的一半，也不需要通过成功的飞行检定来维持飞行。当你在1轮内移动的距离不足速度的一半时，你仍会在避免借机攻击的特技动作检定中获得+2加值，而且AC还会在对抗由于移动而引起的借机攻击时获得+2加值。

通常状况: 除非你至少以半速飞行，否则必须成功通过飞行检定才能够继续飞行。

资源出处: Ultimate Intrigue pg. 79

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Careful%20Flyer

Careful Reader.name: Careful Reader
Careful Reader.description:
Your training with the Pathfinder Society (or its rivals) has taught you proper caution and wariness when deciphering the ancient scrolls and inscriptions of fallen civilizations.

Prerequisites
Linguistics 3 ranks, Spellcraft 3 ranks.

Benefits
You gain a +4 bonus on saving throws against written magical effects, including explosive runes, glyph of warding, illusory script, symbol of death, and similar magic, as well as against any form of curse, madness, possession, or similar effect--magical or not--that might occur from reading a book, inscription, scroll, or any other form of writing.

Careful Sneak.name: 悄声慢行 Careful Sneak
Careful Sneak.description:
通过投入更多的时间，你能够避免大多数护甲对潜行带来的妨害。

先决条件: 敏捷 13，潜行3级。

专长效果: 只要你的移动速度不超过自身速度的一半，便可以忽略轻甲和中甲对潜行检定带来的护甲检定减值（armor check penalty）。在以此方式潜行时，你仍旧无法奔跑（run）或冲锋（charge）。

资源出处: Ultimate Intrigue pg. 79

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Careful%20Sneak

Careful Speaker.name: 慎言者 Careful Speaker
Careful Speaker.description:
你生活在危险的政府所带来的几乎偏执的恐惧之中，这使得你在说话的时候极为小心。

先决条件: 感知13。

专长效果: 你在所有用于愚弄某人或者传递密语的唬骗检定（不包括虚招）中获得+2加值，并且在对抗所有尝试探知你或者读取你思维的意志豁免中获得+2加值。

资源出处: Inner Sea World Guide pg. 284Pathfinder Campaign Setting pg. 74

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Careful%20Speaker

Carrion Feeder.name: 食腐鸟 Carrion Feeder
Carrion Feeder.description:
与其他食腐动物一样，你能够若无其事地吃下可能让虚弱生物染病的食物。

先决条件: 天狗。

专长效果: 你在对抗疾病以及通过摄入生效的毒素（对抗其他传递方式的毒素不获得加值）时豁免检定获得+2种族加值。你在以生存检定给自己寻找食物时获得+2加值。

资源出处: Advanced Race Guide pg. 165

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Carrion%20Feeder

Cartogramancer.name: 地理传送学 Cartogramancer
Cartogramancer.description:
你把地理学上的知识应用到了传送之艺上。

先决条件: 知识(地理)10级，施放高等传送术（Teleport, Greater）的能力。

专长效果: 若你能够施放高等传送术（Teleport, Greater）——或者需要对应地点的可靠描述（reliable description）的类似传送效果——但是并不了解关于目的地的可靠描述的话，你能够在施放法术之前尝试1次DC为25的知识(地理)检定，来获得距离目的地100英里内的某些地点的可靠描述。若你的检定结果比DC高10点，那么则可以获得距离目的地50英里范围内的某处地点的可靠描述；若检定结果比DC高20点，则可以获得距离目的地25英里范围内的某处地点的可靠描述。一旦你为了某个特定地点而尝试了上述检定，则无法再次尝试；而且如果你尝试使用高等传送术前往同一片大致地区（same general area）的不同地点的话，检定结果视为不变。举例说明，如果你不知道强盗的城堡位于何处，那么对于同属于距离该城堡100英里内，紧挨着强盗的城堡的马厩、或者相距城堡半英里的小镇则都属于你所不了解的地点。

资源出处: Ultimate Intrigue pg. 79

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Cartogramancer

Cartwheel Dodge.name: 侧翻回避 Cartwheel Dodge
Cartwheel Dodge.description:
你利用回避伤害的技巧来调整战斗身位。

先决条件: 【反射闪避】职业特性，【精通反射闪避】职业特性，特技12级。

专长效果: 当你成功地运用【精通反射闪避】回避伤害后，你可以通过直觉动作移动相当于速度一半的距离。这次移动会如常引发借机攻击。

资源出处: Ultimate Combat pg. 91

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Cartwheel%20Dodge

Casterbane Shot.name: 破法枪击 Casterbane Shot
Casterbane Shot.description:
专长类型：CombatGrit

在法力荒漠中生活的人们明白，此处的魔力是不可预知并且通常会产生致命的影响，这使得你很善于使用火器破坏他人施法。

先决条件: 业余铳士或勇毅（Grit）职业能力，近距射击，精准射击，基本攻击加值+4。

专长效果: 若你使用准备动作（ready），指定当施法者开始施法时使用火器对其进行远程攻击，而且成功命中敌人时，你能够花费1点勇毅来将目标由于施法时受伤而进行的专注检定DC增加5点。

资源出处: Inner Sea Combat pg. 17

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Casterbane%20Shot

战策增益：当你使用破法枪击时，你可以消耗至多5点耐力来提升由该专长造成的专注检定的DC，提升的点数等于你消耗的耐力。

战策资源出处: Weapon Master's Handbook pg. 24

Casting Conduit.name: Casting Conduit
Casting Conduit.description:
You can use an ally as a conduit to convey spells to an enemy she can touch.

Prerequisites
Spellcraft 1 rank.

Benefits
When casting a spell with a range of touch that deals hit point damage, you can target a willing, adjacent ally who also has this feat. The ally takes the minimum damage from the spell, and as an immediate action the ally can make a touch attack against an adjacent foe to deliver the spell. If this attack hits, the spell deals its normal damage to the opponent. If the ally has the grappled or pinned condition, the spell is automatically transferred to the grappling or grappled foe with no attack roll needed. This ability has no effect if the targeted ally is immune to the spell's effect (such as shocking grasp delivered to an ally immune to electricity).

Casual Illusionist.name: 随手幻术师 Casual Illusionist
Casual Illusionist.description:
你能够使用内在的魔力创造出简单的幻术，辅助你进行诈欺或诡计。

先决条件: 侏儒，侏儒魔法种族特性。

专长效果: 只要你至少还有一个从侏儒魔法种族特性中获得的类法术能力没有使用，那么你的唬骗、交涉以及巧手检定获得+2种族加值。10级起，这些加值提升至+4。

特殊说明: 在判断的先决条件时，该专长视同“诈欺（Deceitful）”专长。

资源出处: Advanced Race Guide pg. 37

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Casual%20Illusionist

Cat and Mouse.name: 猫鼠游戏 Cat and Mouse
Cat and Mouse.description:
专长类型：Combat

你可以通过放弃反击的机会来寻找对手守备的突破口。

先决条件: 唬骗5级，察言观色5级，适时格挡反击炫技（opportune parry and riposte deed）。

专长效果: 当你对1名敌人的攻击使用炫技（deed）中的适时格挡反击（opportune parry and riposte）时，如果你还有直觉动作（immediate action）可用，并且选择不尝试回击的话，你的AC会获得+1闪避加值，并且在对被你成功格挡攻击的敌人进行的所有战技检定中获得+2加值，持续1轮。

资源出处: Ultimate Intrigue pg. 80

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Cat%20and%20Mouse

Cat's Fall.name: 猫落技巧 Cat's Fall
Cat's Fall.description:
你就像猫一样，能够在着陆的瞬间转移身体的重心，让你能够以双脚着地的同时避免严重的伤害。

先决条件: 敏捷 13，特技动作1级。

专长效果: 当你成功通过DC为15的特技动作检定来减缓坠落的冲击时，你可以忽略该次坠落的最初20尺高度，并且让接下来10尺高度带来的伤害转化为非致命伤害（nonlethal damage）。只要由于坠落而对你造成的伤害不超过20点，你便会以双脚着地（而不是倒地）。

通常状况: 成功通过DC为15的特技动作检定能让你忽略坠落最初的10尺高度，如果你受到任何坠落伤害的话，便会倒地着陆。

资源出处: Ultimate Intrigue pg. 80

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Cat's%20Fall

Cataract.name: Cataract
Cataract.description:
You can curse the eyes of a wounded enemy.

Prerequisites
Int 13, Perception 5 ranks, Use Magic Device 1 rank.

Benefits
As a full-round action, you can curse a creature you've dealt damage to since the beginning of your last turn. The creature must succeed at a Fortitude save or its eyes become milky and its vision is obscured. For 1 round, any target the creature makes a ranged touch attack against gains concealment for the purposes of that attack.

Special
A shaman or witch with this blood hex can use it against any creature she has dealt damage to in the past minute. A shaman or witch can use this blood hex as a standard action.

Catch Off-Guard (Mythic).name: 随手武器(神话) Catch Off-Guard (Mythic)
Catch Off-Guard (Mythic).description:
先决条件：随手武器

在你的手中，万物皆为兵刃。

神话专长效果：当你使用临时武器（improvised weapons）时造成的伤害增加，增加数值等同于你的阶层。在对抗敌人对你所持握的临时武器所进行的击破武器或卸除武器尝试时，你的CMD获得等同于你的阶层的加值。

资源出处: Mythic Adventures pg. 60

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Catch%20Off-Guard

Catfolk Exemplar.name: 猫族典范 Catfolk Exemplar
Catfolk Exemplar.description:
你猫科动物的特征比起你的同族更加鲜明突出。

先决条件: 猫族。

专长效果: 你可以选择“化兽态”专长，即使你没有达到先决条件。此外，你以下列方式之一表现你猫科动物的形态。你在选择此专长的时候决定表现形态，并且无法在以后改变。

增强感官（Enhanced Senses, Ex）：如果你有昏暗视觉，你获得猫族的【灵敏嗅觉】种族特性。如果你有【灵敏嗅觉】种族特性，你获得昏暗视觉。

急速冲刺（Fast Sprinter, Ex）：你在进行冲锋、奔跑、撤退动作时获得10尺种族加值。如果你有【短跑健将】种族特性，则你在进行冲锋、奔跑、撤退动作时获得的加值提高到20尺。

锐爪（Sharp Claws, Ex）：如果你没有【猫爪】种族特性或者“化兽态（兽爪）”专长，你获得【猫爪】种族特性。如果你有【猫爪】种族特性或者“化兽态（兽爪）”专长，则你的爪的伤害增加到1d6。

特殊说明: 你可以多次选择这一专长。其效果不叠加。每次选择这个专长，你必须选择一个不同的表现形式。

【专长速查】化兽态（Aspect of the Beast, APG）：得到四选一的兽类优势。

资源出处: Advanced Race Guide pg. 96

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Catfolk%20Exemplar

Caustic Slur.name: Caustic Slur
Caustic Slur.description:
You know exactly how to insult your favored enemies in order to make them lose their heads.

Prerequisites
Bluff 1 rank, favored enemy class feature, gnome.

Benefits
As a standard action, you can make a Bluff check against one sort of favored enemy. Any creature of that type within 60 feet of you must make a Will saving throw or become angered. If an affected creature attacks you, it's treated as if it were using Power Attack (taking a penalty on attack rolls but gaining a bonus on damage rolls). If the creature already has the power attack feat, the attack penalty increases by 1 and the damage bonus increases by 2. These modifiers end when combat ends.
This ability does not work on creatures that cannot understand you, though sometimes a simple gesture is sufficient for an intelligent opponent to catch your gist regardless of any language barrier.

Cautious Fighter.name: 谨慎战斗 Cautious Fighter
Cautious Fighter.description:
专长类型：Combat

比起胜利你更注重生存。

先决条件: 半身人。

专长效果: 当你使用防御式战斗或者完全防御时，你获得的AC闪避加值额外+2。

资源出处: Advanced Race Guide pg. 66

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Cautious%20Fighter

战策增益：如果你不在防御式战斗或全力防御，通过花费5点耐力可以使你的闪避AC+2，直至你的下一轮开始。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 115

Cavalry Formation.name: 骑兵阵列 Cavalry Formation
Cavalry Formation.description:
专长类型：CombatTeamwork

你擅长在战场上与骑乘的盟友并肩而行，且不会妨碍双方的作战效率。

先决条件: 骑乘战斗。

专长效果: 你和你坐骑的方格可以与拥有此专长骑手的坐骑重叠，但同一个方格不能被两个以上的生物共享。此外，你在冲锋时可以越过拥有此专长骑手和其坐骑的方格。

资源出处: Ultimate Combat pg. 90

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Cavalry%20Formation

战策增益：回合开始时，如果你花费2点耐力，你可以与不拥有此专长的骑乘盟友共处一个方格，持续到你下轮开始。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 115

Cecaelia Focus Tattoo.name: Cecaelia Focus Tattoo
Cecaelia Focus Tattoo.description:
You have tattooed the humanoid portion of your skin with a swirling mark that provides you with focus and pride.

Prerequisites
Cecaelia.

Benefits
Select one of the cecaelia focus tattoos below; you gain its benefits while it is active. While you can have any number of focus tattoos, only one can be active at a time. You activate a focus tattoo by concentrating on its importance to you for 1 hour without interruption. Once a focus tattoo is active, it remains so until you activate a new tattoo.

Each time you would gain a favored class bonus, you may forgo that benefit and instead get another tattoo from the Cecaelia Focus Tattoos list. Instead of getting a new tattoo, you can increase the complexity of an existing tattoo by selecting the same tattoo again. You may choose any tattoo multiple times; if you do, its benefits stack while it is active.

Name Effect
Aureoln prong Increase range of darkvision by 5 feet while on land
Cobalt prong Increase range of darkvision by 5 feet while underwater
Crimson spiral +1 competence bonus on Fortitude saves against death effects and on Constitution checks to become stable
Emerald helix +1 competence bonus on Survival checks while on land
Indigo vines +1 competence bonus on Fortitude saves against poison delivered by a creature's natural attack
Inky whorls +1 competence bonus on Stealth checks while on land
Silver whorls +1 competence bonus on Stealth checks while underwater
Teal helix +1 competence bonus on Survival checks while underwater

Celestial Guidance.name: Celestial Guidance
Celestial Guidance.description:
You can use the movements of the sun, moon, stars, and planets to navigate and acquire eldritch knowledge about the fundamental nature of reality.

Benefits
You gain a +2 bonus on Knowledge (geography) skill checks to learn about the stars or planets. At night, as long as the sky is clear and you can see the stars, you cannot get lost. Once per night when the stars are visible, you can reroll a Knowledge check you failed earlier in the day. When you do so, you can choose to roll the appropriate Knowledge skill check again or you can instead use your Knowledge (geography) skill to gain the same information.

Celestial Obedience.name: Celestial Obedience
Celestial Obedience.description:
Your reverence for an empyreal lord is so great that daily prayer and minor sacrifices grant you special boons.

Prerequisites
Knowledge (planes) 3 ranks, must worship an empyreal lord.

Benefits
Each empyreal lord requires a different obedience, but all obediences take only 1 hour to perform. Once you've performed the obedience, you gain the benefit of a special ability or resistance as indicated in the 'Obedience' entry for the empyreal lord.

If you have at least 12 Hit Dice, you also gain the first boon granted by your empyreal lord upon undertaking your obedience. If you have at least 16 Hit Dice, you also gain the empyreal lord's second boon. If you have 20 Hit Dice or more, you also gain the empyreal lord's third boon. Unless a specific duration or number of uses per day is listed, a boon's effects are constant.

Mystery cultists (see page 48) gain access to these boons at lower levels as a benefit of their prestige class.

If you ever fail to perform a daily obedience, you lose all access to the benefits and boons granted by this feat until you next perform the obedience.

Celestial Servant.name: 天界仆从 Celestial Servant
Celestial Servant.description:
你的动物伙伴或魔宠来自天界，而非普通飞禽走兽。

先决条件: 神裔，【动物伙伴】、【魔宠】或【坐骑】职业特性。

专长效果: 你的动物伙伴、魔宠或坐骑获得天界模板，并且类型变更为魔法兽。不过你仍可对它使用驯养动物、野性认同或其他只影响动物的法术或职业能力。

资源出处: Advanced Race Guide pg. 88

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Celestial%20Servant

Censoring Critical.name: Censoring Critical
Censoring Critical.description:
Your critical hits mute your enemies. Whenever you score a critical hit against an opponent, the victim is unable to speak for 1d4+1 rounds. This prevents spellcasters from using spells with verbal components. A successful Fortitude saving throw reduces this muteness to 1 round. The DC of this Fortitude save is equal to 10 + your base attack bonus.

Prerequisites
Critical Focus, base attack bonus +15.

Benefits
Whenever you score a critical hit against an opponent, the victim is unable to speak for 1d4+1 rounds. This prevents spellcasters from using spells with verbal components. A successful Fortitude saving throw reduces this muteness to 1 round. The DC of this Fortitude save is equal to 10 + your base attack bonus.

Special
You can apply the effects of only one critical feat to a given critical hit unless you have Critical Mastery.

Center of Power.name: Center of Power
Center of Power.description:
You have posted loyal followers in the most vital places.

Prerequisites
Leadership score 13, hold a leadership role related to running a kingdom.

Benefit
Choose a building in your kingdom as your center of power, and dedicate one of the followers granted to you by the Leadership feat to overseeing that location. For every kingdom turn in which that follower does nothing but oversee that location, the benefits that building grants to your kingdom’s Economy, Fame, Loyalty, and Stability are doubled and any penalties are negated. This feat does not allow a building to grant benefits it does not normally provide, and has no effect on a building’s other effects.

This feat only applies to one building, and committing multiple followers to this or different buildings has no effect—the selected location is treated as being of particular importance to you, and its uniqueness combined with the follower’s loyalty grants it special efficiencies. The same follower does not have to oversee your center of power every month, but you must keep at least one follower dedicated to this location for the entire month to gain this feat’s benefits. Once per year, you may change which building is your center of power.

Centered Spell.name: Centered Spell
Centered Spell.description:
You can make a spell explode around you, leaving a safe zone for yourself at the center of the blast.

Prerequisites
Spellcraft 3 ranks.

Benefits
You can center the area of a spell with an area effect and duration of instantaneous on you, and exclude yourself from the effects of the spell. Your familiar (if any) is also excluded from the effect, provided that it is in your square and at least one size category smaller than you.

A centered spell does not use up a higher-level spell slot than the spell's actual level.

Cerberus Crush.name: Cerberus Crush
Cerberus Crush.description:
When you strike from three directions, you channel deadly force into each blow.

Prerequisites
Cerberus Snare, Cerberus Style, Vital Strike, base attack bonus +13 or monk level 13th.

Benefits
You can apply the benefits of Vital Strike, Improved Vital Strike, and Greater Vital Strike to all attacks made using Cerberus Style.

Cerberus Snare.name: Cerberus Snare
Cerberus Snare.description:
Your strikes latch onto your opponent like the jaws of a cerberus, preventing them from fleeing across planes.

Prerequisites
Cerberus Style, base attack bonus +9 or monk level 9th.

Benefits
Whenever you damage an opponent with Cerberus Style, that opponent cannot take 5-foot steps until the beginning of your next turn. Additionally, it is barred from dimensional travel. This effect functions as dimensional anchor, except that its duration is 1 round. Spell resistance applies; for the purpose of checks to overcome spell resistance, your caster level is equal to your character level.

Cerberus Style.name: Cerberus Style
Cerberus Style.description:
You rain blows upon your enemies from three directions, like the three heads of the cerberus guardians of Hell.

Prerequisites
Cleave, Improved Unarmed Strike, base attack bonus +6 or monk level 6th.

Benefits
As a standard action, you can make a single unarmed strike at your full base attack bonus against a foe within reach. If you hit, you deal damage normally and can make an additional attack (using your full base attack bonus) against up to two other foes that are also within reach. You take a -2 penalty to your Armor Class until the start of your next turn for each additional attack you make with this feat.

Chain Challenge.name: 一骑讨 Chain Challenge
Chain Challenge.description:
你策马跃入敌群，枪头所到之处，包围上来的敌将刹那间横七竖八。

先决条件: 挑战职业能力，人物等级7。

专长效果: 每当一个受到你的挑战能力所影响的目标被击杀或是击败时，你都可以立刻以一个直觉动作对一个处于30尺内的目标发起新的挑战。这个行动必须在你击败挑战目标的同时立刻发出，并且不能因为你目前无法行动而延后。如果你通过本专长发动了新的挑战，那么这次挑战将不计入你的每日挑战能力使用次数限制。在第一个挑战目标以后，你可以连环挑战的目标数不能超过你的魅力调整值（至少一个）。

资源出处: Monster Codex pg. 116

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Chain%20Challenge

Chain Mastery.name: 锁链熟稔 Chain Mastery
Chain Mastery.description:
专长类型：Combat

你轻易就能让手中的刺链化为致命凶器。

先决条件: 敏捷15，擅长异种武器（刺链）。

专长效果: 你在所有方面都将刺链视为单手军用武器。你依然可以将刺链作为双手武器来持用，且若你这么做，你在用你的刺链对敌人进行绊摔或卸武的战技检定上获得+2加值。

资源出处: Book of the Damned pg. 178

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Chain%20Mastery

Chainbreaker.name: Chainbreaker
Chainbreaker.description:
Nothing rouses your fury and makes you more deadly in battle than the sight of slaves cowering before their masters.

Prerequisites
Over the course of at least five different occasions, free a cumulative total of 50+ sentient beings held in unjust captivity.

Benefits
When in combat with an opponent that you know owns or trades in slaves, once per round you may add a bonus to damage rolls for a melee attack, ranged attack, or targeted spell against that opponent. This bonus damage is +1 for every four Hit Dice you have.

Chairbreaker.name: Chairbreaker
Chairbreaker.description:
You deal more damage by breaking nearby objects against your enemies.

Prerequisites
Catch Off-Guard, base attack bonus +1.

Benefits
When you attack a target with an improvised weapon, you can give that weapon the broken condition to deal 1d4 points of additional damage on that attack. Additionally, you gain a +4 bonus on the roll to confirm a critical hit with this attack. If you confirm the crit, the extra damage granted by this feat is also multiplied and the improvised weapon is destroyed.

Chakra Adept.name: 脉轮修行者 Chakra Adept
Chakra Adept.description:
你的身心得到锻炼，逐渐习惯了拙火。

先决条件: 脉轮初学者（Chakra Initiate），觉醒心脉轮（Heart Chakra）的能力。

专长效果: 你的储存蛇焰真气（serpentfire ki）的气池增加至4点。当你选择以迅捷动作维持脉轮而非开启新的脉轮时，能够选择尝试一次强韧豁免或者一次意志豁免，以取代原本的进行两次豁免。

此外，当你停止花费气（ki）来维持脉轮之后，拙火仍会徘徊在你的体内。在你停止花费气来维持脉轮的第一轮内，你的最高层的脉轮会关闭，而你能够花费迅捷动作来使用仍旧开启的脉轮中的任意一项能力。在此举后的下一轮，你的所有脉轮都会关闭，此时你必须花费1点气和迅捷动作再次从海底脉轮（root chakra）开始重新开启。

资源出处: Occult Adventures pg. 129

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Chakra%20Adept

Chakra Initiate.name: 脉轮初学者 Chakra Initiate
Chakra Initiate.description:
你获得了额外的拙火能量源，并可以以此来开启你的脉轮。

先决条件: 觉醒海底脉轮（root chakra）的能力。

专长效果: 你获得存有3点蛇焰真气（serpentfire ki）的气池，而你仅能用它开启或维持脉轮。当你的常规气池（ki pool）重新回满的时候，这些蛇焰真气也会在同一时间重新充满。

资源出处: Occult Adventures pg. 129

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Chakra%20Initiate

Chakra Mandala.name: Chakra Mandala
Chakra Mandala.description:
Using scars, tattoos, or henna, you inscribe symbols over your chakras to help maintain your balance of kundalini.

Prerequisites
Ki pool class feature.

Benefits
If you fail the Fortitude saving throw to maintain your awakened chakras, you take only half the normal damage.

Chakra Master.name: 脉轮宗师 Chakra Master
Chakra Master.description:
你精通这所有七层脉轮，而且能够运用真气来展现更为强大的拙火。

先决条件: 脉轮修行者（Chakra Adept），脉轮初学者（Chakra Initiate），觉醒灵冠顶脉轮（Crown Chakra）的能力。

专长效果: 你的储存蛇焰真气（serpentfire ki）的气池增加至5点。当你开启或维持脉轮时，能够花费3点气以取代1点，以此来在该轮内获得两项脉轮带来的好处以取代原本的一项。若你正在开启或维持灵冠顶脉轮（Crown Chakra），那么这也会与灵冠顶脉轮的特殊力量叠加，使你能够在一轮内获得三项脉轮的好处。

资源出处: Occult Adventures pg. 129

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Chakra%20Master

Champion.name: 斗技冠军 Champion
Champion.description:
专长类型：Story

你必须通过单打独斗来证明自己。

先决条件: 你必须在完全不依赖他人的状况下击败一名强大敌手；或拥有“神选斗士（Champion of a God）”、“人民卫士（Champion of the People）”、“竞技勇士（Competition Champion）”、“神鬼斗士（Gladiator）”等角色背景之一。

专长效果: 你能够通过迅捷动作指定50尺内的一个敌人为挑战对手。如此施为后只要在没有他人威胁该对手、战斗未结束的情况下，你对其的攻击检定和闪避AC+1。若另有人攻击你或你的对手，该挑战结束且你在1轮内的攻击检定和AC遭受-2。尽管你可以随意发动挑战，但无法在24小时内挑战同一目标多次。

专长目标: 在单挑中击败适当数量的强大敌手。这些战斗不能被他人插手，并且你的对手必须被目击到身负重伤或无力再战。

完成收益: 你的挑战加值增至+2。此外，你对挑战对手的重击确认后追加1d6额外伤害。

资源出处: Ultimate Campaign pg. 67

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Champion

Champion of Anarchy.name: Champion of Anarchy
Champion of Anarchy.description:
You spread chaos wherever you go.

Prerequisites
10 Hit Dice, chaotic neutral alignment.

Benefits
You can store a number of affirmations up to your Charisma bonus (minimum 1) to use at any time, not just within the next 24 hours. You can use an affirmation to cast lesser confusion as a spell-like ability as a standard action, with a caster level equal to your Hit Dice. The duration of this effect on a failed save is 1d4 rounds. Lastly, you gain a +2 bonus on weapon and spell damage rolls against lawful creatures. This is an alignment-based effect.


Residual
If you have this feat but are no longer chaotic neutral, you continue to gain the +2 bonus on weapon and spell damage against lawful creatures.

Champion of Balance.name: Champion of Balance
Champion of Balance.description:
You are dedicated to perfect balance in the multiverse.

Prerequisites
10 Hit Dice, neutral alignment.

Benefits
You gain a +2 bonus on weapon and spell damage rolls against good and evil creatures. You also gain a +2 bonus on weapon and spell damage rolls against lawful and chaotic creatures. These bonuses stack with each other.


Residual
You gain no benefit from this feat if you are not of neutral alignment.

Champion of Destruction.name: Champion of Destruction
Champion of Destruction.description:
You would destroy the world if it were within your power.

Prerequisites
10 Hit Dice, chaotic evil alignment.

Benefits
You can store a number of affirmations up to your Charisma bonus (minimum 1) to use at any time, not just within the next 24 hours. You can also use an affirmation to treat an effect on you from a spell, magic item, or other alignment-based effect as if you were neither chaotic nor evil. You can choose to do so after any attack roll hits you with such an effect or you fail a saving throw against such an effect. Lastly, you gain a +2 bonus on weapon and spell damage rolls against lawful and good creatures (or +4 if the creature is both lawful and good). This is an alignment-based effect.


Residual
If you have this feat but you are no longer chaotic evil, you continue to gain the +2 bonus on weapon and spell damage rolls against lawful and good creatures (or +4 if the creature is both lawful and good).

Champion of Freedom.name: Champion of Freedom
Champion of Freedom.description:
You believe that beings can thrive only when free.

Prerequisites
10 Hit Dice, chaotic good alignment.

Benefits
You can store a number of affirmations up to your Charisma bonus (minimum 1) to use at any time, not just within the next 24 hours. You can also use an affirmation to gain the effects of freedom of movement for 1 round. Lastly, you gain a +2 bonus on weapon and spell damage rolls against evil and lawful creatures (or +4 if the creature is both evil and lawful). This is an alignment-based effect.


Residual
If you have this feat but you are no longer chaotic good, you continue to gain the +2 bonus on weapon and spell damage rolls against evil and lawful creatures (or +4 if the creature is both lawful and evil).

Champion of Grace.name: Champion of Grace
Champion of Grace.description:
It is your mission to do as much good as possible.

Prerequisites
10 Hit Dice, neutral good alignment.

Benefits
You can store a number of affirmations up to your Charisma bonus (minimum 1) to use at any time, not just within the next 24 hours. You can use an affirmation and touch a creature as a standard action to remove a single condition or harmful effect from the list of paladin mercies (using your Hit Dice as your paladin level to determine which mercies you can use and their effects). Lastly, you gain a +2 bonus on weapon and spell damage rolls against evil creatures. This is an alignment-based effect.


Residual
If you have this feat but you are no longer neutral good, you continue to gain the +2 bonus on weapon and spell damage rolls against evil creatures.

Champion of Malevolence.name: Champion of Malevolence
Champion of Malevolence.description:
Things would be better if everyone just did as you wished.

Prerequisites
10 Hit Dice, neutral evil alignment.

Benefits
You can store a number of affirmations up to your Charisma bonus (minimum 1) to use at any time, not just within the next 24 hours. You can use an affirmation and touch a creature as a standard action to bestow a single condition or harmful effect from the list of antipaladin cruelties (using your Hit Dice as your antipaladin level to determine which cruelties you can use and their effects). Lastly, you gain a +2 bonus on weapon and spell damage rolls against good creatures. This is an alignment-based effect.


Residual
If you have this feat but you are no longer neutral evil, you continue to gain the +2 bonus on weapon and spell damage rolls against good creatures.

Champion of Righteousness.name: Champion of Righteousness
Champion of Righteousness.description:
You know that good must be tempered with order if it's going to prevail in the long term.

Prerequisites
10 Hit Dice, lawful good alignment.

Benefits
You can store a number of affirmations up to your Charisma bonus (minimum 1) to use at any time, not just within the next 24 hours. You can use an affirmation to treat the effect of a spell, magic item, or other alignment-based effect on you as if you were neither lawful nor good. You can choose to do so after any attack roll hits you with such an effect or you fail a saving throw against such an effect. Lastly, you gain a +2 bonus on weapon and spell damage rolls against chaotic and evil creatures (or +4 if the creature is both chaotic and evil). This is an alignment-based effect.


Residual
If you have this feat but you are no longer lawful good, you continue to gain the +2 bonus on weapon and spell damage rolls against chaotic and evil creatures (or +4 if the creature is both chaotic and evil).

Champion of Tranquility.name: Champion of Tranquility
Champion of Tranquility.description:
The harmony of law is your highest ideal.

Prerequisites
10 Hit Dice, lawful neutral alignment.

Benefits
You can store a number of affirmations up to your Charisma bonus (minimum 1) to use at any time, not just within the next 24 hours. You can use an affirmation to cast calm emotions as a spell-like ability as a standard action, with a caster level equal to your Hit Dice. Lastly, you gain a +2 bonus on weapon and spell damage rolls against chaotic creatures. This is an alignment-based effect.


Residual
If you have this feat but you are no longer lawful neutral, you continue to gain the +2 bonus on weapon and spell damage rolls against chaotic creatures.

Champion of Tyranny.name: Champion of Tyranny
Champion of Tyranny.description:
You must beat down the masses to have true order.

Prerequisites
10 Hit Dice, lawful evil alignment.

Benefits
You can store a number of affirmations up to your Charisma bonus (minimum 1) to use at any time, not just within the next 24 hours.
