资源出处: Cheliax, Empire of Devils pg. 26

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Cornugon%20Stun

Cornugon Trip.name: 角魔之绊摔 Cornugon Trip
Cornugon Trip.description:
专长类型：Combat

你可以投掷出你的刺链去做绊摔攻击。

先决条件: 敏捷15，精通绊摔，武器专攻（刺链）。

专长效果: 你可以投掷刺链（被视为一个具有10尺射程增量的投掷武器），投掷刺链时你可以做一个绊摔攻击。如果此次绊摔攻击失败了，你不会受到绊摔。

资源出处: Cheliax, Empire of Devils pg. 26

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Cornugon%20Trip

Corpse Companion.name: 僵尸伙伴 Corpse Companion
Corpse Companion.description:
你的动物伙伴也变成了不死怪物。

先决条件: 食尸鬼，动物伙伴职业能力。

专长效果: 你的动物伙伴的生物类型转变为不死生物，但它原有的HD，基础攻击加值，豁免加值技能与技巧不会改变，它失去体质值，但魅力值上升到12。如果你的僵尸伙伴被摧毁，那么你获得新的动物伙伴时它也会自动变为不死生物，拥有同样的调整。

资源出处: Monster Codex pg. 80

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Corpse%20Companion

Corrupted Flesh.name: 腐烂神 Corrupted Flesh
Corrupted Flesh.description:
你浑身不断脱落气味逼人的死皮和脓疖，或是你身上长着多余的退化肢体一直在腐烂，无法治愈。

先决条件: 体质15，6HD，食人魔。

专长效果: 你获得恶臭（Stench）怪物特殊能力（DC=10+1/2你的HD+你的体质调整值）。

资源出处: Monster Codex pg. 152

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Corrupted%20Flesh

Corsair of Taldor.name: Corsair of Taldor
Corsair of Taldor.description:
Many Taldans seeking a life of adventure and service to the empire come to Cassomir hoping to join the ranks of Jean Coremont's corsairs. Those who do soon find themselves on the high seas, battling enemies of the empire and gaining fame for themselves and their shipmates.

Prerequisites
Spent at least 1 month working on a ship for Jean Coremont.

Benefits
You get a +2 bonus on initiative checks made while on a ship and deal an additional +1 damage when using light or one-handed weapons on a ship.

Cosmic Gate.name: Cosmic Gate
Cosmic Gate.description:
You know that the stars shining in Cynosure's pools aren't reflections, but are gateways, and you can use this knowledge in your travels.

Prerequisites
Lady Luck's Guidance, Knowledge (planes) 10 ranks.

Benefits
Once per day, you can briefly enter Cynosure and use the pools located there to instantly travel to a nearby location on the Material Plane; this functions as teleport except you are always considered very familiar with your destination.

Cosmopolitan.name: 四海为家 Cosmopolitan
Cosmopolitan.description:
在大型异国城市生活的经历使得你与许多不同的文明、文化和种族产生了联系。

专长效果: 你可以读写两种额外语言，种类自行选择。此外，选择两种基于智力、感知或者魅力的技能。这两个技能对于你来说视为本职技能。

资源出处: Advanced Players Guide pg. 156Pathfinder Campaign Setting pg. 86

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Cosmopolitan

Counter Reflexes.name: 进无可进 Counter Reflexes
Counter Reflexes.description:
专长类型：Combat

通过判读敌人的步伐，你深知对方会如何在你的威胁范围内移动

先决条件: 捕捉闪避，闪避，灵活移动，基础攻击加值+9或拳师等级6或武僧等级6。

专长效果: 拥有灵活移动专长的敌人无法在因为移出你的威胁范围而触发你的借机攻击时，在防御等级上获得任何闪避加值。

资源出处: Advanced Class Guide pg. 144

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Counter%20Reflexes

战策增益：在对拥有灵活移动专长的敌人因移出你的威胁范围而触发你的借机攻击时，花费2点耐力可在命中上获得+4加值。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 116

Countering Loophole.name: 乘间伺隙 Countering Loophole
Countering Loophole.description:
你可以发现法术中的漏洞，摆脱法术的效果，并反制施法者。

先决条件: 精通法术反制。

专长效果: 当你成功地反制一个魅惑系或胁迫系法术，你立即将该法术反转给施法者如同你是法术的施法者，而原施法者成为目标（只要你可以施展该施法等级的法术）。即使法术最初的目标是复数个生物，反转的法术的原施法者成为唯一的目标。法术的豁免DC仍然相同，但是你可以做任何影响法术的决定（例如修改一项建议或次等指使术的条件）。

正常情况：如果你成功反制法术，法术互相否定对应法术，不产生其他的效果。

资源出处: Heroes of the High Court pg. 20

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Countering%20Loophole

Counterpoint to Inspiration.name: Counterpoint to Inspiration
Counterpoint to Inspiration.description:
As your allies' morale swells, your enemies falter.

Prerequisites
Basic Harmony, Compelling Harmony, Perform (keyboard, percussion, sing, string, or wind) 10 ranks, bardic performance or raging song.

Benefits
When an ally with this feat is within 60 feet and uses a bardic performance or raging song that grants allies a morale bonus or competence bonus, you may perform the same bardic performance or raging song to increase those bonuses by +1. This increase only lasts as long as you and your ally each maintain the same performance, and cannot be extended with effects like Lingering Performance. Additional bards with this feat beyond the second don't increase the bonuses further.

Counterpunch.name: 反手一拳 Counterpunch
Counterpunch.description:
专长类型：Combat

敌人在攻击失手时一个恍神，你就获得了一次立刻反击的机会。

先决条件: 敏捷18，战斗反射，精通徒手击打，武器专攻（徒手击打），基础攻击加值+16或拳师等级12。

专长效果: 每轮一次，每当你双手全空并使用徒手击打战斗时，只要你的敌人对你近战攻击失手，你就可以对他发动一次徒手击打借机攻击。这次借机必须使用徒手攻击。

资源出处: Advanced Class Guide pg. 144

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Counterpunch

战策增益：如果花费5点耐力，你可以在同一轮第二次使用该专长。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 116

Courage in a Bottle.name: 好酒壮胆 Courage in a Bottle
Courage in a Bottle.description:
先决条件：英勇职业能力，信仰凯登·凯利恩

先决条件: 英勇职业能力，信仰凯登·凯利恩。

专长效果: 每当你醉酒（Intoxicated），你从英勇职业能力获得的加值就+2，如果该加值被提升到+6或更高，你将免疫恐惧效果。

资源出处: Inner Sea Gods pg. 209

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Courage%20in%20a%20Bottle

Courage in Numbers.name: Courage in Numbers
Courage in Numbers.description:
Your allies give you courage when you face an enemy as one.

Prerequisites
Iron Will.

Benefits
You gain a +2 morale bonus on saves against fear for every ally within 10 feet who possesses this feat (maximum +8).

Courageous Resolve.name: 勇敢的心 Courageous Resolve
Courageous Resolve.description:
即使别人退缩了，你依然坚持。

先决条件: 【胆小鬼】或【无畏】种族特性，半身人。

专长效果: 如果你有【无畏】种族特性，你在对抗恐惧的种族豁免奖励增加到+4。如果你有【胆小鬼】种族特性，你在对抗恐惧时豁免检定依然承受-2减值，但你可以正常获得士气加值。

资源出处: Advanced Race Guide pg. 66

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Courageous%20Resolve

Coven Caster.name: Coven Caster
Coven Caster.description:
You share your mother's gift for working in groups.

Prerequisites
Changeling.

Benefits
As a standard action, you can attempt a special aid another action (1d20 + your choice of your Intelligence or Charisma modifier; DC 10). If you succeed, you can increase an adjacent spellcaster's caster level by 1 until the beginning of your next turn. If you also have the coven witch hex, you can apply this bonus to all members of your coven within 30 feet.

Coven-Touched.name: Coven-Touched
Coven-Touched.description:
You have a natural affinity for coven magic.

Prerequisites
Cha 11, changeling.

Benefits
You can join a changeling coven even if you are not a witch with the coven hex. Your effective witch level is equal to half your character level. A changeling coven must still include at least one changeling witch who has the coven hex.

Additionally, select a single a 0-level spell drawn from the witch's spell list. You gain the ability to cast this spell three times per day as a spell-like ability with a caster level equal to your character level. The save DC for this spell is 10 + your Intelligence modifier.

Cover Tracks.name: Cover Tracks
Cover Tracks.description:
You are very difficult to follow in the wild, leaving few tracks in your wake.

Prerequisites
Survival 3 ranks.

Benefits
You increase the DC of Survival checks to track you by 5 when moving at full speed and by 10 when moving at half speed. You can cover the tracks of a number of allies within 30 feet equal to your Wisdom modifier plus half your character level, increasing the DC to track them by 2 if they are moving at full speed or by 5 if they are moving at half speed.

Special
If you have the favored terrain class feature and you are in that terrain, you also add your favored terrain bonus to the DC to track you or your allies.

Covering Defense.name: 掩护 Covering Defense
Covering Defense.description:
专长类型：Combat

你擅长使用盾牌同时保护自己和盟友。

先决条件: 盾牌专攻，基本攻击加值+6。

专长效果: 当你在持用轻型盾牌、重型盾牌或者塔盾进行全防御动作时，能够为盟友的AC提供掩蔽加值用于对抗所有攻击，不过这名盟友必须与你相邻并且体型小于等于你的体型。这个掩蔽加值等同于你的盾牌的盾牌加值，并且持续至你的下一轮开始。你的盾牌不会为反射豁免提供掩蔽加值。

资源出处: Advanced Players Guide pg. 156

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Covering%20Defense

战策增益：如果花费5点耐力，你的盾牌也会为反射豁免提供掩蔽加值。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 116

Covering Fire.name: Covering Fire
Covering Fire.description:
Your shot can put an enemy off guard, giving your teammates the opportunity to act.

Prerequisites
Exotic Weapon Proficiency (firearms), Weapon Focus (at least one firearm).

Benefits
When you hit a foe with a firearm for which you have Weapon Focus, that creature takes a -2 penalty on attack rolls for 1 round against any other ally that also has this feat; this changes to a -4 penalty on attacks of opportunity. The penalty applied by this feat does not stack with itself. However, if both you and an ally with this feat attack the same foe, you can cover each other (since a penalty you impose with this feat doesn't apply to attacks against you).

Covering Shield.name: Covering Shield
Covering Shield.description:
You can use your shield to protect your most vulnerable parts from area effects.

Prerequisites
Dex 13, Shield Focus, Shield Proficiency.

Benefits
While using a shield of the type to which your Shield Focus feat applies, you gain a bonus on Reflex saves against area of effect attacks equal to your shield's base bonus to armor class plus any bonuses granted by feats or class abilities. This does not transfer any enhancement bonuses on a shield to Reflex saves.

Combat Trick
You can spend 3 stamina points to also gain the enhancement bonus of your shield on your Reflex save against one attack or hazard. (Dragonslayer's Handbook 24)

Cracking the Shell.name: Cracking the Shell
Cracking the Shell.description:
The tip of your weapon pierces both the body and the spirit.

Prerequisites
Weapon Focus with piercing weapon.

Benefits
When you deal damage with a melee attack with a piercing weapon to an opponent you have already damaged this round, you can also reduce the value of that target's spell resistance or energy resistances by 1 until the start of your next turn. This reduction stacks with itself.

Craft Cybernetics.name: Craft Cybernetics
Craft Cybernetics.description:
You can build cyberware and install it in a creature's body.

Prerequisites
Technologist, Heal 9 ranks, Knowledge (engineering) 9 ranks

Benefits
You can create cybernetic items. Creating a cybernetic item takes 1 day for every 1,000 gp in the item's price. To create the object, you must use up raw materials costing half of this total price. See Crafting High-Tech Items on page 16 for more information.

You can repair a broken cybernetic item if it is one that you could make. Doing so costs half the raw materials and half the time it would take to craft that item from scratch. You can also install a cybernetic item in a creature's body.

See the Cybertech section on page 35 for more information on installing cyberware.

Craft Pharmaceutical.name: Craft Pharmaceutical
Craft Pharmaceutical.description:
You can craft pharmaceuticals.

Prerequisites
Technologist, Heal 9 ranks, Knowledge (nature) 9 ranks

Benefits
You can create any pharmaceutical or poison. Creating a pharmaceutical takes 2 hours if its base price is 250 gp or less; otherwise, the creation of the pharmaceutical takes 1 day for every 1,000 gp in its price. To create the pharmaceutical or poison, you must use up raw materials costing half of this total price. See Crafting High-Tech Items on page 16 for more information.

Craft Robot.name: Craft Robot
Craft Robot.description:
You can build robots.

Prerequisites
Craft Technological Arms and Armor, Craft Technological Item, Technologist, Craft (mechanical) 9 ranks, Knowledge (engineering) 9 ranks.

Benefits
You can create robots, provided you have access to a robotics lab and the necessary materials. A robot's price is equal to its CR x 20,000 gp, and the cost to create one is half this amount. Creating a robot takes 1 day for every 1,000 gp of its price. At the end of the process you must attempt a single Craft (mechanical) skill check to finish the robot. Failing this check means that the robot doesn't function and the materials and time are wasted. The DC for this skill check is equal to 20 + the robot's CR (minimum 21). A newly created robot has average hit points for its Hit Dice.

Special
A robotics lab is required to craft robots and uses 200 charges each day it is in operation. See page 16 of Pathfinder Campaign Setting: Technology Guide for more information on technological laboratories.

Craft Shoddy Item.name: Craft Shoddy Item
Craft Shoddy Item.description:
You can create poorly constructed items that appear to be just as sturdy and as of good quality as normal goods, saving on the cost of materials in the process.

Prerequisites
1 rank in appropriate Craft skill.

Benefits
When you craft an item using your Craft skill, you can pay 1/5 of the item's price for the raw material cost and craft a shoddy item (see page 116). You must still succeed at the appropriate DC check, and the work takes the same amount of time as a normal item. If you fail the Craft check by 5 or more, you ruin all the raw materials and must begin again. If you attempt to craft an item of even lower quality, the item's poor quality is immediately apparent.

Normal
You pay 1/3 of the item's price for the raw material cost. If you fail the Craft check by 5 or more, you ruin half the raw materials and must pay half the original raw material cost again.

Shoddy Item
Price varies; Weight varies
A shoddy item is any mundane piece of equipment that has been cleverly but poorly crafted such that its materials and workmanship are worse than expected, but the flaws are concealed. Layers of material are thinner than normal, hasps and hinges are only loosely attached, metals are mixed improperly, resulting in softer alloys, and so forth. Shoddy items are sold for the same price as their well-made counterparts. Manufacturing a shoddy item requires the Craft Shoddy Item feat (see above) in order to successfully conceal the poor workmanship. Shoddy items are never masterwork or made of special materials (though they might appear to be made of a special material), and single-use items can never be made as shoddy items.
Any shoddy item has its hardness reduced by 2 and its hit points reduced by half.
Any weapon or piece of armor constructed in a shoddy manner takes damage each time it is used; a weapon takes the same amount of damage it deals in an attack (minus its lower hardness rating), and a piece of armor takes damage identical to its wearer's loss in hit points from an enemy's successful attack (again, after taking the adjusted hardness into account). Items other than weapons and armor have a 10% chance to gain the broken condition with each day of use, and if they have a limited number of uses, they have half as many uses as normal. In either case, shoddy items that gain the broken condition can never have that condition removed (even by using magic or if they later recover hit points) without further successful Craft checks and gp expenditure to fix the initial flaws. Shoddy items that are destroyed cannot be recovered by any means, and are useless for anything more than salvaging some of the raw materials. A shoddy item typically costs the same as a normal item of its kind.

A character who succeeds at a DC 15 Appraise (or appropriate Craft) check notices the shoddy condition of an item, but the character must specifically inspect the item to do so.

Craft Technological Arms and Armor.name: Craft Technological Arms and Armor
Craft Technological Arms and Armor.description:
You can build technological weapons and armor.

Prerequisites
Technologist, Craft (mechanical) 7 ranks, Knowledge (engineering) 7 ranks

Benefits
You can create technological weapons or armor. Creating a technological weapon or suit of armor takes 1 day for every 1,000 gp in the item's price. To create the object, you must use up raw materials costing half of this total price. See Crafting High-Tech Items on page 16 for more information.

You can also repair a broken technological weapon or suit of armor if it is one that you could make. Doing so costs half the raw materials and half the time it would take to craft that item from scratch.

Craft Technological Item.name: Craft Technological Item
Craft Technological Item.description:
You can craft technological gear and items.

Prerequisites
Technologist, Craft (mechanical) 5 ranks, Knowledge (engineering) 5 ranks

Benefits
You can create technological gear. Creating a piece of technological gear takes 1 day for every 1,000 gp in the item's price. To create the object, you must use up raw materials costing half of this total price. See Crafting High- Tech Items on page 16 for more information.

You can also repair a broken technological item if it is one that you could make. Doing so costs half the raw materials and half the time it would take to craft that item from scratch.

Crane Riposte.name: 白鹤弹腿 Crane Riposte
Crane Riposte.description:
专长类型：Combat

你以防守的力量来发动强有力的反击。

先决条件: 白鹤拳，白鹤亮翅，闪避，精通徒手打击，基本攻击加值+8或武僧7级。

专长效果: 你因防御式战斗而受到的攻击罚值只有-1。每当你成功的使用白鹤亮翅偏斜了一次敌人的攻击，或是因为一次对你发动的近战攻击失手并检定结果比你的AC低不超过4点而失去白鹤亮翅的闪避AC加值时，你可以对对你攻击失手的对手发动一次借机攻击。

资源出处: Ultimate Combat pg. 93

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Crane%20Riposte

战策增益：在你的回合开始时如果你使用防御式战斗，花费2点耐力可抵消命中惩罚，直至你下一轮开始。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 116

Crane Style.name: 白鹤拳 Crane Style
Crane Style.description:
专长类型：CombatStyle

你的徒手攻击技巧以柔克刚，攻守圆转。

先决条件: 闪避，精通徒手打击，基本攻击加值+2或武僧1级。

专长效果: 你在进行防御式战斗时攻击骰只受-2减值。你使用白鹤拳流派架势时，从防御式战斗与全回合防御获得的AC闪避加值+1。

资源出处: Ultimate Combat pg. 93

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Crane%20Style

战策增益：在防御式战斗或全防时，面对敌人的一次近战攻击，你可以花费不超过3点耐力，以直觉动作强化你对该攻击的闪避AC，等同所消耗耐力点。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 116

Crane Wing.name: 白鹤亮翅 Crane Wing
Crane Wing.description:
专长类型：Combat

你以禽鸟般的速度和巧劲移动，并用挥洒自如的优雅动作挡开敌人的攻击。

先决条件: 白鹤拳，闪避，精通徒手打击，基本攻击加值+5或武僧5级。

专长效果: 当你至少空一只手进行防御式战斗时，你会在对抗近战攻击的AC上获得+4闪避加值。如果一次对你发动的近战攻击失手并检定结果比你的AC低不超过4点，则你将失去上述的好处。当你进行全防御动作时，你可以偏斜一次命中你的近战武器攻击。以此法偏斜的近战攻击不造成伤害和其它效果（而非直接丢失）。使用此专长无需动作，但你必须察觉到该次攻击且不处于措手不及中。

资源出处: Ultimate Combat pg. 93

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Crane%20Wing

战策增益：花费5点耐力可对第二个目标获得2点闪避AC。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 116

Cranial Adjustment.name: Cranial Adjustment
Cranial Adjustment.description:
You have learned to manually adjust the plates that make up the skull, inducing altered states in your subjects.

Prerequisites
Deft Hands or Trepanation.

Benefits
You can perform the hypnotism occult skill unlock even if you can't use psychic magic. If you can cast psychic spells or have the Psychic Sensitivity feat, you can use hypnotism one additional time per day.

You can use the Sleight of Hand skill in place of Diplomacy to hypnotize a subject, but doing so requires 10 minutes of contact with the target's skull. You can perform an adjustment that takes 1 hour to access the deeper recesses of a target's emotional mind, either granting the target a +2 bonus or imposing a -2 penalty on the target's saving throws against mind-affecting emotion effects for 24 hours.

Cranial Implantation.name: Cranial Implantation
Cranial Implantation.description:
You turn the science of phrenology inward, driving needles and nails into your or another's brain to grant focus through the pathways of pain.

Prerequisites
Self-Sufficient or Trepanation, Heal 7 ranks.

Benefits
You can perform the phrenology occult skill unlock, though you must use needles or similar sharp implements rather than your fingertips, dealing 1d3 points of damage to the subject. If you can cast psychic spells or have the Psychic Sensitivity feat, you can use phrenology one additional time per day.

In addition, you can insert needles into a creature's brain to help center its thoughts and emotions. Doing so requires a successful Heal check (DC = 25 + the target's Hit Dice). Creatures with implanted needles gain a +1 bonus on saving throws against spells with the emotionUM or fear descriptor (or similar effects), but take a -1 penalty on saving throws against spells with the electricity or painUM descriptors. Implanting needles deals 1d6 points of damage to the patient, which can't be healed by any means until the needles are removed (which requires a second successful Heal check at the same DC, or a restoration or regenerate spell).

If you have implanted needles into your own cranium, you can probe them as a swift action while casting a spell, dealing an amount of damage to yourself equal to 1 + the spell's level. The pain from this probing stimulates your powers of focus, granting you a bonus of +1d6 on any concentration check you must attempt as part of casting that spell. This damage doesn't force you to attempt a concentration check.

Crashing Wave Buffet.name: 碎浪搏 Crashing Wave Buffet
Crashing Wave Buffet.description:
专长类型：Combat

你残忍地推撞和重击对手，使其迷惑，就像大海无情地击打击岩石一般。

先决条件: 感知15，碎浪流，精通拖拽，精通移位，精通徒手打击，BAB+6。

专长效果: 当你拖拽或移位对手的时候，你能像持续的波浪一般用全身来击打对手。在拖拽或移位的时候，你的对手必须进行一次强韧豁免检定（DC=10+1/2你的角色等级+你的感知调整+2每5尺拖拽或移位的距离）。若豁免失败，你的对手会迷失方向，并在攻击检定、战技检定和基于敏捷的技能检定上获得-2的罚值，直到他的下一次回合结束。

资源出处: Ultimate Wilderness pg. 108

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Crashing%20Wave%20Buffet

Crashing Wave Fist.name: 碎浪破 Crashing Wave Fist
Crashing Wave Fist.description:
专长类型：Combat

除了简单地移动敌人的位置，你还可以在推动敌人时攻击他。

先决条件: 感知15，碎浪搏，碎浪流，精通拖拽，精通移位，精通徒手打击，BAB+9。

专长效果: 当进行拖拽或者移位对手时，在移动过程的任何时机，你都可以用你的最高攻击加值对对手进行一次徒手攻击。在最初的5尺之后，每拖拽或者移位5尺你都可以进行一次额外的攻击。以这种方式造成的额外攻击，每一次额外的攻击都将叠加-5的罚值。

资源出处: Ultimate Wilderness pg. 109

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Crashing%20Wave%20Fist

Crashing Wave Style.name: 碎浪流 Crashing Wave Style
Crashing Wave Style.description:
专长类型：CombatStyle

你无情地把你的敌人推开，如同他们被大海卷走。

先决条件: 感知13，精通拖拽，精通移位，精通徒手打击。

专长效果: 当你在使用该流派时成功拖拽或移位一名对手，在拖拽或移位的任何时机，即使你该轮已经移动过，你可以用一个直觉动作移动5尺，包括进入被对手占据的区域。这个移动不会引发借机攻击。

资源出处: Ultimate Wilderness pg. 109

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Crashing%20Wave%20Style

Create Reliquary Arms and Shields.name: 制造圣遗物 Create Reliquary Arms and Shields
Create Reliquary Arms and Shields.description:
你在制造的魔法物品被灌入了神圣的力量。

先决条件: 制造魔法武器和盔甲，使用‘祝圣术（consecrate）’或者‘亵渎术（desecrate）’的能力。

专长效果: 你将‘祝圣术’或者‘亵渎术’作为制造一件魔法武器、魔法护甲、魔法盾牌的一部份。这会增加制品的价格250gp。制品会成为一件圣遗物，可以作为你所信奉的神祇的圣徽（或邪徽）法器。如果你施放‘祝圣术’或者‘亵渎术’，法术区域内你的圣遗物将被视为你所信奉的神祇的永久性固定物品。

资源出处: Ultimate Magic pg. 148

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Create%20Reliquary%20Arms%20and%20Shields

Create Sanguine Elixir.name: 制造血统药剂 Create Sanguine Elixir
Create Sanguine Elixir.description:
你将你血统力量的一部份凝聚到一瓶威力强大的药剂中。

先决条件: 魅力15，制造药水，工艺（炼金）12级，术士3级。

专长效果: 每日一次，在你清空思绪获得法术位的时候，你可以制造一瓶血统药剂。当你这样做的时候，选择你的一种血统力量转移到一小瓶药剂中，而喝下这药剂的生物会暂时获得你的血统力量所带来的好处。制造一瓶血统药剂需要花费1小时和价值100gp的特殊材料。当你制造血统药剂时，你失去你的血统力量、直到下一次清空思绪获得法术位的时候。

当一个生物喝下了血统药剂，他能在他下一轮结束前的任何时候激活血统力量就如同他原本拥有血统力量一般。如果生物的角色等级没有达到或者超过血统力量所要求的最低等级，则这个生物无法从药剂中获得相应的好处。以饮用者和药剂的制造者中等级较低者的等级决定一切与等级相关的效果。喝下一瓶血统药剂就和喝下一瓶普通的药剂一样。一瓶血统药剂视作等同你CL的魔法物品。

血统药剂是极不稳定的。它们会在被制造出来的1天后失效。

资源出处: Ultimate Magic pg. 148

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Create%20Sanguine%20Elixir

Creative Armorsmith.name: Creative Armorsmith
Creative Armorsmith.description:
You can temporarily customize your own armor.

Prerequisites
Craft (armor) 3 ranks, Knowledge (engineering) 3 ranks.

Benefits
With an hour of work, you can temporarily add an armor modification of your choice to your armor, or temporarily remove an existing modification, at no cost. You must have access to masterwork artisan's tools designed for armorsmithing to perform this alteration. This alteration lasts for 8 hours. Armor modifications you add this way only provide their benefits to you; any other wearer suffers the modification's drawbacks but does not gain its benefits.

Creative Weaponsmith.name: Creative Weaponsmith
Creative Weaponsmith.description:
You can temporarily customize your own weapons.

Prerequisites
Craft (weapons) 3 ranks, Knowledge (engineering) 3 ranks.

Benefits
With an hour of work, you can temporarily add a weapon modification of your choice to your weapon (or temporarily remove an existing modification) at no cost. You must have access to masterwork artisan's tools designed for weaponsmithing to perform this alteration. This alteration lasts for 8 hours. Weapon modifications you add this way only provide their benefits to you; any other wielder treats the weapon as one category more difficult to use than normal, but does not gain its benefits.

Creature Focus.name: Creature Focus
Creature Focus.description:
You have deadly experience with a certain type of creature, granting you an edge in fighting its kind.

Prerequisites
No levels in a class that grants the favored enemy class feature.

Benefits
Choose a creature type from the ranger favored enemies table except for humanoid or monstrous humanoid. You gain a +2 bonus on Perception checks, Survival checks, and weapon damage rolls against creatures of the selected type. You can attempt Knowledge skill checks untrained when attempting to identify such creatures.

Special
This feat counts as the favored enemy class feature for the purpose of meeting feat prerequisites. If another ability references your favored enemy bonus for the creature type selected, you treat your favored enemy bonus as +2. If you later gain the favored enemy class feature, you can replace this feat with a different feat for which you qualify and whose prerequisites include the favored enemy class feature.
You can gain this feat multiple times. Its effects do not stack. Each time you take the feat, it applies to a different creature type.

Crepuscular Cowl.name: Crepuscular Cowl
Crepuscular Cowl.description:
Your affinity with the Shadow Plane allows you to draw a cloak of concealing gloom around you, even in bright light.

Prerequisites
Stealth 9 ranks, shadow blending racial trait or shadow call shadowdancer prestige class feature.

Benefits
As a swift action, you can pull a haze of shadow around you, granting yourself concealment (20% miss chance) in bright light or normal light for 1 minute. You can use this ability once per day, plus one additional time per day when your character level reaches 12th, 15th, and 18th.

Criminal Reputation.name: 黑道名声 Criminal Reputation
Criminal Reputation.description:
你的大胆行为会让那些生活在里社会的人们对你刮目相看。

先决条件: 交涉5级，威吓5级。

专长效果: 你与不法之徒（criminals）进行互动时，交涉和威吓检定均会获得+2加值，无论这些不法之徒是单干的窃贼还是有组织的犯罪者。若你在这些技能上投入了10点或更多技能点的话，那么对应技能的加值则会增加至+4点。

这些加值不会与谈判专家（Persuasive）带来的加值叠加，但是在判断专长的先决条件或者将谈判专家专长作为基础的其他规则时，该专长被视同为谈判专家（Persuasive）。

资源出处: Ultimate Intrigue pg. 81

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Criminal%20Reputation

Crippling Critical.name: 致跛重击 Crippling Critical
Crippling Critical.description:
专长类型：CombatCritical

你能够让目标残废，使其运动受到阻碍。

先决条件: 重击专攻，基本攻击加值+13。

专长效果: 当你成功对一名敌人造成重击时，他的速度会减半，持续1分钟。成功的强韧豁免能够使持续时间降低至1d4轮。该次豁免的DC等同于“10+你的BAB”。对于拥有多种移动类型的生物，你必须选择想要影响的移动类型。正在飞行的生物若被此攻击命中，则必须进行DC为10的飞行检定以保持滞留在空中，并且它的机动性会下降一级。

特殊说明: 你只能将一种重击专长的效果应用到一次确认的重击上，除非你拥有“重击大师”专长。

【编注：本专长没有〔重击专长〕标签，这很诡异。】

资源出处: Advanced Players Guide pg. 157

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Crippling%20Critical

战策增益：当你重击确认并尝试用该专长令目标减速时，通过花费最多不超过5点耐力，你可以提升豁免DC等同所耗费的耐力点。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 116

Crippling Thrust.name: Crippling Thrust
Crippling Thrust.description:
With one precise stab, you hamper movement.

Prerequisites
Weapon Focus with piercing weapon, base attack bonus +6.

Benefits
As a standard action, make a single attack with your chosen weapon. If the attack hits, the target's movement speed is halved until the start of your next turn. When your base attack bonus reaches +11, the target's movement is so hampered that even a 5-foot step provokes an attack of opportunity. When your base attack bonus reaches +16, the target must also succeed at a Reflex save with a DC equal to 10 + your base attack bonus or become entangled. An entangled creature's movement can be halved only once. You can use this feat's benefits only once per minute.

Crisis of Conscience.name: Crisis of Conscience
Crisis of Conscience.description:
Your internal struggle and contradictory actions have left you teetering on a knife's edge between good and evil. You must choose which path you will make your own.

Prerequisites
Lawful neutral, neutral, or chaotic neutral alignment. Your alignment must have shifted from either good or evil at least once since 1st level or the last time you completed this feat (see Special).

Benefits
You are an enigma unto those who cleave to notions of morality as guiding life principles. Habits and mannerisms from your past life send subtly confusing signals to those trying to read you. Whenever another character attempts to discern your alignment, loyalties, or intentions (including via magical effects such as detect thoughts and when you are using Bluff to send a secret message or feint), you gain a +2 bonus on opposed skill checks and on Will saving throws to resist such effects.

Goal
Resolve your conscience with an act of decisive good or evil that shifts your alignment accordingly. Acts of decisive good include dedicating your worldly wealth to a noble cause or charitable institution, risking death for the sake of others, or another notable sacrifice for a greater good. Acts of decisive evil include reducing a city to penury and starvation, murdering or terrorizing innocents, or other, darker deeds.

Completion Benefit
If your alignment changes from good to evil or evil to good, you know how to entice others down your path. While you retain this alignment, you gain a +2 bonus on Charisma- and Wisdom-based skill checks made to interact with a sentient creature of your previous (and now opposite) moral alignment. This bonus increases to +4 if success would cause the target to act against its moral alignment (at the GM's discretion). If it does so, you retain this bonus when interacting with that target until its moral alignment is the same as yours.
If you return to your original moral alignment, you have gained deeper insight into your convictions. While you retain this moral alignment, you become aware of any action or item that could adversely affect your alignment or your standing with your deity (if you have one), including magical effects. You acquire this information prior to performing such an action or becoming associated with such an item if you take a moment to contemplate the act.

Critical Conduit.name: Critical Conduit
Critical Conduit.description:
You are deadly when delivering your master's magic.

Prerequisites
Deliver touch spells ability, familiar.

Benefits
When delivering a touch spell for your master, the critical threat range of your touch attack is doubled. This feat does not stack with Improved Critical or other effects that increase critical threat range.

Critical Focus (Mythic).name: 重击专攻(神话) Critical Focus (Mythic)
Critical Focus (Mythic).description:
先决条件：重击专攻

你的攻击能够正确无误地命中目标的弱点。

神话专长效果：当你对抗非神话敌人时，能够自动确认重击。此外，当你对佩戴具有护命（fortification）特殊能力的护甲或者具有类似效果的生物造成重击威胁时，该名生物必须在确认重击是否无效的检定中掷两次并取更糟的结果。

资源出处: Mythic Adventures pg. 61

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Critical%20Focus

Critical Mastery (Mythic).name: 重击熟稔(神话) Critical Mastery (Mythic)
Critical Mastery (Mythic).description:
先决条件：重击熟稔

你的重击极具毁灭性。

神话专长效果：当你使用重击大师专长时，你每拥有3个阶层，能够应用的重击专长数量就会增加1个。

资源出处: Mythic Adventures pg. 61

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Critical%20Mastery

Critical Versatility.name: 灵活重击 Critical Versatility
Critical Versatility.description:
专长类型：Combat

先决条件：战士11级，人类。

先决条件: 战士11级，人类。

专长效果: 每天一次，你可以花费1个小时演练战斗技巧以获得一个重击专长，你必须满足专长的先决条件才可以选择。你获得所选择重击专长的好处，直到你选择另外一个重击专长替代它。

资源出处: Advanced Race Guide pg. 76

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Critical%20Versatility

战策增益：花费5点耐力，你每天可第二次使用该能力。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 116

Crossbow Mastery.name: 十字弓熟稔 Crossbow Mastery
Crossbow Mastery.description:
专长类型：Combat

你能够以令人目眩的速度装填弩弓，甚至可以在近战中用他们射击而不必担心遭到报复。

先决条件: 敏捷15，近距射击，快速装填，快速射击。

专长效果: 不论你使用的弩的类型为何种，装填弩所需要的时间降低为自由动作。你能够在全力攻击中使用弩射击多次，就如同使用弓的时候一般。当你选取“快速装填”专长时所选择的那种类型的弩在进行装填时不会引起借机攻击。

特殊说明: 从6级起，选择【箭术战斗流派】的游侠能够将“十字弓熟稔”作为战斗流派专长进行选取。

资源出处: Advanced Players Guide pg. 157Curse of the Crimson Throne Players Guide pg. 10Pathfinder Campaign Setting pg. 218

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Crossbow%20Mastery

战策增益：只要耐力池中还又至少一点耐力，装填任何类型的弩弓都不会引起借机攻击。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 116

Crowd Control.name: Crowd Control
Crowd Control.description:
You and your allies have been trained to prevent enemies from moving around or through your formation.

Prerequisites
Base attack bonus +3.

Benefits
You gain a +2 competence bonus to your CMD when an enemy uses Acrobatics to move through a square you threaten. For each ally within your reach that also has this feat, the bonus increases by an additional 2.

Crowd of Bullies.name: Crowd of Bullies
Crowd of Bullies.description:
Your failed attempt to humiliate a foe reveals its weaknesses to your allies.

Prerequisites
Half-orc.

Benefits
Whenever you fail a combat maneuver check, your allies within 30 feet who also have this feat gain a +2 circumstance bonus on combat maneuver checks of the same type against the same foe for 1 round.

Cruelty.name: 残酷 Cruelty
Cruelty.description:
先决条件：信仰宗-库山

先决条件: 信仰宗-库山。

专长效果: 当你对一个目标造成流血伤害，使一个目标受到恐惧或痛苦效果影响，或者使目标的生命值被降低到0或更低时，你在攻击检定和武器伤害上获得+2士气加值，持续1轮。

资源出处: Inner Sea Gods pg. 209

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Cruelty

Crusader's Fist.name: 圣战之拳 Crusader's Fist
Crusader's Fist.description:
专长类型：Combat

你给被击中的敌人注入神圣的能量。

先决条件: 【圣疗】或【堕落之触】职业特性，精通徒手打击，基本攻击加值+6。

专长效果: 当你用徒手打击命中一个生物，并且该生物可以被你的【圣疗】或【堕落之触】所伤害，你可以选择以迅捷动作消耗1次每日次数来对其造成正常伤害，如同你以标准动作使用了能力。该额外伤害不会被你的重击所加成。

资源出处: Ultimate Combat pg. 94

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Crusader's%20Fist

战策增益：如果使用圣战之拳时确认了重击，花费5点耐力可令额外伤害享受暴击翻倍加成。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 116

Crusader's Flurry.name: 圣战连击 Crusader's Flurry
Crusader's Flurry.description:
你学会了如何将你信仰的神祇的偏好武器融入你所使用的武术架势。

先决条件: 【引导能量】职业特性，【疾风连击】职业特性，武器专攻（神祇的偏好近战武器）。

专长效果: 你可以将神祇的偏好武器用于疾风连击，就像它是一件武僧武器一样。

资源出处: Ultimate Combat pg. 94

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Crusader's%20Flurry

Crushing Blow.name: 怒涛碎击 Crushing Blow
Crushing Blow.description:
专长类型：Combat

你专注于如何粉碎敌人的防御。

先决条件: 精通徒手打击，震慑拳。

专长效果: 你可以用一个整轮动作来施放一次震慑拳。如果成功，你将不会震慑目标，而是降低其AC，数值为你的感知修正，持续1分钟。该罚值不会与另一次本专长造成的罚值叠加。

资源出处: Ultimate Combat pg. 94

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Crushing%20Blow

战策增益：使用怒涛碎击时可选择花费2或4点耐力，令导致的AC惩罚提升1或2点。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 116

Cry Challenge.name: Cry Challenge
Cry Challenge.description:
With a ferocious shout or vigorous gestures, you provoke an opponent's ire. By tricking the opponent into making a clumsy swing at you, you provide an opening for your allies.

Prerequisites
Antagonize.

Benefits
When you take a 5-foot step, you can choose for that step to provoke attacks of opportunity from all opponents that threaten you after the step. You gain a +4 dodge bonus to AC against attacks of opportunity provoked in this manner.

Normal
A 5-foot step doesn't provoke an attack of opportunity.

Cry of Mercy.name: Cry of Mercy
Cry of Mercy.description:
You invoke an ancestral boon to modify your fatal blows, and those of your allies, so that they render your foes merely unconscious.

Prerequisites
Wis 13.

Benefits
As a swift action once per day, you may call upon the spirits of your ancestors to prevent your opponents from dying. For the remainder of the combat, all of your dying opponents are stabilized at their current hit points, and any opponents who would be killed by damage from you or your allies are instead reduced to -1 hit point and stabilized. This is a supernatural ability. If an ally wants to kill an opponent despite the efforts of your ancestral spirits, she may attempt a Will saving throw (DC equal to 10 plus half your level plus your Wisdom modifier); success means her attacks affect the opponents normally.

Crypt Spell.name: 墓园法术 Crypt Spell
Crypt Spell.description:
专长类型：Metamagic

你向法术注入了来自骨园（Boneyard）不可动摇的力量，令敌人直面无可避免的审判。

专长效果: 你可以将任何对敌人造成生命值伤害的法术转化为墓园法术。若收到墓园法术伤害的目标在被伤害的那一轮内死亡，在判断复生情况时，视为因受即死效果而死亡。受到墓园法术伤害的不死生物会在等同于法术原本环级的轮数内获得恶心（Sickened）状态，若目标成功通过法术豁免，恶心（Sickened）状态持续时间减半。若法术不允许豁免，则目标通过一个意志豁免来对抗恶心（Sickened）状态。墓园法术获得[死亡]描述符。

墓园法术使用高于原本法术环级1级的法术位。

资源出处: Planar Adventures pg. 26

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Crypt%20Spell

Crystalline Cloud.name: Crystalline Cloud
Crystalline Cloud.description:
You can release large amounts of crystalline dust to create a diversion or cover your allies.

Prerequisites
Aphorite, character level 5th, crystalline dust racial trait.

Benefits
When you use your crystalline dust supernatural racial trait, you can instead create a cloud of crystalline dust in a 10-foot radius centered on you. The cloud does not obscure sight, but allies within the cloud receive the benefit of your crystalline dust. The cloud can be maintained each round as a free action as long as you remain within the cloud's area. A moderate wind (11+ mph), such as from a gust of wind spell, disperses the cloud immediately. Each round that the crystalline cloud is active expends 2 rounds of your crystalline dust racial trait. If you have the Gilded Weapons feat, any creature with the chaotic subtype that enters the cloud must succeed at a Fortitude save (DC = 10 + half your character level + your Charisma modifier) or be sickened for 1 round.

Cudgeler Style.name: 蛮锤式 Cudgeler Style
Cudgeler Style.description:
专长类型：CombatStyle

你知道如何冲击敌人并给予非致命打击。

先决条件: 钝击士。

专长效果: 当你处于该流派下冲锋命中敌人并选择造成瘀伤时，你的武器伤害骰视为增大1级来造成伤害。若你在冲锋后可以进行不止1次攻击，该专长只对第一次攻击起效。

资源出处: Melee Tactics Toolbox pg. 13

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Cudgeler%20Style

Cudgeler Sweep.name: 蛮锤扫 Cudgeler Sweep
Cudgeler Sweep.description:
专长类型：Combat

你强力的锤击可以击倒敌人。

先决条件: 钝击士，蛮锤式，BAB+5或武僧等级5。

专长效果: 当你处于蛮锤式流派下冲锋攻击命中时，你可以立刻以自由动作对目标进行一次摔绊战技检定，该次检定获得+2表现加值。这种摔绊战技检定可以正常引发借机攻击。

资源出处: Melee Tactics Toolbox pg. 13

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Cudgeler%20Sweep

Cudgeler Takedown.name: 蛮锤撞 Cudgeler Takedown
Cudgeler Takedown.description:
专长类型：Combat

被你击倒的敌人很难再起。

先决条件: 钝击士，蛮锤式，蛮锤扫，BAB+9或武僧等级9。

专长效果: 当你处于蛮锤式流派下冲锋攻击时，你的武器伤害骰视为增大1级持续1轮或直到武器离开你的手。当你成功通过蛮锤扫专长摔绊敌人时，该敌人必须通过强韧豁免检定（DC=10+你的人物等级+你的力量调整值），否则被震慑1轮。

资源出处: Melee Tactics Toolbox pg. 13

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Cudgeler%20Takedown

Cunning.name: 狡黠 Cunning
Cunning.description:
你特别狡黠，可以在相同的时间内掌握比别人更多的技能。

专长效果: 每个生命骰获得1点额外技能点数。当你选择这个专长时，你可以立即获得与你的生命骰相同数量的技能点，并且每当你的生命骰在将来增加时，你也会获得额外的技能点。

资源出处: Villain Codex pg. 128

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Cunning

Cunning Caster.name: Cunning Caster
Cunning Caster.description:
Whether a smuggler or spy, you've learned to use misdirection and legerdemain to conceal your own magical abilities.

Prerequisites
Deceitful, ability to cast 1st-level spells.

Benefits
When casting a spell, you can attempt a Bluff check (opposed by observers' Perception checks) to conceal your actions from onlookers. If the spell requires material components, you take a -4 penalty on the Bluff check. If the spell requires somatic components, you take a -4 penalty on the Bluff check. If the spell requires verbal components, you take a -4 penalty on the Bluff check. If the spell requires a focus or divine focus, you take a -4 penalty on the Bluff check. If the spell produces an obvious effect (such as a summoned creature or visible spell effect), you take a -4 penalty on the Bluff check, and even if your check is successful, observers still see the spell effect (though they fail to notice that you are responsible for it). All Bluff check penalties are cumulative.

Cunning Intuition.name: 诡诈直感 Cunning Intuition
Cunning Intuition.description:
专长类型：Combat

你能够读取敌人的肢体语言预估对方的行动，并以此来在战斗中获得优势。

先决条件: 警觉，精通先攻，闪电反射，即时备战，时刻备战，BAB +13或盗贼等级13级，察言观色13级。

专长效果: 当你准备动作（ready an action）时，你不需要声明具体要采取何种行动，只需要说出如何触发该行动以及被触发的动作类型（标准、移动、迅捷或自由选择其一）。若你选择的动作类型是标准动作，则可以在被准备的动作被触发时以移动动作进行替代。当准备动作的条件被触发时，你能够选择执行一个符合相应动作类型的特定动作（specific action）。

资源出处: Ultimate Intrigue pg. 81

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Cunning%20Intuition

Cunning Killer.name: Cunning Killer
Cunning Killer.description:
You mercilessly dispatch those creatures that you outwit.

Prerequisites
Base attack bonus +2, Knowledge (arcana, dungeoneering, local, nature, planes, or religion) 3 ranks.

Benefits
When you succeed at a Knowledge check to identify a creature with an Intelligence score of 2 or less, you gain a +1 insight bonus on attack and damage rolls against that creature for a number of rounds equal to your Intelligence bonus. When your base attack bonus reaches +4 and every 4 points thereafter, increase the Intelligence score of the creatures you can affect with this ability by 2 (maximum 12 Intelligence); your Intelligence must exceed the target's Intelligence by 5 or more for you to gain any benefit. When your base attack bonus reaches +6 and every 6 points thereafter, increase the insight bonus on attack and damage rolls by 1 (maximum +4).

Curative Mastery.name: Curative Mastery
Curative Mastery.description:
You can invoke a magic item's innate conjuration magic to conjure positive energy for healing wounds.

Prerequisites
Use Magic Device 1 rank, base Fortitude bonus +2.

Benefits
You can cause an item that has a 1st-level or higher conjuration spell listed in its construction requirements to cast cure light wounds as a spell-like ability, using the item's caster level as the spell's caster level. You can use this feat once per day, plus one additional time per day when your base Fortitude save bonus reaches +4, +6, +8, +10, and +12.

You can expend two uses of this feat to cast cure moderate wounds, three uses to cast cure serious wounds, four uses to cast cure critical wounds, and five uses to cast breath of life, provided that the item's construction requirements include a spell whose level is equal to or greater than the level of the spell-like ability to be used (2nd level for cure moderate wounds, 3rd level for cure serious wounds, 4th level for cure critical wounds, and 5th level for breath of life).


Pathfinder Society
When qualifying for and calculating the benefits of an item mastery feat, a PC uses the base Fortitude save bonus from only one of his classes.

Curious Companion.name: Curious Companion
Curious Companion.description:
Heroes tend to pick up the oddest friends--birds of the sky and beasts of the wood. Your companions are strange even by these standards.

Prerequisites
Animal companion class feature.

Benefits
You can select a plant companion or vermin companion as your animal companion.

Curse Mastery.name: 诅咒掌握 Curse Mastery
Curse Mastery.description:
专长类型：Item Mastery

你引导死灵系物品的魔法力量，对敌人施加恶毒的诅咒。

先决条件: 使用魔法装置技能3级，基础强韧豁免加值+6。

专长效果: 你可以引导一件制造时需求使用死灵系法术，且该法术至少为三环的魔法物品中的能量，施放一次法术降咒（Bestow Curse）。你每天可以使用本类法术能力一次，在基础强韧豁免加值达到+9和+12时可以获得额外一次每日使用次数。

资源出处: Weapon Masters Handbook pg. 26

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Curse%20Mastery

Curse of Vengeance.name: 复仇之祝 Curse of Vengeance
Curse of Vengeance.description:
先决条件：可以施放至少一个具有诅咒描述符的法术或类法术能力，信仰卡莉丝翠

先决条件: 可以施放至少一个具有诅咒描述符的法术或类法术能力，信仰卡莉丝翠。

专长效果: 每当你陷入无助或被杀，你就可以对该生物一直觉动作施放一个具有诅咒描述符的法术或类法术能力。这个法术的施放时间不能长于一个标准动作，同时必须施放到造成你无助或杀死你的生物上。如果该法术的距离为接触，那么你可以将它的范围延伸到30尺远。

资源出处: Inner Sea Gods pg. 209

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Curse%20of%20Vengeance

Cursed Conduit.name: Cursed Conduit
Cursed Conduit.description:
Something inside you soothes the lingering malice within corrupted magic items.

Benefits
You are not compelled to keep or use cursed items you touch so long as your character level is equal to or higher than the item's caster level. You are still affected by the afflictions of any cursed item you carry or use, but you gain a bonus on saving throws against curse effects equal to one-third the caster level of the highest-level cursed item you carry.

Cursed Item Detection.name: 诅咒魔法物品鉴定 Cursed Item Detection
Cursed Item Detection.description:
你对奥术强大的掌握让诅咒物品也难以将你迷惑。

先决条件: 法术辨识5级，能施展侦测魔法或以侦测魔法做类法术能力。

专长效果: 你在鉴定魔法物品的属性上得到+2的加值，此外，你只要超过鉴定DC5点就可以辨识出物品是否被诅咒。

通常状况: 你需要超过辨识所需DC10点才能鉴别出受诅咒的魔法物品。

资源出处: Dungeoneers Handbook pg. 12

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Cursed%20Item%20Detection

Cursed Love.name: Cursed Love
Cursed Love.description:
Your love forces you to endure the harshest of endeavors, despite the fact that most people would view your romance as madness.

Prerequisites
You must have a romantic interest who has fallen to some dark influence and rejects you out of shame or fear of newfound capabilities, or must have the Bad Romance or Temptation background.

Benefits
You are well versed in a dark society's way of thinking and in weathering abuse. Select a form of corruption that your lover fell to or willingly embraced: evil divine casters, evil arcane casters, undead creatures, or humanoid creatures with the shapeshifter subtype. You gain a +2 bonus on Diplomacy and Sense Motive checks when dealing with such creatures, and a +2 bonus on saving throws to resist any effects that would spread their corruption to you (such as a vampire's create spawn ability or a werewolf 's curse of lycanthropy). Once per day, when you would normally be reduced below 0 hit points by an attack from such a creature, you instead immediately gain a number of temporary hit points equal to half your character level.

Goal
Find a way to be with your lover in a permanent fashion, either by persuading your lover to reject the influence of evil or by willingly embracing the same corruption.

Completion Benefit
You no longer suffer abuse from those with whom your lover associates, and instead command a measure of their respect. You gain a +2 bonus on Intimidate checks against members of your chosen form of corruption. If you have 10 or more ranks in Intimidate, this bonus increases to +4. When you would normally be reduced below 0 hit points by an attack from such a source, you instead immediately gain a number of temporary hit points equal to your character level.

Cushioning Armor.name: 缓冲盔甲 Cushioning Armor
Cushioning Armor.description:
专长类型：Armor MasteryCombat

你调整你的盔甲，让它为你的坠落提供缓冲。

先决条件: 盔甲训练职业特性，擅长中甲或者重甲。

专长效果: 当你受到坠落伤害时，你可以将伤害的一半引导至你的盔甲。这个伤害会忽略盔甲的硬度。

资源出处: Armor Masters Handbook pg. 16

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Cushioning%20Armor

战策增益：你可以消耗5点耐力来在引导坠落伤害至盔甲时将盔甲的硬度应用上去。

战策资源出处: Armor Master's Handbook pg. 20

Cushioning Shield.name: 盾牌缓冲 Cushioning Shield
Cushioning Shield.description:
专长类型：CombatShield Mastery

使用盾牌吸收坠落时的部分伤害。

先决条件: 盾牌专攻，BAB+6或者战士4级。

专长效果: 当你坠落10尺或以上时，将一半的坠落伤害转嫁给你的盾牌。该伤害无视盾牌硬度。

资源出处: Armor Masters Handbook pg. 18

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Cushioning%20Shield

战策资源出处: Armor Master's Handbook pg. 20

Cut from the Air.name: 矢切 Cut from the Air
Cut from the Air.description:
专长类型：Weapon Mastery

你迅速而强力的一击可以将呼啸而来的飞弹弹开。

先决条件: 力量13，猛力攻击，BAB+5，对所选近战武器拥有战士武器训练（Weapon Training）职业能力。

专长效果: 当你或一个邻接你的目标受到一次远程攻击时，，你可以将来袭的武器（或投射物）击落以避免避免受到伤害。你使用自己最高的攻击加值进行一次近战借机攻击，如果你的攻击检定结果高于这次远程攻击检定的结果，该次攻击被挡下。你必须可以意识到这次攻击的发出，并且并未处于措手不及状态才能尝试挡下这次攻击。通常大型远程武器（例如巨石或弩炮巨矢）和法术效果造成的远程攻击无法被挡开。

资源出处: Weapon Masters Handbook pg. 22

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Cut%20from%20the%20Air

Cut Your Losses.name: Cut Your Losses
Cut Your Losses.description:
You realize that sometimes it's a safer bet to simply get out of danger's way as fast as possible. You are able to summon a surge of adrenaline when you grab what is most dear to you and run.

Prerequisites
Str 13, Acrobatics 1 rank.

Benefits
Whenever you withdraw as a full-round action and have at least one free hand, you can pick up one unattended object or unconscious ally of your size or smaller at any point during your movement without provoking attacks of opportunity. Any additional movement performed on your turn still provokes attacks of opportunity as normal.

In addition, you treat your Strength score as 2 higher for the purpose of determining your carrying capacity.

Cutting Humiliation.name: 刻薄羞辱 Cutting Humiliation
Cutting Humiliation.description:
你知道如何通过羞辱敌人来在她们的伤口上撒盐。

先决条件: 谈判专家，威吓5级。

专长效果: 当你在社交场合（social situation）成功使用语言上（verbal）的威吓检定挫败目标的士气，而非由于炫目技巧（Dazzling Display）或者胁迫者（Enforcer；APG）这样的能力做出威吓检定的话，你能够羞辱目标以取代挫败士气的效果，让目标在基于魅力的技能检定和魅力属性检定承受-2减值，持续时间为1小时 + 你的检定结果每超出DC5点便会额外增加1小时。目标能够花费10分钟整理心情让自己冷静下来，使得该效果提前被移除。若你在检定中失败，那么任何目击此次失败的生物都会免疫你使用该专长作出的羞辱，持续24小时。若失败了5点或更多的话，那么你本人则会变为受到羞辱的对象以取代目标，持续1小时。

资源出处: Ultimate Intrigue pg. 81

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Cutting%20Humiliation

Cypher Magic.name: 密文魔法 Cypher Magic
Cypher Magic.description:
你对符文与古代奥术之秘的熟悉教会了你从魔法文字中吸收强大力量的秘术。这些不同寻常的使用方法最初是由谜港城（Riddleport）的密文法师（Cyphermages）发明的，现在这些知识已经广泛传播至整个内海地区。

先决条件: 智力15，抄写卷轴。

专长效果: 当你使用卷轴施法时，视卷轴比其自身的施法者等级高1级。这种好处会延伸至你所制作的卷轴中。此外，如果你使用的卷轴的施法者等级比你自身的施法者等级高，那么你会在激活这个卷轴的施法者等级检定中获得+2加值。

资源出处: Adventurers Guide pg. 60Second Darkness Players Guide pg. 27Inner Sea World Guide pg. 284

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Cypher%20Magic

Cypher Script.name: 密文体 Cypher Script
Cypher Script.description:
通过研究冗长的古代奥术文献，你发现了一种方法，可以更为有效地记录法术。如同密文魔法专长，密文体最初是由谜港城（Riddleport）的密文法师（Cyphermages）发明的，现在这些知识已经广泛传播至整个内海地区。

先决条件: 知识（神秘）1级，语言学1级，法术辨识1级，法术书（spellbook）职业能力。

专长效果: 对于任何由你抄录到你的法术书上的法术，所需要的成本为正常的一半，并且只占用它通常所占用空间的一半（小数点后向上取整）。如此将法术抄录到你的法术书上，需要消耗的时间仅为每法术等级10分钟（戏法5分钟）。

资源出处: Adventurers Guide pg. 60Second Darkness Players Guide pg. 27Inner Sea World Guide pg. 284

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Cypher%20Script

Daggermark Lore.name: 匕痕毒经 Daggermark Lore
Daggermark Lore.description:
你在制毒者公会中学到的秘密可以让你做出比市面上销售的毒物更强烈的客制药剂——兼具可怕的杀伤力和顽固的持久性。

先决条件: 手艺（炼金术）技能5级，匕痕施毒者公会成员，调查员毒剂学识或用毒职业能力。

专长效果: 选择一种毒药，当你使用这种毒药时，它的豁免DC+1，使用法术中和毒素治疗它的DC+5，但成功的豁免检定仍然能解除毒素的效果。除此之外，如果你拥有毒剂学识职业能力，那么你在决定其他专长与能力的时候视为拥有用毒职业能力

资源出处: Advanced Class Origins pg. 26

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Daggermark%20Lore

Damned.name: 诅咒之人 Damned
Damned.description:
专长类型：Story

先决条件: 你必须与一位满足强大敌手定义的邪恶异界生物保持友好联系，或有如深渊或地狱等与魔物相关的术士血统，或具有魔族的直系先祖（如魔裔或半炼狱生物）；或拥有“魔族养子（Fiend Raised）”、“魔族契约（The Fiend）”等角色背景之一。

专长效果: 你对邪恶异界生物的基于魅力的技能检定+2，用以对抗它们的法术与类法术能力豁免DC+1。你对善良异界生物的基于魅力的技能检定-2。

专长目标: 成功将你的灵魂与一个邪恶异界生物达成交易。

完成收益: 你的一项属性获得+2增强加值。该增强加值由于神力介入而无法被解除或驱散，并被视为超自然能力。此外，你在对抗善良异界生物时的施法者等级检定+2（包括解除魔法时和击破法术抗力时）。如果你在与邪恶异界生物的契约成立时身亡，若无对方允许，你无法复活。若你撕毁以灵魂为代价的契约则将立即并永久失去此完成收益，但即时收益仍将保留。

资源出处: Quests and Campaigns pg. 8Ultimate Campaign pg. 67

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Damned

Damned Disciple.name: 罪恶使徒 Damned Disciple
Damned Disciple.description:
你的多样化的经历影响你的神恩选择。

先决条件: 魔族仪典（Fiendish Obedience）。

专长效果: 当你通过魔族仪典（Fiendish Obedience）专长获得神恩时，你能选择传音者（Evangelist）或颂教者（Exalted）神恩，但在选择后不能改变。此外，选择两个技能，你在此技能上获得+2亵渎加值。

资源出处: Book of the Damned pg. 178

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Damned%20Disciple

Damned Soldier.name: 罪恶尖兵 Damned Soldier
Damned Soldier.description:
你的神恩选择反映出你偏爱武艺。

先决条件: 魔族仪典。

专长效果: 当你通过魔族仪典（Fiendish Obedience）专长获得神恩时，你能选择卫道者（Sentinel）或颂教者（Exalted）神恩，但在选择后不能改变。此外，你在神祇偏好武器的伤害上获得+1亵渎加值。

资源出处: Book of the Damned pg. 178

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Damned%20Soldier

Dampen Presence.name: 淡化身形 Dampen Presence
Dampen Presence.description:
先决条件：技能专供（潜行），潜行技能5级

先决条件: 技能专供（潜行），潜行技能5级。

专长效果: 你可以用潜行技能避开任何想用盲视或盲感察觉你的生物，即使你已经完全进入那个生物的可察觉区域。该专长不提供对抗其他种类察觉方法的优势，例如灵敏嗅觉，视觉或震颤感知。

资源出处: Dungeoneers Handbook pg. 10

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Dampen%20Presence

Dance of Chains.name: 链舞 Dance of Chains
Dance of Chains.description:
专长类型：Combat

在你的手里，刺链能像活物一般舞动起来。

先决条件: 敏捷15，锁链熟稔，擅长异种武器（刺链），武器娴熟，表演（舞蹈）1级。

专长效果: 当单手持用一把刺链时，你可以以敏捷调整值代替力量调整值加到其武器伤害上。该刺链必须符合你的体型。在你的回合中，你刺链的触及视为多5尺。你在使用多武器进行战斗（fighting with multiple weapons）或使用盾牌（但不包括使用小圆盾）时会失去以上的好处。

资源出处: Book of the Damned pg. 178

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Dance%20of%20Chains

Dangerous Tail.name: 危险的尾 Dangerous Tail
Dangerous Tail.description:
专长类型：Combat

你已经把你的尾巴操练成了一种危险的武器，并且以致命的技巧挥动着它。

先决条件: 基本攻击加值+5，蜥蜴人。

专长效果: 你获得尾扫攻击。如果将其用于全回合攻击，此次攻击使用你的满基础攻击加值-5。如果尾扫命中，则造成1d4+1/2力量调整值（假设你是中体型生物）的伤害。如果你用尾扫命中目标切确认重击，你可以用一个自由动作对目标尝试一次摔绊战技。

资源出处: Monster Codex pg. 140

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Dangerous%20Tail

Daring Exploit.name: Daring Exploit
Daring Exploit.description:
Your determination allows you to accomplish great things, at a risk of great failure.

Prerequisites
Dare, deeds, or inspiration class ability.

Benefits
Once per day before using the derring-do deed, a dare, or a similar ability that allows you to roll a die and add the result to a d20 roll, you can roll the bonus die twice and take the higher result. If rolling a high result would allow you to roll the bonus dice additional times, you gain the benefits of this feat only on the first roll. You can use this feat one additional time per day for every 4 character levels you have.

Dark Affinity.name: Dark Affinity
Dark Affinity.description:
You have observed the dark stalkers who roam the Hao Jin Tapestry and adopted some of their tricks.

Prerequisites
Character level 3rd, must have visited the Hao Jin Tapestry.

Benefits
You can cast darkness once per day as a spell-like ability using your character level as your caster level. At 7th level, you can also cast deeper darkness once per day as a spell-like ability using your character level as your caster level.

Dark Sight.name: 黑暗视域 Dark Sight
Dark Sight.description:
通过进一步的增强，你的双眼甚至能够看透一定距离的魔法黑暗。

先决条件: 阴暗视域，窃影鬼。

专长效果: 你获得能够看透15尺范围内魔法黑暗的能力，比如‘深幽黑暗术’造成的黑暗。

资源出处: Advanced Race Guide pg. 111

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Dark%20Sight

Darkness Trick.name: 遮光戏法 Darkness Trick
Darkness Trick.description:
你能够操纵由魔法武器散发出的光芒。

先决条件: 使用魔法装置5级，施放黑暗术（Darkness）的能力。

专长效果: 当你持用1把会发光（sheds light）或者其特征为发光（luminescent）特质，比如炽焰（Flaming）或光能（Brilliant Energy）武器那样的话，你能够以迅捷动作（swift action）熄灭它产生的照明。你可以在任何时候以自由动作（free action）重新点燃它的光芒。任何会迫使武器发出光亮的内在魔法性质，比如炽焰武器的额外伤害，都不会在光芒被熄灭时生效，而且由于光能武器在常态下由光构成的“主要结构（significant portion）”会在熄灭时消失。

若受该能力影响的武器不再被你拥有（举例说明，比如武器从你手中掉落或者被传递给了其他生物），那么它的光芒以及相关能力会立刻恢复。

资源出处: Ultimate Intrigue pg. 81

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Darkness%20Trick

Darting Retrieval.name: Darting Retrieval
Darting Retrieval.description:
As your ally disarms a foe, you knock the disarmed item out of the way.

Prerequisites
Int 13, Combat Expertise, Improved Disarm.

Benefits
When an ally who also has this feat disarms an opponent and the disarmed item lands within your melee reach, as an immediate action you can move the disarmed item to another square within your melee reach. If you have at least one hand free and could carry the disarmed item, you can instead pick it up. Using this feat does not provoke an attack of opportunity.

Darting Viper.name: Darting Viper
Darting Viper.description:
When using a dorn-dergar, you can quickly attack both near and distant foes.

Prerequisites
Base attack bonus +4, proficiency with the dwarven dorn-dergar.

Benefits
You can change whether you're using the dorndergar as a normal or reach weapon as a swift action.

Normal
Changing whether a dorn-dergar is a normal or reach weapon is a move action.

Dastardly Finish.name: 慈悯终结 Dastardly Finish
Dastardly Finish.description:
专长类型：Combat

你能够趁着敌人虚弱的时候进行致命一击。

先决条件: 偷袭+5d6。

专长效果: 你能够对畏缩或者震慑的目标进行致命一击（coup de grace）。

通常状况: 你只能对无助的目标进行致命一击。

资源出处: Advanced Players Guide pg. 157

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Dastardly%20Finish

战策增益：如果花费10点耐力，你可以以一个全轮动作对攻击范围内的2个适合目标发动致命一击，但会引发两次借机攻击。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 116

Dastardly Finish (Mythic).name: 慈悯终结(神话) Dastardly Finish (Mythic)
Dastardly Finish (Mythic).description:
先决条件：慈悯终结

你能够对倒地、眩晕和恍惚的敌人进行致命地攻击。

神话专长效果：你能够对眩晕（dazed）以及恍惚（staggered）的非神话敌人执行致命一击（coup de grace）。此外，当任何生物尝试从你的致命一击中存活而进行强韧豁免时，它在该检定中会受到等同于你的阶层点减值。

资源出处: Mythic Adventures pg. 61

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Dastardly%20Finish

Dastardly Trick.name: 流氓剑 Dastardly Trick
Dastardly Trick.description:
专长类型：CombatPanache

你顺带问候对手祖宗三代的剑法使他面子上挂不住。

先决条件: 智力13，业余剑客ACG专长或派头ACG职业能力，寓守于攻；精通阴招APG。

专长效果: 当你发动一次阴招战技攻击时，通过消耗1点时髦值，如果战技攻击成功，你的对手就必须通过一个DC=10+你等级的一半+你的魅力调整值的意志检定，否则将无法移除因为阴招战技而承受的不良状态。

资源出处: Dirty Tactics Toolbox pg. 14

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Dastardly%20Trick

Dauntless Destiny.name: 无惧者皆天佑 Dauntless Destiny
Dauntless Destiny.description:
先决条件：魅力13，求知者皆无惧，威吓10级，人类。

先决条件: 魅力13，求知者皆无惧，威吓10级，人类。

专长效果: 你对抗带有〔情绪〕描述符的能力的豁免检定+1。这个加值与“求知者皆无惧”以及“无惧者皆自信”的奖励叠加。此外每天1次，当你攻击检定或者豁免自然骰出1时重骰。如果你重骰的结果使你的攻击命中或者豁免成功，你能以自由动作对你攻击的目标、或者使你进行豁免的生物进行一次威吓检定以挫败敌人士气，前提需要目标生物能够看到并听到你。

资源出处: Advanced Race Guide pg. 77

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Dauntless%20Destiny

Dawn's Blessing.name: Dawn's Blessing
Dawn's Blessing.description:
As a chosen of the Dawnflower, you are a beacon of hope to the faithful and a bane against the unrepentant.

Prerequisites
Ability to cast divine spells, sandkin half-orc, worshiper of Sarenrae.

Benefits
When casting divine spells in bright light, you can treat your caster level as 1 higher. In addition, your damaging spells with the fire or light descriptor deal one additional point of damage even outside areas of bright light.

Dazing Assault.name: 晕眩强袭 Dazing Assault
Dazing Assault.description:
专长类型：Combat

你那狂野的攻击能够使敌人晕眩。

先决条件: 力量13，猛力攻击，基本攻击加值+11。

专长效果: 你可以选择让所有近战攻击检定与战技检定承受-5减值，来使你在近战攻击在正常造成伤害之外，使命中的敌人晕眩1轮。成功的强韧豁免可以免受该效果，豁免DC为“10+你的BAB”。你必须在进行攻击检定之前选择是否使用该专长，它的效果会持续至你的下一轮为止。

资源出处: Advanced Players Guide pg. 157

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Dazing%20Assault

战策增益：如果花费5点耐力，你可以在一次近战命中敌人后尝试令对方眩晕，如同该专长的效果。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 116

Dazing Fist.name: 眩晕拳 Dazing Fist
Dazing Fist.description:
专长类型：Combat

你知道如何一拳将目标打懵的方法。

先决条件: 敏捷13，感知13，精通徒手击打，基础攻击加值+4。

专长效果: 你必须在投掷攻击骰之前宣告使用此专长（因此，未命中会导致尝试失败）。眩晕拳在正常造成伤害的同时，还会强制受到你徒手击打伤害的敌人进行一次DC=10+1/2你的角色等级+感知调整值的强韧豁免检定。豁免检定失败的防御者将眩晕1轮。每4级你每天可以多尝试一次眩晕攻击，每轮不能超过1次。构装、泥怪、植物、不死、虚体生物，无心智和免疫重击的生物不会被本能力影响。

资源出处: Advanced Class Guide pg. 144

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Dazing%20Fist

战策增益：如果花费5点耐力，你可以在命中后再宣布使用眩晕拳。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 116

Dazing Spell.name: 晕眩法术 Dazing Spell
Dazing Spell.description:
专长类型：Metamagic

你能够利用法术的力量来使生物晕眩。

专长效果: 你能够调整法术，使法术伤害的生物处于晕眩状态。当生物受到该法术的伤害后，会变得晕眩，持续的轮数等同于法术的原始环级。如果法术允许豁免，那么成功的豁免可以免受晕眩效果。如果法术无需豁免，目标则可以进行一次意志豁免来避免晕眩效果。如果法术效果本身可以使目标晕眩，那么这个超魔效果的持续时间与法术效果的持续时间叠加。晕眩法术占用比法术的实际环级高3环的法术位。无法造成伤害的法术无法从该专长获益。

资源出处: Advanced Players Guide pg. 157

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Dazing%20Spell

Dazzling Display (Mythic).name: 炫目技巧(神话) Dazzling Display (Mythic)
Dazzling Display (Mythic).description:
先决条件：炫目技巧

你能够利用自己娴熟的武艺快速喝阻他人。

神话专长效果：当你持用武器，并且具有与该武器相关的武器专攻专长（Weapon Focus）时，你能够以标准动作使用炫目技巧专长，不过威吓检定受到-5减值。以移动动作并受到-10减值使用炫目技巧专长，或者以迅捷动作使用并受到-20点减值。当你使用炫目技巧专长时，你能够花费1次神话之力，来使得那些被挫败士气影响的人惊惧（frightened）而非原本的战栗（shaken）。

资源出处: Mythic Adventures pg. 61

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Dazzling%20Display

Dead Inside.name: Dead Inside
Dead Inside.description:
You are devoid of both hatred and joy. While many regard you as callous, you have no particular malice in your heart.

Prerequisites
You must have failed your saving throws against at least five different emotion-manipulating spells or your saving throw against a supernatural creature's fear effect (such as a dragon's frightful presence), or you have the Sunless or Sole Survivor background.

Benefits
When you are the target of a spell or spell-like ability with the emotion or fear descriptor, you can roll your saving throw twice and take the better result.

Goal
You overcome your detached state by taking part in an important emotional event, such as finding true love or taking great pleasure in an act of unrepentant evil. Alternatively, you divest yourself of all emotion by severing your remaining emotional ties and eventually changing your alignment to neutral.

Completion Benefit
You master your emotions. You can ignore any morale bonuses or penalties applied to you by outside forces, though other emotion-based effects (such as the shaken condition or an elixir of love) still affect you if you fail a saving throw against them.

Deadhand Initiate.name: Deadhand Initiate
Deadhand Initiate.description:
Your adulation of death not only shields you from your fears, it allows you to feed on them.

Prerequisites
Wis 19, Deadhand Style x€ , Improved Unarmed Strike, Knowledge (religion) 6 ranks, ki pool class feature, nongood alignment.

Benefits
While using Deadhand Style, as long as you have at least 1 point in your ki pool, your bonus on saving throws against fear effects increases to +4, and the DC of Intimidate checks attempted against you increases by 8.

Additionally, if an enemy targets you with a fear effect, you can spend 1 point from your ki pool as an immediate action to gain a number of temporary hit points equal to twice your Hit Dice.

Deadhand Master.name: Deadhand Master
Deadhand Master.description:
Your death-infused punch drains life force from your foes.

Prerequisites
Wis 23, Deadhand Initiate, Deadhand Style, Improved Unarmed Strike, Knowledge (religion) 14 ranks, ki pool class feature, nongood alignment.

Benefits
While using Deadhand Style, when you damage a living creature with an unarmed strike, you can spend 2 points from your ki pool as a swift action to inflict 2 temporary negative levels on your enemy with no saving throw. Effects that reduce the ki cost also reduce the number of negative levels you inflict on your foe, but effects that increase the ki cost do not increase the number of negative levels you inflict. As long as the foe is affected by the temporary negative levels, you can't recover the ki points you spent, effectively reducing the size of your ki pool. The Fortitude save DC to remove the negative levels and prevent them from becoming permanent is equal to 10 + 1/2 your Hit Dice + your Wisdom modifier. Once the negative levels become permanent or the foe removes them, you can recover your spent ki points. If the foe dies before either happens, you can recover the spent ki after 24 hours.

Deadhand Style.name: Deadhand Style
Deadhand Style.description:
Your study of death allow you to exploit your foes' fears.

Prerequisites
Wis 15, Improved Unarmed Strike, Knowledge (religion) 4 ranks, ki pool class feature, nongood alignment.

Benefits
While using this style, if you have at least 1 point in your ki pool, you gain a +2 bonus on saves against fear effects, and the DC of Intimidate checks against you increases by 4. As a swift action, you can spend 1 point from your ki pool to empower your unarmed strikes. Creatures hit with your unarmed strikes must succeed at a Will save (DC = 10 + 1/2 your character level + your Wisdom modifier) or become shaken for a number of rounds equal to your Wisdom modifier. This is a mind-affecting fear effect.

Deadly Aim (Mythic).name: 致命瞄准(神话) Deadly Aim (Mythic)
Deadly Aim (Mythic).description:
先决条件：致命瞄准

你的瞄准准确而致命。

神话专长效果：当你使用致命瞄准专长时，你的远程伤害检定会获得+3加值，而非原本的+2加值。当你的基本攻击加值达到+4，以及之后每再增加4点时，远程伤害检定会增加+3加值而非原本的+2加值。

资源出处: Mythic Adventures pg. 61

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Deadly%20Aim

Deadly Dealer.name: 致命发牌 Deadly Dealer
Deadly Dealer.description:
你发牌的技巧和奥术天赋让你把普通的卡片变成致命武器。

先决条件: 奥术打击，巧手5级。

专长效果: 你可以把卡片当作飞镖来投掷，在考虑伤害、射程和其他特性时，将卡片视做飞镖。你必须使用奥术打击专长才能用这种方式投掷卡片，否则缺乏魔法力量和精度的卡片只会造成非致命伤害。把卡片当飞镖射出去会彻底毁掉卡片。

使用此专长发射哈罗牌时，哈罗牌被视为精致品武器，不过射出去之后仍然会损毁，只要一套牌里面有一张被拿去发射，这套哈罗牌就没办法再作为占卜工具使用了。

一个有此专长的奥术施法者可以把卡牌视为有54发弹药的远程武器赋予增强加值。增强加值只有在用致命发牌投掷卡片的时候才会有用，用其他的方式使用卡片时，赋予的增强加值不会有任何效果。只有拥有此专长的角色才能使用这些增强过的牌，而且仍须使用奥术打击专长来活化这些牌。

资源出处: The Harrow Handbook pg. 15Varisia, Birthplace of Legends pg. 10

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Deadly%20Dealer

Deadly Finish.name: 致命终结 Deadly Finish
Deadly Finish.description:
专长类型：Combat

你的攻击从不击倒对手——因为他们都直接死了。

先决条件: 基本攻击加值+11。

专长效果: 当你用近战攻击将你的敌人的生命值减少至-1或更低时，他必须进行一次DC为“15+最后一击伤害”的强韧检定，否则立刻死亡。

资源出处: Ultimate Combat pg. 94

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Deadly%20Finish

战策增益：花费2点耐力，你可以令目标的强韧检定必然成功。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 116

Deadly Grappler.name: 危险擒抱人 Deadly Grappler
Deadly Grappler.description:
专长类型：Combat

你在擒抱时，会变得更加凶险。

先决条件: 敏捷13，精通擒抱，精通徒手打击。

专长效果: 你可以运用擒抱者的重量来对付他。当你处于擒抱时（无论是主动还是被动），你对擒抱者进行的甲刺攻击、轻型或单手武器攻击、天武攻击、徒手攻击造成的伤害骰视为增大1级。

资源出处: Melee Tactics Toolbox pg. 14

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Deadly%20Grappler

Deadly Horns.name: 致命之角 Deadly Horns
Deadly Horns.description:
专长类型：Combat

许多魔裔（tiefling）生有的角是他们的魔族（fiendish）遗产的明显特征；你已经学会了使用你自己作为武器。

先决条件: BAB+1，魔裔（tiefling，又译提夫林或泰夫林）。

专长效果: 你获得了1个可以造成1d6点伤害的抵撞（gore）天生武器。由于这种攻击方式的尴尬，你不能进行抵撞（gore）攻击和其他天生武器攻击作为同一全回合攻击的一部分。若你以人造武器攻击作为全回合攻击行动的一部分，将你的抵撞（gore）攻击视为次要天生攻击。

资源出处: Book of the Damned pg. 178

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Deadly%20Horns

Deadly Kiss.name: Deadly Kiss
Deadly Kiss.description:
You can change your venom to poison those it touches.

Prerequisites
Toxic racial trait, vishkanya.

Benefits
As a swift action when applying your venom to a weapon or object, you can alter it to become a contact poison for 1d4 rounds. In its contact form, your venom has an onset time of 1 minute, and remains indistinguishable from your saliva or blood.

In addition, you can use your toxic racial trait one additional time per day.

Normal
Vishkanya venom is an injury poison.

Deadly Stroke (Mythic).name: 致命绝杀(神话) Deadly Stroke (Mythic)
Deadly Stroke (Mythic).description:
先决条件：致命绝杀

你能够一击杀敌。

神话专长效果：当你进行致命绝杀攻击时，能够花费1次神话之力来立即杀死一名非神话活物。一次强韧豁免（DC 10 + 你的基本攻击加值 + 你的阶层）能够避免该效果，不过攻击仍旧会如同致命绝杀原本的效果那样，造成双倍伤害与体质出血（Con bleed）。构装体（Constrts），泥形怪物（oozes）以及免疫重击或精准伤害的生物无法被该专长杀死。

资源出处: Mythic Adventures pg. 62

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Deadly%20Stroke

Deadly Trap.name: Deadly Trap
Deadly Trap.description:
Your traps are especially deadly, either through their increased accuracy or the viciousness of their blades and bludgeons.

Prerequisites
Craft (traps) 8 ranks, Survival 8 ranks.

Benefits
If you craft a trap that requires an attack roll to hit, you can either increase the threat multiplier of the trap by 1 ( x2 becomes x3, and so on) or grant the trap's attack a +4 bonus to confirm a critical hit.

Deadly Troupe.name: Deadly Troupe
Deadly Troupe.description:
You combine elements of dance and acting with your combat style to distract your enemies.

Prerequisites
Perform (act) or Perform (dance) 3 ranks, human (Varisian).

Benefits
When at least one ally who also has this feat is threatening a foe, you gain a +4 circumstance bonus against that foe on Bluff checks to feint, Bluff checks to create a diversion to hide, and Acrobatics checks to move through that foe's threatened squares. You also gain a +2 circumstance bonus on steal and dirty trick combat maneuver checks made against that foe.

Deafening Explosion.name: 炸弹轰鸣 Deafening Explosion
Deafening Explosion.description:
你的炸弹爆炸时发出震耳欲聋的声响。

先决条件: 【炼金炸弹】职业特性，大地精。

专长效果: 你可以让炼金炸弹的伤害降低1骰，使它获得将生物震聋的能力。使用此专长的炼金炸弹必须造成火焰、力场或音波伤害。被你的炸弹直接命中的生物必须进行一次等同于炼金炸弹DC的豁免检定，失败则会耳聋1分钟。这种致聋效果与炼金炸弹的所有其他效果相叠加。【译注：原文并没注明是何种豁免，不过耳聋一般都是强韧吧。】

资源出处: Advanced Race Guide pg. 124

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Deafening%20Explosion

Death Field.name: 死亡荒原 Death Field
Death Field.description:
专长类型：Conduit

你用负能量位面的致命力量创造了一个以你的活力为代价扼杀生命力量的领域

先决条件: 知识（位面）5级。

专长效果: 以一个移动动作，你可以从体内散发出致命的能量。当该专长生效时，小型植物会枯萎并从你身边退缩回去。允许你忽略植物造成的困难地形的影响，并且你忽略3环或更低环的植物相关的法术导致的纠缠状态的影响（本专长不能忽略3环以上的植物相关法术造成的影响）。

任何进入本专长影响范围的集群都会受到1d6点的负能量伤害；该伤害是在你受到该集群攻击之前造成的，所以如果此伤害足以摧毁该集群，那么集群不会对你造成任何有害效果。每回合结束时，由于本专长效果，你受到1点负能量伤害，当你处于本专长效果下，你无法被正能量效果治疗。可以防护负能量伤害的魔法物品和法术在这时不能防止这种伤害，但如果你是不死生物或具有负能量亲和特性（或类似的能力）时，本专长在生效时会给予快速治疗1。

你每天可以使用这个专长的轮数等于你的知识（位面）等级数，这些轮数不需要连续使用。如果你的知识（位面）等级是11级或更高，你能以一个迅捷动作启动本专长。

资源出处: Planar Adventures pg. 27

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Death%20Field

Death from Above.name: 殃云天降 Death from Above
Death from Above.description:
专长类型：Combat

你利用重力来额外增加你冲锋的力道。

专长效果: 每当你从更高的地形或飞行状态从更高处冲锋你的敌人时，你从居高临下和冲锋获得的攻击检定加值变为+5。编注:从+3变成+5。

资源出处: Ultimate Combat pg. 94

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Death%20from%20Above

战策增益：花费4点耐力，你从高处冲锋还能享受5点伤害加成。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 117

Death from Above (Mythic).name: 殃云天降(神话) Death from Above (Mythic)
Death from Above (Mythic).description:
先决条件：殃云天降

你从高处或空中进行的全力一击会造成致命的效果。

神话专长效果：每当你从高处，或者在飞行时从上方冲锋一名敌人时，你的武器的重击倍率增加2点（最高为x6）。这不会与任何其他增加武器重击倍率的能力叠加。若你的冲锋攻击命中，你能够以自由动作对攻击目标进行摔绊战技而不会引起借机攻击。

资源出处: Mythic Adventures pg. 62

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Death%20from%20Above

Death from Below.name: 矮处求生 Death from Below
Death from Below.description:
你能够使目标在对抗较大生物时的AC获得闪避加值。攻击者比受术者体型每大1级，获得的加值就能够提升1点，最高获得施法者等级的1/3。如果受术者为侏儒，那么最高获得的加值等同于施法者等级的一半。



资源出处: Advanced Race Guide pg. 39

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/SpellDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Death%20from%20Below

Death or Glory.name: 死而后生 Death or Glory
Death or Glory.description:
专长类型：Combat

即使面对巨大的敌人，你也会为了赢得最后胜利而无惧任何危险。

先决条件: 力量13，猛力攻击，基本攻击加值+6。

专长效果: 在面对一个大型或更大的生物时，你可以用整轮动作进行一次单次近战攻击，这次攻击的攻击检定、伤害和重击确认骰获得+4加值。这个加值在你的基本攻击加值达到+11、+16和+20时分别会增加1（最高在基本攻击加值+20时达到+7）。当你决定进行这次攻击，你攻击的目标可以用直觉动作用与你同样的加值对你进行一次单次攻击。

特殊说明: 你可以在这次整轮动作的攻击里应用“要害打击”、“精通要害打击”或“高等要害打击”专长。

资源出处: Ultimate Combat pg. 94

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Death%20or%20Glory

战策增益：花费5点耐力，你可在对方发动直觉反击时将其无效化。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 117

Death Roll.name: Death Roll
Death Roll.description:
Like an alligator, you twist and wrench your foe, forcing him to the ground.

Prerequisites
Bite attack, reptilian subtype.

Benefits
When grappling a foe of your size or smaller, you can attempt to perform a death roll. Upon a successful grapple combat maneuver check to deal damage with your bite attack, you can immediately attempt a second grapple combat maneuver check as a free action. If successful, you knock the target prone. Upon knocking the target prone, you must either release the grapple or fall prone and maintain the grapple. This doesn't count as a combat maneuver check to maintain the grapple, and doesn't add any other effects (such as constrict) beyond knocking the target prone.

Death's Host.name: Death's Host
Death's Host.description:
You become harder to kill when possessed by the undead.

Prerequisites
Spell Focus (necromancy).

Benefits
Whenever you are possessed by an undead creature that you do not directly control, you gain a +4 bonus on saving throws against death effects. You don't fall unconscious at negative hit points, and if you or the undead possessing you is forced to attempt a saving throw to resist ending the possession effect, you or your possessor gains a +4 bonus on the saving throw.

Death's Suitor.name: Death's Suitor
Death's Suitor.description:
You have died and returned so often that even Pharasma now deems it part of your fate.

Prerequisites
Risen Guard 20 TPA.

Benefits
Once per day, you may reroll a save or skill check if failure has a chance of killing you (whether from hit point damage, ability damage, or some instant effect). You must decide to use this ability before the results are revealed. You must take the second roll, even if it is worse.

Deathless Initiate.name: 亡命尖兵 Deathless Initiate
Deathless Initiate.description:
专长类型：Combat

对你来说，迫近的死亡只会唤起你的狂怒。

先决条件: 力量13，体质13，坚忍，顽强，兽人或半兽人，基本攻击加值+6。

专长效果: 你在使用“顽强”专长时不会陷入恍惚状态，不过每当你在一轮内同时进行一个移动和一个标准动作、或进行一次整轮动作，你都会受到1点伤害。同时，当“顽强”专长激活时，你的近战攻击检定和伤害骰都会获得+2加值。

资源出处: Ultimate Combat pg. 95

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Deathless%20Initiate

战策增益：花费2点耐力，你可免除在一轮内同时进行一个移动和一个标准动作、或进行一次整轮动作所造成的伤害。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 117

Deathless Master.name: 亡命勇士 Deathless Master
Deathless Master.description:
专长类型：Combat

即使受到严重的创伤，你也可以视若无睹的继续进行无情的突击。

先决条件: 力量13，体质15，亡命尖兵，坚忍，顽强，铁皮（Ironhide, APG），兽人或半兽人，基本攻击加值+9。

专长效果: 当你的生命值为0或更低时，你在行动时不会失去1点生命值。

资源出处: Ultimate Combat pg. 95

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Deathless%20Master

战策增益：当你HP低于0，你可以以标准动作花费2点耐力，来获得2点（……）临时HP，持续1分钟。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 117

Deathless Zealot.name: 亡命狂徒 Deathless Zealot
Deathless Zealot.description:
专长类型：Combat

只有最恐怖的伤势才能停下你的杀戮。

先决条件: 力量13，体质17，亡命尖兵，亡命勇士，坚忍，顽强，铁皮（Ironhide, APG），兽人或半兽人，基本攻击加值+12。

专长效果: 每当一个生物对你进行重击确认，它必须投两次骰并取低。

资源出处: Ultimate Combat pg. 95

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Deathless%20Zealot

战策增益：如果两次重击确认都不成功，花费5点耐力你可以发动一次借机攻击。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 117

Deceitful (Mythic).name: 诈欺师(神话) Deceitful (Mythic)
Deceitful (Mythic).description:
先决条件：诈欺师

说起误导他人的技术，无人能与你匹敌。

神话专长效果：诈欺师专长对唬骗与易容技能检定带来的加值增加2点。此外，你能够花费1次神话之力，使得1次唬骗或者易容检定就好像自然掷出20一般。你必须在进行检定之前决定使用该能力。

资源出处: Mythic Adventures pg. 62

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Deceitful

Deceitful Incompetence.name: Deceitful Incompetence
Deceitful Incompetence.description:
You learn from your mistakes rapidly when others lower their guard around you.

Prerequisites
Combat Reflexes.

Benefits
When you make an attack of opportunity in a single round after you have already made an unsuccessful attack of opportunity that round, you gain a cumulative +2 insight bonus on your attack roll for each unsuccessful attack of opportunity. For example, if you have made one unsuccessful attack of opportunity and an enemy provokes another attack of opportunity from you during that same round, you gain a +2 insight bonus on that attack roll, and if you have made two unsuccessful attacks of opportunity in a round and an enemy provokes another attack of opportunity from you during that same round, you gain a +4 insight bonus on that attack roll, and so on.

Deceptive Exchange.name: 欺诈交换 Deceptive Exchange
Deceptive Exchange.description:
即使是在激烈的战斗中，你也可以成功的欺骗对手并将东西塞到他手里。

先决条件: 智力13，寓守于攻，精通虚招。

专长效果: 如果你成功的对敌人使用了虚招，你可以选择不让他对你下一次攻击失去AC的敏捷加值，而是将你手里的一件东西塞给他。该敌人必须有肢体用于接取物品，而且必须有肢体是空闲状态才能接住物品。

特殊说明: 一个拥有〔定时炸弹（Delayed bomb, APG）〕科研发现的炼金术士可以用这个专长把定时炸弹塞给敌人。定时炸弹将在炼金术士行动结束时爆炸。如果炸弹在炼金术士行动结束时在一个生物手里，该生物将被视为被直接命中而无需其他检定。

资源出处: Ultimate Combat pg. 95

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Deceptive%20Exchange

Deconstruct Spell.name: Deconstruct Spell
Deconstruct Spell.description:
You deconstruct a spell into its constituent glyphs, storing them to replenish your crystalline dust.

Prerequisites
Improved Counterspell or ability to cast dispel magic or greater dispel magic, aphorite, crystalline dust racial trait.

Benefits
Once per day when you successfully counterspell or dispel a spell, you can instead deconstruct the spell to regain a number of rounds of your crystalline dust racial trait equal to half the level of the spell. You can't use this feat to gain more than your maximum number of rounds of your crystalline dust racial trait.

Decoy's Misdirection.name: Decoy's Misdirection
Decoy's Misdirection.description:
You can fool scrying attempts by using your familiar.

Prerequisites
Must have a familiar with the decoy archetype (see page 10).

Benefits
As long as your familiar is within 30 feet of you, anytime you succeed at a Will save to negate a scrying effect (including scrying and greater scrying), you become aware of the scrying attempt as though you succeeded at the Spellcraft check to identify it, and you can choose to let the spell function as normal instead of causing it to fail. If you do, you can choose to redirect the scrying effect toward your familiar, causing the familiar to immediately change shape (as its secret sharer spell-like ability, except the duration is as long as the scrying effect lasts). The creator of the scrying effect observes the familiar as though it were you, though spells such as detect magic detect the alter self effect as normal.

Dedicated Adversary.name: 业余宿敌 Dedicated Adversary
Dedicated Adversary.description:
专长类型：Combat

你有个十分讨厌的对手，为此你钻研过无数弄死它的计划。

先决条件: 在拥有宿敌（Favored Enemy）职业能力的职业上不拥有任何等级。

专长效果: 当选择这个专长时，同时选择一种特定的生物（如霜巨人，狼，地精，影魔，诸如此类），你在对抗该生物时获得游侠的宿敌职业能力的好处，宿敌加值为+2，但是本专长不会再作为先决条件时视为宿敌职业能力。如果你在选择本专长后获得了拥有宿敌能力的职业等级，那么你可以免费将本专长置换为一个你符合先决条件且先决条件要求宿敌职业能力的专长。

特殊说明: 你可以多次选择本专长，每次选择时，你必须选择另一种生物类型。

资源出处: Dirty Tactics Toolbox pg. 10

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Dedicated%20Adversary

Deep Breath.name: Deep Breath
Deep Breath.description:
You can hold your breath for twice as long.

Prerequisites
Constitution 15.

Benefits
You can hold your breath for twice as long as usual (4 rounds times your Constitution score instead of 2).

Deep Diver.name: Deep Diver
Deep Diver.description:
You are accustomed to diving deeper than most would dare swim and can do so with less risk of drowning than even other experienced swimmers.

Prerequisites
Endurance.

Benefits
You gain a +4 bonus on Acrobatics checks to reduce falling damage when diving into water and on Perception checks in dim light or darkness underwater. When attempting a Swim check to swim downward (at least 45 degrees down from the horizontal), on a successful check you can swim half your speed as a move action, or your speed as a full-round action. If you have a swim speed, it increases by 10 feet when you spend a move action to swim only downward.

In addition, you can hold your breath for a number of rounds equal to three times your Constitution score, and you gain a +4 bonus on Constitution checks to continue holding your breath after this time and to resist the effects of the cold environment underwater. Pressure damage you take from deep water is halved.

Deep Drinker.name: 豪饮 Deep Drinker
Deep Drinker.description:
你能够通过饮酒引出更多的真气。

先决条件: 体质13，武僧等级11，【醉酒】职业特性。【编注：【醉酒（Drunken Ki）】为醉拳大师（Drunken Master, APG武僧变体）3级能力。】。

专长效果: 当你通过【醉酒】职业特性获得临时气池储量时，你获得2点气来取代原本的1点。

资源出处: Advanced Players Guide pg. 157

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Deep%20Drinker

Deep Toxin.name: Deep Toxin
Deep Toxin.description:
You can deliver poisons deep into a foe's flesh.

Prerequisites
Vital Strike; base attack bonus +6; Craft (poison) 6 ranks or poison use class feature.

Benefits
When you use a poisoned weapon to make a Vital Strike, you increase the poison's duration by one frequency increment (for example, a dose of large scorpion venom would last for 7 rounds instead of 6 and a dose of drow poison would last for 3 minutes instead of 2). The poison takes effect immediately and does not have an onset time.

Deepsight.name: 增强视觉 Deepsight
Deepsight.description:
你的感官在完全的黑暗中格外敏锐。

先决条件: 黑暗视觉60尺。

专长效果: 你的黑暗视觉提升至120尺。

通常状况: 黑暗视觉通常只有60尺或90尺。

资源出处: Advanced Players Guide pg. 157

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Deepsight

Deepsight (Mythic).name: 增强视觉(神话) Deepsight (Mythic)
Deepsight (Mythic).description:
先决条件：增强视觉

你那敏锐的双眸能够看透深幽的黑暗，传达给你更多信息。

神话专长效果：你的黑暗视觉增加每阶层10尺。

资源出处: Mythic Adventures pg. 62

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Deepsight

Defended Movement.name: 谨慎移动 Defended Movement
Defended Movement.description:
专长类型：CombatShield Mastery

移动时你灵巧地使用盾牌格挡攻击。

先决条件: 盾牌专攻，BAB+6或者战士4级。

专长效果: 对抗借机攻击获得+2加值。

特殊情况：谨慎移动可视作闪避和灵活移动专长来满足需要其作为前置条件的专长。

资源出处: Armor Masters Handbook pg. 18

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Defended%20Movement

战策增益：你可以以一个直觉动作消耗3点耐力来在单次攻击上将你的AC加值提升到4。

战策资源出处: Armor Master's Handbook pg. 20

Defending Eidolon.name: 幻灵守护 Defending Eidolon
Defending Eidolon.description:
你训练你的幻灵保护你。

先决条件: 【幻灵护体】职业特性。

专长效果: 当你临近你的幻灵时，你可以选择幻灵在近战攻击和战技上获得-1的罚值，使你在AC上获得+1闪避加值。当你的幻灵的BAB达到+5并且之后每+5时，罚值再-1，并且闪避加值再+1。你必须在你的幻灵使用近战武器或天生武器，发动近战攻击或者全力攻击时选择使用这个专长，其效果持续到你幻灵的下个回合或者你和幻灵不再相邻，以先发生的为准。

资源出处: Ultimate Magic pg. 148

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Defending%20Eidolon

Defensive Combat Training (Mythic).name: 防御式战斗训练(神话) Defensive Combat Training (Mythic)
Defensive Combat Training (Mythic).description:
先决条件：防御式战斗训练

你在战斗中的防御技巧十分强大。

神话专长效果：将你的阶层的一半加到你的CMD上。

资源出处: Mythic Adventures pg. 63

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Defensive%20Combat%20Training

Defensive Weapon Training.name: 防御式武器训练 Defensive Weapon Training
Defensive Weapon Training.description:
专长类型：Combat

你知道在面对一种武器时如何保护自己。

先决条件: 智力13，基本攻击加值+5。

专长效果: 从战士【武器训练】列表的武器组（除了天生武器）中选择一种。在面对使用你选择的列表中的武器攻击你的敌人时，你的AC获得+2闪避加值。如果你同时拥有相同种类的【武器训练】能力，你的闪避加值增加至+3。

特殊说明: 你可以多次选择该专长。效果不会叠加，不过每次你都可以选择不同的武器组。
