战策增益：即使能力不满足前提（13智力），只要耐力池依然有1点耐力就可以使用该专长。如果你拽倒的CMB鉴定超过对方CMD 10点，只要花费5点耐力就可以立刻从倒地状态站起并不受借机攻击。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 118

Dragon Ferocity.name: 龙威 Dragon Ferocity
Dragon Ferocity.description:
专长类型：Combat

你以巨龙之力发动攻击，你的沉重打击令敌人恐惧不已。

先决条件: 力量15，精通徒手打击，龙形拳，震慑拳，特技5级。

专长效果: 你使用龙形拳流派架势时获得以下好处：你在徒手攻击上获得等于你力量修正一半的额外伤害，这会使你在每轮第一次发动徒手击打时在伤害上获得力量修正的2倍加值，接下来获得1.5倍力量加值；如果你造成重击或“震慑拳”成功，你可以令对手在“1d4+力量修正”轮内陷入颤栗状态。

特殊说明: 学会此专长让你视为满足“元素之拳（Elemental Fist, APG）”专长的先决条件，即使你并没有达到其原先要求。但在你满足“元素之拳”原有的先决条件之前，你只能选择一种元素伤害作为徒手打击的额外伤害。拥有此专长的武僧可以视为同等级修验僧（Monk of the Four Winds, APG）使用“元素之拳”专长（即可以每5级+1d6元素伤害）。

资源出处: Ultimate Combat pg. 98

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Dragon%20Ferocity

战策增益：在令对方陷入颤栗状态时花费5点耐力，还能领目标恶心1d4轮。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 118

Dragon Gold Crown.name: Dragon Gold Crown
Dragon Gold Crown.description:
Inspired by tales of First Emperor Taldaris pulling the gold from the gullet of the terrible dragon Verksaris to forge the Primogen Crown, you have learned to fashion potent headgear from the remains of magical creatures you defeat.

Prerequisites
Knowledge (arcana) 5 ranks, Survival 5 ranks.

Benefits
You can use the remains of a dragon or magical beast that you helped to defeat to craft a crown, as if you were harvesting and creating a trophy (Pathfinder RPG Ultimate Wilderness 162). If you successfully create the trophy, it has no monetary value but it functions for you as a headband of alluring charisma. The bonus the trophy provides to you is based on the creature's base CR (not including class levels) or your character level at the time the crown was created, whichever is lower: +2 at CR 5 or 5th level, +4 at CR 10 or 10th level, and +6 at CR 15 or 15th level.

Dragon Roar.name: 龙吼 Dragon Roar
Dragon Roar.description:
专长类型：Combat

你体内潜藏的龙魂以响彻天际的咆哮轰散开去。

先决条件: 力量15，精通徒手打击，龙形拳，震慑拳，特技8级。

专长效果: 你获得1次“震慑拳”额外每日使用次数。当你使用龙拳流派架势时，消耗2发“震慑拳”，你可以用标准动作进行龙吼，15尺锥状范围内的敌人受到你徒手击打的伤害，并在1d4轮内颤栗。通过DC为“10+1/2角色等级+感知修正”的意志豁免则所受伤害减半，且不会颤栗。

特殊说明: 如果你有“元素之拳”专长，耗费1发元素之拳，你可以对锥状范围内的生物造成你元素之拳的伤害。这种伤害无法通过成功豁免减半。

资源出处: Ultimate Combat pg. 98

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Dragon%20Roar

战策增益：除了花费2次震慑拳次数，你可以用一次震慑拳和5点耐力来发动龙吼。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 118

Dragon Shot.name: Dragon Shot
Dragon Shot.description:
You instinctively channel your latent magical abilities through your firearm.

Prerequisites
Amateur Gunslinger feat or grit class feature, Spellcraft 5 ranks.

Benefits
As a swift action, you can spend 1 grit point to convert your gun's damage into acid, fire, electricity, or cold damage for 1 round. You can choose a different damage type each time you use this ability. This still counts as a ranged weapon attack for critical hit multipliers and abilities such as Deadly Aim.

Dragon Style.name: 龙形拳 Dragon Style
Dragon Style.description:
专长类型：CombatStyle

你呼唤龙族之灵，从这些伟大存在中获得了巨大的韧性、机敏和狂烈。

先决条件: 力量15，精通徒手打击，特技3级。

专长效果: 你启用龙拳流派架势时，你对抗睡眠，麻痹与震慑效果的豁免有+2加值。你在冲锋，奔跑或撤退时无视困难地形。你可以越过同伴占据的方格进行冲锋。而且你在1轮中第一次徒手打击的伤害加值使用1.5倍力量修正。

通常状况: 你无法在困难地形或穿越同伴占据的方格进行冲锋。你的徒手击打的伤害加值使用你的力量修正。

资源出处: Ultimate Combat pg. 98

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Dragon%20Style

战策增益：在每轮第二次及以后的徒手打击中，每花费3点耐力就可以使一次攻击享受1.5倍力量修正。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 118

Dragon-Touched.name: Dragon-Touched
Dragon-Touched.description:
Your life has been shaped by an encounter with a powerful dragon, and you have dedicated your life to seeing that dragon dead.

Prerequisites
You must have been knocked unconscious in an encounter with a challenging draconic foe or have a regional background tied to a specific dragon (such as those presented in this section or a similar trait).

Benefits
Choose one kind of dragon (such as blue, green, or silver). You gain a +2 bonus on Reflex saves against the breath weapons of dragons of the chosen kind, as well as a +1 bonus on attack rolls and a +1 dodge bonus to AC against members of the same dragon kind.

Goal
Defeat the specific dragon linked to your prerequisite.

Completion Benefit
You gain the ability to select a new dragon kind whenever you wish. You must first defeat a member of the selected kind with a CR equal to or greater than your character level. In addition, you gain a +2 bonus on initiative checks when facing a dragon of your selected kind.

Dragonbane Aura.name: 屠龙灵光 Dragonbane Aura
Dragonbane Aura.description:
在屠龙灵光范围内的同伴获得与你相同的保护。

先决条件: 【勇气灵光】职业特性，施法者等级8级。

专长效果: 当和龙战斗时，你的勇气灵光范围变成20尺半径弥漫，灵光范围内的同伴在对抗龙息的豁免骰上获得士气加值，数值等同于你勇气灵光在对抗恐惧时的加值。

通常状况: 勇气灵光的范围是10尺半径弥漫，并且在对抗恐惧时的豁免检定上提供+4士气加值。

资源出处: Ultimate Magic pg. 149

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Dragonbane%20Aura

Dragoncrafting.name: Dragoncrafting
Dragoncrafting.description:
You have the ability to create rare and valuable items from the bodies of fallen true dragons.

Prerequisites
Craft (any) 5 ranks, Knowledge (arcana) 3 ranks.

Benefits
You gain the ability to create a variety of dragoncraft items from materials gathered from the bodies of true dragons (not lesser dragons, such as linnorms or wyverns). Crafting dragoncraft items takes 1 hour per 100 gp of items being produced. In order to gather specimens from a dragon's corpse, you must succeed at a Heal check equal to 10 + the dragon's CR within 48 hours of the dragon's death (unless the body is preserved in some way). Refer to the table below to determine how much of a given material can be harvested from a dragon based on its size.

Dragon SizeBloodStomach AcidGallMuskSkin
Tiny2 vials1 vial1 vial--1 grip
Small3 vials1 vial1 vial1 vial2 grips
Medium4 vials2 vials2 vials1 vial2 grips
Large5 vials2 vials2 vials2 vials2 grips
Huge6 vials3 vials2 vials2 vials3 grips
Gargantuan7 vials3 vials3 vials3 vials3 grips
Colossal8 vials4 vials3 vials3 vials3 grips


Special
Normally, if a suit of dragonhide armor has energy immunity, one may enhance such a suit with additional energy protection for the wearer at a 25% reduced cost. However, only effects with the same elemental type as the armor's immunity are eligible for this discount. An artisan with the Dragoncrafting feat may add 1 additional elemental protection to a suit of dragonhide armor at the same 25% discount, even if this energy resistance is not normally associated with the type of dragonhide being used.

Dragonflight Flight.name: Dragonflight Flight
Dragonflight Flight.description:
You can fly short distances through the air.

Prerequisites
Dex 15, Wis 15, Dragonfly Style, Dragonfly Wings, Improved Unarmed Strike, Acrobatics 10 ranks, Climb 10 ranks.

Benefits
While using Dragonfly Style, you can attempt an Acrobatics check to high jump as a move action, and then immediately glide as the spell for 1 round. If you have not used your standard action after using Dragonfly Flight to make a high jump and start gliding, you can charge while gliding. This charge follows the rules for charging when you are only able to take a standard action.

Dragonfly Style.name: Dragonfly Style
Dragonfly Style.description:
You can leap off walls and objects to strike from above.

Prerequisites
Wis 13, Improved Unarmed Strike, Acrobatics 2 ranks, Climb 2 ranks.

Benefits
You add your Wisdom modifier to Acrobatics checks in addition to your Dexterity modifier. While using this style, when you are adjacent to a vertical surface or object capable of supporting your weight, such as a wall or a tree, you gain a +1 bonus on melee attack rolls against opponents your size or smaller, as if you were on higher ground.

Dragonfly Wings.name: Dragonfly Wings
Dragonfly Wings.description:
You can jump off willing allies and unwilling opponents to attack creatures from above.

Prerequisites
Dex 15, Wis 15, Dragonfly Style, Improved Unarmed Strike, Acrobatics 5 ranks, Climb 5 ranks.

Benefits
While using Dragonfly Style, the bonus on your melee attacks increases to +2 and applies to opponents up to two size categories larger than you. In addition, you can substitute a creature your size or larger in place of a vertical surface. You can freely use a willing creature in such a manner, but using a hostile creature requires a successful Acrobatics check with a DC equal to the creature's CMD. If you fail this check by 5 or more, you provoke an attack of opportunity from the hostile creature.

Dragonheart.name: Dragonheart
Dragonheart.description:
Your familiarity with dragonkind makes you less susceptible to their abilities.

Prerequisites
Knowledge (arcana) 1 rank.

Benefits
You gain a +1 bonus on all saving throws against auras, breath weapons, spell-like abilities, spells, supernatural abilities, and other special attacks of creatures with the dragon type.

Dragonslayer.name: Dragonslayer
Dragonslayer.description:
You have been trained to fight dragons.

Prerequisites
Knowledge (arcana) 4 ranks, base attack bonus +4.

Benefits
Whenever you confirm a critical hit against an opponent that has a breath weapon, you can forgo the extra critical damage to instead prevent your foe from using its breath weapon for a number of rounds equal to twice the critical multiplier of your attack, in addition to any normal delay mentioned in the breath weapon effect's description.

Draining Strike.name: 取力拳 Draining Strike
Draining Strike.description:
专长类型：Combat

你巧妙的一击命中对手的秘孔，使他全身疲软

先决条件: 敏捷13，感知13，精通徒手击打，基础攻击加值+8。

专长效果: 你必须在投掷攻击骰之前宣告使用此专长（因此，未命中会导致尝试失败）。取力拳在正常造成伤害的同时，还会强制受到你徒手击打伤害的敌人进行一次DC=10+1/2你的角色等级+感知调整值的强韧豁免检定。豁免检定失败的防御者将疲乏1分钟或直到受到任何治疗生命值伤害的法术、效果为止；如果你拥有+14或更高的基础攻击加值，那么目标会在同样的时间中陷入力竭而非疲乏。每4级你每天可以多尝试一次取力攻击，每轮不能超过1次。构装、泥怪、植物、不死、虚体生物和免疫重击的生物不会被本治疗影响。

资源出处: Advanced Class Guide pg. 144

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Draining%20Strike

战策增益：花费5点耐力就可以在命中后再宣告使用该专长。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 118

Dramatic Display.name: 精彩武技 Dramatic Display
Dramatic Display.description:
专长类型：CombatPerformance

你对武器的掌握技巧同时展现给对手和在场观众。

先决条件: 炫目技巧。

专长效果: 当你以迅捷动作进行演武检定时，技巧令人叹为观止。你的演武检定+2，并在下轮结束前的所有攻击和战技检定都获得+2加值。

资源出处: Ultimate Combat pg. 98

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Dramatic%20Display

战策增益：使用该专长时花费5点耐力就还能获得2点躲避AC直至你下一轮。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 118

Dramatic Slam.name: Dramatic Slam
Dramatic Slam.description:
Your brutal maneuvers shock any who would dare to stand against you.

Prerequisites
Dazzling Display, Improved Grapple, Improved Unarmed Strike, Savage Slam, Weapon Focus, base attack bonus +9 or monk level 6th.

Benefits
While you are using Savage Slam, if you succeed at your grapple combat maneuver check to knock the opponent prone, you can spend a swift action to attempt an Intimidate check to demoralize foes within 30 feet who could see your attack.

Dreadful Carnage.name: 惧栗屠杀 Dreadful Carnage
Dreadful Carnage.description:
专长类型：Combat

杀死敌人能够挫败附近其他敌人的士气。

先决条件: 力量15，猛力攻击，沉着暴怒，基本攻击加值+11。

专长效果: 当你将一名敌人的HP降至0或更低时，你能够以自由动作对30尺内的所有敌人进行一次威吓检定以挫败士气。若敌人无法同时看到你和HP被你降至0或更低的敌人，则不受影响。

资源出处: Advanced Players Guide pg. 158

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Dreadful%20Carnage

战策增益：使用该专长时可选择花费最多6点耐力，每点耐力令挫败士气的范围扩展5尺。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 118

Dreadful Carnage (Mythic).name: 惧栗屠杀(神话) Dreadful Carnage (Mythic)
Dreadful Carnage (Mythic).description:
先决条件：惧栗屠杀

你那肆意杀戮的身影会让目击者心惊胆寒。

神话专长效果：当你使用惧栗屠杀专长时，除了对所有30尺内的敌人产生影响外，你还能够影响60尺内的非神话敌人。在使用惧栗屠杀专长进行威吓检定以挫败敌人的士气时，你能够花费1次神话之力，使敌人惊惧（frightened）而非原本的战栗（shaken），持续时间与正常的战栗效果一样。当敌人被该能力惊惧时，敌人的攻击检定、豁免检定、技能检定与属性检定受到等同于你的阶层的减值。

资源出处: Mythic Adventures pg. 63

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Dreadful%20Carnage

Dreamed Secrets.name: 怪异梦景 Dreamed Secrets
Dreamed Secrets.description:
先决条件：能够施放神术，拥有7个施法者等级，信仰旧日支配者或者外神

先决条件: 能够施放神术，拥有7个施法者等级，信仰旧日支配者或者外神。

专长效果: 每夜休息时，你可以从法师法师列表中选择2个法术，如果你是一个自发施法者，你可以视为在接下来24小时内知晓这些法术；如果你是准备施法者，那么你可以在24小时内准备这些法术。这两个法师法术必须至少比你能施放的最高神术环数低1环。在施放这两个法术时，你必须通过一个DC20的意志检定，否则将施法失败并受到1d2感知伤害，但你不会失去这个法术。

资源出处: Inner Sea Gods pg. 211

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Dreamed%20Secrets

Dreamwalker.name: Dreamwalker
Dreamwalker.description:
Your dreams are as vivid as your waking hours, and you can slip into a dreamlike state with no effort.

Prerequisites
Cha 17, Lucid Dreamer, Practiced Dreamer, Knowledge (planes) 10 ranks.

Benefits
Your experience in the Dimension of Dreams allows you to enter the demiplane with ease. You no longer have to attempt a Charisma check when entering the Dimension of Dreams to determine whether or not you are at a disadvantage, instead automatically arriving unhindered.

Drinking Buddy.name: Drinking Buddy
Drinking Buddy.description:
You and your allies have almost preternatural luck when you've all had a few drinks

Benefits
Once per day, if you are drunk (or worse) within 10 feet of an ally who has this feat and is also drunk (or worse), you can reroll one d20 roll as a free action. You must take the result of the second roll, even if it is worse.

Drow Nobility.name: 卓尔贵族 Drow Nobility
Drow Nobility.description:
你的血液中流淌着力量，而你从中获益的更多。

先决条件: 能够使用卓尔的类法术能力，卓尔。

专长效果: 你可以随意以类法术能力使用‘侦测魔法’，并且每日能以类法术能力使用‘羽落术’与‘浮空术’各1次。你的CL等同于你的角色等级。

资源出处: Advanced Race Guide pg. 105

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Drow%20Nobility

Drow Spirit.name: Drow Spirit
Drow Spirit.description:
Although you are of mixed heritage, the magic of your drow relatives flows freely through your veins.

Prerequisites
Half-elf.

Benefits
You gain the ability to cast dancing lights, darkness, and faerie fire each once per day as a spell-like ability. You use your character level as your caster level for these abilities. Alternatively, you can instead gain any one racial trait that elves can exchange for the elven magic racial trait.

Special
You can take this feat only at 1st level. If you take this feat, you cannot take the Human Spirit or Elven Spirit feat.

Druidic Decoder.name: 密语解码 Druidic Decoder
Druidic Decoder.description:
你与生俱来可以理解德鲁伊语。

先决条件: 语言学1级，且不是德鲁伊。

专长效果: 你在解读以德鲁伊语写成的密文时，语言学检定获得+5加值。如果你在语言学拥有10个技能等级，将德鲁伊语添加到可学习语言列表。

资源出处: Faiths and Philosophies pg. 11

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Druidic%20Decoder

Drunkard's Recovery.name: 酒鬼的坚毅 Drunkard's Recovery
Drunkard's Recovery.description:
把你从死亡边缘带回这个世界，只需要一口烈酒。

先决条件: 体质 13。

专长效果: 若你正处于濒死（dying），只要有生物给你喝下至少1口酒（a sip of alcohol）的话（对相邻的生物来说是标准动作），你的伤势便会立即稳定（immediately stabilize）。

资源出处: Ultimate Intrigue pg. 82

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Drunkard's%20Recovery

Drunken Brawler.name: 酩酊侠 Drunken Brawler
Drunken Brawler.description:
专长类型：Combat

先决条件：坚忍，信仰凯登·凯利恩

先决条件: 坚忍，信仰凯登·凯利恩。

专长效果: 当你在饮用了一大杯麦酒或是其他的烈性酒后，你在反射豁免检定上承受-2减值，但与此同时你将获得相当于你人物等级的临时生命值以及在强韧和意志检定上+2炼金加值。该效果持续一小时或是你获得的临时生命值全部消耗完毕为止——取其先者。无论如何，该效果带来的减值将持续一整个小时。

资源出处: Inner Sea Gods pg. 211Faiths of Purity pg. 24

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Drunken%20Brawler

Drunken God's Blessings.name: Drunken God's Blessings
Drunken God's Blessings.description:
Cayden Cailean smiles upon you when you visit his most favored temples: taverns.

Prerequisites
Worshiper of Cayden Cailean.

Benefits
When you have had at least a number of drinks equal to your Constitution modifier (or get drunk or soused, if you are using the rules on pages 54-55) in a tavern, once within the following 24 hours, you can gain the benefits of remove paralysis as a free action. Alternatively, you can choose one of the following benefits depending on the type of bar you patronized. (The specific taverns detailed in this book are given in parentheses as examples.) At the GM's discretion, other types of taverns might grant other benefits.

Gambling Den (Whispering Stone)
You can gain the benefits of detect thoughts for 1 minute as a free action.

Illegal Tavern (Runoff)
You can gain the benefits of invisibility for 1 minute as a free action.

Posh Tavern (Aeylinth Vineyard)
You can gain the benefits of eagle's splendor for 1 minute as a free action.

Private Club (The Porthmos Club)
You can gain the benefits of undetectable alignment for 1 minute as a free action.

Rowdy Bar (Formidably Maid)
You can gain the benefits of bear's endurance for 1 minute as a free action.

Tavern of Intrigue (The Wicked Fork)
You can gain the benefits of fox's cunning for 1 minute as a free action.

Drunken Sing-Along.name: Drunken Sing-Along
Drunken Sing-Along.description:
With a raised tankard and catchy tune, you can get large groups of people on your side.

Prerequisites
Diplomacy 1 rank, Performance (sing) 1 rank.

Benefits
While in a tavern or other drinking establishment, you can change the attitude of the patrons from unfriendly to indifferent or from indifferent to friendly by spending 10 minutes engaging in a group sing-along. For the following 24 hours, your attempts to gather information in that tavern take only 2d6 minutes if the patrons are indifferent or 1d4 minutes if the patrons are friendly. You must be able to speak the same language as the majority of the patrons to use this feat.

Special
You can use this feat with a large crowd of people outside of a tavern if you supply at least 5 gp worth of alcohol to the group.

Dryad's Apprentice.name: Dryad's Apprentice
Dryad's Apprentice.description:
You have learned secrets of woodworking from dryads.

Prerequisites
Cha 13, gathlain.

Benefits
You can cast wood shape as a spell-like ability at will, but only on a piece of wood no larger than 1 pound. You gain a +4 bonus on Craft checks involving wood, and you are always treated as if you had masterwork artisan's woodworking tools when attempting such checks.

Dryad's Attendant.name: Dryad's Attendant
Dryad's Attendant.description:
Dryads trust you to bear their power and their bond.

Prerequisites
Cha 15, Dryad's Apprentice, character level 9th, gathlain.

Benefits
You can cast meld into stone as a spell-like ability once per day with a caster level equal to your character level, except that you instead meld with wood. You can remain melded with the wood for up to 24 hours. If you meld with a dryad's bonded tree, the dryad can treat you as her bonded tree for a number of days equal to your Charisma modifier (minimum 1) after you leave it; the dryad retains her bond to her tree during this time as well.

Dual Enhancement.name: 双武祝圣 Dual Enhancement
Dual Enhancement.description:
你可以将神圣之力同时施加在两件你中意的武器或是它的两头上

先决条件: 双武器格斗，圣武士神契（武器）或战斗祭司神圣武器职业能力。

专长效果: 当你使用神契或神圣武器加强自己的武器时，你可以同时加强两件武器或双头武器的两头。你必须同时手持这些武器。通过这些能力获得的武器增强加值将同时作用于两把武器，但你必须把它们分配到不同的武器上。举例来说，你的神圣武器如果能提供+3增强加值，那么你可以将主手的武器分配+2，而副手分配+1。

资源出处: Advanced Class Guide pg. 145

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Dual%20Enhancement

Duck and Cover.name: 庇护 Duck and Cover
Duck and Cover.description:
专长类型：Teamwork

你的盟友能够帮助你免受一些攻击。

专长效果: 当与你相邻的盟友也具有该专长，并且你们两人都需要进行反射豁免对抗一个法术或效果时，你可以选择使用你的或者盟友的掷骰结果（无论你选择哪个结果，你的修正仍旧应用于这个检定）。如果你使用你的盟友的结果，那么你会被击倒（若你已经倒地或者无法被倒地，则会在你的下一轮之前处于恍惚状态）。此外，只要你的盟友持用盾牌，你的AC在对抗远程攻击时就会获得+2掩蔽加值。

资源出处: Advanced Players Guide pg. 158

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Duck%20and%20Cover

Dueling Cape Deed.name: 斗篷与匕首 Dueling Cape Deed
Dueling Cape Deed.description:
专长类型：CombatPanache

将一副斗篷披挂在副手，你依靠它在战斗中的上下翻飞来迷惑你的敌人，甚至缠裹住他们。

先决条件: 闪避，手上功夫技能1级。

专长效果: 以一个移动动作，你可以将一副斗篷持握在手上（或是移除它），如同你使用小圆盾。如果你使用斗篷来防卫，每当敌人在近战攻击你时失手，你都可以消耗1点时髦值，把手上的斗篷罩到对方身上使其陷入纠缠状态。对方必须使用一个整轮动作来解开斗篷或是将其撕碎才能脱身。一副典型的斗篷具有3点生命值，1点硬度。任何制式和长度的斗篷，比如剑客的短斗篷或披风都可以被用来防御。

资源出处: Advanced Class Guide pg. 145

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Dueling%20Cape%20Deed

战策增益：令目标陷入纠缠时你可以选择花费5点耐力而非一点派头。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 118

Duelist of the Roaring Falls.name: 怒流剑式 Duelist of the Roaring Falls
Duelist of the Roaring Falls.description:
专长类型：Combat

你学会了奥多里剑术中的怒流剑式，这招以优雅而势不可挡的攻击而闻名。

先决条件: 奥多里剑斗学徒，擅长异种武器（奥多里决斗剑），武器娴熟，武器专攻（奥多里决斗剑），基本攻击加值+5。

专长效果: 当你对战栗（shaken）、惊惧（frightened）或恐慌（panicked）的敌人造成伤害时，你能够将你的敏捷加值加到伤害检定上，以取代你的力量加值。你无法在双手持握时将1.5倍的敏捷加值应用至伤害检定。若你已经能够将敏捷加值加到伤害检定上，那么作为替代，你在使用奥多里决斗剑时伤害检定会获得+1表现加值。当你尝试在决斗中进行决斗格挡（dueling parry）时，格挡对攻击检定造成的减值从-5点降低至-3点。你只有在持握奥多里决斗剑（没有使用盾牌、副手武器、甲刺、徒手打击或天生武器）的时候才能获得这些好处。

资源出处: Adventurers Guide pg. 25Inner Sea Combat pg. 10

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Duelist%20of%20the%20Roaring%20Falls

战策增益：当你用奥多里决斗剑使用近战攻击命中了一名敌人时，你可以消耗4点耐力来在决定获得怒流剑式的加值时将该敌人视为战栗，这个效果持续到你的下一回合开始。

战策资源出处: Weapon Master's Handbook pg. 24

Duelist of the Shrouded Lake.name: 雾池剑式 Duelist of the Shrouded Lake
Duelist of the Shrouded Lake.description:
专长类型：Combat

你学会了奥多里剑术中的雾池剑式，这招以迂回而诡诈的步伐而闻名。

先决条件: 奥多里剑斗学徒，擅长异种武器（奥多里决斗剑），武器娴熟，武器专攻（奥多里决斗剑），基本攻击加值+5。

专长效果: 当你尝试对敌人进行冲撞（bull rush）或移位（reposition）战技时，你的战技检定获得+1洞察加值，并且AC在对抗你所引起的借机攻击时获得+4闪避加值。此外，你在对抗冲撞或移位战技的尝试时，CMD获得+1洞察加值。当你尝试在决斗中进行决斗闪避（dueling dodge）时，你在AC上获得的加值增加至+6点。你只有在持握奥多里决斗剑（没有使用盾牌、副手武器、甲刺、徒手打击或天生武器）的时候才能获得这些好处。

资源出处: Adventurers Guide pg. 25Inner Sea Combat pg. 10

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Duelist%20of%20the%20Shrouded%20Lake

战策增益：当你在使用奥多里决斗剑尝试战技检定时，通过消耗5点耐力，你在对抗该目标的AC上获得+4加值，直到你的下一回合开始。

战策资源出处: Weapon Master's Handbook pg. 24

Dwarf Blooded.name: 矮人血脉 Dwarf Blooded
Dwarf Blooded.description:
你的血管中流淌着矮人的血脉。

先决条件: 土元素裔。

专长效果: 矮人血统在你身上以两种方式体现。首先，你的速度不会受到盔甲和负重影响，就如同矮人的【慢而稳】种族特性一般。其次，你获得矮人的【岩石敏锐】种族特性。

【特性速查】慢而稳（Slow and Steady）：矮人拥有20尺基本速度，但是其速度不会受到负重以及盔甲影响。

【特性速查】岩石敏锐（Stonecunning）：矮人在察觉异常的石制造物（比如石墙与石制地板中隐藏的陷阱与密门）时，察觉检定+2。当他们在这些石制造物10尺范围内时，就可以进行检定，无论他们是否在主动搜索。

资源出处: Advanced Race Guide pg. 147

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Dwarf%20Blooded

Dwarven Fury.name: 矮人气到炸 Dwarven Fury
Dwarven Fury.description:
专长类型：Combat

你能够引导自身的恨意，并利用它来对抗大量的敌人。

先决条件: 矮人恨意流，矮人怒如火，基本攻击加值+7，防御训练与仇恨种族特性，中等体型。

专长效果: 当你使用矮人怒如火时，你能够同时维持防御训练与仇恨种族特性带来的奖励，并且可以用于对抗任意数量的敌人。

资源出处: Weapon Masters Handbook pg. 12

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Dwarven%20Fury

Dwarven Hatred Style.name: 矮人恨意流 Dwarven Hatred Style
Dwarven Hatred Style.description:
专长类型：CombatStyle

你将仇恨转化为一腔怒火。

先决条件: 基本攻击加值+1，防御训练（Defensive Training）与仇恨（Hatred）种族特性，中等体型（Medium size）。

专长效果: 在对抗合适的种族或亚种时，你能够将仇恨种族特性的加值同时加到攻击检定和武器伤害检定上，而且这些加值提升至+2点。

资源出处: Weapon Masters Handbook pg. 12

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Dwarven%20Hatred%20Style

Dwarven Seething.name: 矮人怒如火 Dwarven Seething
Dwarven Seething.description:
专长类型：Combat

是仇恨驱使着你挥舞着手中的武器。

先决条件: 矮人恨意流，基本攻击加值+5，防御训练与仇恨种族特性，中等体型。

专长效果: 当你使用矮人恨意流时，若有一名敌人以一次攻击命中你（包括需要进行攻击检定的法术），你便能够以直觉动作，来使用防御训练或仇恨种族特性的加值（由你选择）对抗该目标，无论敌人的种族类型或亚种为何。该能力持续至敌人死亡、战斗结束、你改变流派、或者你使用该能力指定不同的敌人为目标时为止，以较先发生者为准。

资源出处: Weapon Masters Handbook pg. 12

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Dwarven%20Seething

Dynasty Founder.name: Dynasty Founder
Dynasty Founder.description:
You will claim rulership of a city, whether under a larger government or independently.

Prerequisites
You must have lived in the chosen city for at least 1 year or be the heir of a former city leader.

Benefits
You gain followers as if you had the Leadership feat, although you cannot attract followers of a level higher than your level - 2. If you also have the Leadership feat, increase your Leadership score by 3 for the purpose of determining how many followers you have.

Goal
Thwart all rivals to rulership over the chosen region, including at least one challenging foe.

Completion Benefit
You gain control of the settlement (see the settlement rules in the Pathfinder RPG GameMastery Guide). Upon gaining this benefit and once per year thereafter, you can attempt to alter the settlement in one of the following ways by attempting a DC 25 Diplomacy check modified by the settlement's Society modifier or a DC 25 Intimidate check modified by its Law modifier:
  • Move the settlement's alignment 1 step closer to yours along either the good-evil or law-chaos axis.
  • Replace one settlement quality with another.
  • Change the government type.
  • Significantly alter the laws.
Failure indicates that popular opinion in the city successfully opposes you.
In addition, from now on, your followers gain a +1 morale bonus on attack rolls and saving throws as long as they can see you.

Eagle Eyes.name: 鹰眼 Eagle Eyes
Eagle Eyes.description:
你的视觉格外敏锐。

先决条件: 感知13，【敏锐感官】种族特性。

专长效果: 在通过视觉进行察觉检定时，你忽略至多5点距离造成的减值，这使得你比大多数人看得更远更准确。

资源出处: Advanced Players Guide pg. 158

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Eagle%20Eyes

Eagle Eyes (Mythic).name: 鹰眼(神话) Eagle Eyes (Mythic)
Eagle Eyes (Mythic).description:
先决条件：鹰眼

你的视力堪比目光最为锐利的猛禽。

神话专长效果：通过视力进行察觉检定时，你能够忽略至多10点距离造成的减值，取代原本的5点。以迅捷动作，你能够花费1次神话之力，在1轮内，你以视力进行察觉检定时能够忽略所有距离造成的惩罚。

资源出处: Mythic Adventures pg. 64

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Eagle%20Eyes

Eagle Knight Candidate.name: Eagle Knight Candidate
Eagle Knight Candidate.description:
You have proven your courage and skill to both the Eagle Knights and the leaders of Andoran.

Prerequisites
Character level 5th, convince four different Eagle Knights and either a member of the People's Council or an Andoran town mayor to write letters of commendation on your behalf.

Benefits
Choose one branch of the Eagle Knights you hope to join. You gain a specific benefit based on this choice.

Golden Legion
Each round as a move action, you may issue commands to all allies within 30 feet who can see and hear you. Each affected ally that obeys your orders gains a +1 bonus on attack rolls, Armor Class, and saving throws during that round.

Steel Falcons
You deal +1 damage with weapon attacks directed at any creature against which you have concealment. If you have total concealment against the creature, this bonus increases to +2.

Twilight Talons
During the surprise round, the threat range of your weapons doubles for any attack made against unaware targets. This does not stack with any other effect that expands the threat range of a weapon.

Eagle-Eyed.name: Eagle-Eyed
Eagle-Eyed.description:
Your distance vision is exceptionally keen, enabling you to see well in both normal and dim lighting conditions and providing you an advantage when making ranged attacks.

Prerequisites
Perception 3 ranks.

Benefits
Your distance modifier to the DC of vision-based Perception checks is decreased to +1 per 50 feet in bright light or normal light, or +1 per 20 feet in dim light. You also gain a +2 circumstance bonus on ranged attacks against targets that are more than 100 feet away.

Eagle's Resolve.name: 鹰之决意 Eagle's Resolve
Eagle's Resolve.description:
你坚决反对奴隶制和压迫，一想到精神控制就使你厌恨。

先决条件: 钢铁意志。

专长效果: 你在对抗影响心灵效果的豁免检定上获得+1加值。当你成功的对抗一个此类豁免，你在等于法术环级的轮数内，所有对该效果来源者的攻击骰、伤害骰和豁免骰上获得+2士气加值，如果该效果不是法术，则持续时间等于施展该效果生物HD的轮数。

资源出处: Adventurers Guide pg. 76Andoran, Birthplace of Freedom pg. 28

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Eagle's%20Resolve

Earth Child Binder.name: 狡兔搏鹰 Earth Child Binder
Earth Child Binder.description:
专长类型：Combat

即便最高大的巨人也畏惧你的技巧。

先决条件: 感知13，以小搏大，四两拨千斤，精通绊摔，高等绊摔，震慑拳，特技9级。

专长效果: 你可以绊摔任何体型的巨人亚种生物。你处于地堂流派架势时，巨人亚种生物因在俯卧状态中站起而引发你借机攻击时，你可以进行徒手打击，你可以在这次攻击命中后宣告使用震慑拳，这次震慑拳DC+4。

通常状况: 你不能摔绊比自己体型大一级以上的生物；你必须在攻击掷骰前宣告使用震慑拳。

资源出处: Ultimate Combat pg. 98

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Earth%20Child%20Binder

战策增益：巨人亚种生物因在俯卧状态中站起而引发你借机攻击时，你可以用5点耐力发动震慑拳。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 118

Earth Child Style.name: 以小搏大 Earth Child Style
Earth Child Style.description:
专长类型：CombatStyle

你所受的武技训练使你成为巨人克星。

先决条件: 感知13，矮人或侏儒，“防御训练”种族特性，精通徒手打击，特技3级。

专长效果: 你启用地堂流派架势时，“防御训练”的奖励闪避AC变成+6；同时你在对抗巨人亚种生物时，徒手伤害加上感知修正。

资源出处: Ultimate Combat pg. 99

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Earth%20Child%20Style

战策增益：你在徒手攻击命中巨人亚种生物时可以选择花费最多5点耐力，每点耐力提升2点伤害。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 118

Earth Child Topple.name: 四两拨千斤 Earth Child Topple
Earth Child Topple.description:
专长类型：Combat

你对平衡与动量的掌握允许你空手摞倒巨人。

先决条件: 感知13，以小搏大，精通绊摔，特技6级。

专长效果: 你可以对巨人亚种生物进行绊摔（体型不超过超大型）。当你使用地堂流派架势时，你在对抗巨人亚种生物的重击确认骰与绊摔CMB上加上你的感知修正。

通常状况: 你不能摔绊比自己体型大一级以上的生物。

资源出处: Ultimate Combat pg. 99

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Earth%20Child%20Topple

战策增益：成功绊摔巨人时你可以选择消耗3点耐力，令目标承受2d6跌落伤害。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 119

Earth Magic.name: 大地魔法 Earth Magic
Earth Magic.description:
你可以从大地汲取原始的魔法能量授予你施展的法术。

先决条件: 施展1级法术的能力，偏好地形职业能力。

专长效果: 在你偏好的地形中你的有效施法者等级增加1。这种增加的有效施法者等级不允许你获得更多的法术。

资源出处: Ultimate Wilderness pg. 110Heroes of the Wild pg. 26

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Earth%20Magic

Earthtouched.name: Earthtouched
Earthtouched.description:
You were marked from birth with the gift of magic.

Prerequisites
Cha 15, stone giant.

Benefits
You have a distinguishing feature such as small stature, odd coloration, or crystalline growths on your skin that mark your sorcerous potential. You gain a +1 racial bonus to your caster level when casting sorcerer spells with the earth descriptor. For every 3 sorcerer levels you attain, you add a new spell known of a spell level you can cast. This spell must either be from the abjuration or divination schools or have the earth descriptor.

Echoes of Stone.name: 石之共鸣 Echoes of Stone
Echoes of Stone.description:
你的感官在山岩与石头之中变得很敏锐。

先决条件: 土元素裔。

专长效果: 你在地下进行的察觉检定，以及使用生存检定避免在洞穴和岩石地区迷路时获得+4种族加值。

资源出处: Advanced Race Guide pg. 147

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Echoes%20of%20Stone

Echoes of the First World.name: Echoes of the First World
Echoes of the First World.description:
Your fey heritage is strong, and it grows stronger when you're near another of your kind.

Prerequisites
Knowledge (nature) 2 ranks, gnome subtype.

Benefits
While you're adjacent to an ally who has the gnome subtype and who also has this feat, you gain DR 2/cold iron, and you count as fey instead of humanoid for the purposes of effects that target creatures by type. You still count as having the gnome subtype, however.

Echoing Spell.name: 回音法术 Echoing Spell
Echoing Spell.description:
专长类型：Metamagic

你已经学会了如何在施展法术时保留余力。

专长效果: 当你施展回音法术时，法术并没有从你的脑海中完全消失，你依旧可以在这天之内再释放一次这个法术。回音法术不能被重新准备或者【唤回法术】的效果影响。如果你需要准备法术，则第二次的法术不会消耗你所准备的其他法术位。如果你是自发施法者，第二次的法术不会消耗你其他的可用法术位。回音法术须占用高于原本3个环级的法术位。

资源出处: Ultimate Magic pg. 149

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Echoing%20Spell

Eclectic.name: 兼容并蓄 Eclectic
Eclectic.description:
天资聪慧的你能够胜任不同的职业。

先决条件: 人类。

专长效果: 选择一个额外的天赋职业，只要你获得该职业的等级，就可以获得+1HP或者+1技能点的天赋职业奖励。如果你选择已经拥有等级的职业，那么这一好处可以向前追溯。

资源出处: Advanced Players Guide pg. 158

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Eclectic

Eclipse Strike.name: Eclipse Strike
Eclipse Strike.description:
A sudden darkness disorients your foe, leaving it unprotected against your blinding attack.

Prerequisites
Tiefling, darkness racial spell-like ability.

Benefits
You can attack with an eclipse strike as a standard action if you and an ally who also has this feat are both flanking the target. You and your ally must both have at least one use of your darkness racial spell-like ability available to make this attack. If your eclipse strike hits, your target is blinded for 1 round. Creatures that have the see in darkness ability are immune to the blindness that is caused by an eclipse strike.

Eclipsed Spell.name: Eclipsed Spell
Eclipsed Spell.description:
You alter how your spells affect illumination.

Benefits
Only spells that create areas of light or darkness can be eclipsed spells. If the eclipsed spell creates an area that shines like a torch or raises the light level by one step, you can choose to have the spell lower the illumination level in the affected area by one step, functioning like darkness. If the eclipsed spell creates an area that shines like daylight or raises the light level by two steps, you can choose to have the spell lower the illumination level in the affected area by two steps and create an area of magical darkness, functioning like deeper darkness.

If the eclipsed spell lowers the illumination level in the affected area by one step, you can choose to have the spell cause the affected area to glow with normal light, functioning like light. If the eclipsed spell lowers the illumination level in the affected area by two steps, you can choose to have the spell cause the affected area to shed bright light, functioning like daylight.

An eclipsed spell does not use up a higher-level spell slot than the spell's actual level.

Ectoplasmic Spell.name: 跨界法术 Ectoplasmic Spell
Ectoplasmic Spell.description:
专长类型：Metamagic

你的法术能够冲破维度的障壁，将鬼魅般的力量投射入虚空。

专长效果: 跨界法术能够对虚体或者灵界生物造成完整的效果。跨界法术占用比法术的实际环级高1环的法术位。

资源出处: Advanced Players Guide pg. 158

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Ectoplasmic%20Spell

Edge Runner.name: Edge Runner
Edge Runner.description:
You move with speed and assurance in places that cause others to fall into danger.

Prerequisites
Dex 13.

Benefits
You can move at full speed while using Acrobatics to balance on narrow surfaces, and do not become flat-footed or lose your Dexterity bonus to AC while doing so. You also gain a +4 bonus on Climb checks to catch yourself while falling. You also gain a +4 bonus on saving throws against effects that would cause you to fall into a pit (such as create pit or a pit trap). This bonus does not apply to your CMD against bull rush or trip attacks.

Eerie Sense.name: 异灵感 Eerie Sense
Eerie Sense.description:
先决条件：可以施放法术或类法术能力侦测不死生物或侦测邪恶，信仰法莱斯玛

先决条件: 可以施放法术或类法术能力侦测不死生物或侦测邪恶，信仰法莱斯玛。

专长效果: 在每轮你的回合开始时，只要你的周围60尺内有不死生物或鬼魂（Haunt）活动，你就能感到脊背发凉，有脏东西在附近——但是这并不能帮助你定位对方的确切位置。任何可以阻挡侦测亡灵的效果也能阻止本专长生效。

资源出处: Inner Sea Gods pg. 211

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Eerie%20Sense

Eerily Centered.name: Eerily Centered
Eerily Centered.description:
Little can shake your peaceful temperament.

Prerequisites
Bleachling racial trait, gnome.

Benefits
You gain a +4 racial bonus on saving throws against spells and effects with the emotion descriptor. Effects with the fear descriptor or that grant you a morale bonus affect you for only half the normal duration (minimum 1 round), and such effects that you can activate on yourself (such as a barbarian's rage) require you to expend daily uses or rounds of those abilities at twice the normal rate.

Efficient Focus Shift.name: 等效心智转移 Efficient Focus Shift
Efficient Focus Shift.description:
你比大多数人擅长转移灵器中的心智点。

先决条件: 秘学士7级。

专长效果: 每日两次，当你从一个灵器（Implements）向另一个转移心智点（Mental Focus）时，能够将与前者移除的数量相同的心智点转移至后者。

正常：当你将一个灵器的心智点转移至另一个灵器时，仅能将相同数值-1个心智点转移过去。

特殊说明: 你可以多次选取该专长。专长效果会叠加。

资源出处: Occult Adventures pg. 132

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Efficient%20Focus%20Shift

Effortless Trickery.name: Effortless Trickery
Effortless Trickery.description:
Your natural knack for illusion allows you to maintain at least one illusion spell with little effort.

Prerequisites
Gnome.

Benefits
You can maintain concentration on one spell of the illusion school as a swift action. This has no effect on spells of other schools or on illusion spells with durations that don't depend on your active concentration. While you may only maintain one spell as a swift action, you may take your move and standard actions to maintain other spells normally, if you wish.

Normal
Concentrating to maintain a spell is a standard action that does not provoke attacks of opportunity.

Efreeti Stance.name: 炎宿 Efreeti Stance
Efreeti Stance.description:
专长类型：Combat

你呼唤出实体化的炎之灵魂保护自己，并将敌人烧为灰烬。

先决条件: 体质15，炎灵，基本攻击加值+11或武僧9级。

专长效果: 你获得额外1次额外“元素之拳”每日使用次数。当你使用炎灵流派架势时获得以下好处：你获得火焰抗力，数值等同于你的基本攻击加值、或你的武僧等级加上你从其他职业得到的基本攻击加值（取高者）。当你失去AC的敏捷加值时，你也会失去此抗力。受到你元素之拳火焰伤害的对手须进行一次DC为“10+1/2角色等级+感知修正”的反射豁免，失败将着火。

资源出处: Ultimate Combat pg. 99

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Efreeti%20Stance

战策增益：使用元素之拳令对手着火时你可花费最多5点耐力，每点耐力提升DC1点。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 119

Efreeti Style.name: 炎灵 Efreeti Style
Efreeti Style.description:
专长类型：CombatStyle

你掌握了火焰变幻莫测的力量，即使你接触不到敌人，你拳脚间爆发的烈风仍然能烧焦你的敌人。

先决条件: 体质13，感知15，元素之拳，精通徒手打击，基本攻击加值+9或武僧5级。

专长效果: 你获得1次额外“元素之拳”每日使用次数。你在炎灵流派架势中使用元素之拳时，你在造成火系伤害时获得等于你感知加值的额外伤害。如果你在此架势中使用火系元素之拳没有命中，你仍然能给予对手1d6火焰伤害。

资源出处: Ultimate Combat pg. 99

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Efreeti%20Style

战策增益：使用元素之拳并造成火焰伤害时你可花费最多5点耐力，每点耐力提升2点火焰伤害。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 119

Efreeti Touch.name: 炎触 Efreeti Touch
Efreeti Touch.description:
专长类型：Combat

你掌握了烈风与炎日的秘密，可以让手中凝聚的火之精灵解放，化成毁灭之焰。

先决条件: 感知17，炎宿，基本攻击加值+13或武僧11级。

专长效果: 你使用炎灵流派架势时，以一个标准动作，消耗两次“元素之拳”使用次数，你可以放出半径15尺的锥状爆炎，对范围内所有生物造成等于“你的徒手打击伤害+元素之拳火伤”的伤害并着火。通过DC为“10+1/2角色等级+感知修正”的反射豁免则伤害减半，且不会着火。

资源出处: Ultimate Combat pg. 100

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Efreeti%20Touch

战策增益：使用炎触时你可以选择不用2发元素之拳，而使用一发元素之拳和2点耐力。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 119

Eidolon Mount.name: Eidolon Mount
Eidolon Mount.description:
Your eidolon is capable of carrying you into combat with great skill.

Prerequisites
Eidolon able to choose quadruped or serpentine as a base form.

Benefits
Your eidolon is capable of serving you as a combat-trained mount. If the eidolon's base form is not quadruped or serpentine, it also gains the ability to transmute its physical body into a form suitable for you to ride. This functions as the change shape ability, except the eidolon's base form changes to either quadruped or serpentine and its size changes to be one size category larger than its summoner's base size. Unlike other changes to size, this ability doesn't increase the eidolon's ability scores, reach, or weapon damage beyond that of its true form. (However, if the eidolon's size is reduced by this ability, its reach and weapon damage are adjusted accordingly.)

If the eidolon's base form is not quadruped or serpentine when it gains this feat, it chooses which base form (quadruped or serpentine) to assume when using this ability. The eidolon cannot choose a base form that is not available to its subtype with this ability. If both base forms are available to the eidolon's subtype, it can change which base form it assumes when using this ability whenever it gains a new Hit Die. The eidolon can select evolutions that have either base form as a requirement, but any evolutions that require one of the base forms (but not the other) provide no benefit while the eidolon is assuming the shape of its other base form.


Pathfinder Society
Eidolon Mount is only available to unchained eidolons

Eldritch Aid.name: 秘法援助 Eldritch Aid
Eldritch Aid.description:
你学习过如何使用自己的魔法力量支援盟友的法术。

先决条件: 施法者等级1。

专长效果: 以一个标准动作，你可以消耗一个至少为1环的已准备法术或法术位，用它的能量强化一个近距（25尺+5尺/2个等级）内的施法者盟友。如果该盟友在你的下一个回合开始前施放一个环数不高于你消耗法术的法术，他的法术的施法者等级检定与依赖施法者等级计算的效果都视为+2.如果你消耗的法术环数至少比你盟友施放的法术环数高一倍，那么这个加值翻倍。如果在你的回合开始前你的盟友可以施放多于一个法术，那么这个加值只会在他的第一个法术上生效。

特殊说明: 奥能师可以选择本专长替换一个奥术发现，法师可以选择本专长作为他的职业奖励专长。

资源出处: Advanced Class Origins pg. 26

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Eldritch%20Aid

Eldritch Assault.name: 奥法强袭 Eldritch Assault
Eldritch Assault.description:
当魔法掩盖你的位置时，你能造成致命一击。

先决条件: 盲斗，精通先攻。

专长效果: 每当你在魔法来源的全隐蔽效果中（例如移位术或者隐形术）攻击，你每轮第一个攻击骰若是重击威胁则自动确认重击。

资源出处: Magic Tactics Toolbox pg. 5

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Eldritch%20Assault

Eldritch Claws.name: 奥秘之爪 Eldritch Claws
Eldritch Claws.description:
专长类型：Combat

谁需要魔法武器？鬼魅的把戏无法阻挡你的兽性之力。

先决条件: 力量15，拥有天生武器，基本攻击加值+6。

专长效果: 你的天生武器在克服伤害减免时同时被视为魔法和银。

资源出处: Advanced Players Guide pg. 158

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Eldritch%20Claws

战策增益：只要耐力池里还有至少1点耐力，你的天生武器在克服伤害减免时视为寒铁武器。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 119

Eldritch Heritage.name: 悠远血脉 Eldritch Heritage
Eldritch Heritage.description:
你是历史悠久的术士家族的后裔，一些血统力量流淌在你的血液之中。

先决条件: 魅力13，对应你为此专长所选择血统的技能专攻（见下文），角色等级3级。

专长效果: 选择一个术士血统。你必须拥有选择血统1级时赋予术士额外本职技能所对应的“技能专攻”（例如天界血统为医疗技能）。所选的血统不能是你已经拥有的血统。你获得所选血统的1级血统力量。在使用所选择的能力时，将你的“角色等级-2”作为术士等级，即使你已经拥有术士等级也是如此。你不会得到其它血统能力。

资源出处: Ultimate Magic pg. 149

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Eldritch%20Heritage

Eldritch Heritage (Mythic).name: 悠远血脉(神话) Eldritch Heritage (Mythic)
Eldritch Heritage (Mythic).description:
先决条件：悠远血脉

你的术士祖先所流传下的血脉融入了你的神话力量，并且产生了很大的影响。

神话专长效果：你会获得悠远血脉专长中所选术士血统的血统力量，就如同你的术士等级为你的角色等级-2一般。对于血统的1级血统力量来说，使用你的完整角色等级来确定其效果，而其他血统力量则视你的术士等级为你的角色等级-2级。

资源出处: Mythic Adventures pg. 64

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Eldritch%20Heritage

Eldritch Researcher.name: 魔能学者 Eldritch Researcher
Eldritch Researcher.description:
专长类型：Story

你寻求魔法能量的崭新应用。

先决条件: 你必须创造出一个新法术；或拥有“万物之理（The Way Things Work）”角色背景。

专长效果: 当你施展自己创造出的法术时CL+1。此外，你的法术辨识检定+2。如果你在法术辨识技能受训10级以上，该加值升至+4。

专长目标: 创造出一个6级以上的新法术。

完成收益: 当你施展自己创造出的法术时豁免DC+1。此外，你超魔施展自创法术时的法术环位提升减少1级。你无法通过此方式将超魔后的法术降低到其原本环位之下。

特殊备注：为从此专长中受益，一个自创法术必须有其完整描述。仅对原有法术做出微调（如相比“延迟爆裂火球术”与“火球术”）的法术无法获益。炼金术师也可以从此专长中受益，因为他们的炼金药剂本质也是法术。

资源出处: Ultimate Campaign pg. 68

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Eldritch%20Researcher

Electric Discharge.name: Electric Discharge
Electric Discharge.description:
The fury of lightning storms fuels you and your allies.

Prerequisites
Arcane Strike, ability to cast a 1st-level or higher spell with the electricity descriptor.

Benefits
If you ready an action to cast a 1st-level or higher spell with the electricity descriptor when an ally within 30 feet who has this feat casts a 1st-level or higher spell with the electricity descriptor, when you cast your spell both you and that ally gain the ability to have the next weapon attack you augment with the Arcane Strike feat deal an additional 1d4 points of electricity damage on a hit. These attacks must be made before the end of the next round.

Electric Eel Conduit.name: Electric Eel Conduit
Electric Eel Conduit.description:
You can establish an ongoing electrical charge between you and a target you have grabbed.

Prerequisites
Wis 17, Electric Eel Shock, Electric Eel Style, Elemental Fist, Improved Unarmed Strike, base attack bonus +13 or monk level 9th.

Benefits
You gain one additional Elemental Fist (Pathfinder RPG Advanced Player's Guide 158) attempt per day. When you successfully grapple a creature, you may expend two uses of Elemental Fist as a swift action to set up an electric charge between yourself and the creature. If you do, the target takes electricity damage equal to 1d6 plus your Wisdom modifier each round you maintain the grapple. This damage ceases when you are no longer grappling the target.

Electric Eel Shock.name: Electric Eel Shock
Electric Eel Shock.description:
You can stagger your opponents with jolts of electricity.

Prerequisites
Wis 15, Electric Eel Style, Elemental Fist, Improved Unarmed Strike, base attack bonus +11 or monk level 7th.

Benefits
You gain one additional Elemental Fist (Advanced Player's Guide 158) attempt per day. Creatures that take electricity damage from your Elemental Fist attack must succeed at a Fortitude save (DC 10 + half your character level + your Wisdom modifier) or be staggered for 1 round. This also applies to creatures that take electricity damage from your Electric Eel Conduit feat while grappled.

Electric Eel Style.name: Electric Eel Style
Electric Eel Style.description:
You have learned how to harness electrical energy to momentarily disorient your foes.

Prerequisites
Wis 13, Elemental Fist, Improved Unarmed Strike, base attack bonus +9 or monk level 5th.

Benefits
You gain one additional Elemental Fist (Advanced Player's Guide 158) attempt per day. While you are in this style, your Elemental Fist attack deals electricity damage. When a creature takes electricity damage from your Elemental Fist attack, you gain a +4 bonus for 1 round on combat maneuver checks to grapple the creature.

Elemental Channel (Mythic).name: 元素导能(神话) Elemental Channel (Mythic)
Elemental Channel (Mythic).description:
先决条件：元素导能

你的力量对元素的影响力是绝对的。

神话专长效果：你的元素导能能够影响任意元素亚种（elemental subtype），而不仅仅是你在选取元素导能专长时所选择的那种。每当你使用元素导能专长时，你必须在使用之前选择1种元素亚种。在你使用元素导能时，你能够花费1次神话之力来选择第二种可以影响的元素亚种。

资源出处: Mythic Adventures pg. 64

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Elemental%20Channel

Elemental Claws.name: Elemental Claws
Elemental Claws.description:
You empower your claws with elemental energy.

Prerequisites
Con 13, Wis 13, base attack bonus +8, wild shape class feature.

Benefits
When you attack with a natural weapon, select one of the following energy types: acid, cold, electricity, or fire. If you hit, the attack deals its normal damage plus 1d6 points of damage of the chosen energy type. You must declare that you are using this feat before you make your attack roll (a failed attack roll ruins the attempt). You can attempt one elemental claws attack per day for every 4 levels you have, and no more than once per round.

Elemental Commixture.name: Elemental Commixture
Elemental Commixture.description:
You can combine your elemental spells with those of your allies to produce entirely new and synergistic magical effects.

Prerequisites
Caster level 1st.

Benefits
You and an ally within 30 feet who shares this feat can cast your spells together to create a more powerful, hybrid effect. Both spells must have an elemental descriptor (air, earth, fire, or water), or an energy descriptor that corresponds to one of the elements (acid [earth], cold [water], electricity [air], or fire [fire]) . Both spells must be at least 1st level, within 1 spell level of each other, and cast during the same initiative turn through the use of readied actions.

When the spells to be commixed are cast, one is designated as the primary spell (typically the higherlevel spell), while the other is the secondary spell. The primary spell must be an offensive spell that targets an area or one or more creatures. The secondary spell can be any spell with an appropriate descriptor. Neither spell can take more than a standard action to cast. The primary spell behaves as written (with the exception of the synergistic benefits that are described below). The secondary spell does not manifest any of its usual effects; instead, targeted creatures are affected by a secondary effect that is determined by the combination of the two spells' descriptors.

Targeted creatures can attempt a saving throw against the primary spell as normal (assuming that a save is normally allowed), and then attempt a separate save against the secondary effect. The secondary effect's save type is described in its listing, and its save DC is equal to the normal save DC of the primary or secondary spell, whichever is lower (or, if neither spell allows a saving throw, 10 + lowest spell's level + spellcaster's primary spellcasting ability score [Int, Wis, or Cha] modifier).

Commixed spells cannot be counterspelled normally. A creature with Improved Counterspell can counterspell commixed spells if both spells are correctly identified and both belong to the same school. Regardless, the secondary effects of two spells combined through Elemental Commixture cannot be counterspelled. Spell resistance still applies to the secondary effect, unless both of the commixed spells bypass spell resistance.

Synergistic Benefits
The primary spell's save DC (if any) increases by 1. If either spell is normally modified by Spell Focus or Greater Spell Focus, the bonus to save DCs granted by those feats stacks with this increase. The caster of the primary spell also gains a +1 bonus on any caster level check made to overcome spell resistance.

Secondary Effects
While the secondary spell has no direct effect other than bolstering the effects of the primary spell, the combination of spells also creates a unique secondary effect depending on the elemental descriptors of the commixed spells. For the purpose of this secondary effect, the acid, cold, and electricity descriptors count as earth, water, and air descriptors, respectively. Commixed spells with the same elemental descriptors do not produce a secondary effect, though the primary spell still gains the synergistic benefits described above.

  • Dust (Air/Earth)
    Choked by dust, the targets must succeed at a Fortitude save or become staggered for 1 round plus 1 round per 5 caster levels of the secondary spell's caster. Targeted spellcasters must succeed at a concentration check to cast spells (the DC is equal to the save DC). On a successful save, the targets are not staggered but must still attempt concentration checks.
  • Lava (Earth/Fire)
    The targets are splattered with bits of molten rock and take 1d6 points of fire damage. The targets must succeed at a Reflex save or catch fire (see Catching on Fire on page 444 of the Pathfinder RPG Core Rulebook).
  • Mud (Earth/Water)
    The targets must succeed at a Reflex save or fall prone and have their movement speeds cut in half (to a minimum speed of 5 feet) for 1 round plus 1 round per 5 caster levels of the secondary spell's caster. On a successful save, the targets' movement speeds are cut in half for 1 round.
  • Smoke (Air/Fire)
    The targets suffer smoke inhalation and must succeed at Fortitude saves or become nauseated for 1 round and blinded for 1d4 rounds. Success negates the nausea effect and reduces the blindness to 1 round. Creatures immune to fire are immune to the nausea effect.
  • Snow (Air/Water)
    The primary spell gains the cold descriptor if it doesn't have that descriptor already, and half the damage dealt (if any) is cold damage. The targets must succeed at a Reflex save or fall prone.
  • Steam (Fire/Water)
    Damage caused by the primary spell (if any) is treated as nonlethal, untyped damage (neither cold nor fire damage) and is not affected by energy resistance or absorbed by protection from energy. The targets become blinded for 1d4 rounds unless they succeed at a Will save.

Elemental Conversion.name: Elemental Conversion
Elemental Conversion.description:
You can infuse your elemental spells with primal magic.

Benefits
Once per day, when you cast a spell that deals acid, cold, electricity, or fire damage, you can infuse the spell with primal magic and transform its elemental energy at random. After you cast the spell but before its effects are resolved, roll 1d4 to determine the new element (1 = acid, 2 = cold, 3 = electricity, 4 = fire). If you are in an area where primal magic is predominant, you can instead use this ability once per hour.

Elemental Fist.name: 元素之拳 Elemental Fist
Elemental Fist.description:
专长类型：Combat

你将元素能量赋到打击之上。

先决条件: 体质13，感知13，精通徒手打击，基本攻击加值+8。

专长效果: 当你使用元素之拳时需要从后述能量类型中选择一种：强酸，寒冷，闪电或火焰。若成功命中，此次攻击造成正常伤害外加1d6点所选元素类型的伤害。你必须在进行攻击检定前声明使用这个专长（因此失败的攻击检定会浪费这次机会）。你每拥有4个等级，每日可以尝试元素之拳的次数就增加1次（见特殊），每轮尝试的次数不能超过1次。

特殊说明: 修验僧（Monk of the Four Winds, APG武僧变体）在1级获得“元素之拳”作为奖励专长，即使他不满足先决条件。武僧每日可以尝试使用元素之拳的次数等同于他的武僧等级，额外加上每4个非武僧职业等级1次。

资源出处: Advanced Players Guide pg. 158

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Elemental%20Fist

战策增益：花费5点耐力，你可以在攻击命中后选择使用元素之拳。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 119

Elemental Fist (Mythic).name: 元素之拳(神话) Elemental Fist (Mythic)
Elemental Fist (Mythic).description:
先决条件：元素之拳

凝聚元素之力能使你的双拳更为有力。

神话专长效果：元素之拳专长所增加的额外能量伤害增加至1d8点，而且每日你能够使用元素之拳专长的次数会额外增加，数量等同于你的阶层。你能够以直觉动作花费1次神话之力，来将元素之拳带来的额外伤害加到你所进行的所有徒手打击（unarmed strikes）上，直至你的下一回合开始为止。无论你以此方式进行多少次攻击，这只被算作使用1次元素之拳。

资源出处: Mythic Adventures pg. 64

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Elemental%20Fist

Elemental Focus.name: 元素专攻 Elemental Focus
Elemental Focus.description:
你所施放的某种元素法术会更加难以抵御。

专长效果: 选择一种能量类型（强酸，寒冷，闪电或者火焰）。所有造成此类能量伤害的法术，其豁免DC提高1点。

特殊说明: 你可以多次选取该专长。其效果不会叠加。每次选取该专长都会应用到一种新的能量类型上。

资源出处: Advanced Players Guide pg. 158

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Elemental%20Focus

Elemental Focus (Mythic).name: 元素专攻(神话) Elemental Focus (Mythic)
Elemental Focus (Mythic).description:
先决条件：元素专攻

你的元素法术强而有力、行之有效。

神话专长效果：选择一项你已经具有元素专攻专长的能量类型。元素专攻（Elemental Focus）与高等元素专攻（Greater Elemental Focus）对所选能量类型的法术提供的豁免DC加值增加1点。当你施放的法术具有此种能量类型的描述符时，作为施法的一部分，你能够花费1次神话之力迫使法术的目标进行两次豁免检定，并取较低结果。

资源出处: Mythic Adventures pg. 64

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Elemental%20Focus

Elemental Jaunt.name: 元素旅行 Elemental Jaunt
Elemental Jaunt.description:
先祖的精魂呼唤着你，召唤你回到家乡。

先决条件: 角色等级15，火元素裔、土元素裔、风元素裔或水元素裔。

专长效果: 每天1次，你能以类法术能力施放‘异界传送’，但是只能将自己以及自愿的目标传送至符合自身种族的位面（火元素裔传送至火元素位面，土元素裔传送至土元素位面，风元素裔传送至气元素位面，水元素裔传送至水元素位面），CL等同于你的角色等级。在元素位面时，你被视为在‘位面适应’法术效果的影响下（但是其他与你一同传送的生物则否）。

【法术速查】异界传送（Plane Shift）：使最多8个受术者旅行到另一个位面。

【法术速查】位面适应（Planar Adaptation, APG）：使你抵抗某个位面的有害影响。

资源出处: Advanced Race Guide pg. 130

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Elemental%20Jaunt

Elemental Ki.name: Elemental Ki
Elemental Ki.description:
You can accept burn to gain the benefits of ki.

Prerequisites
Brawler's flurry or flurry of blows class feature, burn class feature, kinetic fist wild talent, kineticist level 4th.

Benefits
Your burn functions like a ki pool. As long as you have at least 1 point of burn, your unarmed strikes count as magic. You can take 1 point of burn as a swift action to do any two of the following: make an additional attack at your highest bonus during a flurry of blows, increase your speed by 20 feet for 1 round, or gain a +4 dodge bonus to AC for 1 round. You can also accept burn instead of spending ki (or a combination of the two) to activate an ability that costs ki points, with each point of burn you accept counting as 2 ki points. You count as having a ki pool for effects that requires a ki pool.

Elemental Knowledge.name: Elemental Knowledge
Elemental Knowledge.description:
Your breadth of knowledge widens as you explore your connection to the elements.

Prerequisites
Expanded element class feature.

Benefits
When you chose a different element from your primary element with the expanded element class feature at 7th level, you gain that element's associated skills as class skills. In addition, you gain a +1 bonus on all your element's associated skills. If you chose a third element with expanded element at 15th level, you receive these benefits for that element's associated skills as well.

Elemental Overload.name: Elemental Overload
Elemental Overload.description:
As you become suffused with power, you become more and more like an elemental.

Prerequisites
Elemental overflow class feature, kineticist level 15th.

Benefits
Whenever you have accepted at least 4 points of burn, the chance to ignore the effects of a critical hit or sneak attack increases by an additional 10%. This chance increases by an additional 5% for every 2 points of burn you accept after that. This chance can't exceed 100%.

Normal
Whenever you have accepted at least 3 points of burn, your chance to ignore the effects of a critical hit or sneak attack equals 5% x your current number of points of burn.

Elemental Spell.name: 元素法术 Elemental Spell
Elemental Spell.description:
专长类型：Metamagic

你能够操纵自身法术的元素性质。

专长效果: 选择一种能量类型：强酸，寒冷，闪电或火焰。你可以使用这种能量类型替代法术原本正常的伤害；或者分裂法术的伤害，使法术所造成伤害的一半为正常伤害，另一半为你所选择的伤害类型。元素法术占用比法术的实际环级高1环的法术位。

特殊说明: 你可以多次选取该专长。每次必须选择不同的能量类型。

资源出处: Advanced Players Guide pg. 158

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Elemental%20Spell

Elemental Strike.name: Elemental Strike
Elemental Strike.description:
You draw upon your extraplanar heritage to imbue your weapons with elemental energies.

Prerequisites
Ifrit, oread, sylph, or undine.

Benefits
As a swift action, you can imbue your weapons with elemental energy. For 1 round, your weapons deal an additional 1 point of energy damage. The type of energy damage depends on your race: acid for oread, electricity for sylph, fire for ifrit, or cold for undine. For every 5 levels you possess, this bonus increases by 1, to a maximum of +5 at 20th level.

Special
You can use this feat instead of Arcane Strike to qualify for or attack with the Deadly Dealer feat (Pathfinder Player Companion: The Harrow Handbook 15).

Elemental Vigor.name: 元素威力 Elemental Vigor
Elemental Vigor.description:
先决条件：信仰元素领主之一

先决条件: 信仰元素领主之一。

专长效果: 当你听过变形效果变身成元素生物时，你会感到一阵力量在全身奔涌——你可以获得相当于该效果的施法者等级数的临时生命值，以及基础移动速度提升10尺

资源出处: Inner Sea Gods pg. 211

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Elemental%20Vigor

Elephant Stomp.name: 巨象重踏 Elephant Stomp
Elephant Stomp.description:
专长类型：Combat

你对被踩过的敌人造成毁灭性的打击。

先决条件: 力量13，猛力攻击，精通闯越，基本攻击加质+1。

专长效果: 当你成功闯越一个目标，而且你的战技检定成功5点或以上时，你可以选择在目标前面或离他最近的方格停下来，以直觉动作进行一次徒手击打或以天生武器攻击对手，而不是穿过对手的方格并将他撞倒。

通常状况: 当你闯越的战技检定成功5点或以上时，你可以穿过对手的方格并将他撞倒。

资源出处: Sargava, the Lost Colony pg. 24

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Elephant%20Stomp

Elf-Magic Defense.name: Elf-Magic Defense
Elf-Magic Defense.description:
You can better resist arcane trickery from your hated foes.

Prerequisites
Favored enemy class feature, hobgoblin.

Benefits
In addition to the normal benefits against your favored enemies, you add half your favored enemy bonus on saving throws made against arcane spells, spell-like abilities, and supernatural abilities of your favored enemies.

Elongated Cranium.name: 颅骨拉伸 Elongated Cranium
Elongated Cranium.description:
你忍受住了充满痛苦且源自古代的头骨束缚技艺，这让你的头颅变得畸形并可以解放了潜藏于自我之中的可能性。

专长效果: 你把头颅紧紧束缚和包裹住，改变它的形状，使得你的精神能够与精神境界进行同调。若你在1级时选取该专长，则必须经历长达六个月的痛苦疗程，来固定和缩紧你的头颅，在此期间你在智力、感知和魅力检定，以及基于智力、感知和魅力的技能检定中受到-1减值。一旦塑形完成后，你的头颅会依照先前的选择呈现出后述三种形状之一，每一种都会提供特殊的好处。一旦选择，头颅的形状就无法被更改。

前枕骨拉伸（Fronto-Occipital Elongation）：你的头骨呈现为向上的锥形，锥面从额头向头顶延伸。你会在智力与感知检定、以及基于智力与感知的技能检定中受到-1减值，但是魅力检定以及基于魅力的技能检定中获得+2加值。此外，每日1次，你能够将自己所施放的一个异能法术（psychic spell）的持续时间延长50%（最低为0个额外轮数）。此种持续时间的延长不会与法术延时（Extend Spell）专长叠加。

卵型紧缩（Ovoid Compression）：你的头部会呈现为比正常更大的球状外观。你的魅力与感知检定、以及基于魅力与感知的技能检定受到-1减值，但是智力检定以及基于智力的技能检定获得+2加值。此外，每日1次，你能够在施放一个自身已知的异能法术时，使其施法者等级获得+1加值。

矢状拉伸（Sagittal Elongation）：你的头部以较为缓和但却很长的曲线向后延伸。你的智力与魅力检定、以及基于智力与魅力的技能检定受到-1减值，但是感知检定以及基于感知的技能检定获得+2加值。此外，每日1次，你能够让一个由你所施放的异能法术的DC增加1点。

资源出处: Occult Adventures pg. 132

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Elongated%20Cranium

Elusive Redirection.name: 斗转星移 Elusive Redirection
Elusive Redirection.description:
你能让敌人的攻击悉数返回，或转移到邻近的其他敌人身上。

先决条件: 【转身采手】职业特性，寓守于攻，精通徒手打击，无相僧12级。

专长效果: 当你成功的使用了一次【转身采手】以减免一次攻击伤害，你可以花费直觉动作和1点气池将这次攻击返还给原攻击者、或另一个同时邻接你和攻击者的敌人。这次攻击使用于原攻击相同的攻击检定骰，但是攻击对象是你选择的敌人。

【能力速查】转身采手（Elusive Target, Ex）：5级时无相僧（flowing monk, UC武僧变体）能以直觉动作消耗2点气，通过一个反射检定对抗对方的攻击检定，成功的话他会使伤害减半。11级起，当他反射检定成功时将不会受到任何伤害，就算反射检定失败，他也只会受到一半的伤害。如果对方夹击无相僧，那么没有发起攻击的那个夹击者将会变成这次攻击的目标，使用和攻击无相僧相同的攻击掷骰，如果该目标被击中了，那他将受到一半伤害；若无相僧完全避开了攻击，那么该目标则受到全额伤害。所有攻击附带的效果仍会照常运作。

资源出处: Ultimate Combat pg. 100

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Elusive%20Redirection

Elven Accuracy.name: 精灵之眼 Elven Accuracy
Elven Accuracy.description:
专长类型：Combat

你那敏锐的视觉使得困难的射击变得从容。

先决条件: 精灵。

专长效果: 如果你使用长弓或短弓（包括复合弓）进行远程攻击，却由于隐蔽而失手，那么你能够重新投掷一次失手率检定来看看你是否真的命中。

资源出处: Advanced Players Guide pg. 159

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Elven%20Accuracy

战策增益：花费5点耐力，你可在重投失手检定时自动通过。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 119

Elven Accuracy (Mythic).name: 精灵之眼(神话) Elven Accuracy (Mythic)
Elven Accuracy (Mythic).description:
先决条件：精灵之眼

精灵天生的视觉能力会让你找到敌人掩体的缺口。

神话专长效果：当你使用长弓或短弓（包括复合弓）进行攻击时，你能够忽略隐蔽（concealment），但是无法忽略全隐蔽（total concealment）。你仍旧会受到全隐蔽带来的失手率，但是如果你由于全隐蔽而失手，那么你就可以如同精灵之眼专长一般重掷失手率。

资源出处: Mythic Adventures pg. 64

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Elven%20Accuracy

Elven Battle Focus.name: 精灵武技专攻 Elven Battle Focus
Elven Battle Focus.description:
专长类型：Combat

聪明才智能帮助你强化攻击的威力。

先决条件: 智力13，精灵武技，精灵战斗训练，武器娴熟，基本攻击加值+4，武器熟悉种族特性。

专长效果: 当你使用精灵武技时，你能够将智力调整值加到武器的伤害上（来取代任何其他让你能够加到武器伤害上的属性加值或调整值）。该武器必须符合你的体型。

资源出处: Weapon Masters Handbook pg. 12

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Elven%20Battle%20Focus

Elven Battle Style.name: 精灵武技 Elven Battle Style
Elven Battle Style.description:
专长类型：CombatStyle

你使用传统精灵武器的姿势华丽而优雅。

先决条件: 精灵战斗训练，武器娴熟，基本攻击加值+1，武器熟悉（Weapon Familiarity）种族特性。

专长效果: 当你持用长剑（longsword）、细剑（rapier）、或者任何冠以“精灵（elven）”之名的近战武器时，用这些武器在借机攻击中尝试的战技检定不会让你引起借机攻击。

资源出处: Weapon Masters Handbook pg. 12

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Elven%20Battle%20Style

Elven Battle Torrent.name: 精灵反击术 Elven Battle Torrent
Elven Battle Torrent.description:
专长类型：Combat

你能迅速向敌人发起反击。

先决条件: 智力13，精灵武技专攻，精灵武技，精灵战斗训练，武器娴熟，基本攻击加值+10，武器熟悉种族特性。

专长效果: 当你使用精灵武技时，任何在你使用防御式战斗（fighting defensively）、全防御（total defense）或者寓守于攻（Combat Expertise）专长的情况下对你作出攻击并且失手的敌人，都会引起你的借机攻击。即便具有战斗反射（Combat Reflexes）专长，你在每轮中也只能获取一次该专长带来的好处。

资源出处: Weapon Masters Handbook pg. 12

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Elven%20Battle%20Torrent

Elven Battle Training.name: 精灵战斗训练 Elven Battle Training
Elven Battle Training.description:
专长类型：Combat

你受过运用各种传统精灵武器的训练。

先决条件: 基本攻击加值+1，精灵。

专长效果: 你受过使用精灵传统武器（长弓，复合长弓，长剑，细剑，短弓，复合短弓以及任何冠以“精灵”之名的武器）的特殊训练。当你对抗针对这些武器的卸武以及破武战技时，你的CMD获得+2加值。此外如果你持用上述近战武器，每轮能够额外进行1次借机攻击（与“战斗反射”专长叠加）。

资源出处: Advanced Race Guide pg. 28

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Elven%20Battle%20Training

战策增益：如果持握专长所述的精灵传统武器，花费5点耐力你可获得多一次借机攻击的次数。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 119

Elven Spirit.name: 精灵之魂 Elven Spirit
Elven Spirit.description:
虽然你是混血儿，但是你更接近你的精灵亲属，他们那充满魔力的血液流淌在你的血管中。

先决条件: 半精灵。

专长效果: 你拥有精灵的【精灵魔法】种族特性，这使你在克服法术抗力时的施法者等级检定获得+2种族加值。此外在使用法术辨识技能检定辨认魔法物品的特性时，获得+2种族加值。另外，你能够选取任何精灵能够选择的、用于替换【精灵魔法】的种族特性。

特殊说明: 你只能在1级时选择该专长。如果你选择该专长就不能选择“人类之魂”专长。

资源出处: Advanced Race Guide pg. 46

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Elven%20Spirit

Embrace of the Dark Fey.name: Embrace of the Dark Fey
Embrace of the Dark Fey.description:
The blood of an evil fey ancestor in your veins lends you aggressive, often bloodthirsty impulses that you strive to keep under control.

Prerequisites
You must have an evil fey such as a quickling or redcap somewhere in your family line, or you must have the Shameful Heritage background (Ultimate Campaign 40).

Benefits
You gain a +2 bonus on Intimidate checks. If you have 10 or more ranks in Intimidate, this bonus increases to +4. You also gain a +2 circumstance bonus on attack rolls made to confirm critical hits.

Goal
Demoralize an appropriate number of creatures using the Intimidate skill.

Special
While a creature is shaken because you have demoralized it using the Intimidate skill, your attacks that deal damage to the creature also deal 1 point of bleed damage. Bleed damage from this ability does not stack with itself.

Emergency Attunement.name: Emergency Attunement
Emergency Attunement.description:
You can adapt your defenses to any situation.

Prerequisites
Spellcraft 7 ranks.

Benefits
As a standard action, you can alter one of your ongoing abjuration or transmutation spells. It must be currently affecting you and must grant a choice of options when cast. You change its benefit to a different one from the same list. In order to accomplish this, you must make a successful Spellcraft check (DC equal to 10 + the level of the spell to be altered). The duration of the spell is reduced to half of the spell's remaining duration. For example, a 7th-level wizard could change her resist energy ( fire) spell with 50 minutes of its duration remaining into resist energy (cold), but the new duration would be 25 minutes. This ability does not change the benefit for any other creatures targeted by the original spell.

Emissary's Emboldening.name: Emissary's Emboldening
Emissary's Emboldening.description:
Your familiar lends you divine courage.

Prerequisites
Must have a familiar with the emissary archetype (see page 10).

Benefits
As long as your familiar is adjacent to you, you gain a +1 morale bonus against fear effects. This bonus increases by 1 at 4th level and every 4 levels thereafter (to a maximum of +5 at 16th level). At 20th level, you become immune to fear effects as long as your familiar is adjacent to you.

Emotional Conduit.name: 情感导体 Emotional Conduit
Emotional Conduit.description:
你与魅影之间深刻的情感共鸣使你能够掌握他人的情绪。

先决条件: 共享意识（Shared Consciousness）职业能力。

专长效果: 根据你的魅影（Phantom）的情感羁绊（Emotional Focus），你能够精通数个额外法术。这些法术会同时加到你的职业法术列表（如果这些法术原本并不在该列表中）以及你的已知法术列表中；这些法术不会占用你在对应法术环级中的已知法术数量。具体的明细如后所述（标有·的法术均刊载于本书，详细请见第四章）。

· 愤怒灵（Anger）：1级--肾上腺素激增*（Burst of Adrenaline）；2级--狂暴术（Rage）；3级--惨嚎剧痛（Howling Agony；UM）；4级--念动冲锋（Telekinetic Charge；UC）；5级--复仇之怒（Vengeful Outrage；UM）；6级--转变术（Transformation）。

· 守护灵（Despair）：1级--笨拙之触（Touch of Gracelessness；APG）；2级--死亡丧钟（Death Knell）；3级--力竭射线（Ray of Exhaustion）；4级--极度绝望（Crushing Despair）；5级--绞杀（Suffocation；APG）；6级--摄心目光（Eyebite）。

· 无望灵（Devotion）：1级--反隐警报（Invisibility Alarm；ACG）；2级--灵能武器（Spiritual Weapon）；3级--治疗重伤（Cure Serious Wounds）【译注：此处原文为治疗轻伤，但是1环法术占3环显然有问题，所以自行修正了一下】；4级--法术免疫（Spell Immunity）；5级--吸血影障（Vampiric Shadow Shield；ACG）；6级--高等英雄气概（Heroism, Greater）。

· 恐惧灵（Fear）：1级--强化认知（Heightened Awareness；ACG）；2级--恐吓术（Scare）；3级--恐惧术（Fear）；4级--恐惧饕宴（Feast On Fear；ACG）；5级--梦魇（Nightmare）；6级--骇人外形（Frightful Aspect；UC）。

· 憎恨灵（Hatred）：1级--谋杀指令（Murderous Command；UM）；2级--毁容之触（Disfiguring Touch；UM）；3级--降咒（Bestow Curse）；4级--衰弱预兆（Debilitating Portent；UC）；5级--煽动恨意*（Foster Hatred）；6级--复仇鬼影（Phantasmal Revenge；APG）。

· 妒忌灵（Jealousy）：1级--强迫敌对（Compel Hostility；UC）；2级--生命契约（Life Pact；ACG）；3级--灵质捕网*（Ectoplasmic Snare）；4级--囚困魂魄*（Entrap Spirit）；5级--支配人类（Dominate Person）；6级--强迫护卫（Unwilling Shield；APG）。

· 狂热灵（Zeal）：1级--妄尊自大（Delusional Pride；UM）；2级--虚假生命（False Life）；3级--英雄气概（Heroism）；4级--行动自如（Freedom of Movement）；5级--欢欣鼓舞（Joyful Rapture；UM）；6级--高等英雄气概（Heroism, Greater）。

资源出处: Occult Adventures pg. 132

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Emotional%20Conduit

Empath.name: 移情感知 Empath
Empath.description:
你明白如何从精神上感知一名个体的心绪或者精神状态的变化。

先决条件: 异能敏感（Psychic Sensitivity）或施放异能法术（psychic spell）的能力，察觉1级或察言观色1级。

专长效果: 当你使用神秘技能解放（Occult Skill Unlock）中的望气（Read Aura）阅读情感灵光（Read Emotion Aura）时，可以使用察觉或察言观色技能。阅读生物的情感灵光仅会花费你的整轮动作，以取代原本的10分钟，而且当你成功通过检定时，你还能判断出该生物当前是否被恐惧（fear）或影响心灵（mind-affecting）效果所影响，以及该效果的相对强度（昏暗、中等、强烈，如同侦测魔法中定义的那样）。你无法得知效果的发生源或者实际上是什么效果。

你还可以通过打开内心的自我防护的方式，在一日内多次使用神秘技能解放的望气阅读情感灵光。在你使用该专长之后的1分钟内，会在对抗恐惧和影响心灵效果时承受-4减值（无论你的检定是否成功）。在此期间你无法进行阅读情感灵光的尝试。使用该专长不会消耗掉当日使用望气的每日次数，因此你仍旧可以使用原本的望气每日次数阅读其他类型的灵光，或者在不承受与该专长相关的惩罚的情况下阅读情感灵光。

资源出处: Occult Adventures pg. 132

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Empath

Empathy.name: Empathy
Empathy.description:
You have learned to experience emotion.

Prerequisites
Cha 13, android.

Benefits
You lose the emotionless special quality. You can gain morale bonuses, and can be affected by emotionbased effects and fear effects. You lack the +4 racial bonus on saving throws against mind-affecting effects.

Empower Spell-Like Ability.name: 类法术能力强效 Empower Spell-Like Ability
Empower Spell-Like Ability.description:
专长类型：Monster

该生物的一种类法术能力极其强而有力。

先决条件: 拥有施法者等级6级以上的类法术能力。

专长效果: 选择一个该生物拥有的类法术能力（不过要遵守以下列出的限制）。每天3次，该生物可以如同搭配了“法术强效”超魔般使用此类法术能力（除非该生物每天可以使用该类法术能力的次数低于3次）。每当该生物使用类法术能力强效时，法术效果中的所有可变量值皆增加一半（+50%）。但本专长不影响豁免检定与对抗检定，对没有变量的法术也无影响。该生物必须选择一个法术环级不超过“1/2生物最高CL-2”的类法术能力以搭配此专长。详见表：类法术能力强效与瞬发。

特殊说明: 生物可以多次选择本专长。每次选择此专长时，它的效果将应用在另一个类法术能力上。

资源出处: Pathfinder RPG Bestiary pg. 314

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Empower%20Spell-Like%20Ability

Empowered Daemonic Pact.name: Empowered Daemonic Pact
Empowered Daemonic Pact.description:
Your violent death brings woe to the enemies of your daemon masters.

Prerequisites
Urdefhan.

Benefits
When you succeed at using your daemonic pact ability and allow your soul to be consumed, the resulting blast's radius increases to 10 feet, and you gain a +2 profane bonus to the DC of the Reflex save victims must attempt to halve this damage.

Normal
A successful use of the daemonic pact ability deals negative energy damage to creatures in a 5-foot radius.

Empty Quiver Flexibility.name: 折翎迅 Empty Quiver Flexibility
Empty Quiver Flexibility.description:
专长类型：Combat

你在射击上的训练同样有助于紧急关头的贴身肉搏。

先决条件: 快速射击，折翎式，针刺射击，对所选武器拥有武器专攻专长。

专长效果: 当你开启折翎流的架势时，你可以将所有增强远程攻击的攻击检定和伤害检定的职业能力与专长效果添加到通过折翎式发动的近战攻击的攻击检定和伤害检定上。除此之外，你可以威胁你周围区域内的敌人，如同你持用正常的近战武器一样。

资源出处: Weapon Masters Handbook pg. 14

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Empty%20Quiver%20Flexibility

Empty Quiver Flurry.name: 断剑折翎 Empty Quiver Flurry
Empty Quiver Flurry.description:
专长类型：Combat

你使用弓弩发动的猛击使敌人退缩，被迫吃下你随之而来的射击。

先决条件: 快速射击，折翎式，折翎迅，针刺射击，对所选武器拥有武器专攻专长。

专长效果: 当你使用折翎式或针刺射击专长，使用远程武器发动近战攻击时，只要你成功命中一个敌人，直到你的下一轮开始，该敌人无法因为你的远程攻击而对你发动借机攻击。

特殊说明: 如果你拥有快速射击专长并且持有一把尚未装填的十字弓或火器，那么你在以此专长的效果成功近战攻击命中敌人时，你可以同时以自由动作装填你的武器。

资源出处: Weapon Masters Handbook pg. 14

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Empty%20Quiver%20Flurry

Empty Quiver Style.name: 折翎式 Empty Quiver Style
Empty Quiver Style.description:
专长类型：CombatStyle

你可以用自己的弓，十字弓或是火器痛击贴近的敌人。

先决条件: 对所选武器拥有武器专攻专长。

专长效果: 当你开启此流派的架势时，你可以持用自己所选的远程武器，使用重型硬头锤（如果是单手火器或手弩则是轻型硬头锤）的数据对敌人进行近战攻击，但此法并不会使你如同持用近战武器一样威胁周围格子。你可以自由转换近战和远战模式而没有任何惩罚，就算是同一轮内也无妨。除此之外，你可以无视先决条件而选择针刺射击（Stabbing Shot）APG专长。如果你确实拥有针刺射击专长，那么你可以使用十字弓或火器来进行针刺射击效果中的近战攻击（使用它们的装填好的弩矢或子弹的替代箭矢）。

特殊说明: 一个拥有武器训练（弓，弩或火器）职业能力的角色可以使用任何弓，弩或火器而非仅限于他所选的单件武器来获得此流派的好处。

资源出处: Weapon Masters Handbook pg. 14

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Empty%20Quiver%20Style

Empty Threats.name: Empty Threats
Empty Threats.description:
You have a gift for making authentic-sounding threats you never intend to follow through on.

Prerequisites
Bluff 5 ranks.

Benefits
You can use the Bluff skill to demoralize opponents in combat instead of Intimidate. You can attempt a Bluff check in place of an Intimidate check when using the Dazzling Display feat and feats that list Dazzling Display as a prerequisite. If you use the Bluff skill to demoralize, you cannot use it to feint until the beginning of your next turn, and vice versa.

Encouraging Spell.name: 激励法术 Encouraging Spell
Encouraging Spell.description:
专长类型：Metamagic

你的鼓舞提供盟友更大的支持。

先决条件: 魅力13，交涉技能6级。

专长效果: 激励法术提供的所有士气加值+1.激励法术占用比原法术环级高1环的法术位。

资源出处: Magic Tactics Toolbox pg. 5

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Encouraging%20Spell

Endurance (Mythic).name: 坚忍(神话) Endurance (Mythic)
Endurance (Mythic).description:
先决条件：坚忍

你的忍耐力真正地超越了界限。

神话专长效果：坚忍专长带来的检定与豁免加值增加，数额等同于你的阶层的一半。当你进行检定以避免强行军、饥饿和口渴、冷热环境或者缓慢窒息造成的非致命伤害时，若检定失败，则只会受到一半伤害。

你能够穿着重甲睡觉而不疲乏。

资源出处: Mythic Adventures pg. 65

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Endurance

Endure Pain.name: Endure Pain
Endure Pain.description:
Through violent and torturous conditioning, you have built up a resistance to pain.

Prerequisites
Survived being tortured 10 or more times.

Benefits
If you take nonlethal damage, you may attempt a Fortitude saving throw (DC equal to 10 + the nonlethal damage dealt) to reduce that damage by half. The Endurance feat grants a +4 bonus on this saving throw.

Enduring Might.name: Enduring Might
Enduring Might.description:
When you gather your might, it lasts long enough to improve your defenses and attacks of opportunity.

Prerequisites
Gather Might, gather power class feature, kineticist level 8th.

Benefits
When you use Gather Might, the ability score bonuses last until the beginning of your next turn.

Enemy Cult.name: Enemy Cult
Enemy Cult.description:
You have crossed paths with a cult opposed to everything in which you believe.

Prerequisites
You must have encountered a cult whose general alignment is opposite to yours on at least one axis or who threatened your beliefs or way of life, or you must have the Angelic Encounter, the False Witness, The Omen, or the Terrible Secret background (all of which are found in Ultimate Campaign).

Benefits
Choose an appropriate detect chaos/evil/good/law spell that would aid you in opposing your chosen enemy cult. You can cast this spell twice per day as a spell-like ability with a caster level equal to your character level.

Goal
Thwart the enemy cult, whose leader must be a challenging foe. You must deal that cult leader a decisive defeat, and additionally eradicate the cult or drive the cult from the area.

Completion Benefit
You gain a +2 resistance bonus on saving throws against evil creatures and a +2 deflection bonus to AC against evil creatures' attacks. These bonuses double against evil summoned creatures.

Energized Wild Shape.name: Energized Wild Shape
Energized Wild Shape.description:
Your wild shape form gains the benefits of one energy type for both offensive and defensive purposes.

Prerequisites
Wis 19, base attack bonus +6, wild shape class feature.

Benefits
When you assume a wild shape form, choose one of the following energy types: acid, cold, electricity, or fire. You gain resistance 10 to that energy type. Also, one of your natural attacks deals an additional 1d6 points of damage of the chosen energy type. If you choose a wild shape form that already has energy resistance of the same type you choose, it increases by 5 instead. If you choose a wild shape form that deals damage of the same energy type you choose, increase the energy damage you deal by one die size (1d6 becomes 1d8, and so on).

Special
You can take this feat more than once. Each time you take this feat, choose a different energy type.

Energy Channel.name: 引导元素 Energy Channel
Energy Channel.description:
你可以将神祇代表的元素能量通过引导注入武器

先决条件: 引导能力职业能力，气，土，火或水牧师领域或战斗祭司祝福。

专长效果: 以一个迅捷动作，你可以消耗一次本日的引导能量，使你的武器攻击获得相当于你引导能量骰数x2的额外能量伤害。这个能力伤害的类型取决于你的领域或祝福：强酸（土），电击（气），寒冷（水）或火焰（火）。如果你同时拥有多个元素领域或祝福，你必须在使用这个能力时选择其一来发动。这个效果持续3次攻击或是战斗结束，取其先者。

资源出处: Advanced Class Guide pg. 146

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Energy%20Channel

Energy Mastery.name: 能量掌握 Energy Mastery
Energy Mastery.description:
专长类型：Item Mastery

你引导塑能系物品的魔法力量，以奔流的元素吞噬敌人。

先决条件: 使用魔法装置技能1级，基础强韧豁免加值+4。

专长效果: 你可以引导一件制造时需求使用塑能系法术，带有火焰，寒冷，强酸或电击描述符，且该法术至少为一环的魔法物品中的能量，施放一次法术燃烧之手（Burning Hand）。这个法术效果具有你所使用的魔法物品制造所需法术的对应描述符，且造成与该描述符对应的能量伤害。你每天可以使用本类法术能力一次，在基础强韧豁免加值达到+6，+8，+10和+12时可以获得额外一次每日使用次数。

除此之外，你也可以选择消耗两次本专长的每日使用次数，施放一个法术闪电束（Lightning Bolt）。这件魔法物品的制造所需法术等级至少需要为三环（仍然造成对应描述符的能量伤害）。

资源出处: Weapon Masters Handbook pg. 26

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Energy%20Mastery

Enfilading Fire.name: 交叉火力 Enfilading Fire
Enfilading Fire.description:
专长类型：CombatTeamwork

透过盟友的夹击，你在射击时得到额外的优势。

先决条件: 近距射击，精准射击，至少一项团队专长。

专长效果: 当至少一个拥有此专长的盟友夹击敌人时，你对该目标的远程攻击得到+2加值。

资源出处: Ultimate Combat pg. 100

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Enfilading%20Fire

战策增益：在每次攻击前，只要花费1点耐力，即使夹击的盟友不拥有团队专长你也可享受该专长的效果

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 119

Enforcer.name: 胁迫者 Enforcer
Enforcer.description:
专长类型：Combat

你善于在被你伤害的人心中制造恐惧。

先决条件: 威吓1级。

专长效果: 每当你使用近战武器造成非致命伤害，就能够以自由动作进行一次威吓检定，用以挫败攻击目标的士气。若成功，目标会战栗，持续等同于伤害的轮数。如果你的攻击是重击，你的目标会在成功的威吓检定后惊惧1轮，除此之外还会在等同于伤害的轮数中战栗。

资源出处: Advanced Players Guide pg. 159Pathfinder Campaign Setting pg. 125

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Enforcer

战策增益：重击后如果花费5点耐力，你可令对方惊惧1d4轮而非1轮。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 119

Engulf Horror.name: Engulf Horror
Engulf Horror.description:
The repulsive horror of your smothering attack nearly incapacitates most foes.

Prerequisites
Engulf Revulsion; engulf or smother universal monster ability.

Benefits
When you successfully engulf or smother an opponent, successfully maintain a grapple combat maneuver on a smothered opponent, the opponent must succeed at a Will save (DC = 10 + 1/2 your Hit Dice + your Strength modifier) or become staggered for 1 round. This is a mindaffecting fear effect.

Engulf Revulsion.name: Engulf Revulsion
Engulf Revulsion.description:
The stomach-churning terror of your smothering attack leaves creatures sick and weakened.

Prerequisites
Engulf or smother universal monster ability.

Benefits
When you successfully engulf or smother an opponent, or successfully maintain a grapple combat maneuver on an engulfed or smothered opponent, that opponent must succeed at a Will save (DC = 10 + 1/2 your Hit Dice + your Strength modifier) or become shaken for 1 round. This is a mind-affecting fear effect.

Enhanced Coven.name: Enhanced Coven
Enhanced Coven.description:
By deepening your connection with your coven members, you have made your coven capable of casting more spells each day.

Prerequisites
Changeling, coven hex or Coven-Touched.

Benefits
Your changeling coven can cast three more spells each day from its list of spell-like abilities. If multiple members of your coven take this feat, the benefits stack.

Enhanced Gnome Magic.name: Enhanced Gnome Magic
Enhanced Gnome Magic.description:
Your ties to the First World manifest in the form of magical abilities that tap into a natural element.

Prerequisites
Cha 13, Knowledge (nature) 3 ranks, gnome, gnome magic racial trait.

Benefits
Add one of the following to your gnome magic spell-like abilities: burning hands, corrosive touch, gentle breeze, icicle dagger, or shocking grasp. You can use this spell-like ability once per day.

Enhanced Ki Throw.name: 进阶太极推手 Enhanced Ki Throw
Enhanced Ki Throw.description:
专长类型：Combat

你强化了太极推手的力道，让你可以透过使用太极推手摧毁敌人，就如同你重重的将他们踩在地上。

先决条件: 气池职业能力，太极推手。

专长效果: 当你使用太极推手专长时，你可以花费一点真气，强化你的力道，如果你成功的将敌人摔出，当他倒地时，将承受相当于你徒手击打的伤害。

资源出处: Dragon Empires Primer pg. 24

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Enhanced%20Ki%20Throw

Enlightened Noble.name: 贤明贵族 Enlightened Noble
Enlightened Noble.description:
你长于处理与家族产业相关专业领域的事务。

先决条件: 13魅力，贵族后裔，知识（贵族）1级。

专长效果: 基于贵族后裔专长中你选择的家族出身，你获得下述额外效果。

艺术之子：每天基于你的魅力调整值次数，你可以在一次表演检定中重骰2个D20并选择较好的结果。

知识之子：你可以以未受训的知识技能进行检定，如果你的某项知识技能达到10级或更高，该知识技能由贵族后裔-知识之子所给予的加值改为+2。

魔法之子：每日一次，你可以在法术专注的施法者等级检定，使用魔法物品检定，或是一次克服法术抗力的检定中，你可以获得+2加值。

安宁之子：选择一项基于感知的技能，每日一次，当你在该技能上取10时，视为你骰出18而非10点作为结果

战争之子：在骰掷先攻后，你能以直觉动作立即对一个目标发动一次基于唬骗检定的虚招，或一次基于威吓检定的挫败士气，此能力仅能影响先攻值低于你的目标。

资源出处: Heroes of the High Court pg. 4

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Enlightened%20Noble

Ennobled Resistances.name: 冠位抗力 Ennobled Resistances
Ennobled Resistances.description:
上天赐予你的庇护和抗性异常惊人。

先决条件: 神授权能职业特性，角色等级4。

专长效果: 当以迅捷动作使用天选神通职业特性为豁免检定提供加值时，选择另一个豁免并在此之上得到同样的加值。

资源出处: Heroes of the High Court pg. 23

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Ennobled%20Resistances

Enrage Opponent.name: 激怒敌人 Enrage Opponent
Enrage Opponent.description:
专长类型：CombatPanache

靠着几句嘲弄或者挑衅的动作，你能把敌人气得牙齿发痒。

先决条件: 魅力 13，业余剑客或派头（panache；ACG）职业能力，谈判专家。

专长效果: 以迅捷动作（swift action），你能够花费1点时髦值（panache point）来激怒（enrage）1名60尺范围内、智力为4或更多、且能够看到或听到你的生物。就如同挫败该生物士气一般尝试1次威吓检定。如果你成功了，那么该生物的AC会承受-2减值，直至它至少对你作出1次攻击（包括将你包含在内的区域型攻击）或者直至它不再能看到或听到你为止。在同一时间内，你只能以此专长激怒1名敌人对你发火，而且一旦你激怒了1名生物，则在24小时内无法再次激怒它。

资源出处: Ultimate Intrigue pg. 82

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Enrage%20Opponent

Ensemble.name: 乐团 Ensemble
Ensemble.description:
专长类型：Teamwork

你可以将那些业余的或是专业的家伙组织成一支乐团。

先决条件: 表演5级。

专长效果: 当你表演时，20尺内拥有同一专长的队友可以用直觉动作如同协助他人一般协助你的表演检定（包括【吟游表演】的一部份）提供加值。队友的协助他人检定先于你的检定。最多有4个队友可以为你提供帮助。队友表演技能的子类无需和你相同。

特殊说明: 如果你拥有至少1级诗人等级，则你可以将20尺内的任一队友加入乐团。队友在协助你表演时时为拥有乐团专长。

资源出处: Ultimate Magic pg. 149

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Ensemble

Entreating Critical.name: 终战重击 Entreating Critical
Entreating Critical.description:
专长类型：CombatCritical

重击能让你有机会让敌人看清现状。

先决条件: 魅力 15，呼吁停战，重击专攻，谈判专家，BAB +11，交涉5级。

专长效果: 每当你确认了1次重击（confirm a critical hit）时，攻击带来的威慑力总会带来一次机遇，让你能够以一次简短的请求（quick entreaty）终结敌意。在确认重击（confirming the critical hit）后立即通过直觉动作（immediate action），你能够尝试1次交涉检定改变目标的态度，就好像花费了1整轮（full round）的时间使用呼吁停战（Call Truce）专长一般。所有其他呼吁停战（Call Truce）专长所具有的条件与限制依旧有效。

资源出处: Ultimate Intrigue pg. 82

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Entreating%20Critical

Entwining Stare.name: Entwining Stare
Entwining Stare.description:
Your painful stare makes your enemies easier to grab and constrict.

Prerequisites
Mesmerist level 7th, painful stare class feature.

Benefits
When you trigger your painful stare to add damage to an attack with grab, the target takes a -4 penalty to its CMD against the grab's grapple combat maneuver attempt.

Ephemeral Tread.name: Ephemeral Tread
Ephemeral Tread.description:
You are able to gain some abilities of a lucid dreamer while in your corporeal form.

Prerequisites
Cha 15, Lucid Dreamer, Knowledge (planes) 5 ranks.

Benefits
Once per day, when you are in the Dimension of Dreams in your physical body, you can attempt an impossible action as a standard action as though you were in a lucid body. No positive modifiers can be applied to this roll other than your Charisma modifier.

Erastil's Blessing.name: Erastil's Blessing
Erastil's Blessing.description:
Old Deadeye's favor grants you prowess with a bow that far exceeds your own physical capabilities.

Prerequisites
Weapon Focus (longbow), must be a worshiper of Erastil.

Benefits
You can use your Wisdom modifier instead of your Dexterity modifier on ranged attack rolls when using a bow.

Eroding Strikes.name: Eroding Strikes
Eroding Strikes.description:
With careful, repeated blows, you weaken your foe's defenses.

Prerequisites
Weapon Focus with bludgeoning weapon.

Benefits
