Felling Smash.description:
专长类型：Combat

你集中你所有的力量进行一次毁灭性的猛击，试图将你的敌人击垮在地。

先决条件: 智力13，力量13，寓守于攻，精通绊摔，猛力攻击，基本攻击加值+6。

专长效果: 当你以攻击动作使用猛力攻击进行一次最高攻击加值的单次近战攻击时，如果你命中，你可以花费迅捷动作来对目标进行一次绊摔尝试。

资源出处: Ultimate Combat pg. 101

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Felling%20Smash

战策增益：即使在你并不满足属性先决条件（智力13）时你也能选取这个专长。你只能在你的耐力池至少拥有1点耐力时才能获得这个专长的好处。你可以使用5点耐力来让来自这个专长的绊摔尝试变成一个自由动作而不是迅捷动作。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 119

Fencing Grace.name: 优雅挑刺 Fencing Grace
Fencing Grace.description:
专长类型：Combat

你那优雅的架势和刺剑组合起来，使得你能够以灵活性、而非蛮力来制服敌人。

先决条件: 敏捷 13，武器娴熟，武器专攻（细剑）。

专长效果: 当你以单手持用细剑（rapier）时，能够将敏捷调整值取代力量调整值，以应用至该武器的伤害上。这把细剑必须符合你的体型。当你以双武器或者使用疾风连击（flurry of blows）进行战斗、或者另一只手被占用（occupied）时，便无法获得该好处。

此外，若你具有派头（panache；ACG）职业能力，且至少还有1点时髦值（panache point）时，你会在对抗向你的细剑进行卸武（disarm）尝试中，CMD获得+2加值。

资源出处: Ultimate Intrigue pg. 83Advanced Class Origins pg. 27

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Fencing%20Grace

Feral Combat Training.name: 野性战斗训练 Feral Combat Training
Feral Combat Training.description:
专长类型：Combat

你曾蒙异人传授，习得了如何使用你的种族或职业特性赋予你的天生武器施展招式的艺术。

先决条件: 精通徒手打击，武器专攻（天生武器）。

专长效果: 选择一种你的天生武器。当使用选择的天生武器时，你可以应用那些以“精通徒手打击”为前提的专长。

特殊说明: 如果你是一个武僧，你可以用你选择应用此专长效果的天生武器施展【疾风连击】。

资源出处: Ultimate Combat pg. 101

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Feral%20Combat%20Training

战策增益：在你回合开始的时候，你可以消耗任意点数的耐力。直到你的下一轮开始，你每以这种方式消耗2点耐力，你可以将野性战斗专长的好处应用到一次由天生武器而不是你通过这个专长选择的武器做出的天生武器攻击上。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 119

Feral Grace.name: 野性优雅 Feral Grace
Feral Grace.description:
专长类型：Combat

动物伙伴的优雅与灵巧受到战斗的磨砺，这让它成为极为致命的斗士。

先决条件: “武器娴熟”，BAB+3，动物伙伴。

专长效果: 选择动物伙伴的一种天生武器。当动物伙伴用选择的天生武器进行攻击，并在攻击检定上使用敏捷加值、伤害上使用力量加值时，将它1/4的生命骰数加到伤害检定上作为加值。此加值不会因该天生武器是主要或次要天生攻击而增加或减少。

特殊说明: 你可以多次选择此专长。其效果不叠加。每次你选择此专长时，选择一种不同的天生攻击，应用此专长的效果。

资源出处: Ultimate Wilderness pg. 218

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Feral%20Grace

Feral Heart.name: 狂野之心 Feral Heart
Feral Heart.description:
专长类型：Story

野兽的心脏在你的胸膛里跳动着。

先决条件: 你必须因精神受创而回归野性、或曾经历一段野性时光；或拥有“野性狼孩（Raised by Beasts）”角色背景。

专长效果: 每当你受到力量属性或攻击检定的士气加值（如通过‘英雄气概’法术或野蛮人的狂暴能力），你基于力量和敏捷的属性检定、技能检定+2，同时反射豁免+1，直到士气效果结束。

专长目标: 与一位来自文明社会的伴侣结合。你们的关系必须建立在爱情，而非买卖或胁迫之上。

完成收益: 陷入疲乏、力竭、战栗或恶心效果时将其延后1轮生效。若你已经处于该状态、并再次发生类似状况，本专长无效。尽管暂时无视对应效果，但它们确实存在。举例而言，当你战栗并因本专长受益时，若再度受到战栗效果将会陷入惊惧。

资源出处: Ultimate Campaign pg. 69

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Feral%20Heart

Ferocious Action.name: 凶猛行动 Ferocious Action
Ferocious Action.description:
凶猛的你迅捷而薄命。

先决条件: 【凶猛】种族特性，兽人。

专长效果: 当你HP降为0或更低时，你每轮失去2点HP，但是你不会陷入恍惚。若你处在狂暴中（比如来自野蛮人职业能力的），你每轮只失去1点HP。

资源出处: Advanced Race Guide pg. 141

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Ferocious%20Action

Ferocious Beast.name: 凶猛野兽 Ferocious Beast
Ferocious Beast.description:
专长类型：Combat

透过训练，又或者是与生俱来的能力，动物伙伴特别擅长扰乱敌人的行动。

先决条件: 威吓1级，动物伙伴。

专长效果: 动物伙伴在进行挫败敌人士气和使用“嘲讽”UM（Antagonize）专长的威吓检定时，以主人职业等级的一半（最少1）取代其魅力调整值。此外，动物伙伴可以用移动动作挫败敌人士气。

特殊说明: 动物伙伴不能同时选取“凶猛野兽”与“威逼”专长。

资源出处: Ultimate Wilderness pg. 218

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Ferocious%20Beast

Ferocious Feint.name: 凶猛虚招 Ferocious Feint
Ferocious Feint.description:
专长类型：Combat

透过训练，又或者是生来就有的能力，动物伙伴特别擅长虚晃敌人一招。

先决条件: 唬骗1级，动物伙伴。

专长效果: 动物伙伴在进行对敌人使用虚招的唬骗检定时，以主人职业等级的一半（最少1）取代其魅力调整值。此外，动物伙伴可以用移动动作用唬骗对敌人进行虚招。

资源出处: Ultimate Wilderness pg. 218

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Ferocious%20Feint

Ferocious Horde.name: Ferocious Horde
Ferocious Horde.description:
Seeing a fellow orc bleed makes you fight harder.

Prerequisites
Orc, ferocity racial trait.

Benefits
Whenever you are at or below half of your full hit points and an orc ally within 30 feet who also has this feat is at or below half of her full hit points, you gain a +2 morale bonus on attack rolls.

Ferocious Loyalty.name: Ferocious Loyalty
Ferocious Loyalty.description:
You have a powerful sense of responsibility for your allies.

Benefits
You gain a +1 morale bonus on attack rolls against any foe that currently threatens an ally who also has this feat. Whenever an ally with this feat is rendered helpless or killed within 30 feet of you, you gain a +2 morale bonus on attack rolls for 1 minute or until the foe responsible is rendered helpless or killed, whichever comes first.

Ferocious Resolve.name: 凶暴决意 Ferocious Resolve
Ferocious Resolve.description:
你的兽人血脉允许你持续作战。

先决条件: 体质13，半兽人，【兽人凶猛】种族特性。

专长效果: 你获得“凶猛”通用怪物特性，这使你能够在HP降至负值之后继续战斗。当使用该能力时，你的威吓检定获得+2加值。

通常状况: 半兽人的【兽人凶猛】种族特性只允许他在HP降至负值后战斗1轮。

【特性速查】凶猛（Ferocity, Ex）：拥有凶猛能力的生物即使在HP达到0以下，也可以保持清醒并且继续战斗。该生物还是会在HP低于0时进入恍惚状态并且每轮失去1点HP。拥有凶猛能力的生物在HP降到负体质值时还是会死亡。

资源出处: Advanced Race Guide pg. 57

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Ferocious%20Resolve

Ferocious Summons.name: 凶暴召唤 Ferocious Summons
Ferocious Summons.description:
你召唤的生物如你一般凶猛。

先决条件: 增强召唤，法术专攻（咒法系），半兽人或兽人。

专长效果: 你召唤的生物获得“凶猛”通用怪物特性。

资源出处: Advanced Race Guide pg. 57

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Ferocious%20Summons

Ferocious Tenacity.name: 不屈凶暴 Ferocious Tenacity
Ferocious Tenacity.description:
专长类型：Combat

你对死亡不屑一顾。

先决条件: “凶猛”种族特性，半兽人或兽人，【狂暴】职业特性。

专长效果: 当你处于狂暴状态时，每天1次，如果你受到一次攻击所造成的伤害足以杀死你（负HP等同于你的体质属性），你能够以一个直觉动作并花费1或更多的狂暴轮数降低该伤害并使你存活下来。你所花费的每个狂暴轮数能够降低1点该次攻击的伤害，但是无法将该次伤害降低至1点以下。

比如，当你处于狂暴状态，拥有18点体质，当前HP为2点，并且受到一次造成20点伤害的攻击（这足以使你的HP降至-18点并杀死你），你能够花费1轮狂暴轮数使伤害降低1点（这使你的HP降至-17点并免于被直接杀死）；如果你花费17轮狂暴轮数，你能够将伤害降至1点（最低值），使你还剩1点HP。【编者吐槽：2-20+17=1，原文如此，可作为数死早的范例。】

备注：如果该伤害仍会使你失去意识，你的狂暴就会像通常情况那样结束，将你的体质属性降至普通状态并使你的总HP恢复正常。因此，上述例子允许你使用该专长防止自己立刻死亡，但是你仍可能由于负HP超过正常体质属性而……所以当你使用该专长并决定花费多少狂暴轮数时，多考虑一下原本的体质属性。

【译注：【凶猛（Ferocity）】为兽人种族特性，半兽人初始木有。】

【编注：通过“凶暴决意”专长获得的“凶猛”通用特性应该可以视作满足这里的先决条件。】

资源出处: Advanced Race Guide pg. 57Orcs of Golarion pg. 24

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Ferocious%20Tenacity

战策增益：当你使用这个专长时，你可以使用2点耐力来代替一轮狂暴来获得一样的效果。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 119

Fetid Breath.name: 腐败呼吸 Fetid Breath
Fetid Breath.description:
你从肺里翻出来深深的一口气，让周围充满了令人窒息的恶臭。

先决条件: 体质15，6HD，食人魔，腐烂神。

专长效果: 你可以喷出30尺锥形的刺鼻气体——混杂着你自身的烂疮与胃里没消化完全的食物形成的杀伤性口臭。然后处于喷吐范围内的生物都必须通过一个DC=（10+1/2你的HD+你的体质调整值）的强韧检定否则将陷入反胃状态1d6轮。被影响的生物可以以一个整轮动作尝试躲开你的口臭，并尝试吸入新鲜空气来进行一个新的豁免检定。你每日可以使用本能力两次，并且在HD每比6高额外6点时再获得一次每日的额外使用机会。

资源出处: Monster Codex pg. 152

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Fetid%20Breath

Fey Foundling.name: 精类遗孤 Fey Foundling
Fey Foundling.description:
当你在旷野中被发现时，还是一个孩子，身上带有与第一世界（the First World）有关的印记。

先决条件: 必须在1级选取。

专长效果: 你的生命中已经融入了与第一世界和精类的怪异联系，无论何时你受到魔法治疗时，每骰会额外治疗2点伤害。在对抗死亡效果（death effects）的所有豁免中均获得+2加值。不幸的是，当你受到寒铁（cold iron）武器造成的伤害时，额外增加1点（尽管你仍旧可以使用寒铁武器而不会感到明显的不适）。

资源出处: Inner Sea World Guide pg. 286Pathfinder Campaign Setting pg. 80

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Fey%20Foundling

Fey Friend.name: 妖精之友 Fey Friend
Fey Friend.description:
先决条件：信仰原初长者（The Eldest）

先决条件: 信仰原初长者（The Eldest）。

专长效果: 精类生物将你也视为妖精，所有精类的法术和能力将你视为精类生物。除此之外，你在对精类生物的唬骗，交涉和察言观色检定上获得+2加值。

资源出处: Inner Sea Gods pg. 212

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Fey%20Friend

Fey Insight.name: Fey Insight
Fey Insight.description:
You have insight into the weird, alien minds of fey and can use this knowledge to more handily negotiate with or manipulate the capricious creatures.

Prerequisites
Wis 13; Knowledge (nature) or Knowledge (planes) 2 ranks.

Benefits
You gain a +2 bonus on Bluff, Diplomacy, and Sense Motive skill checks when interacting with creatures of the fey type. If you have 10 or more ranks in one of these skills, the bonus gained when interacting with creatures of the fey type increases to +4 for that skill.

Fey Obedience.name: Fey Obedience
Fey Obedience.description:
Your devotion to one of the Eldest is so great that daily prayer and offerings grant you special boons.

Prerequisites
Knowledge (planes) 3 ranks, must worship one of the Eldest.

Benefits
Each Eldest requires a different obedience, but each obedience takes only 1 hour to perform. Once you've performed the obedience, you gain the benefit of a special ability or resistance as indicated in the 'Obedience' entry for that Eldest.

If you have at least 12 Hit Dice, you also gain the first boon granted by your Eldest upon undertaking your obedience. If you have at least 16 Hit Dice, you also gain the Eldest's second boon. If you have at least 20 Hit Dice, you also gain the Eldest's third boon. Unless a specific duration or number of uses per day is listed, a boon's effects are constant.

Feysworn gain access to these boons at lower levels as a benefit of their prestige class.

If you ever fail to perform a daily obedience, you lose all access to the benefits and boons granted by this feat until you next perform the obedience.

Fey Performance.name: 精类表演 Fey Performance
Fey Performance.description:
风、树和当地的野生动物加入到了你的吟游表演中。

先决条件: 吟游表演职业能力。

专长效果: 开始表演时，你可以花费一轮额外的吟游表演，用大自然的景色与天籁提高你的表演能力。这次表演的有效范围增加了30英尺。在对以盲和聋的生物为目标时，这种表演同时被认为具有声音和可见现象的成分。本专长在缺乏动植物生活的环境中不起作用。

资源出处: Ultimate Wilderness pg. 111Heroes of the Wild pg. 26

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Fey%20Performance

Fey Spell Lore.name: 精怪术法学识 Fey Spell Lore
Fey Spell Lore.description:
你学会了精类爱用的危险法术。

先决条件: 魅力 13，法术辨识1级，施放德鲁伊法术（druid spells）的能力。

专长效果: 将后述法术添加到你的德鲁伊法术列表中对应的环级上：0环——舞光术（Dancing Lights），1环——次等困惑术（Confusion, Lesser），2环——魅惑人类（Charm Person），3环——隐形术（Invisibility），4环——降咒（Bestow Curse），5环——魅惑怪物（Charm Monster），6环——强效诅咒（Curse, Major；UM），7环——梦之衣（Cloak of Dreams；APG），8环——精神错乱（Insanity），9环——迷舞（Irresistible Dance）。

资源出处: Ultimate Intrigue pg. 83

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Fey%20Spell%20Lore

Fey Spell Versatility.name: 精怪术法技巧 Fey Spell Versatility
Fey Spell Versatility.description:
你从精类那里学得了魔法的奥秘。

先决条件: 魅力 13，法术辨识1级，施放游侠法术（ranger spells）的能力。

专长效果: 从吟游诗人（bard）、术士/法师（sorcerer/wizard）、或女巫（witch）的法术列表内，属于附魔（enchantment）或幻术（illusion）学派、或者具有诅咒（curse；UM）描述符的法术中，选择1环法术、2环法术、3环法术和4环法术各1个。将这些法术加入到你的游侠法术列表中。一旦选择，这些法术就无法被更改。

资源出处: Ultimate Intrigue pg. 83

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Fey%20Spell%20Versatility

Fey-Guarded.name: Fey-Guarded
Fey-Guarded.description:
You have trained your mind to resist fey magic--both that cast by fey creatures and that cast by other denizens of the First World.

Prerequisites
Knowledge (nature) or Knowledge (planes) 3 ranks.

Benefits
You gain a +2 morale bonus on saving throws against enchantment and illusion spells and spell-like abilities cast by creatures of the fey type.

Field Repair.name: 战地维修 Field Repair
Field Repair.description:
即使手边没有趁手工具，你也可以对破损的武器和盔甲进行应急处理。

先决条件: 工艺4级。

专长效果: 如果你在破损的道具的对应工艺技能上已受训，你可以在没有材料成本和只有简易工具的情况下进行修复，并且没有手艺技能检定惩罚。如果你花费一整天，该物品将会恢复1点加上原最大生命值1/4的生命值。此外，如果一把火器由于哑火而破损、一台攻城兵器由于掉链而破损或是一件〔易碎〕武器破损（或其他类似情况），你可以进行一次对应物品类型的DC的工艺检定。如果检定成功，物品的破损状态被移除。

通常状况: 使用简易工具会导致手艺技能有-2罚值。修复物品需要原材料。

资源出处: Ultimate Combat pg. 101

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Field%20Repair

Fiend Sight.name: 邪魔视觉 Fiend Sight
Fiend Sight.description:
你的双眼在低光以及黑暗环境下变得更加锐利。

先决条件: 黑暗视觉60尺，魔裔。

专长效果: 你获得昏暗视觉，同时黑暗视觉提升到120尺。

特殊说明: 你可以选择该专长两次。当你第二次选择，你获得“看透黑暗”怪物能力。

【特性速查】看透黑暗（See in Darkness, Su）：该生物可以看穿任何种类的黑暗，包括‘深幽黑暗术’。

资源出处: Advanced Race Guide pg. 174

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Fiend%20Sight

Fiendish Darkness.name: Fiendish Darkness
Fiendish Darkness.description:
You can use your darkness spell-like ability more often.

Prerequisites
Darkness spell-like ability, tiefling.

Benefits
You can use darkness three times per day as a spell-like ability.

Normal
Tieflings can use darkness once per day as a spell-like ability.

Fiendish Facade.name: Fiendish Facade
Fiendish Facade.description:
You are easily mistaken for a member of another race. Your fiendish physical traits are normally hidden by clothing or appear to be markings of another race.

Prerequisites
Must be taken at 1st level, tiefling.

Benefits
You gain a +5 racial bonus on Disguise checks when attempting to impersonate a particular race. You must select the race you are able to impersonate when you select this feat, and thereafter you cannot change the race you have chosen. That race must be Medium size.

Fiendish Heritage.name: Fiendish Heritage
Fiendish Heritage.description:
You possess a strong tie to your fiendish ancestors, granting you favorable abilities.

Prerequisites
Tiefling, must be taken at 1st level.

Benefits
Your fiendish bloodline proves particularly strong, being tied to a specific race of fiends. Rather than taking a tiefling's usual racial ability modifiers, choose one of the tiefling heritage modifiers presented on page 64. In addition, you may roll on the Variant Tiefling Abilities table three times and choose the most favorable ability.

Nethys Note
Blood of Fiends pgs. 18-23 reprints the tiefling heritages and does not require players to select the Fiendish Heritage feat to take one.

Fiendish Obedience.name: 魔族仪典 Fiendish Obedience
Fiendish Obedience.description:
你致力献身于魔族的庇护主（可以是神祇、半神、或准神），以每日的祈祷和小小的祭献来换取特殊的神恩。

先决条件: 知识（宗教）3级，必须崇拜一位魔族神祇、半神、或准神（例如本书第1章的那些存在）。

专长效果: 每一位魔族都有其特定的日常服从仪典，不过这些仪典每天最多只需要一小时来完成。你能在准备法术的同时结合服从仪典的行为。一旦你完成服从仪典以后，你将获得你所崇拜的魔族所拥有的“服从仪典”项目所列出的特殊能力与抗力奖励。

如果你拥有至少12个HD，你获得你所信仰魔族的第一神恩（Boon）；在16HD时，你获得祂的第二神恩；在20HD时，你获得最终的第三神恩。除非特别提及其持续时间，否则神恩在一经获得后是永久生效的。

当你获得魔族仪典的神恩时，你一般获得的是颂教者（Exalted）神恩。若你获得罪恶使徒（Damned Disciple）或罪恶尖兵（Damned Soldier）专长时，你能选择传音者（Evangelist）或者卫道者（Sentinel）神恩。某些进阶职业也可以改变获得的神恩种类。一旦你选择了一个神恩，你通常不能在日后改变获得的神恩种类（除非在特定的进阶职业中回溯性地改变你的神恩）。

恶魔狂信者（demoniac）、魔鬼大师（diabolist）、吮魂者（souldrinker）进阶职业（看pg. 208-213）给予你在较低HD时即可获得神恩。在这些职业中，你必需选择你想要的神恩种类；一旦选择，你就锁定在那项种类中（而之前的神恩也会被回溯性地改变）。

如果你未能执行每日的服从仪典，你将失去所有通过本专长获得的神恩奖励，直到你下一次完成服从仪典为止。

资源出处: Book of the Damned pg. 178

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Fiendish%20Obedience

Fiendish Resilience.name: Fiendish Resilience
Fiendish Resilience.description:
You dodge energy attacks with amazing agility.

Prerequisites
Dex 13, evasion class feature, tiefling.

Benefits
Choose one of the following energy types that you have resistance to: cold, electricity, or fire. Anytime you make a Reflex saving throw against an attack that deals the selected type of energy damage and is subject to your evasion class feature, you gain a +4 competence bonus on the save.

Special
You can take this feat multiple times. Each time you take it, you select a different qualifying energy type.

Fiendish Serpent.name: 蛇魔 Fiendish Serpent
Fiendish Serpent.description:
虽然变形成蛇是在诸如阿巴拉克萨斯（Abraxas）或是格殷永（Geryon）等蛇形半神那魔族仆从中最为常见，但是任何魔族的信徒都可能呈现这种型态。

先决条件: 两足身体型态（Bipedal body shape），邪恶亚种的非本地异界生物（non-native outsider with the evil subtype）。

专长效果: 你已用一条蛇尾取代你的双腿爬行。这使你获得了等同于你基础速度的攀爬速度和游泳速度，并且你不能被绊摔（tripped）。

资源出处: Book of the Damned pg. 178

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Fiendish%20Serpent

Fiendish Wings.name: 翼魔 Fiendish Wings
Fiendish Wings.description:
你拥有了那有能力带你到高处的巨大翅膀。你通过这种方式获得的翅膀各不相同，从在恶魔和魔鬼中常见的类蝙蝠翅膀，到莎祖瑞尔（Szuriel）的将军们的那种羽翅，再到链魔们的那种伸展皮膜。

先决条件: 邪恶亚种的非本地异界生物（Non-native outsider with the evil subtype）。

专长效果: 你的翅膀赋予了你等同于你基础速度的飞行速度，并拥有良好机动性（good maneuverability）。

资源出处: Book of the Damned pg. 179

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Fiendish%20Wings

Fiendskin.name: Fiendskin
Fiendskin.description:
The forces of darkness gird you against the light.

Benefits
You gain defensive abilities related to your patron's outsider subtype. For example, if your patron is a devil, the abilities listed below tie into the devil subtype (see Creature Subtypes, starting on page 310 of the Pathfinder RPG Bestiary). These benefits tie to your patron's subtype, not your specific patron (its abilities might differ from the norm).

One Damnation Feat
Choose one of the energy types to which your patron's outsider subtype grants resistance. You gain resistance 5 against that energy type.

Two Damnation Feats
Choose one of the energy types to which your patron's outsider subtype grants resistance. You gain resistance 5 against that energy type. If you already have resistance to the chosen energy type (even from earlier benefits of this feat), this new resistance stacks with the existing resistance.

Three Damnation Feats
Choose one of the energy types to which your patron's outsider subtype grants resistance. You gain immunity to the selected energy type.

Four Damnation Feats
Your creature type changes to outsider (native). Additionally, choose one energy type to which your patron's outsider subtype grants immunity or resistance. You gain immunity to that energy type.

Fight On.name: 挺住再上 Fight On
Fight On.description:
即使在死后，你也能战斗。

先决条件: 体质13，矮人，半兽人或者兽人。

专长效果: 每日1次，你能够获得等同于你的体质修正的临时HP。你能在HP小于等于0时以直觉动作激活该专长。你能够使用该专长预防自身陷入濒死状态。这些暂时HP持续1分钟。如果你的HP由于失去这些暂时HP而低于0，那么你会如常陷入濒死并失去意识。如果你拥有【凶猛】种族特性，则可以在失去来自该专长的暂时HP时使用它。

资源出处: Advanced Players Guide pg. 160

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Fight%20On

Fighting Frenzy.name: 战狂之心 Fighting Frenzy
Fighting Frenzy.description:
专长类型：CombatTeamwork

你与盟友一起陷入狂怒，投身不顾一切的恶斗。

先决条件: 魅力13，狂暴职业能力。

专长效果: 每当你和一个距离你60尺内且拥有本专长的盟友同时进入狂暴状态，你不会因为狂暴而承受防御等级上的-2减值。如果你因为狂暴而承受高于2点防御等级减值，这个减值减少2点。

资源出处: Advanced Class Origins pg. 27

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Fighting%20Frenzy

Figment's Fluidity.name: Figment's Fluidity
Figment's Fluidity.description:
Your familiar can rework the dream-stuff it is made of.

Prerequisites
Must have a familiar with the figment archetype (see page 10).

Benefits
Once per day, your familiar can spend a full-round action to manually reshape itself, reassigning 1 evolution point of eidolon evolutions. The evolution it loses can't be a prerequisite for any other evolutions it has. It can use this ability twice per day at 7th level, and three times per day at 13th level.

Filth Forager.name: Filth Forager
Filth Forager.description:
Your regular exposure to the filth and unfortunate residues common to sewers and subterranean urban environs has caused you to develop a resistance to the effects of such conditions.

Benefits
You gain a +4 bonus on all saving throws against diseases and any effect that would cause you to become nauseated or sickened.

Filthy Weapons.name: Filthy Weapons
Filthy Weapons.description:
You spread contagion with your weapons by covering their business ends in virulent muck and sewage.

Prerequisites
Knowledge (dungeoneering) 1 rank, Knowledge (nature) 1 rank.

Benefits
You can take a standard action to cover a weapon in decomposing waste, slimy filth, or other virulent agent. The next attack with that weapon that succeeds against a foe exposes the target to filth fever. If the attack is a critical hit, the filth fever has an onset time of 1 round, and a save DC equal to 10 + 1/2 your base attack bonus + your Intelligence modifier.

Final Embrace.name: 最终拥抱 Final Embrace
Final Embrace.description:
专长类型：Combat

你的紧勒变得致命，让你能够捆绑和你同体型或更小的生物。

先决条件: 力量13，智力3，纳迦、蛇人或拥有＜紧勒＞特殊攻击的生物，基本攻击加值+3。

专长效果: 你获得＜紧勒＞和＜攫抓＞特殊攻击作为种族特性。你的紧勒将会造成等于你徒手打击或者天生武器的近战伤害。此外，你可以攫抓和紧勒最多和你同等体型的生物。

通常状况: 你只能攫抓和紧勒比你体型小一级的生物。

【特性速查】紧勒（Constrict, Ex）：当一个生物做了一个成功的擒抱检定时，他可以使用这种特殊攻击挤压敌人，造成钝击伤害（可与成功检定引起的其他效果共存，包括额外伤害）。伤害的总和已经在该生物的介绍中给出，并且伤害不逊于该生物使用近战攻击造成的伤害总和。

【特性速查】攫抓（Grab, Ex）：具有此能力的生物一旦用近战武器（通常为爪抓或啮咬）命中目标，它在造成正常伤害之外，还会自动展开擒抱，这是自由动作且不会引发借机攻击。除非特别说明，否则攫抓只能针对体型比该生物至少小一级的对手。如果该生物可以擒抱其他体型的生物，那么会在特殊攻击中列出。该生物可以用通常的方式展开擒抱，或仅限于用展开攫抓的身体部位将对手定身。如果选择后者，它将在对抗擒抱的CMB上有-20的减值，但这样它自身便可认为不处于擒抱状态；成功的擒抱检定不会制造任何额外的伤害，除非它有紧勒的特殊能力。在后续回合中，如果该生物不会紧勒，每个成功的擒抱检定将自动造成伤害，伤害相当于最初定身对手的攻击所造成的伤害；否则，它还将造成紧勒伤害（具体数目在生物的描述中给出）。有攫抓特殊攻击的生物在开始和保持擒抱的战技检定中获得+4加值。

资源出处: Ultimate Combat pg. 101

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Final%20Embrace

战策增益：你可以消耗2点耐力来擒抱一个比你大一个体型的生物。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 119

Final Embrace Horror.name: 恐怖最终拥抱 Final Embrace Horror
Final Embrace Horror.description:
专长类型：Combat

很少有生物能活着离开你粉碎性的最终拥抱。

先决条件: 力量15，智力3，纳迦、蛇人或拥有＜紧勒＞特殊攻击的生物，最终拥抱，基本攻击加值+6。

专长效果: 当你的＜紧勒＞攻击对一个生物造成伤害，它同时也会陷入颤栗状态，持续到你下次行动开始为止。

资源出处: Ultimate Combat pg. 101

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Final%20Embrace%20Horror

战策增益：当一个生物被你的紧勒能力伤害时，你可以消耗2点耐力来让这个生物恶心直到你的下一个回合开始。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 119

Final Embrace Master.name: 最终拥抱极意 Final Embrace Master
Final Embrace Master.description:
专长类型：Combat

很少有生物能活着离开你粉碎性的最终拥抱。

先决条件: 力量17，智力3，纳迦、蛇人或拥有＜紧勒＞特殊攻击的生物，最终拥抱，恐怖最终拥抱，基本攻击加值+9。

专长效果: 你的＜紧勒＞特殊攻击的伤害骰翻倍。

资源出处: Ultimate Combat pg. 102

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Final%20Embrace%20Master

战策增益：每当你擒抱时，你可以消耗5点耐力来将来自你紧勒能力的伤害骰翻三倍而不是两倍。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 119

FInd the Flaw.name: FInd the Flaw
FInd the Flaw.description:
You sense the minute imperfections in the otherwise ordered structure of your foes' weapons and armor.

Prerequisites
Str 13, Improved Sunder, Power Attack, base attack bonus +1, Craft (armor or weapons) 5 ranks, aphorite.

Benefits
When performing a sunder combat maneuver, you ignore a number of points of hardness equal to your Intelligence modifier.

Finesse Shot.name: 唯手熟尔 Finesse Shot
Finesse Shot.description:
专长类型：Weapon Mastery

任何需要手来做的事情你都可以靠一发箭矢或是一颗子弹做到…事实上你还能办到更多。

先决条件: 万能射击，BAB+7，对所选远程武器拥有战士武器训练（Weapon Training）职业能力。

专长效果: 除了可以使用一件你所擅长的所选远程武器来发动铳士的万用射击UC勇毅动作外，你还可以获得以下特殊的射击技巧。

开/关射击：你可以以一个标准动作通过一次远程攻击来打开或是关上一件物品，这需要你用远程武器对一件处于你的第一个射程增量内，无人看管的门，窗户或是容器的盖子来一发。这个物品的防御等级视为3+它的体型调整值（至少+0）+它的硬度。如果你的攻击命中，那么你成功的将它打开或是关上。在其他方面，本动作的效果与法术开/关术相同。

触发射击：你可以用射击来触发陷阱的机关，这需要你用远程武器对一件处于你的第一个射程增量内的陷阱来一发。这个陷阱的防御等级视为10+解除它的解除装置技能检定DC。如果你的攻击命中，那么陷阱会被立刻触发，如同它的触发条件被满足一般。

操作射击：你可以以一个标准动作通过一次远程攻击来使用一件简单的物品。这个动作的效果与使用万用射击勇毅动作来射飞无主物品类似，但你其实是运用射击将它操作了一下。举例来说，你可以用这个动作射击一个远处的开关，让它将一座浮桥升起来。

资源出处: Weapon Masters Handbook pg. 21

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Finesse%20Shot

Finishing Cascade.name: Finishing Cascade
Finishing Cascade.description:
Your blows set up your opponents for a devastating finish.

Prerequisites
Base attack bonus +11 or monk level 11th; at least one combination feat.

Benefits
The first time in a round you use a combination feat to apply a reduction or penalty to yourself or an enemy, you can double the feat's numerical modifier. For example, you can double the reduction granted by Combat Rhythm to -2. This does not double any other effects of combination feats, such as damage.

Fire God's Blessing.name: Fire God's Blessing
Fire God's Blessing.description:
The Fire God rewards you for killing enemies with flame.

Prerequisites
Half-orc or orc, worshiper of the Fire God.

Benefits
When in combat, if you deal fire damage to an enemy, you heal 1 hit point. You can only benefit from this healing once per round. Attacks that cause a target to catch on fire heal you each round the target takes fire damage.

Fire Hand.name: 火掌 Fire Hand
Fire Hand.description:
专长类型：Combat

你生来掌中带有火炬胎记，在任何与焚烧有关的事情上都能显现非同一般的天赋。

先决条件: 地精。

专长效果: 你可以用火炬作为武器，并且不会由于不擅长而受到罚值，同时在使用近战武器造成火焰伤害时的攻击检定获得+1加值。

资源出处: Advanced Race Guide pg. 118

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Fire%20Hand

战策增益：当你用火炬攻击击中一个生物时，你可以消耗1点耐力。如果你这样做了，这次攻击造成的火焰伤害将会提升到1d6点火焰伤害。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 119

Fire Music.name: 燃火之音 Fire Music
Fire Music.description:
你将控制火焰的能力和诗人的音乐相互混合，从而创造了一种奇怪的魔法。

先决条件: 法术辨识5级，能够施展诗人法术，能够从其他施法者职业中施展带有火焰的奥术。

专长效果: 当你施展一个诗人法术造成伤害时，你可以用火焰伤害替换法术的正常伤害，或者造成一半火焰伤害一半正常伤害。

如果你用诗人法术施展‘召唤怪物’，你可以选择给予召唤生物燃烧的外观，从而使之获得5点火抗力并且在天生武器攻击时造成额外1点火焰伤害。这一生物在5尺范围内提供昏暗照明。如果召唤的生物已经拥有火系类别，则此专长无效。

当你使用这一专长时，使用的法术获得〔火〕描述符。

资源出处: Ultimate Magic pg. 150

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Fire%20Music

Fire Music (Mythic).name: 燃火之音(神话) Fire Music (Mythic)
Fire Music (Mythic).description:
先决条件：燃火之音

你能够巧妙地将古老的火之旋律融入自身的法术中。

神话专长效果：当你使用燃火之音专长，并以此来将任何吟游诗人法术造成的伤害变为火焰伤害时，该伤害会忽略最高等同于你的阶层点火焰抗力。

若你以吟游诗人法术施放召唤怪物法术，并赋予召唤出的生物燃烧的外观，该名生物的火焰抗力增加5点（加到燃火之音已经赋予的抗力之上），并使它们的所有天生攻击造成1d4点火焰伤害，以取代燃火之音专长正常赋予的+1点火焰伤害。具有火系亚种的生物也会获得这些好处。

资源出处: Mythic Adventures pg. 65

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Fire%20Music

Fire Tamer.name: 驯火者 Fire Tamer
Fire Tamer.description:
你熟知火焰的习性，即使是魔法的火焰也一样。

先决条件: 地精。

专长效果: 你在对抗带有〔火〕描述符的法术的豁免检定时获得+2加值。此外，你身上的疤痕说明你是一名有才华的驯火者，这使你在与其他地精打交道时的交涉以及威吓检定获得+2环境加值。

资源出处: Advanced Race Guide pg. 118

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Fire%20Tamer

Firebrand.name: 火焰纹章 Firebrand
Firebrand.description:
专长类型：fire

你为几个盟友身上刻下火焰构成的印记。这个印记不会造成任何伤害，并且会发出如同一个火把一般的光芒。

当火焰印记生效后，任何被标记的生物对你的法术造成的火焰伤害都会完全免疫。

所有目标的武器 (天生和人造武器) 的每一击都会造成额外1d6点的火焰伤害 (此额外伤害可以和任何武器造成的火焰伤害叠加)。

在法术持续时间内的任何时候，受术生物都可以用一个迅捷动作对30英尺内的任何目标发射一道火焰射线。射线需要一次远程接触攻击检定，成功后造成6d6点火焰伤害。

一旦受术生物使用本法术能力发射火焰射线，它身上的法术效果立刻结束。



资源出处: Advanced Players Guide pg. 222

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/SpellDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Firebrand

Firesight.name: 火焰视域 Firesight
Firesight.description:
火焰与烟云再也无法从你的眼前掩盖任何事物。

先决条件: 火元素裔。

专长效果: 你可以看透火焰与烟雾而不会因此受到任何惩罚，你忽视任何火焰与烟雾产生的掩蔽或隐蔽加值。但是这不会让你能够看到通常无法看到的东西（例如隐形生物依旧不可见）。你免疫目眩状态。

资源出处: Advanced Race Guide pg. 130

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Firesight

First General of the East.name: First General of the East
First General of the East.description:
Your creator was a soldier and person of war, and your memories are filled with the taste of blood.

Prerequisites
Character level 5th, shabti.

Benefits
Once per day, you can cast greater magic weapon as a spell-like ability. You gain a second daily use at 9th level, and a third at 15th level. Only you can benefit from this spell-like ability; anyone else who wields the enchanted weapon gains no benefit from the spell. The caster level for this ability is equal to your character level.

Flagbearer.name: 旗手 Flagbearer
Flagbearer.description:
专长类型：Combat

当挥舞着旗帜，旗帜上带有着你所效忠的组织标志时，你能够激发周边其他成员的忠诚心。

先决条件: 魅力15。

专长效果: 只要握住你的氏族、家族或者党派的旗帜（见内海世界指南 293页），30尺范围内忠于上述组织并且能够看到旗帜的成员（包括你自己），会在攻击检定、伤害检定以及对抗恐惧与魅惑效果的豁免检定中获得+1士气加值。为了获得这个加值你必须用一只手握住旗帜。如果旗帜被敌人夺走或被破坏，那么这些加值会变为减值，并影响所有曾经受到上述加值的生物，持续1小时（或直至夺回失去的旗帜为止）。

资源出处: Inner Sea World Guide pg. 286Pathfinder Campaign Setting pg. 64

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Flagbearer

战策增益：当你可以看到你的旗帜但你并未握住它时，你可以消耗1点耐力来获得旗手的好处，就如同你已经握住旗帜了一样。

战策资源出处: Weapon Master's Handbook pg. 25

Flagellant.name: 鞭笞魔 Flagellant
Flagellant.description:
先决条件：坚忍，人物等级7，信仰宗-库山

先决条件: 坚忍，人物等级7，信仰宗-库山。

专长效果: 你在对抗痛苦效果时在豁免检定上获得+4加值，除此之外，如果你受到的非致命伤害等同于你的生命值，你不会受到任何影响；如果你受到的非致命伤害高于你的生命值，你会陷入恍惚状态，但你永远不会因为受到非致命伤害而失去意识。

通常状况: 在你受到的非致命伤害等同于你的生命值时，你陷入恍惚状态；当你受到超过你生命值的非致命伤害时，你失去意识。

资源出处: Inner Sea Gods pg. 212

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Flagellant

Flame Blade Dervish.name: Flame Blade Dervish
Flame Blade Dervish.description:
You move effortlessly when wielding a flame blade.

Prerequisites
Ability to cast flame blade as a spell or spell-like ability.

Benefits
When you cast flame blade, you gain a +10 enhancement bonus to your base speed as long as the spell persists, along with a +4 competence bonus on all Acrobatics checks. You add your Charisma modifier to damage rolls with your flame blade, and ignore the first 10 points of fire resistance possessed by a creature you hit with the flame blade for the purposes of determining the damage dealt by the flame blade. Against undead foes, you ignore the first 30 points of fire resistance. Immunity to fire still completely protects against damage from your flame blade.

Flame Heart.name: 燃烧之心 Flame Heart
Flame Heart.description:
你精通了与火焰有关的魔法与炼金术。

先决条件: 驯火者，角色等级5，地精。

专长效果: 你获得火焰抗力5。当你施放带有〔火〕描述符的法术或投掷造成火焰伤害的炼金炸弹时，你的CL或炼金术师等级视为比实际高1级。

资源出处: Advanced Race Guide pg. 118

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Flame%20Heart

Flame Warrior.name: Flame Warrior
Flame Warrior.description:
The raging inferno of your body flows through any sword or axe you wield.

Prerequisites
Fire subtype, giant subtype.

Benefits
You naturally transfer the heat of your body to any metal melee weapons you wield, dealing 1d6 additional points of fire damage.

Flanking Foil.name: 挫败夹击 Flanking Foil
Flanking Foil.description:
专长类型：Combat

你能轻易的打破多个敌人合击你的意图。

专长效果: 每当你用近战攻击命中一个敌人，直到你下一次行动开始，即使该敌人夹击你，他也不会获得任何夹击加值，亦不能利用夹击对你进行偷袭。他仍然可以对他的其他盟友提供夹击机会。

资源出处: Ultimate Combat pg. 102

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Flanking%20Foil

战策增益：当你使用这个专长时，你可以消耗5点耐力。如果你这样做了，目标和他的盟友在你的下一回合开始之前不会构成夹击。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 119

Flaring Spell.name: 闪耀法术 Flaring Spell
Flaring Spell.description:
专长类型：Metamagic

你在使用带有〔火〕、〔光亮〕或〔电〕描述符的法术时使得被影响的生物目眩。

专长效果: 当使用闪耀法术对生物造成伤害时，其中的电、火或者光的效果创造了一次闪光使得其目眩。受到闪耀法术影响的生物在受到火焰或者电伤害时会目眩等同于法术原本环级的轮数。闪耀法术只能影响带有〔火〕、〔光亮〕或〔电〕描述符的法术。闪耀法术须占用高于原本1个环级的法术位。

资源出处: Ultimate Magic pg. 151

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Flaring%20Spell

Flaying Critical.name: Flaying Critical
Flaying Critical.description:
Your critical hits weaken your opponents' defenses.

Prerequisites
Critical Focus, base attack bonus +11.

Benefits
Whenever you score a critical hit, your opponent takes a -1 penalty to its natural armor bonus for the duration of the encounter. This penalty is cumulative, but cannot reduce an opponent's natural armor bonus below 0.

Fleet (Mythic).name: 快速移动(神话) Fleet (Mythic)
Fleet (Mythic).description:
先决条件：快速移动

你的脚步极为灵动。

神话专长效果：你的基本陆上速度增加5尺，无论你穿着何种护甲，也不管你的负重情况为何。该加值与快速移动专长赋予的加值叠加。

资源出处: Mythic Adventures pg. 65

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Fleet

Fleeting Spell.name: 短暂法术 Fleeting Spell
Fleeting Spell.description:
专长类型：Metamagic

你的法术会以不同以往的速度加速消逝。

专长效果: 如果原法术不允许解消的话，那么短暂法术在持续时间内将会变得可以解消（dismissible）。你能够以迅捷动作（swift action）解消自己的短暂法术。当你解消短暂法术后，若有人想以魔法侦测该法术所残留的灵光时，进行侦测的施法者必须成功以施法者等级检定对抗DC才能发现灵光，该DC为11 + 你的施法者等级。反制（counter）短暂法术的解除检定（dispel checks）DC降低2点，移除短暂法术的解除魔法（dispel magic）无需通过施法者等级检定便可成功。短暂法术的持续时间为其正常持续时间的一半（对于延时短暂法术来说，法术持续时间的调整会相互抵消掉）。只有持续时间至少为2轮的法术才能够受到短暂法术超魔调整，立即（instantaneous）或永久（permanent）的法术无法成为短暂法术。短暂法术不会让法术占用比其实际环级更高的法术位。

通常状况: 解消可解消的法术是标准动作，而且只有法术持续时间一栏内标注“（可解消）”的法术能够被解消。

资源出处: Ultimate Intrigue pg. 83

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Fleeting%20Spell

Flensing Strike.name: Flensing Strike
Flensing Strike.description:
Your slashing sneak attacks tend to slice away swaths of skin and natural armor.

Prerequisites
Sneak attack +3d6, bleeding sneak attack rogue trick or bleed universal monster ability.

Benefits
When you successfully inflict sneak attack damage on a foe with a slashing weapon, your attack doesn't go particularly deep, but you do carve away a significant portion of skin and flesh. If this sneak attack inflicts bleed damage, the victim of the sneak attack is sickened by the pain and has its natural armor bonus (if any) reduced by a number of points equal to the number of sneak attack dice you possess. These penalties persist as long as the bleed damage persists. Multiple strikes on the same foe do not stack the bleed damage, but the penalty to natural armor does stack, to a maximum penalty equal to the target's normal full natural armor score.

Flexible Foe.name: 灵活宿敌 Flexible Foe
Flexible Foe.description:
专长类型：Combat

你的专业技术可以扩展到其他的敌对目标身上。

先决条件: 宿敌职业能力，宿敌（任意异界生物或类人生物亚种），基础攻击加值+5。

专长效果: 每天一次以一个迅捷动作，你可以更换一种你作为宿敌的类人生物或异界生物的亚种类型。举例来说，你可以将宿敌（精灵）换成宿敌（矮人）。无论你本身的宿敌加值多高，更换之后你只有+2宿敌加值。本专长的效果持续相当于你的角色等级的轮数。

特殊说明: 你可以多次选择本专长，获得的额外使用次数叠加。

资源出处: Dirty Tactics Toolbox pg. 10

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Flexible%20Foe

Flexible Hex.name: 灵活巫术 Flexible Hex
Flexible Hex.description:
飘渺之精魂听你命而动。

先决条件: 萨满飘渺巫术职业能力。

专长效果: 每天一次以一个迅捷动作，你可以改变你选择的当日游荡巫术，当这个巫术也必须来自你当日的飘渺魂域。在12级时，你可以改变你当日所有的两个飘渺巫术。

通常状况: 萨满必须在每日准备法术时选择自己的巫术，一旦选择则本日包括改变。

资源出处: Advanced Class Guide pg. 148

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Flexible%20Hex

Flexible Shadow Jump.name: Flexible Shadow Jump
Flexible Shadow Jump.description:
You have refined your ability to leap through the shadows.

Prerequisites
Shadow jump shadowdancer class feature.

Benefits
When you travel between shadows using the shadow jump ability, the minimum increment that you can jump is 5 feet, allowing you to split your shadow jumps into 5-foot increments instead of 10-foot increments. In addition, your shadow jump ability counts as the ability to cast dimension door for the purpose of meeting the prerequisites of the Dimensional Agility feat as well as any feat that lists that feat as a prerequisite, and your shadow jump benefits from such feats as if you were casting dimension door.

Normal
Each shadow jump, no matter how small, counts as a 10-foot increment.

Flexible Wizardry.name: 灵活魔术 Flexible Wizardry
Flexible Wizardry.description:
你知道如何让自己手中的魔法运用更加灵活有效。

先决条件: 法术掌握（Spell Mastery），法师等级1。

专长效果: 在你每日准备法术时，你可以选择保留最多相当于你的智力调整值（最小为1）的法术位作为临时调整的备选，在每个备选法术位上，你可以准备两个而非一个法术。在你准备好法术后的任何时刻，你可以以一个整轮动作决定你在其中一个备选法术位上的法术，并把它放在这个法术位上。

资源出处: Advanced Class Guide pg. 148

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Flexible%20Wizardry

Flickering Step.name: 闪现步 Flickering Step
Flickering Step.description:
专长类型：Conduit

你能在眨眼之间出现和消失

先决条件: 知识（位面）9级。

专长效果: 你能以类法术能力使用任意门（Dimension Door），CL=你的知识（位面）等级。你不能以此方式传送大于2倍你的基础移速的距离，而且你必需跟你的目的地有视觉线和效果线。

你能每天1次，加上每5级知识（位面）等级额外1次使用此专长效果。

特殊说明: 拥有此专长的战士能在选择战士奖励专长时将次元灵巧（Dimensional Agility）和以此为先决条件的任何专长视为战斗专长。

资源出处: Planar Adventures pg. 28

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Flickering%20Step

Flight Mastery.name: 浮空掌握 Flight Mastery
Flight Mastery.description:
专长类型：Item Mastery

你引导变化系物品的魔法力量，使自己腾空而起。

先决条件: 使用魔法装置技能3级，基础强韧豁免加值+6。

专长效果: 你可以引导一件制造时需求使用变化系法术，且该法术至少为二环的魔法物品中的能量，施放一次法术飞行术（Fly）。如果你所用来引导魔法能量的这件物品是一件你所穿戴的护甲，那么你还可以用它的增强加值取代你的敏捷调整值加到飞行技能检定上。你每天可以使用本类法术能力一次，在基础强韧豁免加值达到+9和+12时可以获得额外一次每日使用次数。

资源出处: Weapon Masters Handbook pg. 26

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Flight%20Mastery

Fling.name: Fling
Fling.description:
You can throw grappled enemies a short distance, turning them into makeshift missiles against their allies.

Prerequisites
Flyby Attack, Powerful Wings, Snatch and Drop, Throw Anything.

Benefits
Whenever you successfully grapple an opponent using the Snatch and Drop feat, you can instead fling your victim at another target. You can throw a creature 10 feet, plus an additional 5 feet for every size category by which it is smaller than you. To strike another target, make a ranged touch attack. If you hit, the attack deals damage to both the creature flung and its intended target. This damage is equal to that of a slam attack of a creature two sizes larger than the creature being flung (see page 302 of the Pathfinder RPG Bestiary) plus your Strength modifier. The flung creature lands prone in the nearest adjacent square to the target, and the target must succeed at a Reflex saving throw (DC = 10 + damage dealt) or also fall prone in its own square. You can't use this feat if the weight of the creature you intend to fling exceeds the amount you can carry as a heavy load.

Special
While the following feats are primarily taken by strix, other creatures with natural wings can also take them at the GM's discretion.

Flinging Charge.name: Flinging Charge
Flinging Charge.description:
You hurl a weapon during your charge before drawing a new one to strike, enabling you to make another attack at the expense of the latter attack's accuracy.

Prerequisites
Quick Draw, base attack bonus +6.

Benefits
If you have a thrown weapon in hand when you begin charging, you can make a ranged attack with that weapon against the target of your charge at any point during your charge. You gain the +2 bonus for charging on the attack roll for this ranged attack. You can then immediately draw a melee weapon during your charge. You take a -5 penalty on the melee attack made at the end of the charge. When charging this way, you cannot use any effect that would grant you more than one attack at the end of your charge (such as pounce), nor can you use abilities that grant you other ranged attacks on a charge, such as the hurling charge rage power.

Flow of Elements.name: Flow of Elements
Flow of Elements.description:
You can spontaneously channel your ally's elemental essence, be it burning fire, freezing ice, crackling lightning, or searing acid.

Prerequisites
Ability to cast spells; ifrit, oread, sylph, or undine.

Benefits
Whenever you're adjacent to an ifrit, oread, sylph, or undine ally who also has this feat, you can spontaneously replace or split a spell's damage when casting it, as though the spell were affected by Elemental Spell (without using a higher-level spell slot). The type of energy damage depends on your ally's race: acid for oread, electricity for sylph, fire for ifrit, or cold for undine.

Flumefire Rage.name: Flumefire Rage
Flumefire Rage.description:
Your meditation before a rune-engraved stone in the Flume Warrens unlocks the secret of its blazing flame.

Prerequisites
Cha 15; bloodrage class feature, elemental focus class feature, or Varisian Tattoo (evocation) (Pathfinder Campaign Setting: The Inner Sea World Guide 289).

Benefits
When casting an evocation spell that deals fire damage, you can deal +1 point of fire damage per die. If you do, you must succeed at a Fortitude save (DC = 15 + the spell or blast's level) or become fatigued. You cannot use this feat while fatigued or if you cannot become fatigued.

If you are raging (such as when using bloodrage or affected by the rage spell), this damage increases to +2 points per die and you roll twice when attempting the Fortitude save and take the better result. This feat does not otherwise grant you the ability to cast spells while raging.

Flyby Attack.name: 飞越攻击 Flyby Attack
Flyby Attack.description:
专长类型：Monster

该生物可以在飞行移动的前后发起攻击。

先决条件: 拥有飞行速度。

专长效果: 当生物飞行时，该生物可以在移动途中进行一个移动动作和另一个标准动作。不过在飞行途中，生物不能进行多于一个移动动作。

通常状况: 没有此专长的情况下，生物只能在移动前或移动后进行标准动作。

资源出处: Pathfinder RPG Bestiary pg. 315

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Flyby%20Attack

Flying Tackle.name: 飞身扑 Flying Tackle
Flying Tackle.description:
你可以猛地推倒没来得及站稳的妹子，然后上下其手。

先决条件: 精通闯越。

专长效果: 当你对一个处于措手不及状态的对手发动一次闯越战技攻击时，如果你打算撞倒一个对手，你可以选择自己也同时倒地，但以一个自由动作对目标同时发动一次擒抱战技攻击。这样做不会引发被你擒抱的目标的借机攻击。

资源出处: Dirty Tactics Toolbox pg. 13

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Flying%20Tackle

Focused Aberration Expertise.name: Focused Aberration Expertise
Focused Aberration Expertise.description:
You hold strong against aberrations.

Prerequisites
Favored enemy (aberration) class feature.

Benefits
Choose either Fortitude saves against transformation effects (including transmutation spells and spell-like abilities) or Will saves against mind-affecting effects. You gain a bonus on the selected saving throw equal to half your favored enemy (aberration) bonus. Against aberrations' spells and abilities, you gain this bonus on Fortitude saves against transmutation effects and on Will saves against mind-affecting effects.

Focused Animal Expertise.name: Focused Animal Expertise
Focused Animal Expertise.description:
You're skilled at patiently hiding from your favored enemies, particularly animals.

Prerequisites
Favored enemy (animal) class feature.

Benefits
You gain a bonus on Stealth checks equal to half your favored enemy (animal) bonus. Against animals, this bonus is equal to your full favored enemy bonus.

Focused Construct Expertise.name: Focused Construct Expertise
Focused Construct Expertise.description:
You are skilled at breaking the defenses of constructs and other creatures.

Prerequisites
Favored enemy (construct) class feature.

Benefits
Your weapon attacks ignore a number of points of damage reduction or hardness equal to half your favored enemy (construct) bonus. This feat allows you to only ignore damage reduction that is normally bypassed by adamantine, bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing weapons. Against constructs, the amount of damage reduction and hardness you ignore is equal to your full favored enemy bonus.

Focused Disbelief.name: Focused Disbelief
Focused Disbelief.description:
So certain is your disbelief in the authority of the gods that you can brush aside their spells without effort.

Prerequisites
Divine Defiance.

Benefits
You gain spell resistance equal to 11 + your character level. This spell resistance applies only against spells and spell-like abilities covered by the Divine Defiance feat. You can lower this resistance for 1 round as a standard action.

Focused Discipline.name: 严守纪律 Focused Discipline
Focused Discipline.description:
专长类型：Combat

你对家乡的军事传统的熟悉，使你获得了非同寻常的勇气。

专长效果: 你在对抗所有恐惧效果（fear effects）时的豁免检定获得+2加值。每当恐惧效果以你为目标并且未能影响到你（无论是由于成功的豁免检定还是由于免疫恐惧），你在对抗使用该恐惧效果未遂的生物时，攻击检定，武器伤害检定与CMB检定均获得+2士气加值，持续1轮。

资源出处: Inner Sea World Guide pg. 286

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Focused%20Discipline

战策增益：你可以消耗2点耐力来获得严守纪律的好处一轮，就如同你成为了一个未能影响到你的恐惧效果的目标一样。

战策资源出处: Weapon Master's Handbook pg. 25

Focused Dragon Expertise.name: Focused Dragon Expertise
Focused Dragon Expertise.description:
Your understanding of dragons helps you to easily avoid breath weapons.

Prerequisites
Favored enemy (dragon) class feature.

Benefits
You gain a bonus on saving throws against breath weapons and fear effects equal to half your favored enemy (dragon) bonus. Whenever you succeed at a Reflex saving throw against a dragon's extraordinary or supernatural ability that would deal half damage, you instead take no damage. If you already have the evasion class feature, you instead gain an inquisitor's stalwart ability (Pathfinder RPG Advanced Player's Guide 41) against dragons' extraordinary and supernatural abilities.

Focused Eidolon.name: 幻灵专注 Focused Eidolon
Focused Eidolon.description:
你和你幻灵的联系帮助你保持专注。

先决条件: 【幻灵】职业特性。

专长效果: 当你临近你的幻灵时，你的专注检定获得+4加值。

资源出处: Ultimate Magic pg. 151

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Focused%20Eidolon

Focused Fey Expertise.name: Focused Fey Expertise
Focused Fey Expertise.description:
Your attacks strike true against capricious targets like fey.

Prerequisites
Favored enemy (fey) class feature.

Benefits
You gain a bonus on attack rolls to confirm critical hits equal to half your favored enemy (fey) bonus. You treat your weapon attacks against fey as cold iron for the purpose of overcoming damage reduction and regeneration.

Focused Inspiration.name: 灵感专注 Focused Inspiration
Focused Inspiration.description:
在使用一些技能时，你的灵感更为充沛。

先决条件: 灵感职业能力，调查员敏锐回想职业能力。

专长效果: 选择两个你已受训，或者可以在未受训情况下仍可以使用的技能，你在使用灵感能力增强这些技能检定时，你的灵感骰从d6上升到d8；如果你的灵感骰为d8，那么则上升到d10。如果你拥有灵感满溢职业能力，那么你同样可以骰一副这样的灵感骰（2d8上升到2d10）。

资源出处: Advanced Class Guide pg. 148

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Focused%20Inspiration

Focused Magical Beast Expertise.name: Focused Magical Beast Expertise
Focused Magical Beast Expertise.description:
You move in ways that confound creatures that would strike you repeatedly.

Prerequisites
Favored enemy (magical beast) class feature.

Benefits
If a creature makes three or more attacks with natural weapons against you during its turn, you gain partial cover against the third and subsequent natural attacks from that creature. If the creature makes five or more attacks against you with natural weapons, you gain cover (instead of partial cover) against the fifth and subsequent natural attacks. If the attacker is a magical beast, reduce by one the number of natural attacks it must make in order for you to gain cover or partial cover.

Focused Ooze Expertise.name: Focused Ooze Expertise
Focused Ooze Expertise.description:
You've learned to avoid and overcome the engulfing attacks of your studied prey.

Prerequisites
Favored enemy (ooze) class feature.

Benefits
You gain a bonus to your CMD equal to half your favored enemy (ooze) bonus. You also gain acid resistance equal to half your favored enemy (ooze) bonus. Against oozes, you instead apply your full favored enemy (ooze) bonus for both benefits.

Focused Outsider Expertise.name: Focused Outsider Expertise
Focused Outsider Expertise.description:
You've learned to attack in a way that stymies the natural resistances common in outsiders.

Prerequisites
Favored enemy (outsider) class feature.

Benefits
Your weapon attacks ignore a number of points of damage reduction equal to half your favored enemy (outsider [any one]) bonus. This feat allows you to ignore only damage reduction that is normally bypassed by chaotic-, evil-, good-, or lawful-aligned weapons. Against outsiders that match your favored enemy subtype, the amount of damage reduction and hardness you ignore is equal to your full favored class bonus.

Focused Overseer.name: Focused Overseer
Focused Overseer.description:
Your attention to detail provides you with insights into how to more effectively and economically gain certain commodities.

Prerequisites
Focused Worker.

Benefits
You can spend a day of downtime to purchase one type of capital for half its normal cost (see Purchasing Capital on page 77 of Ultimate Campaign). This capital must be the same as the focus capital you chose for the Focused Worker feat. However, the cost of the neglected capital, chosen as part of the same Focused Worker feat, increases by half again its normal amount. These changes in price apply to both the purchased cost and the earned cost of the affected forms of capital.

Special
You may take this feat twice, but only if you have also chosen the Focused Worker feat twice. This feat only affects one feat's focus capital. The second time you take this feat, choose the other focus capital from your Focused Worker feats.

Focused Phantom.name: 魅影专注 Focused Phantom
Focused Phantom.description:
你与魅影的紧密联结能帮助你集中精神。

先决条件: 魅影加护（Spiritual Interference）职业能力。

专长效果: 当你与你的魅影（phantom）相邻，或者你的魅影附身于你的意识之中时，你会在专注检定中获得+4加值。

资源出处: Occult Adventures pg. 134

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Focused%20Phantom

Focused Plant Expertise.name: Focused Plant Expertise
Focused Plant Expertise.description:
You are quick to dodge and slash anything that would ensnare you.

Prerequisites
Favored enemy (plant) class feature.

Benefits
You gain a bonus equal to half your favored enemy (plant) bonus on Reflex saves to avoid being entangled and to your CMD whenever an opponent attempts to grapple you. Your weapons' critical hit multipliers increase by one against creatures with the plant type.

Focused Shot.name: 集中射击 Focused Shot
Focused Shot.description:
专长类型：Combat

对结构的洞悉能够使你的射击更加致命。

先决条件: 智力13，近距射击，精准射击。

专长效果: 以标准动作，你能够使用弓或弩进行一次攻击，并且将智力修正加到伤害检定上。你必须距离目标30尺范围内，才能造成这个额外伤害。免疫重击与偷袭的生物同样免疫这个额外伤害。

特殊说明: 从2级起，选择【箭术战斗流派】的游侠能够将“集中射击”作为战斗流派专长进行选取。

资源出处: Advanced Players Guide pg. 160Pathfinder Campaign Setting pg. 89

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Focused%20Shot

战策增益：你可以消耗2点耐力来让集中射击攻击任何一个位于你第一个射程增量内的敌人。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 120

Focused Spell.name: 集中法术 Focused Spell
Focused Spell.description:
专长类型：Metamagic

当你施放影响多名生物的法术时，其中一名敌人会发现自身难以抵御它的影响。

专长效果: 当你施放一个会影响多个生物的法术时，可以选择一个目标或者法术效果内的生物。该名生物对抗法术的豁免DC提高2点。你必须在施法之前选择将法术集中至哪个目标身上。集中法术占用比法术的实际环级高1环的法术位。无需豁免的法术无法由此专长获益。

资源出处: Advanced Players Guide pg. 161

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Focused%20Spell

Focused Target.name: Focused Target
Focused Target.description:
You pour your entire focus into slaying your chosen target.

Prerequisites
Studied target class feature (second studied target).

Benefits
When you study a target, you can reduce the number of additional targets you can maintain as a studied target. For each target reduced in this way, you increase your studied target bonus by 1 for either attack rolls, damage rolls, skill checks, or the DCs of your abilities. Each such increase must be applied to a different category (attack rolls, damage rolls, skill checks, or DCs). You can end the effects of this feat as a free action.

Focused Undead Expertise.name: Focused Undead Expertise
Focused Undead Expertise.description:
Your knowledge of the undead makes you especially effective when fighting them.

Prerequisites
Favored enemy (undead) class feature.

Benefits
You gain a bonus equal to half your favored enemy (undead) bonus on saving throws against ability damage, ability drain, energy drain, and negative energy effects. Once per day, when an undead creature's natural attack against you deals ability damage, deals ability drain, or bestows 1 or more negative levels, you can negate the damage, drain, or negative levels as an immediate action.

Focused Vermin Expertise.name: Focused Vermin Expertise
Focused Vermin Expertise.description:
Your experience with vermin resists the attacks of swarms.

Prerequisites
Favored enemy (vermin) class feature.

Benefits
You gain DR/-- equal to half your favored enemy (vermin) bonus against vermin and creatures with the swarm subtype. When attempting Fortitude saves against a swarm's distraction ability, you gain a bonus on the save equal to the damage prevented by this feat. Against vermin with the swarm subtype, the amount of damage reduction is equal to your full favored enemy (vermin) bonus. This damage reduction does not stack with that from other sources.

Focused Worker.name: Focused Worker
Focused Worker.description:
Your attention to detail provides you with an excess of some commodities, at the cost of others.

Benefits
You excel at performing skilled work for a certain type of capital, but are less adept at generating another type of capital (see page 78 of Ultimate Campaign). Choose one of the following types of capital to be your focus capital: Goods, Influence, Labor, or Magic. Whenever you spend downtime to perform skilled work to gain focus capital, you gain half again the normal amount (rounded down). However, you must also choose a second, separate type of capital from the same list to be your neglected capital. Whenever you spend downtime to perform skilled work to gain neglected capital, you gain only half the amount you normally would. This feat only affects capital you gain by performing skilled work, not capital you might gain by performing unskilled work, purchasing capital, or running a business.

For example, say you chose Goods as your focus capital and Magic as your neglected capital. If you spent a day performing skilled work to gain Goods, and the result of your Sleight of Hands skill check is a 33, you would gain 4 Goods (rather than the usual 3 for a result of 30 or higher). However, if you were to spend the following day using your Spellcraft check to perform skilled work and again got a result of 33, you would only gain 2 Magic rather than the usual 3.

Special
You may take this feat twice. The second time, you must choose the other two types of capital to be a focus and a neglected capital.

Focusing Blow.name: 清神打击 Focusing Blow
Focusing Blow.description:
专长类型：Teamwork

你和你盟友的团队协作打破了敌人精神攻击的影响。

先决条件: 大地精军规，大地精。

专长效果: 同样拥有该专长的盟友可以通过对你造成伤害，给予你再一次豁免持续性影响心灵效果的机会。盟友必须以攻击、法术或其他能力对你造成至少5点伤害。你每受到5点伤害，就会在接下来的重新豁免中获得+1加值。如果你豁免成功，则影响心灵的效果立刻结束。该专长的影响只计算实际造成的伤害；非致命伤害以及被减免的伤害等不算在内。

资源出处: Advanced Race Guide pg. 124

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Focusing%20Blow

Foebane Magic.name: 仇灾魔法 Foebane Magic
Foebane Magic.description:
你的法术对你的宿敌特别有效。

先决条件: 施展1级法术的能力，宿敌职业能力。

专长效果: 你的宿敌在对抗你施展的法术时在豁免上承受-1的惩罚。此外，在辨识你的宿敌施展的法术时你的法术辨识检定也获得宿敌的加值。

资源出处: Ultimate Wilderness pg. 112Heroes of the Wild pg. 26

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Foebane%20Magic

Foeslayer.name: 复仇化身 Foeslayer
Foeslayer.description:
专长类型：Story

你和仇敌之间的苦涩斗争只能以鲜血来终结。

先决条件: 你必须曾被一群特定的类人生物或人形怪物打败并被劫夺半数以上的财产；或拥有“以眼还眼（An Eye for an Eye）”、“不共戴天（Hated Foe）”、“惨遭劫掠（Raiders）”、“绝命复仇（Vengeance）”等角色背景之一。

专长效果: 你施放用以对抗特定团体敌人的法术豁免DC+1，同时你对他们的闪避AC+1。

专长目标: 击杀适当数量的强大敌手。

完成收益: 你对特定种族的敌人攻击时视为拥有“精通重击”专长。你对此类敌人的闪避AC+2。

资源出处: Quests and Campaigns pg. 10Ultimate Campaign pg. 69

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Foeslayer

Follow-Up Strike.name: Follow-Up Strike
Follow-Up Strike.description:
You bat away an opponent's weapon, creating an opening for a punch or kick.

Prerequisites
Int 13, Combat Expertise, Improved Disarm, Improved Unarmed Strike, base attack bonus +6 or monk level 6th.

Benefits
Whenever you succeed at a combat maneuver check to disarm an opponent, you can spend a swift action to make an unarmed strike attack at your highest base attack bonus against the target you disarmed.

Following Step.name: 咄咄逼人 Following Step
Following Step.description:
专长类型：Combat

当敌人试图从你身边逃开时，你能够反覆尝试跟上他而不会妨碍自身的正常移动。

先决条件: 敏捷13，快步跟进。

专长效果: 当你使用“快步跟进”专长跟上邻近的敌人时，你能够移动至多10尺。你可以在下一轮内使用五尺快步，并且任何使用此专长进行的移动，均不会扣除你下一轮的移动距离。

通常状况: 你只能使用“快步跟进”专长进行五尺快步跟上敌人。

资源出处: Advanced Players Guide pg. 160

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Following%20Step

战策增益：当你使用这个专长来进行移动时，你可以消耗2点耐力来提升你的移动力至15尺。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 120

Foment the Blood.name: 嗜血煽动 Foment the Blood
Foment the Blood.description:
你可以释放出一股能量，驱使兽人们陷入狂怒。

先决条件: 【引导能量】职业能力，兽人。

专长效果: 当你引导能量时，你不造成正常效果，而是在直到你的下一轮前给兽人提供武器伤害和重击确认检定的加值。这一加值等同于你引导能量治疗或伤害的骰数。你的引导能量对其他处于该区域内的生物正常生效。

资源出处: Advanced Race Guide pg. 141

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Foment%20the%20Blood

Fool Magic.name: 愚弄魔道具 Fool Magic
Fool Magic.description:
你能通过巧妙的化妆来误导魔法物品。

先决条件: 诈欺师，易容1级，使用魔法装置1级。

专长效果: 当你易容成特定种族的成员、或者特定阵营的人时，可以使用你的易容加值取代使用魔法装置加值，以此来在启动魔法物品的尝试中模仿为上述种族和阵营。

资源出处: Ultimate Intrigue pg. 83

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Fool%20Magic

Footslasher.name: Footslasher
Footslasher.description:
You are trained to strike at a large foe's feet to impede its movement and cause great pain.

Benefits
If you damage a foe that is of a larger size category than you with a weapon that does piercing or slashing damage, you can attempt to damage the creature's feet in a way that impedes its movement.

Attacking a foe in this way is a standard action--you cannot use Footslasher as part of a full-attack action. When you use Footslasher, you take a -2 penalty on your attack roll, but if you hit and deal at least 1 point of damage to the target, it is affected as if by caltrops--its speed is reduced by half. This penalty lasts for 24 hours, or until the creature is successfully treated with a DC 15 Heal check or receives at least 1 point of magical healing. Footslasher does not stack with itself--once a foe has been wounded by this attack, its speed cannot be further reduced by additional attacks (or by damage from caltrops).

Force Dash.name: 力能加速 Force Dash
Force Dash.description:
你吸收力场法术的能量，将自己的移动导入更强的推进力。

先决条件: 基本攻击加值+4，可以施放2环奥术，可以施放至少一个力场类奥术法术。

专长效果: 以一个迅捷动作，你可以消耗一个已经准备的力场法术（或者如果你是一个自发施法者，你消耗一个你所知的该环奥术力场法术法术位），为你在移动速度上获得加值，加值为10尺x你所消耗的法术环术。这个加值可以影响所有类型的移动速度，并持续1轮。如果你在获得此速度加值时冲锋，那么你不会再冲锋后承受防御等级上的-2减值。

资源出处: Advanced Class Guide pg. 148

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Force%20Dash

Force Shield Mastery.name: 力场盾掌握 Force Shield Mastery
Force Shield Mastery.description:
专长类型：Item Mastery

你可以用防护系魔法物品创造力场屏障

先决条件: 使用魔法装置技能3级，基础强韧豁免加值+3。

专长效果: 你可以引导一件制造条件里有防护系法术、且该法术至少为一环的魔法物品中的能量，创造一个魔法效果。该效果如同护盾术shield一样运作，除了其提供的AC盾牌加值等同于你的基础强韧豁免加值的1/3（最小+1）。你每天可以使用该专长1次，基础强韧豁免加值达到+6，+9和+12时可以获得一次每日使用次数。

资源出处: Magic Tactics Toolbox pg. 30

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Force%20Shield%20Mastery

Forceful Channel.name: 力能引导 Forceful Channel
Forceful Channel.description:
先决条件：引导负能量7d6，信仰内希斯

先决条件: 引导负能量7d6，信仰内希斯。

专长效果: 每天一次，当你引导负能量伤害活物时，你可以使你引导的能力造成力场伤害，并且目标生物必须进行强韧检定而非意志检定豁免以减半伤害。如果生物在此检定中失败，它们还会被击倒至俯卧。

资源出处: Inner Sea Gods pg. 212

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Forceful%20Channel

Forceful Charge.name: Forceful Charge
Forceful Charge.description:
This animal's charges move its enemies.

Prerequisites
Improved Bull Rush, Power Attack, animal companion.

Benefits
Once per round when this animal companion hits an opponent with a charge attack, it can initiate a bull rush against that target as a free action. If it moves its full speed as part of the charge, it gains a +4 bonus on its combat maneuver check to resolve this bull rush.

Forest Ambush.name: Forest Ambush
Forest Ambush.description:
Your deep knowledge of natural environments allows you to take your enemy by surprise, dealing a deadly blow.

Prerequisites
Stealth 1 rank, Survival 1 rank.

Benefits
In natural environments, you can spend 5 minutes to cover yourself in loose debris (such as branches, grass, or dirt) and take 20 on a Stealth check. You fall prone and are considered to have concealment for purposes of being allowed to attempt Stealth checks. As a full-round action that doesn't provoke attacks of opportunity, you can burst from your hiding place, stand, and make a single melee attack or ranged attack against a target within 30 feet. If the target didn't notice you before you jumped from hiding and your attack hits, that attack deals an additional 1d6 points of precision damage. Effects that negate sneak attack damage also negate this damage.

Forester.name: Forester
Forester.description:
You are a master of woodcraft and forest lore and can move through even the densest of trees with ease and grace.

Prerequisites
Favored terrain (forest) class feature.

Benefits
You ignore difficult terrain created by light or heavy undergrowth, and you ignore increased DCs for Acrobatics and Stealth checks in light or heavy undergrowth. In addition, you can use trees to shield yourself from attacks, gaining a +1 cover bonus to your AC whenever you are adjacent to a tree (including while climbing). If you are adjacent to two or more trees simultaneously, you gain a +2 cover bonus to your AC and a +1 bonus on Reflex saving throws.

Forgotten Past.name: 忘却回忆 Forgotten Past
Forgotten Past.description:
专长类型：Story

某个重大事件从你的记忆中隐去了。

先决条件: 你必须遭受持久的失忆之苦；或拥有“转世轮回（Reincarnated background）”角色背景。

专长效果: 影响心智法术（即便是有利效果）对你的持续时间减半，至少1轮。你的求知本能使你的察觉检定+2。如果你在察觉技能受训10级以上，该加值升至+4。

专长目标: 拾回你重要的记忆残片。具体实现的手段多变，可以通过‘许愿术’法术、神祇协助、往事重现或直面导致你失忆的情境。该过程必须伴随着一位强大敌手的登场，尽管并不一定需要你们直接对峙。

完成收益: 你在对抗影响心智效果的豁免中可以双骰取高。

特殊备注：以低于‘奇迹术’和‘祈愿术’层次的法术重获记忆并不满足目标条件。

资源出处: Ultimate Campaign pg. 69

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Forgotten%20Past

Formula Recollection.name: 回想公式 Formula Recollection
Formula Recollection.description:
你可以回忆起整个法术在你眼前施放的过程，将它抄录在你的笔记中。

先决条件: 辨识法术技能5级，敏锐回想职业能力。

专长效果: 每天一次，你可以将一条你在前24小时内通过辨识法术辨别出的法术记录到你的公式薄上，整个法术必须处于炼金术士化合炼成表中。

资源出处: Advanced Class Guide pg. 148

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Formula%20Recollection

Fortified Armor Training.name: 丢卒保帅 Fortified Armor Training
Fortified Armor Training.description:
专长类型：Combat

你学会了如何让你的防具替你承受最重的攻击。

先决条件: 擅长盔甲或盾牌。

专长效果: 如果一个敌人你对造成了重击，你可以选择将其变为普通攻击，不过你的盔甲或盾牌（由你选择）会陷入破损状态。

资源出处: Ultimate Combat pg. 102

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Fortified%20Armor%20Training

战策增益：当你使用这个专长来让重击无效时，你可以消耗5点耐力来让你的盔甲或盾牌有50%的概率来避免获得破损状态。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 120

Fortitude of Giants.name: Fortitude of Giants
Fortitude of Giants.description:
Your great mass and vigor allows you to shrug off the effects of poison and fatigue.

Prerequisites
Con 14, Great Fortitude, giant subtype.

Benefits
When you attempt a saving throw against a poison effect or an effect that inflicts the fatigued condition, roll twice and take the higher result.

Fortuitous Vigor.name: Fortuitous Vigor
Fortuitous Vigor.description:
Your determination and enthusiasm help you shake off the most grievous wounds and soldier on against your enemies.

Prerequisites
Con 13, Combat Vigor, character level 4th.

Benefits
Your vigor pool gains 1 vigor point. Whenever you roll a natural 20 on an ability check, attack roll, saving throw, or skill check, and whenever you threaten a critical hit with an attack, you can spend 1 or more vigor points as a swift action to regain hit points as described in the Combat Vigor feat.

Fortunate Manager.name: Fortunate Manager
Fortunate Manager.description:
Your good luck helps you and your business persevere even during the most troublesome times.

Prerequisites
Own at least one building.

Benefits
During the Event phase of downtime, if an event occurs and the GM rolls on a building event table or organization event table (see pages 114-129 of Ultimate Campaign), you may, once per week, choose to roll twice on the applicable table and choose either result. You must declare you are using this feat before the results of the initial roll are revealed.

Fortunate One.name: 幸运儿 Fortunate One
Fortunate One.description:
你比大多数半身人更会操控运气。

先决条件: 【万用幸运】种族特性，半身人。

专长效果: 你的【万用幸运】种族特性的每日使用次数增加1次。

资源出处: Advanced Race Guide pg. 66

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Fortunate%20One

Fortunate Ruler.name: Fortunate Ruler
Fortunate Ruler.description:
Your good luck shines on your people, even in the most trying times.

Prerequisites
Hold the Ruler leadership role for a kingdom.

Benefits
During a kingdom's Event phase, once an event's type and danger level has been determined, you may choose to roll twice on the applicable kingdom or settlement table and choose either result. You must declare you are using this feat before the results of the initial roll are revealed.

Fortune Teller.name: 占卜师 Fortune Teller
Fortune Teller.description:
作为在充满传说与迷信的土地（比如瓦瑞西安Varisia或者乌斯塔拉夫Ustalav）上长大成人的结果，你十分擅长与精神世界进行沟通。

先决条件: 施放预言系法术的能力。

专长效果: 通过选取该专长，你需要为你的预言魔法选择一件器材——水晶球，符文，哈罗牌组（Harrow deck）或者其他类似的物品。每当你施放预言学派的法术时，只要花费的材料成分不超过1000gp，就能够使用器材物品替代法术的材料成分。如果你选择使用你的器材物品和法术的正常材料成分进行施法（不管材料成分的成本价值多少），这个法术的施法者等级提高1级。

资源出处: Inner Sea World Guide pg. 286Pathfinder Campaign Setting pg. 143

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Fortune%20Teller

Forward from Beneath.name: Forward from Beneath
Forward from Beneath.description:
You have vowed to infiltrate your wicked kin and redeem your family's reputation.

Prerequisites
Be a member of House Kastner, be a good-aligned member of a family or organization whose secret evil has been publicly revealed, or have the Dishonored Family or Betrayal backgrounds.

Benefits
Your experience with infiltrating your own family or organization gives you a +2 bonus on Disguise checks. If you have 10 or more ranks in Disguise, this bonus increases to +4. If you are not evil, as a standard action you can choose to radiate a faint aura of evil for the purposes of spells such as detect evil. You can dismiss this ersatz aura as a standard action.

Goal
Redeem your family or organization.

Completion Benefit
You gain the benefit of undetectable alignment as a constant spell-like ability. You can suppress or resume this ability as a standard action.

Fox Insight.name: 狡狐之智 Fox Insight
Fox Insight.description:
专长类型：Combat

你那如同狐狸一般的动作可以防止敌人操弄你。

先决条件: 智力 13，狡狐式。

专长效果: 当你使用狡狐式（Fox Style），且有敌人尝试对你使用虚招时，你可以使用基本攻击加值来替代察言观色检定中投入的技能点数，并以此来判断你的察言观色技能加值。此外尝试对你进行挫败士气的生物不会因为体型比你大而获得加值（不过体型比你小的依旧会承受减值）。如果你的智力至少达到了19，那么对你进行虚招或者挫败士气的DC增加4点。

资源出处: Ultimate Intrigue pg. 84

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Fox%20Insight

Fox Shape.name: 狐身 Fox Shape
Fox Shape.description:
除了你的另外形态之外，你还可以变成一只狐狸。

先决条件: 魅力13，基础攻击加值+3，狐妖。

专长效果: 你可以变成一只狐狸，当你使用该能力时变化成的狐狸会表现出特定的形态。在该形态下，你的啮咬攻击伤害减少为1d3，但是你在伪装为一只狐狸的易容检定中获得+10的种族加值。使用此能力是一个标准动作。此能力在其他方面如同野兽形态II一样运作，你的属性值也会因此能力而变化。

特殊说明: 狐妖可以在她任何获得专长的时候选择此专长。

资源出处: Dragon Empires Primer pg. 5

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Fox%20Shape

Fox Style.name: 狡狐式 Fox Style
Fox Style.description:
专长类型：CombatStyle

你的武术技巧能用于操弄敌人。

先决条件: 智力 13。

专长效果: 当你使用该流派时，能够在为了隐藏而分散对方注意力（create a distraction to hide）以及在战斗中进行虚招而作出的唬骗检定中，使用基本攻击加值来取代你在唬骗技能中投入的点数。若你的智力至少达到了19，则可以在上述唬骗检定中添加你的魅力调整值时获得+4加值。

资源出处: Ultimate Intrigue pg. 84

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Fox%20Style

Fox Trickery.name: 狡狐之策 Fox Trickery
Fox Trickery.description:
专长类型：Combat

在敌人疏于守备时，你会让他们被脏招打得痛不欲生。

先决条件: 智力 13，狡狐之智，狡狐式，精通阴招。

专长效果: 当你使用狡狐式（Fox Style）时，能够以借机攻击执行阴招战技（dirty trick combat maneuvers；Advanced Player's Guide 320页）。若你的智力至少达到了19，则会在阴招战技检定中获得+4加值。

资源出处: Ultimate Intrigue pg. 84

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Fox%20Trickery

Free Spirit.name: 自由精神 Free Spirit
Free Spirit.description:
这个法术可以让你引导出凯登·凯连哲学的精髓，让你获得行动自如（Freedom Of Movement)法术的好处，并给予你对恐惧效果的豁免中+4的加值。这个法术也会让你醉倒（drunk）。在法术持续期间，你在攻击检定、能力检定、技能检定和专注检定中受到-2的惩罚。如果你以某种方式消除或避免这些惩罚，法术的持续时间就会结束。



资源出处: Inner Sea Temples pg. 23

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/SpellDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Free%20Spirit

Freeze in Place.name: Freeze in Place
Freeze in Place.description:
You become an expert of hiding in plain sight.

Prerequisites
Stealth 5 ranks, wyrwood.

Benefits
You gain the freeze universal monster rule, allowing you to appear as an ordinary statue. If you attack a creature unaware of you while using this ability, you double your critical threat range. This effect doesn't stack with any other effect that expands the threat range of your attacks or weapons.

Friend to Animals.name: 动物之友 Friend to Animals
Friend to Animals.description:
你对所有活物展示敬意，并且他们感觉到并会以友善。

先决条件: 自然之魂，驯养动物3级。

专长效果: 以一个标准动作，你可以要求所有在你30尺内的动物进行一次意志检定。检定失败的动物不能主动攻击你除非你首先攻击他们或者攻击他们的盟友。这个意志豁免的DC等于10+1/2角色等级+你的魅力修正。

资源出处: Faiths and Philosophies pg. 11

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Friend%20to%20Animals

Friendly Face.name: Friendly Face
Friendly Face.description:
Other animals of your species adore you. No matter how territorial, ill-tempered, wounded, or hungry they are, they see you as a friend, not an enemy. They'll give your two-legged friend the benefit of the doubt as well.

Prerequisites
Animal companion.

Benefits
Other animals of roughly the same kind as you (cats to felines, eagles to raptors, frogs to amphibians, etc.) have their starting attitudes toward you improved by two steps. Their attitudes towards your master are likewise improved by one step.

Special
If your master has the animal focus class feature, this feat also applies to any animals of roughly the same kind as your active animal focus.

Friendly Fire.name: 火力支援 Friendly Fire
Friendly Fire.description:
专长类型：BetrayalTeamwork

你的远程攻击吓坏了敌人，因为你毫不介意会击中你的盟友。

先决条件: 精准射击。

专长效果: 你可以用一个标准动作激活此专长进行一次远程攻击，被攻击的目标必须与至少一个牺牲者处于接战状态。这次舍弃完全没有任何预示以至于让你的盟友处于险境之中，但因此也成功地出乎敌人的预料。

如果你的攻击从牺牲者的位置穿过，你在此攻击骰上获得2点加值。如果你的射击失手了，你必须立刻用相同的调整值攻击牺牲者，这可能会造成击中牺牲者而非敌人。当攻击结算完毕后（无论攻击到了谁），原定的攻击目标会因惊吓给牺牲者提供一次借机攻击的机会。

资源出处: Champions of Corruption pg. 21

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Friendly%20Fire

Friendly Fire Maneuvers.name: 友军炮火打击战术 Friendly Fire Maneuvers
Friendly Fire Maneuvers.description:
专长类型：CombatTeamwork

你和队友们可以预计到相互之间的弹道从而互不干扰。

先决条件: 近程射击，精准射击。

专长效果: 有该专长的盟友不会给敌人提供软掩蔽；因此你可以借机攻击正常情况下因盟友提供软掩蔽而无法借机的敌人。若习得该专长的盟友对你所在区域释放允许进行反射豁免检定来避免伤害的法术（例如火球术），你在该豁免检定上获得+4闪避加值。

资源出处: Ranged Tactics Toolbox pg. 14

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Friendly%20Fire%20Maneuvers

Friendly Rivalry.name: Friendly Rivalry
Friendly Rivalry.description:
You fight harder when you're trying to score a quick kill in single combat before your ally does.

Prerequisites
Human (Taldan).

Benefits
If you're the only one threatening a foe and an ally within 30 feet who also has this feat is the only creature threatening a different foe, you gain a +2 morale bonus on your melee attack rolls against the foe that only you are threatening. You gain the bonus only if neither of the qualifying opponents is flat-footed, helpless or otherwise unable to act. You must be able to see your ally to gain the benefit of this feat. If another ally who is not threatening your chosen foe makes any sort of attack against that foe (such as a ranged attack or a spell), you lose this feat's benefit for 1 round.

Friendly Shroud.name: 遮掩队友 Friendly Shroud
Friendly Shroud.description:
你可以帮助队友避开他人的视线。

先决条件: 潜行技能1级。

专长效果: 当你邻接一个盟友时，双方至少在1轮中都没有移动，并且同时尝试进行潜行检定时，你们双方都可以选择两人中较好的能够检定结果作为潜行检定结果。

资源出处: Dirty Tactics Toolbox pg. 13

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Friendly%20Shroud

Friendly Switch.name: Friendly Switch
Friendly Switch.description:
You elbow an ally out of the way, and take his place on the battlefield.

Prerequisites
Base attack bonus +1.

Benefits
As part of your movement or as a 5-foot-step, you can move into the space occupied by an ally of your size or smaller, which displaces the ally into the space you just left. Your ally must be willing and able to move and able to occupy the space you were in. This movement does not provoke attacks of opportunity. This does not count toward your ally's movement on his next turn.

Frightening Ambush.name: 震撼伏击 Frightening Ambush
Frightening Ambush.description:
专长类型：Combat

当你从藏身处一跃而出，敌人被吓得手足无措。

先决条件: 威吓技能1级。

专长效果: 以一个自由动作，你可以对一个你所攻击的措手不及状态的目标发动一次威吓检定以挫败士气。

资源出处: Dirty Tactics Toolbox pg. 13

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Frightening%20Ambush

Frightful Shape.name: Frightful Shape
Frightful Shape.description:
Your wild shape form strikes fear into your opponents.

Prerequisites
Wis 19, base attack bonus +9, wild shape class feature.

Benefits
When you use wild shape, it is supernaturally ferocious and disquieting in appearance, such that when you attack a creature, you can use this ferocity to frighten observers. Opponents within 30 feet of you when you attack must succeed at a Will save (DC = 10 + half your character level + your Charisma modifier) to resist being affected by your frightful shape. On a failed save, creatures with fewer Hit Dice than you become shaken, or panicked if they have 4 Hit Dice or fewer; in either case, the effect lasts for a number of rounds equal to your character level. An opponent that succeeds at its saving throw is immune to your frightful shape for 24 hours. This is a mind-affecting fear effect.

Frost Warrior.name: Frost Warrior
Frost Warrior.description:
The frigid cold of your body makes your melee attacks more formidable.

Prerequisites
Cold subtype, giant subtype.

Benefits
You naturally transfer the cold of your body to any metal melee weapons you wield, dealing 1d6 additional points of cold damage.

Frozen Skin.name: Frozen Skin
Frozen Skin.description:
Rumors abound that winter half-orcs spend so much time in the snow that a thin layer of ice covers their skin.

Prerequisites
Con 15, frostkin half-orc.

Benefits
You gain cold resistance 3. If you already have cold resistance, it is increased by 3 instead.

Furious Finish.name: 狂怒终结 Furious Finish
Furious Finish.description:
你引导你所有的怒气聚于一击并彻底将敌人轰杀至渣。

先决条件: 【狂暴】职业特性，要害打击，基本攻击加值+6。

专长效果: 处于狂暴状态时，当你使用要害打击系列专长，你可以选择不掷伤害骰而是将伤害骰取最大值。如果你这么做，你的狂暴状态立刻结束，并且你陷入疲乏状态（即使正常情况下不会疲乏）。

资源出处: Ultimate Combat pg. 102

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Furious%20Finish

Furious Focus (Mythic).name: 沉着暴怒(神话) Furious Focus (Mythic)
Furious Focus (Mythic).description:
先决条件：沉着暴怒

你能够有节奏地连续攻击，而又不必为了力量牺牲精准度。

神话专长效果：当你使用沉着暴怒专长时，你在借机攻击中做出的攻击检定不会受到猛力攻击的减值。以自由动作，你能够花费1次神话之力，来使你在1轮内使用该专长时做出的任何近战攻击都免受猛力攻击的减值。

资源出处: Mythic Adventures pg. 65

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Furious%20Focus

Furious Spell.name: 暴怒法术 Furious Spell
Furious Spell.description:
专长类型：Metamagic

你的法术萦绕着血红色的怒气，看起来凶狠异常。

专长效果: 造成生命值伤害的暴怒法术会将两倍于法术原始环级的伤害量加在法术造成的伤害上。若法术本身会影响复数目标，那么该额外伤害仅会对每个目标生效一次，无论该法术本身是对所有目标造成一次伤害，还是在多次命中时分别造成伤害（在后者的例子中，该额外伤害仅会加在每个目标首次被命中时遭受的伤害上）。此外，暴怒法术可以在施法者陷入愤怒（enraged）时进行施放，这包括野蛮人的狂暴（rage）或者受到狂暴术（rage）影响的时候。施法者在愤怒时可以施放暴怒法术，即便该法术需要情绪成分（emotion component）也可以做到。如果施法者正处于愤怒之中，那么她会在与施放暴怒法术相关的专注检定和施法者等级检定中获得+2环境加值。暴怒法术使用比法术的实际环级高1级的法术位。

资源出处: Occult Adventures pg. 134

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Furious%20Spell

Fury of the Tainted.name: Fury of the Tainted
Fury of the Tainted.description:
The unstoppable anger you feel toward do-gooders and selfproclaimed saints makes you a force to be reckoned with.

Prerequisites
Cha 13, rage class feature, tiefling.

Benefits
While raging, you gain a +4 competence bonus on saving throws made against spells and effects with the good descriptor.

Fury's Fall.name: 怒魔之落袭 Fury's Fall
Fury's Fall.description:
专长类型：Combat

你同时使用力量和机敏将你的对手放倒在地。

先决条件: 精通绊摔。

专长效果: 当你使用绊摔战技时，将你的敏捷调整值加到你的战技加值上。

资源出处: Cheliax, Empire of Devils pg. 26

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Fury's%20Fall

Fury's Snare.name: 怒魔之圈套 Fury's Snare
Fury's Snare.description:
专长类型：Combat

你使用你的武器纠缠你的对手。

先决条件: 怒魔之落袭，精通绊摔。

专长效果: 如果你成功使用鞭子绊摔了一名敌人，你可以放开你的鞭子。被你绊摔的目标将会陷入纠缠状态。该目标可以尝试做一个DC10的力量检定或者DC15的脱逃检定来获得自由（将你的鞭子的增强加值加入DC中去），该目标还可以用一个全回合动作来摆脱纠缠。如果该目标以力量检定的方式逃脱鞭子，则鞭子进入破损状态。如果鞭子上附有魔法效果，例如火焰，则每回合都造成该魔法效果的伤害（在你的回合造成）。

资源出处: Cheliax, Empire of Devils pg. 26

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Fury's%20Snare

Gang Up.name: 一拥而上 Gang Up
Gang Up.description:
专长类型：Combat

你擅长使用人海战术。

先决条件: 智力13，寓守于攻。

专长效果: 只要敌人处于至少两名盟友的威胁范围内，就视为你在夹击目标，无论你的具体位置如何。

通常状况: 你必须处于对角位才能进行夹击。

资源出处: Advanced Players Guide pg. 161

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Gang%20Up

战策增益：在你并不满足这个专长的属性先决条件（智力13）时你也能选择这个专长。只有当你在耐力池中拥有1点耐力时你才能获得这个专长的好处。如果你花费5点耐力，当你和另外一个盟友（而不是另外两个）同时威胁一个敌人时你就能获得这个专长的好处。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 120

Garen's Discipline.name: 加仑之戒 Garen's Discipline
Garen's Discipline.description:
专长类型：Combat

先决条件：警觉，异种武器擅长（奥多里决斗剑），武器专攻（奥多里决斗剑），BAB+4。

先决条件: 警觉，异种武器擅长（奥多里决斗剑），武器专攻（奥多里决斗剑），BAB+4。

专长效果: 当你使用防御式战斗，寓守于攻专长，全回合防御时，选择一种豁免（每次进行这些动作时，你都可以选择不同的豁免类型）检定。在尝试选择的豁免检定前，每轮一次，你在该豁免上获得+2加值。如果你的BAB达到了+11或更高，这个加值将增加到+3。如果你达到了BAB+16或更高，这个加值增加到+4.

资源出处: Adventurers Guide pg. 26

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Garen's%20Discipline

Gate Breaker.name: Gate Breaker
Gate Breaker.description:
Your strikes against objects are especially vicious.

Prerequisites
Str 13, Improved Sunder, Power Attack, base attack bonus +1.

Benefits
Whenever you would deal damage to an object, you deal normal damage plus an additional amount equal to your Strength modifier. This applies to both unattended objects and those you damage as part of a successful sunder combat maneuver check.

Gather Might.name: Gather Might
Gather Might.description:
You can feed your body when you gather power.

Prerequisites
Gather power class feature, kineticist level 8th.

Benefits
When you gather power, instead of reducing the burn cost of a blast wild talent, you can send elemental energy flowing through your body to gain a +2 alchemical bonus to Strength, Dexterity, and Constitution until the end of your turn for each point of burn reduction your gather power would grant (to a maximum of +10 when spending a full round plus a move action to gather power with the supercharge class feature).

Gaze Reflection.name: 凝视映射 Gaze Reflection
Gaze Reflection.description:
你的异能能够有效保护自身免受敌人那强大的凝视攻击。

先决条件: 法术辨识10级，深邃注视（Bold Stare）和催眠师诡计（Mesmerist Trick）职业能力。

专长效果: 当有生物使用凝视攻击（gaze attack），包括由摄心目光（Eyebite）或灼热凝视（Burning Gaze）这样的法术或者魔法物品提供的效果，而你以移开双眼（avert your eyes）来应对的话，你可以投掷两次检定并选择较好的结果，来判断你是否暴露在凝视攻击之下、或者判断你对抗该生物做出的攻击检定是否失手，其中后者的效果不会与盲斗（Blind-Fight）专长叠加。此外，以迅捷动作（swift action），你能够花费1次催眠师诡计（Mesmerist Trick）的使用次数，来让你免疫该生物的凝视，直至你的下个回合开始为止。若你花费2次催眠师诡计（Mesmerist Trick）的使用次数，则会在免疫该生物的凝视的同时，将它的凝视反射回其自身，以它自己的凝视来影响它。

特殊说明: 在判断该专长的效果时，催眠师（Mesmerist）的催眠注视（Hypnotic Stare）、女巫（witch）或鬼婆（hag）的邪眼（evil eye）以及吸血鬼（vampire）的支配（dominate）都被视为凝视攻击（gaze attacks）；同样地，那些在看向生物时才会触发的能力，比如宁芙（nymph）的盲目绝色（blinding beauty）或海鬼婆（sea hag）的骇人外貌（Horrific Appearance），在本专长中也被视同为凝视效果。在使用本专长并且花费2次催眠师诡计（Mesmerist Trick）的使用次数时，并不会忽略目标生物对自身凝视的免疫力，比如吸血鬼的免疫影响心灵效果（immunity to mind-affecting effects）或者宁芙的盲目绝色（blinding beauty）仅对类人生物（humanoids）生效的限制。

资源出处: Ultimate Intrigue pg. 84

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Gaze%20Reflection

Genie-Touched Companion.name: Genie-Touched Companion
Genie-Touched Companion.description:
Your animal companion is descended from creatures from one of the Elemental Planes.

Prerequisites
Cha 13, animal companion or mount class feature.

Benefits
You can take a genie-touched creature as an animal companion. This animal companion functions as a horse companion, with the adjustments that follow. When you choose your genie-touched companion, you must select your companion's breed: istaheq, misayyah, tuanu, or zefaheen. Your choice determines the type of energy resistance your companion gains, as well as the three additional abilities your companion acquires as you advance in level.
Genie-Touched Companion
Companion TypeResistanceStarting Ability4th-Level Ability8th-Level Ability
IstaheqAcid 10SteadfastScion of stoneThundering hooves
MisayyahFire 10FiresightSunbornFlaming trail
TuanuCold 10Water senseFluid movementWaterborn

Ghost Guide.name: Ghost Guide
Ghost Guide.description:
You have made it your life's work to put the dead to rest.

Prerequisites
You have encountered a ghost or haunt, or have the Bones, the Died, the Raised Among the Dead, or The Dead One background (all of which are found in Ultimate Campaign).

Benefits
Whenever you communicate with a ghost or haunt, whether while adventuring or through use of spells such as call spirit, speak with haunt, and speak with dead, or seances and talking boards, you gain a +2 bonus on Diplomacy and Sense Motive checks. The GM can also extend this benefit to any intelligent undead creature that has an interest in being laid to rest. If you have more than 10 ranks in either these skills, you instead gain a +4 bonus on the appropriate skill.

Goal
Lay an appropriate number of ghosts, haunts, and other undead creatures to rest. Laying to rest means fulfilling the actions described on a haunt's destruction line or doing what is required to prevent a ghost's rejuvenation. If the GM includes other types of undead, the GM decides what constitutes their final business.

Completion Benefit
You retain the normal benefit. Additionally, you increase your effective caster level by 2 when determining the effects of call spirit, speak with haunt, speak with dead. Finally, when a spirit lies to you, you can confront the spirit about the lie and force it to roll another saving throw against the spell's DC. If the spirit fails the saving throw, you receive an additional question to replace the one where the spirit gave a false answer.

Ghost Hunting Team.name: Ghost Hunting Team
Ghost Hunting Team.description:
Your loathing of undead is so great that even your allies can feel it.

Prerequisites
Duskwalker, ghost hunter racial trait.

Benefits
When you use your ghost hunter ability to grant your weapons the ghost touch special ability, you can also affect the weapons of allies within 30 feet of you. You can activate ghost hunter an additional time each day.

Ghost Whisperer.name: Ghost Whisperer
Ghost Whisperer.description:
Your words soothe the dead and undead alike, and can even affect haunts.

Prerequisites
Ability to cast 3rd-level spells.

Benefits
You gain Necril as a bonus language, and gain a +2 bonus on Bluff, Diplomacy, Intimidate, and Sense Motive checks against undead creatures or when you speak Necril. Add speak with dead to your list of spells known. As soon as you gain the ability to cast 4th-level spells, add speak with haunt to your list of spells known. Whenever you cast speak with dead or speak with haunt, treat your alignment as identical to that of the dead creature or haunt with which you are speaking, and increase the effective caster level of the spell by 2.

Ghostbane Ichor.name: Ghostbane Ichor
Ghostbane Ichor.description:
Your venom is powerful enough to seep into the Ethereal Plane.

Prerequisites
Knowledge (religion) 9 ranks, vishkanya.

Benefits
For a number of rounds equal to your Constitution modifier, a weapon envenomed by your vishkanya venom gains the ghost touch special ability and deals 1d6 additional points of damage against incorporeal foes. This affects creatures even if they are immune to poison effects. If the weapon is used to attack a corporeal creature, the venom is expended and the effects it granted to your weapon end.

Normal
Vishkanya venom deals Dexterity damage.

Ghostslayer.name: Ghostslayer
Ghostslayer.description:
Your blade is keen enough to hew incorporeal creatures.

Prerequisites
Base attack bonus +1, Knowledge (religion) 1 rank.

Benefits
As a swift action, you can imbue a weapon you wield with spiritual energies for 1 round. An imbued weapon damages incorporeal creatures as though it were magical. If the imbued weapon has an enhancement bonus of +2 or greater, it functions as a ghost touch weapon. A weapon imbued in this way can deal precision damage (such as sneak attack damage) to incorporeal creatures.

Giant Killer.name: 巨人杀手 Giant Killer
Giant Killer.description:
专长类型：Combat

你如风般的劈砍威胁着巨人以及其他体型巨大的敌人。

先决条件: 力量13，顺势斩，地精切裂者，兽人屠戮者，猛力攻击，回击，基本攻击加值+11，矮人。

专长效果: 该专长如同“地精切裂者”一般作用，但是你的额外攻击能够用于攻击比你体型大一级或更小的生物。此外，当你用这些攻击对抗类人生物（巨人）时，攻击检定获得+2环境加值。

资源出处: Advanced Race Guide pg. 18
