All restrictions of Spring Attack apply to both targets, and your movement does not provoke attacks of opportunity from either target. You can't target the same creature twice.

Special
A monk of at least 14th level can select this feat as a monk bonus feat, but only if he has Spring Attack.

Improved Stalwart.name: 精通坚毅 Improved Stalwart
Improved Stalwart.description:
你圆转地接下攻击，并立刻反击。

先决条件: 顽强，坚忍，坚毅，基本攻击加值+11。

专长效果: 你从“坚毅”专长获得的伤害减免加倍，最大达到“10/-”。

资源出处: Ultimate Combat pg. 106

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Improved%20Stalwart

Improved Steal (Mythic).name: 精通盗取(神话) Improved Steal (Mythic)
Improved Steal (Mythic).description:
先决条件：精通盗取

即便敌人将物品藏得再严实，你那轻巧的手指也能够轻松顺走这些宝贝。

神话专长效果：你的盗取战技检定获得加值，数值等同于你的阶层的一半，当敌人对你进行盗取战技时，你的CMD也获得此加值。这些加值与非神话版的精通盗取专长所赋予的加值叠加。

除此之外，你还能对任何尝试对你进行盗取战技的敌人进行借机攻击，除非对方也拥有该专长。

资源出处: Mythic Adventures pg. 67

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Improved%20Steal

Improved Stellar Wanderer.name: Improved Stellar Wanderer
Improved Stellar Wanderer.description:
You have mastered the art of planar travel through your time on Cynosure.

Prerequisites
Stellar Wanderer, Knowledge (planes) 15 ranks.

Benefits
When using the Stellar Wanderer feat for planar travel, you can choose up to eight creatures to be transported with you. You now appear 1 to 100 miles (1d%) from your intended destination rather than 5 to 500 miles.

Improved Stench.name: Improved Stench
Improved Stench.description:
Your foul odor is particularly strong and wide-reaching.

Prerequisites
Stench universal monster ability.

Benefits
The aura range of your stench ability increases by 30 feet. In addition, your stench ability save DC increases by 2, and its duration increases by 50%.

Improved Stonecunning.name: 精通岩石敏锐 Improved Stonecunning
Improved Stonecunning.description:
你对石造物的感知异常敏锐。

先决条件: 感知13，矮人，【岩石敏锐】种族特性。

专长效果: 当你使用察觉检定注意到不寻常的石造物时获得+4加值。这个加值会取代【岩石敏锐】种族特性对察觉检定的正常加值。

资源出处: Advanced Players Guide pg. 163

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Improved%20Stonecunning

Improved Stonecunning (Mythic).name: 精通岩石敏锐(神话) Improved Stonecunning (Mythic)
Improved Stonecunning (Mythic).description:
先决条件：精通岩石敏锐

若你仔细倾听，就能了解到岩石诉说的秘密。

神话专长效果：你获得每日1次的石言术（Stone Tell）类法术能力，施法者等级等同于你的阶层的两倍。

资源出处: Mythic Adventures pg. 67

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Improved%20Stonecunning

Improved Studied Combatant.name: 精通决斗智慧 Improved Studied Combatant
Improved Studied Combatant.description:
你深入分析对手的战术，以此在和他的对决上占得先手。

先决条件: 智力13，业余调查员，决斗智慧，基础攻击加值+8，在至少一项知识技能上拥有1个等级，在拥有灵感职业能力的职业上没有任何等级。

专长效果: 你通过决斗智慧专长获得的攻击检定洞察加值和伤害加值提升到+4。除此之外，本能力的效果和决斗智慧专长相同。

资源出处: Advanced Class Guide pg. 150

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Improved%20Studied%20Combatant

Improved Sunder (Mythic).name: 精通破武(神话) Improved Sunder (Mythic)
Improved Sunder (Mythic).description:
先决条件：精通破武

你那强有力的打击能够粉碎物体。

神话专长效果：你的破武战技检定获得加值，数值等同于你的阶层的一半，当敌人尝试对你所使用的物品进行破武战技时，你的CMD也获得此加值。这些加值与非神话版的精通破武专长所赋予的加值叠加。

除此之外，你还能对任何尝试对你所使用的物品进行破武战技的敌人进行借机攻击，除非对方也拥有该专长。

资源出处: Mythic Adventures pg. 67

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Improved%20Sunder

Improved Surprise Follow-Through.name: 精通顺势突袭 Improved Surprise Follow-Through
Improved Surprise Follow-Through.description:
专长类型：Combat

你在一次攻击后突然展开一系列雨点般的打击。

先决条件: 力量13，顺势斩，大顺势斩，猛力攻击，顺势突袭，基本攻击加值+8。

专长效果: 当使用“大顺势斩”时，每个你在你的行动轮中攻击的敌人（除了第一个）都失去对你的敏捷加值。

资源出处: Advanced Race Guide pg. 57

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Improved%20Surprise%20Follow-Through

战策增益：当你击中一个因为这个专长失去敏捷加值的敌人时，你可以使用顺势突袭战策来造成额外伤害，这个造成的额外伤害将提升到1d6。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 124

Improved Swap Places.name: 精通换位 Improved Swap Places
Improved Swap Places.description:
专长类型：CombatTeamwork

无论你们之间的身材差异多大，你和伙伴已经完全掌握了互相移身的技巧。

先决条件: 换位。

专长效果: 当你和你的盟友使用换位专长时，它可以比你大或者小一个体型等级，并且你在移入盟友占据的方格时不会引发借机攻击，如果你为盟友让出的方格不足以它的体型完全占据，你们它必须挤入（Squeeze，在攻击检定和速度上承受减值）。除此之外，你还可以在此移动中发动一次冲撞战技攻击，对抗占据你的盟友即将交换位置的一个生物，但这次冲撞攻击无法将这个生物撞离多于5尺距离。

通常状况: 你必须和你的盟友同一体型才能发动换位专长，并且你移入盟友的方格会引发借机攻击。

资源出处: Advanced Class Guide pg. 150

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Improved%20Swap%20Places

战策增益：当你在使用这个专长尝试冲撞时，如果为了给你的盟友创造出空间必须这么做的话，你可以消耗2点耐力来获得让目标移动超过5尺的能力（你仍然必须要在冲撞尝试中投出足够高才能让目标移动额外的距离，就和正常情况一样）。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 124

Improved Swarm Form.name: Improved Swarm Form
Improved Swarm Form.description:
You can assume the form of various varmints.

Prerequisites
Vampire.

Benefits
Choose one of the following forms: bat swarm, centipede swarm, cockroach swarm, leech swarm, rat swarm, or spider swarm. As a standard action, you can change into this form.

Special
You can gain this feat multiple times. Each time you take this feat, choose another swarm type.

Improved Toxicological Timing.name: Improved Toxicological Timing
Improved Toxicological Timing.description:
You know how to adjust the amount of time required for a poison to take effect.

Prerequisites
Craft (alchemy) 11 ranks, Toxicological Timing.

Benefits
Whenever you craft a poison with the Craft (alchemy) skill, you can add or subtract up to 1 day from its onset time (to a minimum onset period of 1 round).

Improved Trip (Mythic).name: 精通绊摔(神话) Improved Trip (Mythic)
Improved Trip (Mythic).description:
先决条件：精通绊摔

击倒敌人，你是专家。

神话专长效果：你的绊摔检定获得加值，数值等同于你的阶层的一半，当敌人绊摔你时，你的CMD也获得此加值。这些加值与非神话版的精通绊摔专长所赋予的加值叠加。

除此之外，你还能对任何尝试绊摔你的敌人进行借机攻击，除非对方也拥有该专长。

资源出处: Mythic Adventures pg. 68

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Improved%20Trip

Improved Two-Weapon Feint.name: 精通双武器虚招 Improved Two-Weapon Feint
Improved Two-Weapon Feint.description:
专长类型：Combat

你的主手武器让对手失去平衡，而副手武器则乘隙攻入他的防御。

先决条件: 敏捷17，智力13，寓守于攻，精通双武器格斗，双武器格斗，双武器虚招，基本攻击加值+6。

专长效果: 当你使用双武器进行近战攻击，你可以放弃你的第一次主手武器攻击、进行一次唬骗检定来对一个敌人使用虚招。如果你虚招成功，目标将会在你本轮结束之前失去敏捷上的AC加值。

资源出处: Ultimate Combat pg. 106

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Improved%20Two-Weapon%20Feint

战策增益：即使你没有满足属性值先决条件（智力13）时也可以选择这个专长。只有在你的耐力池中至少还有1点耐力时你才能获得这个专长的好处。你可以消耗5点耐力来让对手失敏的时间延长到你的下一轮开始。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 124

Improved Umbral Scion.name: 进阶黑耀传人 Improved Umbral Scion
Improved Umbral Scion.description:
你精通了卓尔贵族魔法。

先决条件: 魅力13，感知13，黑耀传人，卓尔贵族，高等卓尔贵族，进阶卓尔贵族，能够使用卓尔的类法术能力，卓尔。

专长效果: 你可以每天以类法术能力使用‘解除魔法’，‘神恩’，‘暗示术’各1次。CL等同于你的人物等级。

资源出处: Advanced Race Guide pg. 105

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Improved%20Umbral%20Scion

Improved Unarmed Strike (Mythic).name: 精通徒手打击(神话) Improved Unarmed Strike (Mythic)
Improved Unarmed Strike (Mythic).description:
先决条件：精通徒手打击

你的徒手打击比其他人更强。

神话专长效果：你能够将你的阶层的一半加到徒手打击的伤害上。以迅捷动作，你能够花费1次神话之力使用徒手打击克服物体的硬度。这个效果持续的轮数等同于你的阶层。若物体的硬度比15还高，你就无法忽略它的硬度了。

资源出处: Mythic Adventures pg. 68

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Improved%20Unarmed%20Strike

Improved Uncivilized Tactics.name: Improved Uncivilized Tactics
Improved Uncivilized Tactics.description:
You are skilled at twisting your foe's limbs out of joint.

Prerequisites
Str 13, Power Attack, Uncivilized Tactics.

Benefits
You don't provoke an attack of opportunity when attempting a combat maneuver check to use Uncivilized Tactics. In addition, you receive a +2 bonus on such checks.

Normal
You provoke an attack of opportunity when using the Uncivilized Tactics feat.

Improved Underhanded Teamwork.name: Improved Underhanded Teamwork
Improved Underhanded Teamwork.description:
You and your allies have trained together long enough to know how to exploit an opponent's disadvantage to make her predicament even worse.

Prerequisites
Combat Expertise, Improved Dirty Trick, Underhanded Teamwork, base attack bonus +6.

Benefits
Whenever an ally who also has this feat performs the dirty trick combat maneuver against a foe that you both threaten, you may attempt a dirty trick combat maneuver against the same foe as an immediate action to inflict a second condition. If the foe uses an action to remove the first condition, it also removes the condition imposed by your immediate action.

Improved Weapon of the Chosen.name: 精通神选武器 Improved Weapon of the Chosen
Improved Weapon of the Chosen.description:
专长类型：Combat

当你挥舞神祇偏好的武器时，你获得的祝福将更加强大。。

先决条件: 拥有神祇偏好武器的武器专攻专长，神选武器。

专长效果: 除了神选武器专长的效果外，你在启动神选武器后专长的效果将持续到你的下轮开始为止。除此之外，在克服伤害减免时，你的武器获得一个基于你神祇阵营的阵营品质——混乱，邪恶，善良或守序。如果你的神祇的阵营为绝对中立，则你的武器在克服伤害减免时同时视为寒铁和镀银武器。

资源出处: Advanced Class Guide pg. 151

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Improved%20Weapon%20of%20the%20Chosen

战策增益：当你使用这个专长时，在它的正常持续时间结束时你可以消耗2点耐力来延长持续时间到你的下一回合结束。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 124

Improved Weapon Shift.name: Improved Weapon Shift
Improved Weapon Shift.description:
When you change forms, your natural attacks take on not just the physical properties of your weapons, but their magical abilities as well.

Prerequisites
Weapon Shift, base attack bonus +6, wild shape class feature.

Benefits
When you apply a melee weapon's damage type and properties to your natural attacks using the Weapon Shift feat, your natural attacks also gain the weapon special abilities of the weapon, such as the flaming special ability. Improved Weapon Shift does not apply the dancing special ability or any special abilities limited to thrown or ranged weapons, and it does not apply the weapon's enhancement bonuses to your attacks.

Improved Whip Mastery.name: 精通长鞭熟稔 Improved Whip Mastery
Improved Whip Mastery.description:
专长类型：Combat

你可以用长鞭环绕并纠缠敌人。【译者吐槽：扯淡吧那里说到能纠缠敌人了？！】

先决条件: 武器专攻（长鞭），长鞭熟稔，基本攻击加值+5。

专长效果: 当持用长鞭时，你的威胁范围为天生触及外加5尺。你能用长鞭抓起触及范围内的一件小型或超小型无主物品，将其拖到你所在的方格。如此施为你需要进行AC为10的近战接触攻击。此外，你能用长鞭钩住它触及范围内的一件物体，将它5尺长的一段当作抓钩来使用，令你能够把长鞭的剩余部分当作绳索般摇荡。你能以自由动作放开钩住的物体，但你不能在长鞭正钩在物体上的时候用它攻击。

资源出处: Ultimate Combat pg. 106

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Improved%20Whip%20Mastery

战策增益：在你回合开始时，你可以消耗5点耐力来提升你持用长鞭的威胁范围的半径额外5尺，直到你在额外触及中对一个敌人使用了借机攻击或者到你下一回合开始，取决于哪一个先发生。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 124

Improved Wilding Strike.name: Improved Wilding Strike
Improved Wilding Strike.description:
You gain greater skill with the natural power of your blows.

Prerequisites
Str 16, Improved Unarmed Strike, Wilding, Wilding Strike, base attack bonus +11.

Benefits
The damage die of your unarmed strikes increases to 1d8 (or 1d6 if you are Small). This does not stack with any other effects that increase the damage die of your unarmed strikes, including levels in classes such as monk. Increases to your actual size category (such as enlarge person) still increase your damage die as normal.

Improvisation.name: 灵机一动 Improvisation
Improvisation.description:
先决条件：智力13，速学者，人类。

先决条件: 智力13，速学者，人类。

专长效果: 你在任何没有投入技能点的技能检定中均获得+2加值。此外，你可以在未经受训的情况下使用那些需要受训才能使用的技能。

资源出处: Advanced Race Guide pg. 77

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Improvisation

Improvisational Focus.name: Improvisational Focus
Improvisational Focus.description:
A makeshift weapon in your hands is as dangerous as any other instrument of violence.

Prerequisites
Catch Off-Guard or Throw Anything, base attack bonus +1.

Benefits
You gain a +1 bonus on attack rolls you make using an improvised weapon. You are considered proficient with the improvised weapon and are considered to have Weapon Focus with improvised weapons for the purpose of meeting the prerequisites of feats that specifically select a weapon, such as Weapon Specialization.

Special
Thrown splash weapons are not considered improvised weapons for the purposes of this feat.

Improvisational Healer.name: Improvisational Healer
Improvisational Healer.description:
In any urban or natural setting, you can scavenge for useful medical supplies.

Prerequisites
Heal 1 rank.

Benefits
When attempting a Heal check that normally requires a healer's kit, you don't take a penalty on the check for not having a healer's kit. When you use a healer's kit, you can augment it with improvised supplies, gaining an additional +2 circumstance bonus on your check. Finally, you can treat any potion of cure light wounds, potion of cure moderate wounds, or potion of cure serious wounds you drink yourself or administer to another character as though its caster level were equal to the number of ranks you have in the Heal skill. The spell's normal limitations apply; for example, a potion of cure light wounds can cure a maximum of 1d8+5 points of damage, even if you have more than 5 ranks in the Heal skill.

Improvised Defenses.name: Improvised Defenses
Improvised Defenses.description:
You can deftly defend yourself with makeshift weapons.

Prerequisites
Catch Off-Guard or Throw Anything, base attack bonus +1.

Benefits
You gain a +1 shield bonus to AC when you are wielding an improvised weapon and have your other hand free.

In Harm's Way.name: 肉盾 In Harm's Way
In Harm's Way.description:
专长类型：Combat

为了保护盟友，你将自身置于危险之中。

先决条件: 保镖。

专长效果: 当你使用援助他人动作提高相邻盟友的AC时，你能够以直觉动作拦截对抗该名盟友的成功攻击，受到该次攻击的全部伤害以及任何可能的效果（流血，毒素等等）。一名生物从该专长获得的好处不能超过每次攻击一回。【编注：就是说不能由多人同时来为同一人挡刀。】

资源出处: Advanced Players Guide pg. 164

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=In%20Harm's%20Way

战策增益：当你使用这个专长的效果时，你可以消耗5点耐力来降低被拦截攻击的伤害，降低的点数等于两倍你以这种方式消耗的耐力。这不会改变其它来自这次攻击的效果（比如流血，毒素等等），即使伤害已经降低到0。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 124

Incite Paranoia.name: 煽动猜忌 Incite Paranoia
Incite Paranoia.description:
专长类型：Combat

你能说服任何人相信自己的亲友心怀鬼胎。

先决条件: 智力 13，寓守于攻，诈欺师，高等虚招，精通虚招，BAB +6。

专长效果: 当你成功在战斗中使用了虚招时，如果你的检定成功了5点或更多，那么直至你的下个回合为止，目标便不会再为盟友提供夹击，也不会提供或获得团队专长（teamwork feats）带来的好处。

此外，当你尝试1次唬骗检定来说谎，而且谎言中暗指1个或更多个目标的盟友会背叛目标、或者暗中陷害她（secretly against her）的话，该谎言的可信度会比正常情况下高1级，从过于牵强（far-fetched）变为不太可靠（unlikely），从不太可靠（unlikely）变为可信（believable），如果谎言的可信度本身低于过于牵强（far-fetched），则本专长不会产生效果。

资源出处: Ultimate Intrigue pg. 85

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Incite%20Paranoia

Incorporeal Intuition.name: Incorporeal Intuition
Incorporeal Intuition.description:
You notice incorporeal creatures, even those lurking in walls.

Prerequisites
Psychic Sensitivity or the ability to cast psychic spells, Spirit Sense.

Benefits
You can sense the presence and movement of incorporeal creatures though solid walls, as long as that incorporeal creature is adjacent to you. When you sense a creature in this way, you can attempt a Knowledge (religion) check to identify the creature and its special powers or vulnerabilities, with a -5 penalty. When you sense an incorporeal creature with this ability and use a readied action to attack it when it attacks from inside the wall, it doesn't gain cover against your attack.

Normal
Incorporeal creatures are silent unless they choose to make a sound and are thus almost impossible to detect when inside a solid wall. When readying to attack an incorporeal creature in a solid wall, it gains cover against your attack.

Incredible Healer.name: Incredible Healer
Incredible Healer.description:
You are able to treat deadly wounds with an almost supernatural skill.

Prerequisites
Heal 5 ranks.

Benefits
When you use the Heal skill to treat deadly wounds, the target heals a number of hit points equal to either the result of your Heal check or the normal amount, whichever is higher. A creature can still benefit from having deadly wounds treated no more than once per day.

Incremental Elemental Assault.name: 蓄能元素攻袭 Incremental Elemental Assault
Incremental Elemental Assault.description:
你每天可以多次启动元素攻袭能力。

先决条件: 巨灵裔。

专长效果: 你能以1轮为单位使用你的【元素攻袭】能力，每日使用的轮数最高等同于你的角色等级。这些轮数不必连续。启动该能力是一个迅捷动作；解消效果是自由动作。

通常状况: 你每天只能使用1次【元素攻袭】。它持续的轮数等同于你的角色等级。

资源出处: Advanced Race Guide pg. 203

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Incremental%20Elemental%20Assault

Indomitable Mount.name: Indomitable Mount
Indomitable Mount.description:
Your skill at riding helps your mount avoid attacks.

Prerequisites
Mounted Combat, Handle Animal 5 ranks, Ride 5 ranks, Lastwall affinity.

Benefits
Once per round when your mount must make a saving throw, you can make a Ride check as an immediate action. Your mount makes its save if your Ride check result is greater than the DC of the opponent's attack.

Indomitable Mountain Avalanche.name: 岳峙渊渟 Indomitable Mountain Avalanche
Indomitable Mountain Avalanche.description:
专长类型：Combat

你是一座无法逾越的绝巅。

先决条件: 感知15，战斗反射，精通徒手击打，岳峙流，岳峙巅，BAB+9。

专长效果: 如果对手对你的战技失败，你可以使用你的最高攻击加值对对手进行借机攻击。如果攻击命中，你可以选择不造成伤害，而是将敌人往后推离一定距离（战技检定每失败5点5尺，至少5尺）。此外，当对手尝试在通过你威胁的空间而不引发借机攻击的特技检定中失败时，你使用徒手进行借机攻击时，你可以替代造成伤害将对手向后推5尺。对手以直线后退，但在遇到任何障碍或危险前停下来。

资源出处: Ultimate Wilderness pg. 114

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Indomitable%20Mountain%20Avalanche

Indomitable Mountain Peak.name: 岳峙巅 Indomitable Mountain Peak
Indomitable Mountain Peak.description:
专长类型：Combat

你变得更难移动或通过。

先决条件: 感知15，战斗反射，精通徒手击打，岳峙流，BAB+6。

专长效果: 每当对手成功对你释放战技，或在通过你威胁的空间的特技检定中成功时，你立即在下一次对抗战技检定的CMD，和下一次对抗通过你威胁的空间的特技检定中的DC上，获得+2士气加值。此加值将一直持续到敌人任何一次上述尝试失败为止。

资源出处: Ultimate Wilderness pg. 114

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Indomitable%20Mountain%20Peak

Indomitable Mountain Style.name: 岳峙流 Indomitable Mountain Style
Indomitable Mountain Style.description:
专长类型：CombatStyle

你像山岳一般不可逾越，不可移动。

先决条件: 感知13，战斗反射，精通徒手打击，BAB+4。

专长效果: 只要你不采取移动动作，你的CMD和尝试对你进行虚招的唬骗检定的DC将获得+4士气加值。此外，当生物试图通过特技检定通过你威胁的空间而不引发借机攻击时，你被视作大一个体型的生物来决定CMD。

资源出处: Ultimate Wilderness pg. 115

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Indomitable%20Mountain%20Style

Ineffable Count of the Clock.name: Ineffable Count of the Clock
Ineffable Count of the Clock.description:
You realize that the endless march of time is more of a drunkard's lurch, and this grants you status in the eyes of the Many.

Prerequisites
Fey creature type or Fey Obedience (Shyka), you must have either visited or interacted with an outsider from the Dimension of Time.

Benefits
Three times per day as a free action, you can increase your speed by any amount up to your base speed until the end of your turn. On the subsequent round, your speed is reduced by the same amount.

Inerrant Justice.name: Inerrant Justice
Inerrant Justice.description:
You will punish the guilty without letting any innocents be harmed as a result.

Prerequisites
Must have witnessed or suffered a grave injustice that went unpunished, or have the An Eye for an Eye or the Raiders background. If the offender is not a challenging foe, it either advances to become one or allies with one or more creatures who are.

Benefits
Once per day, you can choose to take the maximum possible weapon damage die roll rather than rolling when you hit a foe that is unaware of you or considers you an ally. Bonus dice, including from sneak attack, surprise attack, and Vital Strike, are rolled normally.

Goal
Decisively defeat or slay the offender without killing any innocents in the process. You can complete the

Goal
after killing innocents if you receive an atonement spell.

Completion Benefit
You can use this feat's benefit once per combat.

Inexplicable Luck.name: 莫名好运 Inexplicable Luck
Inexplicable Luck.description:
先决条件：挑战机运，人类。

先决条件: 挑战机运，人类。

专长效果: 每天一次，你可以以一个自由动作在d20检定掷骰之前获得+8加值。同样你也可以在掷骰之后使用此能力，不过只能获得+4加值。

资源出处: Advanced Race Guide pg. 77

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Inexplicable%20Luck

Infectious Weapons.name: Infectious Weapons
Infectious Weapons.description:
Your weapons spread your sickness.

Prerequisites
Ability to cause disease with a natural weapon via an extraordinary or supernatural ability.

Benefits
Creatures damaged by your ranged and melee weapon attacks have a chance to contract disease, as though they were damaged with your disease-spreading natural weapon.

Infernal Legist.name: Infernal Legist
Infernal Legist.description:
You can instantly conjure an infernal contract into being.

Prerequisites
Devil subtype.

Benefits
As a full-round action, you can produce an infernal contract. To receive the contract's benefit, a mortal creature must sign its name of its own free will. When it does so, that mortal's soul is sworn to Hell. As long as the infernal contract remains in effect, the victim cannot be restored to life after death save by a miracle or a wish. If the mortal is restored to life, you immediately sense it and gain the benefits of a discern location spell targeting the resurrected creature.

Infiltrator.name: Infiltrator
Infiltrator.description:
You have sacrificed your true identity in order to achieve your goal.

Prerequisites
Must have adopted an assumed or secret identity associated with an enemy organization.

Benefits
Once per day when you succeed at a saving throw to negate a divination, you learn what the divination would have revealed and can spend an immediate action to cause the divination to return appropriate false information you imagine that would fit with your cover identity.

Goal
Thwart the organization you have infiltrated, defeating or turning to your cause an appropriate number of challenging foes in the process .

Completion Benefit
Whenever a spell or spell-like ability would reveal information about you, you can attempt a Will saving throw. If your saving throw is successful, the spell reveals nothing about you. You can use this feat's benefits to instead give false information, as detailed above.

Infused Spell Cartridges.name: Infused Spell Cartridges
Infused Spell Cartridges.description:
You can improve your arcane ammunition with more powerful magic.

Prerequisites
Int 15, Arcane Strike, Spell Cartridges, ability to cast 4th-level arcane spells, proficient with firearms.

Benefits
While your gun is imbued with power from the Arcane Strike feat, you can spend a standard action to cast a spell of 3rd level or lower and deliver it via a force bullet. The spell must have a range of touch or produce a ray; if the spell would produce multiple rays, the bullet delivers the effect of only one ray. If the force bullet strikes a target, it deals its force damage and also delivers the effects of the spell. If the force bullet critically hits a target, the spell deals double damage.

Innate Arcana.name: 自生秘法 Innate Arcana
Innate Arcana.description:
你可以通过释放自己准备的奥术能量来充盈天生的魔法回路

先决条件: 奥术施法者，施法者等级4，蛇人。

专长效果: 你可以通过消耗两个已准备的法术或是两个法术位来施放一次种族类法术能力。你所消耗的法术的环数不能低于你所欲施放的类法术能力作为法师/术士法术的环数。

资源出处: Monster Codex pg. 200

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Innate%20Arcana

Innate Flexibility.name: 灵巧魔力 Innate Flexibility
Innate Flexibility.description:
你的魔力之源灵活多变。

先决条件: 灰矮人，拥有两个每日可使用一次的种族类法术能力。

专长效果: 你拥有的每日可使用一次的种族类法术能力使用次数获得增加，相当于你所拥有的类法术能力总量。这些次数可以用在你拥有的任何类法术能力上-无论这些类法术能力来自普通的灰矮人种族特性还是替代灰矮人种族特性。

举例来说，一个普通的灰矮人拥有两个每日可使用一次的种族类法术能力（人类变巨术和隐形术），那么他就可以额外获得两次每日使用类法术能力的机会：他每天可以多施放两次人类变巨术，两次隐形术或是这两个类法术能力额外各一次。

特殊说明: 你可以多次选择本专长。每次选择本专长时，获得的额外使用次数叠加。

资源出处: Monster Codex pg. 44

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Innate%20Flexibility

Inner Breath.name: 内在之息 Inner Breath
Inner Breath.description:
你体内充满了气之元素，它提供你呼吸所需。

先决条件: 角色等级11，风元素裔。

专长效果: 你不再需要呼吸。你免疫那些需要呼吸产生的效果（比如吸入毒素）。但是这不会使你免疫不需要呼吸进行的云雾或气体攻击，比如‘死云术’。

资源出处: Advanced Race Guide pg. 159

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Inner%20Breath

Inner Flame.name: 炽焰核心 Inner Flame
Inner Flame.description:
专长类型：Combat

你的身体产生了如此之多的热能，使得你仅靠触摸就能烧焦敌人。

先决条件: 炙热武器，角色等级7，火元素裔。

专长效果: 你在对抗火焰攻击以及带有〔火〕或者〔光亮〕描述符的法术时的豁免加值提升至+4。当你使用“炙热武器”时，被影响的武器造成额外1d6火焰伤害而非原本的1点，此外当你处于擒抱状态时，你可以在你的行动轮对擒抱对手造成该伤害。

资源出处: Advanced Race Guide pg. 130

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Inner%20Flame

战策增益：当你在对抗一次拥有火或光描述符的效果的豁免骰上失败时，你可以消耗5点耐力来重投这次豁免。你必须接受第二次的结果，即使它更糟。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 124

Inner Light.name: Inner Light
Inner Light.description:
Some ghorans glow with a nurturing inner light.

Prerequisites
Wis 13, ghoran.

Benefits
Once per day, you can cast daylight as a spell-like ability with a caster level equal to your character level. If you have the light dependent racial trait, you can instead cast this spell without the usual effect, but you are considered to be exposed to sunlight for that day.

Innocent Blood.name: 无辜鲜血 Innocent Blood
Innocent Blood.description:
专长类型：Story

世间可悲者的灵魂，通过死亡为你开启了通往伟大之途。

先决条件: 你必须出于个人原因或毫无理由地击杀50个以上无战斗力的智慧生物；或拥有“嗜血如狂（Bloodthirsty）”、“杀人体验（First Kill）”、“天生杀手（The Kill）”等角色背景之一。

专长效果: 你的威吓检定+2。如果你在威吓技能受训10级以上，该加值升至+4。每当你击杀一个智慧生物，你的攻击检定和施法者等级检定+1，持续1分钟（该加值不与自身叠加）。

专长目标: 击杀200个以上无战斗力的智慧生物，然后击杀一个想要将你绳之以法或取而代之的强大敌手。

完成收益: 任何处于战栗状态下的生物攻击你、豁免你所施放的能力或以你为目标使用技能时受到的减值加倍。

资源出处: Ultimate Campaign pg. 69

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Innocent%20Blood

Insidious Healing.name: Insidious Healing
Insidious Healing.description:
Your healing spells give you an advantage when you choose to affect those targets with other spells.

Benefits
Any creature that chooses not to attempt a saving throw against any healing spell you cast takes a -4 penalty on saving throws against other targeted spells you cast for 24 hours.

Insightful Advice.name: 金玉良言 Insightful Advice
Insightful Advice.description:
你能教导他人如何充分利用自身掌握的技巧。

先决条件: 表演（演说）3级。

专长效果: 你能够尝试1次技能检定为30尺内的1名盟友提供协助（aid），不过前提是你必须在该项技能中受训。这会耗费1分钟，而且在此期间内，你需要在动嘴说的同时，让接受该次建议的盟友听到你说的话。你赋予的加值为+2点，并且忽略任何可能改变你的协助他人加值（aid another bonus）的任何其他效果。该加值会适用于此盟友使用对应技能尝试的全部检定，它会持续1日，而且不会与任何其他协助他人加值叠加。无论你在协助他人的检定中成功与否，每日你仅能为每名盟友尝试使用1次该能力。

资源出处: Ultimate Intrigue pg. 85

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Insightful%20Advice

Insightful Delivery.name: 精明毒杀 Insightful Delivery
Insightful Delivery.description:
你精心调整你准备的毒剂，将它们以最致命的方式送入对手体内。

先决条件: 用毒职业能力，调查员战斗策略职业能力。

专长效果: 当你展开战斗策略并使用喂毒的武器发动策士之击时，毒药的DC将获得相当于策士之击骰数的一半加值。

资源出处: Advanced Class Guide pg. 151

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Insightful%20Delivery

Insightful Gaze.name: 洞察人心 Insightful Gaze
Insightful Gaze.description:
你能注意到他人所没注意到的东西。没有什么能够逃过你的眼睛。

先决条件: 【严苛凝视】职业特性。

专长效果: 当你使用察言观色检定对抗他人的唬骗检定时，你可以双骰取高。

资源出处: Ultimate Magic pg. 153

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Insightful%20Gaze

Inspirational Commander.name: Inspirational Commander
Inspirational Commander.description:
Armies under your command enjoy higher morale thanks to your excellent leadership.

Prerequisites
Charisma 13.

Benefits
You or any army that is under your command gains a +2 bonus on Morale checks. Additionally, you gain two additional boons of your choice (see page 240 of Ultimate Campaign).

Inspired Alchemy.name: 炼金术灵感 Inspired Alchemy
Inspired Alchemy.description:
只要投入一点灵感和功夫，你就可以再调出一份用过的化合炼成。

先决条件: 可以制造2环化合炼成，炼金术职业能力，灵感职业能力。

专长效果: 你可以重新炼制一份在过去的一小时内使用过的化合炼成，这将花费你10分钟时间重新配合材料，并花费相当于这个化合炼成环数的灵感点数。当你以此专长重新调制一份化合炼成，这个化合炼成将不计入你每日可以准备的化合炼成数量。

资源出处: Advanced Class Guide pg. 151

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Inspired%20Alchemy

Inspired by Fear.name: 拥抱恐惧 Inspired by Fear
Inspired by Fear.description:
你的丧歌让敌人战栗，但你的盟友反而更为坚强。

先决条件: 可以演奏末日丧歌。

专长效果: 处于你的末日丧歌表演影响范围内的盟友将在对抗恐惧效果的豁免检定上获得+4士气加值，必须有至少一个因为末日丧歌而陷入战栗状态的生物处于你的末日丧歌影响范围内你的盟友才能获得这个加值。

资源出处: Advanced Class Guide pg. 151

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Inspired%20by%20Fear

Inspired Sneak Attack.name: 灵感猛袭 Inspired Sneak Attack
Inspired Sneak Attack.description:
专长类型：Combat

你闪耀的灵感会成为毙敌的致命武器。

先决条件: 拥有灵感池（Inspiration Pool）职业能力；偷袭或调查员策士之击（Studied Strike）职业能力。

专长效果: 每当你造成一次偷袭或策士之击伤害时，你都可以消耗1点灵感点数，重投所有这次额外伤害中结果为1的伤害骰。如果你拥有猛力偷袭（Powerful Sneak）APG盗贼天赋的话，你可以取代该天赋使你为1的偷袭骰为2的效果，而是重投结果为1的偷袭骰；如果你拥有致命偷袭（Deadly Sneak）APG高等盗贼天赋的话，你可以取代该天赋使你为1或2的偷袭骰为3的效果，而是重投结果为1或2的偷袭骰。但是，无论如何你都必须接受重投的结果，即使它比原结果更糟。

资源出处: Dirty Tactics Toolbox pg. 11

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Inspired%20Sneak%20Attack

Inspired Strike.name: 灵感打击 Inspired Strike
Inspired Strike.description:
你神奇的灵感并不只能用来纸上谈兵——它也能重创你的对手。

先决条件: 调查员战斗策略职业能力。

专长效果: 每当你在对目标展开战斗策略时对一个生物造成了伤害，你都可以消耗1点灵感点数，造成相当于你的灵感骰结果的额外伤害。

资源出处: Advanced Class Guide pg. 151

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Inspired%20Strike

Inspiring Bravery.name: 英勇启迪 Inspiring Bravery
Inspiring Bravery.description:
专长类型：Combat

你的勇猛能激发他人的勇气。

先决条件: 魅力 13，英勇（Bravery）职业能力。

专长效果: 只要你还有意识（conscious）且没有陷入震慑（stunned）、晕眩（dazed）或困惑（confused），那么30尺内所有能够看到你并听到你的盟友均可以在对抗恐惧（fear）时，获得你的英勇（Bravery）加值。若你具有精通英勇*（Improved Bravery）专长，他们还能将你的英勇加值用在对抗所有影响心灵（mind-affecting）效果的豁免检定上。若你具有英勇交际*（Social Bravery）专长，则你的英勇加值可以加在挫败盟友士气的威吓检定DC、对盟友进行虚招的DC、改变盟友态度的检定DC、或者说服他们履行要求（perform a request）的检定DC上。

资源出处: Ultimate Intrigue pg. 85

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Inspiring%20Bravery

Inspiring Mentor.name: 激励师 Inspiring Mentor
Inspiring Mentor.description:
你的表演能够让其他听众也做得更好。

先决条件: 魅力 13，提振技能（Inspire Competence）吟游表演。

专长效果: 提振技能（Inspire Competence）吟游表演（bardic performance）现在可以影响30尺内所有能够听到你的表演的盟友，只要他们尝试的技能是你选择的便可以生效。

通常状况: 提振技能（Inspire Competence）仅能影响1名盟友。

资源出处: Ultimate Intrigue pg. 85

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Inspiring%20Mentor

Inspiring Talent.name: Inspiring Talent
Inspiring Talent.description:
Your innate adaptability allows you to imitate others of your kind nearly flawlessly, to the extent that you can utilize their mastery over skills almost as if you had personally trained in their use.

Prerequisites
Half-elf, adaptability or ancestral arms racial trait.

Benefits
Whenever you are within 30 feet of an ally who also has this feat, you gain the following benefits. If the ally has a Skill Focus feat, you also count as having that feat for the purpose of the following skill uses: Acrobatics checks to move through threatened squares, Bluff checks to feint, Escape Artist checks to escape a grapple, Intimidate checks to demoralize, Knowledge checks to identify a monster, and Perception checks to notice a creature using Stealth. Furthermore, if the ally has a weapon proficiency gained through the ancestral arms racial trait, you also count as having that weapon proficiency.

Instant Alchemy.name: Instant Alchemy
Instant Alchemy.description:
You can perform simple alchemical tasks with preternatural speed.

Prerequisites
Craft (alchemy) 1 rank.

Benefits
When performing spontaneous alchemy, you can craft an alchemical item as a standard action if its total crafting time is 10 minutes or less and you have all the equipment and materials required in hand. Items that require 1 hour to create with spontaneous alchemy take you only 10 minutes, and items that require 1 day take you only 1 hour. If you have the alchemy class feature, you can identify a potion using the Craft (alchemy) skill as if using detect magic as a swift action rather than a standard action.

Instant Judgment.name: 瞬刻审判 Instant Judgment
Instant Judgment.description:
你最快速的宣言也蕴含着力量。

先决条件: 【第二审判】职业特性。

专长效果: 你可以用直觉动作来发动审判，或是改变一个激活的审判类型。

通常状况: 开启或改变审判是一个迅捷动作。

资源出处: Ultimate Combat pg. 106

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Instant%20Judgment

Instrumental.name: Instrumental
Instrumental.description:
You can deliver a breathtaking bardic performance while activating the powers of a magical instrument, or utilize your bardic prowess to enhance the instrument's power.

Prerequisites
Bardic Performance class feature, Perform (any instrument) 3 ranks.

Benefits
When activating a magical instrument as a fullround or standard action, you may begin a bardic performance as a free action. Your performance must use a Perform skill appropriate to the instrument.

Alternatively, you may expand 2 rounds of bardic performance to add +2 to any save DCs associated with the use of the instrument's powers.

If your instrument summons allies, such as pipes of the sewers or the horn of Valhalla, your bardic performances with that instrument affect those allies even if they normally would not.

Intense Blows.name: 强力冲击 Intense Blows
Intense Blows.description:
专长类型：Armor MasteryCombat

你强力的冲击和你盔甲的重量让你在战斗中更加难以阻挡。

先决条件: 力量13，猛力攻击，基本攻击加值+6或者战士4级，盔甲训练职业特性，擅长重甲。

专长效果: 当你使用猛力攻击时，在你的下一轮开始之前你在CMD上获得+1加值。当你的基本攻击加值到达4以及之后的每4点时，这个加值都会提升额外1点。

资源出处: Armor Masters Handbook pg. 17

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Intense%20Blows

战策增益：你可以消耗5点耐力来在一次战技检定上将该专长在你CMD上的加值翻倍。

战策资源出处: Armor Master's Handbook pg. 21

Intense Pain.name: 剧烈痛楚 Intense Pain
Intense Pain.description:
专长类型：CombatStare

当你使用痛苦注视时，可以造成额外的伤害。

先决条件: 催眠师7级，痛苦注视（Painful Stare）职业能力。

专长效果: 当你使用痛苦注视（Painful Stare）增加自己造成的伤害时，能够额外造成1d6点伤害。该伤害会在催眠师12级时增加至2d6点，并且在催眠师18级时增加至3d6点。当你使用痛苦注视增强一名盟友的伤害时，你每拥有4个催眠师等级，痛苦注视的目标就会额外受到1点伤害。

资源出处: Occult Adventures pg. 135

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Intense%20Pain

Intensified Spell.name: 强化法术 Intensified Spell
Intensified Spell.description:
专长类型：Metamagic

你的法术能够超越通常的制限。

专长效果: 强化法术会使决定法术的伤害骰数的最高施法者等级增加5级。为了从该专长获益，你必须拥有足够的CL来超过最大值。没有变量的法术不会被影响，不会受CL调整的、造成伤害的法术也不会被该专长影响。强化法术占用比法术的实际环级高1环的法术位。

资源出处: Advanced Players Guide pg. 163

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Intensified%20Spell

Intensified Spell-Like Ability.name: Intensified Spell-Like Ability
Intensified Spell-Like Ability.description:
Your spell-like ability deals more damage.

Prerequisites
Spell-like ability at caster level 4th or higher.

Benefits
Choose one of your spell-like abilities, subject to the restrictions described in this feat. You can use the chosen spell-like ability as an intensified spell-like ability three times per day (or less, if the ability is normally usable only once or twice per day).

When you use an intensified spell-like ability, the maximum number of the ability's damage dice increases by 5 levels. You must have sufficient caster levels to surpass the normal maximum in order to benefit from this feat. No other variables of the spell-like ability are affected, and spell-like abilities that inflict damage that is not modified by caster level are not affected by this feat.

You can only select a spell-like ability duplicating a spell with a level less than or equal to 1/2 your caster level (round down) - 1. For a summary, see Table 3-1.

Special

This feat can be taken multiple times. Each time it is taken, you can apply it to a different spell-like ability.

Spell Level Caster Level1 Caster Level2
0 2nd 4th
1st 4th 6th
2nd 6th 8th
3rd 8th 10th
4th 10th 12th
5th 12th 14th
6th 14th 16th
7th 16th 18th
8th 18th 20th
9th 20th -

1 Bouncing, disruptive, intensified, lingering, or scarring ability.
2Fearsome, sickening, or traumatic ability.

Intercept Blow.name: 拦截攻击 Intercept Blow
Intercept Blow.description:
专长类型：Combat

动物伙伴愿意以身为盾，护卫自己的主人。

先决条件: BAB+1，动物伙伴。

专长效果: 当动物伙伴邻近其主人，且其主人成为一次近战攻击的目标时，即使并非动物伙伴的回合，它仍可以用自由动作花费一次借机攻击的次数，来试图拦截该次攻击。动物伙伴用其中一种天生攻击，以最高攻击加值进行一次攻击检定，如同进行借机攻击。发动攻击的生物体型每比动物伙伴大上一阶，该次攻击就要承受-2减值。若此次攻击结果大攻击生物的攻击结果，则动物伙伴的主人只受到该次攻击的一半伤害，而另外一半则由动物伙伴承受。成功攻击会触发的效果（例如流血或绊摔特殊能力）会同时影响动物伙伴跟主人，就好像他们都被该次攻击命中一样；不过，如果被命中与否有其差异（例如在命中一次就会消散的碰触法术），那么将动物伙伴视为先被命中者。若动物伙伴知晓护卫（defend）把戏，那么动物伙伴可以将“拦截攻击”与任何以它作为先决条件的专长，用在它邻近且正在护卫（透过护卫把戏）的盟友身上。

资源出处: Ultimate Wilderness pg. 219

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Intercept%20Blow

Intercept Charge.name: 迎身上前 Intercept Charge
Intercept Charge.description:
专长类型：CombatTeamwork

你可以在敌人冲向盟友时挺身将他挡下。

专长效果: 每当有敌人向同样拥有此专长的盟友发动冲锋时，以一个直觉动作，你可以立刻以你的速度移动到对方冲锋的路径上任一格将其挡住，当你到达冲锋路径上后，该敌人必须在邻接你格子停下并且对你发动攻击。以此专长进行的移动计入你下一轮的移动之中。

资源出处: Advanced Class Guide pg. 151

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Intercept%20Charge

战策增益：当你使用这个专长时，你可以消耗5点耐力不让你的移动计入你下一回合的移动中。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 124

Interweave Composite Blast.name: 合力念袭 Interweave Composite Blast
Interweave Composite Blast.description:
专长类型：CombatTeamwork

你能与另一名操念使合力释放念袭。

先决条件: 念袭（Kinetic Blast）职业能力。

专长效果: 当有一名同样具有该专长的其他角色位于距离你15尺的范围内时，可以进行一次准备动作来启动一次简易念袭（Simple Blast），自行选择念袭的类型。当该角色也施放出一次简易念袭时，你的也会被触发，并由此创造出一次复合念袭（Composite Blast），此次复合念袭的产生条件要与这两个简易念袭相符。复合念袭的施法者等级为两名参与者的施法者等级的平均值，其造成的伤害要符合该等级的操念使创造的复合念袭（举例说明：使用火元素的10级操念使和使用水元素的6级操念使合作创造出一次蒸灼念袭，它的基础伤害为4d6+4点火焰伤害和4d6+4点钝击伤害）。

其中一名参与者能够提供一个对于复合念袭来说可用的塑形注能（form infusion），而另一名则提供可用的性质注能（substance infusion）。每名参与者都要承受自身提供的注能的超载（burn）。没有执行特殊准备动作的参与者能够将超念（Metakinesis）应用至念袭上，而她也是唯一可以使用念力凝聚（Gather Power）降低念袭消耗的一方（因为只有她可以在使用念袭前使用移动动作）。无论如何，她所使用的任何超念（Metakinesis）都会应用至整个复合念袭上。

如果两位参与者没有彼此相邻，那么锥形、线形意思其他通常以角色所在方格为源发点的效果均会变更源发点，新源发点位于两位参与者之间直线距离的中心点（在此位置，两个简易念袭会融合在一起，成为复合念袭）。

念袭使用性质注能（substance infusion）提供者的体质调整值以及塑形注能（form infusion）提供者的敏捷调整值。如果念袭仅应用了一个注能，那么念袭则会使用提供注能的操念使的体质或敏捷调整值，以被提供的注能为准。如果没有使用任何注能的话，那么两名操念使自行选择其中一人提供敏捷调整值，另一人提供体质调整值。

资源出处: Occult Adventures pg. 135

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Interweave%20Composite%20Blast

Intimidate Animals.name: Intimidate Animals
Intimidate Animals.description:
You are skilled at intimidating animals with your bluster and fury.

Prerequisites
Greater Wild Empathy, Intimidate 5 ranks, Knowledge (nature) 5 ranks, wild empathy class feature.

Benefits
You add your Wisdom modifier on Intimidate checks against animals in addition to your Charisma modifier. An animal with 4 or fewer Hit Dice is frightened instead of shaken on a successful Intimidate check to demoralize it.

Intimidating Bane.name: 威吓破敌 Intimidating Bane
Intimidating Bane.description:
你用破敌武器做出的攻击让敌人闻风丧胆。

先决条件: 【破敌】职业特性，炫目技巧，武器专攻，角色等级8。

专长效果: 当你在【破敌】能力激活时使用“炫目技巧”，你对对应破敌类型的生物的威吓检定获得+2加值。只要你的【破敌】能力持续且生物类型匹配，被影响的生物将会一直处于颤栗状态。

资源出处: Ultimate Combat pg. 106

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Intimidating%20Bane

Intimidating Confidence.name: 无惧者皆自信 Intimidating Confidence
Intimidating Confidence.description:
你对成功有无限的信心。

先决条件: 魅力13，求知者皆无惧，威吓5级，人类。

专长效果: 你对抗带有〔情绪〕描述符的能力的豁免检定上+1。这个加值与“求知者皆无惧”的奖励叠加。当你确认重击时，可以用一个自由动作对你威胁的目标进行一次威吓检定以挫败士气。如果你有“炫目技巧”专长，你可以做威吓检定挫败所有生物的士气。此次检定你获得+2加值，如果你的武器的重击倍率为×3则为+3，重击倍率×4则为+4。

【专长速查】炫目技巧（Dazzling Display）：威吓30尺内所有敌人。

资源出处: Advanced Race Guide pg. 78

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Intimidating%20Confidence

Intimidating Gaze.name: 骇人目光 Intimidating Gaze
Intimidating Gaze.description:
你眼中的某些东西让人肝胆欲裂。

先决条件: 魅力13，【严苛凝视】职业特性，威吓5级。

专长效果: 每日1次，在你做威吓检定时，可以用一个自由动作双骰取高。

资源出处: Ultimate Magic pg. 153

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Intimidating%20Gaze

Intimidating Glance.name: 威慑眼神 Intimidating Glance
Intimidating Glance.description:
专长类型：Combat

只需一瞥，你就能在敌人心中植入恐惧。

先决条件: 催眠注视（Hypnotic Stare）职业能力。

专长效果: 你能够以迅捷动作对你的催眠注视（Hypnotic Stare）目标尝试挫败士气（demoralize）。

正常：对一名敌人进行挫败士气的尝试要使用标准动作。

资源出处: Occult Adventures pg. 135

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Intimidating%20Glance

Intimidating Performance.name: 威慑表演 Intimidating Performance
Intimidating Performance.description:
你的表演奖恐惧打入敌人心中。

先决条件: 可以以自由或迅捷动作取代吟游诗人表演或战怒之歌，吟游诗人表演或战怒之歌职业能力。

专长效果: 每当你以移动或者迅捷动作启动吟游诗人表演或战怒之歌，你都可以以一个标准动作尝试挫败一个对手的士气，在这次检定上，你可以以表演技能检定的结果作为威吓检定结果，并且此表演必须具有视觉成分。

如果你可以以一个迅捷动作启动表演并且拥有炫目技巧专长，你可以发动炫目技巧，并且使用你的表演技能检定取代威吓技能检定。

资源出处: Advanced Class Guide pg. 151

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Intimidating%20Performance

Intimidating Prowess (Mythic).name: 威逼(神话) Intimidating Prowess (Mythic)
Intimidating Prowess (Mythic).description:
先决条件：威逼

你那神话般的身形让人感到不安。

神话专长效果：在对抗非神话生物时，你的威吓检定获得加值，数值等同于你的神话阶层，这个加值在对抗神话生物时减半。若你同时具有谈判专家（神话）专长，你能够花费1次神话之力来让你的威吓检定如同掷出自然20一般。你必须在进行检定之前决定是否使用该能力。

资源出处: Mythic Adventures pg. 68

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Intimidating%20Prowess

Intoxicating Flattery.name: 戴高帽 Intoxicating Flattery
Intoxicating Flattery.description:
你懂得如何用谎言削弱目标的判断力。

先决条件: 诈欺师，唬骗5级。

专长效果: 你能够在1次长期互动（花费至少1分钟）中奉承1名生物，让他变得自我膨胀，从而影响其判断力。在这段奉承的最后，尝试1次唬骗检定，对抗DC为10 + 该生物的HD + 该生物的感知调整值或者10 + 该生物的察言观色调整值，以较高者为准。若你的检定成功，目标则会在意志豁免检定、基于感知的技能检定和感知属性检定上承受-2减值，持续1小时，你的检定结果每比DC高5点，就会再额外持续1小时。目标可以通过花费10分钟调整心态来提前移除该效果。如果你的检定失败，任何目击到你的失败的生物均会免疫你使用该专长作出的奉承，持续24小时。若你失败了5点或更多的话，目标对你的态度会降低1级。

资源出处: Ultimate Intrigue pg. 85

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Intoxicating%20Flattery

Intrepid Rescuer.name: 无畏救援 Intrepid Rescuer
Intrepid Rescuer.description:
专长类型：Combat

先决条件：战斗反射，信仰库尔吉斯（Kurgess）

先决条件: 战斗反射，信仰库尔吉斯（Kurgess）。

专长效果: 每当一个你威胁的敌人承受攻击一个陷入无助，俯卧或震慑状态的盟友，或是尝试攻击非战斗人员时，这将会导致你对他进行借机攻击。如果你的借机攻击命中目标，那么他在导致这一借机攻击的攻击检定上承受-4减值。

资源出处: Inner Sea Gods pg. 213

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Intrepid%20Rescuer

战策增益：当一个敌人因为无畏救援引发了来自你的借机攻击时，如果你的借机攻击命中了，你可以消耗5点耐力来让对手的攻击对你的盟友自动失手。

战策资源出处: Weapon Master's Handbook pg. 25

Introspecitve Performance.name: Introspecitve Performance
Introspecitve Performance.description:
With no other allies to enjoy your performance, you improvise to make it more inspiring for yourself.

Prerequisites
Perform (any) 3 ranks, bardic performance or raging song class feature.

Benefits
Whenever you are the only creature affected by a bardic performance or raging song that normally affects all allies within a range, any bonuses granted by your bardic performance or raging song are calculated as though your class level were 4 higher. This feat does not allow you to activate a bardic performance or raging song if your actual class level is not high enough to use that performance.

Intrusive Presence.name: 窃心者 Intrusive Presence
Intrusive Presence.description:
你能够窃取宿主的思维和记忆。

先决条件: 智力或魅力21，隐藏者（Hidden Presence），操控者（Manipulative Presence），施放占据术（Possession）或高等占据术（Possession，Greater）的能力。

专长效果: 你能够以类法术能力随意使用侦测思想（Detect Thoughts）对抗你所占据的宿主生物。宿主无法进行豁免，而且法术效果就如同你已经维持了3轮的专注一般。在占据宿主期间，你还可以以类法术能力对它使用一次探寻思想（Seek Thoughts；APG）。宿主能够尝试一次意志豁免，豁免DC为原占据效果的DC。若宿主豁免成功，该效果便会失败，而且如果宿主原先没有注意到自身被占据的话，此时也会意识到这一点。

资源出处: Occult Adventures pg. 135

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Intrusive%20Presence

Intuitive Spell.name: 本能法术 Intuitive Spell
Intuitive Spell.description:
专长类型：Metamagic

你可以相信自身的直觉与本能，在避免思维成分的情况下施法。

专长效果: 本能法术可以在没有思维成分（Thought Components）的情况下进行施放。不需要思维成分的法术不受该专长影响。本能法术使用比法术的实际环级高1级的法术位。

资源出处: Occult Adventures pg. 136

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Intuitive%20Spell

Inured to Draconic Majesty.name: 惯承龙威 Inured to Draconic Majesty
Inured to Draconic Majesty.description:
你花了很长时间来习惯龙族以咆哮表达亲近。

先决条件: 宿敌（龙类）或知识（神秘）1级。

专长效果: 在对抗特异能力或超自然能力造成的恐惧效果(如龙类等可怕的存在)的豁免上，你获得+4加值。如果一个对抗抗特异能力或超自然能力造成的恐惧效的豁免检定失败并让你惊惧，你只会颤栗而非惊惧，如果豁免失败会让你恐慌，你只会惊惧而非恐慌。

资源出处: Heroes of the High Court pg. 19

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Inured%20to%20Draconic%20Majesty

Invested Magic.name: Invested Magic
Invested Magic.description:
Spells cast using this feat pay the wages of Mammon and forgo their more mundane costs.

Benefits
You may satisfy the material requirement of any spell you cast with valuable coins, gems, or jewelry rather than the normal component. For spells with material components with no listed value, valuables worth 5 times the spell's level in gp may be expended instead of the usual components (5 gp for a 1st-level spell, 20 gp for a 4th-level spell, etc). In the case of spells with components that have a listed cost, you may expend valuables worth a number of gp equal to one and a half times this cost (thus, a spell like commune with material components costing 500 gp could be cast using valuables worth 750 gp). Only coins, gems, jewelry, and other similar objects of obvious worth can be used to replace other material components using this feat. The value of these objects need not match the required cost exactly, but they cannot be less than the required costs. Should valuables of greater value than required be expended (likely when employing objects like gems or jewelry), the extraneous gp value is lost, consumed with the rest of the object. The only exception comes in the case of spells with material components that have a listed worth. When casting such spells you may expend double the components' gp worth in valuables to cast the spell as if your caster level were 1 level higher. This e!ect only applies to spells with components with a specific gp value. Any expenditure beyond double the gp value grants no additional benefit.

Invoke Primal Instinct.name: Invoke Primal Instinct
Invoke Primal Instinct.description:
You can use your ability to take the shape of an animal to enhance your Bluff skill, giving yourself an aura of danger or meekness that influences nearby creatures into doing what you want.

Prerequisites
Bluff 1 rank, wild shape class feature, gnome.

Benefits
As a standard action, you can pantomime or describe predator- or prey-like behavior, expend one of your uses of wild shape, and make a Bluff check. All creatures within 30 feet that fail a Will save against your Bluff check DC regard you as a figure of either fear or contempt (your choice applies to all affected creatures). If you choose fear, the targets are frightened for 1 round per druid level. If you choose contempt, the targets consider you harmless for 1 minute, ignoring you unless you attack them or take a threatening action.

Iomedaean Sword Oath.name: Iomedaean Sword Oath
Iomedaean Sword Oath.description:
By swearing to never use a weapon other than a longsword, you can achieve things normally limited to the most highly trained swordsmen.

Prerequisites
Proficient in longsword, Weapon Focus (longsword), base attack bonus +4, worshiper of Iomedae.

Benefits
You may select longsword-related feats as if you were a 4th-level fighter. For example, you may select Weapon Specialization (longsword) as a feat.

Special
If you ever use a melee or ranged weapon other than a longsword in combat, you lose the benefits of this feat until you receive an atonement spell. You may still use spells that act as weapons (such as flame blade and spiritual weapon) without affecting your oath.

Ioun Resonance.name: Ioun Resonance
Ioun Resonance.description:
You can create a magic link between your ioun heart and an ioun stone in your possession.

Prerequisites
Wyrwood.

Benefits
As a standard action, you can create a link between your ioun core and an active ioun stone you hold or carry. For as long as you gain the benefits of the linked stone, any numerical bonuses and penalties granted by the stone are increased by 1. You can maintain a link with only one ioun stone at a time. Creating a link to a new stone ends any previous links.

Iron Will (Mythic).name: 钢铁意志(神话) Iron Will (Mythic)
Iron Will (Mythic).description:
先决条件：钢铁意志

你的意志绝不会动摇。

神话专长效果：每当你在对抗由非神话来源产生的法术、类法术能力或者超自然能力的意志豁免时，做两次检定并取较高结果。

资源出处: Mythic Adventures pg. 68

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Iron%20Will

Ironbound Master.name: 铁甲神官 Ironbound Master
Ironbound Master.description:
先决条件：7级牧师，信仰古拉姆

先决条件: 7级牧师，信仰古拉姆。

专长效果: 你获得战士的护甲训练职业能力，以你的牧师等级-4计算有效战士等级。

资源出处: Inner Sea Gods pg. 213

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Ironbound%20Master

Ironclad Logic.name: 不破的逻辑 Ironclad Logic
Ironclad Logic.description:
在影响他人时，你所使用的是正确的推理和事实真相，而非共情共感。

先决条件: 智力 19，交涉3级。

专长效果: 每当你把魅力调整值应用至交涉检定时，该检定便会获得+4加值。若你在交涉技能上投入了至少10点技能点，而且智力属性达到了27或更高，该加值提升至+8点。该加值不会与技能专攻：交涉（Skill Focus：Diplomacy）带来的加值叠加，但是在判断专长以及其他以技能专攻：交涉为基础的先决条件时，本专长可以被视同为技能专攻：交涉。在舌战（verbal duels；见本书176-181页）中，若你使用的辩才（tactic）关联技能本身基于智力（Intelligence-based skill）的话，在计算该关联技能加值时，你可以使用你的智力调整值而非魅力调整值。

资源出处: Ultimate Intrigue pg. 85

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Ironclad%20Logic

Ironclad Reactions.name: 装甲反应 Ironclad Reactions
Ironclad Reactions.description:
专长类型：Armor MasteryCombat

你可以快速地对攻击做出反应。

先决条件: 基本攻击加值+6或者战士4级，盔甲训练职业特性，擅长中甲。

专长效果: 每轮一次，当一个敌人成功使用借机攻击击中你时，你可以消耗一次借机攻击次数来做出5尺快步。在你已经做出5尺快步后你也可以做出这个动作。

资源出处: Armor Masters Handbook pg. 17

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Ironclad%20Reactions

战策增益：你可以消耗3点耐力来使用这个专长，即使这次借机攻击并未命中你。

战策资源出处: Armor Master's Handbook pg. 21

Ironguts.name: 铁胃 Ironguts
Ironguts.description:
你的胃强健如钢铁。

先决条件: 体质13，矮人，半兽人或兽人。

专长效果: 在对抗任何会引起反胃或恶心状态的效果，以及对抗所有摄入类毒素（不包括其他毒素）时，豁免检定获得+2种族加值。此外，在使用生存检定为自身寻找食物时，你获得+2加值。

资源出处: Advanced Players Guide pg. 164

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Ironguts

Ironhide.name: 铁皮 Ironhide
Ironhide.description:
你的皮肤比大部分同类都更加坚韧厚实。

先决条件: 体质13，矮人，半兽人或兽人。

专长效果: 由于你那异常粗糙的皮肤，你获得+1天生防御加值。

资源出处: Advanced Players Guide pg. 164

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Ironhide

Irrisen Icemage.name: Irrisen Icemage
Irrisen Icemage.description:
You were born with the power to drive ice and snow as others drive their slaves.

Prerequisites
Sorcerer, Irrisen affinity, may only be taken at first level.

Benefits
All of your spells with the cold descriptor are cast at +1 caster level. Any spell with a different energy descriptor is cast at -1 caster level. Three times per day you may alter a spell you cast to deal cold damage instead of its normal damage; your +1 caster level for this feat applies to this variant casting.

Jabbing Dancer.name: 百裂步 Jabbing Dancer
Jabbing Dancer.description:
专长类型：Combat

你可以在发动连续拳击的间隙摆出各种姿势，从不同角度殴打对手。

先决条件: 闪避，精通徒手击打，百裂拳，灵活移动，基础攻击加值+9或拳师等级5或武僧等级5。

专长效果: 在使用百裂拳流派时，你的徒手攻击每命中目标一次，你就可以移动5尺一次且不引发借机攻击，但你的移动落点必须邻接你徒手击打命中的目标。但是，你的下一轮无法进行五尺快步。

资源出处: Advanced Class Guide pg. 151

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Jabbing%20Dancer

战策增益：在你使用百裂拳ACG移动五尺而不受借机攻击时，如果你的耐力池中还有1点耐力，你仍可以在你的下一轮使用5尺快步。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 124

Jabbing Master.name: 千手百裂 Jabbing Master
Jabbing Master.description:
专长类型：Combat

没有人能在你暴风骤雨般的欧拉欧拉下全身而退。

先决条件: 闪避，精通徒手击打，百裂步，百裂拳，灵活移动，猛力攻击，基础攻击加值+12或拳师等级8或武僧等级8。

专长效果: 在使用百裂拳流派时，你同一轮两次徒手击打命中造成的额外伤害提升到2d6。三次或以上徒手击打命中造成的额外伤害提升到4d6。

资源出处: Advanced Class Guide pg. 151

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Jabbing%20Master

战策增益：当你在使用百裂拳架势时使用徒手击打造成了重击威胁，你可以消耗5点耐力来让对那个目标的千手百裂额外伤害翻倍。一轮中你只能对一个目标使用一次这个能力。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 124

Jabbing Style.name: 百裂拳 Jabbing Style
Jabbing Style.description:
专长类型：CombatStyle

你加快自己出击的速度，以雨点般的拳脚对敌人造成伤害

先决条件: 精通徒手击打；基础攻击加值+6或拳师连打职业能力或疾风连击职业能力。

专长效果: 当你徒手攻击命中一名单位时，若本轮你之前也用徒手攻击命中过该单位，则你本次徒手攻击额外造成1d6点伤害。

资源出处: Advanced Class Guide pg. 152

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Jabbing%20Style

战策增益：当你因为使用徒手击打命中单个目标两次或更多而获得额外伤害时，你可以消耗2点耐力来提升额外徒手击打伤害1d6点。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 124

Jackal Heritage.name: Jackal Heritage
Jackal Heritage.description:
A jackalwere crouches somewhere in your family tree.

Prerequisites
Humanoid, must be taken at 1st level.

Benefits
You gain a +2 racial bonus on saving throws against mind-affecting effects, and a +2 racial bonus on Perception checks.

Jaguar Pounce.name: 猎豹突袭 Jaguar Pounce
Jaguar Pounce.description:
专长类型：Combat

先决条件：基本攻击加值+4

先决条件: 基本攻击加值+4。

专长效果: 当你冲锋或以跳跃攻击袭击措手不及或是无助的目标时，你的第一次攻击视同拥有精通重击专长的效果。

资源出处: Ultimate Wilderness pg. 115Sargava, the Lost Colony pg. 24

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Jaguar%20Pounce

Janni Rush.name: 罡风惊天 Janni Rush
Janni Rush.description:
专长类型：Combat

当跃起攻击时，你的打击沉重犹如万钧。

先决条件: 精通徒手打击，御风，乱披风，特技8级，表演（舞蹈）8级。

专长效果: 你使用风灵流派架势时获得以下好处：你跳跃总是视为已助跑。如果你使用跳跃作为你冲锋动作的一部分，并用徒手攻击命中对手，丢两次徒手伤害骰合计，但力量，武器属性（例如＜炽焰＞附魔）及基于精准攻击（例如偷袭）带来的伤害增加值不翻倍。本专长带来的额外伤害在重击时不翻倍（尽管其他伤害增加值正常翻倍计算）。

资源出处: Ultimate Combat pg. 106

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Janni%20Rush

战策增益：你可以消耗5点耐力来让来自这个专长的额外伤害骰在重击中翻倍。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 124

Janni Style.name: 御风 Janni Style
Janni Style.description:
专长类型：CombatStyle

你旋风般的格斗技巧令自己难以被击中。

先决条件: 精通徒手打击，特技3级，表演（舞蹈）3级。

专长效果: 你处于风灵流派架势中时，冲锋带来的AC罚值降为-1；夹击你的对手获得的攻击加值降为+1。

资源出处: Ultimate Combat pg. 106

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Janni%20Style

战策增益：当你位于这个架势下对敌人冲锋时，你可以消耗2点耐力让冲锋不获得AC减值，并移动额外10尺作为该次冲锋的一部分。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 124

Janni Tempest.name: 乱披风 Janni Tempest
Janni Tempest.description:
专长类型：Combat

你的烈风攻势可轻易令对手失去平衡。

先决条件: 精通徒手打击，御风，特技5级，表演（舞蹈）5级。

专长效果: 你处于风灵流派架势时，只要你徒手击打命中对手，你对此对手的冲撞和摔绊的战技检定有+4加值，但战技必须在你该轮结束前发动。你的这次战技不会引发借机攻击。

资源出处: Ultimate Combat pg. 106

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Janni%20Tempest

战策增益：当你在处于御风UC架势下使用徒手击打命中了一个敌人时，你可以消耗2点耐力来提升这个专长的加值2点。你可以消耗2点耐力来将这个专长的加值应用在拖拽APG或者移位APG战技检定而不是冲撞或者绊摔。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 124

Jawbreaker.name: 碎颚者 Jawbreaker
Jawbreaker.description:
专长类型：Combat

你强大的攻击打爆了对手的牙齿和嘴上的骨头。

先决条件: 精通徒手打击，震慑拳，医疗6级。

专长效果: 当你对一个被擒抱、无助或震慑中的敌人成功的施展了一次震慑拳，你可以选择不造成震慑拳的正常效果，而是打爆对手的嘴巴。这会造成普通徒手打击伤害以及1d4的流血伤害。在流血结束前，目标不能使用嘴进行攻击、清晰讲话或施放有语言成分的法术。免疫致命一击或没有明显的嘴的生物不会受到该专长的影响。

资源出处: Ultimate Combat pg. 106

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Jawbreaker

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 125

Jinx Alchemy.name: Jinx Alchemy
Jinx Alchemy.description:
With your knowledge of alchemy, creatures you jinx cannot benefit from most sorts of alchemical compounds.

Prerequisites
Swift alchemy class feature, Halfling Jinx trait.

Benefits
A jinxed creature cannot benefit from the effects of potions, elixirs, or any other substance that he must ingest in order to activate. This includes alchemical substances such as antitoxin, but not extracts, mutagens, or other alchemist class abilities that only affect the alchemist. A jinxed creature still takes any penalties and detrimental effects from ingested compounds or poisons.

Jinxed Spell.name: Jinxed Spell
Jinxed Spell.description:
You can make a creature that fails its spell save suffer your jinx as well.

Prerequisites
Any two metamagic feats, Halfling Jinx trait.

Benefits
Any creature that fails its saving throw against a jinxed spell also suffers the effects of your jinx. This feat has no effect on spells that do not allow a saving throw. If the spell affects an area or multiple creatures, you must select one creature to take the jinx, unless you have the Area Jinx feat; if you have the Area Jinx feat, choose a jinx burst area within the spell's area or among its targets and apply the jinx to those in the burst that failed their save. A jinxed spell uses up a spell slot one level higher than the spell's actual level.

Joined Wings.name: Joined Wings
Joined Wings.description:
You have developed a deep rapport with your comrades that allows you to swiftly convey divine grace.

Prerequisites
Fervor or lay on hands class feature.

Benefits
You can use your lay on hands or the healing granted by fervor on allies with this feat as a swift action.

Joyless Toil.name: Joyless Toil
Joyless Toil.description:
Your strikes render your enemy distracted and unable to focus on productive action.

Prerequisites
Dex 13, Wis 13, Improved Unarmed Strike, base attack bonus +8.

Benefits
Joyless Toil forces a foe damaged by your unarmed attack to attempt a Fortitude saving throw (DC = 10 + half your character level + your Wisdom modifier) in addition to taking damage normally. You must declare that you are using this feat before you make your attack roll--thus, a failed attack roll wastes the attempt. An opponent who fails this saving throw is nauseated for 1 round or until the opponent is attacked. You can attempt to use Joyless Toil once per day for every 4 character levels you have, but you can use it no more than once per round. Constructs, incorporeal creatures, mindless creatures, plants, undead, and creatures that are immune to critical hits cannot be affected by this ability.

Judgment Surge.name: 狂热审判 Judgment Surge
Judgment Surge.description:
每日一次，你的信仰之力澎湃而出，从而增强了你的审判。

先决条件: 【审判】职业特性。

专长效果: 每日1次，你使用【审判】职业特性时将你的职业等级视为比通常情况下高3级。如果你同时激活了复数个审判，那么它们都能获得这个增益。

资源出处: Ultimate Magic pg. 153

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Judgment%20Surge

Juggle Load.name: 超*快速装弹 Juggle Load
Juggle Load.description:
专长类型：Combat

你的手指异常灵活，填装投石索对你来说豪不费力。

先决条件: 巧手1级，擅长投石索，快速装弹。

专长效果: 你可以以自由动作为投石索或双头投石索装弹。这不会引发借机攻击。本专长允许你在全力攻击时，使用投石索进行多次攻击。

资源出处: Halflings of Golarion pg. 23

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Juggle%20Load

Juju Way.name: Juju Way
Juju Way.description:
You can use spirits of the unseen world to carry your spells for you.

Prerequisites
Knowledge (religion) 3 ranks, human (Mwangi).

Benefits
You can cast spells with the range of 'touch' at a range of 20 feet if the recipient is a willing Mwangi ally who also has this feat.

Juke.name: 杂技换位 Juke
Juke.description:
专长类型：Combat

你在避免重复后，可以让敌人更容易受到你或盟友的攻击。

先决条件: 敏捷13，闪避，灵活移动，滑步。

专长效果: 当敌人冲锋你时，你的AC获得+4闪避加值。若该次冲锋没有击中你并且目标停止冲锋移动时邻接与你，你可以一个直觉动作与目标交换位置，并且直到你的下一回合结束，目标都视为被你夹击。你无法在使用准备动作准备反冲锋武器对抗冲锋时使用该专长。

资源出处: Melee Tactics Toolbox pg. 15

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Juke

Jumper.name: Jumper
Jumper.description:
You are a natural leaper.

Prerequisites
Acrobatics 1 rank, creature type other than humanoid or outsider.

Benefits
You always count as having a running start when making jump checks using Acrobatics. Acrobatics becomes a class skill for you.

Jungle Survivalist.name: Jungle Survivalist
Jungle Survivalist.description:
Normally pestilential rain forests are a safe haven and home to you.

Prerequisites
Favored terrain ( jungle) class feature.

Benefits
You gain a +2 bonus on saving throws against diseases, poisons, and the distraction ability of creatures with the swarm subtype. You also gain a +2 bonus on Acrobatics and Climb checks when climbing trees and a +2 bonus on Perception checks against creatures that gain a racial bonus on Stealth checks in vegetation.

Just Out of Reach.name: 不在范围内 Just Out of Reach
Just Out of Reach.description:
专长类型：Combat

攻击者离你越远，你越容易闪躲近战攻击。

先决条件: 敏捷13，闪避，灵活移动。

专长效果: 当距离你5尺之外的目标因长触及近战攻击你时，你对抗该种攻击的AC获得+4闪避加值。

资源出处: Melee Tactics Toolbox pg. 9

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Just%20Out%20of%20Reach

战策增益：你可以消耗5点耐力来在任意一次近战攻击上获得该专长的好处。

战策资源出处: Armor Master's Handbook pg. 21

Keen Scent.name: 灵敏嗅觉 Keen Scent
Keen Scent.description:
你的鼻子就好像野兽一样灵敏。

先决条件: 感知13，半兽人或兽人。

专长效果: 你获得＜灵敏嗅觉＞特殊能力。

【特性速查】灵敏嗅觉（Scent, Ex）：这种特殊能力可以让生物察觉接近的敌人、嗅出隐藏的对手、或者凭借嗅觉展开追踪。具有灵敏嗅觉能力的生物能够辨识熟悉的气味，就像人类能认出熟悉的画面。凭借嗅觉，生物可以发现30尺以内的敌人。如果对手在上风处，则距离增为60尺；若在下风处，则减为15尺。如果是强烈的气味，比如浓烟或者腐烂的垃圾味道，可在上述距离两倍之内闻到。某些无法抵挡的气味，比如臭鼬或穴居人的恶臭，则可在通常距离的三倍之内闻到。具有灵敏嗅觉的生物无法确定气味来源的具体位置，只知道它存在于嗅觉范围内的某处。生物可以用一个移动动作来觉察到气味来源的方向。只要生物进入气味源的5尺之内，它就能精确确定源头的位置。一个具有追踪专长的灵敏嗅觉生物可以通过气味来追踪，这时它用感知（或生存）检定来找到或追踪气味。新鲜痕迹的通常DC是10（无论气味停留在什么表面）。该DC会因气味来源的强弱、生物的数量和痕迹新旧的差别在此基础上增加或减少。痕迹每经过1小时DC会增加2。除此之外，此能力的判定上都按照追踪专长的规则。地面状况和低能见度不会影响通过嗅觉来展开追踪的生物。

资源出处: Advanced Players Guide pg. 164

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Keen%20Scent

Ki Channel.name: 元气引导 Ki Channel
Ki Channel.description:
先决条件：引导能量职业能力，信仰义洛理

先决条件: 引导能量职业能力，信仰义洛理。

专长效果: 当你引导正能量治疗活物时，任何此引导能量治疗的生物可以选择恢复气池作为替代。生物可以恢复的气池点数等同于你的引导能量骰数。一个可以此法恢复气池点数的生物必须选择恢复气池点数或接受治疗中的一个效果（它不能两者都选）。

资源出处: Inner Sea Gods pg. 213

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Ki%20Channel

Ki Diversity.name: Ki Diversity
Ki Diversity.description:
You have trained at the feet of the masters of the Kusari-Gama, a secret society of monk warriors. With their secrets you have mastered new ways to apply your ki.

Prerequisites
Ki pool class feature, Wis 13, Kusari-Gama 25 TPA.

Benefits
You learn how to channel your ki in a new ability. Choose one of the following ki powers:

Bone Crusher
When you succeed at a trip or disarm combat maneuver, you may spend 1 point from your ki pool as a swift action to deal damage to your opponent as if you had hit them with an unarmed strike.

Dim Mak
You may spend 1 point from your ki pool as a swift action to execute your next Stunning Fist attack as a melee touch attack rather than a normal melee attack.

Mind of the Kensai
You may spend 1 point from your ki pool as a swift action to imbue a single melee weapon in your hands with the ki focus weapon special ability until your next turn.

Wings of the Crane
If you have the Deflect Arrows feat, you may spend 1 point from your ki pool as an immediate action to use that feat to def lect a second missile weapon that round. If you have the Snatch Arrows feat, you may use this ability to catch a second weapon, but not throw it back.

Zen Combatant
You may spend 1 point from your ki pool as a swift action to substitute your Wisdom score for your Strength or Dexterity for all melee or ranged attacks you make that round.

Ki Stand.name: 受身 Ki Stand
Ki Stand.description:
在对手将你击倒时，你能迅速起身。

先决条件: 【气运丹田】能力。

专长效果: 只要你在气池中存在至少1点气，你可以用一个引发借机的迅捷动作站起来。你可以花费1点气让你在使用迅捷动作起身的时候不引发借机攻击。

资源出处: Ultimate Magic pg. 153

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Ki%20Stand

Kick Up.name: 挂金勾 Kick Up
Kick Up.description:
专长类型：Combat

只用脚尖一挑，掉在地上的武器就飞回到你的手里。

先决条件: 敏捷12，特技专家（Acrobatic），特技动作技能1级，杀手或游荡剑客职业等级1。

专长效果: 只要你有一只手空着，你就可以以一个迅捷动作将一件在你或者邻接你且不在敌人威胁范围中的无人看管的，重量轻于10磅的物品或武器收回手中。除此之外，如果你在踢起一件武器的同一轮中进行一次虚招尝试，那么你可以在这次虚招检定上获得+2环境加值。

资源出处: Advanced Class Guide pg. 152

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Kick%20Up

战策增益：你可以消耗2点耐力来踢起一件位于你邻接的被敌人占据方格的物品。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 125

Killing Flourish.name: 处刑秀 Killing Flourish
Killing Flourish.description:
专长类型：Combat

当你刺杀一个目标，周围所有的人都在恐惧中战栗。

先决条件: 威逼，威吓技能4级，杀手职业等级4。

专长效果: 当你通过近战攻击将一个生物的生命值降到0以下时，你可以以迅捷动作进行威吓检定以挫败30尺范围内所有敌人的士气。

资源出处: Advanced Class Guide pg. 152

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Killing%20Flourish

战策增益：当你确认一次重击，你可以消耗5点耐力并使用一个迅捷动作来尝试一次威吓检定来挫败30尺内可以看见你这次攻击的敌人。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 125

Kinetic Counter.name: 咒返念袭 Kinetic Counter
Kinetic Counter.description:
你能够使用念袭来反制与对立元素相关的能力。

先决条件: 简易念袭（Simple Blast）中的霜打（Cold Blast）、火冲（Fire Blast）或水突（Water Blast）；念袭（Kinetic Blast）职业能力。

专长效果: 你能够进行一次准备动作，使用你的念袭反制一个敌人的元素能力（elemental abilities）。若你准备的是火冲（Fire Blast），那么你可以反制任何具有水（water）或冰（ice）描述符的法术、被激活的特异能力（activated extraordinary）、超自然能力、或类法术能力，如果你准备的是霜打（Cold Blast）或水突（Water Blast），则能够反制任何具有火（fire）描述符的上述效果。要成功反制效果，你必须成功进行一次施法者等级检定，DC为11 + 敌人的施法者等级（对于法术和类法术能力来说）或者11 + 敌人的生命骰（对于特异和超自然能力来说）。对抗法术和类法术能力时，成功会被视同为使用解除魔法（dispel magic）来反制（counterspelled）了效果。在对抗被激活的超自然和特异能力时，成功的咒返念袭会使能力的效果彻底无效，但仍旧会消耗该能力。举例说明：若一名操念使使用火冲（Fire Blast）成功通过施法者等级检定对抗白龙（white dragon）的喷吐武器，那么她能够让喷吐武器的效果失效，整个区域都不受影响，而白龙仍旧要等待1d4轮才能再次使用喷吐武器。

资源出处: Occult Adventures pg. 136

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Kinetic%20Counter

Kinetic Crafting.name: Kinetic Crafting
Kinetic Crafting.description:
You can use your wild talents to help you craft magic items.

Prerequisites
Kineticist level 3rd.

Benefits
When crafting a magic item or taking item creation feats, you can treat your kineticist level as your caster level. In addition, you can treat any wild talent you have as a spell of the same level or lower for the purpose of fulfilling the requirements for magic item creation (except spell-completion and spell-trigger items). This wild talent must be associated with the same element or deal the same type of energy damage as the emulated spell's descriptor.

Kinetic Invocation.name: Kinetic Invocation
Kinetic Invocation.description:
You have learned to channel your element's energy into the magic used by traditional spellcasters.

Prerequisites
Kineticist level 1st, elemental focus class feature.

Benefits
For each kineticist element to which you have access, you treat all spells associated with that element (see below) as utility wild talents of the listed level, which you can select as normal. Each has a burn cost of 1 unless otherwise noted, and any nonpermanent, non-instantaneous effects end when your burn is removed. Using this wild talent is considered psychic spellcasting (except for the purpose of prerequisites), and you must provide emotion and thought components, as well as material components where appropriate. In addition, some spells are restricted to certain races (as detailed on page 9 of Pathfinder RPG Advanced Race Guide). Your caster level for a spell is equal to your kineticist level, and the save DC for any spell is equal to 10 + the listed level of the spell + your Constitution modifier. At the GM's discretion, other appropriate spells can be added to each element's list.


Pathfinder Society
The Kinetic Invocation feat is legal but does not grant access to silent image

Aether
Etheric shards (5th), instant armor (2nd), kinetic reverberation (2nd), protective spirit (3rd), telekinetic charge (4th; 2 burn).

Air
Air step (2nd), body capacitance (1st), cloak of winds (3rd), cloud shape (4th; self only), gaseous form (3rd), wind walk (6th).

Earth
Expeditious excavation (2nd; 0 burn), groundswell (2nd), imprisonment (9th), rampart (7th), slowing mud (4th), statue (7th; 0 burn; self only), stone shield (1st).

Fire
Blessing of the salamander (5th; self only), boiling blood (2nd), death candle (2nd), fury of the sun (2nd; 0 burn), hypnotic pattern (2nd), hypnotism (2nd; 0 burn), invigorate (1st).

Void
Animate dead (3rd), command undead (2nd), death ward (4th), halt undead (3rd), life channel (1st; 0 burn; self only), mind blank (8th; self only), unliving rage (3rd).

Water
Fluid form (6th), ride the waves (4th), silent image (2nd; 0 burn), sleet storm (3rd), water breathing (3rd).

Wood
Command plants (4th), fairy ring retreat (7th; ends 1 hour after your burn is removed), goodberry (1st), grove of respite (4th), lesser restoration (2nd), ward of the season (3rd).

Special
Kineticists with the air affinity, earth affinity, fire affinity, or water affinity racial traits or the air, earth, fire, or water subtypes can select spells of the appropriate element as if they had this feat. Caligni (Pathfinder RPG Bestiary 5 66) and dhampir (Pathfinder RPG Bestiary 2 89) kineticists can select spells of the void element as if they had this feat. Gathlain (Pathfinder RPG Bestiary 4 122) and ghoran (Bestiary 5 119) kineticists can select spells of the wood element as if they had this feat. Such a character must still have access to the appropriate element to select spells this way. At the GM's discretion, this benefit can be expanded to other races.

Kinetic Leap.name: 念动飞跃 Kinetic Leap
Kinetic Leap.description:
在跳跃时，念力会为你提供推力。

先决条件: 特技动作3级，念袭（Kinetic Blast）职业能力。

专长效果: 每日1次以迅捷动作，你能够利用念袭引发一股能量爆发，来帮助自身进行长距离的跳跃，在用于跳跃的特技动作检定中获得+10加值；若你在特技动作上至少投入了10点技能点，那么该加值会增加至+20点。通过承受1点超载，你能够随意使用该能力，直至你所承受的超载得以移除为止。

资源出处: Occult Adventures pg. 136

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Kinetic%20Leap

Kinslayer.name: Kinslayer
Kinslayer.description:
Your intimate knowledge of anatomy, deep hatred of your own kind, and delight in spilling your people's blood make you a lethal combatant against your own race.

Prerequisites
Knowledge 3 ranks (see special), evil alignment.

Benefits
Your attacks deal an additional 1d6 points of precision damage against creatures that have the same creature type (and subtype, if applicable) as you. This bonus damage stacks with other sources of precision damage, such as sneak attack. If you have more than one subtype, you must choose one of them--this feat applies only to targets of that subtype. Once made, this choice can't be changed.

Special
The Knowledge skill used to qualify for this feat must be appropriate for identifying creatures of your type.

Kirin Path.name: 麒麟步 Kirin Path
Kirin Path.description:
专长类型：Combat

你将对敌人的了解转化为无懈可击的防御步法。

先决条件: 智力13，麒麟破，麒麟势，精通徒手打击，知识（奥秘）12级，知识（地城，地方，自然，位面，或宗教）5级。

专长效果: 你的所有用于鉴定生物的知识检定可以取10。当你采用麒麟流派架势时，被鉴定成功的生物如果在你的威胁范围内结束回合的话，你可以消耗该轮一次借机攻击次数移动等于你每点智力修正（最少为1）5尺的距离，但你的移动终点必须处于该生物的威胁范围内，这种移动不会引起借机攻击。

资源出处: Ultimate Combat pg. 107

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Kirin%20Path

战策增益：当你使用麒麟势UC时，你可以消耗5点耐力而不是使用一次借机攻击来移动等同于你5尺×你的智力调整值的距离。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 125

Kirin Strike.name: 麒麟破 Kirin Strike
Kirin Strike.description:
专长类型：Combat

你已精研过相关典籍，并知晓如何攻击敌人防御最薄弱之处。

先决条件: 智力13，麒麟势，精通徒手打击，知识（奥秘）9级，知识（地城，地方，自然，位面，或宗教）3级。

专长效果: 你鉴定生物的知识检定得到+2洞察加值。当你处于麒麟流派架势时，在你的近战攻击或远程攻击击中对手后，用一个迅捷动作，你对知识检定成功的生物造成等于你两倍智力修正的额外伤害（最少为2）。

资源出处: Ultimate Combat pg. 107

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Kirin%20Strike

战策增益：只要你在你的耐力池中还拥有至少1点耐力，当你击中一个你用麒麟势鉴定过的生物时，你可以在之后的24小时将你的智力调整值加到对抗那个生物的近战和远程伤害骰上。你可以以一个迅捷动作将两倍智力调整值加到伤害骰上，但不会与来自这个战策的伤害叠加。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 125

Kirin Style.name: 麒麟势 Kirin Style
Kirin Style.description:
专长类型：CombatStyle

你的研习和从容允许你洞悉敌人的弱点。

先决条件: 精通徒手打击，知识（奥秘）6级，知识（地城，地方，自然，位面，或宗教）1级。

专长效果: 当你使用此流派架势时，你能以一个迅捷动作，以知识检定鉴定一个敌人（DC为“15+目标生物CR”），如果成功，你在对抗该生物的攻击时豁免获得+2加值，并在对抗该生物的借机攻击时AC获得+2闪避加值。这些加值在你保持麒麟势时一直生效。如果你这次和该生物停战、并在之后再战，你可以重新尝试这个检定。

资源出处: Ultimate Combat pg. 107

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Kirin%20Style

战策增益：当你尝试一次知识检定来鉴定一个生物时，你可以消耗最多2点耐力来在这次检定上获得等同于两倍你消耗耐力的加值。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 125

Kitsune Style.name: 灵狐式 Kitsune Style
Kitsune Style.description:
专长类型：CombatStyle

如一道流星划过对手，你的招数让他晕头转向。

先决条件: 智力13，寓守于攻，精通阴招APG。

专长效果: 当处于本流派的架势时，你可以在冲锋攻击时以一次阴招战技攻击取代正常的攻击。

资源出处: Dirty Tactics Toolbox pg. 15

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Kitsune%20Style

Kitsune Tricks.name: 灵狐计 Kitsune Tricks
Kitsune Tricks.description:
专长类型：Combat

当你的计策层出不穷时，你的对手已经无力维持正常的思考。

先决条件: 智力13，寓守于攻，精通阴招APG，灵狐式，基础攻击加值+3或武僧等级3。

专长效果: 当处于灵狐流的架势时，你通过在一次阴招战技攻击为对手同时造成两个不同的不良效果，移除由此专长造成的两个效果只需要一个动作。

资源出处: Dirty Tactics Toolbox pg. 15

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Kitsune%20Tricks

Kitsune Vengeance.name: 灵狐倾城 Kitsune Vengeance
Kitsune Vengeance.description:
专长类型：Combat

看似优雅的姿态背后，你隐藏着险恶的后手。

先决条件: 智力13，寓守于攻，精通阴招APG，灵狐式，灵狐计，基础攻击加值+6或武僧等级6。

专长效果: 当处于灵狐流的架势时，如果你的对手引发了一次你的借机攻击，你可以选择对他进行一次阴招战技攻击以取代正常的攻击。

资源出处: Dirty Tactics Toolbox pg. 15

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Kitsune%20Vengeance

Knight of the Twisted Word.name: Knight of the Twisted Word
Knight of the Twisted Word.description:
You've so impressed the Traitor that he's given you a title in his court-in-exile--possibly to keep an eye on you.

Prerequisites
Fey creature type or Fey Obedience (Count Ranalc), character level 7th, you must have betrayed or deceived in a major fashion a demon with a CR at least 2 higher than your level when you took the feat.

Benefits
Once per day, you can cast glibness as a spell-like ability with a caster level equal to your Hit Dice.

Knocking Blows.name: 震撼冲击 Knocking Blows
Knocking Blows.description:
专长类型：Armor MasteryCombat

你冲击的力量压倒了你的敌人。

先决条件: 力量13，强力冲击，猛力攻击，基本攻击加值+11或者战士8级，盔甲训练职业特性，擅长重甲。

专长效果: 如果你以猛力攻击击中了一个体型比你大不超过1级的生物时，你攻击的这个生物会被震入失衡状态。直到你的下一轮开始，它在对抗移动它或者将它击倒的CMD上获得-4减值。

资源出处: Armor Masters Handbook pg. 17

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Knocking%20Blows

战策增益：你可以在使用这个专长时消耗5点耐力来让目标CMD减值变为-6。

战策资源出处: Armor Master's Handbook pg. 21

Knockout Artist.name: 斗殴艺术 Knockout Artist
Knockout Artist.description:
你的拳头充满破坏力。

先决条件: 【偷袭】职业特性，精通徒手打击。

专长效果: 当你使用徒手打击对一个失去AC上的敏捷加值的敌人进行非致命性伤害的偷袭时，你的每个偷袭伤害骰获得+1额外伤害。

资源出处: Ultimate Combat pg. 106

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Knockout%20Artist

Knockout Artist (Mythic).name: 斗殴艺术(神话) Knockout Artist (Mythic)
Knockout Artist (Mythic).description:
先决条件：斗殴艺术

就算是真正的勇士也击倒给你看。

神话专长效果：当你使用徒手打击对敌人造成非致命伤害和偷袭伤害时，每个偷袭攻击骰都使用d8以取代原本的d6。

资源出处: Mythic Adventures pg. 68

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Knockout%20Artist

Knotted Nets.name: Knotted Nets
Knotted Nets.description:
You are capable of entangling far greater prey with the help of your allies.

Prerequisites
Exotic Weapon Proficiency (net), base attack bonus +1.

Benefits
If you ready an attack with a net to entangle a creature when an ally of your size who also has this feat attempts to entangle that creature with a net, the two of you can entangle the creature as if you were one size category larger. The entangled creature can attempt to escape both nets as though they were a single net, using the lower of the nets' hit points, hardness (if any), and DCs to break or escape. Only you or your ally can attempt to control the entangled creature's movement with an opposed Strength check, but your ally grants you a +1 bonus on the check. If you work with three other allies of the same size who have this feat, you can entangle a creature as if you were two size categories larger. If you work with seven other allies in this way, you can instead entangle a creature as if you were three size categories larger.

Normal
A net is useful against only creatures within one size category of you.

Know Weakness.name: 知晓弱点 Know Weakness
Know Weakness.description:
专长类型：Combat

你学习过无数怪物寓言和传说，对怪物的弱点知之甚多。

先决条件: 轶闻知识职业能力。

专长效果: 每当你成功的通过一个知识检定分析了某种生物，你会对该生物在攻击和伤害检定上获得+1价值，持续1轮。

资源出处: Advanced Class Origins pg. 27

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Know%20Weakness

Knowledgeable Spellcaster.name: Knowledgeable Spellcaster
Knowledgeable Spellcaster.description:
Your vast knowledge of opponents lets you more effectively cast spells on them.

Prerequisites
Knowledge (arcana, dungeoneering, local, nature, planes, or religion) 5 ranks, caster level 7th.

Benefits
When you select this feat, choose one Knowledge skill in which you have at least 5 ranks. When you succeed at a check with that Knowledge skill to identify a creature's abilities and weaknesses, you can learn one less piece of information in order to gain a +3 bonus on caster level checks to overcome that creature's spell resistance (if any). If you have 10 or more ranks in the selected Knowledge skill, you can learn two fewer pieces of information to increase this bonus to +5.

Normal
You can take this feat multiple times. Each time you take this feat, you must select a different Knowledge skill.

Kobold Ambusher.name: 狗头人伏击者 Kobold Ambusher
Kobold Ambusher.description:
专长类型：Combat

你善于快速移动以及保持隐蔽。

先决条件: 隐匿4级，狗头人。

专长效果: 你可以在隐匿时进行全速移动而不会使隐匿检定受到任何罚值。你可以在冲锋或者奔跑时保持隐藏，但是这么做会使隐匿检定-10。

通常状况: 如果你在隐匿时移动速度高于半速则会使隐匿检定上-5。当你在奔跑或冲锋时使用隐匿，你会使隐匿检定-20【译注：核心书隐匿技能说明冲锋或者奔跑时无法隐匿。不知是否有勘误，求解。】

资源出处: Advanced Race Guide pg. 137

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Kobold%20Ambusher

战策增益：当你使用奔跑或者冲锋动作并希望保持躲藏时，你可以消耗5点耐力来让这样做的减值降低到-5。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 125

Kobold Confidence.name: Kobold Confidence
Kobold Confidence.description:
Your cunning, confidence, or faith in the draconic power in your blood allows you to overcome your physical frailty.

Prerequisites
Charisma 13, kobold.

Benefits
You use your Charisma, Intelligence, or Wisdom in place of Constitution to determine your bonus to Fortitude saves and your maximum negative hit points before death. Once this choice has been made, it can't be changed.

Kobold Flood.name: Kobold Flood
Kobold Flood.description:
You are an expert at keeping creatures on the ground.

Prerequisites
Combat Expertise, Kobold Groundling, Kobold Style, Small size or smaller.

Benefits
You can make a grapple combat maneuver check to mount a prone Medium or Large foe. If you're successful, you move into the target's square and are considered to be on top of the target. For the target to stand, it must succeed at a combat maneuver check to break your grapple.

Kobold Groundling.name: Kobold Groundling
Kobold Groundling.description:
Your small size grants you superiority over grounded foes.

Prerequisites
Combat Expertise, Kobold Style, Small size or smaller.

Benefits
Prone creatures are denied their Dexterity bonus to AC against your attacks.

Kobold Sniper.name: 狗头人狙击手 Kobold Sniper
Kobold Sniper.description:
专长类型：Combat

你狙击时出手干净利落，这使得其他人很难找到你攻击的位置。

先决条件: 隐匿1级，狗头人。

专长效果: 当你狙击时（参见隐匿技能说明），你只会在隐匿检定上受到-10减值以保持隐藏。

通常状况: 当你试图在狙击后维持隐藏状态时隐匿检定-20。

资源出处: Advanced Race Guide pg. 137

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Kobold%20Sniper

战策增益：当你正在狙击时，你可以消耗5点耐力来将拥有保持躲藏的隐匿检定降低到-5，持续到你的下一轮开始。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 125

Kobold Style.name: Kobold Style
Kobold Style.description:
You're able to manipulate foes that are caught off guard.

Prerequisites
Combat Expertise, Small size or smaller.

Benefits
You gain a +4 bonus on combat maneuver checks against enemies denied their Dexterity bonus to AC.

Kraggodan's Stance.name: Kraggodan's Stance
Kraggodan's Stance.description:
You have learned one of the secrets of Kraggodan's defenders and can lock your armor and shield into an impenetrable barrier.

Prerequisites
Con 13, proficiency with heavy armor and shields.

Benefits
As a move action when wearing heavy armor and using a heavy shield or tower shield, you increase the bonus to AC granted by your armor and your shield by 1 each until you move or are moved from your current square. You must be in contact with solid ground to gain this benefit. You can never increase an armor or shield bonus to AC by more than 1 each in this way.

Kraken Style.name: 触手流 Kraken Style
Kraken Style.description:
专长类型：CombatStyle

你野蛮地压榨挤压被你擒抱的家伙。

先决条件: 感知13，精通擒抱，精通徒手打击，BAB+3或武僧等级3。

专长效果: 当你处于该流派下成功通过一次擒抱检定时，被你擒抱的目标在因你的擒抱而受到伤害时（比如你在成功维持擒抱的检定后选择伤害目标作为该次成功检定的一部分），额外造成等同于你感知调整值的数值的钝击伤害。额外的，你维持擒抱的擒抱战技检定获得+2加值。

资源出处: Melee Tactics Toolbox pg. 13

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Kraken%20Style

Kraken Throttle.name: 触手锁 Kraken Throttle
Kraken Throttle.description:
专长类型：Combat

你的擒抱会锁死目标的咽喉。

先决条件: 感知13，精通擒抱，精通徒手打击，触手流，BAB+5或武僧等级5。

专长效果: 你在擒抱战技检定成功时触手流专长所提供的额外伤害增加为你的感知调整值+2。当你处于该流派下时，你在成功维持擒抱后，可以选择锁住目标的咽喉，而非造成伤害、移动、压制或捆绑目标。这种锁喉会使目标窒息（使用核心窒息规则）。被擒抱目标可以在你没有成功维持擒抱时进行呼吸。

资源出处: Melee Tactics Toolbox pg. 13

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Kraken%20Throttle

Kraken Wrack.name: 触手紧缚 Kraken Wrack
Kraken Wrack.description:
专长类型：Combat

你超强的紧缚能力压碎了敌人和你之间的护甲或物品。

先决条件: 感知13，感知13，精通擒抱，精通徒手打击，触手流，BAB+7或武僧等级7。

专长效果: 你在擒抱战技检定成功时触手流专长所提供的额外伤害增加为你的感知调整值+4。当你处于该流派下时，你在成功维持擒抱后可以选择压碎目标，而非锁喉、造成伤害、移动、压制或捆绑目标。若如此做，你对目标的护甲或手持物品造成伤害，其数值等同于你徒手攻击伤害或一种天武攻击伤害。这种压碎伤害忽视护甲或物品一半的硬度。

资源出处: Melee Tactics Toolbox pg. 13

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Kraken%20Wrack

Kudzu Grappler.name: Kudzu Grappler
Kudzu Grappler.description:
You climb all over creatures you're grappling like kudzu, blocking their vision.

Prerequisites
Dex 13, Improved Grapple, Improved Unarmed Strike, Greater Grapple, base attack bonus +6, vine leshy.

Benefits
You add an option to blind the grappled creature for 1 round to the list of actions you can take when you succeed at a check to maintain a grapple.

Kudzu Invasion.name: Kudzu Invasion
Kudzu Invasion.description:
In addition to obscuring creatures' vision, your vines crush their bodies.

Prerequisites
Dex 13, Greater Grapple, Improved Grapple, Improved Unarmed Strike, Kudzu Grappler, base attack bonus +6 or monk level 6th, vine leshy.

Benefits
When you blind a creature using your Kudzu Grappler feat, you can also deal your unarmed strike damage to it.

Kudzu Takeover.name: Kudzu Takeover
Kudzu Takeover.description:
Your magical nature infuses your vines, further obscuring grappled foes' vision--even for opponents with enhanced senses.

Prerequisites
Dex 13, base attack bonus +6 or monk level 6th, Greater Grapple, Improved Grapple, Improved Unarmed Strike, Kudzu Grappler, Kudzu Invasion, vine leshy.

Benefits
Opponents blinded by your Kudzu Grappler feat increase their miss chance against creatures they attack by 20%. If the opponent has means of ignoring blindness, such as blindsight, they instead treat other creatures as if these creatures had normal concealment (20% miss chance).

Normal
All opponents are considered to have total concealment (50% miss chance) against blinded creatures.

Kyton Cut.name: 链魔割 Kyton Cut
Kyton Cut.description:
专长类型：Combat

你鞭打自己并把痛苦分享给你的对手。

先决条件: 感知17，擅长异种武器（刺链），链魔流，链魔盾，BAB+8或6级武僧等级，知识（位面）3级，气池职业能力。

专长效果: 当使用链魔流时，你的刺链攻击能变得异常残酷，对你和你的敌人都是如此。在用刺链进行攻击骰之前，你可以尝试使用链魔割。攻击前你会受到1d6的非致命伤害。这个伤害不会被任何方式减免。如果你免疫非致命伤害，那么你会受到正常的致命伤害作为代替。如果攻击命中，目标会受到1d6的非致命伤害，并在下一轮的专注检定上受到-4的减值。此减值具有痛苦描述符。

资源出处: Horror Adventures pg. 88

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Kyton%20Cut

Kyton Shield.name: 链魔盾 Kyton Shield
Kyton Shield.description:
专长类型：Combat

无论在你手中还是围绕自身，刺链既是武器，也是盾牌。

先决条件: 感知15，擅长异种武器（刺链），链魔流，BAB+5，知识（位面）3级，气池职业能力。

专长效果: 当你使用链魔流时，只要你持用刺链，你的AC获得+1盾牌加值。如果刺链是魔法物品，那么把它增强加值的1/2加到盾牌加值上。如果刺链有反噬特性，那么把全部的增强加值加到盾牌加值上。

资源出处: Horror Adventures pg. 88

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Kyton%20Shield

Kyton Style.name: 链魔流 Kyton Style
Kyton Style.description:
专长类型：CombatStyle

你的战斗风格就像链魔一般，将盛怒与痛苦紧锁于锁链中。

先决条件: 感知13，擅长异种武器（刺链），知识（位面）3级，气池职业能力。

专长效果: 当你使用这个流派时，你视作刺链拥有武僧武器特性。此外，如果你有震慑拳专长，你可以花费1点气来用刺链使出震慑拳，而不是徒手攻击。这仍然需要花费震慑拳的使用次数。

资源出处: Horror Adventures pg. 89

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Kyton%20Style

Lady Luck's Guidance.name: Lady Luck's Guidance
Lady Luck's Guidance.description:
Desna has taken a liking to you and guides you from the stars as you travel.

Prerequisites
Knowledge (geography) 5 ranks, Knowledge (planes) 5 ranks.

Benefits
Once per day during overland travel, you can attempt a DC 25 Knowledge (geography) check to follow the stars. On a success, you and up to eight other creatures use Desna's mystical guidance to travel twice the usual distance during overland travel.

Lamashtu's Mark.name: Lamashtu's Mark
Lamashtu's Mark.description:
You are marked as one of Lamashtu's favored minions.

Prerequisites
Con 13, Lamashtu as patron deity.

Benefits
