Dedicated to ridding your land of colonialist invaders, you have pledged your eternal soul to the purging of their presence from Mzali. Upon completion of the ritual, you gain fire resistance 2 and a +1 morale bonus on Will saves.

When you are killed, you rise as a juju zombie (Pathfinder RPG Bestiary 2 291) after 1d4 minutes. Upon rising, your alignment changes to evil. Lawful and chaotic components of your alignment are not changed. After this transformation, you deal an additional 1d6 points of fire damage with the slam attack gained from the template.

Special
If you are a juju zombie at the time when Mzali is entirely purged of foreigners, your duty to Mzali is fulfilled and you are immediately destroyed.

Marked for Glory.name: 注定荣耀 Marked for Glory
Marked for Glory.description:
你命中注定会获得远超普通冒险者和凡人无法想像的荣耀。

先决条件: 强韧加强，钢铁意志或闪电反射。

专长效果: 你获得每日使用1次神力涌动（神力涌动加骰为1d6）的能力。若你成为了神话角色，那么每日能够额外使用1次神力涌动能力。

资源出处: Mythic Adventures pg. 69

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Marked%20for%20Glory

Marksman's Utility.name: 万能射击 Marksman's Utility
Marksman's Utility.description:
专长类型：Weapon Mastery

你对于远程武器的娴熟运用使你可以用它们来发动一些需要火器进行精确打击才能做到的效果。

先决条件: BAB+6，对所选远程武器拥有战士武器训练（Weapon Training）职业能力。

专长效果: 你可以使用一件你所擅长的所选远程武器来发动铳士的万用射击UC勇毅动作。如果你本身就拥有万用射击勇毅动作，那么你可以在发动万用射击的攻击检定上获得+4加值，并且可以在没有勇毅点数的情况下使用万用射击

特殊说明: 铳士可以忽略武器训练职业能力的先决条件来选择本专长。

资源出处: Weapon Masters Handbook pg. 21

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Marksman's%20Utility

Martial Dominance.name: 武装权威 Martial Dominance
Martial Dominance.description:
专长类型：Combat

你很擅长用手里的家伙警告别人。

先决条件: BAB +5，威吓1级。

专长效果: 在判断你的威吓技能加值时，你可以使用基本攻击加值取代你在威吓技能上投入的技能点数。当你对1名生物确认了重击（confirm a critical hit）时，能够以直觉动作（immediate action）尝试1次威吓检定，用于挫败该生物的士气（demoralize）。

资源出处: Ultimate Intrigue pg. 86

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Martial%20Dominance

Martial Focus.name: 武器专家 Martial Focus
Martial Focus.description:
专长类型：Combat

你熟练地掌握了一些武器的用法。

先决条件: BAB+5。

专长效果: 选择一个战士武器组（Fighter Weapon Group），你在持用该武器组中你擅长的武器时，在伤害检定上获得+1加值。

特殊说明: 本专长可以在你选择需要战士武器训练职业能力作为先决条件的武器掌握专长，以及决定该武器掌握专长影响的武器类型时视为你拥有对所选武器组的武器训练职业能力。

资源出处: Weapon Masters Handbook pg. 20

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Martial%20Focus

Martial Mastery.name: 武器熟稔 Martial Mastery
Martial Mastery.description:
专长类型：Combat

先决条件：武器变通，战士16级，人类。

先决条件: 武器变通，战士16级，人类。

专长效果: 你可以将你已知的所有适用于特定武器的战斗专长（如“武器专攻”）应用到与其相同武器组的所有有武器上。

资源出处: Advanced Race Guide pg. 78

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Martial%20Mastery

战策增益：在你回合开始时，你可以消耗5点耐力来将所有专长应用到一件不属于同一武器组的武器上。在你下一轮开始之前你将获得这一好处。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 126

Martial Versatility.name: 武器变通 Martial Versatility
Martial Versatility.description:
专长类型：Combat

先决条件：战士4级，人类。

先决条件: 战士4级，人类。

专长效果: 选择一个你已知的适用于特定武器的战斗专长（如“武器专攻”）。在与其相同的武器组中的武器均可应用该专长。

特殊说明: 你可以多次选择这个专长。每次必须选择不同的战斗专长。

资源出处: Advanced Race Guide pg. 78

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Martial%20Versatility

战策增益：在你回合开始时，你可以消耗2点耐力来将一个选定专长应用到一件不属于同一武器组的武器上。在你下一轮开始之前你将获得这一好处。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 126

Mascot's Affection.name: Mascot's Affection
Mascot's Affection.description:
Your familiar can bond with many creatures.

Prerequisites
Must have a familiar with the mascot archetype (see page 11).

Benefits
The maximum number of team members your familiar can have increases by two.

Mask Focus.name: Mask Focus
Mask Focus.description:
You can use your mask as an additional focus for your arcane spells, enhancing their power.

Prerequisites
Extend Spell, Nameless One, ability to cast 3rd-level arcane spells.

Benefits
While you're benefiting from the Nameless One feat (see below), the mask you wear to gain the benefits of that feat satisfies the focus component of any spell you cast that requires a mask (such as mask from divination). In addition, once per day you can apply the Extend Spell metamagic feat to an arcane spell without increasing the spell's level by adding your mask as a focus component. When Extend Spell is applied in this manner, its increase to duration applies only to effects that target you; other creatures use the spell's normal duration. For example, if you use this ability with the haste spell, the spell's effects last twice as long for you, but not for any other creature that you target with the spell.

Mask of Virtue.name: Mask of Virtue
Mask of Virtue.description:
Your alignment is known to you and you alone.

Benefits
Those who try to learn your true alignment find it hidden or receive a false result. Depending on the number of damnation feats you possess, spells or special abilities that would normally reveal your alignment return a vague or incorrect result. If this feat disguises your alignment, you can use either your true alignment or the false one when using magic items with alignment prerequisites.

One Damnation Feat
The spell or special ability returns an inconclusive result.

Two Damnation Feats
Upon gaining this power, choose an alignment within one step of your actual alignment. Your alignment is always revealed as being that false alignment.

Three Damnation Feats
Upon gaining this power, choose an alignment within two steps of your actual alignment. Your alignment is always revealed as being this false alignment.

Four Damnation Feats
You immediately know when someone is attempting to use a spell or special ability to learn your alignment. You learn the name and alignment of the creature using the effect. Additionally, you can choose any alignment as the result returned by the spell or ability.

Masked by Fear.name: Masked by Fear
Masked by Fear.description:
You embody all that you fear while wearing your mask.

Prerequisites
Nameless One; base Will save bonus +6 or bravery class feature.

Benefits
By donning a mask etched with your greatest terrors, you are able to eschew fear completely. While benefiting from the Nameless One feat, when you suffer the cowering, frightened, or panicked condition, that condition causes you to act as if shaken instead of imposing its normal effects. In addition, whenever you attempt a skill check (normally Intimidate) to demoralize an opponent, you gain a +3 bonus on the check.

Masked Intent.name: Masked Intent
Masked Intent.description:
Your masked face makes your intentions nearly impossible to discern.

Prerequisites
Nameless One.

Benefits
While you're benefiting from the Nameless One feat, your intentions become difficult to read. You gain a +4 circumstance bonus on opposed Bluff checks, and increase the DC by 4 of checks to gather information about you using Diplomacy, to answer questions about you or your abilities or weaknesses using the appropriate Knowledge skill, or to identify any spells or spell-like abilities that you cast using Spellcraft. If you have 10 or more ranks in any of these skills, the bonus for that skill or increase to that DC increases to +8.

Masked Renown.name: Masked Renown
Masked Renown.description:
Your masked persona is especially well known.

Prerequisites
Cha 13, Disguise 2 ranks.

Benefits
You gain the vigilante's renown social talent (Ultimate Intrigue 12), allowing you to gather and maintain a reputation in a community.

Special
Beginning at 9th level, you can select this feat a second time to gain the great renown vigilante social talent.

Masked Symbol.name: Masked Symbol
Masked Symbol.description:
Your alternate identity exists as a nearly inhuman avatar of a mood or cause.

Prerequisites
Disguise 1 rank or dual identity class feature.

Benefits
Your masked persona represents a particular concept, granting you a benefit while in your masked persona or vigilante identity. Each time you gain a new character level, you can choose to embody a different symbol, forgoing your previous bonus and gaining a new one. Faith
+2 circumstance bonus on Diplomacy checks against creatures of your faith; +2 circumstance bonus on Intimidate checks against enemies of your faith.

Fear
+3 circumstance bonus on Intimidate checks.

Hope
+3 circumstance bonus on Diplomacy checks.

Leadership
+2 bonus to your Leadership score.

Mystery
+2 circumstance bonus on Disguise checks to conceal your true identity; +2 circumstance bonus on Stealth checks to enter or escape unseen.

The People
+2 circumstance bonus on checks to influence crowds.

Trust
+2 circumstance bonus on Bluff checks to lie and Diplomacy checks to make requests.

Master Alchemist.name: 炼金大师 Master Alchemist
Master Alchemist.description:
你对炼金术掌握的程度近乎神技。

先决条件: 工艺（炼金）5级。

专长效果: 你的工艺（炼金）检定获得+2加值，你能够以更快的速度制造普通炼金物品。当你制造毒药时，你能够同时制作等同于你的智力修正（最低为1）剂毒药。这些额外的毒药并不会增加制作所需的时间，但是它们仍旧如常增加材料成本。此外，当你使用工艺（炼金）制作炼金物品或者毒药时，使用物品的金币（gp）价值当做银币（sp）价值来判断工作的进程（你不需要将金币价格乘10来得出银币价值，而是直接使用金币的价值替代）

【PFS】仅限炼金术师和制毒大师(游荡者变体)使用。

资源出处: Advanced Players Guide pg. 165

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Master%20Alchemist

Master Combat Performer.name: 演武大师 Master Combat Performer
Master Combat Performer.description:
专长类型：Combat

你是一个在角斗场和舞台上表演武艺的大师。

先决条件: 演武斗士或三项演武专长，基本攻击加值+6。

专长效果: 你可以用自由动作进行演武检定。你可以像演武武器一样使用所有武器进行演武。

资源出处: Ultimate Combat pg. 109

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Master%20Combat%20Performer

战策增益：当你尝试演武检定时，你能消耗至多5点耐力来在检定上获得等同于消耗耐力的加值。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 126

Master Delver.name: Master Delver
Master Delver.description:
You've spent some time in Cassomir's Locker and have learned a little bit to help you survive.

Prerequisites
Explored part of Cassomir's locker.

Benefits
You get a +2 bonus on all Knowledge (dungeoneering) checks and Perception checks made to notice traps. Knowledge (dungeoneering) is always a class skill for you.

Master Hammer Throw.name: Master Hammer Throw
Master Hammer Throw.description:
Your ability to knock down foes with thrown weapons is second to none.

Prerequisites
Int 13, Combat Expertise, Hammer Throw, Improved Hammer Throw, Improved Trip, Point-Blank Shot, Precise Shot, base attack bonus +6, dwarf.

Benefits
You can immediately attempt a trip combat maneuver against a target that you successfully hit and damage with a thrown bludgeoning weapon with any attack, even as part of a full-attack action.

Master of Knowledge.name: 知识大师 Master of Knowledge
Master of Knowledge.description:
先决条件：智力17，技能专攻（知识任一），信仰义洛理

先决条件: 智力17，技能专攻（知识[任一]），信仰义洛理。

专长效果: 选择一项你拥有技能专攻的知识技能。每天一次当你需要进行此知识技能检定时，你不必投骰，而是直接获得相当于投出20的结果。

资源出处: Inner Sea Gods pg. 213

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Master%20of%20Knowledge

Master of Wonders.name: Master of Wonders
Master of Wonders.description:
Having seen the wonders of the world, you know how to tweak more chaos out of a rod of wonder.

Prerequisites
Iron Will, Wonderseeker faction, gnome.

Benefits
When you activate a rod of wonder, roll d% to determine what effect the rod would create. If you desire to do so, you can roll d% again and use this second result. You can only use this ability once per round.

Master of Your Kind.name: Master of Your Kind
Master of Your Kind.description:
When you speak to other animals of your kind, you can influence them to act according to your wishes and those of your master.

Prerequisites
Familiar, speak with animals of its kind ability.

Benefits
Your master gains a +2 bonus on Handle Animal checks with animals of your kind. In addition, once per day you can use animal messenger, animal trance, or charm animal as a spell-like ability, using your master's caster level but your own Charisma modifier. These abilities affect only animals of your kind, and you gain only one use of this ability per day (not one of each ability); however, you can gain one additional use of any one of these three abilities by having your master sacrifice a prepared spell or spell slot of the same level or higher as a standard action.

Master Performer.name: Master Performer
Master Performer.description:
When using your bardic performance abilities, you grant your allies greater bonuses.

Prerequisites
Bardic performance class feature, Extra Performance, Kitharodian Academy 15 TPA.

Benefits
When any of your bardic performance abilities grant your allies a bonus, that bonus is increased by +1.

Master Siege Engineer.name: 攻城宗匠 Master Siege Engineer
Master Siege Engineer.description:
专长类型：Combat

你装填攻城兵器更加迅速，射击也更精确。

先决条件: 攻城技师，知识（工程）10级。

专长效果: 当你身为攻城兵器的机师长时，你的技师组能以移动动作进行装填；当你需要消耗动作来下令瞄准时，你和你的技师组以移动动作而非整轮动作来操作攻城兵器进行瞄准。

通常状况: 攻城兵器的装填和瞄准都需要数个整轮动作。

【译注：注意攻城兵器的装填和瞄准都需要消耗“数个”整轮动作，拥有此专长只是将其缩短为“数个”移动动作，而非一下了事。】

资源出处: Ultimate Combat pg. 109

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Master%20Siege%20Engineer

战策增益：你可以消耗5点耐力在1轮内降低瞄准和装填攻城武器动作一个等级（最少为一个动作）。你必须是攻城武器的队伍领袖。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 126

Master Sniper.name: 狙杀王牌 Master Sniper
Master Sniper.description:
专长类型：Combat

你出神入化的狙击技术足以在被迫转移前连射敌人两发。

先决条件: 老练狙击，快速射击，潜行技能等级6。

专长效果: 当处于隐藏状态时，你可以以一个整轮动作以最高攻击加值发动两次远程攻击然后立刻重新尝试潜行。你正常在尝试重新潜行时在技能检定上承受狙击减值，影响狙击攻击的所有相关效果也正常生效，并且这两次攻击的攻击检定承受-2减值。

通常状况: 你在狙击时只能发动一次攻击。

资源出处: Dirty Tactics Toolbox pg. 11

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Master%20Sniper

Master Swimmer.name: Master Swimmer
Master Swimmer.description:
You've trained at swimming in combat and over long distances for so long that you can move through the water like a native.

Prerequisites
Skill Focus (Swim), Swim 10 ranks.

Benefits
You gain a swim speed of 30 feet or your unmodified base land speed, whichever is slower; your racial bonus on Swim checks for having a swim speed is +2, instead of +8.

Masterful Display.name: 宗师极意 Masterful Display
Masterful Display.description:
专长类型：CombatPerformance

你做出了招牌式的胜利姿态，观众为之狂野。

先决条件: 炫目技巧，任意两项演武专长。

专长效果: 任选两项你所拥有的演武专长。当你进行演武检定时，可以同时获得这两项专长的效果，不过演武检定本身获得的加值还是只有+2。

资源出处: Ultimate Combat pg. 109

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Masterful%20Display

战策增益：当你选择任何两个你拥有的演武专长的效果时，你可以消耗2点耐力来在演武战斗检定上获得来自两个专长的加值。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 126

Masterful Flourish.name: 得心应手 Masterful Flourish
Masterful Flourish.description:
专长类型：CombatPerformance

你对使用演武武器所作出的艰苦训练，让你在使用它们演武时能够获得更大的优势。

先决条件: 武器训练（Weapon training）职业能力。

专长效果: 当你持用具有演武（Performance）武器特性的武器，而且该武器还属于你已经具有的武器训练的武器类别，那么你可以将武器训练的加值加到使用该武器做出的任何演武检定的结果上。

资源出处: Inner Sea Combat pg. 12

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Masterful%20Flourish

Mauler's Endurance.name: Mauler's Endurance
Mauler's Endurance.description:
Your familiar is harder to kill than most.

Prerequisites
Must have a familiar with the mauler archetype (see page 11).

Benefits
Your familiar gains 2 hit points per level you possess.

Maximized Spellstrike.name: 极效法术打击 Maximized Spellstrike
Maximized Spellstrike.description:
你可以针对一个措手不及的对手进行残暴的痛击。

先决条件: ＜法术极效化＞魔战士奥能，【武器训练】职业特性或即时备战。

专长效果: 当你对一个失去了AC上的敏捷加值的敌人进行了一次近战攻击、并且成功的对敌人使用了【法术打击】能力，你可以从你的奥能力池中花费3点奥能来让你传递的接触法术极效，如同你使用了“法术极效”超魔专长。

资源出处: Ultimate Combat pg. 109

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Maximized%20Spellstrike

Maze Expert.name: Maze Expert
Maze Expert.description:
You have a near-perfect sense of direction.

Prerequisites
Skill Focus (Survival), Survival 5 ranks.

Benefits
You gain a +4 bonus on Survival checks to avoid becoming lost and to determine whether you are lost. You also gain a +4 bonus on Intelligence checks to navigate mazes, including to escape a maze spell. Once per day, you can use your intuition to determine whether traveling a particular direction from a fork in the road (or other junction) might be productive or dangerous. This functions like the augury spell, except it provides weal or woe based on traveling in a particular direction.

Measure Foe.name: 武艺评估 Measure Foe
Measure Foe.description:
专长类型：Combat

你能通过敌人的肢体语言解读出它所受到的武技训练。

先决条件: 街头智慧，BAB +1。

专长效果: 在至少观察1分钟敌人的移动、或者至少观察2轮敌人的攻击之后，你能以自由动作（free action）尝试1次察言观色检定，并以此推断出1名敌人曾经受过何种的武技训练。如果你观察的是移动时的姿态而非攻击动作的话，则会在检定中承受-10的减值。该DC为20 + 该生物的BAB 或 10 + 该生物的唬骗或易容调整值，以较高者为准。若你的检定成功，则会了解到敌人的基本攻击加值，外加1个它所具有的战斗专长（combat feat），你的检定每比DC高出5点，便能够再额外知晓1个该生物具有的战斗专长。直至该名敌人获得新的等级或者以其他方式强化了自身能力为止，你在对抗它的攻击检定中均会获得+1洞察加值，而且AC还会在对抗它的攻击时获得+1洞察加值。若你的检定失败了，那么直至你的察言观色技能获得更多技能点为止，均无法再对该名特定敌人尝试本检定。

资源出处: Ultimate Intrigue pg. 86

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Measure%20Foe

Measured Response.name: 黄金律 Measured Response
Measured Response.description:
专长类型：Combat

先决条件：信仰阿巴达尔，基础攻击加值+1

先决条件: 信仰阿巴达尔，基础攻击加值+1。

专长效果: 当你在一次近战或远程攻击时，你可以选择不进行伤害投骰，而是直接取伤害的平均值（向下取整），如同你直接投出了平均值的伤害一样。除此之外，你的其他伤害加值和减值正常计算。

资源出处: Inner Sea Gods pg. 213Faiths of Balance pg. 24

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Measured%20Response

战策增益：你可以在做出一次应用了黄金律的近战或远程攻击之前消耗5点耐力来将这次攻击骰的结果视作10。

战策资源出处: Weapon Master's Handbook pg. 25

Meditation Master.name: 冥想大师 Meditation Master
Meditation Master.description:
专长类型：Meditation

当你完全集中于内在自我，你可以进入一种深度冥想状态来获得对精神与肉体的完美掌握。

专长效果: 当你在休息至少8小时并进行一次至少1小时的冥想后，你会对你的状态有一种近乎全面的特殊理解。在冥想后，你在接下来24小时内的任何一次D20检定中无需动作获得+1洞察加值。这个加值可以应用在检定进行后，但是必须在结果决定前。一旦当天的加值被使用，你不能再次使用，直到你再次休息8小时并进行冥想。

资源出处: Faiths and Philosophies pg. 19

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Meditation%20Master

Meditative Concentration.name: 冥想专注 Meditative Concentration
Meditative Concentration.description:
专长类型：Meditation

冥想会使你的思维清晰，并令你在被干扰时持续专注于你的法术。

先决条件: 感知13，战斗冥想，冥想大师，角色等级5。

专长效果: 在你使用战斗冥想后，持续每角色等级1轮，每当你需要进行一次专注检定来避免失去一个法术或者用于抵抗扰乱心神的强韧检定（例如集群的扰乱心神能力），你的这次检定获得+4加值。如果你在这次检定中使用战斗冥想的效果，那么这个加值会应用到两次检定中。

资源出处: Faiths and Philosophies pg. 19

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Meditative%20Concentration

Medusa's Wrath (Mythic).name: 万蛇出洞(神话) Medusa's Wrath (Mythic)
Medusa's Wrath (Mythic).description:
先决条件：万蛇出洞

你的双臂如同雨点一样击出，汇聚成一次令人震惊的猛击。

神话专长效果：你可以放弃万蛇出洞专长带来的2次额外徒手打击，并以1次使用你的最高基本攻击加值的徒手打击作为替代。若你成功命中你的敌人，它必须成功进行强韧豁免（DC 10 + 1/2你的角色等级 + 你的感知调整值），否则会恍惚（staggered）1轮。当你使用万蛇出洞让敌人恍惚时，能够花费1次神话之力，使恍惚状态的持续时间延长，轮数等同于你的阶层的一半。

资源出处: Mythic Adventures pg. 69

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Medusa's%20Wrath

Menacing Bane.name: 威胁破敌 Menacing Bane
Menacing Bane.description:
当与你的队友群殴一个落单敌人时，你更加致命。

先决条件: 【破敌】职业特性。

专长效果: 你可以选择给一把近战武器灌注〔威胁〕属性而非〔破敌〕属性。你可以用一个迅捷动作让武器在两种特殊属性之间切换。这可以算作是你的破敌能力的另一个使用方法。

特殊说明: 如果你有“双武破敌”专长，你可以选择两把武器分别灌注〔破敌〕还是〔威胁〕。不过同一把武器还是不能同时拥有两种属性。

【附魔速查】威胁（Menacing, APG）：这个能力只能附加在近战武器上。威胁武器帮助同伴夹击敌人。当持有者临近一个被同伴夹击的敌人时，同伴得到的夹击攻击加值额外增加2。该武器持有者即是不是夹击的一员，也同样可以给予同伴该加值。

资源出处: Ultimate Combat pg. 109

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Menacing%20Bane

Mental Derail.name: Mental Derail
Mental Derail.description:
Your logic is so ridiculous it can cause people's brains to shut down in self-defense.

Prerequisites
Goblin.

Benefits
You can shout nonsense as a swift action to throw off an enemy. Choose a single target that can hear you. It must attempt a Will saving throw (DC = 10 + half your level + your Charisma modifier). On a failed save, the target is caught off guard, and it takes a -2 penalty on attack rolls and Strength- and Dexterity-based skill checks until the end of its turn. Whether or not the save is successful, a creature cannot be the target of this ability again for 24 hours. This is a mind-affecting effect.

Mental Stare.name: Mental Stare
Mental Stare.description:
Blind mesmerists have learned to navigate the world without relying on sight and can use their hypnotic stare regardless of their sight level.

Prerequisites
Hypnotic stare class feature.

Benefits
You can use your hypnotic stare ability without relying on sight and do not have to attempt concentration checks to use this ability while blinded.

Merciful Bane.name: 悲悯破敌 Merciful Bane
Merciful Bane.description:
你可以用你的破敌能力造成非致命伤害。

先决条件: 【破敌】职业特性。

专长效果: 当你持有一把附加了〔破敌〕能力的近战武器时，你可以用迅捷动作让武器在造成致命伤害和非致命伤害之间切换。当你的【破敌】能力允许你通过这种方式造成非致命伤害时，你在进行非致命伤害攻击时不会受到任何罚值。

通常状况: 当你使用一把致命武器造成非致命伤害时，你的攻击检定有-4罚值。

资源出处: Ultimate Combat pg. 109

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Merciful%20Bane

Merciful Spell.name: 慈悯法术 Merciful Spell
Merciful Spell.description:
专长类型：Metamagic

你的伤害性法术只会制服敌人，而不会将其杀死。

专长效果: 你能够调整法术，使其造成非致命伤害。造成特定类型伤害的法术（如火焰）所造成的非致命伤害也属于相同的类型。慈悯法术不会占用比法术的实际环级高的法术位。

资源出处: Advanced Players Guide pg. 165

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Merciful%20Spell

Merciful Takedown.name: Merciful Takedown
Merciful Takedown.description:
You are adept at removing your defeated opponents from the fight while avoiding their deaths.

Benefits
When you perform a coup de grace and deal only nonlethal damage, instead of attempting a Fortitude save to avoid death, the target must instead attempt a Fortitude save to avoid falling unconscious for 1 hour. The DC of this save is the same as that of a lethal coup de grace.

Merciless Beating.name: Merciless Beating
Merciless Beating.description:
When you have the numbers on your side, you can lend your strength to the group to give your shared enemy a savage pummeling.

Prerequisites
Int 13, Combat Expertise, Gang Up.

Benefits
Whenever you and two or more allies threaten an opponent, you can choose to forgo your flanking bonus to grant each of your allies a +1 flanking bonus on their attack rolls against the threatened creature. This bonus stacks with any flanking bonuses your allies might already have.

Merciless Butchery.name: 无情杀戮 Merciless Butchery
Merciless Butchery.description:
专长类型：Combat

在他们还没缓过气来之前，你就击杀了对你门户大开的敌人。

先决条件: 慈悯终结（慈悯终结）APG，偷袭+5d6，杀戮目标职业能力。

专长效果: 以一个不会引发借机攻击的标准动作，你可以对一个作为你杀戮目标且处于畏缩，无助或震慑状态的敌人发动致命一击（Coup de Grace）。

资源出处: Advanced Class Guide pg. 152

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Merciless%20Butchery

战策增益：当你使用这个专长时，你可以消耗10点耐力来在CDG中提升你武器的重击倍率一倍（×2变成×3，×3变成×4）

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 127

Merciless Magic.name: Merciless Magic
Merciless Magic.description:
Your spellcasting is strongest against those in peril.

Prerequisites
Ability to cast spells, kobold.

Benefits
The DC to resist your spells increases by 1 for targets that are already afflicted with any of the following conditions: blinded, dying, entangled, exhausted, frightened, helpless, nauseated, panicked, paralyzed, or stunned.

Merciless Precision.name: Merciless Precision
Merciless Precision.description:
You delight and excel in bringing down hobbled targets.

Prerequisites
Sneak attack class feature, kobold.

Benefits
Your sneak attack damage increases by 1d6 against targets that are already aff licted with any of the following conditions: blinded, dying, entangled, exhausted, frightened, helpless, nauseated, panicked, paralyzed, or stunned.

Merciless Rush.name: 横冲直撞 Merciless Rush
Merciless Rush.description:
专长类型：Combat

先决条件：精通冲撞，信仰拉瓦古格

先决条件: 精通冲撞，信仰拉瓦古格。

专长效果: 当你对一个生物发动冲撞战技攻击且你的检定结果超过对方的CMD5点或更多，那么你可以选择直接践踏过目标而非将其击退，在你穿越目标时，你可以对其造成相当于你力量调整值的伤害。

资源出处: Inner Sea Gods pg. 214Faiths of Corruption pg. 25

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Merciless%20Rush

Mesmerizing Feint.name: 摄神虚招 Mesmerizing Feint
Mesmerizing Feint.description:
专长类型：Combat

即便是最缺乏想像力的生物，也会被你那逼真的假动作所引导。

先决条件: 催眠注视（Hypnotic Stare）职业能力。

专长效果: 只要目标是你的催眠注视（Hypnotic Stare）的受术者，那么在使用虚招对抗非类人生物（non-humanoid）时，你仅会受到-2减值；在使用虚招对抗仅具有动物智能（animal intelligence）的生物时，你仅会受到-4减值。若你在唬骗技能上至少投入了10个技能点，且你的虚招目标同时是你的催眠注视的受术者的话，虚招检定在对抗非类人生物以及仅具有动物智能的生物时将不会承受任何减值。

正常：当对一个非类人生物进行虚招检定时，你承受-4减值。对一个只有动物智力水平（1 – 2）的生物使用虚招时，你承受-8减值。

资源出处: Occult Adventures pg. 137

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Mesmerizing%20Feint

Messenger of Fate.name: 命运信使 Messenger of Fate
Messenger of Fate.description:
先决条件：能够施放法术卜筮，信仰法莱斯玛

先决条件: 能够施放法术卜筮，信仰法莱斯玛。

专长效果: 当你施放预言系法术时，你的施法者等级视为+1。如果你施放一个占卜法术揭示未来或有用的信息，这个法术的最大成功率上升到100%而非正常的90%。

资源出处: Inner Sea Gods pg. 214

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Messenger%20of%20Fate

Meta Word Mastery.name: 掌握超魔咒字 Meta Word Mastery
Meta Word Mastery.description:
专长类型：Words of Power

你擅长使用超魔咒字增强你的咒字施法能力。

先决条件: 能够施放咒字法术。

专长效果: 每天你能使用超魔咒字额外3次。此外，选择一个额外的超魔咒字加到你的法术书、魔宠或已知咒字列表中。

资源出处: Ultimate Magic pg. 166

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Meta%20Word%20Mastery

Metallic Wings.name: 金属之翼 Metallic Wings
Metallic Wings.description:
你翅膀上的羽毛是闪闪发亮的金属构成。

先决条件: 天使之血，天使之躯，天使之翼，神裔，角色等级11。

专长效果: 你获得2翼击。这是一种次要天生武器，造成1d4点挥砍伤害（如果你是小体型则1d3）。

【编注：次要天生武器采用BAB-5进行攻击，伤害加值为力量修正一半，并能和武器攻击或主要天生武器同时展开全力攻击。】

资源出处: Advanced Race Guide pg. 88

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Metallic%20Wings

Metamagic Invocation.name: Metamagic Invocation
Metamagic Invocation.description:
You have further refined your combination of elemental power and spellcasting with metamagic techniques.

Prerequisites
Metakinesis class feature.

Benefits
Choose a metamagic feat from the following list: Enlarge Spell, Extend Spell, Intuitive Spell, Logical Spell, Quicken Spell, Reach Spell, or Tenacious SpellUI. When casting a spell via Kinetic Invocation, you can increase its burn cost to augment the spell with that metamagic feat.

The burn cost increase is equal to the spell level increase applied by the feat. Augmenting a spell increases its casting time as if it were cast spontaneously.

Special
You can take this feat more than once. Each time you take this feat, select another metamagic feat; you can augment a spell with multiple feats by accepting additional points of burn equal to the total increased spell level.

Metamagical Synergy.name: Metamagical Synergy
Metamagical Synergy.description:
You and the other members of your coven can weave your spells together to great effect.

Prerequisites
Allied Spellcaster.

Benefits
If all three coven members with this feat cast the same spell in the same round, you can combine your efforts, resolving the spell only on the last member's initiative. The effects of the spell are resolved only once, but the coven can apply one of the following metamagic feats without altering the spell slot used: Empower Spell, Enlarge Spell, Extend Spell, Maximize Spell, or Widen Spell. Casters do not need the appropriate metamagic feat to apply it via this feat. The synergy spell resolves using the caster level, save DC, and other modifiers of the caster of the coven's choice. The spell does not apply other metamagic feats unless all three members included the same feat in their casting. This ability cannot be used if the chosen metamagic feat would normally alter a spell to use a spell slot above 9th level.

Meteor Swing.name: Meteor Swing
Meteor Swing.description:
The power of your blow leaves your enemies reeling.

Prerequisites
Weapon Focus with bludgeoning weapon, base attack bonus +6.

Benefits
As a standard action, make a single attack with your chosen weapon. If the attack hits, the target must succeed at a Reflex save with a DC equal to 10 + your base attack bonus or lose its ability to make attacks of opportunity until the beginning of your next turn. When your base attack bonus reaches +11, you can instead cause the target to lose its Dexterity bonus to AC. When your base attack bonus reaches +16, you can instead cause the target to become flat footed. You can use this feat's benefits only once per minute.

Mighty Bite.name: 碎肉之牙 Mighty Bite
Mighty Bite.description:
专长类型：Combat

你撕开敌人的肌肉，将他的脆弱内脏暴露在你的獠牙之下。

先决条件: 基本攻击加值+6，啮咬攻击，撕裂，巨魔。

专长效果: 如果你通过撕裂特殊攻击伤害了应该生物，在你的下一回合开始前，你的啮咬攻击将会获得18-20的重击威胁范围。本能力通过的重击威胁范围提升不会与其他提升重击威胁范围的效果叠加（比如锋锐武器附魔和精通重击专长）。

资源出处: Monster Codex pg. 224

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Mighty%20Bite

Mighty Boughs.name: Mighty Boughs
Mighty Boughs.description:
Your wings are particularly strong and sprout sharp barbs.

Prerequisites
Str 15, character level 11th, gathlain.

Benefits
You gain two wing attacks. These are secondary natural attacks that deal 1d3 points of slashing damage (or 1d4 if you are Medium).

Mind Strike.name: Mind Strike
Mind Strike.description:
Your sneak attacks strike not only your target's body but also their willpower.

Prerequisites
Ranged legerdemain class feature.

Benefits
Whenever you deal sneak attack damage, you fluster your foe, causing your target to take a penalty on Will saves equal to the number of sneak attack dice you rolled on the attack for 1 round. This penalty does not stack with itself, but each time you deal sneak attack damage to an affected target, the duration is extended by 1 round.

Mindful Meditation.name: Mindful Meditation
Mindful Meditation.description:
You clear your mind of stress and emotion by focusing on calming breathing exercises.

Prerequisites
Wis 11, Meditation Master.

Benefits
For 24 hours after you meditate, you gain a +1 bonus on Will saving throws against charm, compulsion, emotion, and fear effects, and increase the Bluff DC to feint you and the Intimidate DC to demoralize you by +5. These bonuses increase by 1 for every 5 Hit Dice you have to a maximum increase of +4 at 20 Hit Dice.

Mindfulness Mastery.name: Mindfulness Mastery
Mindfulness Mastery.description:
The act of meditation allows you to steel your mind against mental attacks.

Prerequisites
Wis 19, Meditation Master, Mindful Meditation, character level 13th.

Benefits
For 24 hours after you meditate, whenever you fail your saving throw against a charm, compulsion, emotion, or fear effect, you can attempt a new saving throw again 1 round later at the same DC. You get only this one extra chance to succeed at your saving throw.

Minor Miracle.name: Minor Miracle
Minor Miracle.description:
You can call upon your deity for a minor miracle.

Prerequisites
Wis 12, Knowledge (religion) 5 ranks, alignment must match that of your worshiped deity.

Benefits
Choose two domains associated with your deity (if you have access to one or more domains already, the chosen domains can be the same ones you already have access to, or different ones). Once per day, by presenting a holy symbol of your deity and calling out in supplication, you can cast the 1st-level spell associated with either of the two chosen domains as a spell-like ability. You choose which domain's spell you cast at the time you use the ability. Your caster level for this effect is equal to your total Hit Dice, and the saving throw DC, if any, is Charisma-based.

Minor Spell Expertise.name: 次等法术专修 Minor Spell Expertise
Minor Spell Expertise.description:
你能够以类法术能力施放1级法术。

先决条件: 能够施放4环法术。

专长效果: 选择一个你已知的1环法术。你能够每日以类法术能力施放该法术2次。而这个法术取自哪个职业的列表，它的CL就等同于你在该职业上的CL。类法术能力的豁免DC基于魅力。如果该法术需要昂贵的材料或法器成分，它就不能被该专长所选取。你不能将超魔专长应用到该法术上。

特殊说明: 你可以多次选取该专长。它的效果不会叠加。每次选取该专长，它都会应用在一个新的法术上。

资源出处: Advanced Players Guide pg. 165

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Minor%20Spell%20Expertise

Mirror Kin.name: Mirror Kin
Mirror Kin.description:
Combining your cunning with illusion magic makes you and your allies nearly indistinguishable.

Prerequisites
Bluff 8 ranks, gnome, gnome magic racial trait.

Benefits
Whenever you're adjacent to any gnome allies who also have this feat, your appearance and mannerisms change into an amalgam of the features of you and your allies, making you and your allies look exactly alike. Your shapes occasionally appear to blend into each other, making it impossible to distinguish you and granting you and any affected allies a 20% miss chance due to concealment. This is an illusion (figment) effect.

Spells and effects that don't require an attack roll, such as area spells, affect you normally. An attacker must be able to see and reach both you and your ally to be fooled. If you're invisible or the attacker is blind, the feat has no effect. Because this feat relies on the fact that both you and your ally are blending together to create the visual illusion, it doesn't function with effects like the inquisitor's solo tactics class feature; both you and the ally must possess the feat. If you have more than one adjacent ally with this feat, this feat applies to all allies who qualify.

Mirror Move.name: 如影随形 Mirror Move
Mirror Move.description:
专长类型：Combat

通过模仿目标的移动方式，你可以尝试复制他的技巧。

先决条件: 智力13，寓守于攻，BAB+4。

专长效果: 若目标在使用战斗专长时（包括使用动作从战斗专长受益、从战斗专长获得AC攻击伤害骰豁免骰加值），你是唯一一个威胁目标的单位，你可立刻用一个直觉动作获得那个战斗专长的效果，直到你的下一轮结束。你必须满足该专长的所有先决条件。若该专长有每日使用次数限制，比如震慑拳，你使用该种专长的次数都会消耗你如影随形的每日使用次数。如影随影的每日使用次数为每4个等级1次。

资源出处: Melee Tactics Toolbox pg. 7

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Mirror%20Move

战策增益：你可以消耗至多5点耐力来延长如影随形专长的效果，每消耗1点就能延长1轮。

战策资源出处: Armor Master's Handbook pg. 21

Mischievous Tail.name: 调皮用尾巴 Mischievous Tail
Mischievous Tail.description:
你的尾巴似乎拥有自己的想法。

先决条件: 敏捷 15，贪婪之尾，你必须拥有尾巴。

专长效果: 你能使用你的尾巴满足所有目的，如同空手（free hand）一样，但是你不能用他有效地持用武器或盾牌（你仍能用你的尾巴持有物品，只要该物品通常也可以舒适地用手携带）。此外，你在卸武和盗取战技获得+2加值而且不会引起借机攻击，以及在只用你的尾巴的巧手检定获得+2加值。

资源出处: Planar Adventures pg. 30

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Mischievous%20Tail

Misdirection Attack.name: 反击误导 Misdirection Attack
Misdirection Attack.description:
专长类型：Combat

在误导敌人的武器攻击后，你可以进一步反击他。

先决条件: 智力 13，寓守于攻，诈欺师，转向误导，误导战法，唬骗10级。

专长效果: 当你成功使用了误导战法（Misdirection Tactics）专长让1次近战武器攻击失效时，对你作出此次失效攻击的敌人会引起你的借机攻击，即便正常情况下进行全防御动作时不能进行借机攻击，此时你也可以这么做。该专长的效果独立于转向误导（Misdirection Redirection）的效果之外。

资源出处: Ultimate Intrigue pg. 87

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Misdirection%20Attack

Misdirection Redirection.name: 转向误导 Misdirection Redirection
Misdirection Redirection.description:
专长类型：Combat

在误导敌人的武器攻击后，你引导着他打向了其他人。

先决条件: 智力 13，寓守于攻，诈欺师，误导战法，唬骗10级。

专长效果: 当你成功使用了误导战法（Misdirection Tactics）专长让1次近战武器攻击失效时，可以重定向敌人的攻击，引导敌人依照你的选择来攻击其近战触及范围内的其他生物。要处理该次攻击，你的敌人必须对抗新目标做出1次新的攻击检定。

资源出处: Ultimate Intrigue pg. 87

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Misdirection%20Redirection

Misdirection Tactics.name: 误导战法 Misdirection Tactics
Misdirection Tactics.description:
专长类型：Combat

你明白如何使用骗术和身法将敌人的武器攻击带歪。

先决条件: 智力 13，寓守于攻，诈欺师，唬骗4级。

专长效果: 当你使用全防御动作（total defense action）时，若1次近战攻击仍然会超出你的AC（hit your AC），你能以直觉动作（immediate action）尝试1次唬骗检定，DC等同于敌人的攻击检定。若你的检定成功，则会免受到此次攻击（它被视为失手了）。若该次攻击仍旧命中的话，你在24小时内无法再次对相同的敌人使用该专长。

资源出处: Ultimate Intrigue pg. 87

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Misdirection%20Tactics

Missile Shield.name: 盾牌辟矢 Missile Shield
Missile Shield.description:
专长类型：Combat

你擅长使用盾牌偏斜远程攻击。

先决条件: 敏捷13，盾牌专攻。

专长效果: 你必须使用轻型盾牌，重型盾牌或者塔盾才能使用该专长。每轮1次，当你将要被远程武器做出的一次攻击命中时（不包括法术效果，天生武器或者巨大的远程武器），可以使其偏斜，让自身避免该次伤害，就如同你拥有“拨挡飞箭”专长一般。你必须察觉到攻击，并且不处于措手不及状态。

资源出处: Advanced Players Guide pg. 165

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Missile%20Shield

战策增益：只要你在你的耐力池中还有1点耐力，你就能用小圆盾发动这个专长。你可以在措手不及的情况下消耗5点耐力来偏转一支箭矢。但你仍然需要意识到这次攻击。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 127

Missile Shield (Mythic).name: 盾牌辟矢(神话) Missile Shield (Mythic)
Missile Shield (Mythic).description:
先决条件：盾牌辟矢

非凡的意识让你能够偏转复数远程攻击，甚至还能偏转射线法术。

神话专长效果：当你使用盾牌辟矢专长时，每轮你能够偏转额外数量的远程攻击，这个数量等同于你的阶层的一半。你能够以直觉动作花费1点神话之力，以此来偏转以你为目标、来自射线法术或效果的1个射线。

资源出处: Mythic Adventures pg. 69

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Missile%20Shield

Mixed Scales.name: Mixed Scales
Mixed Scales.description:
You have two colors of scales, which mark you as special.

Prerequisites
Draconic Aspect or dragon-scaled racial trait, kobold.

Benefits
Choose an additional color for your Draconic Aspect feat or dragon-scaled racial trait. You gain the benefits of both this color and the color you originally chose. (If you have both Draconic Aspect and dragon-scaled, this benefit applies to both.) If you gain abilities that rely on scale color, choose which color gains the benefits.

Mobile Acrobat.name: Mobile Acrobat
Mobile Acrobat.description:
You harness your acrobatic momentum to quickly propel yourself forward.

Prerequisites
Racial bonus to Dexterity.

Benefits
When attempting an Acrobatics check that would reduce your speed, treat your base speed as 10 feet faster before making speed reductions.

Mobile Bulwark Style.name: 铁壁流 Mobile Bulwark Style
Mobile Bulwark Style.description:
专长类型：CombatStyle

你可以疾风般地挥舞塔盾。

先决条件: 力量13，盾牌专攻，擅长塔盾，BAB+1。

专长效果: 当你持用一面塔盾时，将盾牌的AC加值(包括增强加值)加到你对冲撞和闯越战技的CMD上。开启本流派后，你可以用移动动作使用塔盾制造沿着你所处空间一条边的全掩蔽。

资源出处: Armor Masters Handbook pg. 12

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Mobile%20Bulwark%20Style

Mobile Fortress.name: 铁壁·坚 Mobile Fortress
Mobile Fortress.description:
专长类型：Combat

你可以随时使用塔盾保护自己或盟友。

先决条件: 力量15，铁壁流，盾牌专攻，擅长塔盾，BAB+4。

专长效果: 当你持用一面塔盾时，将一半的盾牌AC加值(包括增强加值)加到你的接触AC上，并且由塔盾造成的对攻击检定的减值仅为-1。开启铁壁流后，每当你使用塔盾制造全掩蔽效果时，对于越过你选取的那条边到来的攻击，你所有邻接盟友均视为有全掩蔽。

资源出处: Armor Masters Handbook pg. 12

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Mobile%20Fortress

Mobile Gathering.name: Mobile Gathering
Mobile Gathering.description:
You can gather elemental energy while walking slowly.

Prerequisites
Kineticist level 7th, kinetic blast class feature.

Benefits
While taking a move action to gather power, you can move up to half your base speed, and while taking 1 full round to gather power, you can move up to half your speed on the turn you begin the full round of gathering power. This movement provokes attacks of opportunity, and you can't use Acrobatics checks or other abilities to attempt to negate them, as you're concentrating on gathering power (nor can you use Acrobatics to balance, jump, or do anything else that requires a skill check). It's harder to concentrate on gathering power while using this feat; if you take damage during or after gathering power and before using a kinetic blast that releases it (including from an attack of opportunity provoked by the movement), the concentration check DC to avoid losing the gathered power increases by twice the blast's effective spell level.

Mobile Stronghold.name: 铁壁·固 Mobile Stronghold
Mobile Stronghold.description:
专长类型：Combat

你能用塔盾格挡魔法攻击。

先决条件: 力量17，铁壁流，铁壁·坚，盾牌专攻，擅长塔盾，BAB+7。

专长效果: 当你持用一面塔盾时，你不会因塔盾的沉重而在攻击检定上承受减值。开启铁壁流后，每当你使用塔盾制造全掩蔽效果时，对于从你选取的那条边过来的法术，你和你所有邻接盟友均视为有部分掩蔽。同时，使用本流派时，你能够用直觉或迅捷动作在对抗一次攻击时获得全掩蔽。

备注：PFS禁用本战斗专长。

资源出处: Armor Masters Handbook pg. 12

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Mobile%20Stronghold

Mobility (Mythic).name: 灵活移动(神话) Mobility (Mythic)
Mobility (Mythic).description:
先决条件：灵活移动

你在战场中反转腾挪的技巧已经炉火纯青，甚至能够巧妙地借助他人攻击的势头走得更远。

神话专长效果：每当你使用灵活移动专长时，你的AC获得+6闪避加值，以取代原本的+4点。此外，每轮1次，当1次因为你的移动而引起的借机攻击没有命中你的时候，你能够以自由动作移动5尺。这次移动不会算在该轮内的总移动距离内，不过它仍会引起借机攻击。

资源出处: Mythic Adventures pg. 69

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Mobility

Mocking Dance.name: 嘲弄舞步 Mocking Dance
Mocking Dance.description:
专长类型：CombatPerformance

你跳了一小段滑稽舞来挑衅对手并娱乐大众。

先决条件: 特技4级或表演（舞蹈）4级。

专长效果: 当你以迅捷动作进行演武检定时，你可以在检定前不受借机攻击移动5尺，或以正常速度移动并引发借机攻击。你不能停在可以威胁到对手的地方。若你至少移动了5尺，你的演武检定+2。

资源出处: Ultimate Combat pg. 110

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Mocking%20Dance

战策增益：当你使用这个专长时，你可以消耗5点耐力来移动至多你一半的速度（而不是只能5尺）而不会引发借机攻击。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 127

Modification Master.name: Modification Master
Modification Master.description:
You can create inconceivable bastardizations of the smith's art.

Prerequisites
Creative Armorsmith, Armor Adept, and Craft (armor) 7 ranks, or Creative Weaponsmith, Weapon Adept, and Craft (weapons) 7 ranks; Knowledge (engineering) 7 ranks.

Benefits
You can use Creative Armorsmith or Creative Weaponsmith to add a modification to a weapon or suit of armor that already has a modification. The modification you are adding must be one that you have selected with Armor Adept or Weapon Adept. In addition, others can use armor or weapons with your temporary modifications.

Modification Trainer.name: Modification Trainer
Modification Trainer.description:
You can drill others in the use of modified weapons or armor.

Prerequisites
Cha 13, Armor Adept or Weapon Adept, fighter level 4th.

Benefits
Choose a modification that you have selected with the Armor Adept or Weapon Adept feat. Once per day with 10 minutes of drilling, you can instruct a number of allies equal to your Charisma modifier in the use of that modification. The allies to be trained must have an Intelligence of at least 3. The instructed allies gain the benefit of Armor Adept or Weapon Adept with that modification for 8 hours.

Modified Weapon Proficiency.name: Modified Weapon Proficiency
Modified Weapon Proficiency.description:
You know how to use a specific weapon skillfully, even when it has undergone modification.

Prerequisites
Proficiency with the selected weapon.

Benefits
Select one type of weapon, such as longsword. You are always considered to be proficient with modified weapons of that type.

Normal
A modified weapon is treated as one category more difficult to wield.

Special
A warpriest with the focus weapon class feature can gain this feat with his deity's favored weapon in place of his bonus Weapon Focus feat. A magus with the kensai archetype can gain this feat with his chosen weapon in place of his bonus Weapon Focus feat.

Monastic Legacy.name: 修道传承 Monastic Legacy
Monastic Legacy.description:
专长类型：Combat

即使投身旁门，你也不曾荒废武学的修炼。

先决条件: 【心如止水】职业特性，精通徒手打击。

专长效果: 在计算你的基础徒手打击伤害时，将你所有其他职业等级总和的一半计入你的武僧等级。这个专长加算的等级不会让你在获得其他武僧职业能力时获得好处。

资源出处: Ultimate Combat pg. 109

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Monastic%20Legacy

战策增益：在你回合开始时，你可以消耗5点耐力来使用你全部的等级来在决定你的徒手击打伤害时作为你的有效武僧等级。这种提升将会持续到你的下一轮开始。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 127

Monastic Legacy (Mythic).name: 修道传承(神话) Monastic Legacy (Mythic)
Monastic Legacy (Mythic).description:
先决条件：修道传承

每一份全新的体验都会让你曾经遵循的修业之道更上一层楼。

神话专长效果：在确定武僧AC加值能力的有效武僧等级时，将你所有其他职业等级总和的一半计入你的武僧等级。以自由动作，你能够花费1次神话之力，以此将你的阶层的一半加到有效武僧等级上，来确定你的基本徒手打击伤害与AC加值，该效果持续至你的下一回合开始为止。

资源出处: Mythic Adventures pg. 69

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Monastic%20Legacy

Monitor Obedience.name: Monitor Obedience
Monitor Obedience.description:
Your daily prayer and minor sacrifices to a particular monitor demigod grant you special boons.

Prerequisites
Knowledge (planes) 3 ranks, must worship a monitor demigod.

Benefits
Each monitor demigod requires a different obedience, but all obediences take only 1 hour to perform. Once you've performed the obedience, you gain the benefit of a special ability or resistance as indicated in the Obedience entry for the demigod.

If you have at least 12 Hit Dice, you also gain the first boon granted by your monitor demigod upon undertaking your obedience. If you have at least 16 Hit Dice, you also gain the monitor demigod's second boon. If you have 20 Hit Dice or more, you also gain the monitor demigod's third boon. Unless a boon lists a specific duration or number of uses per day, its effects are constant.

If you ever fail to perform a daily obedience, you lose access to the benefits and boons granted by this feat until you next perform the obedience.

Monkey Lunge.name: 灵猴突刺 Monkey Lunge
Monkey Lunge.description:
专长类型：Combat

你可以快速调整你的步伐，让你免受反击。

先决条件: 突刺专长，特技动作1级。

专长效果: 以一个标准动作发动攻击，你可以使用突刺专长在你的回合结束之前增加你的可触距离五尺，而不需承受AC减值。你不能在中载或重载的时候使用此专长。

正常情况：使用突刺专长将使你承受-2AC的惩罚。

资源出处: Sargava, the Lost Colony pg. 24

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Monkey%20Lunge

Monkey Moves.name: 猿步 Monkey Moves
Monkey Moves.description:
专长类型：Combat

你从诡异的角度攻击，令敌人防不胜防。

先决条件: 感知13，精通徒手打击，猴拳，特技8级，攀爬8级。

专长效果: 当你处于猴拳流派架势时，你获得以下好处：你可以将你的感知修正加到攀爬检定上。你可以用半速攀爬或匍匐前进。你可以用跳跃，匍匐前进或攀爬来进行五尺快步。当你进行攀爬时，你保留AC上的敏捷加值。如果在你的回合你成功用徒手击打命中一个敌人两次以上，就算你之前进行过移动，也能以一个迅捷动作做一次五尺快步。

通常状况: 你的爬行速度为你移动速度的1/4。在攀爬中你失去敏捷的AC加值。五尺快步只能用你通常的移动方式进行，且你只能在该轮没移动过的情况下使用五尺快步。

资源出处: Ultimate Combat pg. 109

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Monkey%20Moves

战策增益：在你回合开始时，你可以消耗5点耐力来获得等同于你陆地速度的攀爬速度，直到你的下一回合开始。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 127

Monkey Shine.name: 猿搏 Monkey Shine
Monkey Shine.description:
专长类型：Combat

结合特技与取巧，你向敌人发动攻势。

先决条件: 感知13，精通徒手打击，猿步，猴拳，震慑拳，特技11级，攀爬11级。

专长效果: 当你使用猴拳流派架势时，你成功施展“震慑拳”后，作为震慑拳的额外效果，你可以不引发借机攻击地用一个自由动作进入你邻接的一个被敌人占据的格子。当你处于目标的方格中时，你对抗这个敌人的近战攻击时AC能获得+4闪避加值，并在近战攻击检定获得+4加值。除非被阻碍，否则对手依旧能离开你的方格，但会引发你的借机攻击，即使他采取不会引发借机攻击的移动方法。

通常状况: 你不能进入敌人的方格。

资源出处: Ultimate Combat pg. 110

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Monkey%20Shine

战策增益：在你使用这个专长进入一个对手的空间时，如果这个对手远离了你，你可以消耗耐力点来和他一起移动。每移动5尺你需要消耗2点耐力。如果你和对手一起移动，他不会引发你的借机攻击，但你也不会因为这种方式移动而引发借机攻击。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 127

Monkey Style.name: 猴拳 Monkey Style
Monkey Style.description:
专长类型：CombatStyle

你的徒手攻击灵巧难测，滚地和跃步动作接连不断。

先决条件: 感知13，精通徒手击打，特技5级，攀爬5级。

专长效果: 你可以将你的感知修正加到特技检定上。当你使用猴拳流派架势并处于俯卧状态时，你不会在俯卧时受到近战攻击检定和近战AC的罚值，而且你匍匐前进与俯卧状态中站立都不会引发借机攻击。如果你成功通过一个DC为20的特技检定，你可以用一个迅捷动作站起来。

通常状况: 你在俯卧时在近战攻击检定与近战AC上受-4罚值。从俯卧状态中站立是一个会引发借机攻击的标准动作。【编注：此处胡说。核心手册说明了从俯卧中站立是一个会引发借机攻击的移动动作。】

资源出处: Ultimate Combat pg. 110

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Monkey%20Style

战策增益：当你使用这个专长时，你可以消耗2点耐力来以一个迅捷动作起身。而不需要成功通过一个DC20的特技检定。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 127

Monster Spotter.name: Monster Spotter
Monster Spotter.description:
Your knowledge of strange life forms makes you adept at piercing their disguises and detecting their hiding places.

Prerequisites
Skill Focus (Knowledge [any]), Knowledge (any) 3 ranks.

Benefits
You can substitute a Knowledge skill for opposed Perception checks against creatures' Disguise and Stealth checks, and for Survival checks to track creatures. You must have 3 ranks in the Knowledge skill that corresponds to the creature's type .

Monstrous Companion.name: Monstrous Companion
Monstrous Companion.description:
You have formed a bond with a creature far more exotic than an animal.

Prerequisites
Handle Animal 7 ranks; class feature that functions as the druid animal companion ability (including animal companion, divine bond [mount], hunter's bond [animal companion], nature's bond [animal companion], and the mount class feature) with an effective druid level of 7.

Benefits
You can select a magical beast as a cohort in place of your animal companion class feature (for more information on monster cohorts see Bestiary 316). The following chart determines the effective cohort level for your monstrous companion based on your effective druid level.

Effective Druid LevelEffective Cohort Level
74
85
96
106
116
127
138
149
159
169
1710
1811
1911
2012

If the magical beast's effective cohort level is lower than what is allowed by your effective druid level, the cohort gains class levels equal to the difference. A cohort with 1 class level gains the link and share spells abilities of an animal companion. A cohort with 3 class levels gains the evasion animal companion ability. A cohort with 6 class levels gains the devotion animal companion ability. If the class feature you use as a prerequisite for this feat does not grant one of those abilities (such as a cavalier's mount, which does not gain share spells), your monstrous mount also does not gain the ability. The magical beast does not gain any abilities not listed here.

In addition to the magical beasts listed in the Bestial Cohorts sidebar, this feat can be used to gain an ahuizotl, aranea, blink dog, dragon horse, dragonne, giant eagle, giant owl, giant vulture, griffon, kirin, leucrotta, manticore, pegasus, sea cat, shedu, sleipnir, worg, or xanthos. The rules for using each of these creatures as a monster cohort are presented in the appendices of their respective Pathfinder RPG Bestiary volumes.

Special
This feat counts as the Leadership feat for the purposes of prerequisites. A character cannot have both Leadership and Monstrous Companion.

Monstrous Disguise.name: Monstrous Disguise
Monstrous Disguise.description:
You can disguise yourself as a monstrous humanoid.

Prerequisites
Disguise 5 ranks, Knowledge (nature) 5 ranks.

Benefits
You can use the Disguise skill to emulate creatures of the monstrous humanoid type, at a -5 penalty. Creating a monstrous humanoid disguise takes 1d3 hours.

Monstrous Mask.name: Monstrous Mask
Monstrous Mask.description:
Your fiendish physical traits give you a twisted and fearsome appearance that strikes fear into others' hearts.

Prerequisites
Tiefling, must be taken at 1st level.

Benefits
You get a +5 racial bonus on Intimidate checks made against all creatures of the humanoid type.

Monstrous Masquerade.name: Monstrous Masquerade
Monstrous Masquerade.description:
When you disguise yourself as a monstrous humanoid, you can gain some of its qualities.

Prerequisites
Monstrous Disguise, Disguise 9 ranks, Knowledge (nature) 9 ranks.

Benefits
When you use the Monstrous Disguise feat to assume the shape of a monstrous humanoid, you can gain a rudimentary version of one of that creature's abilities selected from the following list: climb 10 feet, fly 20 feet (clumsy maneuverability), swim 20 feet, damage reduction 3/magic, or resistance 5 to one energy type. Preparing a disguise in this way takes 1 additional hour and costs an extra 500 gp. The bonus ability granted by this feat has a 25% chance to cease functioning every hour after you apply the disguise. This disguise automatically falls apart after 8 hours.

Monstrous Mount.name: 怪物坐骑 Monstrous Mount
Monstrous Mount.description:
你学会了如何驯服并骑乘那些奇特猛兽的技巧。

先决条件: 驯养动物4级，骑术4级，有效德鲁伊等级4级的神契坐骑（divine bond mount）、猎手羁绊动物伙伴（hunter’s bond animal companion）或坐骑（mount）职业能力。

专长效果: 你能够从怪物坐骑列表中选择一只奇特猛兽来做你的动物伙伴或特殊坐骑。你可以按照本专长先决条件里的职业能力的描述，使用与坐骑和动物伙伴相同的方式来获取和进化怪物坐骑。你也能够按照职业能力中描述的那样遣散怪物坐骑。

你必须满足额外的先决条件才能选择智力属性为3或更高的生物作为怪物坐骑，详细要求标注在每个生物的说明中。

资源出处: Inner Sea Combat pg. 14

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Monstrous%20Mount

Monstrous Mount Mastery.name: 精熟怪物坐骑 Monstrous Mount Mastery
Monstrous Mount Mastery.description:
你的怪物坐骑掌握了那些只有野生同类才能拥有的能力。

先决条件: 怪物坐骑，角色等级大于或等于坐骑的精熟要求中列出的等级。

专长效果: 你的怪物坐骑会获得其属性中标注为“精熟”一栏的能力与加值。你的等级必须至少与该栏标示的等级相同才能使用这些能力，因此如果你遣散一只怪物坐骑并更换不同种的新坐骑的话，尽管你可能会保留该专长，但是你的等级未必足够获取新坐骑的精熟一栏所带来的好处。

通常状况: 怪物坐骑无论如何成长都无法使用自身的精熟能力。

资源出处: Inner Sea Combat pg. 14

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Monstrous%20Mount%20Mastery

Monument Builder.name: 不朽巨匠 Monument Builder
Monument Builder.description:
专长类型：Story

你空前绝后的建筑天赋当令你的名字不朽。

先决条件: 知识（工程）1级，并且你必须建造过1幢价值5000GP以上的建筑物。

专长效果: 当你监管建筑工程或自行施工建造时，原料成本降低10%。你的知识（工程）检定+2。如果你在知识（工程）技能受训10级以上，该加值升至+4。

专长目标: 设计并建造1幢价值100000GP以上、并且极具你个人风格的建筑物。举例而言，你可能在你所信仰的神祇神庙遗址上建造起新的宏伟神殿，或者建起供学生们研究宇宙奥秘的学院等。

完成收益: 你过去和未来所建造的所有建筑物（包括你用来达到专长目标的那幢）由于你的名望散播而使价值上升10%。此外，在你监管建筑工程时，在限定时间以内完成的进度将为正常水平的双倍。

资源出处: Ultimate Campaign pg. 71

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Monument%20Builder

Moonlight Stalker.name: 月夜伏击者 Moonlight Stalker
Moonlight Stalker.description:
专长类型：Combat

你善于利用阴影来隐藏自己的攻击。

先决条件: 智力13，盲斗，寓守于攻，唬骗3级，【黑暗视觉】或【昏暗视觉】种族特性。

专长效果: 当你对一个对手获得隐蔽，你对其的攻击检定和伤害骰有+2加值。

资源出处: Ultimate Combat pg. 110

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Moonlight%20Stalker

战策增益：当你对一个对手有全隐蔽时，你可以消耗2点耐力来将你在这个专长所获得的攻击和伤害骰上的加值提升到+4。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 127

Moonlight Stalker Feint.name: 月夜虚招 Moonlight Stalker Feint
Moonlight Stalker Feint.description:
专长类型：Combat

你的攻击自阴影中而来，对手全然无法反应。

先决条件: 智力13，盲斗，寓守于攻，精通虚招，月夜伏击者，唬骗6级，【黑暗视觉】或【昏暗视觉】种族特性。

专长效果: 每轮一次，当你对一个对手获得隐蔽，你可以用迅捷动作对其进行一次虚招。

通常状况: 使用虚招是一个标准动作。

资源出处: Ultimate Combat pg. 110

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Moonlight%20Stalker%20Feint

战策增益：当你尝试一个唬骗检定来对一个你对其拥有隐蔽的对手进行虚招时，你可以消耗至多5点耐力来在唬骗检定上获得加值，等于你消耗耐力的两倍。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 127

Moonlight Stalker Master.name: 月夜伏击大师 Moonlight Stalker Master
Moonlight Stalker Master.description:
专长类型：Combat

你挥一挥衣袖，自黑暗中飘然而去，任由对手在原地胡乱挥打。

先决条件: 智力13，盲斗，寓守于攻，精通虚招，月夜伏击者，月夜虚招，唬骗9级，【黑暗视觉】或【昏暗视觉】种族特性。

专长效果: 当你对一个对手获得隐蔽，他对你的失手率增加10%。如果一个对手因为你的隐蔽而对你攻击失手，你可以用直觉动作移动5尺。这次移动不会触发借机攻击，也不会计入五尺快步。

资源出处: Ultimate Combat pg. 110

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Moonlight%20Stalker%20Master

战策增益：当你在拥有隐蔽时，一个对手对你做出了攻击，你可以消耗5点耐力来将这次命中的失手率提升额外的20%。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 127

Moonlight Summons.name: 月光召唤 Moonlight Summons
Moonlight Summons.description:
你所召唤的仆从被注入了月亮的力量。

先决条件: 法术专攻（咒法系），能够施展‘召唤自然盟友’。

专长效果: 你所召唤的生物如同被施展了‘光亮术’一般散发着光芒。它们免疫困惑和睡眠效果，并且其天生武器在克服伤害减免时被视为银。

资源出处: Ultimate Magic pg. 153

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Moonlight%20Summons

Moontouched.name: Moontouched
Moontouched.description:
Moonlight has a strange effect on you, making your body stronger but your mind weaker.

Benefits
At night when at least part of the moon is showing and you can see it, you gain a +2 bonus on Fortitude and Reflex saves but take a -2 penalty on Will saves.

Morrigna's Wrappings.name: Morrigna's Wrappings
Morrigna's Wrappings.description:
One of the Boneyard's psychopomp bounty hunters has taught you the trick of using spider webs to defend against the undead.

Prerequisites
Character level 9th, duskwalker, ward against corruption racial trait.

Benefits
So long as you have a spider web wrapped around some part of your body, the bonus provided by your ward against corruption racial trait increases to +4.

Mother's Gift.name: 母亲赠礼 Mother's Gift
Mother's Gift.description:
你从鬼婆母亲那里继承了特殊的礼物。

先决条件: 替换儿。

专长效果: 你获得的黑暗馈赠由下列方式体现出来。当你选择该专长时选择其表现形式，一旦选定则无法改变。

鬼婆之爪（Hag Claws, Ex）：爪抓的攻击检定以及伤害检定获得+1加值。

骇人强韧（Surprisingly Tough, Ex）：你的天生防御加值增加1点。

神秘抗力（Uncanny Resistance, Su）：你获得等同于“6+角色等级”的法术抗力。

特殊说明: 你可以选择该专长至多3次。其效果无法叠加。每次获得专长时，你必须选择不同的表现形式。

资源出处: Advanced Race Guide pg. 185

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Mother's%20Gift

Motivated March.name: 监军 Motivated March
Motivated March.description:
靠着一顿皮鞭或呵斥，作为经验丰富的军官，你可以驱赶自己的奴隶或部下拼老命进行强行军。

专长效果: 当进行大陆移动（Overland Movement）时，你可以是让多等同于你的人物等级x10数量的盟友在因为强行军而承受非致命伤害时只承受一半伤害。除此之外，这些生物在强行军是可以延迟进入疲乏状态的时间，最多相当于你的魅力调整值个小时（至少1小时）。但是，这些生物在延迟疲乏以后，他们在强行军结束时会陷入力竭而非疲乏。

资源出处: Monster Codex pg. 117

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Motivated%20March

Motivating Display.name: Motivating Display
Motivating Display.description:
You can empower your allies through their fear of you.

Prerequisites
Cha 13, Dazzling Display, Weapon Focus.

Benefits
Whenever you use Dazzling Display to demoralize foes, you can motivate your allies to better serve you. In addition to possibly demoralizing foes within 30 feet, your Intimidate check while using Dazzling Display also applies to allies within 30 feet who can see you. The DC for this effect is the same as it would be to demoralize your allies. Each ally so affected gains a +1 morale bonus on attack rolls and skill checks for the duration that it would normally be shaken.

Mountain Eyes.name: Mountain Eyes
Mountain Eyes.description:
Your gaze cuts through vapors with ease.

Prerequisites
Blind-Fight, Perception 5 ranks.

Benefits
You ignore concealment (but not total concealment) caused by fog, rain, smoke, wind, and other gases or weather effects (including magical effects like obscuring mist), and you ignore up to -4 in penalties on Perception checks from such effects. You treat total concealment resulting from any such gas or weather effects within 10 feet of you as concealment (20% miss chance).

Mountain-Splitting Strike.name: Mountain-Splitting Strike
Mountain-Splitting Strike.description:
You have learned techniques to focus the force of an unarmed strike into the most vulnerable parts of a large opponent's anatomy.

Prerequisites
Wis 13, Improved Unarmed Strike.

Benefits
When you make a charge attack against an opponent at least one size category larger than you, your unarmed attacks deal damage as though you were one size category larger. In addition, you gain a +2 bonus to the DC of any Stunning Fist effect you deliver with this charge attack.

Mountaineer.name: Mountaineer
Mountaineer.description:
You are thoroughly at home in the high peaks and precipices of alpine territory.

Prerequisites
Favored terrain (mountains) class feature.

Benefits
You gain a +2 bonus on Climb checks on natural stone surfaces and a +4 bonus on Fortitude saves to avoid high-altitude fatigue and altitude sickness. If you spend 24 hours at a dangerous altitude, you treat that altitude as if it were one category lower. If you spend at least 1 week at that altitude, you are immune to altitude fatigue or sickness. If you go to a lower altitude for more than 1 week, you lose this acclimation.

Mounted Archery (Mythic).name: 骑乘射击(神话) Mounted Archery (Mythic)
Mounted Archery (Mythic).description:
先决条件：骑乘射击

你那精湛的骑术使自身能够在隐藏起来的同时进行精准的射击。

神话专长效果：当你使用骑术技能来将坐骑作为掩蔽（cover）使用时，你仍旧能够以标准动作使用远程武器进行单次攻击。当你的坐骑移动时，你能够花费1次神话之力，以此来使骑乘时进行远程武器攻击的减值无效，该效果持续至你的下一回合开始为止。

资源出处: Mythic Adventures pg. 69

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Mounted%20Archery

Mounted Blade.name: Mounted Blade
Mounted Blade.description:
You can use the momentum of your mount to carry your weapon through one foe and into another.

Prerequisites
Mounted Combat, Ride-By Attack, Ride 3 ranks.

Benefits
When you use the Ride-By Attack feat, if your attack hits, you can also make an attack against a target adjacent to your original target. You take a -5 penalty on this additional attack, which does not benefit from any effects of a charge.

Mounted Combat (Mythic).name: 骑乘战斗(神话) Mounted Combat (Mythic)
Mounted Combat (Mythic).description:
先决条件：骑乘战斗

经过严苛战斗的考验，你在驱策坐骑的能力上已经盖世无双。

神话专长效果：每轮你能使数量等同于你的阶层次命中你的坐骑的攻击无效化。每轮1次以直觉动作，你能够花费1次神话之力，以此使用你的骑术检定替代1次你的坐骑必须进行的反射豁免检定。

资源出处: Mythic Adventures pg. 70

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Mounted%20Combat

Mounted Onslaught.name: Mounted Onslaught
Mounted Onslaught.description:
You and your mount can shatter an enemys line with your unyielding assault.

Prerequisites
Mounted Combat, Trample, Ride 5 ranks.

Benefits
On your turn, you can overrun more than one creature. Each overrun combat maneuver check beyond the first takes a cumulative -5 penalty. If you fail to overrun a target, your movement ends. Your mount can make only a single hoof attack against one target that is knocked prone by your overrun (not one per prone opponent).

Normal
You can perform only one overrun combat maneuver per round.

Mounted Shield.name: 骑乘盾牌防御 Mounted Shield
Mounted Shield.description:
专长类型：Combat

你的防御技巧可以同时应用到自身和坐骑上。

先决条件: 骑乘战斗，盾牌专攻。

专长效果: 你可以将你的基本盾牌加值（包括由盾牌专攻获得的加值，但是不包括增强加值）加到你的坐骑的AC上。此外，当你使用“骑乘战斗”专长，能够将这个加值加到用于避免你的坐骑受到攻击的骑术检定上。

资源出处: Advanced Players Guide pg. 165

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Mounted%20Shield

战策增益：只要你的耐力池中还有1点耐力，你就能将你盾牌上的增强加值加到坐骑的AC上。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 127

Mounted Skirmisher.name: 骑乘散兵 Mounted Skirmisher
Mounted Skirmisher.description:
专长类型：Combat

你擅长在快速移动的马背上进行攻击。

先决条件: 骑术14级，骑乘战斗，骑乘技巧。

专长效果: 如果你的坐骑移动的距离等同于自身速度或更少时，你仍旧可以进行全力攻击动作。

通常状况: 如果你的坐骑移动距离超过5尺，那么你就只能进行普通的攻击动作。

资源出处: Advanced Players Guide pg. 165

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Mounted%20Skirmisher

战策增益：当你的坐骑移动的距离小于它的速度时，你可以消耗5点耐力来鞭策它移动额外10尺。这是额外的移动，你在坐骑使用了这个额外的移动后也能做出全力攻击。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 127

Mud in Your Eye.name: Mud in Your Eye
Mud in Your Eye.description:
You are used to fighting in muck and slime, and happily hurl it in your foes' eyes in the heat of battle.

Prerequisites
Throw Anything.

Benefits
As a standard action when in urban or subterranean terrain, you can scoop filth, sewage, mud, or similar grime off a nearby surface and hurl it at a foe as a ranged touch attack with a range increment of 5 feet. If the attack hits, you can immediately attempt a dirty trick combat maneuver against the target as a free action; this dirty trick can be used only to blind the target. As a ranged touch attack, this action provokes attacks of opportunity, even if your dirty trick attempts normally wouldn't provoke such attacks (such as via the Improved Dirty Trick feat).

Special
A character with favored terrain (as the ranger class feature) can use this feat when in any of his favored terrains in addition to urban and subterranean.

Muddled Morals.name: Muddled Morals
Muddled Morals.description:
Your conviction is strong... unless you've had a few drinks.

Benefits
You gain a +2 bonus on saving throws against effects that affect you based on your alignment. In addition, choose an alignment one step away from your true alignment; when you are drunk (or worse), spells and other effects affect you as if this alignment were your alignment.

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击 Multiattack
Multiattack.description:
专长类型：CombatMonster

这个生物精于利用自己的天生武器进行攻击。

先决条件: 三次或更多天生武器攻击。

专长效果: 生物的次要天生武器攻击仅在攻击上承受-2减值。

通常状况: 若无此专长支持，生物的次要天生武器攻击在攻击投骰上将承受-5减值。

资源出处: Pathfinder RPG Bestiary pg. 315

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Multiattack

Multitalented Mastery.name: 文武全能 Multitalented Mastery
Multitalented Mastery.description:
你精熟于众多学科。

先决条件: 角色等级5，半精灵，【多才多艺】种族特性。

专长效果: 你所拥有的所有职业均被视为天赋职业。每当你在任何职业上获得等级时，均可以获得HP+1或者技能点+1的奖励。所有未曾获得这些加值之一的职业等级也能够追授这些加值。

通常状况: 拥有【多才多艺】种族特性的半精灵拥有两个天赋职业。

资源出处: Advanced Race Guide pg. 47

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Multitalented%20Mastery

Multiweapon Defense.name: Multiweapon Defense
Multiweapon Defense.description:
You sacrifice attacks to parry blows.

Prerequisites
Three or more arms, Dex 21

Benefits
When you make a full-attack action, you may choose not to take an attack with a number of your wielded weapons other than your primary weapon. For each attack you forgo, you gain a +1 shield bonus to your AC for that round. This bonus stacks with itself to a maximum bonus of +5, but not with shield bonuses to AC from other sources.

Multiweapon Fighting.name: 多重武器战斗 Multiweapon Fighting
Multiweapon Fighting.description:
专长类型：CombatMonster

这个生物擅于利用自己的多条手臂挥舞武器。

先决条件: 敏捷13，拥有三条或更多手臂。

专长效果: 在持用多件武器战斗时，你在主手武器上受到的攻击检定减值减少2点，副手武器攻击检定上的减值减少6点。

特殊说明: 如果该生物的手多于两只，那么此专长对该生物而言取代“双武器格斗”专长。

通常状况: 若无此专长支持，生物在使用多武器战斗时，在主手武器上的攻击检定承受-6减值，副手武器上的攻击检定承受-10减值（该生物只有一只手视为主手，其他手皆视为副手）。更多信息请查看双武器战斗规则。

资源出处: Pathfinder RPG Bestiary pg. 315

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Multiweapon%20Fighting

Multiweapon Specialist.name: Multiweapon Specialist
Multiweapon Specialist.description:
You gain bonuses on damage when you wield identical one-handed weapons.

Prerequisites
Three or more arms, Dex 21

Benefits
When you wield one-handed or light weapons in each of your arms, and all of those weapons belong to the same weapon group (as defined for the fighter class), all attacks with those weapons gain a +2 bonus on damage rolls.

Murderer's Circle.name: 杀戮回旋 Murderer's Circle
Murderer's Circle.description:
专长类型：CombatPerformance

凶猛地攻击敌人之后，你如同随时准备杀死猎物的猎手般在旁环绕。

先决条件: 闪避，特技5级。

专长效果: 在发动了一次重击或战技后以迅捷动作进行演武检定、并与重击或战技的目标相邻时，你能够不引发借机攻击地移动到与其相邻的任意位置。你必须有着明确的路线，并能通过一个移动动作到达目的地。如果你在不同于起点的任何位置停下，你的演武检定+2。

资源出处: Ultimate Combat pg. 111

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Murderer's%20Circle

战策增益：你可以消耗2点耐力来在造成最大伤害或者成功对一个生物进行虚招后使用这个专长。你必须邻接该生物。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 127

Murderous Sniper.name: Murderous Sniper
Murderous Sniper.description:
Your study of death allows you to pinpoint weaknesses from afar.

Prerequisites
Death attack class feature.

Benefits
You can make a death attack using a ranged weapon. Your target must be within 30 feet when attempting the death attack. For every additional round you spend studying the target, you can extend the range from which you can make a ranged death attack by 10 feet.

Murky Spell.name: Murky Spell
Murky Spell.description:
You can call upon murky sediments in the water to transform a mist spell underwater.

Benefits
You can apply Murky Spell only to a mist or fog spell that normally doesn't work underwater, such as cloudkill, fog cloud, mind fog, obscuring mist, or solid fog. When cast underwater, a murky spell clouds the water with sediments, producing roughly the same effects as the normal spell would above water except as follows. Due to the dilution, a murky spell has only one-tenth of the duration of a normal spell (generally 1 minute per level, though mind fog lasts 3 minutes), but this reduction doesn't affect the duration of secondary effects like mind fog's mental penalties. Abilities that see through mist and fog can't see through a murky spell unless they also specifically see through murky water (like the mistsight universal monster rule). Instead of wind, currents can disperse a murky spell; any current with a speed of at least 10 feet disperses a murky spell in 1 round. A murky spell has no effect above the water. A murky spell uses up a slot the same spell level as the spell's actual level.

Murmurs of Earth.name: 大地的低语 Murmurs of Earth
Murmurs of Earth.description:
在你的感知之下，大地将她的所知倾囊相授。

先决条件: 石之共鸣，角色等级9，土元素裔。

专长效果: 你获得了有限的颤动感知。以一个移动动作，你可以感知到15尺范围内所有接触地面的生物。

资源出处: Advanced Race Guide pg. 147

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Murmurs%20of%20Earth

Musketeer's Daring.name: Musketeer's Daring
Musketeer's Daring.description:
The more you dare, the greater the results of your deeds.

Prerequisites
Dex 15, derring-do deed, swashbuckler level 6th.

Benefits
If the result of your d6 roll is a natural 5 or 6 when using the derring-do deed, you can roll another d6 and add it to the Acrobatics, Climb, Escape Artist, Fly, Ride, or Swim check that the deed modifies. The number of d6s you roll is still limited to a number equal to your Dexterity modifier (minimum 1), and you can roll another d6 after a natural roll of 5 or 6 only once per use of derring-do.

Normal
You can roll further derring-do d6s only if you roll a natural 6 on the die.

Musketeer's Dodge.name: 火枪手闪避 Musketeer's Dodge
Musketeer's Dodge.description:
专长类型：CombatGrit

你比大多数人更善于躲避远程攻击。

先决条件: 异种武器擅长（火器），枪手3级，枪手闪避炫技。

专长效果: 当你使用枪手闪避炫技进行移动时，该炫技提供的移动不会引发借机攻击，且你在AC上获得+4闪避加值。

资源出处: Villain Codex pg. 56

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Musketeer's%20Dodge

Musketeer's Reposition.name: 火枪手换位 Musketeer's Reposition
Musketeer's Reposition.description:
专长类型：CombatGrit

你可以用手中的双手火器击退敌人。

先决条件: 异种武器擅长（火器），枪手6级，枪柄抽击炫技。

专长效果: 当你使用枪柄抽击炫技并以双手火器命中敌人时，你可以不击倒目标，而是改为进行换位战技。不过，你不能将敌人换位到更接近你的位置上。此战技不会引发借机攻击。

资源出处: Villain Codex pg. 56

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Musketeer's%20Reposition

Musketeer's Sidestep.name: Musketeer's Sidestep
Musketeer's Sidestep.description:
You're able to dodge attacks with increased panache.

Prerequisites
Dodging panache deed, swashbuckler level 3rd.

Benefits
When you use the dodging panache deed, the movement granted by that deed does not provoke attacks of opportunity from any creature, and you gain a +2 dodge bonus to your Armor Class.

Mutated Shape.name: Mutated Shape
Mutated Shape.description:
Your wild shape form gains an additional appendage you can use to attack your foes.

Prerequisites
Wis 19, base attack bonus +6, wild shape class feature.

Benefits
When you use wild shape, you grow an additional appendage of your choice that can be used to make one of the following attacks: bite, claw, gore, slam, sting, or talons. The appendage can be used as part of a full attack using your highest base attack bonus, and it deals damage as described in Table 3-2: Mutated Shape Appendage Attacks. This appendage lasts for as long as you stay in the same form with this use of wild shape.

Mutilating Ritualist.name: Mutilating Ritualist
Mutilating Ritualist.description:
You add a personal sacrifice to heighten the power of your ritual magic.

Prerequisites
Knowledge (arcana) 4 ranks, Knowledge (religion) 4 ranks, Spellcraft 4 ranks.

Benefits
Once during the casting of an occult ritual (Pathfinder RPG Occult Adventures 208), you can inflict 1d6 hit points of damage per 2 Hit Dice and 1d4 Constitution damage (or Charisma damage if you're undead) to yourself as an immediate action with a piercing or slashing weapon. You can't reduce or ignore this damage in any way. This damage doesn't disrupt the ritual, and you can roll twice for the next skill check made as part of a ritual casting and take the better result. If the resulting ritual effect has the fear descriptor or is in the phantasm subschool, increase its saving throw DC by 1. Multiple characters with this feat can each use it once per ritual on their skill checks, but the DC increases don't stack.

Mutual Hatred.name: 恨意反制 Mutual Hatred
Mutual Hatred.description:
专长类型：Combat

你被外族所憎恨，而你对他们也一样。

专长效果: 在对抗拥有针对你的仇恨种族特性或是宿敌职业能力的生物时，你在攻击和伤害检定上获得+1加值。对大多数兽人来说，这个专长的目标包括矮人和拥有宿敌（人型生物-兽人）的游侠。

资源出处: Monster Codex pg. 164

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Mutual%20Hatred

My Blade is Yours.name: 武器协同 My Blade is Yours
My Blade is Yours.description:
专长类型：CombatTeamwork

在战斗中，你与盟友的协作如行云流水一般，而这也为你的武器提供了更多的优势。

先决条件: 智力 13，寓守于攻，察言观色3级。

专长效果: 当你与1名具有该专长的盟友相邻、而且它持用着的武器具有格挡（blocking）、卸武（disarm）、虚实（distracting）或摔绊（trip）武器特性时，你自己的武器也能被视同为具有相应的特性。若盟友的武器具有多个合适的特性，那么你要在自己回合开始时决定自己的武器获得哪1种特性。

资源出处: Ultimate Intrigue pg. 87

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=My%20Blade%20is%20Yours

Mystic Stride.name: 高等穿林 Mystic Stride
Mystic Stride.description:
魔化的植物无法阻止你的脚步。

先决条件: 敏捷15，灵活移动，【穿林】职业特性。

专长效果: 你能以正常速度通过任何魔化或魔力形成的荆棘丛、石南丛、茂密的灌木丛，即使在其中会受到纠缠效果也是如此。

通常状况: 【穿林】无法作用于魔化或魔力形成的荆棘丛、石南丛、茂密的灌木丛。

资源出处: Ultimate Magic pg. 153

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Mystic%20Stride

Mystical Reverberation.name: Mystical Reverberation
Mystical Reverberation.description:
Your ritualistic training has taught you to join in with the magic of others.

Prerequisites
Ability to spontaneously cast spells.

Benefits
As a standard action, select an ally within 30 feet who also has this feat and select a metamagic feat you have. If that ally doesn't have the selected metamagic feat, she can modify a spell she casts before the end of her next turn with that metamagic feat. The spell is modified as normal, except it uses a spell slot 1 additional level above the normal spell level modification for that metamagic feat.

If the selected ally does have the metamagic feat you select, she can instead use that feat to modify a spell she casts before the end of her next turn without increasing the spell's casting time.

Mythic Companion.name: 参与神话 Mythic Companion
Mythic Companion.description:
尽管你身处非神话的范畴内，但是已经成为了伟大神话世界的重要组成部分。

先决条件: 你必须为非神话角色或生物。

专长效果: 在判断神话法术与效果对你如何起作用时，你被视为神话生物。若你成为了神话角色或生物，那么你会在对抗神话法术的所有豁免中获得+1加值。

资源出处: Mythic Adventures pg. 70

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Mythic%20Companion

Named Bullet.name: 指名狙杀 Named Bullet
Named Bullet.description:
你让目标弹药对一个选定的你可以命名的生物或一个生物类别 (对于类人生物和异界生物还须指定亚种) 产生可怕的精准度。

在受术弹药对指定生物使用时，弹药不会不发火，并且无视掩蔽效果 (除了全掩蔽)，并且在30尺或更短距离内，攻击视为接触攻击。当受术弹药命中选定生物，你必须克服它的法术抗力 (如果有)，否则法术无效。

如果选定生物被正常命中，会直接造成一次重击威胁，并且造成每施法者等级1点 (最高20) 的额外伤害，这个伤害不会被重击系数加成。但如果这次命中投骰本身即可造成重击，那么额外伤害同样也按重击系数翻倍。

一旦受术弹药被用于攻击选定生物，不管成功与否，法术都解消。



资源出处: Ultimate Combat pg. 238

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/SpellDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Named%20Bullet

Nameless One.name: Nameless One
Nameless One.description:
You completely eschew your former identity, making you impossible to locate or even name.

Benefits
When you take this feat, you eschew all of your former identities, going as far as to render your former name completely inaccessible to discover by mortal means. You perform an 8-hour ritual that requires the expenditure of 200 gp for rare oils, incense, and creation of a special mask. After this ritual, you forever lose all names and identities previously associated with you (including any identities that you gain from class abilities). You adopt a brief descriptive title in place of a new name. Your title must not reference the names of any people or places. (For example, you could adopt the title 'Blue Fox' or 'Twilight Stalker,' but not the title 'Chelish Avenger' or 'Spirit of the Mwangi.')

At the ritual's conclusion, you must don the mask created for the ritual, the appearance of which is evocative of your title. While you're wearing this mask, any attempts to scry or otherwise locate any of your eschewed identities or connect you to those identities do not work, revealing nothing but darkness, as if you were an invalid target or did not exist. Successful Knowledge checks to identify you reveal your new title rather than any old identity, but can reveal your strengths and weaknesses normally.

As long as you wear the ritual mask and do not reveal your connection to any past identities, any attempt to scry on you in relation to of your eschewed identities requires a successful caster level check with a DC of 10 + your Hit Dice. In addition, you are immune to effects that require the use of your name, such as the named bullet spell. While benefiting from this feat, you cannot wear any magic items in the head slot, as the mask used by this effect effectively occupies this slot (though this feat's benefits are not magical for the purpose of dispel magic and other effects). In addition, you cannot attempt to impersonate a specific individual by any means, magical or nonmagical. If you ever reveal or confirm your connection to your eschewed identities, you immediately lose the benefit of this feat and gain 1d4 permanent negative levels as your discarded identities return. You cannot regain the benefit of this feat or remove these negative levels until you atone (as per atonement, as if restoring a class feature).

Nameless Servitor.name: Nameless Servitor
Nameless Servitor.description:
The fact that you have given up your real name makes you resistant to certain types of magic.

Prerequisites
Risen Guard rank, Risen Guard 10 TPA.

Benefits
Anyone who attempts to use magic in order to learn personal information about you, such as through divination, scrying, or similar magic, must make a caster level check with a DC equal to 10 plus your level to succeed. You are immune to spells that require the use of your name in order to function (such as trap the soul).

Most members of the Risen Guard with this feat are addressed by their rank.

Nanite Disruption.name: Nanite Disruption
Nanite Disruption.description:
You can use your nanite surge to inflict wounds upon other mechanical beings.

Prerequisites
Nanite surge racial trait.

Benefits
As long as you are adjacent to an android, a robot, or a creature primarily made of electronic components (GM's discretion), you can use your nanite surge ability as an immediate action to short-circuit that creature's hardware. If you succeed at a melee touch attack and the target fails a Will save (DC = 10 + 1/2 your character level + 1/2 your Constitution modifier), it takes a penalty equal to 1 + 1/2 your level (minimum 0) on its next d20 roll. This penalty lasts until the beginning of your next turn.

Narrow Frame.name: Narrow Frame
Narrow Frame.description:
Your excellent coordination allows you to maneuver better in close quarters.

Prerequisites
Escape Artist 1 rank, animal or magical beast.

Benefits
You do not take penalties on your attack rolls or to your AC for squeezing through a narrow space that is at least half as wide as your normal space, though each move into or through a narrow space still counts as if it were 2 squares.

Normal
You take a -4 penalty on attack rolls and a -4 penalty to AC while squeezing.

Nation Builder.name: 开国元勋 Nation Builder
Nation Builder.description:
专长类型：Story

这片疆土呼唤着你来征服，并建立起属于你的强大国家。

先决条件: 你必须探索并占据100平方英里以上的一块土地。

专长效果: 当身处自己的国土或无主荒野时，你的察觉、隐匿和生存检定+2。如果你在上述技能受训10级以上，该加值升至+4。

专长目标: 探索并征服1000平方英里以上的土地，并在此过程中完胜一位强大敌手。你必须宣布这些土地为你本人、或直接领导你的人所有，并建立一座据点或要塞来守卫疆土。

完成收益: 当身处自己的国土时，你的先攻、攻击和豁免检定+2。

资源出处: Ultimate Campaign pg. 71

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Nation%20Builder

Natural Charmer.name: 天生丽质 Natural Charmer
Natural Charmer.description:
你掌握了一些吸血鬼先祖的控制之力。

先决条件: 魅力17，吸血裔。

专长效果: 当你使用任何基于魅力的技能吸引、劝说、说服或引诱人形生物时可以取20，这些生物对你的起始态度至少需要友善。取20依旧需要20倍于正常的时间执行技能。

通常状况: 你不能在任何失败后会遭受惩罚的技能检定上取20。

资源出处: Advanced Race Guide pg. 100

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Natural%20Charmer

Natural Jouster.name: Natural Jouster
Natural Jouster.description:
Nearly all svathurims have the following feat, which is common among tauric creatures.

Prerequisites
Centaur (or any tauric creature at the GM's discretion)

Benefits
You gain proficiency with the lance. You can wield a lance one-handed as if you were mounted, and you deal double damage with a lance while charging.

Natural Pathseeker.name: Natural Pathseeker
Natural Pathseeker.description:
You use your surroundings to overcome obstacles.

Prerequisites
Favored terrain class feature.

Benefits
While you're in any of your favored terrains, you apply half your favored terrain bonus to Acrobatics, Climb, and Swim skill checks.

Natural Poison Antitoxin.name: Natural Poison Antitoxin
Natural Poison Antitoxin.description:
You have learned how to create antitoxin that can resist natural poisons.

Prerequisites
Natural Poison Harvester, Craft (alchemy) 8 ranks, Survival 8 ranks.

Benefits
When you succeed at a Craft (alchemy) check to create an antitoxin using a dose of a natural poison you harvested, you increase the duration of the antitoxin to an amount equal to 4 hours plus an additional hour for every 5 by which your result exceeds the DC.

Natural Poison Harvester.name: Natural Poison Harvester
Natural Poison Harvester.description:
You are exceedingly proficient at harvesting and distilling poison from venomous monsters.

Prerequisites
Craft (alchemy) 6 ranks, Survival 6 ranks.

Benefits
You gain a +2 bonus on Craft (alchemy) checks when creating poison harvested from poisonous monsters. When you successfully craft such poisons, the DC of the poison increases by 2.

Natural Ruler.name: Natural Ruler
Natural Ruler.description:
You have a special talent for ruling a nation, and take to the task with ease.

Prerequisites
Hold a leadership role related to running a kingdom.

Benefits
Choose an ability score. Any time your leadership role calls for that ability score to affect one of your kingdom's attributes, your modifier to that ability score is treated as being +2 higher. For example, if you choose Charisma and occupy the General or High Priest leadership role, your Charisma modifier to affect your kingdom's stability would be +2 higher than normal. However, if you occupied the Spymaster leadership role--which employs the Intelligence and Wisdom ability scores--this feat would grant no benefit.

Additionally, the entire kingdom gains +2 Stability for as long as you occupy a leadership role.

Special
You may gain this feat multiple times, but each time you must choose a different ability score. The bonus to Stability gained from this feat stacks.

Natural Spell (Mythic).name: 自然施法(神话) Natural Spell (Mythic)
Natural Spell (Mythic).description:
先决条件：自然施法

当你使用自然变身时，能够进行交谈和使用魔法物品。

神话专长效果：当你使用自然变身时，你能够使用法术完成型与法术触发型魔法物品，这些物品必须在你变更形态的时候已经携带在身上。当你在使用自然变身形态下使用这些物品时，不需要用身体对这些物品进行操作。除此之外，你还能够在使用自然变身时，正常进行交谈。

资源出处: Mythic Adventures pg. 70

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Natural%20Spell

Nature Magic.name: 自然魔法 Nature Magic
Nature Magic.description:
通过汲取大自然的力量，你可以施放一些简单的法术。

先决条件: 知识（自然）技能1级。

专长效果: 。你获得法术指北术（Know Direction）作为永久性生效的类法术能力，并且你可以选择另一个德鲁伊祷念作为每日一次使用的类法术能力。你使用此类法术能力的施法者等级等同于你的人物等级。

资源出处: Advanced Class Guide pg. 152

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Nature%20Magic

Nature Soul.name: 自然之魂 Nature Soul
Nature Soul.description:
你与生俱来地能与自然协调并且尊敬自然界的力量与神秘。

专长效果: 你在知识（自然）与生存检定中获得+2加值。如果你的上述技能之一有10个或更多技能等级，则对于那个技能此加值上升到+4。

资源出处: Faiths and Philosophies pg. 11

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Nature%20Soul

Nature's Freedom.name: 荒野自如 Nature's Freedom
Nature's Freedom.description:
先决条件：动物或植物领域，引导能量职业特性。

先决条件: 动物或植物领域，引导能量职业特性。

专长效果: 当你引导能量时，你可以额外花费一次引导能量次数，令受到影响的生物可以不受阻碍地在灌木丛中穿行如同德鲁伊的穿林步（Woodland Stride）职业特性。上述效果持续轮数等同于你的魅力调整值（至少1轮）。重复使用本专长可以延长穿林步效果的持续时间。

资源出处: Ultimate Wilderness pg. 116

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Nature's%20Freedom

Nature's Weapons.name: Nature's Weapons
Nature's Weapons.description:
You can make a weapon out of nearly anything that can be found in the wild.

Prerequisites
Catch Off-Guard; base attack bonus +2; Knowledge (nature) or Survival 2 ranks.

Benefits
You can turn nearly anything you might find in the wilderness into an improvised melee weapon. This improvised melee weapon is one-handed and deals 1d6 points of damage for Medium creatures and 1d4 for Small creatures. Depending on the weapon, it deals bludgeoning, piercing, or slashing damage (at the GM's discretion). Grabbing an object to use as a weapon is the same action as drawing a weapon. The weapon must be of a material that is naturally occurring in that terrain.

Nature's Wrath.name: Nature's Wrath
Nature's Wrath.description:
Though a plant creature, you are infused with the Blight Caller's primal rage against civilization.

Prerequisites
Int 1, any nongood alignment, plant type.

Benefits
