You are no longer immune to effects that cause morale bonuses or effects with the emotion descriptor, and you take a -1 penalty on saves against anger or rage emotion effects. You gain a +1 bonus on attack rolls against humanoid creatures.

Neckbreaker.name: 碎颈者 Neckbreaker
Neckbreaker.description:
专长类型：Combat

你猛然扭住了敌人的脖子。

先决条件: 碎骨者，高等擒抱，精通擒抱，精通徒手打击，碎颚者，震慑拳，医疗12级。

专长效果: 如果有一个体型与你相同或更小的对手陷入无助或被压制状态，在你成功的发起或维持一次擒抱后，你可以用-5罚值使用一次“震慑拳”。如果成功，你扭住了敌人的脖子，造成2d6点力量或敏捷伤害。如果目标的属性点因此被降到0，所有溢出的属性伤害都会变成目标的体质伤害。免疫重击或没有明显头部和颈部的生物对该专长效果免疫。

资源出处: Ultimate Combat pg. 111

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Neckbreaker

战策增益：当你使用这个专长时，你可以消耗10点耐力来造成1d6点体质伤害而不是2d6点力量或敏捷伤害。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 127

Necromantic Affinity.name: 死灵术亲和 Necromantic Affinity
Necromantic Affinity.description:
长时间暴露在死灵能量之下，使得你在抵御它们时获得了小小的变化。

先决条件: 体质15。

专长效果: 你在对抗任何利用负能量（utilize negative energy），造成负向等级（cause negative levels），造成属性伤害（cause ability damage），属性吸取（ability drain）或者属性罚值（ability penalties）的法术或效果时，豁免获得+2加值。此外，造成伤害类法术（inflict spells）会治疗你，就如同你是不死生物一般，但是你会被治疗伤害类法术（cure spells）所伤害。

资源出处: Inner Sea World Guide pg. 287

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Necromantic%20Affinity

Needle in a Haystack.name: Needle in a Haystack
Needle in a Haystack.description:
Once you have even the trace of a creature you're tracking, you can't be thrown off the trail.

Prerequisites
Skill Focus (Perception), Perception 3 ranks.

Benefits
You can use Perception (rather than Survival) to follow tracks. After you track a creature using the Perception skill, you gain a +2 insight bonus on Perception checks to avoid being surprised by that creature for 1 hour. If you have 10 or more ranks in Perception, this bonus increases to +4.

Neither Elf nor Human.name: 既非精灵也非人类 Neither Elf nor Human
Neither Elf nor Human.description:
你将自身从你的血脉中抹除得如此彻底，就连魔法也无法识别出你。

先决条件: 流放之路，飘忽不定，角色等级11，半精灵。

专长效果: 在判断与你的类别相关的有害法术以及效果时，你既不被视为精灵也不被视为人类，比如〈破敌〉武器或者游侠的【宿敌】职业能力。

资源出处: Advanced Race Guide pg. 47

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Neither%20Elf%20nor%20Human

Nemesis.name: 仇怨缠身 Nemesis
Nemesis.description:
专长类型：Story

一位旧敌期盼你陨落。

先决条件: 你必须有一位以上想要给予你重创的敌手。若你有复数敌手，GM可以选定一人为针对你的秘密追踪者，或直接让他们联手对付你。若你的敌手中并无一人能够达到强大敌手的标准，他会逐渐变强以满足条件，或是和其他家伙合力使得CR获得提升。

专长效果: 拥有敌手是对自己最好的驱策。每当你获得新等级、包括选择本专长的这个等级，你都可以选择两项天赋职业加成。其中之一必须为奖励HP或奖励技能，即便有多个可获取的其他选项。

专长目标: 击杀你的追踪者。通过直接行动导致其死亡，即便不是由你发动致命一击亦视为满足条件；但没有你亲身参与的情况下则无效。

完成收益: 你选择的单项属性获得+2内在加值。此外，你可以回溯你选取此专长之前的天赋职业等级，并获取对应的加成。

特殊备注：妨害你的计划已成为追踪者不惜一切代价的终极目标。追踪者对你的攻击和伤害检定+2。无论你追求何物，他们都会丧心病狂地加以阻挠。

资源出处: Ultimate Campaign pg. 71

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Nemesis

Nerve-Racking Negotiator.name: 冷面交涉人 Nerve-Racking Negotiator
Nerve-Racking Negotiator.description:
你已经掌握了恐吓他人的技术，明白如何在获得自己想要的同时不会引起不必要的管处。

先决条件: 谈判专家。

专长效果: 当你成功使用威吓技能迫使1名敌人向你表示友善（act friendly toward you）时，目标必须在威吓效果消退后尝试1次意志豁免。DC为10 + 你在威吓中投入的技能点数。若目标在该次豁免中失败的话，它在威吓带来的效果期限结束之后对你的态度视为与最初相同——通常为冷漠（indifferent）——而且不会因为被你威胁而上报权力机构。

通常状况: 在威吓技能的持续时间结束后，成功受到威吓检定的目标对你的态度会变为不友善（unfriendly），而且可能会举报你。

资源出处: Ultimate Intrigue pg. 87

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Nerve-Racking%20Negotiator

Net Adept.name: 捕网熟练 Net Adept
Net Adept.description:
专长类型：Combat

你受过训练，能将网作为近战武器使用。

先决条件: 擅长异种武器（网），基本攻击加值+1。

专长效果: 你可以把网作为一个触及范围10尺的单手近战长武器使用。此外，你在使用一张没有摺叠的网时不会有攻击检定罚值。另外，你可以用整轮动作或两次移动动作将网摺叠起来。

通常状况: 网只能作为远程武器，并在没有摺叠的时候进行远程攻击有-4罚值。擅长网的使用者将其摺叠起来需要两个整轮动作。

资源出处: Ultimate Combat pg. 111

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Net%20Adept

战策增益：你可以消耗2点耐力来以一个标准动作折叠捕网。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 127

Net and Trident.name: 网叉并用 Net and Trident
Net and Trident.description:
专长类型：Combat

你能在挥舞你的网时熟练地使用轻型武器。

先决条件: 敏捷15，擅长异种武器（网），捕网熟练，双武器格斗。

专长效果: 你可以将网作为一件单手远程武器使用，这允许你再装备一件轻型或单手近战武器，同时仍可以使用网进行远程攻击。当你使用你的轻型或单手近战武器攻击一个陷入纠缠的敌人时，你的攻击检定、伤害骰和重击确认骰获得+2加值。

通常状况: 网是一种双手远程武器。

资源出处: Ultimate Combat pg. 111

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Net%20and%20Trident

战策增益：当你使用轻型或者单手近战武器对一个被你的捕网纠缠住的敌人进行攻击时，你可以在击中敌人时消耗至多5点耐力来在伤害骰上获得加值，这个加值等于你消耗耐力的两倍。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 127

Net Maneuvering.name: 捕网战技 Net Maneuvering
Net Maneuvering.description:
专长类型：Combat

靠着技巧和蛮力，你可以将敌人玩弄在你的网中。

先决条件: 擅长异种武器（网），捕网熟练，基本攻击加值+3。

专长效果: 在战斗中，你可以使用网进行绊摔或卸武、而非纠缠你的敌人。当你这么使用网进行卸武时，你的战技检定有+2加值。此外，如果敌人正被你的网纠缠，你可以尝试对其进行拖拽或移位战技检定，距离最多为你的网的触及范围或你用纤绳能控制网的距离。

资源出处: Ultimate Combat pg. 111

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Net%20Maneuvering

战策增益：只要你的耐力池中还有1点耐力，你就能使用捕网进行拖拽和移位战技。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 127

Net Trickery.name: 捕网诡计 Net Trickery
Net Trickery.description:
专长类型：Combat

你能够非常熟练的用网来阻碍你的敌人。

先决条件: 擅长异种武器（网），捕网熟练，捕网战技，基本攻击加值+6。

专长效果: 当你用网进行近战攻击时，你可以用一次致盲阴招战技来取代近战攻击。如果有一个对手正被你的网纠缠，只要他还处于你的网的触及范围或纤绳控制范围，你可以尝试对其进行绊摔。此外，在你用网进行拖拽或移位战技时，你还会有+2战技加值奖励。

资源出处: Ultimate Combat pg. 111

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Net%20Trickery

战策增益：只要你的耐力池中还有1点耐力，你就能使用阴招APG战技来让一个敌人目眩或者恶心，而不是让他致盲。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 127

Never Conquered, Forever Feared.name: Never Conquered, Forever Feared
Never Conquered, Forever Feared.description:
You are dauntless in battle, and your lineage echoes with awe-inspiring power.

Prerequisites
Be a member of House Heskillar, or have the Adopted by Dragons, Path of Righteous Rage, or Proud Heritage background.

Benefits
Your stern demeanor gives you a +2 bonus on Intimidate checks. If you have 10 or more ranks in Intimidate, this bonus increases to +4. You also gain a +2 bonus on saves against paralysis and sleep effects.

Goal
You must individually slay an appropriate number of significant foes in succession, without retreating or withdrawing from a fight.

Completion Benefit
You can display your imposing presence as a free action when you take an offensive action, such as an attack or a charge. Opponents within 30 feet of you must succeed at a Will save or become shaken for 3d6 rounds. The DC of this save is equal to 10 + 1/2 your character level + your Charisma modifier. This ability does not cause opponents that are already shaken to become frightened, and opponents with more Hit Dice than your character level are immune to the effect. This is a mind-affecting fear effect.

New Thassilonian Magic.name: New Thassilonian Magic
New Thassilonian Magic.description:
You use Thassilonian magic in a nontraditional way that preserves the ancient traditions while lifting some of its restrictions.

Prerequisites
Thassilonian specialization (Pathfinder Campaign Setting: Inner Sea Magic 17).

Benefits
You choose one of your two opposition schools. You also gain Thassilonian as a bonus language. If you already speak Thassilonian, you gain one of the following languages as a bonus language instead: Aklo, Azlanti, Giant, Shoanti, or Varisian.

Normal
A Thassilonian specialist cannot customize his choice for opposition schools.

Night Sky Hex.name: Night Sky Hex
Night Sky Hex.description:
You use the mystical network of power that blazes in the night sky to empower your hexes.

Prerequisites
Hex class feature; moon, stars, or winter patron.

Benefits
When you gain this feat, choose one hex that you can use to affect no more than one opponent. When you are in view of the night sky and use that hex, increase the save DC of that hex by 2.

Night Stalker.name: 尾行夜魔 Night Stalker
Night Stalker.description:
你擅长在深夜追猎人类，并悄无声息地将他们杀掉。

先决条件: 技能专攻（潜行），黑暗视觉，半食人魔或食人魔，体型大型或更大。

专长效果: 在光照效果为昏暗或是处于自然黑暗的环境中，你可以忽略因为体型而承受的潜行检定减值，并且会与措手不及的敌人在攻击检定上获得+2加值。

资源出处: Monster Codex pg. 153Classic Monsters Revisited pg. 49

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Night%20Stalker

Nightmare Chains.name: 梦魇之链 Nightmare Chains
Nightmare Chains.description:
锁链是链魔的特征以及支配力。

先决条件: 链魔亚种（Kyton subtype），5个及以上的生命骰。

专长效果: 你获得了链魔的锁链之舞（dancing chains）能力（Pathfinder RPG Bestiary 185），除了你仅能通过这种方式控制最多2条锁链。这赋予你2链条攻击，造成相当于专为一名你体型的生物设计的带刺链条的伤害。如果你已拥有锁链之舞（dancing chains）能力，你可以控制额外2条锁链。

特殊说明: 由GM决定，如果非链魔异界生物有关系到锁链的主题的话，则可以选择这项专长（比如角魔horned devils或希瓦斯卡Shivaska的恶魔仆从）。

【速查】：锁链之舞（Su）：使用一个标准动作。链魔可以控制身周 20 尺内的最多 4 条锁链，并随意指挥它们移动或者挥舞。同时，链魔还可以选择让这些链条增长至 15 尺并长出锋锐的倒钩。这些活化的链条能进行和链魔相同的攻击动作。如果锁链正在被某个生物持有，该生物可以做一个 DC 15 的意志检定以打破链魔对锁链的控制。如果检定通过，则链魔无法在 24 小时内重新尝试控制该锁链，除非锁链被丢弃。另外，链魔也可以以正常速度利用被控制的锁链进行攀爬而无需进行攀爬检定。这个能力的豁免 DC 基于魅力。

资源出处: Book of the Damned pg. 179

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Nightmare%20Chains

Nightmare Fist.name: 夜魇之拳 Nightmare Fist
Nightmare Fist.description:
专长类型：Combat

你在黑暗中总是显得更为致命。

先决条件: 精通徒手打击，威吓1级，创造魔法黑暗的能力。

专长效果: 当处于一片魔法黑暗中时，你的徒手打击伤害获得+2加值；若对手处于颤栗、惊惧或者恐慌状态，该加值变为+4。此外，你在黑暗中时，特技和威吓技能检定也会有+2士气加值。

资源出处: Ultimate Combat pg. 111

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Nightmare%20Fist

战策增益：当你在魔法黑暗中战斗时，你可以消耗至多5点耐力来提升这个专长在一次伤害骰上赋予的加值，提升的点数等于你消耗耐力的两倍。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 127

Nightmare Scars.name: 梦魇伤疤 Nightmare Scars
Nightmare Scars.description:
先决条件：信仰拉玛什图

先决条件: 信仰拉玛什图。

专长效果: 你在以交涉检定和驯养动物检定改变魔法兽，人型怪物和拉玛什图的信徒时获得+2加值，但是以交涉检定和驯养动物检定改变尝试改变其他所有生物的态度时承受-2减值。除此之外，你在威吓检定上获得+2加值，且你的威吓检定不会因为体型差异而受到减值。

资源出处: Inner Sea Gods pg. 214

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Nightmare%20Scars

Nightmare Striker.name: 夜魇强袭 Nightmare Striker
Nightmare Striker.description:
专长类型：Combat

你的妖火不但能够照出你的敌人，还能显示他们的弱点。

先决条件: 精通徒手打击，夜魇之拳，夜魇织者，震慑拳，医疗5级，有能力施放‘妖火’。

专长效果: 当你对一个敌人施放了‘妖火’（不能由法术完成型或触发型魔法物品施放），你对他的震慑拳豁免DC将会提高2。如果你的震慑拳命中这个敌人，而该敌人豁免失败，你可以让该敌人颤栗1d2轮，加上豁免失败每5点1轮。

资源出处: Ultimate Combat pg. 111

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Nightmare%20Striker

战策增益：当你使用震慑拳击中一个目标并且那个目标豁免失败时，你可以消耗5点耐力来让对手惊惧而不是战栗1d4轮。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 127

Nightmare Weaver.name: 夜魇织者 Nightmare Weaver
Nightmare Weaver.description:
专长类型：Combat

你可以使用你创造魔法黑暗的能力来让敌人陷入恐惧。

先决条件: 精通徒手打击，夜魇之拳，威吓2级，创造魔法黑暗的能力。

专长效果: 通过花费整轮动作来施放‘黑暗术’，你可以同时对影响范围内的所有敌人进行一次威吓检定。

特殊说明: 该专长在获取“致死打击（Deadly Stroke）”和“粉碎防御（Shatter Defenses）”专长时，可以替代“炫目技巧”作为先决条件。

资源出处: Ultimate Combat pg. 112

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Nightmare%20Weaver

战策增益：当你以一个标准动作施放黑暗术时，你可以消耗5点耐力来尝试对法术初始范围内的所有敌人进行一次挫败士气的威吓检定。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 127

Nimble Moves (Mythic).name: 灵狐步(神话) Nimble Moves (Mythic)
Nimble Moves (Mythic).description:
先决条件：灵狐步

你能够在重重障碍间翩翩起舞，就好像它们并不存在一样。

神话专长效果：你每拥有2个阶层，每轮就能通过5尺困难地形（最低5尺），如同它们和正常地形一样。该效果与灵狐步（Nimble Moves）和神行步（Acrobatic Steps）专长的效果叠加。

资源出处: Mythic Adventures pg. 70

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Nimble%20Moves

Nimble Natural Summons.name: 灵巧自然盟友 Nimble Natural Summons
Nimble Natural Summons.description:
先决条件：增强召唤，法术专攻（咒法系），施法者等级6，能够施放法术召唤自然盟友，信仰埃拉斯蒂尔

先决条件: 增强召唤，法术专攻（咒法系），施法者等级6，能够施放法术召唤自然盟友，信仰埃拉斯蒂尔。

专长效果: 你通过召唤自然盟友法术召唤的生物可以穿越自然灌木（如荆棘，石楠和类似的地形）而不受到伤害和其他减值，由魔法效果制造的此类地形仍然会影响你召唤的生物。

资源出处: Inner Sea Gods pg. 214Faiths of Purity pg. 24

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Nimble%20Natural%20Summons

Nimble Striker.name: 机敏前锋 Nimble Striker
Nimble Striker.description:
专长类型：Combat

你与生俱来就是冲锋的料，没人能比你做得更好。

先决条件: 敏捷13，基本攻击加值+1，猫族，【短跑健将】种族特性。

专长效果: 当你在使用“顺势斩”专长、“突刺”专长或者冲锋时，不必承受AC-2的罚值。

资源出处: Advanced Race Guide pg. 94

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Nimble%20Striker

战策增益：当你使用顺势斩或者突刺专长时，又或者当你冲锋时，你可以消耗5点耐力来在AC上获得+2闪避加值。这个加值持续到你的下一回合开始。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 127

No Name.name: 无名枪手 No Name
No Name.description:
专长类型：Grit

你无需花费心思来隐藏自己的身份。

先决条件: 【勇毅】职业特性或业余铳士专长，唬骗4级。

专长效果: 你在人际交往上经常依靠出人意料和误导。你在唬骗检定上获得+2加值，而且可以消耗1点勇毅点，在每个铳士等级10分钟（最少10分钟）里在易容检定上获得+10加值。这个铳技并不能真的改变你的外貌，但却能让你以其他方式隐藏你的身份。

资源出处: Ultimate Combat pg. 112

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=No%20Name

Noble Impostor.name: Noble Impostor
Noble Impostor.description:
You put on airs and others believe your tales.

Prerequisites
Must not be a member of an established family or a member of nobility.

Benefits
You gain a +2 bonus on Bluff and Knowledge (nobility) checks and these skills are class skills for you.

Goal
Convince at least three noble families, a ruling monarch, or a settlement of at least small city size that you are a member of an existing or a previously unknown noble family.

Completion Benefit
You gain followers as if you had the Leadership feat. If you also have the Leadership feat, increase your Leadership score by 3 for the purpose of determining how many followers you have.

Noble Scion.name: 贵族后裔 Noble Scion
Noble Scion.description:
你是一个充满自豪的贵族家庭的一员，无论你是否在你的家族中有着良好的声誉。

先决条件: 魅力13，必须在1级选取。

专长效果: 你的知识（贵族）检定获得+2加值，并且该知识技能总是你的本职技能。

当你选择该专长时，从后述列表中选择一种与你的贵族家庭风格相符的优势。请与你的DM协商来确保你所选择的选项是合适的。

艺术之子：你的所有表演检定获得+1加值，并且表演总是你的本职技能。如果你拥有吟游诗人表演能力，那么你每日能够额外使用该能力3轮。

知识之子：你所拥有的所有至少有1级的知识技能均会获得+1加值。

魔法之子：你从后述语言中选择1个作为奖励语言：深渊语（Abyssal），邪灵语（Aklo），天界语（Celestial），龙语（Draconic），炼狱语（Infernal）或者木族语（Sylvan）。每日1次以自由动作，你能够在任何由你进行的法术辨识检定中获得+2加值。你必须在进行检定之前花费自由动作以获得加值。

安宁之子：每当你在使用基于感知的技能取十时，则视为你骰出13而非10点作为结果。

战争之子：你使用你的魅力调整值来调整先攻检定，而非使用你的敏捷调整值。

资源出处: Inner Sea World Guide pg. 288

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Noble%20Scion

Noble Scion (Oppara).name: Noble Scion (Oppara)
Noble Scion (Oppara).description:
You are a member of one of the significant noble families of Oppara, whether or not you remain in good standing with your family. In many cases, these families are Imperialists loyal to Maxillar Pythareus, and as such you either are a black sheep or your family has cut you off entirely.

Prerequisites
Charisma 13 or Child of Oppara trait, must be taken at 1st level.

Benefits
You gain a +2 bonus on all Knowledge (nobility) checks, and Knowledge (nobility) is always a class skill for you. You also gain an additional benefit depending on which family you belong to.

Basri
You come from the long line of ambassadors, diplomats, and travelers that make up the Basri, and your family maintains the strongest ties to the elven nation of Kyonin of any Taldan humans. Select one of the following as a bonus starting language: Celestial, Elven, Gnome, Sylvan. You gain proficiency in one of the following weapons: longbow (including composite), longsword, rapier, or shortbow (including composite). If you gain proficiency in all martial weapons at 1st level, you can instead select elven curve blade.

Clement
Your Garundi and Mwangi ancestors served Taldor proudly during the Sixth Army of Exploration and were awarded titles for their service. Your family, which has maintained their noble titles to this day, is known for keen insights and biting observations. You can substitute your Wisdom modifier for your Charisma modifier when attempting Diplomacy skill checks.

Corcina
Your family came to prominence during the Second Army of Exploration, and maintains a legacy as explorers and sailors. You gain a +1 bonus on Climb and Escape Artist checks, and a +2 bonus on Survival checks to navigate.

Karthis
Yours is a family of distinguished military veterans, charismatic demagogues, and xenophobic zealots. As the rest of the family becomes increasingly Imperialist, you have made no effort to remain in their good graces, but you retain the skills they taught you during a childhood of rigorous training. You can apply your Charisma modifier instead of your Dexterity modifier to Initiative checks.

Kastner
Your stalwart family defines itself by opposing your devil-worshiping Chelish cousins, a grudge that inspired some of Taldor's greatest healers, priests, and negotiators. You gain one additional use per day of channel energy, lay on hands, or mesmerist tricks, or 3 additional rounds of bardic music per day. You gain only one of these benefits, even if you later acquire a second class that provides one of the other class features listed.

Lotheed
Your family ranks include the greatest wizards and arcane scholars in Taldor, and schooling in some of the most comprehensive arcane libraries in the Inner Sea was your birthright. If your Intelligence is 11 or higher, you gain the following spell-like abilities: 1/day--dancing lights, prestidigitation, read magic, unseen servant. The caster level for these effects is equal to one-half your class level.

Merosett
The cunning members of your large family, a longtime fixture in Oppara's bureaucracy, specialize in tracking lineages and sidestepping red tape. You gain a +5 bonus on Bluff checks to send secret messages and Sense Motive checks to discern secret messages. You halve the time required to search through archives, navigate government offices, review contracts, or otherwise work with the complex bureaucracies your family has mastered for generations.

Stavian
As a close relative of the Grand Prince, yours has been a life of material comfort and indulgence, colored by constant threats and direct influence. You gain a +2 bonus on Fortitude saves against poison and on Will saves against enchantment spells of the charm and compulsion subschools.

Talbot
Your starkly conservative family are merchants and entrepreneurs first and aristocrats second, willing to forgo duty if they can instead pursue profit. They condemn would-be adventurers and readily oust them from the family ranks, leaving you an outcast. You gain a +2 bonus on one Profession skill of your choice. Once per day, you can use this Profession skill in place of a single Knowledge skill check.

Varima
Your family immigrated to Taldor from Vudra hundreds of years ago, and thanks to noble roots, extensive trade contacts, and an unparalleled skill in negotiation, soon developed into a steadfast fixture of Oppara's social scene. Whenever you use Diplomacy to influence a crowd or a room (but not individuals), you can roll twice and use the better result.

Vernisant
Your family is descended from the great general Arnisant, who commanded Taldan forces during the Shining Crusade... and they will never let anyone forget it! Their fierce Imperialist support and nationalist fervor has left you alienated from your relatives now, but their emphasis on scholarship left a mark nonetheless. You gain a +1 bonus on all Knowledge skills in which you have at least 1 rank.

Vinmark
Newcomers and outsiders, your Ulfen family was exalted to nobility 19 years ago, when Stavian III promoted your family patriarch to Baron of Oppara as a reward for service in the Ulfen Guard. Established aristocrats consider your family crude, choosing to leave them on the margins of Taldan politics unless a noble thinks they could use you to curry favor with the Grand Prince, but hard-won practicality and newborn cynicism grant you insight most Taldan nobles lack. Once per day when rolling a Sense Motive check, you may roll two dice and use the better result.

Zespire
Your family runs charities and lobbies heavily for social reform, leaving them with few friends among their Opparan peers but heartfelt support from the common folk and lesser nobility. You gain a +2 bonus on Diplomacy and Perform checks when dealing with common citizens and with nobles whose titles are limited to Lord, Lady, Knight, or Dame.

Noble Spell Resistance.name: 卓越法术抗力 Noble Spell Resistance
Noble Spell Resistance.description:
你的升华已经完成；你的法术抗力已经接近恶魔。

先决条件: 魅力13，感知13，高等卓尔贵族，角色等级13，卓尔。

专长效果: 你的法术抗力等同于“11+角色等级”。

特殊说明: 你在以威吓或交涉检定影响卓尔时获得+1环境加值。

资源出处: Advanced Race Guide pg. 105

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Noble%20Spell%20Resistance

Noble Stipend.name: 贵族津贴 Noble Stipend
Noble Stipend.description:
你从你的家族或继承的遗产中获得了一些补贴。

先决条件: 13魅力，贵族后裔。

专长效果: 每周开始，你收到100GP，你只能将其花费在以下服务和非实物商品上：

  • 招聘演员，使者，坐骑，仆人，车马，工人等等；

  • 改善你的生活质量（见CRB405页的生活成本）；

  • 获取互动事件或进入特殊地点的邀请；

  • 支付住宿、马厩、税收和收费。


资源出处: Heroes of the High Court pg. 5

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Noble%20Stipend

Nosoi's Spiritsense.name: Nosoi's Spiritsense
Nosoi's Spiritsense.description:
Even the lowliest psychopomp can sniff out the undead. A whippoorwill in a papier-m xch x mask taught you how to do it.

Prerequisites
Duskwalker.

Benefits
You can cast detect undead as a spell-like ability at will. Your caster level for the purpose of this effect is equal to your character level.

Notorious Vigilante.name: 煞面义警 Notorious Vigilante
Notorious Vigilante.description:
专长类型：Combat

你的大名因为恐怖与危险而为人所知晓。

先决条件: 炫目技巧，武器专攻，任意非善良阵营（any nongood alignment），高级声誉社交天赋（Great Renown Social Talent），擅长相应的武器（proficiency with chosen weapon）。

专长效果: 你的存在本身可以作为一种快捷而又有效的炫目技巧。即便你没有持用与武器专攻相应的武器，也能够以标准动作使用炫目技巧专长的好处。若你正持用着相应的武器，则会在威吓检定中获得+2加值。

资源出处: Ultimate Intrigue pg. 87

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Notorious%20Vigilante

Noxious Touch.name: Noxious Touch
Noxious Touch.description:
You reflexively excrete poison in response to trauma.

Prerequisites
Grippli, toxic skin alternate racial trait.

Benefits
Whenever you are hit with an unarmed strike or natural weapon, you can spend a use of your toxic skin racial trait as an immediate action, affecting the creature that hit you with your grippli poison as if you had smeared the poison on your own body.

Numbing Blow.name: Numbing Blow
Numbing Blow.description:
You strike the weapons of your opponents so forcefully that they are unable to quickly recover or counterattack.

Prerequisites
Int 13, Str 13, Combat Expertise, Improved Disarm, Power Attack.

Benefits
Whenever you succeed at a combat maneuver check to disarm an opponent, the opponent must succeed at a Fortitude save (DC = 10 + your base attack bonus) or be hampered by the pain of the blow. For 1 round, if the target of your disarm combat maneuver failed its save, it can't use the limb or limbs that had been wielding the disarmed weapon to wield a weapon or shield, provide somatic components for spells, or manipulate objects. This is a pain effect.

Oath of the Unbound.name: 破缚之誓 Oath of the Unbound
Oath of the Unbound.description:
先决条件：信仰洛瓦古格

先决条件: 信仰洛瓦古格。

专长效果: 你在挣脱擒抱或压制的战技检定，击破锁住的门和墙壁等障碍物的力量检定，以及任何会使你缓慢与被纠缠效果的豁免检定上获得+2加值。

资源出处: Inner Sea Gods pg. 214

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Oath%20of%20the%20Unbound

Object of Legend.name: Object of Legend
Object of Legend.description:
The object of your quest drives you ever forward.

Prerequisites
You must have some highly personal stake in attaining the object of your quest as determined collectively by you and the GM--such as needing an ancestral weapon to exact your revenge against a known betrayer, seeking to destroy the artifact that caused your family's downfall generations ago, or attempting to behead a monster that ravaged your homeland during your youth.

Benefits
When you gain this feat, select one of the quest objects on this page or the facing page, or devise a quest object with your GM based on the quest objects presented in this section. You gain a +2 bonus on any Knowledge checks to gain information on the object of your quest. If you have 10 or more ranks in the Knowledge skill in question, the bonus increases to +4. In addition, once per day when you threaten a critical hit against a foe who specifically aims to stop you from completing your quest, you gain a +10 bonus on your confirmation roll against that opponent. You must announce the use of this ability after threatening the critical hit and before rolling your confirmation roll. This bonus does not stack with bonuses on confirmation rolls from other feats, such as Critical Focus.

Goal
Attain the object of your quest, as determined by you and the GM upon taking this feat. This likely means decidedly obtaining the item for yourself, though in some cases (such as when the quest object is more abstract or intangible) this might mean slaying a certain foe, achieving a certain honor, or completing some other set of predetermined objectives.

Completion Benefit
You gain renown throughout a region, perhaps even an entire continent. You are sung of in bardic tales and can be the subject of spells such as legend lore, regardless of your actual level. Commoners in nearby lands know of your deeds, and your reputation precedes you in numerous lands. In addition, you gain a specific benefit keyed to the object of your quest. See the quest objects in this section for examples of completion benefits when devising your own quest objects for use with this feat.

Oblivating Stare.name: Oblivating Stare
Oblivating Stare.description:
Your stare can cause a target to lose track of someone.

Prerequisites
Allure bold stare improvement (Pathfinder RPG Occult Adventures 42), hypnotic stare class feature (Occult Adventures 39), Mesmerist level 5th.

Benefits
You can cause a target of your hypnotic stare to lose track of creatures other than yourself. If the target of your hypnotic stare is in an environment that would allow the target to take 10 on skill checks (if not in immediate danger or distracted), creatures can attempt Stealth checks opposed by the target's Perception check even if they lack cover or concealment. If the target of your hypnotic stare fails an opposed Perception check by 5 or more, it forgets the creature attempting the Stealth check was ever present, and acts as if it had failed a Will saving throw against a hidden presence spell cast by the creature using Stealth. If your hypnotic stare ends, the target takes damage, a creature using Stealth takes an action that would end a hidden presence spell, or the target's circumstances change so it would be unable to take 10 on a skill check, all effects of Obliviating Stare end and the target is immune to your Obliviating Stare for 24 hours.

Obscuring Beacon.name: Obscuring Beacon
Obscuring Beacon.description:
You use light to disrupt your foes' darkness-adapted vision.

Benefits
When you're holding a light source in an area that is otherwise dim or darker, foes within the normal or bright light radius shed by your light source take a -1 penalty on attack rolls against other targets that are also within the radius of your light. Blind creatures aren't affected by this feat.

Occult Conduit.name: Occult Conduit
Occult Conduit.description:
You can use your body as an implement to focus spells.

Prerequisites
Caster level 5th, implements class feature, mental focus class feature, wyrwood.

Benefits
You can invest mental focus in your body rather than an implement. When you invest mental focus this way, you treat your body as an implement of any implement school you know. You do not gain the resonant power for the chosen school, but you treat your occultist level as 1 higher for the purposes of that school's focus powers. You can change which implement school is tied to your body when you invest your chosen implements for the day.

Octopus Focus.name: Octopus Focus
Octopus Focus.description:
The more enemies that surround you, the more accurate your attacks become.

Prerequisites
Dex 13, Dodge, Octopus Style, Acrobatics 3 ranks, Perception 3 ranks.

Benefits
When using this style, you gain a cumulative +1 bonus on melee attacks for each enemy that threatens you, up to a maximum equal to your Dexterity modifier. In addition, when you attempt to grapple without two free hands, you take only a -2 penalty on your combat maneuver check instead of the usual -4.

Octopus Style.name: Octopus Style
Octopus Style.description:
You anticipate the attacks of more than one enemy at once.

Prerequisites
Dex 13, Dodge, Improved Unarmed Strike, Acrobatics 1 rank, Perception 1 rank.

Benefits
As a move action when using this style, you can select a number of creatures you are aware of equal to your Dexterity modifier. You can't be flanked by the selected creatures until the start of your next turn.

Octopus Thrash.name: Octopus Thrash
Octopus Thrash.description:
Your arms flail about in a confusing pattern of strikes that trips and batters your foes.

Prerequisites
Dex 13, Dodge, Improved Trip, Octopus Focus, Octopus Style, Acrobatics 7 ranks, Perception 7 ranks.

Benefits
While using Octopus Style, when you threaten two enemies who are adjacent to each other, you can attempt a trip combat maneuver check against both targets at once in place of a melee attack. You attempt a single combat maneuver check at a -5 penalty and apply the result to both targets.

Ogre Crush.name: 食人魔碎骨扼 Ogre Crush
Ogre Crush.description:
你宽厚，粗长的胳膊一旦锁死体型较小的敌人，就能慢慢地把他们的骨头和内脏压碎。

先决条件: 力量25，精通徒手击打，精通擒抱，食人魔，体型大型或更大。

专长效果: 在擒抱一个体型比你小的生物并对他造成伤害时，你的徒手击打伤害视为上升一个体型。除此之外，你获得紧勒通用怪物能力，造成的伤害骰等同于你的体型所可以造成的挥击伤害或是徒手击打伤害，取其高者。

资源出处: Monster Codex pg. 153

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Ogre%20Crush

Old as Dust.name: 老而不死 Old as Dust
Old as Dust.description:
你已经死了太久太久，以至于摧毁你几乎不可能。

先决条件: 休眠者，挖坟者，成为食尸鬼至少500年。

专长效果: 当你的生命值降低到0时，你不会被摧毁——除非把你抛进圣水或是火堆，又或是通过治疗法术和正能量攻击，否则你不可能被彻底消灭。当你的生命值降为0时，你失去意识，直到下一个午夜或是你获得了足够的治疗为止，在前者的情况，你在苏醒时会恢复每HD1点的生命值。

资源出处: Monster Codex pg. 80

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Old%20as%20Dust

Old Cults Awakener.name: Old Cults Awakener
Old Cults Awakener.description:
You hear the voices of the Old Ones, and believe it is your destiny to awaken others to their ancient cause using bizarre and torturous rituals. Whether your work leaves these individuals mad or truly touched by alien sentience remains unproven.

Prerequisites
Old Cults 20 TPA.

Benefits
You can attempt a DC 25 Heal check upon an unconscious but stable intelligent creature. The ritual takes 1 hour to complete. If it's successful, the victim must make a DC 25 Will save or he gains a false memory of a vision that he has personally been chosen by the Great Old Ones to serve them (treat as an implanted memory from modify memory, except this is a nonmagical effect). If the ritual is unsuccessful, the victim takes 1d2 points of Intelligence and Wisdom drain; you may attempt the ritual again.

Ominous Mien.name: Ominous Mien
Ominous Mien.description:
Your walk, stance, and voice all amplify your status as a Hellknight when you cast spells or use spell-like abilities against opponents.

Prerequisites
Hellknight rank, Hellknight 10 TPA.

Benefits
Whenever you cast a spell or use a spell-like ability from the compulsion, fear, phantasm, or shadow sub-schools, add +1 to the DC of the saving throw against that spell or effect.

Omnipresent Mentor.name: 激励师之惠 Omnipresent Mentor
Omnipresent Mentor.description:
无论身在何处，你都能用自己的鼓励指引1名盟友。

先决条件: 魅力 17，激励师，提振技能（Inspire Competence）吟游表演。

专长效果: 通过在每日伊始（at the start of the day）花费4轮吟游表演（bardic performance）的每日轮数，你能够向1名盟友心中注入你的鼓励之言。选择1项你已经投入了技能点数的技能。你的盟友会获得提振技能（Inspire Competence）吟游表演带来的好处，无视距离，持续至你重新恢复吟游表演的每日轮数为止。该效果并不会被视为被激活的吟游表演，因此它不会因为你开始进行其他吟游表演而结束。在同一时间，仅有1名盟友能受到该能力影响；若你在持续时间结束之前再次使用该能力，先前受影响的盟友会失去该专长带来的加值。

资源出处: Ultimate Intrigue pg. 87

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Omnipresent%20Mentor

One Eye Open.name: 睁一只眼 One Eye Open
One Eye Open.description:
睡觉也不会影响你对危险的感知。

先决条件: 感知13，警觉。

专长效果: 你睡觉时察觉检定DC不会改变。当你成功在睡眠时通过察觉检定察觉到危险，你可以立刻醒来对抗危机。

通常状况: 睡觉时进行的任何察觉检定DC会增加10。

资源出处: Ultimate Wilderness pg. 116Melee Tactics Toolbox pg. 15

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=One%20Eye%20Open

One Mind.name: One Mind
One Mind.description:
Your nearly supernatural mental connection with your allies keeps you in a constant state of readiness.

Prerequisites
Alertness, Sense Motive 3 ranks, human (Vudrani).

Benefits
Whenever you're adjacent to an ally who also has this feat, if your ally is not flat-footed, you're also not considered flat-footed before you act in combat (you might become flat-footed in other ways, however). Additionally, if your ally can see a creature that you can't see, that creature doesn't gain a +2 bonus on attack rolls against you from being invisible, nor do you take a -2 penalty to AC for being blinded if your ally can see.

One with the Land.name: One with the Land
One with the Land.description:
Your connection your favored terrain is so intense that you draw strength from the power of nature itself.

Prerequisites
Favored terrain class feature.

Benefits
In your favored terrain, you require only half the normal amount of food, water, and sleep, and your rate of natural healing is doubled. You add half your favored terrain bonus as a bonus on saving throws and Constitution checks to stave off the effects of cold exposure, heat exposure, starvation, and thirst in your favored terrain.

One-Inch Punch.name: One-Inch Punch
One-Inch Punch.description:
You combine the force of multiple blows into a single strike to potentially send a foe flying.

Prerequisites
Improved Unarmed Strike, base attack bonus +6, brawler's flurry class feature or flurry of blows class feature.

Benefits
When making a full attack against a corporeal foe, you can forgo multiple attacks to make one unarmed strike at your highest base attack bonus. For each attack you forgo, you can add half your Strength modifier (minimum +0) to your damage roll. If you hit with this attack, you can attempt a bull rush combat maneuver check as a free action, substituting your attack roll result for the combat maneuver check result and adding a bonus equal to half your Strength modifier for each attack you forgo. This bull rush does not provoke an attack of opportunity, and you do not move as a result of the bull rush.

Onslaught.name: 轰杀 Onslaught
Onslaught.description:
专长类型：Combat

在被你的突袭命中之前，很少有敌人能对他们将承受的打击做好准备。

先决条件: 力量13，猛力攻击，基础攻击加值+1，偷袭职业能力。

专长效果: 如果你在突袭轮中以猛力攻击发动第一次近战攻击，你会自动在攻击时造成偷袭伤害，即使你并没有夹击目标或是他并不处于措手不及状态。

资源出处: Advanced Class Origins pg. 27

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Onslaught

Open Conduit.name: Open Conduit
Open Conduit.description:
You can draw forth planar energies with unparalleled ease.

Prerequisites
Knowledge (planes) 5 ranks or outsider with the native subtype.

Benefits
Select a conduit feat you have. When determining the uses per day or the amount of time per day you can use this conduit feat, you are treated as though you had an additional 5 ranks in Knowledge (planes). This does not offer any other benefit or affect other uses of Knowledge (planes).

Special
You can select this feat more than once. Its effects do not stack. Each time you select it, choose another conduit feat to gain its benefits.

Open Up.name: 空门大开 Open Up
Open Up.description:
专长类型：CombatTeamwork

你拨开敌人的盾牌，打开目标的空门使得盟友可以长驱直入。

先决条件: 智力13，寓守于攻。

专长效果: 当你成功通过援助他人动作给一个拥有该专长的盟友增加下一击的攻击时，该次攻击将会忽视目标盾牌给予的AC。这种效果只对物理盾牌有效，对法术或其它资源给予的盾牌AC加值无效。

特殊说明: 若你和盟友同时拥有掠阵搭档团队专长，盟友直到你下一回合开始前所有对目标的攻击都会忽视由盾牌给予的AC加值。

资源出处: Melee Tactics Toolbox pg. 10

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Open%20Up

Opening Volley.name: 远近夹攻 Opening Volley
Opening Volley.description:
专长类型：Combat

你用远程武器封锁敌人的活动空间，使他无从闪避你的近战攻击。

专长效果: 每当你对一个敌人造成远程伤害，你对该敌人进行的下一次近战攻击检定将会有+4环境加值。这次近战攻击必须在你下一轮结束前进行。

资源出处: Ultimate Combat pg. 112

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Opening%20Volley

战策增益：当你使用远端攻击造成伤害时，你可以消耗2点耐力，让你对该敌人进行的之后两次近战攻击获得+4环境加值，而不是只有第一次近战攻击。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 127

Opportunistic Grappler.name: Opportunistic Grappler
Opportunistic Grappler.description:
When someone grabs you, you can easily reach that opponent's vulnerable spots.

Benefits
While you are grappled (but not when you are controlling the grapple), you can attempt a dirty trick combat maneuver against the creature grappling you without provoking an attack of opportunity or taking a penalty on the combat maneuver check. If you have the Improved Dirty Trick feat, you gain a +2 bonus on combat maneuver checks to attempt such a dirty trick, and the condition the dirty trick imposes lasts for 1 round longer than normal. This bonus stacks with the bonuses granted by Improved Dirty Trick and Greater Dirty Trick feats.

Oracular Intuition.name: 玄秘直觉 Oracular Intuition
Oracular Intuition.description:
你对于魔法和他人的行为的变化异常敏感。

先决条件: 【秘示域】职业特性。

专长效果: 你在察言观色和法术辨识检定上获得+2加值。如果你在这些技能上拥有10或更高的受训等级，则这些加值提高到+4。

资源出处: Ultimate Magic pg. 153

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Oracular%20Intuition

Orator.name: 雄辩家 Orator
Orator.description:
你擅长于讲演和话术，利用精巧堆砌的辞藻和语调导向你的目标。

先决条件: 技能专攻（语言学）。

专长效果: 你可以使用语言学检定以替代唬骗检定来说谎或掩饰信息；替代交涉检定来改变生物的态度，或是替代威吓检定以强迫生物合作。你必须使用可以和目标交流的语言。

资源出处: Advanced Class Guide pg. 152

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Orator

Orc Fury Style.name: 兽人暴怒斩 Orc Fury Style
Orc Fury Style.description:
专长类型：CombatStyle

你能在敌群中散播恐惧。

先决条件: 威吓猛击，威逼，威吓3级，武器熟悉（Weapon Familiarity）种族特性。

专长效果: 当你持用巨斧（Greataxe）、弯刃大刀（Falchion）、或任何冠有“兽人（orc）”之名的近战武器时，能够以全力攻击（full-attack action）的首次攻击或以标准动作的一部分做出一次或更多次攻击（比如使用顺势斩专长）时使用威吓猛击（Bullying Blow）专长。

资源出处: Weapon Masters Handbook pg. 13

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Orc%20Fury%20Style

Orc Hewer.name: 兽人屠戮者 Orc Hewer
Orc Hewer.description:
专长类型：Combat

你凶猛地砍杀敌人，尤其爱砍兽人。

先决条件: 力量13，顺势斩，地精切裂者，猛力攻击，矮人。

专长效果: 该专长如同“地精切裂者”一般作用，但是你的额外攻击能够用于攻击与你体型相同或更小的生物。此外，当你用这些攻击对抗类人生物（兽人）时，攻击检定获得+2环境加值。

资源出处: Advanced Race Guide pg. 18

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Orc%20Hewer

战策增益：只要你的耐力池中还有1点耐力，你在对抗拥有兽人亚种的类人生物的顺势斩攻击加值提升到+4.

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 128

Orc Rampage.name: 兽人狂怒斩 Orc Rampage
Orc Rampage.description:
专长类型：Combat

你能轻松地斩杀心生惧意的敌人。

先决条件: 威吓猛击，威逼，兽人暴怒斩，威吓5级，武器熟悉种族特性。

专长效果: 当你使用兽人暴怒斩时，对抗战栗（shaken）敌人的攻击检定和伤害检定会获得+1加值，而且你的攻击不再会因为使用威吓猛击专长而承受减值。

资源出处: Weapon Masters Handbook pg. 13

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Orc%20Rampage

Orc Snarl.name: 兽人咆哮斩 Orc Snarl
Orc Snarl.description:
专长类型：Combat

你的攻击会把敌人吓得屁滚尿流。

先决条件: 威吓猛击，威逼，兽人暴怒斩，兽人狂怒斩，威吓7级，武器熟悉种族特性。

专长效果: 若你正在使用兽人暴怒斩，你的豁免检定便会在对抗战栗（shaken）敌人创造的效果时获得+4加值。

资源出处: Weapon Masters Handbook pg. 13

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Orc%20Snarl

Orc Weapon Expertise.name: 兽人武器娴熟 Orc Weapon Expertise
Orc Weapon Expertise.description:
专长类型：Combat

你能用兽人最爱的武器做出更多的事情。

先决条件: 基本攻击加值+1，兽人。

专长效果: 每当你获得该专长，选择以下效果之一。当你使用一件你所擅长的名字中带有“兽人”的武器时，你获得你所选择的效果。这一专长对你不擅长的武器不产生效果。

欺弱（Bully）：在攻击体型比你小至少一级的生物时伤害检定+1。

防御（Defender）：在你的AC上获得+1盾牌加值（若持用双手武器则+2）。

扰乱（Disrupter）：当敌人在你的威胁范围内施展法术时，其专注DC+3。这仅当你知晓敌人的位置且可以对其进行借机攻击时才生效。若你已经使用了本轮的所有借机攻击次数，则该能力不会生效。

致命（Killer）：在确认重击的攻击检定上获得+2表现加值。

暴戾（Thug）：使用武器造成1点非致命伤害。

诡诈（Trickster）：当你使用该武器进行战技检定时，单一类型的战技检定+2。

特殊说明: 你可以多次选择该专长。每次选择该专长，你都必须选择一项不同的效果。你每轮只能使这些效果中的一项生效（在你的回合开始时以一个自由动作选择）。

资源出处: Advanced Race Guide pg. 142

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Orc%20Weapon%20Expertise

战策增益：当你持用一把名字中带有“兽人”的武器，并且你熟稔这把武器时，你可以消耗5点耐力来在一分钟内获得这个专长中一个你并未获得的好处。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 128

Ordered Mind.name: 秩序之心 Ordered Mind
Ordered Mind.description:
先决条件：施法者等级7，任意守序阵营

先决条件: 施法者等级7，任意守序阵营。

专长效果: 你可以将你准备好的法术调整为适合反制法术的形式。但是，你必须通过DC=（20+对手施放的法术环数）而不是（15+法术环数的辨识法术检定）才能以此法进行反制，不过，你可以以任何和对手施放法术同一学派的法术来进行反制。你用来反制的法术环数必须等于或大于对方施放的法术环数。

资源出处: Inner Sea Gods pg. 214Faiths of Corruption pg. 24

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Ordered%20Mind

Oread Burrower.name: 土裔掘地者 Oread Burrower
Oread Burrower.description:
你的轻触就可以分开地面，这使你能够快速地挖掘。

先决条件: 穿石步，角色等级9，土元素裔。

专长效果: 你获得等同于你基本速度一半的掘地速度。你可以钻到沙子、泥土、粘土、沙砾或者其他类似的材质中，但是不能通过坚固的石头。你身后不会留下隧道，地表之上也不会出现痕迹。

资源出处: Advanced Race Guide pg. 147

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Oread%20Burrower

Oread Earth Glider.name: 土裔潜地者 Oread Earth Glider
Oread Earth Glider.description:
大地欢迎你，向你展示泥沙与土壤中的隐藏通路。

先决条件: 土裔掘地者，穿石步，角色等级13，土元素裔。

专长效果: 你获得“潜地”通用怪物能力，你能够在沙子、泥土、粘土、沙砾或者其他类似的材质中以基本速度行动。如果能够不受火焰伤害影响，你甚至可以通过熔岩。你能够以基本速度的一半在固体岩石中穿行。

资源出处: Advanced Race Guide pg. 147

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Oread%20Earth%20Glider

Osirionology.name: Osirionology
Osirionology.description:
You have a broad interest in Osirion and are something of an authority in one specialized field.

Prerequisites
Knowledge (history) 1 rank, Knowledge (local) 1 rank, must be able to speak Osiriani and Ancient Osiriani.

Benefits
Pick one Intelligence-based skill. You gain a +3 bonus on all checks made using that skill in relation to Osirion or its people. In addition, you gain a +1 bonus on all other Intelligence-based skill checks made in relation to Osirion or its people.

Ostentatious Display.name: 炫耀财富 Ostentatious Display
Ostentatious Display.description:
你奢侈的首饰与配件让你看起来非常重要，使你在社交场合得到许多优势。

专长效果: 只要你在正常穿戴魔法物品的栏位装备有价的非魔法物品，让你在对应的技能上得到+1的加值。在多个位置穿着影响同一个技能的配件效果并不会叠加。要进行炫富，该装备的价值必须达到你该等级标准财产的5%，例如要得到+1唬弄加值，一个六级的玩者人物必须穿戴一个价值800gp，镶满宝石的头环，而一个七级的人物则需装备价值1175gp的头环。

装备位置：

腰带、胸口、肩膀：+1威吓

身体、脖子、脚部：+1交涉

额头、眼睛、双手：+1唬弄

头部、戒子、手腕：+1表演

资源出处: Dungeoneers Handbook pg. 12

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Ostentatious%20Display

Ostentatious Rager.name: 招摇狂暴者 Ostentatious Rager
Ostentatious Rager.description:
专长类型：Combat

你能用凶悍可怖的演出吸引观众，也能迫使关键的敌人专注于你。

先决条件: 威吓5级，狂暴（Rage）职业能力。

专长效果: 你能通过彰显自己的力气、练出让人惊诧的把式来使用威吓技能赚钱（earn money），与使用表演技能赚钱完全相同。

除此之外，当你正处于狂暴（raging）时，若有1名敌人将要因为你的技能而被挫败士气（demoralized），而且它现在并未因为你的威吓而陷入颤栗（shaken）的话，你能够选择用扰乱它的注意力来取代让它陷入颤栗，持续至你的下个回合开始为止。在此期间，该名敌人在与你无关（don't involve you）的察觉检定中受到-5减值，AC在对抗除你以外的生物所发起的攻击时受到-2减值。如果除你以外的生物对该名敌人发起攻击，或者你使用挫败士气来让该名敌人陷入颤栗的话，上述效果便会提前结束。

资源出处: Ultimate Intrigue pg. 87

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Ostentatious%20Rager

Ostentatious Weakness.name: 技指弱点 Ostentatious Weakness
Ostentatious Weakness.description:
专长类型：CombatPerformance

你对死敌的了解能够让观众满意。

先决条件: 基本攻击加值+5，宿敌（favored enemy）职业能力。

专长效果: 当你花费迅捷动作来尝试演武检定时，若与你战斗的敌人是你的宿敌，则可以将宿敌加值加到此次检定上。

资源出处: Inner Sea Combat pg. 12

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Ostentatious%20Weakness

战策增益：你可以消耗2点耐力来选择另个一个种类的宿敌（如果你选择的是类人或者异界生物，则需要选择亚种）。被你选定的种类将会在决定技指弱点的效果时被视为你宿敌职业能力所选中的种类，获得等同于你最高宿敌加值的加值。

战策资源出处: Weapon Master's Handbook pg. 25

Osyluth Guile.name: 骨魔之狡诈 Osyluth Guile
Osyluth Guile.description:
专长类型：Combat

你有技巧地使你的对手的攻击失准。

先决条件: 唬骗8级，闪避。

专长效果: 当你使用防御式战斗或者采用全防御时，你可以选择一名对手。到你的下回合为止，你在针对其的近战攻击时在AC上获得等同于你的魅力调整值的闪避加值。当你不能看到你所选择的对手时你不能使用此专长。

资源出处: Cheliax, Empire of Devils pg. 27

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Osyluth%20Guile

Otherworldly Influence.name: Otherworldly Influence
Otherworldly Influence.description:
Extradimensional forces vie for your soul, and have offered you riches and power to claim it.

Prerequisites
You must have refused an evil creature with at least 15 Hit Dice who offered gifts or assistance, have refused an evil creature offering to cast a spell of 7th-level or higher on your behalf, or have the Planar Offering background.

Benefits
When negotiating with evil outsiders, you gain a +2 bonus on Bluff and Diplomacy checks. You gain an amount of spell resistance equal to 5 + your character level against spells and spell-like abilities originating from outsiders with the evil subtype.

Goal
Receive a boon from an evil creature that is equivalent in value to a month's service or an 8th-level spell without becoming indebted to the creature or giving up anything in return. This cannot be the result of magical compulsion.

Completion Benefit
You gain an amount of spell resistance equal to 5 + your character level against spells or spell-like abilities originating from outsiders.

Our Bounty, Our Glory.name: Our Bounty, Our Glory
Our Bounty, Our Glory.description:
You can ignore privation and channel your emotions to prepare for a later bounty.

Prerequisites
Be a member of House Denzarni, or have the Bloodthirsty, Omen, Tree Tender, or Unsuspecting Master background.

Benefits
You add 1 day to the time you can go without food or water before making Constitution checks and you add +4 to Constitution checks to stave off the effects of starvation and thirst.

Goal
You must succumb to your emotions and be victorious. Thwart an appropriate number of foes while you are subject to an effect with the emotion descriptor, such as rage.

Completion Benefit
Once per day, you can use heroes' feast as a spell-like ability with a caster level equal to your character level, although your feast does not grant the effects of neutralize poison or remove disease.

Out of the Sun.name: Out of the Sun
Out of the Sun.description:
You and your allies use the sun's glare to your advantage.

Prerequisites
Bluff 3 ranks, Stealth 3 ranks.

Benefits
When you hit with a melee attack, you can attempt a Bluff check as a move action to feint. You do not gain the benefits of this feint; instead, if you succeed at your Bluff check, an ally with this feat who is adjacent to you or your opponent gains the benefits, such that the opponent is denied its Dexterity bonus to AC (if any) against your ally's next melee attack against that opponent. This attack must be made before the end of your ally's next turn. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus on your Bluff check in bright light. This bonus increases to +4 in natural sunlight. You cannot use this feat in dim light or darkness.

Special
If you have the Improved Feint feat, you can feint with Out of the Sun as a swift action after you hit with a melee attack.

Outer Planes Traveler.name: Outer Planes Traveler
Outer Planes Traveler.description:
You have seen the outer reaches of the multiverse, and have gleaned knowledge from these alien realms. You have a special affinity for one of these realms in particular, and carry some of that plane's power within you.

Prerequisites
Knowledge (planes) 11 ranks, ability to cast plane shift or gate as a spell or spell-like ability.

Benefits
Choose one of the planes below. The alignment of the plane must be within one step of your alignment. You gain a +2 bonus on saves against spells and spell-like abilities with the associated descriptor, and you cast spells with that descriptor at +1 caster level.

PlaneAlignmentDescriptor
HeavenLGLight
NirvanaNGGood
ElysiumCGEmotion
AxisLNLawful
The BoneyardNDeath
The MaelstromCNChaotic
HellLEPain
AbaddonNEEvil
The AbyssCEFear

Outslug Sprint.name: 牙突·零 Outslug Sprint
Outslug Sprint.description:
专长类型：Combat

你突入和位移的速度快如闪电。

先决条件: 牙突式，牙突进，智力13，突刺（Lunge），寓守于攻或拳师武学智慧（Brawler's Cunning）职业能力，对所选武器拥有武器专攻专长。

专长效果: 当开启牙突流架势时，你在进行五尺快步时可以额外移动5尺距离。

资源出处: Weapon Masters Handbook pg. 16

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Outslug%20Sprint

Outslug Style.name: 牙突式 Outslug Style
Outslug Style.description:
专长类型：CombatStyle

你如同疾风般突入或撤出战局。

先决条件: 智力13，寓守于攻或拳师武学智慧（Brawler's Cunning）职业能力，对所选武器拥有武器专攻专长。

专长效果: 选择一件贴身战士武器组中的武器，当你开启此流派架势时，如果你进行一次五尺快步，那么你就可以在防御等级上获得+1闪避加值，在所选的武器伤害上获得+1加值，持续到你的下一轮开始。

特殊说明: 一个拥有拳师的殴斗大师或拥有武器训练（贴身武器）职业能力的角色可以使用任何贴身武器而非仅限于他所选的单件武器来获得此流派的好处。

资源出处: Weapon Masters Handbook pg. 16

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Outslug%20Style

Outslug Weave.name: 牙突进 Outslug Weave
Outslug Weave.description:
专长类型：Combat

你可以在远处对敌人的要害发动突击。

先决条件: 牙突式，智力13，突刺（Lunge），寓守于攻或拳师武学智慧（Brawler's Cunning）职业能力，对所选武器拥有武器专攻专长，基础攻击加值+5或武僧等级+5。

专长效果: 当你开启牙突式架势时，你不会在使用突刺专长的效果时在防御等级上承受-2减值。并且，牙突式专长为你在防御等级和武器伤害上提供的加值上升到+2。

资源出处: Weapon Masters Handbook pg. 16

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Outslug%20Weave

Overachiever.name: Overachiever
Overachiever.description:
Others made you feel small for too long, and now you drive yourself hard and never settle for second place.

Prerequisites
You must have been defeated by the same individual, organization, or creature type at least four times, or have the Boarding School or Humiliated background.

Benefits
You take only half the normal penalties from exhaustion. Choose one skill upon selecting this feat. Once per day, you can forgo rest to study or practice, gaining a +3 bonus on all checks attempted with your selected skill for 24 hours but becoming fatigued in the process. If you rest to recover from this fatigue, this bonus ends (but not if you recover from your fatigue in other ways, such as via lesser restoration). Forgoing rest for this purpose does not interfere with a spellcaster's ability to prepare spells.

Goal
You must utterly humiliate a member of your hated group by besting that creature at an activity for which it is known or in which it takes pride. This opponent's Hit Dice must exceed your current character level by at least 1.

Completion Benefit
Each time you forgo rest to study or practice, you can apply this feat's +3 bonus to a different skill. If you have 10 or more ranks in the skill selected, this bonus increases to +6.

Overhead Flip.name: Overhead Flip
Overhead Flip.description:
You hoist your opponent above your head before slamming him to the ground, temporarily staggering the foe.

Prerequisites
Str 13, Improved Grapple, Improved Unarmed Strike, Savage Slam, base attack bonus +9 or monk level 6th.

Benefits
While you are using Savage Slam, if you succeed at your grapple combat maneuver check to knock your opponent prone, the opponent must succeed at a Fortitude save (DC = 10 + your base attack bonus) or be staggered for 1 round. Oozes, incorporeal creatures, and creatures that are immune to critical hits are immune to this effect.

Overpowering Stare.name: Overpowering Stare
Overpowering Stare.description:
Your painful stare overwhelms your foe's mind.

Prerequisites
Mesmerist level 11th, painful stare class feature.

Benefits
Whenever you use your painful stare, the target must succeed at a Will saving throw (DC = 10 + half your mesmerist level + your Charisma modifier) or become confused for 1 round. Whether or not the save is successful, a creature cannot be affected by this ability again for 24 hours.

Overseer of the House of Truth.name: Overseer of the House of Truth
Overseer of the House of Truth.description:
Your creator was a politician and administrator, and your memories are filled with the sound of clinking coins.

Prerequisites
Shabti.

Benefits
You gain a second daily use of your suggestion spell-like ability. You gain a third daily use at 8th level, a fourth at 13th level, and a fifth at 16th level.

Overwatch Style.name: 矢暴式 Overwatch Style
Overwatch Style.description:
专长类型：CombatStyle

你知道何时放开弓弦可以对敌人造成最大的伤害。

先决条件: 快速射击，精准射击，对所选武器拥有武器专攻专长。

专长效果: 当你开启此流派的架势时，你可以以一个整轮动作，使用自己所选的武器准备两次远程攻击，每一次攻击都设定一个你所选的触发条件。你在这两次准备攻击的攻击检定上承受-2减值。

特殊说明: 一个拥有武器训练（弓，弩或火器）职业能力的角色可以使用任何弓，弩或火器而非仅限于他所选的单件武器来获得此流派的好处。

资源出处: Weapon Masters Handbook pg. 14

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Overwatch%20Style

Overwatch Tactician.name: 矢暴策 Overwatch Tactician
Overwatch Tactician.description:
专长类型：Combat

你可以在短时间内预判敌人的行动并准备箭矢喂给他们。

先决条件: 快速射击，精准射击，矢暴式，对所选武器拥有武器专攻专长。

专长效果: 当你开启矢暴流的架势时，你可以以一个标准动作而非整轮动作准备两次远程攻击。

资源出处: Weapon Masters Handbook pg. 15

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Overwatch%20Tactician

Overwatch Vortex.name: 矢暴啸 Overwatch Vortex
Overwatch Vortex.description:
专长类型：Combat

你箭壶里的每一支箭都知道自己的目的地在哪。

先决条件: 快速射击，精准射击，矢暴式，矢暴策，对所选武器拥有武器专攻专长，基础攻击加值+11。

专长效果: 当你开启矢暴流的架势时，你可以以一个整轮动作，使用自己所选的武器准备最多四次次远程攻击，每一次攻击都设定一个你所选的触发条件。你在这四次准备攻击的攻击检定上承受-2减值。

资源出处: Weapon Masters Handbook pg. 15

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Overwatch%20Vortex

Overwhelm.name: Overwhelm
Overwhelm.description:
You can overwhelm large foes with sheer numbers.

Benefits
You are considered to be flanking an opponent if at least one ally who also has this feat is threatening that opponent and the opponent is at least two size categories larger than the larger of you or your ally, regardless of your actual positioning.

Normal
You must be positioned opposite an ally to flank an opponent.

Overwhelming Phantom.name: Overwhelming Phantom
Overwhelming Phantom.description:
Your phantom is strong-willed, allowing it to enter and dominate other creature's minds.

Prerequisites
Phantom class feature, spiritualist level 15th.

Benefits
Three times per day, as a standard action while it is fully manifested, your phantom can attempt to enter and take control of a living creature; doing so provokes an attack of opportunity. A creature can resist this influence with a successful Will save (DC = 1/2 the phantom's Hit Dice + the phantom's Charisma modifier). A phantom can maintain this control for 1 minute per spiritualist level you have, but the victim is allowed a new saving throw each minute. This ability otherwise functions as greater possession.

Owl Dive.name: 枭穿式 Owl Dive
Owl Dive.description:
专长类型：Combat

武技训练让你能够在飞行和冲锋时穿过他人所处的空间。

先决条件: 敏捷 17，枭冲式，枭落式，技能专攻（潜行），BAB +7或武僧等级5级，特技动作1级，飞行1级，潜行1级。

专长效果: 当你使用枭冲式（Owl Style）时，能够使用你的基本攻击加值取代你在飞行中投入的技能点数，并以此来判断你的飞行技能加值。你能够冲锋（charge）穿过其他生物占据的空间，但是和正常情况一样，你必须做出成功的特技动作检定才能通过敌人占据的空间。当你于冲锋途中穿过敌人占据的空间，而且在此时作出的特技动作检定中失败时，你的冲锋便会在进入该名敌人占据的空间时结束；如果你能威胁到该名敌人，则可以用你的冲锋攻击对抗该名敌人。

资源出处: Ultimate Intrigue pg. 88

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Owl%20Dive

Owl Style.name: 枭冲式 Owl Style
Owl Style.description:
专长类型：CombatStyle

你的攻击就像枭一般安静。

先决条件: 敏捷 13，技能专攻（潜行），潜行1级。

专长效果: 当你使用这个流派时，能够使用你的基本攻击加值取代你在潜行技能中投入的技能点数，并以此来判断你的潜行技能调整值（与正常情况一样，这不会替换掉其他来源提供的技能加值，比如技能专攻带来的效果）。当你以这种架势进行潜行时，能够在承受以全速潜行（Stealth at full speed）而带来的减值（这通常为-5减值）之外，承受-10减值来进行冲锋（charge）。如果敌人的察觉检定失败，而且没有以其他方式（比如盲感之类的能力）发现你的话，这些敌人在对抗你于冲锋期间或者冲锋结束时作出的攻击（以取代正常的第一次攻击）时，AC会失去敏捷加值。

资源出处: Ultimate Intrigue pg. 88

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Owl%20Style

Owl Swoop.name: 枭落式 Owl Swoop
Owl Swoop.description:
专长类型：Combat

武技训练让你能够以华丽的技巧移动。

先决条件: 敏捷 15，枭冲式，技能专攻（潜行），特技动作1级，潜行1级。

专长效果: 当你使用枭冲式（Owl Style）时，能够使用你的基本攻击加值取代你在特技动作中投入的技能点数，并以此来判断你的特技动作技能加值。你能尝试特技动作检定来在光滑或狭窄的表面上移动，也可以用于避免冲锋时引起的借机攻击，不过依旧如常承受全速进行移动所带来的检定DC提升和减值。

资源出处: Ultimate Intrigue pg. 88

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Owl%20Swoop

Pacify Animal.name: Pacify Animal
Pacify Animal.description:
You are able to calm rampaging animals.

Prerequisites
Wild empathy class feature.

Benefits
As a full-round action, you attempt to mollify an animal or magical beast with an Intelligence score of 1 or 2 and an attitude of hostile toward you or your allies. You attempt a wild empathy check (DC = 10 + the target's Hit Dice + the target's Charisma modifier). If you succeed, the target's attitude toward you and your allies becomes indifferent for 1 minute, and it does not attack during this time. If the target is attacked during this time or if the target can see you or your allies after 1 minute, it becomes hostile again. A creature can be affected by this pacification attempt only once in a 24-hour period.

Special
Animal companions and creatures under magical compulsion are harder to pacify; the DC for such creatures equals 15 + the target's Hit Dice + the target's Charisma modifier. An animal companion also applies its bonus on Will saves from the devotion ability to this DC, and attacking the animal's master also breaks this effect. An animal companion's master can direct the animal to attack again, but the DC of this Handle Animal check is increased by your wild empathy modifier.

Pack Attack.name: 机动攻击 Pack Attack
Pack Attack.description:
专长类型：CombatTeamwork

你擅长绕着敌人转。

先决条件: 基本攻击加值+1。

专长效果: 当你发动近战攻击首次命中对手、且和拥有此专长的盟友邻接时，你可以通过直觉动作进行五尺快步，即便你这轮已经移动过位置。

通常状况: 你只能在没有移动过的状况下使用五尺快步。

资源出处: Ultimate Combat pg. 112

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Pack%20Attack

战策增益：当你邻接一个同样拥有这个专长的盟友时，你可以消耗2点耐力以一个自由动作而不是直觉动作来做出5尺快步。你仍然只能在一轮内使用一次这个专长的能力。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 128

Pack Flanking.name: 兽群围猎 Pack Flanking
Pack Flanking.description:
专长类型：CombatTeamwork

你和你的动物伙伴练习过如何围杀猎物。

先决条件: 智力13，寓守于攻，可以获得动物伙伴。

专长效果: 当你和拥有此专长的动物伙伴共享方格或处于邻接状态，且同时威胁一个目标时，你们即都视为夹击目标，无论你们的位置如何。

通常状况: 你必须和盟友处于目标的对角才能夹击目标。

资源出处: Advanced Class Guide pg. 153

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Pack%20Flanking

Pack Intimidation.name: Pack Intimidation
Pack Intimidation.description:
You draw on the strength of numbers and your shared convictions to intimidate your foes.

Prerequisites
Half-orc, intimidating racial trait.

Benefits
Whenever you use the Intimidate skill to demoralize foes, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus on your check for every ally who also has this feat within 30 feet (maximum +6).

Pack Rat.name: 老鼠搬家 Pack Rat
Pack Rat.description:
你总是带着各种各样意想不到的东西，今天丢了这个，明天就会翻出那个来。

先决条件: 鼠族。

专长效果: 每天一次，当你面临急需某一件普通物品的情况时，你可以在随身的收藏里马上找出它来。这件物品的价格不能高于25GP+5GP/你的每个等级，而且你需要为它“付钱”（你花钱买过它，只是大多数时候想不起来它在什么地方而已）。这件物品必须是某种易于你携带的道具——比如，如果你徒步行走并且只有一个背包，那么你不能掏出一口大铁锅。你不能使用该专长获得魔法物品，也不能获得某种特殊物品，比如某一扇门的钥匙。如果你脱光装备或者个人物品，那么你会失去该专长的好处，直至你再次拥有这些物品至少1天为止，来使你获得补给，用于“获取”新的物品。

资源出处: Monster Codex pg. 176

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Pack%20Rat

Pack Tactics.name: 群体战术 Pack Tactics
Pack Tactics.description:
你训练自己的动物伙伴，教会它们按你的指挥进行战斗。

先决条件: 智力13，动物伙伴职业能力。

专长效果: 在决定你和你的盟友是否会因为团队专长而获得加值的情况时，你的动物伙伴视为拥有对应的团队专长，但除非它确实选取了这个团队专长，否则动物伙伴自身无法从中受益。你和没有以及动物伙伴必须满足团队专长所描述的情况（如站位要求）才能获得团队专长的好处。

资源出处: Advanced Class Origins pg. 27

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Pack%20Tactics

Page.name: Page
Page.description:
You recruit a page who heralds your approach and has the ability to smooth the path of your diplomatic missions.

Prerequisites
Character level 4th, proficiency with martial weapons.

Benefits
This feat is similar to the Leadership feat, with several exceptions. You can attract only a 1st-level cohort (referred to hereafter as a page) with this feat, and can't recruit followers. You determine your Leadership score according to the rules presented in the Leadership feat, but your page is always at least 3 levels lower than your level.

A page can take levels in bard, cavalier, or paladin. She cannot multiclass, though she can take any archetype for which she qualifies.

Whenever a page tries to influence a creature's attitude by using the Diplomacy skill, she can use her total Diplomacy skill bonus or yours. Any improvement of a creature's attitude toward the page also applies to you.

If a page gains enough XP to bring her to 2 levels lower than your level, she doesn't gain the new level until you gain your next level; until then, her XP total remains 1 less than the amount needed to attain the next level and she gains no additional XP until you advance in level.

If you release your page from service or otherwise lose your page, you can recruit a new one. At 7th level, you can swap this feat for the Leadership feat.

Painful Anchor.name: 痛苦之锚 Painful Anchor
Painful Anchor.description:
邪恶的异界生物在试图连接其他位面的时候将受到伤害。

先决条件: 【锚定灵光】职业特性。【编注：【锚定灵光（Anchoring aura）】是圣骑士反邪魔誓约（Oath against Fiends, UM）的8级能力。】。

专长效果: 当一个邪恶异界生物在你的锚定灵光范围内使用呼唤、召唤、传送效果或者其他任何从物理上将生物于他位面间转移的（如‘闪现术’、‘幻化灵体’）能力时，它受到“4d8+你的魅力修正”的伤害。这是一种源自神圣力量的伤害，伤害抗力、免疫能量伤害、能量抗力对此不起作用。

资源出处: Ultimate Magic pg. 153

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Painful%20Anchor

Painful Blow.name: Painful Blow
Painful Blow.description:
You have learned how to land blows so painful it is difficult for struck spellcasters to concentrate.

Prerequisites
Vital Strike, base attack bonus +6, Knowledge (arcana) 3 ranks.

Benefits
When you use Vital Strike (or Improved Vital Strike or Greater Vital Strike), the creature you hit with the attack must treat the damage dealt as continuous damage until the beginning of your next turn. This forces the target to attempt a concentration check if it casts a spell (Pathfinder RPG Core Rulebook 206). You can use this benefit twice per day, or three times per day if your base attack bonus is +12 or higher.

Painful Cures.name: Painful Cures
Painful Cures.description:
Your healing spells exacerbate rather than alleviate pain.

Prerequisites
Evil alignment.

Benefits
Whenever you use a spell to restore hit points to a living creature, you can cause that creature to be wracked with waves of searing pain. If you do, the spell gains the evil and pain (Pathfinder RPG Ultimate Magic 251) descriptors. The target takes nonlethal damage equal to the number of hit points restored. If the target fails its saving throw or chooses not to attempt one against your healing spell, it takes a -2 penalty on saving throws and skill checks for 10 minutes per caster level. If the spell does not normally allow a saving throw, it instead allows a Fortitude saving throw to negate this penalty (but not the nonlethal damage dealt).

Paired Opportunists.name: 双重借机 Paired Opportunists
Paired Opportunists.description:
专长类型：CombatTeamwork

你明白如何让敌人为了懈怠的防守而付出代价。

专长效果: 每当你邻近一名拥有该专长的盟友，那么在对抗同时处于你们威胁范围内的生物时，你们的借机攻击都会获得+4环境加值。若敌人处于你的威胁范围，那么只要他引起你的盟友的借机攻击，就也会引起你的借机攻击（即使由于某些能力或者环境，导致正常情况下不会引起你的借机攻击）。在对抗一名生物的一次特定动作时，该专长不会允许你获得超过一次的借机攻击机会。

资源出处: Advanced Players Guide pg. 166

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Paired%20Opportunists

战策增益：只要同样拥有这个专长的盟友在你的近战触及范围内，你就能消耗2点耐力来在你的下一回合开始之前获得这个专长的好处。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 128

Pantheistic Blessing.name: Pantheistic Blessing
Pantheistic Blessing.description:
You are grated a small bit of divine power as a result of your veneration of a pantheon of deities.

Prerequisites
Wis 13, must worship a pantheon of deities.

Benefits
When taking this feat, select a pantheon from the list below. You gain the listed spell-like ability for your selected pantheon, usable once per day. If the granted spell allows a saving throw, the DC is equal to 10 + 1/2 your character level + your Charisma modifier.

Special
If you act out of line with the tenets of your pantheons beliefs, you lose the ability to cast the granted spell-like ability until you have received an atonement for your transgression (as a cleric restoring lost class abilities).

Pantheons of Golarion

Each pantheon below notes the type of pantheon, as well as the member deities and the most common sorts of worshipers found within the faith. Additionally, each pantheon grants a spell-like ability to followers who take the Pantheistic Blessing feat. An asterisk after a deity’s name indicates that he or she is the head of the pantheon.

Archdevils (aligned, racial, and cultural)

Deities Asmodeus* (LE), Baalzebul (LE), Barbatos (LE), Belial (LE), Dispater (LE), Geryon (LE), Mammon (LE), Mephistopheles (LE), Moloch (LE)

Common Believers Chelaxians, devils, diabolists, tieflings

Granted Spell-Like Ability infernal healingISWG

Ascended Pantheon (cultural)

Deities Cayden Cailean (CG), Iomedae (LG), Norgorber (NE), Aroden (prior to his death), sometimes Irori (LN) and Nethys (N)

Common Believers Absalomians, adventurers, individualists

Granted Spell-Like Ability divine favor

Demon Lords (aligned, cultural, and racial)

Deities Abraxas (CE), Baphomet (CE), Cyth-V’sug (CE), Deskari (CE), Flauros (CE), Lamashtu* (CE), Nocticula (CE), Pazuzu (CE), Shax (CE), Sifkesh (CE), Zura (CE), many others

Common Believers drow, murderers, psychopaths

Granted Spell-Like Ability lesser confusion

Dwarven Pantheon (racial)

Deities Angradd (LG), Bolka (NG), Dranngvit (LN), Folgrit (LG), Grundinnar (LG), Kols (LN), Magrim (LN), Torag* (LG), Trudd (NG)

Common Believers dwarves

Granted Spell-Like Ability crafter’s fortuneAPG

Eldest (cultural and racial)

Deities Count Ranalc (CN), Green Mother (NE), Imbrex (LN), Lantern King (CN), Lost Prince (N), Magdh (LN), Ng (N), Ragadahn (CE), Shyka (N)

Common Believers druids, gnomes, fey

Granted Spell-Like Ability silent image

Elven Pantheon (racial)

Deities Calistria* (CN), Desna (CG), Findeladlara (CG), Ketephys (CG), Nethys (N), Yuelral (NG)

Common Believers elves, half-elves

Granted Spell-Like Ability identify

Empyreal Lords (aligned and cultural)

Deities Andoletta (LG), Arshea (NG), Korada (NG), Ragathiel (LG), Sinashakti (CG), Valani (CG), many others

Common Believers aasimars, angels, Kellids, Varisians.

Granted Spell-Like Ability protection from evil

Order of the God Claw Pantheon (aligned)

Deities Abadar (LN), Asmodeus (LE), Iomedae (LG), Irori (LN), Torag (LG)

Common Believers Hellknights

Granted Spell-Like Ability protection from chaos

Sandpoint Pantheon (cultural)

Deities Abadar (LN), Desna (CG), Erastil (LG), Gozreh (N), Sarenrae (NG), Shelyn (NG)

Common Believers natives of the Lost Coast

Granted Spell-Like Ability sanctuary

Taldan Pantheon (cultural)

Deities Abadar (LN), Cayden Cailean (CG), Norgorber (NE), Shelyn (NG)

Common Believers Taldan nationalists

Granted Spell-Like Ability shield of faith

Vudrani Pantheon (cultural)

Deities Chamidu (N), Dhalavei (LE), Gruhastha (LG), Irori* (LN), Lahkgya (CE), Likha (N), Ragdya (N), Raumya (NE), Suyuddha (LN), Vineshvakhi (LN), Vritra (LE), thousands of other deities

Common Believers Vudrani

Granted Spell-Like Ability true strike

Panther Claw.name: 豹爪 Panther Claw
Panther Claw.description:
专长类型：Combat

你在移动中以眼花缭乱之势反击攻向你的敌人。

先决条件: 感知15，战斗反射，精通徒手打击，豹形拳。

专长效果: 你处于豹拳流派架势时，你可以用自由动作进行对借机攻击的反击。你在你的行动轮中可以做出等同你感知修正次数的反击。

资源出处: Ultimate Combat pg. 112

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Panther%20Claw

战策增益：当你做出一次反击时，你可以消耗至多5点耐力来在伤害骰上获得等同于你消耗耐力两倍的加值。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 128

Panther Parry.name: 迅豹闪 Panther Parry
Panther Parry.description:
专长类型：Combat

你的猛恶攻击削弱了敌人趁你移动时袭击的能力。

先决条件: 感知15，战斗反射，精通徒手打击，豹形拳，豹爪。

专长效果: 你处于豹拳流派架势时，你的反击可以在对方进行借机攻击前作出，如果你的这次反击对对手造成伤害，对手对你的借机攻击在攻击骰和伤害骰都有-2罚值。

资源出处: Ultimate Combat pg. 112

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Panther%20Parry

战策增益：当你的反击对敌人造成伤害时，你可以消耗5点耐力来让目标在攻击和伤害骰上的减值提升到-4。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 128

Panther Style.name: 豹形拳 Panther Style
Panther Style.description:
专长类型：CombatStyle

你可以反击那些趁你移步而进犯的敌人。

先决条件: 感知13，战斗反射，精通徒手打击。

专长效果: 当你处于豹拳流派架势时，当你在穿过威胁区域而引发借机攻击时，你能以迅捷动作用徒手反击你的对手。这次攻击在诱发对方借机攻击后才能发动。

资源出处: Ultimate Combat pg. 112

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Panther%20Style

战策增益：当你引发借机攻击时，你可以消耗5点耐力来以迅捷动作做出一次反击。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 128

Pao-Lung Self-Improvement.name: Pao-Lung Self-Improvement
Pao-Lung Self-Improvement.description:
As a devotee of Pao-Lung philosophy, you constantly strive to learn from your mistakes and slowly but surely improve every aspect of yourself.

Prerequisites
Must be devoted to the philosophy of Pao- Lung and not worship any deities.

Benefits
Whenever you roll a natural 1 on an ability check, caster level check, saving throw, or skill check, or fail any of these checks by 5 or more, you may dedicate yourself to that specific type of check (such as a Will saving throw or a Swim skill check). For the next 24 hours, you gain a +1 bonus on checks of that type; the bonus increases by 1 every time you fail that type of check. If you succeed at your chosen type of check, the bonus immediately ends. Once you have designated a type of check to be affected by this feat, you cannot use the feat for another type of check for at least 24 hours.

Paralyzing Strike.name: 定身拳 Paralyzing Strike
Paralyzing Strike.description:
专长类型：Combat

你巧妙的一击命中对手的秘孔，使他全身僵直。

先决条件: 敏捷13，感知13，精通徒手击打，基础攻击加值+14。

专长效果: 你必须在投掷攻击骰之前宣告使用此专长（因此，未命中会导致尝试失败）。定身拳在正常造成伤害的同时，还会强制受到你徒手击打伤害的敌人进行一次DC=10+1/2你的角色等级+感知调整值的强韧豁免检定。豁免检定失败的防御者将麻痹1轮或直到受到任何造成生命值伤害的法术为止。每4级你每天可以多尝试一次取力攻击，每轮不能超过1次。构装、泥怪、植物、不死、虚体生物和免疫重击的生物不会被本能力影响。

资源出处: Advanced Class Guide pg. 153

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Paralyzing%20Strike

战策增益：你可以消耗5点耐力来在你使用徒手击打击中敌人之后宣告使用这个专长。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 128

Parry Spell.name: 回击法术 Parry Spell
Parry Spell.description:
你能够将敌人的法术反射回它的施法者。

先决条件: 法术辨识15级，精通法术反制。

专长效果: 当你成功反制法术时，它会被反转至其施法者处。该专长与‘法术反转（spell turning）’法术完全一致。

资源出处: Advanced Players Guide pg. 166

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Parry%20Spell

Parting Blast.name: 临终念爆 Parting Blast
Parting Blast.description:
你的死亡会引发一场临终爆破秀。

先决条件: 念袭（Kinetic Blast）职业能力。

专长效果: 你能够承受1点超载，来准备一次在你死亡时自动触发的念袭。在你的超载被移除之前的任意时点，如果你被杀死的话，身体会立即释放出一场爆炸，这会对半径5尺范围内的所有生物造成伤害，伤害数值相当于你的简易念袭（Simple Blast）。临终念爆也会毁坏你的尸体，因此这可能会防止某些需要完整尸体的魔法产生作用。

资源出处: Occult Adventures pg. 137

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Parting%20Blast

Parting Shot.name: 牵制射击 Parting Shot
Parting Shot.description:
专长类型：Combat

你是散兵中的能手，无论是在前进还是撤退中都可以将箭雨洒向敌人。

先决条件: 敏捷13，闪避，灵活移动，近距射击，移动射击，基本攻击加值+6。

专长效果: 每次遭遇1次，当你使用撤退动作时，你能够在移动中的任意一点进行单次远程攻击。

特殊说明: 从6级起，选择【箭术战斗流派】的游侠能够将“牵制射击”作为战斗流派专长进行选取。

通常状况: 你无法在撤退动作中进行攻击。

资源出处: Advanced Players Guide pg. 166Pathfinder Campaign Setting pg. 112

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Parting%20Shot

战策增益：你可以消耗2点耐力来在单次遭遇中第二次获得这个专长的好处。你在每次遭遇中只能使用一次该战策，所以在单次遭遇中最多只能使用牵制射击2次。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 128

Partner.name: Partner
Partner.description:
The closest relationship one can achieve with an established merchant house is to be named a partner.

Prerequisites
Character level 9th. The character must have been a colleague of the merchant house for at least 3 years, and must have performed a life-changing service for a member of the house, such as saving her life or setting up a lucrative trade network in an otherwise inaccessible area (such as another plane).

Benefits
The character is offered adoption into the merchant family and citizenship in the empire of Kelesh, if she is not already a citizen. The character draws a stipend of 1,000 gp per month (funded by the house), can borrow up to 50,000 gp per year at no interest (the amount must be paid back within 1 year), and receives the non-monetary benefits detailed at the colleague level. Upon the character's elevation to the status of partner, the house gifts her with a custom magic item worth no more than 12,000 gp.

Pass For Human.name: 人类之证 Pass For Human
Pass For Human.description:
你很容易被误认为是人类，而非你的同族。

先决条件: 半精灵，半兽人或者半身人（见特殊说明）。

专长效果: 当你把自己伪装成人类时，你的易容检定获得+10加值，并且当你这么做的时候，易容检定不会由于将自己易容成其他种族成员而受到减值。在人类所占比率很高或者人类的社区内，你可以在这个易容检定中取10，这意味着除非给他们一个理由去进行怀疑，大多数人都倾向于认为你是人类。

特殊说明: 半身人可以选择该专长，但是必须拥有“童颜”专长作为先决条件。这两个专长的好处叠加。

资源出处: Advanced Players Guide pg. 166

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Pass%20For%20Human

Passing Grace.name: Passing Grace
Passing Grace.description:
Your bond with your allies allows you to share positive energy between yourselves.

Benefits
Whenever a healing spell or an effect would restore you to above your maximum hit points, you can redirect excess hit points to an adjacent ally who has this feat. This ability functions only for effects that require an action to activate--fast healing, regeneration, and other passive effects that restore hit points are not shared.

Passing Trick.name: 越位虚招 Passing Trick
Passing Trick.description:
专长类型：Combat

穿越一个敌人所在位置能给予你晃点他的机会。

先决条件: 智力13，寓守于攻，闪避，精通虚招，灵活移动，小体型或更小。

专长效果: 每当你成功的进行了一次特技检定以穿过对手所在空间，你可以用迅捷动作对其进行一次唬骗检定以施放虚招。

特殊说明: 如果你拥有“钻胯而过（Underfoot, APG）”专长而对手正好比你体型大，你在本专长的唬骗检定上获得+2加值。

资源出处: Ultimate Combat pg. 112

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Passing%20Trick

战策增益：你可以消耗5点耐力来在使用这个专长时以一个自由动作而不是迅捷动作尝试虚招。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 128

Pathfinder Society Ally.name: Pathfinder Society Ally
Pathfinder Society Ally.description:
The Pathfinder Society grants you access to its archives in thanks for services previously rendered.

Prerequisites
Associate (Pathfinder Society).

Benefits
The Pathfinder Society's vast archives are available for you to exploit. In any settlement that is the size of a small town or larger, you can spend 1d4 hours researching notes from available Pathfinders to gain a +4 circumstance bonus on a single Knowledge check.

Pathologist.name: Pathologist
Pathologist.description:
You can offer greater care for diseases and poisons than other healers can.

Prerequisites
Incredible Healer.

Benefits
When you use the Heal skill to treat disease or poison, instead of granting a +4 competence bonus on the target's saving throws to resist the affliction, you may instead choose to allow the target to use the result of your Heal check in place of his next saving throw to resist the disease or poison.

Patient Strike.name: Patient Strike
Patient Strike.description:
Your training under the Master of Swords has taught you that a well-timed strike is worth waiting for and that patience will serve you well in the long run.

Prerequisites
Int 13.

Benefits
You can choose to ready an attack as a fullround action instead of a standard action. When you do so, you gain a +2 bonus on your attack roll when your readied action triggers.

Normal
Readying an attack is a standard action and doesn't grant a bonus on your attack roll.

Pattern Message.name: Pattern Message
Pattern Message.description:
You've become skilled at inserting secret messages into your pattern illusions.

Prerequisites
Caster level 3rd.

Benefits
When you cast a spell from the pattern subschool, you can embed a short message within the effect. You designate any number of the spell's targets to receive this encoded message, regardless of language, but only a creature failing its save against your pattern spell can receive your message. This message is delivered visually, and there is no verbal component that other creatures might overhear. During each round you concentrate to maintain a pattern spell, you can change the embedded message and the targets that receive it.

Peace of Mind.name: 神清气正 Peace of Mind
Peace of Mind.description:
专长类型：Conduit

只需一念，你便能感受到涅槃境的安乐祥和

先决条件: 知识（位面）3级。

专长效果: 以一个直觉动作，当你面对情绪、恐惧或痛苦的影响效果检定失败时，你可以忽略原效果的影响，改为你在原效果持续时间的双倍时间里处于晕眩状态。你因为原效果所受到的任何非致命伤害都会降低至最小（所有伤害骰子都取1）。你不能在晕眩时使用本专长。你每天能使用一次本专长，此外你在知识（位面）上的每5个等级都会使你每可用专长次数加一。

资源出处: Planar Adventures pg. 31

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Peace%20of%20Mind

Peacemaker.name: Peacemaker
Peacemaker.description:
Your words of peace ring true and are much more difficult for others to resist.

Prerequisites
Charisma 13, good alignment.

Benefits
The DC to resist spells you cast to ensure peace or force aggressive creatures to become peaceful increases by +2. This affects spells that dissuade creatures from aggressive actions without exerting long-term or absolute control over them, and without leaving them defenseless. These spells include, but are not limited to, calm animals, calm emotions, command, compassionate ally, enthrall, euphoric tranquility, sanctuary, and serenity.

Peerless Courtier.name: 楷模臣子 Peerless Courtier
Peerless Courtier.description:
作为一名深受总督喜爱的英雄，你已学会如何将战斗技巧转化为社会影响。

先决条件: 13魅力，BAB+3。

专长效果: 选择一个技能：唬骗，交涉或察言观色。你可以用你的基本攻击加值代替在选择技能等级。该技能也成为你的本职技能。

特殊说明: 你可以选择这一专长至多三次。其效果不叠加。每一次你选择这一专长，必须选择一个额外的技能。

资源出处: Heroes of the High Court pg. 17

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Peerless%20Courtier

Penetrating Possession.name: Penetrating Possession
Penetrating Possession.description:
Your ability to possess foes can bypass magical protections.

Prerequisites
Magic jar as a known spell or spell-like ability, Cha 21

Benefits
The first time you attempt to possess a host under the effect of protection from evil spell or any similar spell, you have a chance to dispel that spell as if you had cast dispel magic on the spell.

Penetrating Stare.name: Penetrating Stare
Penetrating Stare.description:
Your stare penetrates right through your foe's strongest mental defenses.

Prerequisites
Mesmerist level 7th, painful stare class feature.

Benefits
When you trigger your painful stare, the damage dealt ignores 5 points of the target's damage reduction, unless that damage reduction is untyped (for example, DR 10/--).

Penetrating Strike (Mythic).name: 穿透打击(神话) Penetrating Strike (Mythic)
Penetrating Strike (Mythic).description:
先决条件：穿透打击

你明白如何击穿身着重铠的敌人的守备。

神话专长效果：当你使用穿透打击专长或者高等穿透打击专长时，你能够增加这些攻击所无视的伤害减免的数值，你每拥有3个阶层，这个数值便会额外增加1点。此外，该效果还适用于无类别的伤害减免（比如DR 10/-）。

资源出处: Mythic Adventures pg. 70

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Penetrating%20Strike

Perfect Awareness.name: 完美警觉 Perfect Awareness
Perfect Awareness.description:
专长类型：CombatMeditation

你可以在短时间内拒绝所有不相干的感觉信息来获得对你周围环境的完美感知。

先决条件: 感知17，战斗冥想，冥想大师，角色等级9。

专长效果: 每天1次，你可以用一个移动动作在一次察觉检定中取20。

资源出处: Faiths and Philosophies pg. 19

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Perfect%20Awareness

Perfect Casting.name: 完美施法 Perfect Casting
Perfect Casting.description:
先决条件：战斗施法，神之严密，能够施放神术，信仰阿巴达尔

先决条件: 战斗施法，神之严密，能够施放神术，信仰阿巴达尔。

专长效果: 当你使用神之严密专长时，你可以选择在施放所有的神术魔法时都不受到借机攻击，而非仅限无害和领域法术。

资源出处: Inner Sea Gods pg. 215

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Perfect%20Casting

Perfect Center.name: 完美集中 Perfect Center
Perfect Center.description:
专长类型：CombatMeditation

你可以忽视几乎所有干扰

先决条件: 感知21，战斗冥想，冥想大师，角色等级17。

专长效果: 你可以在任何技能检定或者专注检定中取10，即使通常这个检定在紧张环境中不允许取10。

资源出处: Faiths and Philosophies pg. 19

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Perfect%20Center

Perfect Strike.name: 完美打击 Perfect Strike
Perfect Strike.description:
专长类型：Combat

当你使用武僧武器时，攻击会变得异常精准。

先决条件: 敏捷13，感知13，精通徒手打击，基本攻击加值+8。

专长效果: 你必须在进行攻击检定之前声明使用该专长（因此失败的攻击检定会浪费这次机会）。你必须使用后述武器中的一种进行攻击：单镰，双节棍，木棍，十手以及破魔锥。你可以进行两次攻击检定并取较高的结果。如果这些检定中的一个造成重击威胁，那么另一个检定会被用于重击确认检定（如果两个检定均造成重击威胁，则由你进行选择）。每日你可以尝试进行“完美打击”的次数为每4级等级1次（见特殊说明），并且每轮只能进行1次。

特殊说明: 执械僧（Weapon Adept, APG武僧变体）或者禅宗射手（Zen Archer, APG武僧变体）会在1级获得“完美打击”作为奖励专长，即使他并不满足专长的先决条件。武僧每日可以尝试使用完美打击的次数等同于他的武僧等级，额外加上每4个非武僧职业等级1次。

资源出处: Advanced Players Guide pg. 166

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Perfect%20Strike

战策增益：你可以消耗5点耐力来在同一轮中使用第二次完美打击。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 128

Perfect Style.name: 无瑕流 Perfect Style
Perfect Style.description:
专长类型：CombatStyle

你接受了无瑕居的训练。

先决条件: 感知13，BAB+5或5级武僧等级。

专长效果: 当你选取该专长时，要从无瑕居流派中选取一种宗派；一旦做出这个选择，就无法再次变更。当你使用这个流派专长时，会根据你选择的无瑕居流派而获得一类能量抗力。难破金宗的门生获得5点强酸抗力。无明火宗的门生获得5点火焰抗力。不定风宗的门生获得5点闪电抗力。若你已经从种族特性或者职业能力中获得了能量抗力，那么从这个流派专长中获得的能量抗力会与其叠加。

此外，你会获得丹田气池，这些气是用来启动你所选择的无瑕居流派能力的。你在1级时气池里会有1点气，在1级之后的每4个等级这个气池会增加1点。若你由其他来源获得了丹田气池，则不会由于该专长而获得额外的气。

特殊说明: 你可以多次选取本专长。每次你选择该专长的时候，都必须选择无瑕居流派中的另一个宗派。

资源出处: Adventurers Guide pg. 106Inner Sea Combat pg. 13

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Perfect%20Style

战策增益：你可以消耗至多5点耐力来提升无瑕流赋予你的抗力，每消耗1点提升2点抗力。

战策资源出处: Weapon Master's Handbook pg. 25

Performance Weapon Mastery.name: 演武武器熟稔 Performance Weapon Mastery
Performance Weapon Mastery.description:
专长类型：Combat

你能手持任何武器进行华丽的表演。

专长效果: 你能将你擅长的任何类型的武器用于演武。

资源出处: Ultimate Combat pg. 112

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Performance%20Weapon%20Mastery

战策增益：只要你的耐力池中还有1点耐力，你就能将你的所有武器——不只是你擅长的——视为拥有演武UC武器特性。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 128

Performing Combatant.name: 演武战士 Performing Combatant
Performing Combatant.description:
专长类型：Combat

通过展现炫目而华丽的技巧，你能将任何战斗都打成一场表演。

先决条件: 炫目技巧，任一项演武专长。

专长效果: 你可以在任何战斗中进行演武检定。如果在一场非演武战斗中进行演武检定，你可以选择一项演武专长以供使用。你自动获得这项演武专长的所有加值；然后你需要进行一次DC20的演武检定，如果你成功，你可以获得该专长的所有效果。

资源出处: Ultimate Combat pg. 112

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Performing%20Combatant

战策增益：当你使用这个专长时，你可以消耗至多5点耐力来在你的演武战斗检定上获得等同于你消耗耐力的加值。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 128

Pernicious Stab.name: Pernicious Stab
Pernicious Stab.description:
Your deep strikes allow you to deliver poison efficiently when your opponent is off guard.

Prerequisites
Sneak attack +2d6.

Benefits
When you hit an opponent with a poisoned weapon and would deal sneak attack damage, you can choose to forgo some or all of the sneak attack damage to increase the poison's chance of success. For every 2d6 points of sneak attack damage you forgo, add 1 to the saving throw DC of the poison delivered with your attack. This increase to the poison save DC does not apply to creatures that are immune to precision damage.

Persistent Spell.name: 顽强法术 Persistent Spell
Persistent Spell.description:
专长类型：Metamagic

你可以调整一个法术，使其更加难以被抵御。

专长效果: 每当一名生物成为顽强法术的目标或者处于法术范围内，并且成功豁免该法术，那么他必须进行另一次豁免检定对抗法术效果。如果该名生物在第二次豁免中失败，那么他会受到法术的全部效果影响，就如同他在第一次豁免中失败一样。顽强法术占用比法术的实际环级高2环的法术位。不需要进行豁免来抵抗或减免效果的法术不会由该专长受益。

资源出处: Advanced Players Guide pg. 167

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Persistent%20Spell

Personal Chronicler.name: Personal Chronicler
Personal Chronicler.description:
Psychopomps have sent a nosoi scribe to record your actions.

Prerequisites
Duskwalker.

Benefits
You gain a fledgling nosoi familiar as per the arcane bond class feature, using your character level as your wizard level. Treat this as either a raven or a whippoorwill familiar (a whippoorwill uses the statistics for a thrush, but grants a +3 bonus to Intimidate instead of Diplomacy). If you have the ability to gain a familiar through other means and you are at least 5th level, the bird is instead treated as a Improved Familiar feat. You can have only one familiar.

This feat can be taken a second time by a character of 7th level or higher if that character doesn't otherwise have access to a familiar. Such characters treat their familiars as nosoi, as described above.

Special
If you ever willingly consort with sahkils or undead, your familiar abandons you and reports your actions to the nearest psychopomps. To regain your familiar, you must atone for your deeds via the atonement spell.

Persuasive (Mythic).name: 谈判专家(神话) Persuasive (Mythic)
Persuasive (Mythic).description:
先决条件：谈判专家

舌灿莲花的你精通话术。
