神话专长效果：谈判专家专长对交涉与威吓技能检定带来的加值增加2点。此外，你能够花费1次神话之力，使得1次交涉或者威吓检定就好像自然掷出20一般。你必须在进行检定之前决定使用该能力。

资源出处: Mythic Adventures pg. 70

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Persuasive

Persuasive Bribery.name: 行贿高手 Persuasive Bribery
Persuasive Bribery.description:
你知道如何用金钱打动他人。

先决条件: 谈判专家。

专长效果: 当你尝试以交涉检定贿赂某人（bribe someone）、以及用交涉或魅力检定与被呼唤的生物（比如异界盟友或异界誓缚法术呼唤的生物）讨价还价时获得+2加值，上述加值是在贿赂本身带来的任何加值之外额外提供的。当某人初次拒绝你提出的贿赂时，这个人对你的态度不会恶化，即便在正常情况下这种提议会冒犯到对方也是如此。

资源出处: Ultimate Intrigue pg. 88

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Persuasive%20Bribery

Persuasive Performer.name: 术艺知心 Persuasive Performer
Persuasive Performer.description:
先决条件：多才多艺职业能力，信仰莎琳

先决条件: 多才多艺职业能力，信仰莎琳。

专长效果: 你可以使用任何表演技能检定，而非仅限（表演[键盘，演讲，弦乐，吹奏]）来作为你的交涉检定结果。如果你使用表演（键盘，演讲，弦乐，吹奏）检定来取代交涉检定，那么你在检定上获得+2加值。

资源出处: Inner Sea Gods pg. 215

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Persuasive%20Performer

Perturbing Stare.name: Perturbing Stare
Perturbing Stare.description:
Your stare dulls your foe's reactions.

Prerequisites
Mesmerist level 5th, painful stare class feature.

Benefits
When you trigger your painful stare, the target must succeed at a Will save (DC = 10 + half your mesmerist level + your Charisma modifier) or lose its Dexterity modifier to AC for 1 round.

Pesh Euphoria.name: Pesh Euphoria
Pesh Euphoria.description:
The calming effects of pesh make you difficult to disturb.

Prerequisites
Sahir-Afiyun or pesh addict.

Benefits
When you take a dose of pesh, in addition to its normal initial effect, you gain a +2 bonus on saves against emotion and fear effects. Once per day, if you fail a saving throw against an emotion or fear effect while you are under the initial effect of pesh, you can attempt another saving throw 1 round later at the same DC.

Pesh Healing.name: Pesh Healing
Pesh Healing.description:
Consuming pesh makes you feel healthier.

Prerequisites
Sahir-Afiyun or pesh addict.

Benefits
When you take a dose of pesh, in addition to its normal initial effect, you gain a number of temporary hit points equal to your total Hit Dice for 1 hour. Temporary hit points gained from additional doses of pesh do not stack.

Pesh Rejuvenation.name: Pesh Rejuvenation
Pesh Rejuvenation.description:
When you are close to death, your body can convert pesh into lifesaving medicine.

Prerequisites
Sahir-Afiyun or pesh addict.

Benefits
If you are brought to 0 or fewer hit points while under the initial effect of pesh, you can end the drug's initial effect as an immediate action. If you do, you gain a number of temporary hit points equal to your Constitution score. These temporary hit points last 1 hour. Upon using this feat, you are sickened for 1d6 hours.

Pestilent.name: Pestilent
Pestilent.description:
Your unarmed strikes and natural weapons cause extra harm to those infected with your disease.

Prerequisites
Ability to cause disease via a spell, spell-like ability, or supernatural means.

Benefits
When you successfully use a spell, spell-like ability, or supernatural ability to cause a creature to contract a disease, you gain a +2 bonus on attack rolls with natural weapons and unarmed strikes against that creature. In addition, such attacks deal an additional 1d6 points of negative energy damage. If you have the supernatural ability to cause a single disease (such as mummy rot), you gain these bonuses against any creature that has contracted the same disease, even if it did not contract it from you.

Phalanx Formation.name: 集团方阵战术 Phalanx Formation
Phalanx Formation.description:
专长类型：Combat

你接受过使用长武器在集团方阵内战斗的训练。

先决条件: BAB+1。

专长效果: 当你持用你擅长的长触及武器时，盟友不会在你进行长触及攻击时为敌人提供软掩蔽。

通常状况: 攻击处于另一个生物后方的单位，包括盟友后方的单位时，目标会受到软掩蔽影响。

资源出处: Melee Tactics Toolbox pg. 10

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Phalanx%20Formation

Phantom Ally.name: Phantom Ally
Phantom Ally.description:
Your phantom's strength is fueled by your own diverse experiences and abilities.

Prerequisites
Phantom class feature.

Benefits
The abilities of your phantom are calculated as though you were 4 class levels higher, to a maximum effective spiritualist level equal to your character level.

Phantom Fighter.name: 魅影战士 Phantom Fighter
Phantom Fighter.description:
对于虚体敌人来说，你的魅影是致命的对手。

先决条件: 魅影（Phantom）职业能力，魅影具有魔法攻击（Magic Attack）能力。

专长效果: 你的魅影（Phantom）的天生武器被视为具有幽冥（ghost touch）特性。此外，当你施放一个接触法术，并由你的魅影进行传递时，你能够如同自身具有跨界法术（Ectoplasmic Spell；出自APG）专长一般调整法术。

资源出处: Occult Adventures pg. 137

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Phantom%20Fighter

Phantom Fortification.name: 强固魅影 Phantom Fortification
Phantom Fortification.description:
即便你的魅影完全显化为灵质态，它仍旧能在某种程度上具有无形的特质。

先决条件: 魅影（Phantom）职业能力，魅影具有幽魂飞行（Incorporeal Flight）能力。

专长效果: 当你的魅影完全以灵质态显形时，它有50%的概率忽略重击以及基于精准的伤害，就如同佩戴了具有中等护命（moderate fortification）特殊能力的护甲一般。该能力不会与其他类似的效果叠加，而且在对抗幽冥武器（ghost touch）或力场构成的武器（比如金刚拳、法师之剑、或灵能武器法术）做出的攻击时不会生效。

资源出处: Occult Adventures pg. 137

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Phantom%20Fortification

Phase Strike.name: 相位打击 Phase Strike
Phase Strike.description:
专长类型：CombatConduit

你通过灵界位面打击，使你的武器穿透障碍、盔甲、甚至重重掩蔽来实现一击命中。

先决条件: 知识(位面) 10级。

专长效果: 以一个移动动作,你可以放逐手中的一把人造武器或一枚弹药到灵界,在你的回合结束前你用该武器所做的下一次近战攻击或远程投掷攻击视为接触攻击并无视掩蔽,但此攻击无法忽视由力场效果带来的AC加值.按这种攻击方式,此次攻击可以穿过全掩蔽进行,但你必须选定你攻击目标所在的方格.

你可以获得本专长的好处每天一次,在知识(位面)上每有10级额外增加一次.本专长在与灵界位面不相接的位面里无法生效.

资源出处: Planar Adventures pg. 31

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Phase%20Strike

Photosynthetic Healing.name: Photosynthetic Healing
Photosynthetic Healing.description:
You can heal yourself using sunlight.

Prerequisites
Con 15, change shape ability, leshy subtype.

Benefits
You can temporarily draw energy from the sun to heal your wounds. Once per day while you are using change shape to assume a plant form, you can activate this ability as a free action to gain fast healing 1 for a number of rounds equal to your Hit Dice, as long as you are in an area of bright, natural sunlight.

When you rest in plant form in bright, natural sunlight, you are healed of twice the normal amount of hit point damage and ability score damage.

Piercing Chant.name: Piercing Chant
Piercing Chant.description:
Music plays a key role in goblin culture--at the very least, goblins are fond of cacophonous chants describing the last enemy they slew or what they're roasting for dinner. You have gathered, however, that non-goblins don't appreciate your songs very much.

Prerequisites
Goblin.

Benefits
As a full-round action, you can sing a song so terrible and ear-splitting that each enemy within 15 feet of you that hears it must succeed at a Will save or be dazed for 1 round. The DC of this saving throw is equal to 10 + half your level + your Charisma modifier. Whether or not the initial save is successful, a creature cannot be affected by this ability again for 24 hours. This is a mind-affecting effect.

Piercing Gambit.name: Piercing Gambit
Piercing Gambit.description:
You cast a spell destined to fail in order to help your ally overcome an enemy's spell resistance.

Prerequisites
Spell Penetration or Bluff 3 ranks; caster level 1st.

Benefits
You can expend one prepared spell or spell slot, as if you had cast the spell, to weaken an enemy's defenses. Your spell has no effect, but a designated ally who also has this feat gains a bonus on her caster level check to overcome spell resistance equal to half the level of the spell or spell slot you expended, lasting until the start of your next turn.

Piercing Grapple.name: 刺击擒抱 Piercing Grapple
Piercing Grapple.description:
专长类型：Combat

你能用一把短小却又致命的武器制服敌人，迫使他在投降与痛苦中作出选择。

先决条件: 敏捷 13，精通擒抱，精通徒手打击，即时备战，威吓7级。

专长效果: 当你发起擒抱（initiate a grapple）时，能够拔出1把轻型或单手穿刺武器（light or one-handed piercing weapon）并把它刺向你要擒抱的敌人。当你如此发起擒抱时，会在战技检定上承受-2减值，但因为你是以发起擒抱的一部分拔出武器，所以不会因为手持这把武器而承受通常的-4减值。若你的检定成功，则会如常擒抱敌人，而且在判断是否承受-4减值或者在维持擒抱中造成伤害时，这把武器不被视为在你的手中。若你的敌人成功打破了擒抱，它便会受到伤害，数值为你使用的那把武器的基础武器伤害外加1d4点出血伤害（bleed damage）。成功通过DC 15的医疗检定或任何魔法医疗都能够结束出血效果（bleed damage）。若你主动结束擒抱，也可以选择不造成出血伤害，但是无论何种方式，你的敌人都会受到基础武器伤害。当你维持此类擒抱时，会在所有用于对抗你的敌人的威吓检定中获得+2环境加值。

资源出处: Ultimate Intrigue pg. 88

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Piercing%20Grapple

Piercing Spell.name: 法术穿刺 Piercing Spell
Piercing Spell.description:
专长类型：Metamagic

你从研究之中得到了克服法术抗力的方法。

专长效果: 当你释放一个穿刺超魔的法术用于克服目标的法术抗力时，将目标的法术抗力视为比正常情况下低5点。法术穿刺须占用高于原本1个环级的法术位。

资源出处: Ultimate Magic pg. 154

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Piercing%20Spell

Pile On.name: 自信粉碎 Pile On
Pile On.description:
专长类型：Combat

你可以通过打脸让对手惧栗不能自已。

先决条件: 力量13，痛殴，猛力攻击。

专长效果: 每轮一次，当你对一个已经处于颤栗，恐慌或惊惧的生物造成伤害时，你可以选择将这次伤害后降低一半，使你的目标额外受到一轮恐惧效果的影响。

资源出处: Monster Codex pg. 20

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Pile%20On

Pin Down.name: 压迫锚定 Pin Down
Pin Down.description:
专长类型：Combat

你可以轻松的阻止敌人逃跑。

先决条件: 战斗反射，战士等级11。

专长效果: 每当你威胁之下的对手进行五尺快步或使用撤退动作，他都将触发你的借机攻击。如果攻击命中，你不造成伤害，不过目标这次5尺快步或撤退动作将不能移动任何距离。

资源出处: Ultimate Combat pg. 113

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Pin%20Down

战策增益：当你使用这个专长时，你可以消耗5点耐力来在该借机攻击上既获得该专长的好处又能造成伤害。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 129

Pinch Time.name: Pinch Time
Pinch Time.description:
Often having one parent with a human lifespan and one with an elven lifespan, many half-elves have a skewed perception of time, and none more so than the Spireborn, who also study the subject of time academically.

Prerequisites
Character level 5th, Spireborn half-elf.

Benefits
Once per day, as a standard action, you can gain the benefits of haste until the end of your next turn.

Pinning Knockout.name: 压制击昏 Pinning Knockout
Pinning Knockout.description:
专长类型：Combat

你能轻松击倒一个被你压制的敌人。

先决条件: 敏捷13，高等擒抱，精通擒抱，精通徒手打击，基本攻击加值+9或武僧9级。

专长效果: 当你压制一个对手，如果你成功的进行了一次擒抱战技检定、并且对其用徒手打击或轻型/单手武器造成非致命伤害，你的伤害翻倍。任何免疫重击的生物也免疫该专长的影响。

资源出处: Ultimate Combat pg. 113

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Pinning%20Knockout

战策增益：当你使用徒手击打或者轻型或单手武器对一个被压制的敌人使用该专长造成非致命伤害时，你可以消耗5点耐力来将伤害提升到三倍而不是两倍。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 129

Pinning Rend.name: 撕裂压制 Pinning Rend
Pinning Rend.description:
专长类型：Combat

当你攻击你压制中的对手时你可以撕裂他的肌肉。

先决条件: 敏捷13，高等擒抱，精通擒抱，精通徒手打击，基本攻击加值+9或武僧9级。

专长效果: 当你压制一个对手，如果你成功的进行了一次擒抱战技检定、并且对其用徒手打击或轻型/单手武器造成伤害，该对手将会受到等同你的徒手或轻型/单手武器的流血伤害。任何免疫重击的生物也免疫该专长的影响。

资源出处: Ultimate Combat pg. 113

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Pinning%20Rend

战策增益：当你使用这个专长造成流血伤害时，你可以消耗至多5点耐力来让流血伤害提升等同于你消耗的耐力的点数。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 129

Pinpoint Jab.name: Pinpoint Jab
Pinpoint Jab.description:
You strikes land exactly where you mean them to.

Prerequisites
Improved Unarmed Strike, base attack bonus +6, ki pool or martial flexibility class feature.

Benefits
As a full-round action, you can expend 1 ki point or one daily use of martial flexibility to use a limited version of the targeted strike deed, targeting either hands or legs with an unarmed attack. A target who succeeds at a Fortitude save (DC = 10 + your base attack bonus) can negate the effect. When your base attack bonus reaches +11, you can instead target head or torso, which the target can negate with a Fortitude save. When your BAB reaches +16, you can target two locations; the target must save against each effect separately.

Special
A monk can substitute his class level for his base attack bonus for this feat's effects.

Pinpoint Poisoner.name: 毒针刺击 Pinpoint Poisoner
Pinpoint Poisoner.description:
专长类型：Combat

你熟练地使用特制的针管进行淬毒，使其能发挥最大的杀伤力。

先决条件: 虺蛇打击，双武器战斗或【疾风连击】职业特性，手艺（炼金）6级。

专长效果: 当你使用“虺蛇打击”专长时，你可以选择在两支吹箭（blowgun dart）上进行淬毒，并且用其对你的敌人进行近战攻击（取出吹箭是一个自由动作）。当你持有吹箭时，你可以使用一个标准动作用其中一支进行攻击，或用整轮动作使用两支同时攻击。这些攻击被视为近战接触攻击，造成1d2加上你的正常徒手打击伤害加值的伤害，并且将会传递毒药。你也可以选择像投掷手里剑一样投掷吹箭，这需要进行一次正常的远程攻击检定以对抗目标的AC。

通常状况: 在武器或弹药上淬毒是一个标准动作。

资源出处: Ultimate Combat pg. 113

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Pinpoint%20Poisoner

战策增益：当你在使用这个专长以投掷手里剑的方式向一个10尺内的目标投掷吹箭时，你可以消耗5点耐力来让这次攻击对抗目标的接触AC。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 129

Pinpoint Targeting (Mythic).name: 精确瞄准(神话) Pinpoint Targeting (Mythic)
Pinpoint Targeting (Mythic).description:
先决条件：精确瞄准

你的攻击能够直击敌人的弱点并且忽略多种防护。

神话专长效果：即便你在该轮移动过也可以使用本专长，不过这只限于你移动的距离不超过每阶层5尺的时候。

资源出处: Mythic Adventures pg. 70

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Pinpoint%20Targeting

Piranha Strike.name: 食人鱼打击 Piranha Strike
Piranha Strike.description:
专长类型：Combat

你进行快速的组合打击，牺牲精确度，造成大量致命的小伤口。

先决条件: 武器娴熟，基本攻击加质+1。

专长效果: 你使用轻武器时可以选择在命中和战技检定上承受-1的惩罚，使伤害增加2，此加值在你使用副手武器的时候减半，当你的基本攻击加值达到+4和之后每增加4点的时候命中减值上升1点，而伤害增加2点，你必须在攻击前使用此专长，且效果延续到你下一轮开始。此伤害加值不会在碰触攻击或不造成生命值伤害的攻击上生效，食人鱼打击无法和猛力攻击一起使用。

资源出处: Sargava, the Lost Colony pg. 24

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Piranha%20Strike

Plague Resistance.name: Plague Resistance
Plague Resistance.description:
Diseases tend to have milder effects on you.

Prerequisites
Constitution 13.

Benefits
When you take damage or drain to your ability scores as the result of a disease, roll damage and drain to each ability score twice and take the lower result. You suffer any other effects of the disease as normal.

Plains Nomad.name: Plains Nomad
Plains Nomad.description:
You are a native of the wide and endless prairie, savanna, or steppe.

Prerequisites
Favored terrain (plains) class feature.

Benefits
You and a mount you are riding gain a +2 bonus on Constitution checks to avoid damage and fatigue from hustling or a forced march. In plains terrain, this bonus is doubled and also applies on Survival checks to avoid getting lost, to find food and water, to protect yourself from severe weather, and to predict the weather.

Planar Focus.name: 位面之力 Planar Focus
Planar Focus.description:
通过学习其他位面，你学会了如同动物一样呈现位面的样貌。

先决条件: 知识（位面）5级，动物之力职业特性。

专长效果: 当你使用你的动物之力职业能力时，你可以选择任意的如下新形态除非它违反了你的阵营。

空气：你获得持续的羽落术效果。10级时，你改为获得持续的浮空术效果。

混乱：你的外形隐隐地改变着，使得他人难以对你进行精准的攻击。你获得25%的机率忽视重击的额外伤害以及对你攻击中的精准伤害（例如偷袭）。只有混乱角色可以使用这种位面之力。

寒冷：使用天生武器或者近战武器攻击你的角色受到寒冷伤害，你每具有2个职业等级对方就受到1d4寒冷伤害。

大地：你获得等同于你基础速度的掘地速度，并在天生护甲上获得+2环境加值。

邪恶：你的AC获得+1亵渎加值，并在对善良异界生物的攻击和能力的豁免检定上获得+1表现加值。这个加值在10级时变为+2.只有邪恶角色可以使用这个位面之力。

火焰：你的天生武器和近战武器每有4个职业等级就造成1d6火焰伤害。

善良：你的AC获得+1神圣加值，并在对邪恶异界生物的攻击和能力的豁免检定上获得+1表现加值。这个加值在10级时变为+2.只有善良角色可以使用这个位面之力。

秩序：你针对变形法术或者效果的鉴定自动成功。只有守序角色可以使用这个位面之力。

阴影：你在隐匿和巧手技能检定上获得+5加值。

水流：你获得30尺游泳速度并且可以在水下呼吸如同在空气中一样。

资源出处: Monster Summoners Handbook pg. 14

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Planar%20Focus

Planar Heritage.name: 位面血脉 Planar Heritage
Planar Heritage.description:
你的先祖能够追溯至一种本地异界生物，虽说你自身在其余方面是完完全全的人类。

先决条件: 人类。

专长效果: 选择一种本地异界生物种族（例如：熵裔）。在判断任何与种族相关的效果时，你将同时视为人类和那个种族。例如，你选择熵裔，那么在选取背景特性、满足专长先决条件、确定法术和魔法物品的效果等等情况时，你被同时视为人类和熵裔。

你必须拥有必要的身体特征才能获得某些效果，这由GM决定（例如，你不是真正拥有一条尾巴，你就无法获得强化你尾巴能力的专长）。

特殊说明: 如果你已经拥有了一种以这样的方式来调整你种族的能力或专长（例如：远古血脉），那么你无法选择位面血脉。

资源出处: Planar Adventures pg. 31

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Planar%20Heritage

Planar Hunter.name: Planar Hunter
Planar Hunter.description:
After careful study of otherworldly environments, you can quickly evaluate how an outsider reacts in its home surroundings. You can use your knowledge of the outsider's native environment to guide your attacks and overcome the outsider's natural resistances.

Prerequisites
Knowledge (planes) 5 ranks, favored terrain (any plane) class feature.

Benefits
When you are on one of the planes you've selected as a favored terrain, you gain a +2 bonus on weapon attack rolls against outsiders native to that plane. You also ignore up to 5 points of damage reduction when making weapon attacks against outsiders native to that plane, except for damage reduction without a type (such as DR 10/--). In addition, you gain this bonus against extraplanar creatures you encounter and identify as being from one of your planar favored terrains, such as with a successful Knowledge (planes) check, regardless of what plane you or they are on.

Special
You may select this feat multiple times. Each time you take it, you apply it to a different qualifying favored terrain.

Planar Infusion.name: 位面谐律 Planar Infusion
Planar Infusion.description:
专长类型：Conduit

在另一个位面中度过一段艰难的岁月之后，你的身心和灵魂都被那个位面的力量所灌注。

专长效果: 你的身心或者灵魂因为你选择的满足前置条件的位面能量的灌注而获得了某种好处。位面谐律的具体描述可以在本书第三章的每个位面的谐律章节找到。需要动作启动的位面谐律能力均为超自然能力，除了那些明确地允许你释放一个法术的，在这种情况下它们是类法术能力。你从位面谐律获得的类法术能力的施法者等级等同于你的HD（至多20级）。所有其它的位面谐律能力均为特异能力。

特殊说明: 你可以多次习得这个专长。每次习得时，你必须选择一个不同的位面来获取。如果位面谐律的特殊效果完全相同，这些效果不会叠加。

资源出处: Planar Adventures pg. 31

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Planar%20Infusion

Planar Mentor.name: Planar Mentor
Planar Mentor.description:
Whether you sought it out, caught its attention, or inherited its service, an outsider is watching over you. The more you impress it, the more it shares its power and knowledge.

Benefits
When you take this feat, choose one non-unique outsider with 18 Hit Dice or fewer and whose alignment is within one step of your own along either the law/chaos axis or the good/evil axis. Twice per day (three times per day for an outsider with only neutral alignment components) when you fulfill the condition associated with either component of your mentor's alignment, you can gain your mentor's boon for that alignment as an immediate action. This grants you resistance equal to your level to a particular energy type as well as a special benefit associated with that alignment. These benefits last for a number of rounds equal to your Charisma modifier + 1 (minimum 1).

Chaotic
To earn chaotic approval, you must provoke an attack of opportunity from a creature whose CR is at least half your level. You gain acid resistance as well as a 10% miss chance due to concealment.

Evil
To earn evil approval, you must damage a flat-footed foe, hit a foe you're flanking, or confirm a critical hit. You gain fire resistance, and your attacks deal an amount of bleed damage equal to half your level.

Good
To earn good approval, you must heal another creature or deal nonlethal damage to a foe using an ability that has no additional effects beyond nonlethal damage. You gain electricity resistance and a +2 bonus on your saving throws.

Lawful
To earn lawful approval, you must perform the aid another action for an ally whose level is equal to or greater than your own, or you must benefit from the aid another action from such an ally. You gain cold resistance and the benefits of the light fortification armor special ability.

Neutral
To earn neutral approval, you must succeed at a saving throw prompted by a source with a CR of at least half your level. You gain resistance to any one energy type (your choice) and a +2 bonus on skill checks.

If your mentor is killed or imprisoned, you lose the benefits of this feat and any feats for which it is a prerequisite. When you gain a level, you can secure a new mentor by performing a ritual that takes 8 hours and expends components worth 200 gp x the new mentor's Hit Dice.

Special
At the GM's discretion, a PC can select an outsider of any alignment. This represents a relationship in which the outsider is attempting to corrupt, redeem, or otherwise influence the PC.


Pathfinder Society
When selecting an outsider of rht ePlanar Mentor feat, you must choose an outsider whose alignment is within one step of your own.

Planar Preservationist.name: 异界博物学者 Planar Preservationist
Planar Preservationist.description:
你知道如何像是保存并且复原动物一般对付那些跨位面生物。

先决条件: 博物学者（Preservationist, UM炼金术师变体）变体职业。

专长效果: 你每知道一个‘召唤自然盟友’配方，你学会同级的‘召唤怪物’配方。如果你以后学会了其他的‘召唤自然盟友’配方，你自动学会同级的‘召唤怪物’配方。

资源出处: Ultimate Magic pg. 154

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Planar%20Preservationist

Planar Sensitivity.name: Planar Sensitivity
Planar Sensitivity.description:
You can sense and manipulate connections between the planes.

Prerequisites
Knowledge (planes) 3 ranks.

Benefits
For every summon nature's ally extract you know, you learn the equivalent summon monster spell as an extract. If you later learn other summon nature's ally extracts, you automatically learn the equivalent summon monster spell as an extract.

Special
Sentient outsiders who have one or more ranks in Knowledge (planes) and who lack the native subtype are treated as having this feat.

Gatefinder (Perception)

You can notice soulgates compatible with your alignment.

 

Check
You are familiar with soulgates and might notice those with an alignment matching your own. To notice a soulgate that you’re not already familiar with, you must succeed at a DC 20 Perception check—this DC could be higher if the portal is obscured or damaged, or at the GM’s discretion. If the soulgate shares your exact alignment, you gain a +5 bonus on your check to notice the portal, feeling an instinctual draw toward it. If your alignment and the portal’s share none of the same components, you take a –5 penalty on your check to notice the portal. If your alignment is neutral with no other alignment components, you take no penalties on checks to find soulgates.

For example, a lawful good character would gain a +5 bonus on her Perception checks to find lawful good soulgates, but would take a –5 penalty on checks to find chaotic evil, chaotic neutral, and neutral evil soulgates, as she has no chaotic, neutral, or evil components to her alignment. A neutral character, however, gains a +5 bonus on checks to find neutral gates, but gains no bonus on checks to find chaotic neutral, lawful neutral, neutral good, and neutral evil soulgates. Additionally, she takes no penalty on checks to notice chaotic good, chaotic evil, lawful good, or lawful evil soulgates.

Once you are aware of a soulgate, you never need to succeed at a Perception check to find that particular gate again, as long as some remarkable event doesn’t change its appearance or location.

Gatekeeper (Knowledge [Planes])

You can attempt to open soulgates compatible with your alignment.

 

Check
Once you are aware of a soulgate, you can use your knowledge of the planes and your place as a child of the multiverse to attempt to open the portal. This attempt takes 1 minute to perform. The DC of the Knowledge (planes) check to open a soulgate is 30. If your alignment perfectly matches that of the soulgate, you gain a +5 bonus on this check. You can also attempt to open a soulgate with an alignment that is within one step of your own. However, unless you are neutral, you cannot open a soulgate with an alignment two or more steps away from your own.

For example, a lawful evil character would gain a +5 bonus on her attempt to open a soulgate connecting the Material Plane to Hell (lawful evil) or other planes of lawful evil alignment. She can also attempt to open soulgates to Abaddon (neutral evil), Axis (lawful neutral), and other planes that share those planes’ alignments, because their alignments are one step away from lawful evil. She can never open a soulgate to the Abyss (chaotic evil), the Boneyard (neutral), Elysium (chaotic good), Heaven (lawful good), the Maelstrom (chaotic neutral), Nirvana (neutral good), or any other plane with those alignments.

If your alignment is neutral with no other alignment components, you can open soulgates with an alignment two steps away from your own, but you take a –10 penalty on attempts to do so.

Once opened, you can keep a soulgate open for a number of rounds equal to your Charisma modifier. An open soulgate closes at the end of that time, or you can close it earlier as a standard action.

Planar Survivor.name: Planar Survivor
Planar Survivor.description:
Your study of the nature and hazards of a diverse array of planes has prepared you for their dangers.

Prerequisites
Knowledge (planes) 3 ranks, Survival 3 ranks.

Benefits
You gain a +2 bonus on Survival checks on planes other than the Material Plane and a +2 bonus on saving throws against hazards encountered in such environments. If you have 10 or more ranks in Survival, the bonus on Survival checks increases to +4. This bonus does not stack with the bonus granted by the Self-Sufficient feat.

Planar Traveler.name: Planar Traveler
Planar Traveler.description:
The confines of the Material Plane cannot sate your wanderlust, and you walk between alternate spheres of reality unhindered.

Prerequisites
You must be related to an outsider or have been born on a plane other than the Material Plane.

Benefits
You gain a +2 bonus on Survival checks when outside your home plane. You can identify portals and other planar connections as well as where they lead by sight or touch with a successful DC 20 Perception check.

Goal
Spend at least 24 consecutive hours on three different planes of existence other than your home plane or more than a month on a single plane other than your home plane. Demiplanes do not count for the purposes of fulfilling this

Completion Benefit
Whenever you cast a spell or use a magic item to travel to another plane, you always arrive exactly where you had intended. In addition, when identifying portals with the first benefit of this feat, you gain a glimpse of what you would see, hear, and smell upon arriving on the other end of the portal.

Suggested Traits: Fey Protection, Scholar of the Great BeyondAPG, Wanderlust.

Possible Planar Traveler Quests

d8 Quest
1 Your morbid curiosity urges you to journey through the Worldwound, either to contact or combat what impossible fiendish entities no doubt lurk beyond (page 198).
2 Several weak points exist between the forested realms of the River Kingdoms and the plane known as the First World. You seek to learn the mysteries of that realm’s strange fey inhabitants (page 239).
3 Ancient relics imply connections between the fallen Empire of Thassilon and the nightmare realm of Leng (pages 211, 245).
4 The wealth of mortal cities pales in comparison to that of the fabled City of Brass on the Plane of Fire. You intend to seize at least a part of the metropolis’s incredible wealth for yourself (page 241).
5 You have always been fascinated by death. Now, you wish to travel to its kingdom, the Boneyard, in life, either to rescue another soul from an uncertain fate or to learn of your own destiny (page 243).
6 You have resolved to reach Hell’s vast fortress-capital Dis, where the magical treasures of Hell are available for a price (page 244).
7 In Axis, the city of perfect order, you hope to scale the crystal spires where the laws of reality are carved so that you might understand or, perhaps, change them (page 243).
8 The Immortal Ambulatory drifts among countless planes, allowing those who can reach the demiplane to visit many other realities. Perhaps by going there you can resolve long-unanswered questions regarding dragons and the nature of the multiverse (page 245).

Planar Wanderer.name: 异界漫游者 Planar Wanderer
Planar Wanderer.description:
关于位面与传送的知识让你能够更为精确地进行位面旅行。

先决条件: 地理传送学，知识（地理）10级，知识（位面）10级，施放高等传送术（Teleport, Greater）和异界传送（Plane Shift）的能力。

专长效果: 当你研究打算使用异界传送（Plane Shift）前往的位面时，能随着施法尝试1次DC为25的知识(位面)检定。若你的检定成功，则可以在跨位面传送中前往更为准确的位置，让你抵达距离目的地5d20英里的位置，以取代原本距离目的地5d%英里的位置。如果你的结果比DC高10或更多，则会抵达距离目的地5d10英里的位置作为替代；若你的结果比DC高20或更多，则会抵达距离5d6英里的位置。

资源出处: Ultimate Intrigue pg. 88

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Planar%20Wanderer

Planar Wild Shape.name: 位面自然变身 Planar Wild Shape
Planar Wild Shape.description:
你可以向你的变身形态中注入异位面的力量。

先决条件: 【自然变身】职业特性，知识（位面）5级。

专长效果: 当你使用【自然变身】变成一种动物形态时，你可以额外花费1次自然变身的每日使用次数来给你的变身形态添加天界或炼狱模板（善良德鲁伊必须使用天界模板，而邪恶德鲁伊则只能使用炼狱模板）。如果你的形态使用了天界模板、而你用天生武器对一个邪恶生物造成了重击，你在重击确认骰上获得+2加值。反之亦然。

资源出处: Ultimate Combat pg. 113

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Planar%20Wild%20Shape

Planewalker's Insight.name: Planewalker's Insight
Planewalker's Insight.description:
You are well versed in the lore of the planes and the psychology of their natives.

Benefits
You gain a +2 bonus on Knowledge (planes) checks and on Sense Motive checks against outsiders, and Knowledge (planes) is a class skill for you. If you have 10 or more ranks in either of these skills, the bonus for that skill increases to +4. These bonuses do not stack with those granted by the Alertness or Scholar feats.

Planned Spontaneity.name: Planned Spontaneity
Planned Spontaneity.description:
You have a measure of flexibility when preparing spells.

Prerequisites
Knowledge (arcana) 9 ranks, ability to prepare and cast 4th-level spells.

Benefits
Once per day when you prepare spells, you can designate one spell slot from each of up to three different spell levels that are lower than the highest-level spell that you can cast. In each designated slot you can memorize two different spells of the respective level. You can cast either spell as normal, but when you do, the spell consumes both of the spells prepared in that spell slot.

Special
A wizard can select this feat as one of his bonus feats.

Play to the Crowd.name: 投其所好 Play to the Crowd
Play to the Crowd.description:
你能够搜集他人的利益关系，并使用这些信息来强化言语的力度。

先决条件: 智力 19，不破的逻辑，交涉5级，察言观色5级。

专长效果: 当你使用交涉来改变1名角色的态度时，可以首先尝试1次察言观色检定对抗该名NPC，以此来获得一种直觉（get a hunch），了解该名角色是否正受到附魔系效果（enchantment）的影响、对其使用查知观念*（Sense Assumptions）专长或用于在舌战（verbal duel；见本书176页）中评估偏好（biases）。若你的察言观色检定成功了，则会在交涉检定中获得+2加值，而且若你在舌战（verbal duel）中得知了任何对方的偏好（biases），则可以选择额外得知一种偏好。如果你在交涉检定中失败5点或共多的话，不会因此而让NPC的态度变差。

资源出处: Ultimate Intrigue pg. 88

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Play%20to%20the%20Crowd

Point-Blank Master.name: 贴身射击 Point-Blank Master
Point-Blank Master.description:
专长类型：Combat

你擅长使用远程武器在极近的距离攻击。

先决条件: 某种远程武器的武器专精。

专长效果: 选择一类远程武器。当你使用这类武器在敌人的威胁范围内进行射击时不会引起借机攻击。

特殊说明: 从6级起，选择【箭术战斗流派】的游侠能够将“贴身射击”作为战斗流派专长进行选取。但是他必须拥有对应武器的“武器专攻”专长来取代“武器专精”专长来满足先决条件。

通常状况: 在敌人的威胁范围内使用远程武器攻击会引起借机攻击。

资源出处: Advanced Players Guide pg. 167

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Point-Blank%20Master

战策增益：当使用任何种类的远端武器射击，投掷武器，或者做一个远端接触攻击时，你可以消耗2点耐力来避免一次借机攻击。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 129

Point-Blank Shot (Mythic).name: 近距射击(神话) Point-Blank Shot (Mythic)
Point-Blank Shot (Mythic).description:
先决条件：近距射击

只要距离够近，你的远程攻击就会无比精确。

神话专长效果：近距射击专长对攻击与伤害检定的加值提升至2点。以迅捷动作，你能够花费1次神话之力，使这些检定获得等同于你的阶层的一半的额外加值。

资源出处: Mythic Adventures pg. 71

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Point-Blank%20Shot

Poised Bearing.name: 蓄势姿态 Poised Bearing
Poised Bearing.description:
专长类型：Armor MasteryCombat

你盔甲的重量让你拥有了稳定的下盘。

先决条件: 基本攻击加值+6或者战士4级，盔甲训练职业特性，擅长中甲或重甲。

专长效果: 在决定冲撞，拖拽，闯越或者摔绊战技所能对抗的生物体型时，你的体型视为比原来大一级。

资源出处: Armor Masters Handbook pg. 17

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Poised%20Bearing

战策增益：你可以一个迅捷动作消耗3点耐力，这个专长对你体型的效果将会决定其他生物能否对你施展特定战技。

战策资源出处: Armor Master's Handbook pg. 21

Poison Focus.name: Poison Focus
Poison Focus.description:
You know the secrets of creating especially vicious poisons.

Prerequisites
Craft (alchemy) 1 rank.

Benefits
The save DC of any poison you craft with Craft (alchemy) and any spells you cast with the poison descriptor (Pathfinder RPG Ultimate Magic 138) increases by 1. This bonus doesn't stack with the bonus granted by Spell Focus.

Poison Resin.name: Poison Resin
Poison Resin.description:
The toxic slime from your skin hardens into a thick, venomous resin that you can craft into various shapes.

Prerequisites
Grippli, toxic skin alternate racial trait.

Benefits
As a standard action, you can spend a use of your toxic skin alternate racial trait to create any simple light weapon out of your hardened secretions. This weapon remains intact and usable for 1 hour. Once per minute when making an attack, you can treat this weapon as if you had applied your grippli racial poison to it. You can use this envenoming function a number of times per day equal to your Constitution modifier for any individual weapon created. Anyone other than you who attempts to wield the weapon is exposed to your poison.

Poison Shot Deed.name: 药铳 Poison Shot Deed
Poison Shot Deed.description:
专长类型：Grit

你手中的枪支犹如毒龙喷烟，所当者皆糜烂。

先决条件: 业余铳士UC专长或勇毅（Grit）UC职业能力。

专长效果: 通过消耗1点勇毅值，你可以以一个移动动作在枪管铳填入一剂吸入（Inhaled）或摄入（Ingested）型毒药，你不会因为这样做而失误使自己中毒（如同你拥有用毒职业能力一般）。然后，如果你以一个可引发借机攻击的标准动作把这发毒弹发射出去，它可以影响15尺锥形范围的所有敌人。这些敌人不承受伤害，但是会立刻暴露在毒素之中并必须进行一次豁免检定（如同毒素的潜伏期已经过去）否则中毒。

资源出处: Dirty Tactics Toolbox pg. 9

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Poison%20Shot%20Deed

Poisoner's Channel.name: 投毒引导 Poisoner's Channel
Poisoner's Channel.description:
先决条件：引导负能量3d6，信仰诺格巴

先决条件: 引导负能量3d6，信仰诺格巴。

专长效果: 每天一次，当你引导负能量伤害活物时，你可以使任何在对抗引导能量的豁免检定失败的生物在对抗毒素的豁免检定上承受-4减值。这一减值持续一分钟。

资源出处: Inner Sea Gods pg. 215

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Poisoner's%20Channel

Polyglot Familiar.name: Polyglot Familiar
Polyglot Familiar.description:
Your familiar can speak with animals other than those of its own kind.

Prerequisites
Must have a familiar.

Benefits
Choose a category of creature: amphibians, birds, felines, invertebrates, reptiles, rodents, simians, or vermin. Your familiar can speak with creatures of that kind.

Special
This feat can be taken multiple times, choosing a different category of creature each time. The first time you take this feat, if your familiar can't already speak with creatures of its kind, you must choose that category of creature. If your familiar later gains the ability to speak with creatures of its kind, you can choose to apply this feat's benefits to a different category of creature instead.

Polytheistic Blessing.name: Polytheistic Blessing
Polytheistic Blessing.description:
You are granted a small bit of divine power as a result of your veneration of a pantheon of deities.

Prerequisites
Wis 13, must worship a pantheon.

Benefits
When you take this feat, select a pantheon from the list below. You gain the listed spell-like ability for your selected pantheon, usable once per day. If the granted spell allows a saving throw, the DC is equal to 10 + 1/2 your character level + your Charisma modifier.

Special
If you act out of line with the tenets of your pantheon's beliefs, you lose the ability to cast the granted spell-like ability until you have received an atonement for your transgression (as a cleric attempting to regain lost class abilities).

Juju Pantheon (Cultural)

Deities wendo (supernatural entities of the spirit world; see Faiths & Philosophies 14)

Common Believers juju practitioners, wendifa

Granted Spell-like Ability speak with animals

Sar-Gorog Pantheon (Aligned and Cultural)

Deities Urgathoa (NE), Rovagug (CE), and Zura (CE)

Common Believers Koboto cannibal tribes of the Sodden Lands

Granted Spell-like Ability decompose corpseUM; if you use this ability on a corpse rather than on a corporeal undead, you receive nourishment as though you had eaten a normal meal for a Medium creature.

Note
This feat first appeared in Pathfinder Player Companion: Faiths & Philosophies as Pantheistic Blessing, but is corrected and expanded here to include a benefit for juju practitioners and worshipers of Sar-Gorog.

Pommel Strike Deed.name: 刀柄打 Pommel Strike Deed
Pommel Strike Deed.description:
专长类型：Panache

在拔刀的一合，你的刀柄已经捅进对手的身体，将他击倒在地。

先决条件: 业余剑客或派头职业能力；基础攻击加值+3。

专长效果: 你可以消耗1点时髦值，以一个标准动作使用一件轻型或单手穿刺武器的手柄打击敌人。你的这次攻击视为你使用武器正常发动攻击（使用受到游荡剑客的所有职业能力，专长和其他效果的加成），不过这次攻击的伤害为1d6（小体型剑客1d4）点钝击伤害，重击范围20/x2，并且不会因为精通重击，锐锋武器附魔等效果而增加重击范围。如果攻击命中，你可以一自由动作进行一次战技攻击检定，如果成功，对方将被击倒至俯卧状态。

资源出处: Advanced Class Guide pg. 153

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Pommel%20Strike%20Deed

Poppet Familiar.name: Poppet Familiar
Poppet Familiar.description:
You may select a poppet as your familiar.

Prerequisites
Ability to acquire a new familiar, caster level 3rd.

Benefits
You can choose a standard Tiny poppet that you control as your familiar. This poppet cannot have any existing augmentations. You absorb the poppet's token harmlessly into your body, making it impossible for you to transfer control of the poppet thereafter. A poppet familiar uses the rules for regular familiars, with the following exceptions: its type does not change, and it does not gain the ability to speak with others of its kind. The poppet's Wisdom score increases to match its Intelligence score and it can speak and understand one language chosen by you at the time you select the poppet as your familiar. A poppet familiar has Craft, Perception, Profession, and Stealth as class skills. A poppet familiar cannot receive augmentations from crafting, but its connection to you allows it to spontaneously generate augmentations of your choice as you increase in level.

If your caster level is 5th or higher, your poppet familiar either becomes Small in size or gains two augmentations of your choice. You do not need to meet the requirements (or pay the construction cost) to craft these augmentations. At caster level 7th, and every 2 caster levels thereafter, your poppet familiar gains an additional augmentation of your choice.

If your caster level is 7th or higher, your poppet familiar gains the ability to generate spray of splinters as a breath weapon that deals 1d6 points of piercing damage in a 15-foot cone. At caster level 9th and every 2 caster levels thereafter, the damage increases by 1d6 (to a maximum> of 7d6 at 19th level). A poppet can use this breath weapon three times per day.

If your poppet familiar is lost or destroyed, you can replace it with another standard Tiny poppet that you control by undertaking a ritual that takes 8 hours to complete. If your previous poppet familiar was Small or had gained augmentations, you can choose different augmentations for your new poppet familiar.

Porcupine Defense.name: Porcupine Defense
Porcupine Defense.description:
You are a threat to opponents that try to overwhelm you.

Prerequisites
Combat Expertise, Combat Reflexes, base attack bonus +6.

Benefits
Whenever an opponent of at least one size category larger than yourself attempts a combat maneuver attack against you, you gain a +2 bonus on any allowed attacks of opportunity. If your opponent may make such attacks without provoking attacks of opportunity, you instead gain a +2 bonus to CMD against such maneuvers.

Combat Trick
You can spend 5 stamina points to make an attack of opportunity against an opponent at least one size category larger than you if that opponent attempts a combat maneuver check against you. You can perform this attack of opportunity even if your opponent can attempt such combat maneuvers without normally provoking attacks of opportunity. (Dragonslayer's Handbook 25)

Position of Strength.name: Position of Strength
Position of Strength.description:
You know how to press your advantage when negotiating with noncombatants.

Prerequisites
Intimidate 5 ranks.

Benefits
As long as you are wielding one or more weapons with which you are proficient, you gain a +4 bonus on Intimidate checks against unarmed creatures, which doesn't stack with Intimidating Prowess. Additionally, if you successfully use Intimidate to demoralize an unarmed creature, that creature becomes shaken for as long as you continue to be armed and they continue not to be, to a maximum of 1 minute. Creatures with natural attacks, or whose unarmed strikes deal lethal damage, are considered to be armed for the purposes of this feat.

Possessed Hand.name: Possessed Hand
Possessed Hand.description:
You've made a peaceful and permanent bargain with a ghost, spirit, or outsider. It possesses your hand, guiding and aiding you in exchange for help in return.

Benefits
You attract a ghost, spirit, or outsider with personal motivations to possess your hand. This usually involves some sort of mutually beneficial pact or agreement. Your possessed hand helps you in numerous ways, but its periodic, uncontrolled antics are distracting; you take a permanent -2 penalty on concentration checks once you gain this feat.

Any attack you make with a one-handed weapon, light weapon, unarmed strike, or natural attack with your possessed hand gains a +1 insight bonus on the attack roll and damage roll. You also gain a +1 insight bonus on Disable Device and Sleight of Hand checks. Once per day as a swift action, you can retrieve any stowed object you carry on your person, provided the object weighs no more than 5 pounds.

Potent Holy Symbol.name: Potent Holy Symbol
Potent Holy Symbol.description:
In your pious hands, your holy symbol is a shining light of faith.

Prerequisites
Good alignment, worshiper of a good deity.

Benefits
Any round in which you use your holy symbol as a divine focus for the casting of a spell or to channel positive energy, you count as presenting a holy symbol, chanting prayers, or ringing a hand bell for the purpose of keeping vampires at bay.

Potion Glutton.name: 狂喝滥饮 Potion Glutton
Potion Glutton.description:
先决条件：信仰厄迦图娅

先决条件: 信仰厄迦图娅。

专长效果: 当你喝下药水或药剂时，你只需要一个移动动作且不会导致借机攻击。

通常状况: 喝下药水是一个标准动作，且会导致借机攻击

资源出处: Inner Sea Gods pg. 215

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Potion%20Glutton

Power Attack (Mythic).name: 猛力攻击(神话) Power Attack (Mythic)
Power Attack (Mythic).description:
先决条件：猛力攻击

你的攻击极具毁灭性。

神话专长效果：当你使用猛力攻击时，你的近战伤害检定获得+3加值，而非原本的+2点。当你的基本攻击加值达到+4以及之后每提高4点时，伤害加值的数值都会+3点以取代原本的+2点。此外，来自该专长的伤害加值会在重击时翻倍，而且这是在应用武器重击倍率之前进行的。

当你启动猛力攻击时，能够花费1次神话之力，以此在1分钟内忽略该专长对近战攻击检定与战技检定带来的惩罚。

资源出处: Mythic Adventures pg. 71

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Power%20Attack

Powerful Poisoning.name: 迅猛之毒 Powerful Poisoning
Powerful Poisoning.description:
依靠蛮力，你将武器上涂抹的毒药深深打进敌人的身体。

先决条件: 猛力攻击，手艺（制毒）技能3级或用毒（Poison Use）职业能力。

专长效果: 当你使用一件施加过毒药的武器并发动猛力攻击专长对一个对手造成伤害时，你可以放弃猛力攻击提供的伤害加值，而选择将武器附带毒素的DC+1。当你的基础攻击加值增加到+4以及之后每再提升+4时，这个DC加值也随之增加1点。但是，本专长的效果不会让毒药的DC增加到超过15+你的角色等级的一半。

资源出处: Dirty Tactics Toolbox pg. 6

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Powerful%20Poisoning

Powerful Shape.name: 壮硕形体 Powerful Shape
Powerful Shape.description:
你的自然变身是如此的威武霸气！

先决条件: 【自然变身】职业特性，德鲁伊8级。

专长效果: 自然变身状态中，在计算CMB、CMD、承载能力、或者任何与体型相关的特殊攻击（如攫抓、吞咽、践踏）时，将你的体型视为大一级。

资源出处: Ultimate Magic pg. 154

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Powerful%20Shape

Powerful Shape (Mythic).name: 壮硕形体(神话) Powerful Shape (Mythic)
Powerful Shape (Mythic).description:
先决条件：壮硕形体

你在自然变身中化身的形态远超自然界中的同类。

神话专长效果：你能够将巨化生物模板（快速套用规则版，请见怪物图鉴的295页）套用到任何自然变身变化的形态上。这会取代壮硕形体专长的好处。

以自由动作，你能够花费1次神话之力，以此将该专长与非神话版的壮硕形体专长的好处结合起来，持续轮数等同于你的阶层。

资源出处: Mythic Adventures pg. 71

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Powerful%20Shape

Powerful Tongue.name: 强力舌头 Powerful Tongue
Powerful Tongue.description:
和你的大多数同类不同，你的舌头强健到可以将被粘住的猎物拖近你的位置。

先决条件: 力量17，粘性舌头特殊攻击。

专长效果: 你的舌击攻击可以进行拖拽（Pull）特殊攻击。在你的回合开始时，只要你的舌头粘住一个体型不大于你的生物，你就可以通过一次成功的战技攻击检定，以一个自由动作将它拉近你5尺。

资源出处: Monster Codex pg. 8

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Powerful%20Tongue

Powerful Wings.name: Powerful Wings
Powerful Wings.description:
You have a large wingspan for a member of your race, and can use these appendages to batter your foes.

Prerequisites
Str 13, Skill Focus (Fly), base attack bonus +8.

Benefits
You gain two wing attacks. These are secondary natural attacks that each deal damage appropriate to a creature one size category larger than yourself (see page 302 of the Bestiary). You are also considered one size category larger for the purposes of any feats or abilities related to your wings, such as the Hover feat.

Special
While the following feats are primarily taken by strix, other creatures with natural wings can also take them at the GM's discretion.

Practical Kata.name: Practical Kata
Practical Kata.description:
Your martial meditation extends onto the battlefield.

Prerequisites
Improved Unarmed Strike, ki pool class feature.

Benefits
When you hit with a melee attack against an opponent you have already damaged this round, you can forgo dealing damage to instead regain 1 ki point. This feat can restore only 1 ki point every minute, to a maximum per day of 1 point for every 4 class levels you have.

Practiced Dreamer.name: Practiced Dreamer
Practiced Dreamer.description:
Your time in the Dimension of Dreams has improved your ability to manipulate its landscape.

Prerequisites
Cha 15, Lucid Dreamer, Knowledge (planes) 5 ranks.

Benefits
Once per day, you can reroll a failed attempt to perform an impossible action, such as casting a spell you can't normally cast, gaining an effect of a spell as if it had been cast, or conjuring a magic item. You also gain an additional +2 bonus on Charisma checks to determine your initial condition when entering a dream with your lucid body.

Practiced Leadership.name: Practiced Leadership
Practiced Leadership.description:
When you and your cohort are both members of the same organization, you needn't shoulder the burden of leadership alone. By relying on the authority of your shared organization as well as your own leadership skills, your cohort demonstrates improved devotion and tactical acumen.

Prerequisites
Leadership, membership in the same organization as your cohort.

Benefits
As long as you and your cohort maintain membership in good standing within the same organization, your cohort gains a +4 morale bonus on Will saves against enchantment spells and effects. Additionally, your cohort is treated as though she possessed the same teamwork feats you do for the purpose of determining whether you receive a bonus from your teamwork feats. Your cohort doesn't receive any bonuses from these feats unless she actually possesses the feats.

If you and your cohort belong to one of the organizations listed in this section, your cohort gains the practiced leadership benefit associated with your organization. If a benefit grants your cohort access to a spell-like ability, the caster level of the effect is 1st or equal to your cohort's caster level, whichever is higher.

Practiced Ritualist.name: 熟练祭祀 Practiced Ritualist
Practiced Ritualist.description:
在仪式施法者当中，你是个经验丰富的领头人。

先决条件: 知识技能（奥秘，历史，位面和宗教）1级。

专长效果: 你在进行异能仪式（occult rituals，异能冒险OA208页）的技能检定，以及学习施放异能仪式的智力检定上获得+2加值。如果你是该仪式的主施法者（a ritual’s primary caster）,对抗仪式效果的豁免DC+2.如果该仪式有所需副施法者的最小数量（minimum number of required secondary casters），该数量-1.

资源出处: Magic Tactics Toolbox pg. 5

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Practiced%20Ritualist

Practiced Tactician.name: 战术熟练 Practiced Tactician
Practiced Tactician.description:
通过简单的手势与指令，你能够在战斗中指挥他人。

先决条件: 【战术】职业特性。

专长效果: 每日你可以额外获得1次机会使用【战术】职业特性赋予同伴团队专长。

特殊说明: 你可以多次选取本专长，它的效果叠加。

资源出处: Advanced Players Guide pg. 167

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Practiced%20Tactician

Precipice Strike.name: Precipice Strike
Precipice Strike.description:
Rough mountain roads are as smooth as cobblestone to you. Enemies challenge you in your home territory at their peril.

Prerequisites
Dex 15, base attack bonus +6, cragkin half-orc.

Benefits
When you and the target of your attack are both in difficult terrain, treat the target as if he were flat-footed. In addition, if you attack a flat-footed enemy from a higher elevation (including while falling), you gain a +2 circumstance bonus on your attack roll.

Precocious Youth.name: Precocious Youth
Precocious Youth.description:
Even in youth, you seek to be more adult than your childish peers, a personal trait that will no doubt aid you in future years.

Prerequisites
Young age category.

Benefits
You lose one of the penalties associated with the young age category, either -2 Constitution, -2 Strength, or -2 Wisdom. Upon reaching adulthood you may exchange this feat for Great Fortitude, Iron Will, or Lightning Reflexes.

Special
You may take this feat up to three times. Each time you do, it affects a different penalty and must be exchanged for a different feat upon reaching adulthood.

Preferred Spell.name: 偏好法术 Preferred Spell
Preferred Spell.description:
你发现自己很容易施放某个特定的法术。

先决条件: 法术辨识5级，法术升阶。

专长效果: 选择一个你能够施放的法术。你能够通过牺牲一个与其环级相同或者更高环级的准备好的法术或法术位来自发施展它。你能够在施放它的时候应用你所拥有的任何超魔专长，为了这么做你需要提高需要牺牲的法术的最低等级，不过这不会增加法术的施放时间。

特殊说明: 你能够多次选取该专长。它的效果不会叠加。每次选取该专长，它都会应用在不同的法术上。

资源出处: Advanced Players Guide pg. 167

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Preferred%20Spell

Press to the Wall.name: 墙角战法 Press to the Wall
Press to the Wall.description:
专长类型：Combat

当你的目标没法轻易逃离时，你更加牛逼。

先决条件: 快步跟进，BAB+3。

专长效果: 若你是唯一一个威胁目标的单位，你可以在决定是否夹击目标时，将邻接目标的占据一个格子的固态不可移动物体（例如柱子、树干、墙）视为正威胁目标。

资源出处: Melee Tactics Toolbox pg. 7

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Press%20to%20the%20Wall

Pressure Adept.name: Pressure Adept
Pressure Adept.description:
You've spent so much time at unusual pressures that you've extended your native range beyond the norms of your species.

Prerequisites
Swim 5 ranks.

Benefits
Add one oceanic zone to your native range when calculating pressure (meaning that you don't take pressure damage in that range unless instantaneously transported up or down, and even then you adapt to the change all at once rather than 100 feet at a time). Surfacedwellers taking this feat must select the sunlight zone, and aquatic creatures can select any zone either directly above or directly below their native range.

Prestigious Spellcaster.name: Prestigious Spellcaster
Prestigious Spellcaster.description:
The transition into a spellcasting prestige class is less difficult for you, and because of this, you gain 1 additional effective spellcaster level from your prestige class levels.

Prerequisites
Favored Prestige Class with selected prestige class.

Benefits
The first time you gain a level in your favored prestige class and the spells per day class feature does not grant an increase in effective level for the purpose of casting spells, you gain new spells per day as if the prestige class did grant +1 level of spellcasting for that level. This effect is retroactive if you gain this feat at a level beyond the point where your favored prestige class would normally have not advanced your spellcasting.

The Prestigious Spellcaster feat does not have any effect if your favored prestige class does not have the spells per day class feature, or if it does have the spells per day class feature but already grants a level increase for every level of the prestige class (as do the arcane trickster and loremaster prestige classes).

Normal
You can select the Prestigious Spellcaster feat multiple times. Each time you select the Prestigious Spellcaster feat, your effective caster level increases by 1. However, regardless of the number of times you choose this feat, the total increase to your effective caster level cannot exceed your actual prestige class level.
This feat also applies to prestige classes that grant extracts per day instead of spells per day.

Primal Ancestry.name: Primal Ancestry
Primal Ancestry.description:
You have a deep connection to the primal First World and can channel this link into powerful effects once a day.

Prerequisites
Wis 13, member of the Primordial Ones

Benefits
Once per day as a move action, you can tap into the essence of the First World, and gain DR 5/cold iron for 1 minute. If you have 11 or more Hit Dice, this increases to DR 10/cold iron. Additionally, while under this effect, enchantment spells you cast gain a +1 bonus to caster level.

Primal Bloom.name: 原初绽放 Primal Bloom
Primal Bloom.description:
专长类型：Conduit

只需一个呼声，你就能唤来第一世界里奇幻莫测的魔法力量。

先决条件: 知识（位面）10级。

专长效果: 以一个标准动作，你可以制造一个以你为中心扩散的半径50尺受到原初奇异力量的影响的区域。该区域可持续1分钟，且区域制造后固定不变直到时间结束。受影响区域获得狂野魔法位面特性（见第63页），且受影响区域内的施法者正常运作法术的施法者等级检定DC增加5。如果该区域此前已经有狂野魔法位面特性，那么该区域内施法者正常运作法术的施法者等级检定DC改为增加10。

你每天能使用本专长一次，当你在知识（位面）上有15或更多个等级时，每天可使用本专长两次，而当你拥有20个知识等级时，每天可使用本专长三次。

资源出处: Planar Adventures pg. 31

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Primal%20Bloom

Primal Kineticist.name: Primal Kineticist
Primal Kineticist.description:
When primal magic surrounds you, you can channel it to transform the nature of your kinetic blasts.

Prerequisites
Kineticist level 1st.

Benefits
When using a simple kinetic blast in an area where primal magic is either predominant or very common, you can accept 1 point of burn to cause your blast to become one of the following simple blasts instead. Roll 1d10 to determine the simple blast: 1 = air, 2 = cold, 3 = earth, 4 = electric, 5 = fire, 6 = gravity, 7 = negative, 8 = telekinetic, 9 = water, 10 = wood. You can apply any of your form or substance infusions that are allowed as choices for the random blast, accepting the typical burn cost.

Primal Strike.name: Primal Strike
Primal Strike.description:
You have learned to draw primal magic through your body to befuddle your enemies.

Prerequisites
Wis 17, Improved Unarmed Strike, base attack bonus +8.

Benefits
Before making an attack roll, you can declare a primal strike. If you do and the attack hits, it deals damage normally and your target must attempt a Fortitude saving throw (DC = 10 + half your character level + your Wisdom modifier). A target who fails this saving throw is confused for 1 round. If you are in an area of primal magic, the confused condition lasts for 1d4 rounds. You can attempt a primal strike attack once per day for every 4 character levels you have (see Special below if you have monk levels), but no more than once per round. A primal strike is a mind-affecting compulsion effect.

Special
If you have levels in the monk class, you can make a primal attack a number of times per day equal to your monk level, plus one additional time per day for every 4 levels you have in classes other than monk, though still no more than once per round.

Prodigy.name: 奇才 Prodigy
Prodigy.description:
你天生就擅长于艺术和手艺。

专长效果: 从工艺、表演或者专业技能中任选两种（例如两种工艺，或者一种工艺一种表演）。你在这些技能的检定上获得+2加值。如果你在这些技能上拥有10个或者更高的受训等级，加值将会提升到+4。

特殊说明: 你可以多次选择本专长，其效果不累计。每次你选择本专长，它适用于两个新技能。

资源出处: Ultimate Magic pg. 154

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Prodigy

Profane Studies.name: Profane Studies
Profane Studies.description:
Your study of fiends grants you advantages when summoning or fighting them.

Prerequisites
Int 13, Knowledge (planes) 4 ranks, ability to cast a summon monster spell.

Benefits
You gain a +5 bonus on Knowledge (planes) checks involving evil outsiders. Additionally, when you cast a summon monster spell to summon an evil outsider, treat your caster level as 2 levels higher for the purpose of determining the duration.

Prone Shooter.name: 匍匐射手 Prone Shooter
Prone Shooter.description:
专长类型：Combat

当你俯卧时，你可以将弩或火器撑在地上稳定的射击。

先决条件: 基本攻击加值+1。

专长效果: 如果你在你上一次行动结束时处于俯卧状态，你在对抗近战攻击的防御等级的减值降到-2。此外，你在对抗远程攻击的防御等级的加值上升到+6。 。

资源出处: Ultimate Combat pg. 113

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Prone%20Shooter

战策增益：只要你的耐力池中还有1点耐力，你就能获得这个专长的加值，即使你在你上一回合结束的时候并未俯卧。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 129

Prone Slinger.name: 匍匐投手 Prone Slinger
Prone Slinger.description:
专长类型：Combat

你即使在俯卧状态也能熟练的侧身发射弹药和石头。

专长效果: 在俯卧时，你可以使用投石索进行远程攻击。

通常状况: 只有弩和火器可以在俯卧状态进行远程攻击。

资源出处: Ultimate Combat pg. 113

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Prone%20Slinger

战策增益：只要你的耐力池中还有1点耐力，你就能在俯卧并使用投石索攻击时在攻击骰上获得+2加值。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 129

Prophet.name: 布道先知 Prophet
Prophet.description:
专长类型：Story

真相已然显露，而你则被选定令其实现。

先决条件: 你必须能够施放神术、并且从你所信奉的神祇（或其他合适的超自然存在）处获得一项神谕；或你拥有“神赋刻印（Marked by the Gods）”角色背景。

专长效果: 若你非邪恶且侍奉非邪恶神祇，当你为同伴施放有益法术时，你获得神圣AC+1，持续每法术等级1轮。若你邪恶或侍奉邪恶神祇，当你向敌人施放有害法术时，你获得亵渎AC+1，持续每法术等级1轮。对自己施法则无此效果，除非该法术同时也影响同伴。

专长目标: 使适当数量的生物皈依到你所信奉的神祇座下。

完成收益: 你对他人施放有益或有害法术后获得的AC加值增至+2，并且这些加值在效果时间内还能应用于豁免。

资源出处: Quests and Campaigns pg. 12Ultimate Campaign pg. 71

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Prophet

Prophetic Visionary.name: 未来福音 Prophetic Visionary
Prophetic Visionary.description:
你的先知能力使你得以一瞥未来。

先决条件: 【秘示域】职业特性。

专长效果: 每天1次，你能够进入一种入神状态并且一观未来的景象。入神持续10分钟，在这段时间里你不能进行任何其他的行动。如果你被打断了，你必须重新开始。当你入神结束后，你可以得知接下来的某个特定行为带来的结果是好是坏，这如同一个‘占卜术’般有70%的成功率。

资源出处: Ultimate Magic pg. 154

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Prophetic%20Visionary

Prophetic Visionary (Mythic).name: 未来福音(神话) Prophetic Visionary (Mythic)
Prophetic Visionary (Mythic).description:
先决条件：未来福音

你的预知能力能够进一步帮助你。

神话专长效果：你能够随意使用未来福音专长的占卜术（augury）能力，每次你都需要在深度的出神状态中花费10分钟。你的占卜术成功率增加每阶层1%。若本专长的占卜术使用成功的话，还会赋予你神导术（Guidance）的好处，不过它的加值会等同于你的阶层，而且提供的是洞察加值，以取代原本的表现加值。

资源出处: Mythic Adventures pg. 71

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Prophetic%20Visionary

Prosperity and Pride.name: Prosperity and Pride
Prosperity and Pride.description:
Your family has raised cities and mastered trade, and you seek to do the same.

Prerequisites
Be a member of House Corcina, or have the Craftsperson, Inheritance, Well-Connected Friend, or Worldshaker background.

Benefits
When in a settlement the size of a large city or smaller, you receive a +2 bonus on Appraise checks and Diplomacy checks. If you have 10 or more ranks in one of these skills, the bonus on that skill increases to +4.

Goal
Your actions must spur a settlement to grow to the next size category; this usually involves decisively defeating a challenging foe or an appropriate number of foes preying upon or impeding the settlement's citizenry.

Completion Benefit
You teach others how to get the most out of their equipment. Three times per day as a standard action, you can increase the armor bonus provided by a suit of nonmagical armor, the circumstance bonus to a skill provided by a tool or skill kit, or the shield bonus provided by a nonmagical shield by 1. This bonus lasts for 1 hour and doesn't stack with other uses of this ability.

Protective Channel.name: 防护引导 Protective Channel
Protective Channel.description:
先决条件：引导能量7d6，信仰艾奥梅黛

先决条件: 引导能量7d6，信仰艾奥梅黛。

专长效果: 当你引导正能量治疗活物时，你可以选择使受到你的引导能量治疗的生物获得法术防护邪恶的效果（施法者等级等同于你的有效牧师等级）。

资源出处: Inner Sea Gods pg. 215

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Protective%20Channel

Protective Line.name: Protective Line
Protective Line.description:
Your teammates look out for you while you reload.

Prerequisites
Exotic Weapon Proficiency (firearms).

Benefits
When you are adjacent to an ally who also has this feat, you do not provoke attacks of opportunity while loading a firearm.

Protective Strike.name: Protective Strike
Protective Strike.description:
When you smite evil, your divine power protects a creature within line of sight.

Prerequisites
Smite evil class feature, base attack bonus +5.

Benefits
When you choose the target of your smite evil ability, you also choose one creature other than you within line of sight. While your smite is in effect, the additional creature you chose gains a deflection bonus to AC equal to your Charisma modifier against attacks made by the target of the smite. This bonus ends when the smite ends. You do not gain the deflection bonus to AC typical for the smite evil class feature.

Normal
While smite evil is in effect, the paladin gains a deflection bonus to her AC equal to her Charisma modifier (if any) against attacks made by the target of the smite.

Protector of the People.name: Protector of the People
Protector of the People.description:
You have vowed to construct a defender for your community.

Prerequisites
Your community has come under persecution and requires considerable defense, or you have the Raiders, the Righting a Wrong, The War, or The Way Things Work background (all of which are found in Ultimate Campaign).

Benefits
You temporarily gain the Craft Construct feat for the purposes of building one golem to satisfy the goal of this story feat. You do not need to meet Craft Construct's prerequisites, and it can't be used as a prerequisite for any other crafting endeavor.

Goal
Craft a golem of CR 5 or greater and donate it to your community for its defense against persecution. You and your allies must fund the construction, not the community. You must be significantly involved in the golem's construction. After completion, this golem cannot be used as a personal adventuring companion; it is the property of the community to which it was dedicated. The donated creature must be a golem and not another type of construct, such as an animated object.

Completion Benefit
You gain Craft Construct as a bonus feat without meeting its prerequisites and can use it for any purpose. The cost to build any construct that normally costs less than the cost of your donated golem is permanently reduced by 10%; the cost of the base materials is not reduced, however.

Protector's Strike.name: 防御者之击 Protector's Strike
Protector's Strike.description:
先决条件：制裁邪恶职业能力，基础攻击加值+5

先决条件: 制裁邪恶职业能力，基础攻击加值+5。

专长效果: 在激活你的制裁邪恶能力选择目标时，你还可以选择一个处于你视线内的盟友，在你进行制裁邪恶时，你所选择的盟友在对抗制裁目标的攻击时会在AC上获得相当于你魅力调整值的偏斜加值，而你无法从自己的制裁邪恶能力中获得AC加值。

通常状况: 当激活制裁邪恶能力后，圣武士可以在对抗制裁的目标攻击时在自己的AC上获得相当于魅力调整值的偏斜加值。

资源出处: Inner Sea Gods pg. 215Faiths of Purity pg. 25

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Protector's%20Strike

Proxy Summoning.name: 代理召唤 Proxy Summoning
Proxy Summoning.description:
你召唤的生物可以作为传递你法术的代理源。

先决条件: 施放咒法（召唤）法术的能力或施放咒法（召唤）类法术能力，施法者等级5。

专长效果: 你可以对与你邻接的一个你的召唤生物（包括幻灵）使用接触法术，并指定该生物作为接触法术的传递载体。以此法使用过接触法术后，你和你所有的召唤生物都获得“法术共享”特殊能力。该专长不受到如下限制：“你必须有一个动物伙伴、魔宠或类似盟友生物才能获得法术共享能力”。

资源出处: Ranged Tactics Toolbox pg. 12

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Proxy%20Summoning

Psychic Adept.name: 念力技法 Psychic Adept
Psychic Adept.description:
通过磨练心智，你开始获得驾驭精神力量的能力。

先决条件: 智力11，异能敏感（Psychic Sensitivity）。

专长效果: 你获得施放异能者职业法术列表中一个0级念力（knack）的能力。每日你能以类法术能力施放该法术3次。该能力的施法者等级与你的角色等级相同，且豁免DC等同于10 + 你的智力调整值。

特殊说明: 你可以多次选取该专长，每次都要选择一个不同的念力。

资源出处: Occult Adventures pg. 137

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Psychic%20Adept

Psychic Combatant.name: 心灵争斗者 Psychic Combatant
Psychic Combatant.description:
专长类型：Combat

你很擅长在异能决斗中攻击敌人。

先决条件: 智力13，异能敏感（Psychic Sensitivity）或者施放异能法术（psychic spells）或使用异能类法术（psychic spell-like）的能力，角色等级3级。

专长效果: 你获得一个额外幻形点数（Manifestation Points）池，数值相当于你的角色等级的一半。无论何时，你都能够在异能决斗（Psychic Duel）中使用这些点数。然而当你没有参与异能决斗之时，能够以迅捷动作从幻形点数池中花费1点，来使你的豁免检定在对抗异能法术时获得+1加值，持续至你的下个回合开始为止；或者也可以以迅捷动作花费3点，来使豁免检定在对抗异能法术时获得+2加值，持续至你的下个回合开始为止。这个幻形点数池会在每日开始时恢复。

资源出处: Occult Adventures pg. 137

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Psychic%20Combatant

Psychic Defender.name: 心灵护卫者 Psychic Defender
Psychic Defender.description:
你很擅长在异能决斗中保护自己。

先决条件: 智力13，异能敏感（Psychic Sensitivity）或者施放异能法术（psychic spells）或使用异能类法术（psychic spell-like）的能力，角色等级3级。

专长效果: 每当你进入一场异能决斗（Psychic Duel）时，都会获得一定数量的临时生命值，具体数值等同于你的幻形等级（Manifestation Level）。这些临时生命值会持续至异能决斗结束为止。

资源出处: Occult Adventures pg. 138

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Psychic%20Defender

Psychic Disciple.name: 异能修行者 Psychic Disciple
Psychic Disciple.description:
你已经开启自身的心智，并由此习得了更高层次的异能法术。

先决条件: 智力13，念力技法（Psychic Adept），异能敏感（Psychic Sensitivity）。

专长效果: 你获得施放异能者职业法术列表中一个1级异能法术（psychic spell）的能力。每日你能以类法术能力施放该法术2次。该能力的施法者等级与你的角色等级相同，且豁免DC等同于11 + 你的智力调整值。

特殊说明: 你可以多次选取该专长，每次都要选择一个不同的法术。

资源出处: Occult Adventures pg. 138

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Psychic%20Disciple

Psychic Healing.name: 精神疗法 Psychic Healing
Psychic Healing.description:
通过传达你的意志，魂魄能够自行修复身体。

先决条件: 魅力11，异能敏感（Psychic Sensitivity）或者施放异能法术（psychic spells）的能力，医疗3级。

专长效果: 作为一次信念治疗（Faith Healing）神秘技能解放的额外使用机会，你能尝试操作一名生物的精神状态，并以此来医疗它的身体受到的伤害。该功能如同使用医疗技能治疗严重伤害（treat deadly wounds），但这还会赋予该生物一定量的临时生命值，数值与被医疗的伤害数值相同。这些临时生命值持续1小时。使用精神疗法不需要医疗包（healer’s kit）。一名生物每日只能从精神疗法中获益一次，而且无法在同一天内同时获得精神疗法以及医疗技能的治疗严重伤害带来的好处。

资源出处: Occult Adventures pg. 138

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Psychic%20Healing

Psychic Maestro.name: 神秘技能大师 Psychic Maestro
Psychic Maestro.description:
你可以更加频繁地使用两种神秘技能解放。

先决条件: 异能敏感（Psychic Sensitivity）或者施放异能法术（psychic spells）的能力。

专长效果: 选择两个神秘技能解放（Occult Skill Unlock）。这两项神秘技能解放每日都能获得1次额外使用次数（对于扶乩来说则是每周1次额外使用次数）。你必须在与上述神秘技能解放相关的技能上至少投入1点技能点。

资源出处: Occult Adventures pg. 138

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Psychic%20Maestro

Psychic Sensitivity.name: 异能敏感 Psychic Sensitivity
Psychic Sensitivity.description:
你了解了世界的神秘侧面。

专长效果: 你获得对于所有你拥有技能等级的技能的神秘技能解放（Occult Skill Unlock）。如果你在特定技能上并未受训，那么你就不能使用该技能的神秘技能解放，即使你可以在未受训的情况下使用这个技能进行检定也不行。

正常：你必须能够施放异能法术才能获得神秘技能解放。

资源出处: Occult Adventures pg. 138

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Psychic%20Sensitivity

Psychic Virtuoso.name: 神秘技能达人 Psychic Virtuoso
Psychic Virtuoso.description:
你十分擅长使用各种神秘技能解放。

先决条件: 异能敏感（Psychic Sensitivity）或者施放异能法术（psychic spells）的能力。

专长效果: 你在使用神秘技能解放（Occult Skill Unlock）的检定中获得+2加值。如果你在基础技能上投入10点以上的技能点，那么该加值会增加至+4点。这些加值无法应用至其他使用基础技能的检定中——它只会对神秘技能解放的检定生效。

资源出处: Occult Adventures pg. 138

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Psychic%20Virtuoso

Psychovore Master.name: Psychovore Master
Psychovore Master.description:
When your unarmed attacks strike true. you also damage your target's mind and gain power from it.

Prerequisites
Improved Unarmed Strike, Psychovore Strike, Psychovore Style, Sense Motives 15 ranks.

Benefits
When you score a critical hit against the creature you are gaining a dodge bonus to AC against from Psychovore Style with your unarmed strike, that target also takes 1 point of Intelligence and Wisdom damage and you gain 2d8 temporary hit points. These temporary hit points last for 1 hour and don't stack with other temporary hit points you might gain with this feat.

Psychovore Strike.name: Psychovore Strike
Psychovore Strike.description:
You can land blows that confuse your enemies.

Prerequisites
Improved Unarmed Strike, Psychovore Style, Sense Motive 9 ranks.

Benefits
When you strike the creature you are gaining a dodge bonus to AC against from Psychovore Style with your unarmed strike, you can force that creature to attempt a Will saving throw (DC = 10 + 1/2 your character level + your Wisdom modifier), in addition to dealing damage normally. A creature who fails its save is confused for 1d6 rounds. You must declare that you are using this feat before you make your attack roll (thus, a failed attack roll ruins the attempt). You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 1 + your Wisdom bonus (minimum once per day), and no more than once per round. This is a mind-affecting effect, and a creature confused in this way never attacks you.

Psychovore Style.name: Psychovore Style
Psychovore Style.description:
You can sense the thoughts of others, allowing you to predict their movements.

Prerequisites
Improved Unarmed Strike, Sense Motive 3 ranks.

Benefits
When using this style, you can attempt a Sense Motive check (DC = 15 + CR of target) as a move action against a creature with an Intelligence score of 3 or higher. If you succeed, you gain a +1 dodge bonus to your AC against attacks from the target creature until you are no longer using this style. You can have this bonus against only one creature at a time: if you succeed at this Sense Motive check against another creature, you lose the bonus against the first creature. This bonus increases to +2 when you have 8 ranks in Sense Motive, and to +3 when you have 13 ranks in Sense Motive.

Pummeling Bully.name: 刚掌波 Pummeling Bully
Pummeling Bully.description:
专长类型：Combat

你的力道刚猛无比，足以将弱者吹走或掀翻。

先决条件: 精通复位（Improved Reposition）APG，精通摔绊，精通徒手击打，刚烈掌，基础攻击加值+9或拳师等级5或武僧等级5。

专长效果: 在使用刚烈掌流派时，若全回合疾风连击只针对单个目标，则你伴随攻击可以发动一次复位或摔绊战技攻击尝试。

资源出处: Advanced Class Guide pg. 153

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Pummeling%20Bully

战策增益：当你使用刚烈掌进行攻击时，你可以消耗2点耐力来以一个自由动作做出一次冲撞而不是移位尝试。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 129

Pummeling Charge.name: 天将奔烈 Pummeling Charge
Pummeling Charge.description:
专长类型：Combat

挟裹着呼啸之势，你聚起至强至刚的斗气冲击敌人

先决条件: 精通徒手击打，刚烈掌，基础攻击加值+12或拳师等级8或武僧等级8（译注：注意和龙拳一样，这个流派进阶只有一阶）。

专长效果: 在使用刚烈掌流派攻击时，你可以在冲锋后进行全回合疾风连击，作为冲锋动作的一部分。你必须在预定对目标发动刚烈掌的情况下，才能发动天将奔烈。

通常状况: 你无法在冲锋时进行全回合攻击。

资源出处: Advanced Class Guide pg. 154

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Pummeling%20Charge

战策增益：当你使用天将奔烈攻击时，你可以消耗5点耐力来以你的最高加值做出一次额外攻击。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 129

Pummeling Style.name: 刚烈掌 Pummeling Style
Pummeling Style.description:
专长类型：CombatStyle

你汇聚全身的力道，打出刚猛的一击。

先决条件: 精通徒手击打，基础攻击加值+6，拳师连打职业能力或疾风连击职业能力。

专长效果: 当你用徒手攻击对单个目标进行全回合攻击或疾风连击时，在应用敌方的DR之前先合计自己的伤害。无论你有什么其它的特殊能力，该专长都只对徒手攻击生效。

资源出处: Advanced Class Guide pg. 154

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Pummeling%20Style

战策增益：当你使用这个流派时，你可以消耗5点耐力来以一个标准动作打出你所有的攻击，而不是一个整轮动作。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 129

Punch Through.name: Punch Through
Punch Through.description:
You and your allies are adept at bypassing enemy defenses.

Prerequisites
Base attack bonus +6.

Benefits
As a full-round action, you may make a single attack against a target. If the attack hits and deals damage to the target, all of your allies with this feat ignore up to 5 points of damage reduction against the same target for 1 round. This feat does not apply to damage reduction without a type (such as DR 10/--).

Pungent Stench.name: Pungent Stench
Pungent Stench.description:
Your stench is overwhelmingly nauseating.

Prerequisites
Stench universal monster ability, Improved Stench, Great Fortitude

Benefits
The first round a creature is affected by your stench, it is nauseated in addition to being sickened. At the end of an affected creature's turn after the first round, it can make a new save against the stench's DC to remove the nauseated condition, but the sickened condition lasts as long as normal.

Punishing Kick.name: 扫堂腿 Punishing Kick
Punishing Kick.description:
专长类型：Combat

你的踢腿是如此有力，以至于可以用来踢开或者踢倒敌人。

先决条件: 体质13，感知13，精通徒手打击，基本攻击加值+8。

专长效果: 你必须在进行攻击检定之前声明使用该专长（因此失败的攻击检定会浪费这次机会）。成功命中会正常造成攻击伤害，并且你能够选择将目标推开5尺或者尝试将他击倒。如果你选择推开目标，他会立即远离你5尺。这个移动不会引发借机攻击，并且目标必须在移动结束时处于能够站立的安全空间。如果你尝试将目标击倒，目标需要进行DC为“10+1/2你的角色等级+感知修正”的强韧豁免来避免该效果。每日你可以尝试进行扫堂腿的次数为每4个等级1次（见特殊说明），并且每轮只能进行1次。

特殊说明: 般若僧（Hungry Ghost Monk, APG武僧变体）会在1级获得“扫堂腿”作为奖励专长，即使他并不满足专长的先决条件。武僧每日可以尝试使用扫堂腿的次数等同于他的武僧等级，额外加上每4个非武僧职业等级1次。

资源出处: Advanced Players Guide pg. 167

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Punishing%20Kick

战策增益：你可以消耗5点耐力来在你做出一次成功的徒手击打后宣告使用这个专长。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 129

Punishing Step.name: Punishing Step
Punishing Step.description:
You can hurt a foe that uses a combat maneuver against you.

Prerequisites
Dex 13, Dodge.

Benefits
Your bonus to AC from the Dodge feat increases to +2 when calculating your CMD. When a creature attempts a combat maneuver against you and fails, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus on attack rolls against that creature until the end of your next turn.

Puppet Master.name: Puppet Master
Puppet Master.description:
You crave power you can wield without drawing attention to yourself.

Prerequisites
You must have survived an encounter with a challenging foe without suffering significant harm by striking a deal (regardless of whether the deal was with the challenging foe or not), or have the Boss, the Liege Lord, or the Well-Connected Friend background.

Benefits
If you succeed at a Diplomacy check to make a request of a creature by 5 or more, the DCs of additional requests you attempt increase by 1 per request, rather than 5.

Goal
Either thwart or decisively defeat an appropriate number of challenging foes as a direct result of bargains you have struck or control at least three leaders of settlements of at least 2,000 residents or similarly influential administrators for at least 6 months without being publicly exposed.

Completion Benefit
If you succeed at a Diplomacy check to make a request of a creature, the DCs of additional requests you attempt increase by 1 per request, rather than 5.

Pure Faith.name: 纯粹信仰 Pure Faith
Pure Faith.description:
你不仅如同其他圣骑士般能够免疫疾病，还对毒药拥有惊人的抗性。

先决条件: 【神佑】职业特性。

专长效果: 你在对抗毒药的豁免上获得+4神圣加值。

资源出处: Ultimate Magic pg. 154

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Pure%20Faith

Pure Legion Assault.name: Pure Legion Assault
Pure Legion Assault.description:
The Pure Legion trained you to apply your knowledge of religions to predicting and defeating divine servitors.

Prerequisites
Bluff 1 rank, Knowledge (religion) 1 rank, Pure Legion Recruit trait (Pathfinder Player Companion: People of the Sands 21).

Benefits
You gain a +2 bonus on saving throws against divine spells and effects and abilities from outsiders. If you must attempt a saving throw against a divine spell, you gain a +1 bonus on attack rolls against the creature that cast the spell.

Purging Emesis.name: Purging Emesis
Purging Emesis.description:
You learn to purge toxins by vomiting.

Prerequisites
Great Fortitude.

Benefits
As a full-round action that provokes attacks of opportunity, you can attempt to end an ingested poison effect by making yourself vomit. If you succeed at a new saving throw against the initial effect, you gain the nauseated condition for 1 round but end the poison effect as if you had succeeded at the requisite saving throws. Your vomiting causes one adjacent square to become slippery (Core Rulebook 412) until your vomit is cleaned (usually taking 1 full round) or dries up (usually 1 hour). Once you use this feat, you must wait at least 1 hour and consume food or drink before you can use it again.

Purifying Channel.name: 涤净引导 Purifying Channel
Purifying Channel.description:
你的治疗能量能够同时伤害敌人。

先决条件: 魅力 15，选择引导，引导能量职业特性。

专长效果: 当你引导正能量治疗生物时，选择一个被你排除在引导能量治疗效果之外的生物，令其受到等同于你治疗骰结果的火焰伤害，并因这些火焰的强光而目眩一轮。一次成功的对抗你的引导能量的豁免检定可以减半火焰伤害并抵抗目眩效果。

资源出处: Adventurers Guide pg. 15

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Purifying%20Channel

Pursuit of Glory.name: Pursuit of Glory
Pursuit of Glory.description:
You know that daring deeds and heroics live forever in song, and sagas will carry your deeds into immortality.

Prerequisites
Human (Ulfen).

Benefits
Whenever you start or end a charge attack in a space adjacent to an ally who also has this feat, you gain a +2 morale bonus on one attack roll you make as part of the charge. Furthermore, you can charge through a space containing an ally who also has this feat.

Push the Limits.name: 突破极限 Push the Limits
Push the Limits.description:
专长类型：Combat

即使在疲乏中，你依然能克服万难获取胜利。

先决条件: 体质13，战斗耐力，BAB+1

专长专长效果：你获得一个次级耐力池，容量等同你的体质加值。只有当你主耐力池归零，或你疲乏时你才能动用该次级耐力池（通常在你疲乏时你无法使用耐力点）。如果你的次级耐力池也耗尽，你将力竭，直至主耐力池恢复到一点耐力或以上。无论次级耐力池里有多少耐力点，只要主耐力池为空，你依然疲乏。次级耐力池只有8小时睡眠能恢复。

专长效果: 你获得一个次级耐力池，容量等同你的体质加值。只有当你主耐力池归零，或你疲乏时你才能动用该次级耐力池（通常在你疲乏时你无法使用耐力点）。如果你的次级耐力池也耗尽，你将力竭，直至主耐力池恢复到一点耐力或以上。无论次级耐力池里有多少耐力点，只要主耐力池为空，你依然疲乏。次级耐力池只有8小时睡眠能恢复。

资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 113

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Push%20the%20Limits

Pushing Assault.name: 推进强袭 Pushing Assault
Pushing Assault.description:
专长类型：Combat

你使用双手武器攻击能够将小体型的敌人打退。

先决条件: 力量15，猛力攻击，基本攻击加值+1。

专长效果: 当你使用双手武器进行攻击不大于你的体型的生物，并且应用了猛力攻击专长时，你可以选择将目标推开5尺来替代猛力攻击带来的额外伤害。如果你成功造成重击，则能够将目标推开10尺。这个移动不会引发借机攻击，并且目标必须在移动结束时处于能够站立的安全空间。你可以在进行攻击检定之后选择产生何种效果，但是必须在进行伤害检定之前选择。

资源出处: Advanced Players Guide pg. 167

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Pushing%20Assault

战策增益：你可以消耗5点耐力来同时获得这个专长的效果和来自猛力攻击的额外伤害。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 129

Putrid Summons.name: Putrid Summons
Putrid Summons.description:
You summon creatures whose very presence turns the stomach of your foes.

Prerequisites
Spell Focus (conjuration); ability to cast summon monster or summon nature's ally.

Benefits
When you cast a summon monster or summon nature's ally spell, you can choose to summon a single creature that exudes a putrid odor or befouls the water surrounding it, granting it the stench universal monster ability. The duration of the sickened condition created by this stench is a number of rounds equal to the spell'slevel. When performing a putrid summon, you summon a creature from the next lower list than the spell you are casting. For instance, if you cast summon monster IV, you summon a creature from the summon monster III list.

Quah Bond.name: Quah Bond
Quah Bond.description:
Your bond with your totem spirit increases around others of the same quah.

Prerequisites
Totem Spirit (The Inner Sea World Guide 289), human (Shoanti).

Benefits
If at least one Shoanti ally from the same quah who also has this feat is within 30 feet, double your benefits from the Totem Spirit feat.

Quarterstaff Master.name: 木棍大师 Quarterstaff Master
Quarterstaff Master.description:
专长类型：Combat

你能将木棍当作单手或双手武器使用。

先决条件: 武器专攻（木棍），基本攻击加值+5。

专长效果: 靠着采取一些不同的姿势和战技，你可以将木棍作为单手武器。在你行动轮开始的时候，你可以决定要将木棍当作单手还是双手武器使用，当你把它作为单手武器，你的另外一只手就可以自由活动，不过如此一来就不能用木裈以双头武器的方式发起攻击。此外，拥有此专长之后，就算你不是战士，你仍可以选择木棍的“武器专精”。

资源出处: Ultimate Magic pg. 154

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Quarterstaff%20Master

战策增益：当你使用这个专长来以单手武器持用木棍时，你可以消耗5点耐力来获得以双头武器使用它的能力，并同时保持一只手空闲。这个效果持续到你的下一回合开始。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 129

Quick Bull Rush.name: 快速冲撞 Quick Bull Rush
Quick Bull Rush.description:
专长类型：Combat

你可以在攻击中迅速地撞击对手。

先决条件: 力量13，精通冲撞，猛力攻击，基本攻击加值+6。

专长效果: 当你行动时，你可以用一次单独的冲撞战技检定来代替你的一次近战攻击。你只能用使用最高攻击加值的那次攻击来冲撞。

通常状况: 冲撞战技检定是一个标准动作。

资源出处: Ultimate Combat pg. 113

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Quick%20Bull%20Rush

战策增益：你可以消耗2点耐力来让一次不是最高基本攻击加值的攻击变成冲撞战技。你每轮只能使用这个战策1次，但你可以在你已经使用你最高基本攻击加值进行冲撞之后使用这个战策。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 129

Quick Channel.name: 快速导能 Quick Channel
Quick Channel.description:
你的神圣能量以令人目眩的速度闪耀着。

先决条件: 知识（宗教）5级，【引导能量】职业特性。

专长效果: 你可以花费2次每日使用次数，以移动动作使用引导能量。

资源出处: Ultimate Magic pg. 154

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Quick%20Channel

Quick Dirty Trick.name: 快速阴招 Quick Dirty Trick
Quick Dirty Trick.description:
专长类型：Combat

你在攻击中夹杂一些阴险下流的伎俩，让你的对手来不及反应。

先决条件: 智力13，寓守于攻，精通阴招，基本攻击加值+6。

专长效果: 当你行动时，你可以用一次单独的阴招战技检定来代替你的一次近战攻击。你只能用使用最高攻击加值的那次攻击来阴招。

通常状况: 阴招战技检定是一个标准动作。

资源出处: Ultimate Combat pg. 114

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Quick%20Dirty%20Trick

战策增益：即使你没有满足属性值先决条件（智力13）时也可以选择这个专长。只有在你的耐力池中至少还有1点耐力时你才能获得这个专长的好处。你可以消耗2点耐力来让一次不是最高基本攻击加值的攻击变成阴招APG战技。你每轮只能使用这个战策1次，但你可以在你已经使用你最高基本攻击加值进行虚招之后使用这个战策。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 129

Quick Drag.name: 快速拖拽 Quick Drag
Quick Drag.description:
专长类型：Combat

你拖拽你的敌人，并顺手补上一击。

先决条件: 力量13，精通拖拽，猛力攻击，基本攻击加值+6。

专长效果: 当你行动时，你可以用一次单独的拖拽战技检定来代替你的一次近战攻击。你只能用使用最高攻击加值的那次攻击来拖拽。

通常状况: 拖拽战技检定是一个标准动作。

资源出处: Ultimate Combat pg. 114

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Quick%20Drag

战策增益：你可以消耗2点耐力来让一次不是最高基本攻击加值的攻击变成拖拽APG战技。你每轮只能使用这个战策1次，但你可以在你已经使用你最高基本攻击加值进行拖拽之后使用这个战策。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 129

Quick Draw (Mythic).name: 即时备战(神话) Quick Draw (Mythic)
Quick Draw (Mythic).description:
先决条件：即时备战

你能够快速取出任何物品，而不仅仅是武器。

神话专长效果：你能够使用即时备战专长取出任意种类的物品，而不仅仅是武器，不过这需要在这些物品收纳（stored）或隐藏（concealed）在你的身上。以移动动作，你能够花费1次神话之力，以此来取出两件隐藏的物品。你必须双手都空着才能这么做。

资源出处: Mythic Adventures pg. 71

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Quick%20Draw

Quick Favor.name: 略施小惠 Quick Favor
Quick Favor.description:
你能够利用个人魅力快速得利。

先决条件: 谈判专家。

专长效果: 每日1次，若你刚使用交涉技能搜集过信息，那么你可以在前一次搜集信息结束后，立即在此地点再次以交涉检定搜集信息（无论先前的尝试是否成功），而且后续这次搜集信息所需要的时间降低至4d10分钟。

通常状况: 使用交涉技能搜集信息需要花费1d4小时。

资源出处: Ultimate Intrigue pg. 89

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Quick%20Favor

Quick Preparation.name: Quick Preparation
Quick Preparation.description:
Early on in your adventuring career, you learned (perhaps the hard way) how to prepare your spells even when put under extreme time constraints.

Prerequisites
Ability to prepare spells.

Benefits
When preparing spells, you halve the time necessary to do so.

Normal
Preparing all of your spells takes 1 hour.

Quick Reposition.name: 快速移位 Quick Reposition
Quick Reposition.description:
专长类型：Combat

你在战斗中仍然能够轻松的将敌人的位置玩弄于指掌之中。

先决条件: 智力13，寓守于攻，精通移位，基本攻击加值+6。

专长效果: 当你行动时，你可以用一次单独的移位战技检定来代替你的一次近战攻击。你只能用使用最高攻击加值的那次攻击来移位。

通常状况: 移位战技检定是一个标准动作。

资源出处: Ultimate Combat pg. 114

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Quick%20Reposition

战策增益：即使你没有满足属性值先决条件（智力13）时也可以选择这个专长。只有在你的耐力池中至少还有1点耐力时你才能获得这个专长的好处。你可以消耗2点耐力来让一次不是最高基本攻击加值的攻击变成移位APG战技。你每轮只能使用这个战策1次，但你可以在你已经使用你最高基本攻击加值进行移位之后使用这个战策。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 129

Quick Steal.name: 快速盗取 Quick Steal
Quick Steal.description:
专长类型：Combat

你善于在搏斗中顺手牵羊。

先决条件: 智力13，寓守于攻，精通盗取，基本攻击加值+6。

专长效果: 当你行动时，你可以用一次单独的盗取战技检定来代替你的一次近战攻击。你只能用使用最高攻击加值的那次攻击来盗取。

通常状况: 盗取战技检定是一个标准动作。

资源出处: Ultimate Combat pg. 114

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Quick%20Steal

战策增益：即使你没有满足属性值先决条件（智力13）时也可以选择这个专长。只有在你的耐力池中至少还有1点耐力时你才能获得这个专长的好处。你可以消耗2点耐力来让一次不是最高基本攻击加值的攻击变成盗取APG战技。你每轮只能使用这个战策1次，但你可以在你已经使用你最高基本攻击加值进行盗取之后使用这个战策。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 130

Quick Stow.name: Quick Stow
Quick Stow.description:
You effortlessly stow items and sheathe weapons.

Prerequisites
Quick Draw, base attack bonus +1.

Benefits
You do not provoke an attack of opportunity when sheathing a weapon, and you can combine a move action to sheathe a weapon with a regular move action.
