(You can both stow and draw a weapon as part of the same move action in this way.) If you have the Two-Weapon Fighting feat, you can sheathe two light or one-handed weapons in the time it would normally take to sheathe one.

You can also quickly stow items in a backpack or other container that you are wearing or carrying. When you successfully use an action to pick up an item (including when you steal an item with a successful Sleight of Hand check or steal combat maneuver check), you can stow the item as part of the same action used to acquire it. You can try to hide this object by attempting a Sleight of Hand check with a -20 penalty, opposed by the Perception check results of all opponents.

Quick Study.name: 快速研习 Quick Study
Quick Study.description:
专长类型：Combat

你可以学得很快，但是并不能牢靠地记忆住如此习得的技巧。

先决条件: 智力 13，英勇+3（Bravery +3）职业能力，战士等级10级。

专长效果: 每日1次，你能够与他人进行训练，以此来让你获得的对方拥有、但你并不具备的1个专长。你必须和他一同训练8小时，而且必须满足以此方式获取的专长之先决条件。你会获得上述专长，持续至你再次使用本专长学习其他专长为止。

资源出处: Ultimate Intrigue pg. 89

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Quick%20Study

Quick Trapper.name: Quick Trapper
Quick Trapper.description:
Your trap-making proficiency improves greatly.

Prerequisites
Learn Ranger Trap or trap class feature, Survival 5 ranks.

Benefits
When setting a ranger trap (Pathfinder RPG Ultimate Magic 64), you can do so as a standard action rather than a full-round action. If you do so, the trap DC is reduced by 5.

Quick Wild Shape.name: 快速变身 Quick Wild Shape
Quick Wild Shape.description:
你在变身时牺牲威力换取速度。

先决条件: 【自然变身】职业特性，施法者等级8级。

专长效果: 你能够以移动动作或者迅捷动作施展自然变身。然而，你在用移动动作变身时你的有效德鲁伊等级降低2级，或者在使用迅捷动作变身时你的有效德鲁伊等级降低4级。

资源出处: Ultimate Magic pg. 154

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Quick%20Wild%20Shape

Quicken Blessing.name: 快速祝福 Quicken Blessing
Quicken Blessing.description:
你可以以极快的速度施放神祇的祝福。

先决条件: 战斗祭司祝福职业能力，高等祝福。

专长效果: 选择一个你可以以标准动作使用的祝福，你可以使用两次每日的祝福能力使用能力（无论是高等还是次级祝福），以迅捷动作使用此祝福。

通常状况: 你可以多次选择本专长，每次你选择时，你可以以迅捷动作使用另一个祝福。

资源出处: Advanced Class Guide pg. 154

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Quicken%20Blessing

Quicken Spell-Like Ability.name: 类法术能力瞬发 Quicken Spell-Like Ability
Quicken Spell-Like Ability.description:
专长类型：Monster

这个生物可以以极短的时间发动类法术能力。

先决条件: 拥有施法者等级10级以上的类法术能力。

专长效果: 选择一项该生物拥有的类法术能力，每天3次，该生物可以如同搭配了“法术瞬发”超魔般使用此类法术能力（除非该生物每天可以使用该类法术能力的次数低于3次）。每当该生物使用类法术能力瞬发时，这个法术的施法时间降低为迅捷动作且不会引发借机攻击。在本轮内，这个生物仍然可以进行其他动作——包括施放类法术能力（以标准动作）。这个生物每轮只能施放一个瞬发类法术能力。该生物必须选择一个法术环级不超过“1/2生物最高CL-4”的类法术能力以搭配此专长。详见表：类法术能力强效与瞬发。

特殊说明: 生物可以多次选择本专长。每次选择此专长时，它的效果将应用在另一个类法术能力上。

通常状况: 使用类法术能力通常至少需要一个标准动作，且会引发其他生物的借机攻击。

资源出处: Pathfinder RPG Bestiary pg. 315

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Quicken%20Spell-Like%20Ability

Quiet Death.name: 无声击杀 Quiet Death
Quiet Death.description:
专长类型：Combat

你学会了如何以安静且优雅的方式完成刺杀，迅速了结敌人。

先决条件: 敏捷 19，潜行10级，盗贼等级10级。

专长效果: 当你伏击（ambush）1名或更多敌人，并且它们并未意识到你的存在时，你能够投掷1次具有-5减值的潜行检定。检定结果会代表听到你的攻击所产生声音的察觉DC（而非以正常DC的-10来判断是否听到战斗的声响），直至1名敌人的初次行动为止，DC才会恢复到-10。其他敌人仍旧可以看到攻击；无声击杀仅能用来防止战斗的声音警告其他敌人。

资源出处: Ultimate Intrigue pg. 89

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Quiet%20Death

Quillbreaker Defense.name: Quillbreaker Defense
Quillbreaker Defense.description:
You know how to put armor spikes to defensive use by thrusting them into the path of an oncoming attack just in time.

Prerequisites
Proficiency with armor spikes.

Benefits
If you are wearing armor spikes, as an immediate action when you take damage from a nonmagical attack, you can give your armor spikes the broken condition to reduce the amount of damage you take by 5. If your armor spikes are already broken, they are destroyed when you take the damage. If you are wearing masterwork armor spikes, you instead reduce the damage taken by 10.

Combat Trick
If you choose to spend 5 stamina points when using this feat, there is a 50% chance that your armor spikes do not gain the broken condition. This combat trick has no effect if your armor spikes already have the broken condition. (Magical Marketplace 6)

Quivering Palm Adept.name: 精通浸透劲 Quivering Palm Adept
Quivering Palm Adept.description:
专长类型：Combat

你的浸透劲异常的致命。

先决条件: 浸透劲职业能力。

专长效果: 对抗你浸透劲的豁免DC+2。

资源出处: Dragon Empires Primer pg. 25

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Quivering%20Palm%20Adept

Quivering Palm Versatility.name: 百变浸透劲 Quivering Palm Versatility
Quivering Palm Versatility.description:
专长类型：Combat

你可以改变你浸透劲的形式，让对手感到严重的疼痛，陷入昏迷或是摧毁他的记忆。

先决条件: 浸透劲职业能力，基本攻击加值+13。

专长效果: 当你成功的对一个目标使用浸透劲，你可以选择以下一种效果取代杀死目标。浸透劲的持续时间相当于每武僧等级一天。

昏迷：目标将会在等同于你武僧等级的日子中陷入昏迷并且无助。

记忆丧失：目标昏迷二十四小时，醒来之后将面临巨大的记忆空白，他将之前相当于你每武僧等级一天的记忆将会被彻底抹除，只有奇迹术或许愿术才能将这些记忆恢复。

疼痛：目标受到每武僧等级1d6点的非致命伤害。

你必须在浸透劲的掷股开始之前选择这些效果，除非对方以强韧检定对抗你的浸透劲成功，否则你就可以透过一个自由动作来让这些效果发动，此专长的其他方面都与浸透劲相同，也受到同样的限制。

资源出处: Dragon Empires Primer pg. 25

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Quivering%20Palm%20Versatility

Racial Heritage.name: 远古血脉 Racial Heritage
Racial Heritage.description:
除了人类之外，还有其他先祖的血脉在你体内流淌。

先决条件: 人类。

专长效果: 选择一种其他的类人种族。在判断任何与种族相关的效果时，你被同时时为该种族和人类。例如，如果你选择矮人，那么在选择背景特性，专长，法术与魔法物品对你的作用等等内容时，同时被认为是人类和矮人。

资源出处: Advanced Players Guide pg. 168

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Racial%20Heritage

Racial Heritage (Mythic).name: 远古血脉(神话) Racial Heritage (Mythic)
Racial Heritage (Mythic).description:
先决条件：远古血脉

当你的神话力量与自身血脉交织在一起时，它会变得更为明显。

神话专长效果：你获得1个种族特性（racial trait），这个特性来自你在选取非神话版远古血脉专长时选择的种族。该种族特性无法调整你的属性或体型。如果你还未掌握该种族的种族语言（如果有的话），那么你会获得该语言。对于获取复数种族语言的种族来说，你能够获取全部对应语言。

资源出处: Mythic Adventures pg. 71

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Racial%20Heritage

Racial Item Mastery.name: 种族物品掌握 Racial Item Mastery
Racial Item Mastery.description:
专长类型：Item Mastery

你能用特定的魔法物品来填充你与生俱来的力量。

先决条件: 使用魔法装置技能6级，基础强韧豁免加值+3。

专长效果: 你能专注于一个与你种族有联系的物品来使用你拥有的种族类法术能力而无须消耗类法术的每日使用次数。种族类法术能力指你从种族特性中获得类法术能力，从以种族为先决条件的专长或特性中获得的类法术能力，或者从仅限你的种族才能选择的职业变体或选项中获得的类法术能力。你必须使用一件制造时需求使用学派与你想使用的类法术能力相同且环数不低于该类法术能力的魔法物品。你每天可以使用该专长1次，基础强韧豁免加值达到+9和+12时可以获得一次每日使用次数。

资源出处: Magic Tactics Toolbox pg. 30

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Racial%20Item%20Mastery

Radiant Charge.name: 光辉冲锋 Radiant Charge
Radiant Charge.description:
信仰之力与你同在。

先决条件: 【圣疗】职业特性。

专长效果: 当你在冲锋中命中时，你可以花费你所有剩下的圣疗次数造成等于“每圣疗次数1d6+魅力修正”的额外伤害。这是一种源自神圣力量的伤害，伤害抗力、免疫能量伤害、能量抗力对此不起作用。

资源出处: Ultimate Magic pg. 154

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Radiant%20Charge

Rage Casting.name: 血暴魔法 Rage Casting
Rage Casting.description:
你的血液蕴含着极为丰富的能量，甚至可以催化你的法术的效力。

先决条件: 血脉狂怒者血狂咒术职业能力。

专长效果: 以一个迅捷动作，你可以在施放一个血脉狂怒者法术时，通过燃烧一些自己的血液来增强其效果。你需要承受施放的法术每环术1d6点伤害，并且你无法以任何方式减免此伤害，也不能通过临时生命值减免之。你每因此而承受一个d6骰的伤害，你的法术DC就会增加1点。

资源出处: Advanced Class Guide pg. 154

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Rage%20Casting

Raging Absorption.name: 血怒吸能 Raging Absorption
Raging Absorption.description:
有害法术的能量被你吞食殆尽，反而使你的血怒燃烧的更为旺盛。

先决条件: 可以施放2环血脉狂怒者法术，血怒职业能力。

专长效果: 当处于血怒状态下时，如果你在对抗一个目标为你或者范围包括你的伤害性奥术法术，并且你不受伤害时，你可以吸收奥法的能量以持久你的狂怒。被你成功豁免的法术每有2个环数，你就获得每日额外的一轮血怒。你每日通过此专长获得的血怒轮数不能超过你的每日血怒上限，也无法超过每日血怒上限。

资源出处: Advanced Class Guide pg. 154

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Raging%20Absorption

Raging Blood.name: 狂怒血统 Raging Blood
Raging Blood.description:
比普通的魔法能量更奇异的是，你体内流淌的血脉会激发你的狂暴。

先决条件: 悠远血脉专长或术士血统职业能力。

专长效果: 。你获得一个对应你所拥有血统的1级血脉狂怒者的血脉能力。除此之外，你可以进入一种类似于血脉狂怒者血怒，但较为衰弱的狂暴状态。你每天可以进入此次级血怒状态两次，每次最多4轮。在次级血怒状态下，你在力量和体质上获得+2士气加值，但在意志检定上没有加值。除此之外，其他状况均和血脉狂怒者血怒相同。

如果你拥有多个血统，你需要选择一个此专长生效的血统。

资源出处: Advanced Class Guide pg. 155

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Raging%20Blood

Raging Brutality.name: 狂暴猛击 Raging Brutality
Raging Brutality.description:
你将怒气灌注于一击之中，使武器造成更大的伤害。

先决条件: 力量13，【狂暴】职业特性，猛力攻击，基本攻击加值+12。

专长效果: 当处于狂暴并使用“猛力攻击”时，你可以用迅捷动作额外消耗3轮狂暴时间，将你的体质修正添加在本轮你造成的近战或投掷伤害中。如果你使用的是双手武器，加值为1.5倍体质修正。这些额外伤害不会被重击所加成。

资源出处: Ultimate Combat pg. 114

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Raging%20Brutality

Raging Brute.name: 武疯子 Raging Brute
Raging Brute.description:
你可以驾驭心中的狂怒，将它导引到战斗之中。

先决条件: 力量21，食人魔。

专长效果: 选择一个狂暴之力，每天一次以一个自由动作，你可以进入狂怒的状态，在1分钟内使用此狂暴之力。如果这个狂暴之力会在使用时结束野蛮人的狂暴状态，那么你在使用它以后也会立刻陷入疲乏状态。在其他情况下，你不会因为结束此狂怒状态而疲乏。

使用此狂暴之力时，你的有效野蛮人等级视为你对总HD-3，这个专长不会带来野蛮人狂暴能力的其他好处和惩罚。

特殊说明: 你可以多次选择本专长，每次你选择本专长时，你可以获得一个新的狂暴之力或每天可以多使用一次已选择的狂暴之力。每次你进入狂怒状态时，你可以同时激活所有从本专长获得的狂暴之力。

资源出处: Monster Codex pg. 153

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Raging%20Brute

Raging Concentration.name: 血魔专注 Raging Concentration
Raging Concentration.description:
即使处于失控的边缘，你仍然能维持自己法术的集中，忽视创伤与混乱的影响。

先决条件: 血狂咒术职业能力。

专长效果: 在处于血怒状态下，你在专注检定上获得相当于你的血怒提供的体质加值数的加值。

资源出处: Advanced Class Guide pg. 155

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Raging%20Concentration

Raging Deathblow.name: 狂暴杀戮 Raging Deathblow
Raging Deathblow.description:
你每一次的击杀都会赋予你活力，进一步增强你的狂怒。

先决条件: 【大狂暴】职业特性。

专长效果: 狂暴时，每当你将一个CR不低于你的角色等级的敌人的生命值减少到-1或更低，你获得1轮额外每日狂暴时间。如果这次攻击是重击，你会再多获得1轮额外每日狂暴时间。当你进行休息以恢复每日狂暴使用时间时，本专长给予的额外狂暴轮数将会丢失。

资源出处: Ultimate Combat pg. 114

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Raging%20Deathblow

Raging Hurler.name: 狂暴投掷 Raging Hurler
Raging Hurler.description:
对手很难闪避你愤怒地投出的物体。

先决条件: 【狂暴】职业特性，随手投掷。

专长效果: 狂暴时你能以标准动作投掷双手武器，并且投掷武器的射程增量加倍。若你同时拥有“即时备战”专长，你能以正常全力攻击的频率投掷双手武器。此外，你能在如此攻击时举起一件可当作临时武器的无主物体用于投掷。

资源出处: Ultimate Combat pg. 114

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Raging%20Hurler

Raging Regeneration.name: 狂暴再生 Raging Regeneration
Raging Regeneration.description:
专长类型：Combat

狂暴的野性催化你的再生能力，使其无法被阻止。

先决条件: 狂暴职业能力，再生，巨魔。

专长效果: 当你进入狂暴状态时，你的再生能力将不会被造成火焰和强酸伤害的攻击在当轮压制。但是，在你的下一回合结束前，你通过再生能力恢复的生命值会每轮降低2点。

特殊说明: 你的再生能力会因为受到火焰和强酸伤害而在下一回合中停止生效。

资源出处: Monster Codex pg. 224

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Raging%20Regeneration

Raging Throw.name: 狂暴撞飞 Raging Throw
Raging Throw.description:
你将部分狂怒用于把对手狠狠摔向其他敌人。

先决条件: 力量13，体质13，【狂暴】职业特性，精通冲撞，猛力攻击，基本攻击加值+6。

专长效果: 当你在狂暴中尝试使用冲撞战技时，你能以迅捷动作消耗1轮每日狂暴轮数，来将体质修正添加到冲撞战技检定上。此外，当你将对方冲撞至另一个生物所在方格、或坚硬物体时，对手和该生物或物体受到等同于你的“力量修正+体质修正”钝击伤害。

资源出处: Ultimate Combat pg. 114

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Raging%20Throw

Raging Vitality.name: 狂暴活性 Raging Vitality
Raging Vitality.description:
你在狂暴的时候更加有活力。

先决条件: 体质15，【狂暴】职业特性。

专长效果: 每当你狂暴的时候，你的体质获得士气加值提高2点。你的狂暴并不会在你失去意识时结束。不过当你失去意识时，仍然必须花费每日狂暴轮数。

资源出处: Advanced Players Guide pg. 168

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Raging%20Vitality

Rahadoumi Exorcist.name: Rahadoumi Exorcist
Rahadoumi Exorcist.description:
You can stagger incorporeal and possessed creatures through sheer force of will.

Prerequisites
Iron Will, can't have a patron deity.

Benefits
As a full-round action, you can recite the Laws of Man with such force and dedication that you stagger those creatures that prey upon the bodies, minds, and souls of mortals. When you use this ability, you must target one creature within 30 feet to which you have line of sight. A successful Will save (DC = 10 + 1/2 your Hit Dice + your Charisma modifier) negates the effects of this feat. An incorporeal undead creature that fails its save against this effect is staggered. If you target a possessed creature, the possessing entity must succeed at a Will save to resist being staggered for 1 round. If it is staggered, the creature it possesses can immediately attempt a new saving throw to end the possession effect (possession effects that don't allow saving throws to resist them cannot be ended by Rahadoumi Exorcist, but the feat can still stagger a possessed creature). You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Charisma modifier.

Raking Claws.name: Raking Claws
Raking Claws.description:
Your claws cause bleeding wounds.

Prerequisites
Base attack bonus +8, shifter, wild shape class feature.

Benefits
Whenever you deal piercing or slashing damage with your primary natural weapons, your opponent takes 1d6 points of bleed damage at the start of his turn each round, in addition to the damage dealt by the attack. Bleed damage can be stopped with a successful DC 15 Heal skill check or any magical healing.

Rallying Blow.name: Rallying Blow
Rallying Blow.description:
When you strike true in battle, you wash away allies' fear.

Prerequisites
Aura of courage.

Benefits
When you confirm a critical hit against an enemy, any fear effect affecting allies within 30 feet is reduced by one step. Panicked becomes frightened, frightened becomes shaken, and shaken is removed. In addition, any ally suffering other effects from a failed save against a fear effect, such as the paralysis from a mummy's despair aura, receives a new save against the effect at the original DC.

Ranged Disable.name: 远距解除装置 Ranged Disable
Ranged Disable.description:
你能用远程武器进行解除装置。

先决条件: 远程射击，近距射击，武器专攻，解除装置9级。

专长效果: 以整轮动作（full-round action），你能用1把具有相应武器专攻专长的远程武器来尝试1次解除装置检定。你仅能对1次简单的解除尝试（1次通常情况会花费1个整轮动作来解除的尝试）使用该能力，而且解除装置的目标如果具有任何掩蔽（cover）或隐蔽（concealment）的话，便无法使用此方法来解除。如此使用的远程武器不会对装置造成伤害，但是可以让你尝试1次解除装置检定作为替代。你会把该次远程攻击视同为你在使用不恰当工具进行此次尝试，让你的解除装置检定承受-4减值。你要将武器所承受的任何距离减值应用至解除装置检定上，但是你无法把通常来说可以为攻击检定提供的加值应用至此次解除装置检定上。

资源出处: Ultimate Intrigue pg. 89

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Ranged%20Disable

Ranged Disarm.name: 远程卸武 Ranged Disarm
Ranged Disarm.description:
专长类型：CombatTargeting

一次精准的射击卸除了敌人的武器。

先决条件: 敏捷13，致命瞄准，BAB+1。

专长效果: 以一个全回合动作，你可以使用远程武器对目标尝试一次受-2罚值的卸除武器战技。使用敏捷调整值代替力量调整值来计算该次战技修正，并加减一切会修正远程攻击的调整，由射程增量带来的减值会加倍。若目标在30尺外，还会额外承受-2罚值。若卸武战技检定成功，目标会承受1次伤害，如同你通过武器成功命中目标一样。你不会因为战技失败而掉落自己的武器。

资源出处: Ranged Tactics Toolbox pg. 8

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Ranged%20Disarm

Ranged Feint.name: 远距虚招 Ranged Feint
Ranged Feint.description:
专长类型：Combat

你能用远程攻击来误导敌人。

先决条件: BAB +2，唬骗3级。

专长效果: 你能够用1把远程武器执行虚招（feint），通过投掷1把投掷武器、或者发射1根箭矢、弩矢、子弹或者其他种类的1发弹药来执行虚招；此次虚招所使用的动作与正常的虚招相同（takes the same action as normal to feint），但是根据你的武器类型，也许在此之后你需要重新装填或拔出另一把武器。当你成功使用1次远程虚招后，能够让该名敌人在对抗你的远程攻击和你的近战攻击时失去AC上的敏捷加值，持续时间与正常情况相同。若你在正常情况下成功使用虚招之后，该敌人在对抗除你以外的生物发起的攻击时，AC也会失去敏捷加值的话，那么你的远程虚招产生的效果仅会对其他人的近战攻击生效。

通常状况: 你只能使用1把近战武器执行虚招，而且仅能对位于该武器威胁范围的生物执行虚招。

资源出处: Ultimate Intrigue pg. 89

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Ranged%20Feint

Ranged Study.name: 远程策略 Ranged Study
Ranged Study.description:
你研究了如何在使用各种武器时寻找最有效的战斗策略，而非仅仅局限于近身格斗的方法。

先决条件: 一种武器的武器专攻专长，战斗策略职业能力。

专长效果: 选择一种你拥有武器专攻的远程武器，只要你的目标距离你不超过30尺，你在使用这种武器展开战斗策略时就可以获得加值，并可以发动策士之击。

通常状况: 你只有在进行近战攻击时才能获得战斗策略和好处和发动策士之击。

资源出处: Advanced Class Guide pg. 155

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Ranged%20Study

Ranged Trip.name: 远程摔绊 Ranged Trip
Ranged Trip.description:
专长类型：CombatTargeting

通过精确射击目标的脚让其倒地。

先决条件: 敏捷13，致命瞄准，BAB+1。

专长效果: 以一个全回合动作，你可以使用远程武器对目标尝试一次受-2罚值的摔绊战技。使用敏捷调整值代替力量调整值来计算该次战技修正，并加减一切会修正远程攻击的调整，由射程增量带来的减值会加倍。若目标在30尺外，还会额外承受-2罚值。若摔绊战技检定成功，目标会承受1次伤害，如同你通过武器成功命中目标一样。你不会因为战技失败而自己倒地。

资源出处: Ranged Tactics Toolbox pg. 9

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Ranged%20Trip

Rapid Focus Shift.name: 快速心智转移 Rapid Focus Shift
Rapid Focus Shift.description:
你可以更快地转移灵器内的心智点。

先决条件: 施法者等级5级，心智点（Mental Focus）职业能力。

专长效果: 每日1次，你能够以整轮动作将一个灵器（Implement）内的心智点转移至另一个灵器。你必须在不受干扰且能够维持专注的情况下才能这么做。若你在转移时承受了任何伤害的话，则必须进行一次专注检定（DC = 10 + 受到的伤害数值），成功才能够完成此次转移。如果检定失败，你会失去此次转移的心智点，以取代原本的转移至另一个灵器内。

正常：在两个灵器之间进行心智转移（Shift Focus）需要花费1分钟安静的冥想。

特殊说明: 你可以多次选取该专长，每次选取都会让快速心智转移的每日使用次数增加一次。

资源出处: Occult Adventures pg. 138

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Rapid%20Focus%20Shift

Rapid Grappler.name: 快速擒抱 Rapid Grappler
Rapid Grappler.description:
专长类型：Combat

你是快速擒抱的专家。

先决条件: 敏捷13，高等擒抱，精通擒抱，精通徒手打击，基本攻击加值+9或武僧9级。

专长效果: 当你成功地使用“高等擒抱”以移动动作维持了一次擒抱之后，接下来你只用迅捷动作就可以以承受-5减值进行维持擒抱的战技检定。

资源出处: Ultimate Combat pg. 114

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Rapid%20Grappler

战策增益：你可以使用2点耐力来在使用这个专长时以迅捷动作做出的擒抱检定上获得+2加值。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 130

Rapid Recovery.name: Rapid Recovery
Rapid Recovery.description:
When you heal damage with your nanite surge, you also remove harmful effects.

Prerequisites
Rapid Repair, Con 13, nanite surge ability.

Benefits
When you heal damage using Rapid Repair, you remove any and all of the following conditions: blinded, confused, dazzled, deafened, shaken, sickened, and staggered. You cannot cure blindness or deafness caused by loss of sensory organs.

Rapid Reload (Mythic).name: 快速装填(神话) Rapid Reload (Mythic)
Rapid Reload (Mythic).description:
先决条件：快速装填

你能够使用惊人的速度装填任意一类武器。

神话专长效果：你获得关于所有弩和火器的快速装填专长的好处，而不仅仅是在你选取该专长时原本选择的那1类。以迅捷动作，你能够花费1次神话之力，以此使你在1分钟内装填弩和火器时不会引起借机攻击。

资源出处: Mythic Adventures pg. 72

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Rapid%20Reload

Rapid Repair.name: 快速修复 Rapid Repair
Rapid Repair.description:
目标构装生物获得5点快速愈合。这个效果不会与任何已有的快速愈合效果叠加。快速愈合对一个生命值已经为0或已被摧毁的构装生物无效。



资源出处: Ultimate Magic pg. 234

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/SpellDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Rapid%20Repair

Rapid Shot (Mythic).name: 快速射击(神话) Rapid Shot (Mythic)
Rapid Shot (Mythic).description:
先决条件：快速射击

你能够以惊人的准度连续进行数次射击。

神话专长效果：当你使用快速射击专长时，你能够选择忽略该专长对攻击检定带来的-2减值，或者选择进行2次额外攻击以取代原本的1次。

资源出处: Mythic Adventures pg. 72

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Rapid%20Shot

Rat Catcher.name: Rat Catcher
Rat Catcher.description:
You have a great deal of experience dealing with the subterranean pests common in cities.

Prerequisites
Knowledge (dungeoneering) 1 rank, base attack bonus +1.

Benefits
You gain a +1 dodge bonus against attacks made by creatures at least two size categories smaller than yourself, and gain a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls against such creatures. Additionally, you take only half damage from swarm attacks, and as a full-round action can make a single attack with a natural or bludgeoning weapon against an adjacent swarm. If the attack hits, you deal half damage to the target, even if the swarm is small enough to normally be immune to such attacks.

Rat Stack.name: Rat Stack
Rat Stack.description:
You coordinate efficiently in tight spaces.

Prerequisites
Dex 13, swarming racial trait.

Benefits
You can occupy the same square with up to two other creatures that also have this feat. If all participants also have the Tunnel Rat feat, up to four creatures can share the same space.

Ray Shield.name: 盾牌反射 Ray Shield
Ray Shield.description:
专长类型：Combat

你甚至可以使用盾牌偏转射线。

先决条件: 敏捷15，盾牌辟矢，破法者。

专长效果: 你必须使用轻型盾牌，重型盾牌或者塔盾才能使用该专长。每轮1次，当你将要被远程接触攻击命中时（包括射线以及类似的魔法效果），你可以使其偏斜，并且不会因其而受到伤害。如果该效果适用的话，你的盾牌会遭受完整的法术或效果的影响。

资源出处: Advanced Players Guide pg. 168

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Ray%20Shield

战策增益：你可以消耗2点耐力来在获得这个专长的效果时防止法术或效果影响你的盾牌。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 130

Razortusk.name: 利牙突变 Razortusk
Razortusk.description:
你那强有力的下颚和钢铁般的牙齿已经足够致命，可以用来进行啮咬攻击。

先决条件: 半兽人。

专长效果: 你可以进行啮咬攻击，造成1d4点伤害外加你的力量修正。你被视为擅长这种攻击，并且能够将适用于天生武器的效果与专长应用于你的啮咬攻击。如果你将其应用于全力攻击动作的一部分，啮咬攻击被视为次要攻击，并且使用你的完整BAB-5进行攻击，伤害只增加你的力量修正的一半。

资源出处: Advanced Players Guide pg. 168

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Razortusk

Reach Defense.name: Reach Defense
Reach Defense.description:
You are proficient at avoiding polearms and long-limbed creatures.

Prerequisites
Dex 15

Benefits
You gain a +2 dodge bonus to Armor Class against attacks of opportunity from opponents that are not adjacent to you.

Special
This feat counts as Dodge for the purposes of qualifying for the Mobility and Spring Attack feats.

Combat Trick
You can spend 5 stamina points to grant the benefit of this feat to any adjacent allies for 1 round. (Dragonslayer's Handbook 25)

Reach Spell.name: 及远法术 Reach Spell
Reach Spell.description:
专长类型：Metamagic

你的法术射程比正常情况更远。

专长效果: 你能够调整范围为接触，近距或者中距的法术，使其范围按照后述次序提升为更远的类别：接触，近距，中距和远距。每提高1级范围类别，及远法术就会占用比法术的实际环级高1环的法术位。比如，将原本范围为接触的法术提升至远距，会占用比法术的实际环级高3环的法术位。需要近战接触攻击的法术若被本专长所调整，那么会改为需要远程接触攻击。法术范围不属于接触、近距和中距的法术无法由此专长受益。

资源出处: Advanced Players Guide pg. 168

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Reach%20Spell

Reach Spell-Like Ability.name: Reach Spell-Like Ability
Reach Spell-Like Ability.description:
You can use a spell-like ability at a greater range.

Prerequisites
Spell-like ability at caster level 4th or higher.

Benefits
Choose one of your spell-like abilities, subject to the restrictions described in this feat. You can use the chosen spell-like ability as a reach spell-like ability three times per day (or less, if the ability is normally usable only once or twice per day).

When you use a reach spell-like ability, it can alter a spell-like ability with a range of touch, close, or medium to increase its range to a higher range category, using the following order: touch, close, medium, and long. You can select a spell-like ability that duplicates a spell only if its level is less than or equal to 1/2 its caster level (round down) - 1 per increase in range category. For example, a spell-like ability with a range of touch can be increased to long range only if it duplicates a spell with a level less than or equal to 1/2 your caster level (round down) - 3. For a summary, see Table 3-3. Reach spell-like abilities that normally require melee touch attacks instead require ranged touch attacks.

Spell-like abilities that do not have a range of touch, close, or medium do not benefit from this feat.

Reactive Arcane Shield.name: 反应式奥能之盾 Reactive Arcane Shield
Reactive Arcane Shield.description:
就算你没有察觉到危险，奥能之盾也能应对。

先决条件: 奥能之盾，奥术施法者，施法者等级12。

专长效果: 若你察觉到一次已宣布的针对你的攻击，而你选择使用奥能之盾专长，则激活该专长的直觉动作将在攻击骰骰出之前进行。另外，任何邻接你的盟友都可以获得该专长提供的偏斜AC加值持续1轮。

资源出处: Melee Tactics Toolbox pg. 15

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Reactive%20Arcane%20Shield

Reactive Healing.name: 救急医疗 Reactive Healing
Reactive Healing.description:
你将神能存储在体内，在最紧急的关头依靠它们撑过死劫。

先决条件: 快速引导UM专长或法术瞬发，引导能量或圣疗职业能力。

专长效果: 如果一次攻击或效果将会把你的生命值降低到0或以下，你可以使用一次每日引导能力次数（如果它可以治疗你）或圣疗次数，以一个直觉动作用它治疗你。这个治疗效果仅对你生效。

资源出处: Advanced Class Guide pg. 155

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Reactive%20Healing

Reactive Reversion.name: Reactive Reversion
Reactive Reversion.description:
You can reactively change back to your natural form.

Prerequisites
Dex 13, change shape ability, leshy subtype.

Benefits
You can shift from your alternate form to your natural form as an immediate action using change shape.

Normal
Leshys can shift between forms as a swift action using change shape.

Read Spell Traces.name: 解读魔力残留 Read Spell Traces
Read Spell Traces.description:
你能够通过法术残留的痕迹鉴别出法术的真面目。

专长效果: 若你使用鉴定术（identify）或者任何更高环级的法术进行侦测，且该法术在正常情况下可以用于侦测1个正在生效的法术（an active spell）的法术学派（school）和灵光强度（aura strength）的话，如果你的检定比DC高出10或更多，那么你还能准确地了解到是什么法术。若你在使用的法术已经可以通过读取灵光来告知你具体是何种法术的话，你便可以尝试从残存灵光（lingering aura）的痕迹中鉴别出法术，不过此类尝试会承受-10减值。当你尝试使用高等侦测魔法*（greater detect magic；见212页）鉴别独特的魔法署名（unique magical signatures）时，你会在知识(神秘)检定上获得+2加值。此外，在对抗魔法灵光（Magic Aura）和其他当你豁免失败便可以隐藏法术真正灵光的法术或效果时，你会在豁免检定上获得+2加值。

资源出处: Ultimate Intrigue pg. 90

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Read%20Spell%20Traces

Read the Room.name: Read the Room
Read the Room.description:
You can gain some insight into the mood of a crowd with just a look.

Prerequisites
Drunken Sing-Along, Diplomacy 1 rank, Performance (sing) 1 rank, Sense Motive 1 rank.

Benefits
Before you use the Drunken Sing-Along feat, you can attempt a DC 20 Sense Motive check as a free action to pick the exact right song for that crowd. If you are successful, you gain a +4 circumstance bonus on your next Diplomacy check to gather information in that tavern.

Ready for Anything.name: 时刻备战 Ready for Anything
Ready for Anything.description:
专长类型：Combat

你永远也不会放松警惕。

先决条件: 警觉，精通先攻，闪电反射，即时备战，BAB +6或直觉闪避（Uncanny Dodge）职业能力。

专长效果: 你总是能够在突袭轮（surprise round）中行动，即便你在发现敌人的察觉检定中失败也是如此，但是直至进行动作之前，你仍旧会被视为措手不及（flat-footed）。

资源出处: Ultimate Intrigue pg. 90

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Ready%20for%20Anything

Ready for Battle.name: 随时备战 Ready for Battle
Ready for Battle.description:
你植入的诡计能让受术者的身体能够更快地投入战斗。

先决条件: 催眠师诡计（Mesmerist Trick）职业能力。

专长效果: 当你植入一个催眠师诡计时，受术者会在先攻检定上获得+2士气加值，直至该项催眠师诡计被触发或者持续时间结束为止。

资源出处: Occult Adventures pg. 138

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Ready%20for%20Battle

Ready for Pain.name: 痛感钝化 Ready for Pain
Ready for Pain.description:
你植入的诡计会让受术者对伤害的感觉变得迟钝。

先决条件: 催眠师诡计（Mesmerist Trick）职业能力。

专长效果: 当你植入一个催眠师诡计时，能赋予受术者DR 1/－，但仅限于对抗非致命伤害（nonlethal damage），直至该项催眠师诡计被触发或者持续时间结束为止。你每具有5个催眠师等级，这个DR便会增加1点。

资源出处: Occult Adventures pg. 138

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Ready%20for%20Pain

Realistic Likeness.name: 乱真外表 Realistic Likeness
Realistic Likeness.description:
当你在人类形态时，你能够模仿特定个体的外貌。

先决条件: 狐妖。

专长效果: 你能够精确模拟任何你遇到的个体的体貌特征。当你使用你的变身种族特性时，你能够尝试变为某个个体的形态，这使你在以易容检定通过你的模仿愚弄他人时获得+10环境加值。

资源出处: Advanced Race Guide pg. 193

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Realistic%20Likeness

Reap the Infirm.name: Reap the Infirm
Reap the Infirm.description:
You can use a creature's diseased state against it.

Prerequisites
Base attack bonus +3.

Benefits
When you hit a diseased creature with a weapon attack, you deal an additional 1d6 points of damage. This is precision damage. Additionally, you gain a +2 bonus on combat maneuver checks against diseased creatures.

Rebounding Leap.name: 返身上马 Rebounding Leap
Rebounding Leap.description:
专长类型：Combat

你的骑术和长矛使用经验让你能够极快的上下坐骑。

先决条件: 【枪矛跃击】职业特性，特技5级，骑术11级。

专长效果: 如果你成功的进行了一次跳跃的特技检定，你在使用【枪矛跃击】能力后可以用一个迅捷动作回到坐骑上。

【能力速查】枪矛跃击（Leaping Lance, Ex）：15级时，龙骑兵（Dragoon, UC战士变体）在骑乘时他与他的坐骑在骑术检定上将不再承受盔甲检定减值，而且冲锋时龙骑兵可以选择从坐骑上跳到目标面前，如果他跳跃超过10尺，那么冲锋的防御罚值和命中加值将会加倍，且在计算伤害与相关专长时仍被视为骑乘状态。

资源出处: Ultimate Combat pg. 115

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Rebounding%20Leap

战策增益：当你在使用枪矛跃击（leaping lance）职业特性尝试特技检定来跳跃时，你可以消耗5点耐力来在该检定上获得等同于你消耗耐力的加值。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 130

Rebuffing Reduction.name: 爆肉刚体 Rebuffing Reduction
Rebuffing Reduction.description:
专长类型：Combat

你坚固的身躯可以将敌人的攻击力道悉数弹回。

先决条件: 力量13，伤害减免能力，精通冲撞，猛力攻击，基本攻击加值+1。

专长效果: 当一个敌人的一次近战攻击没能穿透你的伤害减免，你可以花费直觉动作对其进行一次冲撞战技检定。如果成功，你不会也不能随着该敌人一起移动。

通常状况: 冲撞战技检定是一个标准动作。

资源出处: Ultimate Combat pg. 115

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Rebuffing%20Reduction

战策增益：当你在使用这个专长成功通过冲撞战技检定时，你可以消耗2点耐力来和目标一起移动至多5尺。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 130

Recalcitrant.name: Recalcitrant
Recalcitrant.description:
You are determined to maintain your own will and bow to no one.

Prerequisites
Iron Will, hobgoblin.

Benefits
Add 2 to the DCs of checks to intimidate you. While you are subject to a charm person, dominate person, or other charm or compulsion effect, orders to perform normal or benign actions are treated as actions you wouldn't normally do. Orders to perform actions you wouldn't normally do are treated as obviously harmful or self-destructive.

Normal
While you are under certain charm or compulsion spell effects, commands to perform actions you wouldn't ordinarily do, including obviously harmful or self-destructive acts, allow a new saving throw or end the effect entirely, as described in the spell.

Recall Ammunition.name: Recall Ammunition
Recall Ammunition.description:
You use your innate magical abilities to instantly recall a missed shot.

Prerequisites
Amateur Gunslinger feat or grit class feature, base attack bonus +9, Spellcraft 5 ranks.

Benefits
After missing with a ranged weapon attack using a firearm, you can spend 2 grit points as an immediate action to recall the shot. If you do so, the ammunition from the missed shot is magically loaded back into the firearm and is ready to fire again immediately.

Reckless Aim.name: Reckless Aim
Reckless Aim.description:
Your lack of regard for others proves a boon when you fire projectiles into melee.

Prerequisites
Point-Blank Shot, Precise Shot.

Benefits
When you shoot or throw ranged weapons at an opponent engaged in melee, you can choose to take a -1 penalty to your AC and gain a +2 competence bonus on your attack roll. However, when you roll a natural 1 on a ranged attack roll made with this bonus, you automatically hit a random adjacent creature that threatens your intended target.

Reckless Moves.name: 粗暴移动 Reckless Moves
Reckless Moves.description:
专长类型：BetrayalTeamwork

你和你的队友彼此推搡以一种摇摇晃晃的方式保持平衡。

先决条件: 特技3级。

专长效果: 如果你邻接一个同样拥有此专长的盟友，你可以用自由动作激活此专长推拉你的队友把他当成配重物来提高你的平衡感。你在特技、攀爬和隐匿上获得+4加值直到你用自由动作关闭此专长或离开了盟友。

而牺牲者则失去平衡因此在专长生效期间特技、攀爬和隐匿上承受-2罚值。当你坠落或被击倒时可以用直觉动作激活这个专长以交换你和盟友的位置。如果你这么做了你和盟友在移动结束后都会处于倒地状态除非你通过了一个DC20的特技检定（此专长带来的加值和罚值正常生效）。如果你原本是坠落，牺牲者会代替你坠落。如果你和盟友原本正在攀爬，其他攀爬者也必须通过攀爬表面的正常DC以免坠落。交换位置只提供给牺牲者的借机攻击机会。

资源出处: Champions of Corruption pg. 21

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Reckless%20Moves

Reckless Rage.name: 鲁莽狂暴 Reckless Rage
Reckless Rage.description:
在狂暴之中你的蛮力突破天际，但对于打击精度的控制力也随之降低。

先决条件: 猛力攻击，狂暴或歌者战怒之歌职业能力。

专长效果: 当你启动战怒之歌或狂暴，并进行猛力攻击时，你在攻击检定和战技攻击检定上再多承受-1减值，在伤害上再增加2点加值，你在持用不同武器时的伤害调整仍然适用，如同正常的猛力攻击。

资源出处: Advanced Class Guide pg. 155

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Reckless%20Rage

Recovered Rage.name: 狂暴复苏 Recovered Rage
Recovered Rage.description:
每有一个敌人倒在你的战斧下，你的怒火就会再次烧旺。

先决条件: 狂暴或战怒之歌职业能力。

专长效果: 当你启动战怒之歌或狂暴，并使一个HD不少于你的人物等级的一半的敌人的生命值降低到0或以下时，你获得额外一轮每日的狂暴或战怒之歌使用时间（如果你同时拥有这两个能力，那么选择其一恢复）。你每日通过此专长获得的狂暴或战怒之歌轮数不能超过你的每日血怒上限数，也无法使得最大轮数突破每日上限。

资源出处: Advanced Class Guide pg. 155

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Recovered%20Rage

Recruits.name: 新手 Recruits
Recruits.description:
你得以接触到一小群专用的仆从，不论他们是你组织的学生、家臣、新成员，亦或是你信仰的新皈依者。

先决条件: 魅力13，角色等级5。

专长效果: 你获得一群代表着你负责指导和监督的NPC部属（cohorts）（这如同领导力专长）。你可拥有这样的部署的数量等同于「1/2你角色等级」。不像正常的部署，这些新手（recruits）必须比你的等级低4级或4级以上。由于这些新手必须花费其大量的时间学习及积累经验，同一时间只能有一名新手可以与你旅行（不过他们都是以相同的速率获得经验的，这是由于那些不在场的人被认为是在进行独自的学习和成长）。不论何时，当你处于一个主要城镇或城市时，你都可以将目前陪同你的新手换成另一名新手。

由于新手们忙于学习和研究其职业生涯的基础知识，那些没有与你一道旅行的成员不能参与制造寻常物品及魔法物品、亦或是专业检定。然而，如果你使用休整期规则（downtime rules）的话，那些没有与你一同旅行的新手们可以担任你私产的管理人（managers）。如果一名新手死亡的话，你仅会承受-1的领导力减值。

特殊说明: 在被视为满足先决条件的目的上时，新手专长被视为领导力专长。一名角色不能同时拥有领导力专长和新手专长。一名拥有新手专长的角色，如果后来有能力获得领导力专长的话，在获得了可拥有领导力专长的资格时，可以选择立即将该专长替换为领导力（选择其中一名次级部署成为一名完整的部署，而其余部署则会离开）。

资源出处: Ultimate Intrigue pg. 134Cohorts and Companions pg. 30

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Recruits

Red Mantis Collaborator.name: Red Mantis Collaborator
Red Mantis Collaborator.description:
You pass along private details to the Red Mantis, and they protect you in return.

Prerequisites
Associate (Red Mantis).

Benefits
The Red Mantis can help you hide from trouble in one of their secret safe houses. Anyone attempting Diplomacy or Survival checks to locate you during this time takes a -10 penalty, and anyone attempting to scry upon you or magically divine your location must first succeed at a caster level check (DC = 15 + your character level). You can stay in a Mantis safe house for up to 1 day per character level before you are forced to vacate.

Redeemed Kobold.name: Redeemed Kobold
Redeemed Kobold.description:
The purity you have found in the teachings of good dragonkind colors your scales and grants you confidence.

Prerequisites
Good alignment, kobold.

Benefits
Your scales take on a metallic sheen appropriate for that of a good-aligned metallic dragon who shares any existing energy affinity you possess, or whom you have chosen to emulate. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus on Diplomacy checks when interacting with good creatures. In addition, your Charisma is considered 2 points higher for the purposes of channeling positive energy.

Redemption.name: 救赎之旅 Redemption
Redemption.description:
专长类型：Story

过去的悔恨侵扰着你，同时也驱动你前行。

先决条件: 你必须因违背行为准则（code of conduct）而失去职业特性；或拥有“落魄门第（Dishonored Family）”角色背景。

专长效果: 你能够通过直觉动作使刚才进行的属性、攻击、豁免或技能检定+1，并因此战栗1分钟。你必须在结果确认前做出决定。

专长目标: 重获失去的职业特性，并完成一项证明自己价值的冒险任务。为完成此任务，你必须完胜一个强大敌手。该任务应该与导致你失去职业特性或令你蒙羞的事件相关联。

完成收益: 你获得每日1次重骰失败的豁免检定的能力。你必须接受重骰结果，即便更糟。

资源出处: Ultimate Campaign pg. 71

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Redemption

Redirect Attack.name: 乾坤挪移 Redirect Attack
Redirect Attack.description:
专长类型：Combat

当你闪避掉一次攻击时，你可以将该次攻击偏斜对付另一个目标。

先决条件: 敏捷15，智力15，闪避。

专长效果: 每轮1次，当只有你威胁的一个目标对你的攻击失败时，你可以反转该次攻击对付另一个敌人。新的目标必须邻接你并且处于攻击者的触及内。你进行一次战技检定；若检定结果同时大于攻击者的CMD和新目标的AC，则被反转的攻击命中，正常造成伤害。

资源出处: Melee Tactics Toolbox pg. 7

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Redirect%20Attack

战策增益：你可以消耗至多5点耐力来让自己在该战技检定上获得等同于你消耗耐力的加值。

战策资源出处: Armor Master's Handbook pg. 21

Redirected Shot.name: 撞球射艺 Redirected Shot
Redirected Shot.description:
专长类型：CombatGrit

你能以让人咋舌的精准度改变盟友那糟糕的射击弹道。

先决条件: 业余铳士或勇毅（Grit）职业能力，致命瞄准，近距射击，精准射击。

专长效果: 只要你至少还保留1点勇毅，那么你就能在一个盟友做出远程攻击检定，但是在检定结果揭示出来之前，使用已经装填好的火器对正在向着目标运动的弹药开火以变更它的路径。使用你最高的攻击加值进行一次攻击检定，并且使用你的结果来替代盟友原本的攻击检定。若成功命中，那么盟友的攻击会如常造成伤害。你在每轮中可以执行此动作的次数至多等同于你的感知加值（最低为1）。

资源出处: Inner Sea Combat pg. 17

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Redirected%20Shot

战策增益：通过消耗4点耐力，你可以在每轮中额外使用一次该专长。

战策资源出处: Weapon Master's Handbook pg. 25

Redistributed Might.name: 触力旁通 Redistributed Might
Redistributed Might.description:
专长类型：Combat

你对自己身躯的控制炉火纯青，以至于可以将力量迸发为灵活度。

先决条件: 体质或感知13，专长Enhanced Morale，异种武器擅长（奥多里决斗剑），钢铁意志，BAB+4。

专长效果: 当一个效果能给你的力量属性带来增强加值或士气加值时（如牛之力量或歌者的激发狂暴），你可以将该加值应用到敏捷上。你必须在得到这个加值的一开始做出决定，一旦决定不能更改。

（译注：Enhanced Morale专长从未存在过，故请DM判断此专长是否可用，如果可用的话请删除这个先决条件。）

资源出处: Adventurers Guide pg. 26

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Redistributed%20Might

Reflexive Caster.name: 反射护法 Reflexive Caster
Reflexive Caster.description:
你随时都捏着一个可以马上挡下打击的法术。

先决条件: 战斗反射，施法者等级5。

专长效果: 当你因为察觉检定失败而无法在突袭轮行动时，你仍然可以正常进行先攻检定并且可以在轮到你的先攻位时行动——但是，你只能执行一个标准动作，并且只能用这个动作施放一个防护系法术。

资源出处: Dirty Tactics Toolbox pg. 13

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Reflexive%20Caster

Reflexive Crystalline Dust.name: Reflexive Crystalline Dust
Reflexive Crystalline Dust.description:
Vigilance has taught you to manifest your crystalline dust the instant you sense danger.

Prerequisites
Swift Crystalline Dust, aphorite, crystalline dust racial trait.

Benefits
You can activate your crystalline dust ability as an immediate action when you are targeted by an attack.

Reflexive Interception.name: 闪电拦截 Reflexive Interception
Reflexive Interception.description:
专长类型：Combat

动物伙伴可以用电光火石般的速度护卫自己的主人。

先决条件: 拦截攻击，BAB+3，动物伙伴，反射闪避。

专长效果: 当动物伙伴邻接其主人且其主人正在进行反射豁免时，即使并非动物伙伴的回合，它仍可以用自由动作花费一次借机攻击的次数，进行一次反射检定来试图干预。使用此能力时，动物伙伴会失去反射闪避的效果（若它有精通反射闪避的话，也一并失去），但若动物伙伴在其豁免检定上成功，则主人获得动物伙伴的反射闪避（或精通反射闪避，若动物伙伴有此能力的话）的效果。

资源出处: Ultimate Wilderness pg. 219

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Reflexive%20Interception

Reflexive Trick.name: Reflexive Trick
Reflexive Trick.description:
You are able to implant tricks in yourself in the blink of an eye.

Prerequisites
Mesmerist tricks class feature.

Benefits
Whenever the triggering condition for one mesmerist trick that you have not implanted in yourself occurs, you can implant that trick in yourself as an immediate action. You can then immediately trigger the mesmerist trick as if it were implanted in you when the triggering condition occurred. You can't use this ability if you have already implanted the maximum number of mesmerist tricks in yourself.

Regenerate Muscles.name: 肌腱再生 Regenerate Muscles
Regenerate Muscles.description:
你可以引导自己的再生能力，让他们重组和增强你的肌肉而不是恢复你肉体承受的损伤。

先决条件: 猛力攻击，再生，巨魔。

专长效果: 以一个自由动作，你可以自愿压制你的再生能力1分钟时间，换取在力量属性上获得+2增强加值持续1分钟。在这1分钟期间你的再生能力会完全停止，但你可以以一个自由动作结束本专长的效果。你只有在当这价的再生能力在生效时才能启动本专长。

资源出处: Monster Codex pg. 224

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Regenerate%20Muscles

Reject Poison.name: 百毒不侵 Reject Poison
Reject Poison.description:
先决条件：体质13，用毒职业特性，信仰诺格巴

先决条件: 体质13，用毒职业特性，信仰诺格巴。

专长效果: 每当你在对抗毒素的第一次豁免检定失败时，你将有20%直接抵抗掉毒素的效果，这剂毒药将被直接浪费掉。

资源出处: Inner Sea Gods pg. 215Faiths of Corruption pg. 24

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Reject%20Poison

Relentless Cheer.name: Relentless Cheer
Relentless Cheer.description:
Your undying optimism keeps you and your companions going even when things get rough.

Prerequisites
Halfling, fearless and halfling luck racial traits.

Benefits
Adjacent allies who also have this feat gain a +1 morale bonus on all saving throws. This bonus increases to +3 on saving throws against fear.

Relentless Shot.name: 稳固射击 Relentless Shot
Relentless Shot.description:
专长类型：Combat

对于被击倒的敌人你保持着瞄准。

先决条件: 近程射击，BAB+6。

专长效果: 当你对30尺内的一个目标通过远程攻击成功摔绊时，直到你下一轮开始前你会一直威胁目标。你可以对被此法威胁的目标用远程武器发动借机攻击。若你攻击另外的目标或目标移出被最初威胁的格子，该效果结束。

正常：当你持用远程武器时，你没有威胁范围也不能用远程武器进行借机攻击。

资源出处: Ranged Tactics Toolbox pg. 7

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Relentless%20Shot

Relic Breaker.name: Relic Breaker
Relic Breaker.description:
You are furious when destroying dangerous objects.

Prerequisites
Str 13, Gate Breaker, Improved Sunder, Power Attack, base attack bonus +1.

Benefits
Whenever you sunder a held object, its bearer must succeed at a Reflex saving throw or the bearer catches on fire (taking 1d6 points of fire damage immediately, and an additional 1d6 points of fire damage each subsequent round the creature fails a Reflex saving throw). When your total Hit Dice reach 5, this damage increases by 1d6, and it increases by 1d6 every 5 levels thereafter, to a maximum of 5d6 at 20th level. The saving throw's DC is equal to 10 + 1/2 your HD + your Charisma modifier.

Relic Familiarity.name: Relic Familiarity
Relic Familiarity.description:
Your clan had an impressive collection of ancient artifacts, and you often see things on your journey that remind you of items in the clan hoard.

Prerequisites
Wyvaran.

Benefits
You gain a +2 bonus on Appraise checks to determine an item's value and on Spellcraft checks to determine an item's magic properties. For every 5 points by which you exceed the DC, you can determine additional details about the item at the GM's discretion, such as its country of origin, the crafter's race, techniques employed in its creation, or whether it has any historical significance.

Remote Bomb.name: 遥控炸弹 Remote Bomb
Remote Bomb.description:
你可以在远处引爆你的定时炸弹。

先决条件: 【定时炸弹】科研发现。

专长效果: 你的定时炸弹最大延时时间增加等同于你等级的分钟数。如果你和你的定时炸弹间存在效果线，你可以通过一次DC20的智力检定来提前引爆它；你和炸弹间的距离每增加10尺，DC增加1。

资源出处: Ultimate Magic pg. 155

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Remote%20Bomb

Rending Claws.name: 撕扯之爪 Rending Claws
Rending Claws.description:
专长类型：Combat

你的利爪攻击能够对敌人造成更高的伤害。

先决条件: 力量13，拥有2爪抓天生武器，基本攻击加值+6。

专长效果: 如果你在同一轮内成功使用2爪抓命中一名生物，第二次爪抓攻击会额外造成1d6点伤害。这个伤害是精准伤害，不会受到重击的影响。每轮你只能使用该专长1次。

资源出处: Advanced Players Guide pg. 168

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Rending%20Claws

战策增益：当你做出两次爪抓攻击但是只有一次命中时，你仍可以消耗5点耐力来造成这个专长赋予的精准伤害。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 130

Rending Fury.name: 疯狂撕扯 Rending Fury
Rending Fury.description:
专长类型：Combat

你轻易地用天生武器撕裂对方的肢体。

先决条件: 基本攻击加值+6，＜撕扯＞特殊攻击。

专长效果: 你能在一半天生武器击中对手时造成撕扯伤害。举例而言，一只有此专长的巨魔可以在1次爪抓击中时发动撕扯，而一只有此专长的四臂猩猩则要2次成功爪抓击中后才能发动撕扯。你每轮只能造成一次撕扯伤害。

资源出处: Ultimate Combat pg. 116

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Rending%20Fury

战策增益：当你做出撕扯攻击时，你可以消耗5点耐力来造成等同于你消耗耐力两倍的额外伤害。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 130

Rending Swarm.name: Rending Swarm
Rending Swarm.description:
Together, you and your allies tear through enemies' defenses.

Prerequisites
Dex 15, Rat Stack, swarming racial trait.

Benefits
You gain a +1 bonus on all melee damage rolls for each allied creature you share a square with that also has this feat.

If two or more allies sharing a square have this feat and hit the same adjacent creature in a round, they tear it in different directions, dealing additional damage at the end of the round. This rend attack deals an amount of damage equal to 1d6 + the highest Strength modifier of all qualifying allies in the same square who struck the target this round.

Renown.name: Renown
Renown.description:
Word of your pre-Pathfinder accomplishments precedes you, and you know how to make the most of your previous reputation.

Benefits
When in a settlement of 5,000 people or more, treat your Fame score as 2 higher for the purposes of qualifying for Prestige Awards or purchasing equipment. This feat doesn't grant you any additional Prestige Points.

Normal
Your Fame score is determined by the total number of Prestige Points earned over the course of your career.

Repast of Heroes.name: Repast of Heroes
Repast of Heroes.description:
Your natural spells are significantly increased, enabling you to feed and heal others.

Prerequisites
Con 15, character level 8th, ghoran, natural magic racial trait.

Benefits
Once per week, you can cast heroes' feast as a spell-like ability with a caster level equal to your character level. If you do so, you lose access to the spells normally granted by the natural magic racial trait for the next 48 hours.

Repositioning Strike.name: 移位重击 Repositioning Strike
Repositioning Strike.description:
专长类型：Combat

你的重击能够让你任意挪动敌人。

先决条件: 智力13，寓守于攻，精通移位，基本攻击加值+9。

专长效果: 当你的近战攻击成功重击时，除了攻击正常造成的伤害之外还能够移动敌人。如果你的重击确认检定超过了敌人的CMD，那么你能够将移动敌人，就如同进行了移位战技检定一般。这不会引起借机攻击。

特殊说明: 你只能将后述专长中的一个应用在一次确认的重击上：冲撞重击，移位重击，破武重击，卸武重击或者绊摔重击。你可以在重击确认检定之后选择使用该专长。

通常状况: 你必须进行移位战技检定才能改变敌人位置。

资源出处: Advanced Players Guide pg. 168

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Repositioning%20Strike

战策增益：当你在近战攻击中确认重击失败时，你仍可以消耗2点耐力来对目标尝试移位元。如果你这样做了，重投确认骰，并使用这次的结果来决定移位APG尝试是不是能超过对手的CMD。这次重投只能用于移位战技，它不能让重击确认。你仍不能对免疫重击的目标做出该尝试。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 130

Resilient Armor.name: 铁甲护体 Resilient Armor
Resilient Armor.description:
神力强化的装甲与盾牌在混战中为你吸收伤害。

先决条件: 圣武士神契（护甲或盾牌）或战斗祭司神圣护甲职业能力。

专长效果: 当你激活神契或神圣护甲能力时，你获得相当于你的护甲或盾牌增强加值（包括神契与神圣护甲能力赋予的增强加值）的伤害减免，但只对你每轮受到的第一次攻击生效。这个伤害减免可以被精金武器击破，但是击破你的伤害减免并不影响你使用神契或神圣护甲的时间。

资源出处: Advanced Class Guide pg. 155

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Resilient%20Armor

Resilient Brute.name: 兽性强韧 Resilient Brute
Resilient Brute.description:
你能承受他人认为致命的攻击。

先决条件: 半兽人或兽人。

专长效果: 每天1次，当一名生物对你确认重击时，你能够将其中的一半伤害转化为非致命伤害。如果你免疫非致命伤害，那么你无法使用该能力。当你的BAB提升至+10时，你每天能够额外使用该能力1次。

资源出处: Advanced Race Guide pg. 57

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Resilient%20Brute

Resilient Eidolon.name: 坚韧幻灵 Resilient Eidolon
Resilient Eidolon.description:
你和幻灵直接的联系是如此的紧密以至于在你失去意识或者被杀以后你的幻灵依旧会在你身边停留一小段时间。

先决条件: 【幻灵】职业特性。

专长效果: 如果你失去意识、睡着了、或者被杀，你的幻灵会在被放逐前停留等同于你召唤师等级的轮数。如果你在这段时间里恢复意识，则幻灵不会被放逐。如果在持续时间结束之前你无法恢复意识，则幻灵如常被放逐。

通常状况: 一个幻灵会在召唤师失去意识、睡着或者被杀时离开放逐。

资源出处: Ultimate Magic pg. 155

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Resilient%20Eidolon

Resistance Mastery.name: 抗力掌握 Resistance Mastery
Resistance Mastery.description:
专长类型：Item Mastery

你可以用防护系魔法物品来让自己免受伤害。

先决条件: 使用魔法装置技能3级，基础强韧豁免加值+3。

专长效果: 每天一次，你可以花费10分钟将你的思维集中在一套魔法护甲或一件制造条件中列有2环或更高环数防护系系法术的占用你一个装备栏位的奇物中来获得防御上的好处。该好处可以是在全豁免上获得+1抗力加值，或是在某一种能量类型中获得5点能量抗力（酸，寒冷，电，火焰或者音波）。这个效果持续24小时。你必须穿戴这件物品才能获得这个好处；如果这个物品在该专长效果结束前被移除，则这个效果会马上消失，而且从专长最后以此激活起24小时内无法重新获得。基础强韧豁免加值达到+6，+9和+12时，你从该专长获得的抗力加值+1，或能量抗力+5。同一时间你只能从该专长获得一种好处。

资源出处: Magic Tactics Toolbox pg. 30

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Resistance%20Mastery

Resisting Grappler.name: Resisting Grappler
Resisting Grappler.description:
You are especially adept at fighting off the grabbing appendages of aberrations and other tentacled horrors.

Prerequisites
Dex 13.

Benefits
When a creature hits you with a melee attack and attempts to use the grab ability, it provokes an attack of opportunity from you unless it has the Improved Grapple feat. If you hit the opponent with your attack, treat the damage you deal as 5 higher when calculating the penalty on the attacker's combat maneuver check to grapple you.

Normal
Creatures using the grab ability does not provoke attacks of opportunity.

Resolute Rager.name: 刚毅狂暴 Resolute Rager
Resolute Rager.description:
恐惧在你狂暴时快速消退。

先决条件: 兽人，【狂暴】职业能力。

专长效果: 当狂暴时，若处于一项允许豁免的恐惧效果下，你可以在你的每个回合开始前进行一个新的豁免检定来对抗恐惧。若你成功豁免，恐惧效果结束。

资源出处: Advanced Race Guide pg. 142

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Resolute%20Rager

Respectful Prey.name: Respectful Prey
Respectful Prey.description:
You have learned to assuage monstrous predators with special offerings.

Benefits
A number of times per day equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier, you can prepare a special offering. This takes 5 minutes and at least 5 gp worth of foodstuffs, spices, and other ingredients; a prepared offering lasts 8 hours before spoiling. You can present this offering to a nonhumanoid creature (even one which doesn't normally consume food) as a standard action. The offering's ingredients must be worth at least 5 gp x the creature's CR. This offering improves its attitude toward you by one step unless it succeeds at a Will save (DC = 10 + 1/2 your level + your Wisdom modifier). This attitude adjustment lasts only 5 minutes unless the creature's attitude is adjusted further during that time, such as via the Diplomacy skill. A specific creature cannot be affected by an offering made in this way more than once per 24 hours.

Restoration Mastery.name: 复原掌握 Restoration Mastery
Restoration Mastery.description:
专长类型：Item Mastery

你不仅仅能治疗肉体上的伤势。

先决条件: 医疗技能5级，使用魔法装置技能5级，基础强韧豁免加值+3。

专长效果: 你可以引导一件制造条件有用咒法（医疗）系法术、且该法术至少为二环的魔法物品中的能量，施放一次法术次级复原术lesser restoration。如果你在医疗和使用魔法装置技能上都拥有至少9级，你可以改为引导一件制造条件里有咒法（医疗）系法术、且该法术至少为三环的魔法物品中的能量，施放移除耳聋目盲remove blindness/deafness或移除麻痹remove paralysis。你每天可以使用该专长1次，基础强韧豁免加值达到+9和+12时可以获得一次每日使用次数。

资源出处: Magic Tactics Toolbox pg. 31

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Restoration%20Mastery

Restorative Vigor.name: Restorative Vigor
Restorative Vigor.description:
You can recover from additional kinds of damage using your vigor.

Prerequisites
Con 15, Combat Vigor, character level 8th.

Benefits
Your vigor pool gains 1 vigor point. Whenever you spend vigor points, you can recover from 1d3 points of ability score damage from one physical ability score (Strength, Dexterity, or Constitution) instead of regaining 1d6 hit points. You can choose separately for each vigor point spent. For example, if you spend 2 vigor points, you could regain 2d6 hit points; recover 2d3 points of ability damage from up to two physical ability scores total; or regain 1d6 hit points and recover from 1d3 points of ability damage from one physical ability score.

Retributive Kick.name: 变剑为掌 Retributive Kick
Retributive Kick.description:
专长类型：Weapon Mastery

你的武器攻击只是你接下来拳打脚踢的前奏。

先决条件: 精通徒手击打，BAB+5，对所选近战武器拥有战士武器训练（Weapon Training）职业能力。

专长效果: 在以所选的近战武器进行整轮攻击时，若你的第一次攻击失手，被格挡，招架或是因为任何情况未能成功命中目标，你可以立刻以相同的攻击加值对目标发动一次徒手击打攻击。但是，这样做的话你无法在接下来未完成的这次整轮攻击中继续进行攻击。

资源出处: Weapon Masters Handbook pg. 22

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Retributive%20Kick

Retributive Summoning.name: Retributive Summoning
Retributive Summoning.description:
Your training in counterspelling summons is so extensive that you can redirect some of your foes' power to call forth your own allies.

Prerequisites
Spell Focus (conjuration) or counter-summons class feature.

 

Benefit
When you successfully counter a summoning spell with dispel magic or your own summon monster spell, you can immediately summon nonevil creatures as if you had just finished casting a summon monster spell of 2 levels lower than the countered summoning spell.

Returning Throw.name: Returning Throw
Returning Throw.description:
You have turned your deadly childhood games into a tactical advantage.

Prerequisites
Point-Blank Shot, Precise Shot, Sleight of Hand 3 ranks, goblinoid subtype.

Benefits
Whenever an ally who also has this feat makes an attack with a thrown weapon and misses the target by 4 or less, you can catch the weapon as an immediate action. Both you and your ally must be within 30 feet of the target, and you must be able to trace a line from any part of your space to any part of your ally's space so that the line passes through the target's space. As part of the action to catch the weapon, you can throw it at the target of the original attack. If your target has never seen you perform this maneuver before, it is denied its Dexterity bonus to AC against your attack. You must have at least one hand free to use this feat. You must be aware of the attack and not flat-footed.

Revelation Strike.name: 启示打击 Revelation Strike
Revelation Strike.description:
专长类型：Combat

你的徒手打击将一项启示降诸对手。

先决条件: 【启示】职业特性，精通徒手打击。

专长效果: 获得此专长时，选择一项你拥有的、影响目标不超过一人的先知启示。当你成功用徒手打击命中对手时，你能以迅捷动作在正常伤害外附加所选定的启示效果于他。这不会引发借机攻击。

通常状况: 你可以多次选择本专长，每次选择时指定一项不同的启示。

资源出处: Ultimate Combat pg. 116

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Revelation%20Strike

战策增益：在你使用徒手击打命中时，你可以消耗2点耐力来以一个自由动作而不是迅捷动作将你选择的启示APG效果应用到对手身上。如果选择的启示没有每日使用次数限制，这个战策将会消耗5点耐力。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 130

Revered Guidance.name: Revered Guidance
Revered Guidance.description:
You were selected by your celestial ancestor to be a guide for a chosen people, and serve as a beacon of hope in times of despair.

Prerequisites
Aasimar, must be taken at 1st level.

Benefits
Select one of the following creature subtypes: dwarf, elf, gnome, halfling, human, or orc. You gain a +4 racial bonus on Diplomacy checks made to influence creatures of the selected subtype.

Reverse Somersault Throw.name: Reverse Somersault Throw
Reverse Somersault Throw.description:
You drag your opponent off balance, then use his momentum to fling him over your head.

Prerequisites
Str 13, Improved Drag, Power Attack, base attack bonus +6 or monk level 3rd.

Benefits
When you succeed at a drag combat maneuver check, at the end of your movement, you can fall prone to launch your target over your head. If you do, you move the target of your drag combat maneuver into the space adjacent to you that is opposite its position at the end of your movement, and the target falls prone in that square or squares. You can't use this ability to move a creature into a square that is occupied by a solid object or obstacle. If there would not be enough room for the creature in its new position, the ability fails and the creature is not moved.

Reverse-Feint.name: 倒打一耙 Reverse-Feint
Reverse-Feint.description:
专长类型：Combat

你可以诱使一名敌人攻击你，从而进行一次更为强力的反击。

先决条件: 健壮，基本攻击加值+1，兽人。

专长效果: 以一个移动动作，你可以使自己的防御对一名邻接的敌人露出破绽。若该敌人在它的下一轮中攻击你，他在攻击检定上获得+4加值。不论该敌人是否成功命中，你都能以一个直觉动作对其进行一个单次近战攻击，在你的攻击检定上获得+2加值。

资源出处: Advanced Race Guide pg. 142

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Reverse-Feint

战策增益：你可以消耗2点耐力来以一个自由动作而不是直觉动作做出这个专长赋予的攻击。每次使用这个专长时你仍只能做出该攻击一次。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 130

Reviving Channel.name: Reviving Channel
Reviving Channel.description:
You can target an unconscious ally to gain additional benefit from your channeled energy.

Prerequisites
Channel energy 3d6.

Benefits
When you use channel energy, you can focus on one creature within range that would be healed by your channel energy whose hit points are below 0. When you do so, no other creatures are healed, but the target creature is restored to 0 hit points before the normal healing takes effect.

Reward of Grace.name: 恩泽之赐 Reward of Grace
Reward of Grace.description:
当你使用圣疗时，神圣的力量环绕于你，以此赞许你的善行。

先决条件: 【圣疗】职业特性。

专长效果: 每次你使用【圣疗】能力时，你在所有攻击骰上获得+1圣神加值，持续1轮。

资源出处: Ultimate Magic pg. 155

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Reward%20of%20Grace

Reward of Life.name: 生命之赐 Reward of Life
Reward of Life.description:
当你使用圣疗时，你也一同被治愈。

先决条件: 【圣疗】职业特性。

专长效果: 每次你使用【圣疗】能力治疗你以外的生物时，你恢复等同于你魅力加值的HP。这个能力在你使用圣疗伤害不死生物时不起效。

资源出处: Ultimate Magic pg. 155

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Reward%20of%20Life

Reward of the Faithful.name: Reward of the Faithful
Reward of the Faithful.description:
Your intense belief in your deity allows you to benefit more from divine magic he or she provides.

Prerequisites
Knowledge (religion) 1 rank, alignment must match that of your worshiped deity.

Benefits
Whenever you are the only target of a divine spell cast by a follower of your chosen deity other than you, the spell's caster level is treated as though it were 2 higher than it actually is. Additionally, whenever you regain hit points as a result of a worshiper of your deity other than you channeling energy or casting a cure spell, you regain 1 additional hit point per die rolled for the healing gained.

Rhabdomancy.name: Rhabdomancy
Rhabdomancy.description:
You have mastered the art of casting sticks, rods, or arrows to uncover secrets and find lost things, gaining insight from the way these objects fall.

Prerequisites
Knowledge (nature) 3 ranks, Survival 3 ranks.

Benefits
You can perform the dowsing occult skill unlock even if you can't use psychic magic. If you can cast psychic spells or have the Psychic Sensitivity feat, you can use dowsing one additional time per day.

Spending 1 minute casting sticks prior to attempting a Survival check grants you a +2 insight bonus on the check. In addition, you can cast sticks or rods while casting a spell that locates a creature or object (including scrying effects) to increase the caster level of that spell by 1.

Rhetorical Flourish.name: 舌绽莲花 Rhetorical Flourish
Rhetorical Flourish.description:
你快速地转移话题，以华丽繁复的修辞掩盖自己的真意。

先决条件: 魅力13，说服者。

专长效果: 当时用交涉技能提出要求或改变生物态度时，你能够用误导性的说辞。如此做需要对该生物进行一次唬骗，若你成功则可在1分钟内对他的下次交涉检定获得+4加值。若你失败5点以上，你的下次交涉检定反而将遭受-2减值。此外，你还能利用此专长对一次失败的交涉检定展开重试。以这种方式使用“舌绽莲花”专长将在唬骗检定中承受-4减值。若你唬骗成功，你并不会如常获得交涉加值，而是能够重试1分钟内最后一次对该生物的交涉检定。

资源出处: Ultimate Combat pg. 116

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Rhetorical%20Flourish

Rhetorical Flourish (Mythic).name: 舌绽莲花(神话) Rhetorical Flourish (Mythic)
Rhetorical Flourish (Mythic).description:
先决条件：舌绽莲花

你非常善于使用语言进行误导并巧妙地影响他人。

神话专长效果：当你成功使用舌绽莲花专长对抗非神话生物时，你的交涉检定加值获得提高，提升数值等同于你的阶层。若目标是神话生物，该加值则减少为你的阶层的一半。

你能够花费1次神话之力，以此来重掷失败的唬骗检定。你必须接受新结果，即便它比之前更低。

资源出处: Mythic Adventures pg. 72

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Rhetorical%20Flourish

Rhino Charge.name: 犀牛冲锋 Rhino Charge
Rhino Charge.description:
专长类型：Combat

你的冲锋凶残且无法预料。

先决条件: 猛力攻击，精通冲撞，基本攻击加质+5。

专长效果: 你可以用准备动作准备冲锋，但是你在冲锋时只能以你的基本速度移动。

正常情况：冲锋是一个整轮动作（所以无法准备），且可以用双倍速度移动。

资源出处: Sargava, the Lost Colony pg. 24

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Rhino%20Charge

Ricochet Shot Deed.name: 反弹射击 Ricochet Shot Deed
Ricochet Shot Deed.description:
专长类型：Grit

你能利用墙壁反弹子弹，命中目标。

先决条件: 【勇毅】职业特性或业余铳士专长，盲战。

专长效果: 你可以对一面墙壁或一块固体地面射击，使其反弹。当你这么做时，使用正在那面墙前面的方格，或那块地面的方格来决定对目标的视线，而这个方格将被视为发起攻击的起点方格。以那个方格决定掩蔽效果，而以你所在的方格决定隐蔽效果。你可以在有至少1点勇毅点时进行这样的射击。当这么射击时，你可以消耗1点勇毅点忽略所有掩蔽和遮蔽的效果。你必须在检定前选择是否消耗勇毅点。

资源出处: Ultimate Combat pg. 116

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Ricochet%20Shot%20Deed

Ricochet Splash Weapon.name: 跳弹溅射 Ricochet Splash Weapon
Ricochet Splash Weapon.description:
在你手里，即使是扔偏了的溅射武器以及异常危险。

先决条件: 敏捷13，随手投掷。

专长效果: 当你使用溅射武器失手，并且在溅射武器的落点处有一个生物时，你可以做一次攻击骰（有-5的罚值）就好像你对那个生物投掷溅射武器。如果攻击成功，则溅射武器对这个生物造成全额伤害。与这个生物相邻的格子里依旧受到正常的溅射伤害。

通常状况: 失手的溅射投掷武器在落点和相邻的格子中造成溅射伤害。

资源出处: Ultimate Magic pg. 155

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Ricochet%20Splash%20Weapon

Ricochet Toss.name: 回弹投射 Ricochet Toss
Ricochet Toss.description:
专长类型：Weapon Mastery

你精确计划投射武器的角度，让它们在击中敌人的时候立刻弹回你的手中。

先决条件: 即时备战，BAB+6，对所选远程武器拥有战士武器训练（Weapon Training）职业能力。

专长效果: 当你使用一件所选的投掷武器发动一次远程攻击时，你的武器会在攻击结束时立刻弹回你的手里。这个能力对于弹药型投掷武器比如飞镖，手里剑还有任何溅射类武器无效。除非你拥有随手投掷专长，否则你投出的临时武器也不会因为被专长的效果而回返。

资源出处: Weapon Masters Handbook pg. 21

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Ricochet%20Toss

Ride-By Attack (Mythic).name: 骑乘掠击(神话) Ride-By Attack (Mythic)
Ride-By Attack (Mythic).description:
先决条件：骑乘掠击

当你冲击敌阵时，能做出多次攻击。

神话专长效果：当你成功以快速骑乘攻击的一部分打击1个敌人时，你能够继续攻击并对抗连续的目标。每拥有3个阶层，你就能进行1次额外攻击，但是攻击次数不能超过你进行全力攻击时的攻击次数。后续攻击使用多次攻击时的较低加值，就如同进行全力攻击一般。每两次攻击之间必须至少移动10尺。

资源出处: Mythic Adventures pg. 72

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Ride-By%20Attack

Righteous Healing.name: 公正医疗 Righteous Healing
Righteous Healing.description:
你基于审判动机的治疗法术更加有效。

先决条件: 【审判】职业特性。

专长效果: 当你在审判能力发动时施展治疗法术，每个目标受到额外的“1+1/3审判者等级”点治疗。

资源出处: Ultimate Combat pg. 116

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Righteous%20Healing

Righteous Orator.name: 正义雄辩者 Righteous Orator
Righteous Orator.description:
你将语言视为武器，且绝不允许邪恶的存在在社交场合将你驳倒。

先决条件: 交涉3级，制裁邪恶职业特性。

专长效果: 在口头的辩论，如法院诉讼、谈判或口头决斗（极限诡道176页）中，你针对另一个参与辩论的目标，以一个迅捷动作，花费一次制裁邪恶的使用次数。如果你目标并非邪恶，你会浪费这次制裁邪恶，没有任何效果。如果你的目标是邪恶的，你在交涉检定和用于欺骗目标的察言观色检定上获得等同于你职业等级的奖励加值。你获得等于你的魅力调整值的士气加值，用于对抗该目标的意志检定。以上效果持续到你或该目标不再参与口头辩论为止。

资源出处: Heroes of the High Court pg. 20

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Righteous%20Orator

Rime Spell.name: 霜冻法术 Rime Spell
Rime Spell.description:
专长类型：Metamagic

被你使用〔寒冷〕描述符的法术所伤害的生物陷入纠缠状态。

专长效果: 你的寒冷法术中的霜雾紧附在目标上，在短时间内阻碍他的行动。霜冻法术影响的生物在受到寒冷伤害时被纠缠等同于法术原本环级的轮数。这个专长仅对带有〔寒冷〕描述符的法术有效。霜冻法术须占用高于原本1个环级的法术位。

资源出处: Ultimate Magic pg. 155

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Rime%20Spell

Riptide Attack.name: 激流冲压 Riptide Attack
Riptide Attack.description:
专长类型：Combat

先决条件：精通拖拽APG，精通摔绊，信仰格兹雷

先决条件: 精通拖拽APG，精通摔绊，信仰格兹雷。

专长效果: 当你成功的发动一次摔绊战技攻击时，你可以以一个迅捷动作，自动再对目标进行一次拖拽战技攻击尝试。

资源出处: Inner Sea Gods pg. 215Faiths of Balance pg. 24

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Riptide%20Attack

战策增益：通过消耗4点耐力，当你成功用激流冲压发动一次绊摔战技攻击时，你可以以一个自由动作而不是迅捷动作，对被绊摔成功的目标尝试一次拖拽战技。

战策资源出处: Weapon Master's Handbook pg. 25

Risky Striker.name: 危机战斗 Risky Striker
Risky Striker.description:
专长类型：Combat

你为了对大型敌人造成巨创而把自己放在了危险的境地。

先决条件: 基本攻击加值+1，半身人。

专长效果: 在与比你大至少2个体型的敌人战斗时，你在近战攻击时可以选择承受-1AC减值而得到+2伤害加值。当你的基本攻击加值达到+4以及以后的每4个基本攻击加值等级时，AC再额外-1而这个伤害加值额外增加2。你只有在近战攻击和全回合攻击之前宣布使用这个专长。专长效果持续到你的下一回合开始。

资源出处: Advanced Race Guide pg. 67

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Risky%20Striker

战策增益：当你使用这个专长时，你可以消耗5点耐力来在对抗比你至少大一个体型的生物时获得伤害骰上的加值。这个好处在你停止使用这个专长或者1分钟后结束，以先到来的来结算。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 130

Ritual Hex.name: Ritual Hex
Ritual Hex.description:
You are well versed in ancient secrets and forbidden curses, and know how to petition powers with which you are already in contact for additional knowledge.

Prerequisites
Knowledge (arcana) 4 ranks, Knowledge (history) 4 ranks, hex class feature.

Benefits
You learn to perform a special occult ritual (Pathfinder RPG Occult Adventures 208) known as Beseeching the Patron, which temporarily grants you a hex you don't already know how to use. You always believe that your ritual is a success, so the GM should roll the required skill checks in secret, revealing the result only when you try to use your newly acquired hex.

Beseeching the Patron
School divination; Level 4
Casting Time 40 minutes
Components V, F (a book of occult lore worth at least 150 gp)
Skill Checks Knowledge (arcana) DC 20, 2 successes; Knowledge (history) DC 20, 2 successes
Range personal
Duration 24 hours
Saving Throw no; SR no
Backlash The caster is fatigued for 1 hour.
Failure All of the caster's spells suffer a 10% spell failure chance for 24 hours.

Effect

The caster gains access to one additional hex for which she qualifies. This ritual can be used to acquire a major hex (increasing the DCs of the ritual's skill checks by 10) or grand hex (increasing the DCs by 20) if desired. The caster can have only one additional hex from this ritual at a time.

Ritual Mask.name: Ritual Mask
Ritual Mask.description:
You can use your mask to enhance your occult powers.

Prerequisites
Nameless One, ability to cast one or more occult rituals (Pathfinder RPG Occult Adventures 208).

Benefits
While benefiting from the Nameless One feat, your masked identity affords you a greater spiritual connection when you act as the primary caster for an occult ritual you know. For any such occult ritual, you can attempt all required skill checks, even if untrained in such a skill. If you are trained in such a skill, you instead gain a +3 bonus on your skill check.

In addition, if you have the spirit class feature (as per the shaman or medium class), you can use the ritualistic focus afforded by this feat to enhance your connection to spirits with which you have communed. Once per day, when you use a supernatural ability granted to you by your spirit (such as a shaman's spirit's hex or spirit abilities, or a medium's spirit powers), you increase your effective class level by 1 when determining the effects of that supernatural ability.

Ritualistic Preparation.name: Ritualistic Preparation
Ritualistic Preparation.description:
You have learned to access preparation rituals from spellbooks from which you can't otherwise benefit.

Prerequisites
Knowledge (arcana) 1 rank, Linguistics 1 rank, Spellcraft 1 rank, ability to cast read magic.

Benefits
You can treat spellbooks with preparation rituals as if they were prayer books or meditation books.

Special
A character with this feat can take the Avid Spellbook Reader feat even if she does not meet its prerequisites. Doing so allows her to benefit from the preparation rituals from two spellbooks, though she must still sacrifice spell slots to benefit from preparation rituals when treating such books as meditation books.

Rival.name: Rival
Rival.description:
You have a rival, and the two of you try to sabotage, humiliate, or otherwise defeat each other without allowing anyone else to interfere.

Prerequisites
You must have at least one enemy who wishes to outdo you. If you have multiple rivals, the GM may keep the specific rival secret, or have many of your enemies work together against you. If your rival is not already a challenging foe, it either advances to become one or allies itself with others one or more creatures who are .

Benefits
Your striving pushes you to become ever more skillful. When you gain this feat, and every 2 character levels thereafter, either you gain 1 skill point or your Fame score increases by 1 (if your game uses the reputation and Fame system from Ultimate Campaign).

Goal
Thwart your rival without anyone else directly interfering. Achieving your rival's

Goal
before her in a manner that humiliates her or completely steals her glory through your direct actions also qualifies.

Completion Benefit
Once per day, you can take 20 on a single skill check as a standard action if the skill check is one that would allow you to take 20.

River Raider.name: River Raider
River Raider.description:
You're skilled at creeping up on watercraft without being noticed and getting the jump on their occupants.

Benefits
You gain a +2 bonus on Swim and Stealth checks while swimming in calm or rough water (but not while swimming in stormy water). In addition, if you're able to act in a surprise round and you start the surprise round in water, you can take both a move and a standard action. You still cannot take a full-round action during the surprise round.

Normal
You can take only a move or a standard action if you can act in the surprise round.

Riving Strike.name: 奥能收割 Riving Strike
Riving Strike.description:
专长类型：Combat

奥术力量顺着你的武器撕开对手的魔法防护，使他更易受到你的法术影响。

先决条件: 奥术打击，可以施放奥术魔法。

专长效果: 如果你以奥术打击这次增强的武器对一个敌人造成了伤害，那么这个敌人在一轮内对抗你的法术和类法术能力时，在所有的豁免检定上承受-2减值。

资源出处: Advanced Class Guide pg. 155

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Riving%20Strike

战策增益：当你使用这个专长时，你可以消耗至多3点耐力来延长这个效果的持续时间，每消耗1点就能多持续1轮。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 130

Robot's Bane.name: Robot's Bane
Robot's Bane.description:
You have trained to avoid the attacks and effects employed by robots and technology and to combat them effectively.

Prerequisites
Knowledge (engineering) 5 ranks

Benefits
You gain a +1 bonus on attack and damage rolls against creatures with the robot subtype. Additionally, you gain a +1 dodge bonus to your AC and a +1 bonus on saving throws against attacks and effects from robots. If you have at least 11 ranks in Knowledge (engineering), these bonuses increase to +2. If you have at least 17 ranks in Knowledge (engineering), these bonuses increase to +3.

Special
If you have constructs as a favored enemy, you can use your favored enemy bonus toward constructs in place of the bonus granted by this feat if it's larger. These bonuses do not stack with those granted by other abilities that allow you to add your favored enemy bonus to AC or on saving throws.

Robust Stench.name: Robust Stench
Robust Stench.description:
Your questionable hygiene choices may offend your allies, but exposure has inured them to other, deadlier effects.

Prerequisites
Goblin.

Benefits
Allies within 5 feet of you receive a +2 morale bonus on Fortitude saving throws. This bonus ends as soon as they move more than 5 feet away from you. This bonus applies only to allies you have fought alongside at least once before.

Roll With It.name: Roll With It
Roll With It.description:
You know how to take a hit, even if your reaction sends you bouncing and flying out of battle while shrieking at the top of your lungs.

Prerequisites
Goblin, Acrobatics 1 rank.

Benefits
If you are struck by a melee weapon you can try to convert some or all of that damage into movement that sends you off in an uncontrolled bouncing roll. To do so, you must make an Acrobatics check (DC = 5 + the damage dealt from the attack) as an immediate action. If you succeed in this check, you take no damage from the actual attack but instead convert that damage into movement with each point equating to 1 foot of movement. For example, if you would have taken 6 points of damage, you would convert that into 6 feet of movement. You immediately move in a straight line in a direction of your choice this number of feet (rounded up to the nearest 5-foot-square), halting if you reach a distance equal to your actual speed. If this movement would make you strike an object or creature of your size or larger, the movement immediately ends, you take 1d4 points of damage, and fall prone in that square. This involuntary movement provokes attacks of opportunity normally if you move through threatened squares, but does not provoke an attack of opportunity from the creature that struck you in the first place.

You are staggered for 1 round after you attempt to use this feat, whether or not you succeed.


Pathfinder Society
Only legal goblin PCs are allowed to choose anything from this book

Rouse Emotions.name: Rouse Emotions
Rouse Emotions.description:
You can sway the hearts of an entire crowd with your art, or turn them against your enemies.

Prerequisites
Cha 13, Charming Performance, Perform (any) 5 ranks, bardic performance or raging song.

Benefits
You can use Charming Performance on all creatures within 60 feet. In addition to swaying the crowd's starting attitude toward a single person, you may choose to sway the crowd's attitude toward a well-defined group with which they are familiar (such as a specific nation, organization, or religion). An attempt to rouse emotions about a group takes a -5 penalty due to the difficulty of creating strong feelings toward an entire group rather than a specific individual. The DC for this check is 30 + 1 for every five people in the crowd to be affected. You can't use Rouse Emotions to change a crowd's attitude by more than one step, or to make it helpful or hostile.

Rubble Skirmisher.name: Rubble Skirmisher
Rubble Skirmisher.description:
You use difficult terrain to your advantage when performing combat maneuvers.

Prerequisites
Dex 13, Nimble Moves, base attack bonus +2.

Benefits
When you are in a square that has naturally occurring difficult terrain (bushes, rubble, undergrowth, and so forth), you gain a +2 circumstance bonus on combat maneuver checks and to your CMD.

Rugged Northerner.name: 坚韧的北方人 Rugged Northerner
Rugged Northerner.description:
你生活在艰苦的寒冷环境中，并由此获得了一些好处。

先决条件: 体质13，生存1级。

专长效果: 你将极度严寒环境（extreme cold conditions，核心手册 442页）视为严寒环境（severe cold），将严寒环境视为寒冷环境（cold weather conditions）。你不会被通常的寒冷环境所影响。此外，你不会由于冻伤（frostbite）或体温过低（hypothermia）而陷入疲乏（fatigued）状态。

资源出处: Adventurers Guide pg. 133Inner Sea World Guide pg. 288

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Rugged%20Northerner

Run (Mythic).name: 飞跑(神话) Run (Mythic)
Run (Mythic).description:
先决条件：飞跑

你能够以让人难以置信的速度和持久力进行奔跑。

神话专长效果：当你奔跑时，若你穿戴中甲、轻甲、不着甲，并且携带不超过中载的物品时，你能够以正常速度的7倍进行移动。当你在助跑后进行跳跃时，你的特技动作检定会获得额外加值，数值等同于你的阶层 + 4。

你能够正常奔跑的轮数等同于你的体质属性加你的阶层，不过在此之后你就必须成功进行体质检定才能继续奔跑。

资源出处: Mythic Adventures pg. 72

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Run

Runic Charge.name: Runic Charge
Runic Charge.description:
You can deliver touch spells with frightful ferocity.

Prerequisites
Caster level 5th.

Benefits
As long as two of your hands are free, you can cast a spell with a range of touch and deliver the spell to a single target as part of a charge action. When you do so, you gain a +2 bonus on caster level checks to overcome the target's spell resistance, and the critical threat range of that touch attack is 19-20. This increased threat range does not stack with similar abilities such as Improved Critical.

Rushing Winds.name: Rushing Winds
Rushing Winds.description:
You can fly through the air at high speed, creating a column of wind in your path that destabilizes other fliers.

Prerequisites
Turbulent Takeoff, Fly 10 ranks.

Benefits
As a full-round action, you can fly up to twice your Fly speed in a straight line, creating a shockwave of rushing winds around you as you move. Each flying creature you pass adjacent to as part of this movement must succeed at a DC 25 Fly check or be blown back 1d6 x10 feet and take 2d6 points of nonlethal damage due to battering and buffeting. Creatures that fail this check by 5 or more also lose 1d4 x10 feet of altitude, and creatures that fail this check by 10 or more plummet to the ground.

Ruthless Opportunist.name: 狠辣借机 Ruthless Opportunist
Ruthless Opportunist.description:
专长类型：CombatTeamwork

你对于出手时机的把控与凶狠的程度令敌人措手不及。

先决条件: 切利亚斯人。

专长效果: 当拥有此专长的切利亚斯人盟友用借机攻击命中你与该盟友都正在威胁的敌人时，你在对抗该敌人的近战攻击检定上获得+2环境加值，持续1轮。

资源出处: Inner Sea Races pg. 208

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Ruthless%20Opportunist

Sabotage Magic Item.name: 机关魔道具 Sabotage Magic Item
Sabotage Magic Item.description:
你能让魔法物品变成引起事故的道具。

先决条件: 魔法天赋，解除装置5级，使用魔法装置5级。

专长效果: 你能尝试1次使用魔法装置检定来向1件魔法物品设置机关而非启动它，DC与盲目启动该魔法物品相同。若此次检定成功，你能在魔法物品上设下1个会引发事故（mishap）的触发条件，这个事故可以是对尝试使用魔法物品的生物造成2d6伤害的同时未能启动其预期的功能，或者也可以是魔法物品影响到错误的目标。事故的触发条件必须为视觉型（visual）或听觉型（audible）触发条件，就如同魔嘴（Magic Mouth）法术中所制定的一般。若你在该检定中失败，则会承受事故作为替代，就好像你在盲目启动魔法物品的检定中失败了10点或更多一般。

资源出处: Ultimate Intrigue pg. 90

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Sabotage%20Magic%20Item

Sabotage Specialist.name: 破坏专家 Sabotage Specialist
Sabotage Specialist.description:
你破坏装置的技巧神乎其神。

先决条件: 妙手，解除装置5级。

专长效果: 当你使用解除装置技能设置（rig）简单（simple）或复杂（tricky）的装置（比如马鞍或者货车车轮），让它能够在正常工作一段时间后再脱落或损坏时，你能够指定装置损坏的时间点，延迟的时间至多为在你成功进行设置工作后60分钟的时点。装置会在指定时间的1d6 - 3轮后损坏（结果为-1或-2则意味着装置会在指定时间之前的1或2轮时损坏）。

通常状况: 你能够使用解除装置设置（rig）简单（simple）的装置（比如马鞍或货车车轮），让它能够在正常工作一段时间后再脱落或损坏（通常为开始使用后的1d4轮）。

资源出处: Ultimate Intrigue pg. 90

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Sabotage%20Specialist

Sabotaging Sunder.name: 诡技破武 Sabotaging Sunder
Sabotaging Sunder.description:
专长类型：Combat

你能够快速破坏敌人穿戴或携带的装备。

先决条件: 力量 13，精通破武，猛力攻击，解除装置7级。

专长效果: 你能够以标准动作执行1次特殊的破武战技（sunder combat maneuver），来破坏1名敌人穿戴的1件物品。你会在近战中使用该项技巧破坏1件既没有被持握（hold）也没有被藏匿在袋子、背包、或者其他容器中的物品。你必须至少有1只手空着才能执行该项战技，而且这么做会引起你所执行战技的目标的借机攻击，即便你具有精通破武（Improved Sunder）专长也是如此。

当你尝试该次战技检定时，使用你在解除装置中投入的技能点数替代你的基本攻击加值，并用你的敏捷调整值替代力量调整值。任何针对破武战技检定的加值（比如精通破武专长提供的加值）仍旧适用于该次战技，而你的目标在CMD上获得的任何用于对抗破武尝试的加值，依旧也能够在此次战技中保护它。若你的检定成功，取代原本的造成伤害，你会破坏目标物品，让它获得破损（broken）状态。若该物品已经处于破损状态，那么你会摧毁（destroy）该物品，或者导致它的脱落（fall off）。免疫破武的物品依旧免疫此种特殊战技，若一件物品（比如神器）在正常情况下仅能用特殊方式摧毁（destroy）或移除（remove），该专长也无法将其摧毁或移除。

通常状况: 成功的破武（Sunder）尝试会对目标物品造成武器伤害。

资源出处: Ultimate Intrigue pg. 90

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Sabotaging%20Sunder

Sacred Geometry.name: 神圣几何学 Sacred Geometry
Sacred Geometry.description:
你可以通过你超凡的数学技术来运用超魔专长调整你的法术，而不需要使用更高的法术位。

先决条件: 智力13，知识（工程学）2级。

专长效果: 当你获得该专长时，挑选两个你还没有的超魔专长，当施展法术的时候，你可以进行如下操作以自发性地将超魔专长的效果应用在法术效果上，你可以使用你选择的任一个超魔专长，也可以同时选择这两个超魔专长，也可以添加任何其他你已经拥有的超魔专长。如果你如此进行超魔，你不用花费更高的法术位。使用此专长会如自发施法者般增加施法时间 (自发施法者使用此能力的施法时间会增加两个等级)；应用一个瞬发超魔可以抵消施法时间的延长，但仍然会调整法术的有效等级。你可以多次选择该专长；每次选择都可以再添加两个额外的超魔专长用来通过该能力进行超魔。

当使用神圣几何学施展一个法术时，首选计算法术的有效等级。你可以对一个法术添加任意数量的超魔专长，只要调整后的法术等级是你有能力施展的。

之后查阅素数常量表决定可以运用在此次施法的素数。之后骰d6骰，骰子数量等同于你在知识（工程学）上的等级。然后对骰出来的这些数字进行加减乘除的计算，使最终结果等于相关的素数常量之一。如果你可以得出任一一个相关的素数常量，法术正常生效，并携带所有超魔效果。如果你失败了，你无法施放这个法术，而且法术位也会消耗。任何用该专长施法时的专注检定的DC要使用决定素数常量的那个有效法术等级，即使成功施法并不会消耗更高环的法术位。

例如，Ezren希望施展一个增远强效魔法飞弹，首先计算法术的有效等级，为1（增远）+2（强效）+1（魔法飞弹）=4级。查阅素数常量表，相关的素数常量为31，37，41。因为Ezren有5级的知识（工程学），他骰5d6，骰池的结果为6，6，4，3，1。接着他对这5个数字进行如下计算：6 x 6 + (4 - 3) x 1 = 37。或者也可以这么算：(6 + 6) x 3 + 4 + 1 = 41。他得到了任何一个相关的素数常量的结果，因此他以一个整轮动作施放了一个增远强效魔法飞弹，并且只使用了一个1环法术位。如果Ezren的骰池结果为1，1，2，5，他将无法得出任何一个相关的素数常量。他的施法尝试失败，并仍然要花费一个整轮动作和一个1环法术位。

有效法术等级素数常值
1级357
2级111317
3级192329
4级313741
5级434753
6级596167
7级717379
8级838997
9级101103107


资源出处: Occult Mysteries pg. 49

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Sacred%20Geometry

Sacred Pyromania.name: Sacred Pyromania
Sacred Pyromania.description:
Your faith in Sarenrae and the power of flame allows you to lace fire with holy power and burn things that normally can't be burned.

Prerequisites
Goblin, worshipper of Sarenrae.

Benefits
Whenever you make an attack or cast a spell that deals fire damage, the fire damage applies to incorporeal creatures, regardless of whether the fire is magical. An incorporeal creature's 50% reduction in damage from corporeal sources does not apply to any fire damage that you deal.

Sacred Summons.name: 神圣召唤 Sacred Summons
Sacred Summons.description:
你的神祇随时响应你的呼唤。

先决条件: 【灵光】职业特性，能够施展‘召唤怪物’。

专长效果: 在使用‘召唤怪物’时，如果所召唤的怪物的阵营子类或亚种完全符合你的灵光，则你可以使用一个标准动作施展法术而非一个整轮动作。

资源出处: Ultimate Magic pg. 155

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Sacred%20Summons

Sacrificial Adept.name: Sacrificial Adept
Sacrificial Adept.description:
The deaths of living, sentient creatures fuel your spells and heighten their potency.

Prerequisites
Knowledge (arcana) 4 ranks, Knowledge (planes) 4 ranks, Knowledge (religion) 4 ranks, Spellcraft 4 ranks, ability to cast 3rd-level spells, evil alignment.

Benefits
By partaking in a heinous ritual that takes at least 10 minutes to complete and which requires you to perform a successful coup de grace upon a sacrifice, you can enhance the power of a single spell you know or have prepared for the next 24 hours, regardless of how many times you cast it within that period. Your sacrifice must be a sentient creature with a total number of Hit Dice greater than or equal to your caster level, and it must die from your coup de grace; if it doesn't die or comes back to life, you lose all benefits related to that sacrifice.

After successfully performing the ritual, you choose the spell that the ritual enhances and gain your choice of a +2 bonus to any attack rolls and combat maneuvers made with that spell or a +2 bonus on caster level checks to overcome spell resistance with that spell for 24 hours.

You can perform this ritual a number of times per day equal to your Charisma modifier, but you cannot affect the same spell more than once at a time.

Sacrificial Aid.name: Sacrificial Aid
Sacrificial Aid.description:
You convince an ally to help you disable a trap, but the ally takes the damage if you fail.

Benefits
When you attempt to disable a trap, an ally who also has this feat can bolster your efforts. The ally rolls 1d20 and adds either her total bonus on Disable Device checks or her character level, whichever is higher; if the result of the ally's roll is 10 or greater, you gain a +4 bonus on your Disable Device check. If you trigger the trap, your ally is the target of the trap's effects. In the case of a trap with multiple targets, your ally takes the effects both for herself and for you (potentially taking damage twice or attempting saving throws twice).

Normal
You can use the aid another action only if you are able to attempt the skill check in question. The bonus provided is only +2.

Sacrificial Potency.name: 牺牲效力 Sacrificial Potency
Sacrificial Potency.description:
你的能力伴随着凡人的死亡而兴衰（wax）。

先决条件: 一种及以上的种族类法术能力（One or more racial spell-like abilities），邪恶亚种的异界生物（outsider with the evil subtype）。

专长效果: 每当你使用致命一击杀死1个生物时，选择你拥有的1种每天使用数量有限的种族类法术能力（但不限于更多的限制，比如每周1次或每月1次）。该类法术能力的法术环级必须小于等于受害者生命骰的一半。你可以重获该类法术能力1次使用次数。如果你每耗费该类法术能力任意1次使用次数，这将无效。

此外，当任何30尺内的盟友使用致命一击杀死其受害者时，你可以获得该专长的收益。该盟友必须公开宣称此杀戮是以你的名义而进行的。这在其他方面如同你已经自己使用致命一击行为了。

你每24小时仅可以获得该专长的收益1次。

资源出处: Book of the Damned pg. 179

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Sacrificial%20Potency

Sacrificial Ritualist.name: Sacrificial Ritualist
Sacrificial Ritualist.description:
Your magical power used to originate in yourself, but now you draw it from others.

Prerequisites
Mutilating Ritualist, Knowledge (arcana) 4 ranks, Knowledge (religion) 4 ranks, Spellcraft 4 ranks.

Benefits
You can improve your ability to cast an occult ritual (Occult Adventures 208) by powering it with the blood of creatures. When you begin the occult ritual with the death of a sentient creature (or number of sentient creatures with a total number of Hit Dice equal to twice the effective level of the ritual), you and all secondary casters gain a +4 bonus on all skill checks necessary to complete the occult ritual. This feat's sacrifices are in addition to any sacrifices normally required to complete the ritual.

Saddle Shrieker.name: Saddle Shrieker
Saddle Shrieker.description:
You sometimes get carried away when encouraging your mount to fight.

Prerequisites
Goblin, Ride 1 rank.

Benefits
You can choose to take a -1 penalty on all attack rolls and combat maneuver checks to grant your mount a +1 bonus on all attack rolls and damage rolls made with natural weapons. These effects affect you and your mount for 1 round. When your base attack bonus reaches +4, and every 4 points thereafter, this penalty increases by -1 and the bonus to your mount's attack and damage increases by +1 to a maximum of +5. You must choose to use this feat before making an attack roll.


Pathfinder Society
Only legal goblin PCs are allowed to choose anything from this book

Sage's Guidance.name: Sage's Guidance
Sage's Guidance.description:
Your familiar's keen observations help you defeat foes. Prerequisite: Must have a familiar with the sage archetype (see page 11).

Prerequisites
Must have a familiar with the sage archetype (see page 11).

Benefits
When your familiar succeeds at a Knowledge check to identify a hazard or an opponent's weaknesses and abilities, you gain a +2 insight bonus on attacks and skill checks against the opponent or hazard for 1 round. If your familiar is sharing a space with the opponent or hazard, this bonus is granted to all allies who can see and understand the familiar.

Sahir-Afiyun.name: Sahir-Afiyun
Sahir-Afiyun.description:
You have intertwined your familiarities with pesh and magic to unlock strange powers.

Prerequisites
Spell Focus (any), ability to cast 2nd-level spells.

Benefits
When you consume pesh, you take 1 fewer point of Constitution or Wisdom damage (your choice). In addition, you add spells from the sahir-afiyun spells listed below to your own class spell list or list of spells known. You can add one spell from the highest level you can cast; you can instead add two spells to your list of spells known, but both of these spells must be at least 1 level lower than the highest-level spell you can cast for that class. If you have more than one spellcasting class, choose one and add the sahir-afiyun spell or spells listed below to that class's spell list or list of spells known.

1st--alleviate addiction (see page 19), lesser confusion, night blindness (see page 19), pesh vigor (see page 19), ray of sickening, remove fear, sleep.

2nd--augury, calm emotions, euphoric cloud.

3rd--contact high (see page 19), deep slumber, imbue with addiction (see page 19).

4th--absorbing inhalation, confusion, divination.

5th--symbol of sleep.

All sahir-afiyun spells require 1 dose of pesh as a material component, either replacing the existing material component, or as part of the material component if the existing component costs more.

Special
You can gain this feat multiple times. Its effects do not stack. Each time you take the feat, add one or more sahir-afiyun spells to your spell list.

Sand Strike.name: Sand Strike
Sand Strike.description:
You can incorporate sand as part of your unarmed fighting techniques.

Prerequisites
Improved Unarmed Strike, dwarf, proficiency with the cestus.

Benefits
You can take 1 minute to tightly embed sand into the joints and crevices of a pair of cestuses you wear. While they have sand embedded in them, the cestuses gain +1 hardness and +5 hit points.
