Once the spirit's attitude is indifferent or better, you can request to know what must be done to lay the spirit to rest, though the DC to do so is the DC to change its current attitude + 15. This takes into account the circumstance modifiers for the request in a typical situation, though it could be higher or lower in an unusual circumstance.

The spirit's starting attitude is usually hostile since you destroyed it and imprisoned it within you, interfering with its rejuvenation. If it's the spirit of an undead creature, it has the same Charisma bonus it had while fully manifested. If the spirit is that of a haunt, it has an effective Charisma based on its CR using the following table.
Haunt CREffective Charisma(Modifier)
1-412(+1)
5-816(+3)
9-1220(+5)
13-1624(+7)
17-2028(+9)
21+32(+11)

Conversing with a spirit in this manner unsettles the mind. Each time you attempt a Diplomacy check using this ability to influence the spirit's attitude or make a request, you take 1 point of Wisdom damage. No effect can prevent or reduce the ability damage, nor can the ability damage be healed or suppressed by any means until you release the spirit.

Special
If you are using the sanity system (page 12), when you attempt a Diplomacy check using this ability, you take 1d6 points of sanity damage instead of 1 point of Wisdom damage. No effect can prevent or reduce the damage, nor can the damage be healed or suppressed by any means until you release the spirit.

Spirit Symbiosis.name: Spirit Symbiosis
Spirit Symbiosis.description:
Your phantom is impressionable and easily influenced by contact with new spirits.

Prerequisites
Ability to cast speak with dead, phantom class feature.

Benefits
When you cast speak with dead, you can choose not to gain any of the normal effects of the spell, instead temporarily merging the summoned spirit into your phantom, exchanging your phantom's current emotional focus and all related abilities for a new emotional focus of your choice. This new emotional focus persists for 10 minutes per class level you have, after which your phantom's original emotional focus returns.

Spirit Talker.name: 灵语者 Spirit Talker
Spirit Talker.description:
和精魂花些时间交涉，你可以从它们那里弄到新的巫术。

先决条件: 巫术职业能力，萨满职业等级6或女巫职业等级6。

专长效果: 每天一次，你可以花费10分钟连接到一个萨满的魂域。如果你这样做，你选择一个属于该魂域的巫术，在接下来的1小时中可以暂时使用它，之后立刻失去该巫术所给予的好处。

资源出处: Advanced Class Guide pg. 156

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Spirit%20Talker

Spirit Vision.name: Spirit Vision
Spirit Vision.description:
You retain your senses when seeking a possession target.

Prerequisites
Magic jar as a known spell or spell-like ability, Wis 15

Benefits
When you sense life forces while seeking a host, you can observe them as you could when you were in your own body. Attempting to possess a body is a standard action.

Spirit's Gift.name: 精魂灵赋 Spirit's Gift
Spirit's Gift.description:
你呼唤精魂的力量，让它附身与你的动物伙伴或魔宠。

先决条件: 动物伙伴职业能力或魔宠职业能力。

专长效果: 在每天开始时，你可以选择与一个萨满的魂域交涉（和萨满需要花费一小时准备魂域不同，你不需要任何时间）。接下来24小时内有一次，你可以用标准动作给予你的动物伙伴或魔宠你所沟通魂域的魂兽能力，持续时间为你拥有动物伙伴或魔宠职业等级每分钟。

资源出处: Advanced Class Guide pg. 157

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Spirit's%20Gift

Spirited Charge (Mythic).name: 奋力冲锋(神话) Spirited Charge (Mythic)
Spirited Charge (Mythic).description:
先决条件：奋力冲锋

你的骑乘冲锋会把这些傻到敢于对抗你的敌人的最后一点理智打飞。

神话专长效果：当你使用骑乘冲锋击中1个敌人时，该敌人必须成功进行强韧豁免（DC 10 + 1/2你的角色等级 + 你的力量调整值），否则会被恍惚（staggered），持续轮数等同于你的阶层。若你使用长枪（lance）进行此次攻击，则此次豁免DC增加2点。在你进行攻击前，以自由动作，你能够花费1次神话之力，来使得豁免失败的敌人眩晕（dazed）而非原本的恍惚。

资源出处: Mythic Adventures pg. 74

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Spirited%20Charge

Spiritual Balance.name: 抱元守一 Spiritual Balance
Spiritual Balance.description:
你能够运用气来压制外界的魂魄对你的影响。

先决条件: 气池（Ki Pool）职业能力，心如止水（Still Mind）职业能力。

专长效果: 你的心如止水（Still Mind）职业能力带来的豁免检定加值还能应用至对抗占据（possession）效果的时候，而且以直觉动作，你能够从气池中花费1点气来将心如止水提供的豁免检定加值翻倍。

正常：你的心如止水职业能力仅能对附魔系（enchantment）法术和效果生效。

资源出处: Occult Adventures pg. 140

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Spiritual%20Balance

Spiritual Guardian.name: 戒卫之魂 Spiritual Guardian
Spiritual Guardian.description:
负责防卫你的精魂要比其他的灵体更加强大。

先决条件: 可以施放法术灵能武器（Spiritual Weapon）或灵能盟友（Spiritual Ally），萨满魂术（Spirit Magic）职业能力。

专长效果: 每当你施放灵能武器或灵能盟友，或类似的召唤灵魂存在的法术时，它的基础攻击加值将使用你的萨满等级而非你的基本攻击加值，并且可以因此而获得额外的攻击次数除此之外，这些法术在克服目标的法术抗力的施法者等级检定与伤害上获得+2加值。

资源出处: Advanced Class Guide pg. 157

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Spiritual%20Guardian

Spiritual Training.name: Spiritual Training
Spiritual Training.description:
Through dedicated study and training, you can resist the control of possessing spirits.

Benefits
You gain a +2 competence bonus on Knowledge checks to identify creatures with the incorporeal subtype, and can attempt Knowledge checks dealing with incorporeal creatures untrained. When affected by a dominate person, magic jar, or possession spell or a similar ability, your mind and soul remain aware within your body, at war with the invading consciousness. While dominated or possessed, you can attempt a Will save as a swift action to temporarily regain control over your body. On a successful save, you can act normally for 1 round. On a failed save, you cannot attempt to regain control for 1 hour, but the possessing consciousness can't take a swift action that round.

Spiritualist's Call.name: 唤魂师之祈 Spiritualist's Call
Spiritualist's Call.description:
每当你召唤魅影时，它都会在短时间内获得更为强大的力量。

先决条件: 魅影（Phantom）职业能力。

专长效果: 每当你召唤自己的魅影时，都会让它在力量、敏捷或魅力上获得+2增强加值。该加值在召唤仪式完成后会持续10分钟。

资源出处: Occult Adventures pg. 140

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Spiritualist's%20Call

Spit Venom.name: 毒液喷吐 Spit Venom
Spit Venom.description:
专长类型：poison

以一个远程接触攻击，你对目标喷出了一股毒液蒸汽。

如果毒液命中，它会导致目标失明一轮。

目标必须通过强韧检定否则就会中黑奎蛇毒 (black adder venom); 毒药的后续豁免DC也等于法术DC。



资源出处: Ultimate Magic pg. 240

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/SpellDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Spit%20Venom

Splash Volley.name: 溅射截击 Splash Volley
Splash Volley.description:
专长类型：BetrayalTeamwork

你的队友早已习惯处于你投掷武器的建设范围内，并学会了确保敌人受伤的方法。

先决条件: BAB+1。

专长效果: 当你使用溅射武器失手打格子且此格子在一个同样拥有此专长的盟友触及范围内时，你可以激活此专长。牺牲者可以用直觉动作进行一次对临近敌人的近战接触攻击来改变此溅射武器的方向以取代溅射武器的随机掉落位置。如果牺牲者成功击中敌人，溅射武器会在目标敌人占据的格子最近的格子掉落。

资源出处: Champions of Corruption pg. 21

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Splash%20Volley

Splash Weapon Mastery.name: Splash Weapon Mastery
Splash Weapon Mastery.description:
You are adept at increasing the range, area, and accuracy of splash weapons.

Benefits
When throwing a splash weapon, you act as if you had the Far Shot feat. When you hit with a splash weapon, select one additional square adjacent to the splash area; creatures in this area also take splash damage. When you miss with a splash weapon, you may adjust the miss direction on the grid by +1 or -1. This feat counts as Far Shot for the purpose of qualifying for other feats, but only in regard to splash weapons.

Splintering Weapon.name: 爆碎武器 Splintering Weapon
Splintering Weapon.description:
你手中脆弱武器的碎片插进了对方的伤口中，使你取得优势。

先决条件: 基本攻击加值+1，熟悉对应武器，该武器以原始材料打造。

专长效果: 当你使用带有〔易碎〕特性或类似效果的近战或投掷武器命中对手时，你能让武器破损、同时给对手造成1d4出血伤害。

资源出处: Ultimate Combat pg. 120

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Splintering%20Weapon

Split Hex.name: 分裂巫术 Split Hex
Split Hex.description:
你可以分裂一个目标形巫术的效果，使其影响另一个你能看见的生物。

先决条件: 女巫10级。

专长效果: 当你使用目标是一个生物的【巫术】时（并非【强力巫术】或者【高等巫术】），你可以选择第一目标30尺范围内的另一个生物同时作为那个巫术的目标。

资源出处: Ultimate Magic pg. 156

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Split%20Hex

Split Major Hex.name: 分裂强力巫术 Split Major Hex
Split Major Hex.description:
你可以分裂一个目标形巫术的效果，使其影响另一个你能看见的生物。

先决条件: 分裂巫术，女巫18级。

专长效果: 当你使用目标是一个生物的【强力巫术】时（并非【高等巫术】），你可以选择第一目标30尺范围内的另一个生物同时作为那个强力巫术的目标。

资源出处: Ultimate Magic pg. 156

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Split%20Major%20Hex

Split Trick.name: Split Trick
Split Trick.description:
You can split a mesmerist trick between two targets.

Prerequisites
Mesmerist trick class feature.

Benefits
Whenever you implant a mesmerist trick in a target, you can designate that trick as a split trick. When doing so, you touch two targets and split the trick between them. This counts as implanting a mesmerist trick in both targets. The mesmerist trick functions as normal, except that when the trick's triggering condition occurs, you must choose one of the split trick's targets to receive the effects of the split trick. The other target receives no benefit from the trick.

Spontaneous Metafocus.name: 自发集中 Spontaneous Metafocus
Spontaneous Metafocus.description:
你将你的精力集中于如何把你所知的法术和超魔专长结合起来。

先决条件: 魅力13，一项超魔专长，能够自发施法。

专长效果: 选择一个你能够自发施法的法术。当你在那个法术上附加超魔专长时，你可以用正常的施法时间施展那个法术而非使用较慢的施法时间。

特殊说明: 你可以多次选择本专长。每次你选择本专长时，需要选择一个新的你能自发施法的法术，本专长对那个法术生效。

资源出处: Ultimate Magic pg. 157

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Spontaneous%20Metafocus

Spontaneous Metafocus (Mythic).name: 自发集中(神话) Spontaneous Metafocus (Mythic)
Spontaneous Metafocus (Mythic).description:
先决条件：自发集中

相比其他自发施法者，你对超魔的应用更为灵活自如。

神话专长效果：在每日清晨你的已消耗法术位恢复时，你能够变更自发集中专长所应用的法术。它可以应用至任何等级的法术，但是法术本身要满足自发集中专长的要求。

资源出处: Mythic Adventures pg. 74

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Spontaneous%20Metafocus

Spontaneous Nature's Ally.name: 自发召唤自然盟友 Spontaneous Nature's Ally
Spontaneous Nature's Ally.description:
你的神术并不能自动转化为治疗能量，而是可以召来自然的生物。

先决条件: 知识（自然）技能5级，可以自发施放治疗或伤害法术，拥有动物或植物牧师领域。

专长效果: 你可以通过花费法术位，施放同环或更低环的召唤自然盟友法术，如同你自发使用治疗伤害或造成伤害法术一样。为了方便起见，只在计算召唤自然盟友法术的环级时，将你视为一名德鲁伊，且这些法术位于你的法术列表内。

资源出处: Advanced Class Guide pg. 157

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Spontaneous%20Nature's%20Ally

Sprightly Armor.name: 轻快盔甲 Sprightly Armor
Sprightly Armor.description:
专长类型：Armor MasteryCombat

你将你盔甲的魔法能力发挥到了极致。

先决条件: 敏捷13，基本攻击加值+11或者战士8级，盔甲训练职业特性，擅长轻甲。

专长效果: 你将你的盔甲的增强加值作为加值加到你的先攻检定上。

资源出处: Armor Masters Handbook pg. 17

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Sprightly%20Armor

战策增益：你可以以一个直觉动作消耗5点耐力来在你的反射豁免上获得等同于你盔甲增强加值的环境加值，持续1轮。

战策资源出处: Armor Master's Handbook pg. 21

Spring Attack (Mythic).name: 跳跃攻击(神话) Spring Attack (Mythic)
Spring Attack (Mythic).description:
先决条件：跳跃攻击

你能够像旋转的刀刃一样席卷战场。

神话专长效果：当你使用跳跃攻击专长时，在进行首次攻击前，你不需要至少移动10尺。当你使用跳跃攻击时，如果花费1次神话之力，那么在你跳跃攻击期间的移动不会引起借机攻击。

资源出处: Mythic Adventures pg. 74

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Spring%20Attack

Spring-Heeled Reaping.name: 鹰啄·疾 Spring-Heeled Reaping
Spring-Heeled Reaping.description:
专长类型：Combat

轻便的护甲和出色的训练使你能在移动时做出多次攻击。

先决条件: 敏捷17，闪避，灵活移动，移动射击或跳跃攻击，鹰啄·迅，鹰啄流，BAB+11，擅长轻甲。

专长效果: 开启鹰啄流后，在你使用跳跃攻击或移动射击专长时，你能在移动中的任意地点攻击两个不同的目标。每一次攻击都采用你最高的BAB。如同跳跃攻击，被你近战攻击的目标无法因为这次移动对你进行借机攻击。

资源出处: Armor Masters Handbook pg. 11

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Spring-Heeled%20Reaping

Spring-Heeled Sprint.name: 鹰啄·迅 Spring-Heeled Sprint
Spring-Heeled Sprint.description:
专长类型：Combat

你能在不影响进攻的前提下快速移动。

先决条件: 敏捷15，闪避，灵活移动，移动射击或跳跃攻击，鹰啄流，BAB+7，擅长轻甲。

专长效果: 开启鹰啄流后，在使用跳跃攻击或移动射击专长时你能移动至多两倍你速度的距离。

资源出处: Armor Masters Handbook pg. 11

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Spring-Heeled%20Sprint

Spring-Heeled Style.name: 鹰啄流 Spring-Heeled Style
Spring-Heeled Style.description:
专长类型：CombatStyle

你巧妙地在敌人之间周旋，依靠你护甲的灵活性来躲避敌人的打击。

先决条件: 敏捷13，闪避，灵活移动，移动射击或跳跃攻击，BAB+4，擅长轻甲。

专长效果: 若你在通过移动动作移动了至少10尺的轮中开启此流派，在下一轮开始前你的武器攻击骰获得+2加值。开启此流派后，你对在使用远程武器攻击和为远程武器上弹时造成的借机攻击上，同样获得灵活移动的AC加值。

特殊情况：具有盔甲训练职业能力的角色可以穿着任何他擅长的盔甲来使用本流派。

资源出处: Armor Masters Handbook pg. 11

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Spring-Heeled%20Style

Sprinting Troll.name: 巨魔疾冲 Sprinting Troll
Sprinting Troll.description:
你调整自己的强大的新陈代谢机能，消耗自己的再生能力来获得极高的速度爆发。

先决条件: 飞跑，再生，巨魔。

专长效果: 以一个自由动作，你可以自愿压制你的再生能力1分钟时间，换取在陆地移动速度上获得10尺加值持续1分钟。在这1分钟期间你的再生能力会完全停止，但你可以以一个自由动作结束本专长的效果。你只有在当自己的再生能力可以生效时才能启动本专长。

资源出处: Monster Codex pg. 225

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Sprinting%20Troll

Sproutling.name: Sproutling
Sproutling.description:
You are able to sprout more quickly than most, though your body is underdeveloped.

Prerequisites
Cha 15, seed racial trait, ghoran.

Benefits
Whenever you use your seed ability to grow a new body, you can choose to sprout in half the normal amount of time (1d6 days instead of 2d6 days). If you do, your new body is Small instead of Medium, your natural armor bonus from racial traits (if any) is reduced by half, and you take a -2 penalty to Strength, Dexterity, and Constitution. These modifications last 1d3 weeks, after which your body matures to its proper size and loses all penalties associated with sprouting early.

Squash Flat.name: 碾压冲撞 Squash Flat
Squash Flat.description:
专长类型：Combat

先决条件：精通冲撞，横冲直撞，信仰洛瓦古格

先决条件: 精通冲撞，横冲直撞，信仰洛瓦古格。

专长效果: 当你对一个生物发动冲撞战技攻击且你的检定结果超过对方的CMD5点或更多，那么你可以选择不将对手额外击退5尺，而是在你的冲撞战技攻击的同时发动一次摔绊战技攻击作为冲撞的一部分，这次摔绊战技不会引发借机攻击。

资源出处: Inner Sea Gods pg. 216Faiths of Corruption pg. 25

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Squash%20Flat

战策资源出处: Weapon Master's Handbook pg. 25

Squire.name: Squire
Squire.description:
You attract a squire to aid you in your knightly endeavors.

Prerequisites
Character level 4th, proficient with all martial weapons.

Benefits
This feat acts similarly to the Leadership feat, with several exceptions. You can only attract a 1st-level cohort (referred to hereafter as a squire) with this feat, and cannot recruit followers until you have the Leadership feat. You determine your Leadership score according to the rules presented in the Leadership feat, but your squire is always at least three or more levels lower than yourself.

A squire can only take levels in a class that grants proficiency with all martial weapons as a class feature, such as paladin, gunslinger, cavalier, or fighter. She cannot multiclass, though she may take any archetype she qualifies for, including those from the following 'Squire Archetypes' section.

If a squire gains enough XP to bring her to two levels lower than your level, the squire does not gain the new level until you gain your next level--until then her new XP total is 1 less than the amount needed to attain the next level and she gains no additional XP until you advance.

If you release your squire from service, you may gain a new one by scouting for potential candidates in a city or large town where members of your knightly order can typically be found, which requires at least 24 hours of uninterrupted scouting. This act can also replace a squire who has perished.

Graduation
When you reach 7th level, this feat automatically upgrades to the Leadership feat (meaning that you effectively lose this feat and replace it with Leadership). You gain all the normal benefits of the Leadership feat, except that your squire must remain at least three levels lower than you and must continue to take levels in her first class. In order for your squire to be able to be two levels lower than you, your squire must be at least 4th level, and you must witness her as she single-handedly defeats a creature with Hit Dice equal to or greater than her own. Upon the creature's defeat, your squire graduates to full knighthood and acts as a normal cohort; she may begin taking levels in other classes if she so chooses, and she may increase in level to up to two levels lower than yourself.

Squirming Pile.name: Squirming Pile
Squirming Pile.description:
Your body is easily lost in the muddy chaos of fighting as a swarm, making your vital areas difficult to target.

Prerequisites
Acrobatics 5 ranks, swarming racial trait.

Benefits
While sharing a square with an ally who has this feat, you gain a 25% chance of negating the additional damage from a successful critical hit or sneak attack; if you negate the damage, it is instead rolled normally. This negation chance doesn't stack with similar protection provided by any other source, such as the fortification armor special ability.

Stabbing Shot.name: 迫退射击 Stabbing Shot
Stabbing Shot.description:
专长类型：Combat

你能够清除阻碍之后继续使用弓箭射击。

先决条件: 快速射击，精灵。

专长效果: 当你与一名敌人相邻，并且使用长弓或短弓（包括复合弓）进行全力攻击动作时，你可以选择拔出一根箭矢来对其进行近战攻击，而不是向他射击。如果攻击命中——无论是否造成伤害——你的目标都会被向着远离你的方向推开5尺。你能够在之后如常使用你的弓进行射击，对抗原本的目标，或者其他在射程内的目标。这次近战攻击会取代“快速射击”专长带来的额外攻击，并且该轮的所有攻击检定（近战攻击与远程攻击）都会受到-2减值。如果你的最初攻击能够使你不再处于任何敌人的威胁范围内，你就能够进行后续的远程攻击而不会引起借机攻击。

资源出处: Advanced Players Guide pg. 170

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Stabbing%20Shot

战策增益：当你使用这个专长时，你可以消耗2点耐力来无视掉所有攻击上的-2减值，持续1轮。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 132

Stable Gallop.name: Stable Gallop
Stable Gallop.description:
You run with a smooth and steady gait.

Prerequisites
Animal or magical beast.

Benefits
Your AC penalty when charging is halved. The penalties on ranged attacks made by your rider are reduced by 1 when you take a double move and by 2 when you run (minimum penalty of 0). Your rider gains a +4 bonus on concentration checks caused by your motion.

Stable Spell.name: Stable Spell
Stable Spell.description:
You can cast spells in areas of primal magic with less chance of triggering a primal magic event.

Benefits
In areas of primal magic, the chance of a stable spell triggering a primal magic event is reduced by 25%. In cases where a primal magic event would trigger despite the reduced chances, the caster of a stable spell receives a +2 bonus on the concentration check to avoid the primal magic event. A stable spell uses up a spell slot 1 level higher than the spell's actual level.

Stag Horns.name: Stag Horns
Stag Horns.description:
You've learned to gain the upper hand against your enemies by charging at them with feigned abandon, yet gaining a strong grip on them after attacking.

Prerequisites
Dex 13, Charging Stag Style, Dodge, Improved Unarmed Strike, Mobility.

Benefits
While using Charging Stag Style, if you make a successful unarmed attack at the end of a charge, you can attempt a free grapple check against the target of your charge without provoking an attack of opportunity.

Stag Submission.name: Stag Submission
Stag Submission.description:
You can quickly subdue an opponent you've charged using a special submission hold.

Prerequisites
Charging Stag Style, Dodge, Improved Unarmed Strike, Mobility, Stag Horns.

Benefits
When you are in Charging Stag Style and succeed at a combat maneuver check to pin a foe, you can choose to also knock the foe prone or to deal your unarmed attack damage to the foe.

Stage Combatant.name: 演武斗士 Stage Combatant
Stage Combatant.description:
专长类型：Combat

你是舞台上非致命战斗的大师。

先决条件: 武器专攻，基本攻击加值+5。

专长效果: 当你持用你所拥有“武器专攻”专长的武器时，你用该武器给对方造成非致命伤害或无伤害时不承受减值。

通常状况: 当进行造成非致命伤害或无伤害的攻击时，你的攻击检定-4。

资源出处: Ultimate Combat pg. 120

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Stage%20Combatant

战策增益：如果你的耐力池中还有1点耐力，在你使用你拥有武器专攻的武器做出不造成伤害的攻击时，你将会在攻击上获得+2加值。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 132

Staggering Blow.name: 恍惚一击 Staggering Blow
Staggering Blow.description:
专长类型：Combat

你知道如何将对手打得手脚麻木。

先决条件: 力量13，猛力攻击，暴击，基础攻击加值+8。

专长效果: 当你进行一次暴击攻击时，你可以选择在这次攻击检定上承受-2减值而发动恍惚一击。如果你的攻击检定成功，目标就必须通过一个（DC=10+你的角色等级的一半+你的力量调整值）的强韧豁免检定否则将陷入恍惚状态直到你的下一轮开始。如果这个生物从恍惚效果中恢复，那么他将在24小时内免疫本专长的效果。构装体生物，泥怪，植物，不死生物，虚体生物和免疫重击的死亡同样免疫这个专长的效果。

资源出处: Monster Codex pg. 20

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Staggering%20Blow

Staggering Fist.name: 恍惚拳 Staggering Fist
Staggering Fist.description:
专长类型：Combat

你巧妙的一击命中对手的秘孔，使他神智不清

先决条件: 敏捷13，感知13，精通徒手击打，基础攻击加值+2。

专长效果: 你必须在投掷攻击骰之前宣告使用此专长（因此，未命中会导致尝试失败）。恍惚拳在正常造成伤害的同时，还会强制受到你徒手击打伤害的敌人进行一次DC=10+1/2你的角色等级+感知调整值的强韧豁免检定。豁免检定失败的防御者将恍惚1轮。每4级你每天可以多尝试一次取力攻击，每轮不能超过1次。构装、泥怪、植物、不死、虚体生物和免疫重击的生物不会被本能力影响。

资源出处: Advanced Class Guide pg. 157

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Staggering%20Fist

战策增益：你可以消耗5点耐力来在你的徒手击打命中后宣告使用这个专长。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 132

Stalker's Focus.name: 追猎之力 Stalker's Focus
Stalker's Focus.description:
你对自然界的了解使你可以轻松模仿某一种动物的形态。

先决条件: 知识（自然）技能3级，生存技能3级，在拥有动物之力职业能力的职业上没有等级。

专长效果: 选择一种猎人的动物之力能力代表的动物，你或者你的动物伙伴（如果有）每天一次可以使用此动物之力一分钟。在使用动物之力时，将你的人物等级视为猎人等级来决定动物之力的效果。

特殊说明: 如果你在拥有动物之力职业能力的职业上获得了等级，那么选择这个专长将是你每日使用动物之力的时间增加1分钟。

资源出处: Advanced Class Guide pg. 157

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Stalker's%20Focus

Stalwart.name: 坚毅 Stalwart
Stalwart.description:
你调整好架势，能够吸收和偏移更多打击。

先决条件: 顽强，坚忍，基本攻击加值+4。

专长效果: 当你进行全防御动作、防御式战斗动作、或使用“寓守于攻”专长时，你能放弃本应获得的AC闪避加值，而是代之以等量的伤害减免，最大达到“5/-”，直到下轮开始。此伤害减免和你从职业特性中获得的减免叠加，譬如野蛮人；但不与其他任何类型的伤害减免叠加。若你失去AC的敏捷加值，你也失去上述伤害减免。

资源出处: Ultimate Combat pg. 121

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Stalwart

Stance of the Xorn.name: Stance of the Xorn
Stance of the Xorn.description:
You have heightened awareness of enemies on all sides.

Prerequisites
Wis 15, base attack bonus +3.

Benefits
Flanking creatures do not gain a +2 bonus to attack you (this does not prevent you from being sneak attacked or denied your Dexterity bonus). A condition that makes you lose your Dex bonus to AC also makes you lose the benefits of this feat.

Normal
Flanking opponents gain a +2 flanking bonus to hit.

Standing Tall.name: Standing Tall
Standing Tall.description:
You can tap into your family's old ways to take on some of the traits of plants.

Prerequisites
Be a member of House Fahlspar, or have the Hunter, Nature, or Tree Tender background.

Benefits
Once per day as a move action, you gain a +2 bonus on saving throws against mind-affecting effects for 1 minute.

Goal
Swear to protect a natural site and defend it for at least a year, including decisively defeating an appropriate number of invaders or despoilers.

Completion Benefit
You may now use the above benefit three times per day, and the benefit also applies on saving throws against paralysis, poison, polymorph, sleep, and stunning effects.

Starlight Summons.name: 星光召唤 Starlight Summons
Starlight Summons.description:
你所召唤的生物潜伏于星光的阴影之下。

先决条件: 法术专攻（咒法），能够施展‘召唤自然盟友’。

专长效果: 你召唤的生物获得‘盲斗’专长，在昏暗或者黑暗情况下的察觉检定和隐匿检定获得+5加值，并且他们的天生武器在克服伤害减免时视为寒铁武器。

【专长速查】盲斗（Blind-Fight）：对隐蔽的对手攻击失手后重骰。

资源出处: Ultimate Magic pg. 157

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Starlight%20Summons

Starry Grace.name: 优雅繁星 Starry Grace
Starry Grace.description:
专长类型：Combat

你快速且奔放地舞动着星刃，并以此做出致命且灵巧的攻击。

先决条件: 敏捷 13，武器娴熟，武器专攻（星刃）。

专长效果: 当你持用星刃（Starknife）时，能够用你的敏捷调整值替代力量调整值来修正武器的伤害。你的星刃必须与你的体型相符。当你使用两把武器进行战斗、使用疾风连击（flurry of blows）或者当另一只手因为其他原因而被占用时，便会失去上述好处。

此外，如果你具有派头（Panache）职业能力，那么只要你至少还有1点时髦值，便会在使用星刃进行攻击动作之后的移动动作中使移动速度获得+5加值，使用星刃进行跳跃攻击（Spring Attack）或冲锋（charge）之时也可以获得该加值。

资源出处: Ultimate Intrigue pg. 92

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Starry%20Grace

Startling Getaway.name: 惊愕诡步 Startling Getaway
Startling Getaway.description:
专长类型：Combat

你在突然现身并发起攻击后，能够围绕着敌人快速行动。

先决条件: 惊愕现身（Startling Appearance）职业能力。

专长效果: 在突袭轮（surprise round）期间，你对1名没有意识到你的存在的敌人做出攻击动作（attack action）之后，能够执行1个移动动作（move action）来移动。若你已经有能力在突袭轮中做出1个标准和1个移动动作的话，该专长不会提供任何额外的动作。

通常状况: 你在突袭轮中只能作出单个标准或移动动作。

资源出处: Ultimate Intrigue pg. 92

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Startling%20Getaway

Startling Shapechanger.name: Startling Shapechanger
Startling Shapechanger.description:
You use your shapechanging abilities in order to demoralize your enemies.

Prerequisites
Dazzling Display, change shape ability, shapechanger subtype.

Benefits
You abruptly change shape, startling those who aren't prepared for your reveal. Whenever you use your change shape ability to assume a new form or return to your true form, you can also use Dazzling Display as a free action. Reduce the result of your Intimidate check by 5 against opponents who know that you are a shapechanger. When using Dazzling Display in this manner, you can use the feat without needing a weapon in hand.

Special
A character with the wild shape class feature counts as having the change shape ability and shapechanger subtype for the purpose of meeting this feat's prerequisites. A character with wild shape can use this feat's benefit whenever she uses wild shape to assume a new form or return to her true form.

Startoss Comet.name: 散星击 Startoss Comet
Startoss Comet.description:
专长类型：Combat

你迅速锁定两个对手，分别对他们掷出一击。

先决条件: 敏捷13，近程射击，散星式，对所选武器拥有武器专攻专长。

专长效果: 以一个标准动作，你可以发动一次远程投掷攻击，使用你的最高基础攻击加值。如果你成功命中，那么你可以造成正常伤害并且同时可以立刻发动第二次攻击（同样使用最高基础攻击加值）来攻击最远以第一个目标为起点一个射程增量范围内的第二个目标。在第二次攻击时，你以你击中的第一个目标而不是你的位置来判断攻击起始点以决定掩蔽（Cover）的影响，你每轮只能以此方式发动一次额外攻击。如果你拥有暴击（Vital Strike）专长，那么你可以在第一次攻击时应用此专长的额外伤害（第二次则不可）。

资源出处: Weapon Masters Handbook pg. 15

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Startoss%20Comet

Startoss Shower.name: 散星流光 Startoss Shower
Startoss Shower.description:
专长类型：Combat

你可以对成群的敌人掷出死亡。

先决条件: 敏捷13，近程射击，散星击，散星式，对所选武器拥有武器专攻专长，基础攻击加值+4。

专长效果: 你使用散星击专长攻击命中一个敌人时，你可以继续攻击最远以你之前击中的任一目标为起点，一个射程增量范围内的其他目标。在第一次以后的攻击时，你以你击中的前一个目标而不是你的位置来判断攻击起始点以决定掩蔽（Cover）的影响。你可以以此方法发动的攻击次数等同于1+1次/（你每拥有5点基础攻击加值）。如果你拥有暴击（Vital Strike），精通暴击或高度暴击专长，那么你可以在第一次攻击时应用此专长的额外伤害（接下来的额外攻击则不可）。

资源出处: Weapon Masters Handbook pg. 15

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Startoss%20Shower

Startoss Style.name: 散星式 Startoss Style
Startoss Style.description:
专长类型：CombatStyle

你投出的武器比普通的暗器更为致命。

先决条件: 敏捷13，近程射击，对所选武器拥有武器专攻专长。

专长效果: 从投掷战士武器组中选择一件武器，当你开启此流派架势时，如果你持用这把武器发动攻击，那么你就会在伤害检定上获得加值，相当于2+（每个以散星流为先决条件的专长数量）x2（最高+6）。当你在副手持有任何武器和盾牌（除了小圆盾）时你无法获得本专长的好处。

特殊说明: 一个拥有武器训练（投掷武器）职业能力的角色可以使用任何投掷武器而非仅限于他所选的单件武器来获得此流派的好处。

资源出处: Weapon Masters Handbook pg. 15

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Startoss%20Style

Steadfast Mind.name: Steadfast Mind
Steadfast Mind.description:
You can concentrate even in the direst circumstances, and know how to retain your magic even when it would otherwise be wasted.

Prerequisites
Cha 15, Int 15, or Wis 15 (see special).

Benefits
Whenever you fail a concentration check while casting defensively and would normally lose a prepared spell or spell slot, you may attempt a Will save (DC = 15 + spell level) to retain the spell as though you had not attempted to cast it. The failed concentration check still results in the spell's failure, even if the spell is retained.

Special
To gain the benefits of this feat, you must meet the prerequisite that matches the ability score you use to determine your save DCs, bonus spells per day, and ability to cast spells of a given level. If you gain spells from multiple classes, you must meet the prerequisite ability score for each class to gain the benef its of this feat when casting spells from that class's spell list.

Steadfast Personality.name: 坚定常识 Steadfast Personality
Steadfast Personality.description:
作为一个理智牢固的常识人，没有什么稀奇古怪的东西能够影响你的判断。

专长效果: 在对抗影响心灵的意志豁免时，用你的魅力调整值代替感知调整值计算意志豁免的加值。如果你的感知调整值为负，则计算意志豁免加值时必须同时计算魅力调整值和感知调整值。

资源出处: Advanced Class Guide pg. 157

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Steadfast%20Personality

Steadfast Slayer.name: 孤胆侩子手 Steadfast Slayer
Steadfast Slayer.description:
专长类型：Combat

像传说中的屠龙者或巨人屠一样，你孤身一人对付那些远大于你的生物。

专长效果: 若你是唯一一个威胁目标的单位且你成功用双手近战武器击中目标，目标每比你大一个体型，你的伤害就+2。

资源出处: Melee Tactics Toolbox pg. 7

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Steadfast%20Slayer

Steady Engagement.name: 不动如山 Steady Engagement
Steady Engagement.description:
专长类型：Combat

先决条件：战斗反射，通行禁止，信仰义洛理

先决条件: 战斗反射，通行禁止，信仰义洛理。

专长效果: 如果你通过通行禁止专长阻止了敌人的移动，那么你可以以一个直觉动作对目标进行一次卸武或摔绊战技攻击。

资源出处: Inner Sea Gods pg. 216Faiths of Balance pg. 24

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Steady%20Engagement

战策增益：你可以消耗至多4点耐力来在你所尝试的任何作为不动如山一部分的战技检定获得加值，每消耗1点耐力获得1点加值。

战策资源出处: Weapon Master's Handbook pg. 25

Stealth Synergy.name: 协同隐藏 Stealth Synergy
Stealth Synergy.description:
专长类型：Teamwork

贴近一个盟友，你们可以像孪生的阴影一般行动。

专长效果: 当你可以看到一个或多个拥有此专长的盟友时，当你们进行隐匿检定，你们都可以取众人中最高的投骰并加上各自的加值作为检定结果。

资源出处: Ultimate Combat pg. 121

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Stealth%20Synergy

Stealthy (Mythic).name: 隐秘(神话) Stealthy (Mythic)
Stealthy (Mythic).description:
先决条件：隐秘

你的隐秘行动能力无人能够媲美。

神话专长效果：隐秘专长对逃脱与潜行技能检定带来的加值增加2点。此外，你能够花费1次神话之力，使得1次逃脱或者潜行检定就好像自然掷出20一般。你必须在进行检定之前决定使用该能力。

资源出处: Mythic Adventures pg. 75

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Stealthy

Steam Caster.name: 蒸汽术者 Steam Caster
Steam Caster.description:
你将元素之水灌入火焰法术之中，使之成为危险的蒸汽团。

先决条件: 水元素裔。

专长效果: 你能够将元素之力注入法术中，使你施放的火焰法术的施法时间增加至一个整轮动作（法术的正常施法时间等同于整轮动作或更长则无须增加）。该法术会被视为带有〔水〕描述符。改变后的法术，其所有的火焰效果都替换为滚热的蒸汽。改变后的法术如同正常在水下施法一般运作，但是无须进行施法者等级检定。与火焰不同，蒸汽无法点燃生物或物体。该法术仍旧造成火焰伤害，因此火焰抗力与免疫依旧适用于法术的效果。

资源出处: Advanced Race Guide pg. 178

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Steam%20Caster

Steam Spell.name: Steam Spell
Steam Spell.description:
You've built off of some of the closely-guarded secrets of the undine steamcasters, allowing you to use fire magic underwater easily.

Benefits
You can apply Steam Spell only to a spell with the fire descriptor. A steam spell works underwater without a caster level check, but it requires a caster level check to function above water. A steam spell uses up a slot the same spell level as the spell's actual level.

Steel Soul.name: 钢铁之魂 Steel Soul
Steel Soul.description:
你抵御魔法的能力很强。

先决条件: 矮人，【坚韧】种族特性。

专长效果: 在对抗法术以及类法术能力时，你的豁免获得+4种族加值。这取代了矮人的【坚韧】种族特性的正常加值。

通常状况: 正常情况下，矮人在对抗法术以及类法术能力时，豁免获得+2种族加值。

资源出处: Advanced Players Guide pg. 170

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Steel%20Soul

Steelskin Channel.name: 钢皮引导 Steelskin Channel
Steelskin Channel.description:
先决条件：引导能量7d6，信仰托拉格

先决条件: 引导能量7d6，信仰托拉格。

专长效果: 每天一次，当你引导正能量治疗活物时，你可以使被你所治疗的生物获得伤害减免，这些生物获得DR2/-(或增加DR2/-，如果他们已经拥有DR/-)，持续相当于你的魅力调整值分钟（至少一分钟）。

资源出处: Inner Sea Gods pg. 216

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Steelskin%20Channel

Stellar Wanderer.name: Stellar Wanderer
Stellar Wanderer.description:
You have gained Desna's trust, and she has taught you her realm's secrets.

Prerequisites
Character level 15, Knowledge (planes) 10 ranks.

Benefits
Once per week, you can use the pools of Cynosure to instantly transport yourself from Cynosure to any plane, as per plane shift.

Step of the Flighty Fey.name: Step of the Flighty Fey
Step of the Flighty Fey.description:
Your spell-like ability taps the magic and resilience of the First World.

Prerequisites
Gathlain, feather step spell-like ability.

Benefits
A creature under the effect of your feather step spell-like ability gains DR 1/cold iron for the duration of the effect. If you have at least 8 Hit Dice, the creature instead gains DR 2/cold iron, and if you have at least 16 Hit Dice, the creature instead gains DR 3/cold iron.

Step Up and Strike.name: 飞步进击 Step Up and Strike
Step Up and Strike.description:
专长类型：Combat

当地人试图移开的时候，你能够追上他并且进行一次攻击。

先决条件: 敏捷13，咄咄逼人，快步跟进，基本攻击加值+6。

专长效果: 当你使用“咄咄逼人”或者“快步跟进”专长跟随邻近的敌人时，你还能以最高的BAB进行单次近战攻击对抗该名敌人。这个攻击被计为你在该轮的一次借机攻击。使用本专长不计入正常每轮能够进行的动作数量。

通常状况: 正常情况下你只能进行一次标准动作和一次五尺快步。

资源出处: Advanced Players Guide pg. 170

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Step%20Up%20and%20Strike

战策增益：你可以消耗5点耐力来让使用这个专长做出的攻击并不计入当轮的借机攻击次数。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 132

Stick Together.name: 齐步走 Stick Together
Stick Together.description:
专长类型：CombatTeamwork

战斗中，你紧跟盟友的脚步。

专长效果: 当一个拥有该专长的邻接你的盟友移动时，你可以一个直觉动作移动最多等于你速度的距离，最终停留点必须仍邻接那位盟友。若你如此做，在你下一回合你将会恍惚。该种移动正常引发借机攻击。

资源出处: Melee Tactics Toolbox pg. 11

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Stick%20Together

Stick-Fighting Counter.name: Stick-Fighting Counter
Stick-Fighting Counter.description:
Using stick-fighting techniques both defensively and offensively, you can turn your parries into counterattacks.

Prerequisites
Stick-Fighting Style, base attack bonus +4.

Benefits
While you are fighting defensively, as a free action you can select an opponent you have attacked on that turn and prepare yourself to counter one of its attacks. Once per round, when that opponent attempts a melee attack against you and the attack misses, the attacker provokes an attack of opportunity from you, provided that it is within your threatened area. You must use a club, quarterstaff, dan bong, sap, or tonfa to perform the attack of opportunity.

Stick-Fighting Maneuver.name: Stick-Fighting Maneuver
Stick-Fighting Maneuver.description:
Your attacks with sticks have become blindingly fast, and you can throw in a combat maneuver between your attacks.

Prerequisites
Stick-Fighting Counter, Stick-Fighting Style, base attack bonus +6.

Benefits
When making a full attack using only clubs, a quarterstaff, dan bongs, saps, or tonfas, you can perform a combat maneuver as an extra attack using your full base attack bonus.

Stick-Fighting Style.name: Stick-Fighting Style
Stick-Fighting Style.description:
You know how to use batons, clubs, and sticks in new ways.

Prerequisites
Base attack bonus +1.

Benefits
When fighting with a club, quarterstaff, dan bong, sap, or tonfa with which you are proficient, you gain a +1 enhancement bonus on attack rolls as though it were a masterwork weapon. If the weapon actually is a masterwork weapon, it instead counts as having the blocking, disarm, distracting, performance, and trip special weapon qualities, even if the weapon normally doesn't have them.

Stock-Striker Style.name: Stock-Striker Style
Stock-Striker Style.description:
Your fighting technique makes you equally deadly with your firearm's stock as with its bullets.

Prerequisites
Pistol-whip gunslinger deed.

Benefits
When you perform the pistol-whip deed while using this style, you gain a +1 bonus on the attack roll and on the combat maneuver check to knock the target prone; this increases to +2 when you use a two-handed firearm. If you successfully knock the target prone, you do not provoke attacks of opportunity from the target until the end of your next turn when you make ranged attacks with your firearm. You can treat one-handed firearms as light weapons for the purpose of abilities such as Weapon Finesse when performing the pistol-whip deed.

Stock-Striker Sweep.name: Stock-Striker Sweep
Stock-Striker Sweep.description:
The force of your firearm strikes can drive back your foe or damage a second target.

Prerequisites
Stock-Striker Style, base attack bonus +7, pistol-whip gunslinger deed.

Benefits
When you are using Stock-Striker Style and successfully knock a target prone with the pistol-whip deed, as a swift action you can either push the target 5 feet away from you or perform the pistol-whip deed a second time against a foe that is adjacent to the first and within your reach. This second use of pistol-whip costs 0 grit points.

Stock-Striker Takedown.name: Stock-Striker Takedown
Stock-Striker Takedown.description:
Your melee strike leaves your target vulnerable to a merciless finishing shot.

Prerequisites
Point-Blank Shot, Stock-Striker Style, Stock-Striker Sweep, base attack bonus +9, pistol-whip gunslinger deed.

Benefits
After you knock a target prone with the pistol-whip deed while using Stock-Striker Style, you can fire one barrel of a loaded firearm you're wielding at the target as a move action; if your firearm has the scatter weapon quality, you can instead make a scattering shot so long as you include the target in the area of effect. For this attack, you take no attack penalty for making a ranged attack against a prone target, and the critical multiplier of your weapon increases by 1 (to a maximum of x5).

Stoic.name: 淡定 Stoic
Stoic.description:
你自己的经验告诉你，生活就是一系列无情的考验，并且恐惧本身是可以被克服的。

先决条件: 钢铁意志。

专长效果: 你在对抗恐惧效果的所有豁免检定中获得+1加值。如果你在对抗任何恐惧效果时成功豁免，你就会在24小时内对同一来源的恐惧效果免疫。[/spoiler]

资源出处: Inner Sea World Guide pg. 289Pathfinder Campaign Setting pg. 135

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Stoic

Stoic Pose.name: 雕像姿态 Stoic Pose
Stoic Pose.description:
你能够如同雕像一般使自己保持一个姿势，以回避他人的侦查。

先决条件: 地底侏儒。

专长效果: 通过花费5轮时间找到一个合适的位置，你能保持同一姿态，让你看起来像一个小型物体或者一堆岩石。只要你不进行移动或者其他动作，这就能使你能够在没有掩体或隐蔽时进行隐匿检定。

资源出处: Advanced Race Guide pg. 205

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Stoic%20Pose

Stone Awareness.name: Stone Awareness
Stone Awareness.description:
You can sense creatures touching earth or stone.

Prerequisites
Wis 13, Perception 10 ranks, stone giant.

Benefits
You gain tremorsense 15 feet when in contact with earth or stone, including worked stone, and gain all the benefits of the tremorsense universal monster ability.

Stone Cover.name: Stone Cover
Stone Cover.description:
You can use stone around you to help you avoid attacks.

Prerequisites
Wis 15, Stone Shroud, Stealth 6 ranks, dwarf, stonecunning racial trait.

Benefits
While in areas of rocky terrain or while underground, you can gain 10% miss chance as a swift action. Alternatively, you can take a moment to better position yourself and gain concealment as a move action. The miss chance or concealment you gain from this feat does not stack with similar effects and remains until the start of your next turn.

Stone Dodger.name: Stone Dodger
Stone Dodger.description:
By working with an ally to gauge the trajectory of incoming attacks, you can more easily avoid taking damage.

Benefits
Whenever you are able to see and hear at least one ally with this feat, you receive a +4 dodge bonus to AC against attacks from hurled rocks (or projectiles of similar shape, including bludgeoning ranged attacks from siege weapons). If you are hit by such an attack while you have this bonus, you can attempt a Reflex save to take only half damage from the attack. The DC for this save is equal to the bonus of the ranged attack used to hurl the rock.

Stone Magic.name: Stone Magic
Stone Magic.description:
Knowledgeable even among stone giant elders, you have unlocked greater mastery over earth and stone.

Prerequisites
Cha 17, stone giant elder (age 700 years or older).

Benefits
In addition to the usual spell-like abilities of a stone giant elder, you gain the ability to use passwall, spike stones, statue, stoneskin, and wall of stone once per day as spell-like abilities (caster level 10th, the save DCs are Charisma-based).

Stone Read.name: 阅岩术 Stone Read
Stone Read.description:
先决条件：在知识（地城）上拥有4个等级

先决条件: 在知识（地城）上拥有4个等级。

专长效果: 在地下与山地地形中，你在察觉检定上拥有+2加值。如果你在知识（地城）上拥有10个或更多等级，此加值上升到+6。

资源出处: Inner Sea Gods pg. 216Faiths of Purity pg. 25

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Stone%20Read

Stone Sense.name: 岩石感官 Stone Sense
Stone Sense.description:
你可以感觉到周围的泥土与岩石的运动。

先决条件: 精通岩石敏锐，察觉10级。

专长效果: 你获得10尺范围的＜颤动感知＞。

【特性速查】颤动感知（Tremorsense, Ex）：具有颤动感知能力的生物能够感觉到地面的震颤，它们可以自动辨别出到任何接触地面的东西的位置。具有颤动感知能力的水栖生物亦可感觉出在水中移动的生物的位置。此能力的有效范围在生物的描述中给出。

资源出处: Advanced Players Guide pg. 170

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Stone%20Sense

Stone Shroud.name: Stone Shroud
Stone Shroud.description:
Your connection to the earth allows you to find the perfect spot to hide among the stone.

Prerequisites
Wis 13, Stealth 1 rank, dwarf, stonecunning racial trait.

Benefits
You gain a +4 bonus on Stealth checks while in areas of rocky terrain or while underground.

Stone Singer.name: 岩之歌者 Stone Singer
Stone Singer.description:
你的歌声与自己的人民的行为方式和谐一致。

先决条件: 魅力13，【吟游表演】职业特性，矮人。

专长效果: 当你在地下使用带有听觉成分的吟游表演时，那么你所选择的吟游表演的范围或区域加倍，并且你可以影响处于新范围内，耳聋但是拥有颤动感知的生物。此外，无论你的吟游表演在哪里进行，土系亚种的生物在对抗你的吟游表演时，豁免DC提高2点。

资源出处: Advanced Players Guide pg. 171

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Stone%20Singer

Stone Soul.name: Stone Soul
Stone Soul.description:
You're so attuned to the earth that your skin can harden to the thickness of stone.

Prerequisites
Stone giant.

Benefits
Your natural armor bonus increases by 1. Once per day, you can use stoneskin (on yourself only) as a spell-like ability. Your caster level is equal to 1/2 your Hit Dice.

Special
You can take this feat up to three times. Each additional time you take this feat, the number of times you can use stoneskin per day increases by one.

Stone Strider.name: 越石迅步 Stone Strider
Stone Strider.description:
先决条件：熟悉岩石种族特性，信仰托拉格

先决条件: 熟悉岩石种族特性，信仰托拉格。

专长效果: 你可以穿越非魔法的碎石困难地形而不承受伤害、减速和其他业务困难地形而承受的减值。

资源出处: Inner Sea Gods pg. 216

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Stone%20Strider

Stone to Flesh Savant.name: Stone to Flesh Savant
Stone to Flesh Savant.description:
You can use your mercies to transform petrified victims back to flesh.

Prerequisites
Paladin level 12th, lay on hands class feature, mercy class feature.

Benefits
You gain a unique mercy, which aids victims of petrification. Whenever you use your lay on hands ability to heal damage, you can emulate stone to flesh on the target, using your paladin level as your caster level. This functions only on a creature that has been petrified, and it has no effect on other stone.

Stone-Faced.name: 岩石面容 Stone-Faced
Stone-Faced.description:
岩石的裂纹都比你的表情丰富。

先决条件: 矮人。

专长效果: 当你说谎或者隐藏你的情感或真正的动机时，唬骗检定获得+4加值，但是这个加值无法用于在战斗中进行虚招或者传递密语。此外，使用察言观色检定获取关于你的直觉的DC为25，而非20。

资源出处: Advanced Players Guide pg. 170

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Stone-Faced

Stone-Handed.name: Stone-Handed
Stone-Handed.description:
Drawing upon techniques to combat animated creatures, you bring a strike like an avalanche of stone.

Prerequisites
Str 13, Stunning Fist.

Benefits
Before making a melee attack with an unarmed strike, you can expend one use of Stunning Fist to declare a stone-handed strike. Resolve the attack normally, except your attack ignores an amount of the target's hardness equal to your monk level or one-quarter your base attack bonus (minimum 1), whichever is higher. This effect replaces other effects or conditions that would be caused by your Stunning Fist.

Stony Rampart.name: 塑石为墙 Stony Rampart
Stony Rampart.description:
专长类型：CombatConduit

你一声令下，随后岩石拔地而起为盟友提供掩护

先决条件: 知识（位面）3级。

专长效果: 以一个标准动作，你能在距你30尺范围内选择一个方格，并且沿该格任意一侧唤起一堵未经加工的石制矮墙，这堵墙长5尺，高3尺，厚2英寸，可看做一个低矮的障碍物（详见CRB中“战斗规则”中“战斗修正”中的掩蔽部分），石墙可以提供部分掩蔽。此专长所创造的5英尺长的石墙硬度为8点HP为30。你在知识（位面）上每拥有5个等级就能同时拥有1个上述石墙（最少1个）。石墙持续的轮数等于你在知识（位面）上的等级，超过时间后石墙会化为沙土。如果你在知识（位面）上有10或更多等级时，你能以一个标准动作启动该专长，并且启动时可以多消耗每日使用次数来同时创造相同数目的额外石墙。你每天能使用本专长的次数等于你的知识（位面）等级。

资源出处: Planar Adventures pg. 32

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Stony%20Rampart

Stony Step.name: 穿石步 Stony Step
Stony Step.description:
大地承认你的亲缘关系并且不再妨碍你的行动。

先决条件: 土元素裔。

专长效果: 每当你移动时，每轮你可以忽略5尺土地以及岩石造成的困难地形（碎石，石阶等等）。该专长的效果同类专长叠加，比如“神行步”或者“灵狐步”专长。该专长允许你在此类困难地形中使用五尺快步。

资源出处: Advanced Race Guide pg. 147

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Stony%20Step

Storm Breaker.name: Storm Breaker
Storm Breaker.description:
After the Eye of Abendego, no other storm, magic or mundane, can faze you.

Benefits
You are treated as two sizes larger than your actual size when calculating whether you can be moved by wind or currents, including the vortex and whirlwind special abilities of monsters. If you have at least 11 Hit Dice, you cannot be moved by nonmagical wind unless you so choose.

Storm of Arrows.name: Storm of Arrows
Storm of Arrows.description:
You can rain arrows upon a greater number of foes.

Prerequisites
Hail of arrows class feature.

Benefits
When using hail of arrows, you can target up to two targets for every arcane archer level you have.

Storm of Blades.name: 剑刃风暴 Storm of Blades
Storm of Blades.description:
你创造出一把类型与用于此法术材料成分的剑相同的浮空武器（例如细剑或弯刀），并用魔法驱动它们攻击目标。你每有2个施法者等级就可以创造出一把剑，在10级时最大5把。你和你的目标之间必须有效果线，并且目标必须在法术范围内。你为每把剑做一次远程攻击检定（没有射程增量和近战武器用于远程攻击的惩罚）; 每次攻击使用相同的重击范围和重击倍率以及伤害骰，如同用于花费的剑的标准类型。以此法术创造的剑会在攻击（或失手）他们的目标后消失。



资源出处: People of the Sands pg. 11

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/SpellDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Storm%20of%20Blades

Storm Soul.name: Storm Soul
Storm Soul.description:
Your attunement to storms grants you immunity to some of their effects.

Prerequisites
Cloud or storm giant.

Benefits
You gain immunity to electricity.

Storm Survivor.name: Storm Survivor
Storm Survivor.description:
You know how to survive and thrive in even the stormiest of weathers.

Prerequisites
Knowledge (nature) 2 ranks, Survival 2 ranks.

Benefits
When you are in a storm of any type, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus on Perception checks, Survival checks, and saving throws regarding adverse effects from the storm itself. If you have 10 or more ranks in one of these skills, this bonus increases to +4.

Storm Warrior.name: Storm Warrior
Storm Warrior.description:
Your weapons channel the fury of thunderstorms.

Prerequisites
Storm Soul, cloud or storm giant.

Benefits
You can transfer the power of storms from your body to any metal melee weapons you wield, dealing an additional 1d6 points of electricity damage.

Storm-Lashed.name: 风暴洗礼 Storm-Lashed
Storm-Lashed.description:
在暴雨与狂风之中度过的日子使你的身体在对抗这些元素时更加硬朗。

专长效果: 你可以免受许多恶劣天气带来的影响。在雨天（rainy conditions），你的可视距离只降低四分之一（而非一半）并且察觉检定只受到-2减值。在受到风力影响（wind effects）时，你的体型视为比正常大一级，并且将任何由强风引起的察觉检定的减值减半。最后，你在对抗闪电效果（electrical effects）时，豁免检定获得+2加值。

资源出处: Adventurers Guide pg. 184Pathfinder Campaign Setting pg. 133Inner Sea World Guide pg. 289

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Storm-Lashed

Stouthearted.name: Stouthearted
Stouthearted.description:
You fight back your fear by voicing the song in your heart.

Prerequisites
Raging song class feature.

Benefits
While you are maintaining a raging song, if you fail a saving throw against a fear effect, you can expend a round of performing to reroll your saving throw as an immediate action. You must keep this second result, even if it lower.

Strange Yield.name: Strange Yield
Strange Yield.description:
Your vines produce fruit with helpful properties.

Prerequisites
Craft (alchemy) 5 ranks, gathlain, racial fly speed.

Benefits
Your vines produce fruit with helpful properties. Once per day as a full-round action, you can withdraw a small fruit from your symbiotic vines. Roll d% to determine a Common Potion or Oil on Table 7-17: 1st-Level Potions and Oils on page 371 of Pathfinder RPG Ultimate Equipment; the fruit functions as the result of that roll. After 24 hours, the fruit loses its magic.

Strangler.name: Strangler
Strangler.description:
Throttling the life out of enemies is second nature to you.

Prerequisites
Dex 13, sneak attack +1d6, Improved Grapple, Improved Unarmed Strike.

Benefits
Whenever you successfully maintain a grapple and choose to deal damage, you can spend a swift action to deal your sneak attack damage to the creature you are grappling.

Street Carnage.name: 街霸残虐击 Street Carnage
Street Carnage.description:
专长类型：Combat

对你来说，城镇的街道也是可以削骨去肉的战斗利器。

先决条件: 力量 15，精通冲撞，精通徒手打击，猛力攻击，街霸流，街角霸王拳，BAB +8或武僧等级7级。

专长效果: 当你使用街霸流期间，徒手打击的重击倍率变为x3，以取代原本的x2。

资源出处: Ultimate Intrigue pg. 92

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Street%20Carnage

Street Smarts.name: 街头智慧 Street Smarts
Street Smarts.description:
你了解每一条街道，也熟悉这些街区的住民性格。

专长效果: 你的察言观色与知识（本地）检定获得+2加值，而且知识(本地)总是视为是你的本职技能。如果你在上述技能中投入了10点或更多技能点的话，那么对应技能获得的加值提升至+4点。察言观色检定获得的加值不会与警觉（Alertness）叠加。

资源出处: Ultimate Intrigue pg. 92

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Street%20Smarts

Street Style.name: 街霸流 Street Style
Street Style.description:
专长类型：CombatStyle

你能利用城市的环境带来战斗优势，猛击敌人并把它弹向建筑。

先决条件: 力量 15，精通冲撞，精通徒手打击，猛力攻击，BAB +4或武僧等级3级。

专长效果: 当你使用街霸流期间，每轮1次以迅捷动作，能够在徒手打击命中目标时，额外造成1d6点伤害，并对目标尝试1次冲撞战技（bull rush combat maneuver）。

特殊说明: 你只能在城市地形（urban terrain）启动街霸流的架势，当你离开城市地形后，该架势会立即终止。

资源出处: Ultimate Intrigue pg. 92

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Street%20Style

Street Sweep.name: 街角霸王拳 Street Sweep
Street Sweep.description:
专长类型：Combat

敌人被墙壁弹回后，会被你轻松击倒。

先决条件: 力量 15，精通冲撞，精通徒手打击，猛力攻击，街霸流，BAB +6或武僧等级5级。

专长效果: 当你使用街霸流期间，每轮第1次用徒手打击对1名敌人造成伤害时，如果该名敌人在你的上个回合开始后，被你用街霸流冲撞过的话，该名敌人必须进行1次强韧豁免（DC = 10 + 你的基本攻击加值），失败则会被击倒（knocked prone），而且恍惚（staggered）1轮。

资源出处: Ultimate Intrigue pg. 92

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Street%20Sweep

Strength in Defeat.name: Strength in Defeat
Strength in Defeat.description:
Half-drow tap into inner reserves, fighting even more fiercely when losing.

Prerequisites
Base attack bonus +1, darkborn half-elf.

Benefits
When reduced to half of your maximum hit points or fewer, you gain a +1 morale bonus on attack and damage rolls. This bonus increases to +2 at 8th level and to +3 at 15th level.

Strength of Obligation.name: Strength of Obligation
Strength of Obligation.description:
As a follower of Pao-Lung, you draw strength from your duties and obligations. You know that your every action has a great effect on the world around you, and that to falter is to threaten the spokes of the wheel of society.

Prerequisites
Must be devoted to the philosophy of Pao- Lung and not worship any deities.

Benefits
Once per day, you may swear an oath to accomplish a specific goal that has a clearly defined condition for success. While you are undertaking actions to fulfill this promise, you gain a +1 morale bonus on ability checks and skill checks directly related to achieving that goal. This bonus increases to +2 if the task in question is a responsibility that comes with a title or office you hold. If you ever fail to uphold a promise that you make, or are derelict in the duties of an office or title you hold, you lose the benefits from this feat and instead take a -1 penalty on ability checks, attack rolls, saving throws, and skill checks for 24 hours.

Strength of Wood.name: Strength of Wood
Strength of Wood.description:
You can draw strength from your woody vines to infuse your flesh with arboreal resilience.

Prerequisites
Con 13, gathlain.

Benefits
Once per day as a move action, you can harden your flesh to gain DR 5/slashing for 1 minute. If you have 11 or more Hit Dice, this increases to DR 10/slashing. Additionally, while under this effect, you gain a +2 bonus on saving throws against paralysis, polymorph, sleep, and stunning effects.

Stretched Wings.name: 展翅 Stretched Wings
Stretched Wings.description:
你的短翼变得更有力量。

先决条件: 力量13，技能专攻（飞行），鸮形人，【短翼】种族特性。

专长效果: 你的鸮形人种族飞行速度增加至60尺（机动性普通）。同时忽略【短翼】种族特性在向上飞行时的飞行检定要求。

资源出处: Advanced Race Guide pg. 201

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Stretched%20Wings

Strike Back (Mythic).name: 回击(神话) Strike Back (Mythic)
Strike Back (Mythic).description:
先决条件：回击

你那精确的反击能够削弱敌人在攻击距离上的优势。

神话专长效果：当你以准备动作进行近战攻击对抗你的近战触及范围之外的敌人时，你能够进行五尺快步靠近该名敌人。如果你花费1次神话之力，就能够以你的速度进行移动靠近敌人。上述移动都不会被算入你的回合内做出的移动。

资源出处: Mythic Adventures pg. 75

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Strike%20Back

Strike True.name: Strike True
Strike True.description:
Rather than attempting a series of wild blows, you line up a perfect attack.

Prerequisites
Combat Expertise, base attack bonus +6.

Benefits
You can focus yourself as a move action. When focused, you gain a +4 bonus on your next melee attack roll before the end of your turn.

Strong Comeback.name: 知错能改 Strong Comeback
Strong Comeback.description:
你从过去犯下的错误中学到很多东西。

专长效果: 每当你能够对一次属性检定、技能检定或豁免检定进行重骰时，重骰获得+2环境加值。

资源出处: Ultimate Combat pg. 121

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Strong%20Comeback

Strong Comeback (Mythic).name: 知错能改(神话) Strong Comeback (Mythic)
Strong Comeback (Mythic).description:
先决条件：知错能改

你不会犯下相同的错误。

神话专长效果：每当你能够对1次属性检定、技能检定、或者豁免检定进行重掷时，掷骰两次并取较高的结果，之后再应用知错能改专长赋予的加值。

资源出处: Mythic Adventures pg. 75

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Strong%20Comeback

Strong Implement Link.name: 灵器羁绊 Strong Implement Link
Strong Implement Link.description:
你与特定灵器具有强烈的联结，这让你能在未持有灵器时更有效地使用它的力量。

先决条件: 灵器（Implements）职业能力。

专长效果: 当你与你的灵器相距30尺之内时，则不需要尝试专注检定便能够施放与该灵器相关的法术。当你和灵器间的距离大于30尺的话，则专注检定的DC仅为15 + 法术环级。

正常：如果你要尝试施法，但是并没随身携带与该法术相关的灵器时，必须成功通过一次专注检定才能施放法术，检定DC为20 + 法术环级。

特殊说明: 你可以多次选取该专长。其效果不会叠加。每当你选取该专长时，都会将其效果应用至一个不同的灵器学派上。若你在单个学派上有多个灵器，则可以多次选择该学派；不过每次选择该专长而且选择该学派时，仅能将该专长的好处应用至属于该学派的不同灵器上。

资源出处: Occult Adventures pg. 141

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Strong%20Implement%20Link

Strongarm.name: Strongarm
Strongarm.description:
You are experienced at long-term intimidation of those you wish to exploit, and strike fear into the hearts of those you bully.

Prerequisites
Intimidating Prowess, member of the Lumber Consortium.

Benefits
When you use the Intimidate skill to improve a target's attitude, if your check result exceeds the DC by 5 or more, the target's attitude is improved for 5d6 hours. During this time, should it attack you, the target immediately becomes shaken for 1d6+1 rounds, as though it had been demoralized.

Stronghold.name: 坚实要塞 Stronghold
Stronghold.description:
专长类型：Story

你试图建造一座迟早要面对敌军侵袭的堡垒，如同礁石等待着海浪的冲击。

先决条件: 你必须拥有“领导力（Leadership）”专长，并统帅10名以上具有战斗力的追随者（譬如战士或游侠）。

专长效果: 你能够通过移动动作向军队下达命令，给予60尺内你所选定的生物以攻击检定+1士气加值、闪避AC+1、或单项豁免+1三者之一。所有生物必须获益于同一效果。你不能通过此方式为你无权指挥的同伴带来收益。这是一个依赖语言的影响心智效果。

专长目标: 建造或占据一座足以容纳200名军士的要塞，并为其征募100名以上具有战斗力且听命于你的士兵。此外你还必须为要塞储备足以应对围攻战6个月的粮食与饮水供给，以及足以支付军饷、维护军备达6个月的资金。

完成收益: 你的战斗指令加值增至+2，并且指令影响范围扩至120尺半径。此外，你可以向军队下达两项不同的指令。举例而言，你可以令弓箭手攻击检定+2，同时令前排步兵AC+2。

资源出处: Ultimate Campaign pg. 72

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Stronghold

Structural Strike.name: 解构刺击 Structural Strike
Structural Strike.description:
专长类型：CombatPanache

你知晓关于事物构成的知识，并以此找出了突破敌人守备的方法。

先决条件: 知识（工程）5级，精确刺击（precise strike）职业能力或精确刺击（precise strike）炫技。

专长效果: 在使用决斗家（Duelist）或游荡剑客（Swashbuckler）的精确刺击（precise strike）时，你能够以标准动作作出单次攻击，对抗1名原本免疫你的精确刺击伤害的敌人。若攻击命中，你会如常对该名敌人造成精确刺击伤害。当你使用游荡剑客的精确刺击炫技（deed）时，能够以迅捷动作（swift action）花费1点时髦值（panache point），使得单次攻击对通常来说免疫精确刺击的敌人造成常规（regular）的精确刺击伤害。若你同时具有上述两种职业能力，则可以从两种版本的精确刺击中选择任意一种，并造成全额伤害。

此外，在对抗具有一定概率免疫精确刺击伤害的敌人时（比如敌人穿戴着具有护命特殊能力的护甲），该专长会让敌人免疫精确刺击的概率降低10%。

资源出处: Ultimate Intrigue pg. 92

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Structural%20Strike

Stubborn Curse.name: Stubborn Curse
Stubborn Curse.description:
Your curses are particularly tenacious.

Prerequisites
Ability to cast a spell or spell-like ability with the curse descriptor, or a special ability with a curse effect.

Benefits
Any curse effect you create is difficult to remove. When a creature makes a caster level check to remove the curse, it must roll twice and take the worse result.

Student of Sulunai.name: 苏露奈门徒 Student of Sulunai
Student of Sulunai.description:
你在生活和工作等方面向苏露奈的神裔学习，意图在全国性的混乱中领导天京人民。你知道第二次机会会是救赎的契机。

先决条件: 神裔。

专长效果: 当一个目标在你周围30尺内重骰一次属性检定、豁免检定或技能检定时，你能以一个直觉动作给予他的新骰掷结果+2洞察加值。每日一次，你也可以将神恩（divine favor）作为一个类法术能力施放，以你的角色等级作为施法者等级。

资源出处: Heroes of the High Court pg. 19

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Student%20of%20Sulunai

Studied Combatant.name: 决斗智慧 Studied Combatant
Studied Combatant.description:
运用灵感分析，你在和对方交手之前就掂量出他的强弱何在。

先决条件: 智力13，业余调查员，基础攻击加值+6，在至少一项知识技能上拥有1个等级，在拥有灵感职业能力的职业上没有任何等级。

专长效果: 你可以通过一个移动动作，消耗1点灵感点数来分析一个你视野范围内的敌人，这样做可以让你在相当于你的智力调整值的轮数内对整个敌人在攻击检定上获得+2洞察加值，在伤害上获得+2加值。这个加值属于精准伤害且不会因为重击而翻倍。一旦一个生物被你分析，那么他在接下来的24小时内将免疫你的决斗智慧能力。

资源出处: Advanced Class Guide pg. 157

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Studied%20Combatant

Studied Expertise.name: Studied Expertise
Studied Expertise.description:
Your insight lingers within the minds of your allies.

Prerequisites
Inspirational expertise investigator talent.

Benefits
You can spend one use of inspiration as a swift action to grant allies within 30 feet that can hear you a +4  insight bonus on attack rolls against one type of monster for 1 round, provided you succeeded at a Knowledge check to identify that type of monster's special powers or vulnerabilities no more than 1 minute earlier.

Studied Spell.name: 格物法术 Studied Spell
Studied Spell.description:
专长类型：Metamagic

你靠着自身的学识突破目标的能量抗力和伤害减免。

专长效果: 当你施放格物法术时，从受到该法术影响的目标中指定1名。在你施放法术时，基于这个目标生物的生物类型，尝试1次合适的知识检定。此次检定的DC为20 + 该生物的CR（该CR要基于这个生物的种族，而不包括任何职业等级或模板），由职业等级来确定CR的生物在该能力中的有效CR为0。若你的检定成功，你的格物法术会忽略该目标通过种族而获得的任何能量抗力（energy resistance）或伤害减免（damage reduction）、以及对抗法术时生效的任何豁免检定加值；比如矮人（Dwarves）的坚韧（Hardy）种族特性或者半身人（Halflings）的半身人幸运（Halfling Luck）种族特性。你的格物法术不会忽略由于其他法术和效果而带来的能量抗力、伤害减免或豁免检定加值。若你的知识检定失败了，该法术仍会产生正常的效果。格物法术使用比法术的实际环级高2级的法术位。

资源出处: Ultimate Intrigue pg. 93

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Studied%20Spell

Stumbling Bash.name: 衰弱盾击 Stumbling Bash
Stumbling Bash.description:
专长类型：CombatShield Mastery

你的盾击可以使你的敌人步履蹒跚。

先决条件: 精通盾击，盾牌专攻，BAB+6或者战士4级。

专长效果: 被你盾击击中的生物AC承受-2减值，直至你的下一回合结束。

资源出处: Armor Masters Handbook pg. 19

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Stumbling%20Bash

Stunning Assault.name: 震慑强袭 Stunning Assault
Stunning Assault.description:
专长类型：Combat

你那强大却又不太精准的攻击能够震慑你的敌人。

先决条件: 力量13，猛力攻击，基本攻击加值+16。

专长效果: 你可以选择所有攻击检定与战技检定受到-5减值，来使得你的近战攻击命中的目标震慑1轮。成功的强韧豁免能够避免该效果，豁免DC为“10+你的BAB”。你必须在进行攻击检定之前选择使用这个专长，并且它的效果会持续至你的下一轮为止。

资源出处: Advanced Players Guide pg. 171

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Stunning%20Assault

战策增益：你可以消耗2点耐力来在你回合结束时而不是你的下一回合开始时结束这个专长的效果。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 133

Stunning Croak.name: 蛙鸣震荡 Stunning Croak
Stunning Croak.description:
你的鸣叫现在具有如此强大的能量，以至于足以使被它扫到的敌人失能。。

先决条件: 蛙鸣噪波，喉囊，沼蜍人，恐怖蛙鸣。

专长效果: 每当你使用恐怖蛙鸣能力时，你可以选择不造成这个能力原本的效果，而是震慑一个30尺内的生物1轮时间。如果目标成功的通过了强韧豁免检定，那么它只会恍惚一轮而非被震慑。这个能力的豁免DC与你的恐怖蛙鸣豁免DC相同。

资源出处: Monster Codex pg. 9

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Stunning%20Croak

Stunning Fist (Mythic).name: 震慑拳(神话) Stunning Fist (Mythic)
Stunning Fist (Mythic).description:
先决条件：震慑拳

凭藉着更强的效果与频率，你的拳头能够震晕所有敢挺身对抗你的人。

神话专长效果：你的震慑拳的DC增加，数值等同于你的阶层，而且你能够在同一轮内使用多次震慑拳。以自由动作，你能够花费1次神话之力来使用震慑拳，而不用花费你在当日的专长使用次数。

资源出处: Mythic Adventures pg. 75

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Stunning%20Fist

Stunning Fist Adept.name: 熟练震慑拳 Stunning Fist Adept
Stunning Fist Adept.description:
专长类型：Combat

你的震慑拳变得更加要命。

先决条件: 震慑拳、基本攻击加值+3。

专长效果: 对抗你震慑拳的DC+1，此专长不会和任何增加震慑拳DC的效果叠加。

资源出处: Dragon Empires Primer pg. 25

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Stunning%20Fist%20Adept

Stunning Irruption.name: Stunning Irruption
Stunning Irruption.description:
When you smash your way into a room, you gain more than just the element of surprise.

Prerequisites
Str 15, Power Attack, base attack bonus +5.

Benefits
Before starting combat, you can attempt to break through a door, window, or wall to enter a room. If you succeed, the violence of your arrival is so great that all characters within 20 feet of your entry point must succeed at a Fortitude saving throw (DC = 10 + your base attack bonus) or be stunned instead of acting in the surprise round (if there is one) plus 1 round thereafter. Characters who succeed at this save are instead shaken for 1d4 rounds.

Stunning Pin.name: 震慑压制 Stunning Pin
Stunning Pin.description:
专长类型：Combat

你能让被压制的对手暂时无力化。

先决条件: 精通擒抱，精通徒手打击，震慑拳。

专长效果: 当你在擒抱中压制住一个对手时，你能以迅捷动作将震慑拳效果施加在对方身上。

资源出处: Ultimate Combat pg. 122

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Stunning%20Pin

战策增益：你可以消耗5点耐力来一个自由动作而不是迅捷动作使用震慑压制。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 133

Stupefying Strike.name: Stupefying Strike
Stupefying Strike.description:
Your batter your foes with such disorienting force that they can't exert their full abilities.

Prerequisites
Dex 13, Wis 13, Improved Unarmed Strike, base attack bonus +8.

Benefits
When using this feat, in addition to dealing damage normally, you force a foe damaged by your unarmed attack to attempt a Fortitude save (DC = 10 + half your character level + your Wisdom modifier). If it fails, it loses its skill ranks and activated feats, such as Power Attack or Stunning Fist, for 1d4 rounds. You must declare you are using this feat before you make your attack roll; if you miss, the target is unaffected and your attempt is wasted. You can try to use Stupefying Strike once per day for every 4 character levels you have, but no more than once per round. Constructs, incorporeal creatures, mindless creatures, plants, undead, and creatures immune to critical hits can't be affected by this ability.

Stygian Spell.name: Stygian Spell
Stygian Spell.description:
Stygian spells forsake pure water for the memory-destroying tides of the River Styx.

Benefits
You can enhance any spell with the water descriptor that targets at least one creature to become a Stygian spell. Any creature successfully hit by a Stygian spell (if the spell requires an attack roll) or that fails its saving throw against a Stygian spell must succeed at a Will save (using the save DC of the original spell) or suffer the fugue lesser madness in addition to the spell's normal effects. If the attack is a confirmed critical hit or the original saving throw result is a natural 1, the creature must instead succeed at a Will save (again using the same DC) or suffer the amnesia greater madness. Madness gained this way lasts indefinitely, but can be treated using the normal methods for curing madness. This is a mind-affecting effect, and creatures native to the River Styx are immune to it.

A spell modified by this feat gains the evil descriptor. A Stygian spell uses a spell slot 2 levels higher than the spell's normal spell level. Spells with the good descriptor can't be Stygian spells.

Stylized Spell.name: 时髦法术 Stylized Spell
Stylized Spell.description:
专长类型：Metamagic

你能以独特的方式施放法术。

先决条件: 唬骗5级，法术辨识5级。

专长效果: 时髦法术和正常法术相比，其语言（verbal）和姿势（somatic）成分略有不同。在施放法术时鉴别时髦法术的法术辨识DC要比正常高10点。若使用知识(神秘)通过创造法术所使用的材料或者法术的效果来鉴别时髦法术的话，知识(神秘)DC也会比正常高10点，就如同使用高等侦测魔法（greater detect magic）辨别你的魔法署名（recognize your magical signature）一般。

当你将该专长应用至法术上时，能尝试将时髦法术掩饰成相同学派（school）和子学派（subschool）中具有相同描述符（descriptors）的其他法术。时髦法术（在受到超魔的调整前）必须与试图伪装成的法术具有相同的环级、或者比试图伪装成的法术低1级。若你这么做的话，时髦法术会获得诡计（ruse）描述符（见本书192页），而且会在某些表层表现（some superficial aspects）上呈现出与其他法术相同的形式。与其他具有诡计描述符（ruse descriptor）的法术一样，他人在鉴别该法术的尝试中失败10点或更少时，会将该法术错误地识别为你想要伪装成的法术（失败更多则会完全无法辨识法术）。时髦法术使用比法术的实际环级高1级的法术位。

资源出处: Ultimate Intrigue pg. 93

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Stylized%20Spell

Stylized Spell Mastery.name: Stylized Spell Mastery
Stylized Spell Mastery.description:
You have altered your understanding of a select number of spells

Prerequisites
Spell Mastery, Stylized Spell, Bluff 5 ranks, Spellcraft 5 ranks.

Benefits
You do not modify the spell slot used when applying the Stylized Spell metamagic feat to any spell you have mastered with Spell Mastery.

Normal
A stylized spell uses up a spell slot 1 higher than the spell's actual level.

Stylized Spontaneity.name: Stylized Spontaneity
Stylized Spontaneity.description:
You can modify your spells' apparent components and characteristics at a moment's notice.

Prerequisites
Bluff 5 ranks, Spellcraft 5 ranks.

Benefits
When you cast a spell, you can apply any number of the stylized magic modifications; however, you must succeed at a caster level check (DC = 5 + twice the spell's level + 5 per modification) or the magic is too badly warped to function and the spell is wasted with no effect

Subconscious Ursurpation.name: Subconscious Ursurpation
Subconscious Ursurpation.description:
You have trained your subconscious to overpower your conscious mind under dire circumstances.

Prerequisites
Base Will save bonus +2.

Benefits
You can attempt to force yourself to act normally while your conscious mind is impaired. At the start of any turn that you are under the effects of a compulsion, confusion, or possession effect, you can attempt a Will saving throw (DC = the original effect's save DC). If your saving throw is successful, you can perform one purely mental action (such as casting a psychic spell) as though you weren't under the effects of a compulsion, confusion, or possession effect. This mental action must be a free action, a swift action, a move action, or a standard action. All other actions that you take during the turn are subject to the compulsion, confusion, or possession effect.

Subjective Mobility.name: Subjective Mobility
Subjective Mobility.description:
You are master of your own gravity in planar realms where gravity is subjective.

Prerequisites
Wis 13.

Benefits
You automatically succeed at Wisdom checks to set a new direction of gravity. When you set a new direction of gravity, you can reduce your falling speed by up to twothirds (to a minimum of 50 feet on the first round and 100 feet per round thereafter) or increase it to a maximum of twice normal (300 feet on the first round and 600 feet per round thereafter). These effects only apply on planes with subjective directional gravity.

Subjective Slam.name: Subjective Slam
Subjective Slam.description:
When in control of gravity, you can use your momentum to cause brutal impacts, transforming the very act of falling into a devastating weapon.

Prerequisites
Con 13; Wis 13; Subjective Mobility; base attack bonus +4 or monk level 3rd.

Benefits
While on a plane with subjective directional gravity, you halve all damage you take from impacts (such as falling damage). While on such a plane, if your 'fall' would cause you to collide with a creature or object, you can slam into it with devastating force as a standard action. You must succeed at a touch attack to slam a creature or object, with a cumulative -1 penalty for every 50 feet of your current falling speed; at the GM's discretion, you can automatically hit vast objects such as walls. A creature or object hit by this slam takes 1d6 points of bludgeoning damage for every 50 feet of current falling speed, to a maximum of 6d6, and begins falling at your current speed according to your current subjective directional gravity.

Subtle Devices.name: Subtle Devices
Subtle Devices.description:
You are skilled at concealing your use of magic items with guile and deft tricks.

Prerequisites
Stealthy.

Benefits
When triggering a wand, staff or any other magic item, you can attempt a Stealth check (opposed by observers' Perception checks) to conceal the trigger from onlookers. If the magic item produces an obvious effect (such as a summoned creature or visible spell effect), you take a -4 penalty on the Stealth check, and even if your check is successful, observers still see the spell effect (though they fail to notice you are responsible for it).

Subtle Enchantments.name: 飘渺附魔术 Subtle Enchantments
Subtle Enchantments.description:
你的附魔系法术会以更加难以被人查知的方式潜移默化地影响目标。

先决条件: 诈欺师，法术专攻（惑控）。

专长效果: 当你施放附魔系法术（enchantment spell）或者使用附魔系类法术能力（enchantment spell-like ability）来影响1名生物的态度或行动时，而且敌人以1次成功的意志豁免来抵御法术的话，她有50%的概率不会注意到自己刚刚成功进行了1次豁免（她仍旧可以如常鉴别你的法术或类法术能力）。若敌人在豁免中失败了，或者以其他方式受到了法术的影响，那么察觉该名敌人正处于附魔系效果影响之中的察言观色DC会增加5点。

通常状况: 任何人在成功豁免法术时，都会自动意识到精神遭受了侵袭。

资源出处: Ultimate Intrigue pg. 93

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Subtle%20Enchantments

Subtle Poisoner.name: Subtle Poisoner
Subtle Poisoner.description:
You have mastered the art of stealthily and quickly preparing a poisoned weapon.

Prerequisites
Sleight of Hand 5 ranks.

Benefits
Whenever you draw a weapon, you can apply poison to the weapon as part of the same action. To do so, you must already have the poison in hand and must succeed at a DC 20 Sleight of Hand check. Success means the dose of poison is expended and you poison the weapon without drawing attention to your act. This check is in addition to any other Sleight of Hand checks you attempt to perform the action (such as to draw a hidden weapon). Failure means any creatures present can immediately attempt opposed Perception checks to notice your poisoning attempt. If you fail the check by 5 or more, you also expose yourself to the poison unless you have an ability that would prevent accidental poisoning, such as an alchemist's poison use ability.

Summon Evil Monster.name: Summon Evil Monster
Summon Evil Monster.description:
You can summon the aid of creatures driven their very nature to destroy goodness.

Prerequisites
Evil alignment.

Benefits
When casting summon monster, you also have access to the list of evil monsters on this page. When summoning a creature from this list, your debased nature allows you to cast the spell as a standard action. The summoned creature appears as normal for the spell but can't act until next your next turn. It is not flat-footed, however, and it can make attacks of opportunity as normal. These effects don't apply for creatures from the standard list that aren't also on this list.

Special
If you possess the Sacred Summons feat, you can apply it to a creature on this list whose alignment (as opposed to its subtype or subtypes) matches your aura.

Summon Good Monster.name: Summon Good Monster
Summon Good Monster.description:
You can summon the aid of creatures driven by their very nature to destroy evil.

Prerequisites
Good alignment.

Benefits
When casting summon monster, you also gain access to the list of good monsters below. Your righteous determination grants these summoned creatures the Diehard feat. You may still summon creatures from the standard list, but without the Diehard feat.

Summon Guardian Spirit.name: 呼神守卫 Summon Guardian Spirit
Summon Guardian Spirit.description:
一个守护灵选择了你作为它的受监护人。

先决条件: 使用三级召唤怪物或者三级自然盟友的能力。

专长效果: 选择一个可以作为进阶魔宠的生物，并添加守护灵模板。将这个生物作为一个召唤生物加入你的三级召唤怪物和三级召唤自然盟友的列表。当你召唤你的守护灵时，法术的持续时间为1分钟/等级。一个守护灵总是那个特定的生物，拥有它被召唤期间发生的所有事件的记忆；无法召唤复数个守护灵。如果它在被召唤期间死亡，24小时内它无法被再次召唤。

如果你能够释放更高等级版本的召唤怪物或者召唤自然盟友法术，你可以通过一个仪式协调守护灵与更高等级版本的法术。这也允许你更改根据召唤它的法术所获得的所有能力的选择。这个仪式持续24小时，一旦完成，它会将守护灵移动到更高等级版本的召唤法术列表中。

资源出处: Monster Summoners Handbook pg. 26

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Summon%20Guardian%20Spirit

Summon Neutral Monster.name: Summon Neutral Monster
Summon Neutral Monster.description:
You can summon creatures that embody the forces of balance.

Prerequisites
Chaotic neutral, lawful neutral, or neutral alignment.

Benefits
When casting a summon monster spell, you gain access to the list of neutral creatures on this page. You may also summon creatures from the standard summon monster list and apply the counterpoised creature simple template (see the sidebar) to applicable creatures instead of the celestial or fiendish template. Creatures you summon from the list on this page and creatures you summon with the counterpoised template gain a +2 resistance bonus on Will saves.

1st Level
Sprite (CN)
Stirge (N)

 

2nd Level
Atomie (CN)
Brownie (N)

 

3rd Level
Arbiter (inevitable) (LN)
Nosoi (psychopomp) (N)
Paracletus (aeon) (N)
Thoqqua (N)
Voidworm (protean) (CN)

 

4th Level
D'ziriak (N)
Magmin (CN)
Mephit (any) (N)
Satyr (CN)
Shae (N)

5th Level

Mercane (LN)
Rast (N)
Tojanida (N)

 

6th Level
Chaos Beast (CN)
Invisible stalker (N)

7th Level
Axiomite (LN)
Jyoti (N)
ShokiISB (psychopomp) (N)
Zelekhut (inevitable) (LN)

 

8th Level
Imentesh (protean) (CN)

 

9th Level
Akhana (aeon) (N)
Morrigna (psychopomp)
Valkyrie (CN)

Counterpoised Creature (CR +0 or +1)
Counterpoised creatures dwell in the Outer Planes where balance between elements or ideologies is paramount, but they can be summoned using spells such as summon monster and planar ally. A counterpoised creature's CR increases by 1 only if the base creature has 5 or more Hit Dice. A counterpoised creature's quick and rebuild rules are the same.

Rebuild Rules
Senses gains darkvision 60 ft.; Defensive Abilities gains DR and energy resistance as noted on the table; SR gains SR equal to new CR +5; Special Attacks smite bias 1/day as a swift action (adds Cha bonus to attack rolls and damage bonus equal to HD against a foe that is chaotic evil, chaotic good, lawful evil, or lawful good; smite persists until the target is dead or the counterpoised creature rests).

Counterpoised Creature Defenses

Hit Dice Resist Cold, Electricity, and Fire DR
1-4 5 --
5-10 10 5/adamantine
11+ 15 10/adamantine

Summon Plant Ally.name: Summon Plant Ally
Summon Plant Ally.description:
You can call plant creatures to your aid in battle.

Prerequisites
Knowledge (nature) 1 rank, ability to cast summon nature's ally spells.

Benefits
When casting a summon nature's ally spell, you gain access to the list of plant creatures below.

Summon nature's ally I
Leaf leshy, vegepygmy.

Summon nature's ally II
Gourd leshy, leaf ray (without seed ability).

Summon nature's ally III
Fungus leshy, weedwhip.

Summon nature's ally IV
Assassin vine, seaweed leshy (without air cyst ability).

Summon nature's ally V
Mandragora, shambling mound.

Summon nature's ally VI
Tendriculos, treant.

Summon nature's ally VII
Giant flytrap.

Summon nature's ally VIII
Jinmenju.

Summon nature's ally IX
Alraune.

Summoner's Call.name: 召唤师呼唤 Summoner's Call
Summoner's Call.description:
每当你召唤自己的幻灵，它会在短时间内变得更为强大。

先决条件: 【幻灵】职业特性。

专长效果: 每当你召唤你的幻灵，你能够使其的力量，敏捷或者体质获得+2增强加值。这个加值会在召唤仪式完成后持续10分钟。

资源出处: Advanced Players Guide pg. 171

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Summoner's%20Call

Sun Striker.name: 烈日刀 Sun Striker
Sun Striker.description:
专长类型：CombatCritical

先决条件：重击专攻，武器专攻（弯刀），人物等级7，信仰沙莱伦

先决条件: 重击专攻，武器专攻（弯刀），人物等级7，信仰沙莱伦。

专长效果: 当你对一个不死生物确认重击时，你忽略它的所有伤害减免，因为虚体特性而获得的特殊防御，并且你的武器视为拥有焰爆附魔品质。

资源出处: Inner Sea Gods pg. 217

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Sun%20Striker

战策增益：当你对一个不死生物威胁了一次重击时，你可以消耗至多4点耐力来在确认重击时获得加值，每消耗1点耐力获得1点加值。

战策资源出处: Weapon Master's Handbook pg. 25

Sunblade.name: Sunblade
Sunblade.description:
You can channel your deity's solar wrath through your blade.

Prerequisites
Word of Healing, paladin level 5th, worshiper of a deity that grants the Fire or Sun domain.

Benefits
You can expend a use of lay on hands as a standard action to launch a blast of flame from your weapon. This acts as the kineticist's fire blast (Pathfinder RPG Occult Adventures 15), with an effective kineticist level equal to your paladin level - 4. You do not need a free hand to use this ability, but you must be wielding a manufactured melee weapon. You use your Charisma modifier instead of your Constitution modifier to determine the blast's damage. This blast cannot be modified by infusions or other effects that specifically improve a kineticist's blast, even if you have them from other classes.

Sunder Blessing.name: Sunder Blessing
Sunder Blessing.description:
Your disdain for authority allows you to tear away the blessings of the gods.

Prerequisites
Disruptive, fighter level 8th.

Benefits
You can attempt to sunder an ongoing divine spell effect or divine spell-like ability by succeeding at a combat maneuver check. For any effect other than one on a creature, you must succeed at a combat maneuver check against a CMD of 15 + the effect's caster level. To sunder an effect on a creature, you must succeed at a normal sunder combat maneuver check against the creature's CMD + 5, ignoring any miss chance caused by a spell or spell-like ability. On a success, you suppress the effect for 1 round. If you exceed the CMD by 5 or more, you suppress the effect for 2 rounds. If you exceed the CMD by 10 or more, the effect is dispelled instead. If you fail to sunder a spell, you cannot attempt to sunder that effect again for 1 minute.

Sundering Strike.name: 破武重击 Sundering Strike
Sundering Strike.description:
专长类型：Combat

你的重击能够击破敌人的武器。

先决条件: 力量13，精通破武，猛力攻击，基本攻击加值+9。

专长效果: 当你的近战攻击成功重击时，除了攻击正常造成的伤害之外还能够击破敌人的武器。如果你的重击确认检定超过了敌人的CMD，那么你能够击破敌人的武器，就如同进行了破武战技检定一般（单独对武器进行正常的伤害检定）。这不会引起借机攻击。

特殊说明: 你只能将后述专长中的一个应用在一次确认的重击上：冲撞重击，移位重击，破武重击，卸武重击或者绊摔重击。你可以在重击确认检定之后选择使用该专长。

通常状况: 你必须进行破武战技检定才能击破敌人的武器。

资源出处: Advanced Players Guide pg. 171

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Sundering%20Strike

战策增益：当你在近战攻击的重击确认中失败时，你仍可以消耗2点耐力来尝试击破目标的武器。当你这样做时，重投确认骰，并使用它来决定破武尝试是否达到了目标的CMD。该重投只能被用来进行破武战技，它不能让重击确认。你仍不能对免疫重击的目标做出该尝试。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 133

Sunlight Summons.name: 日光召唤 Sunlight Summons
Sunlight Summons.description:
你所召唤的生物闪耀着太阳的光辉。

先决条件: 法术专攻（咒法），能够施展‘召唤自然盟友’。

专长效果: 你所召唤的生物如同被施展了‘光亮术’一般散发着光芒。他们免疫目盲和目眩效果，并且他们的天生武器在克服伤害减免时视为魔法武器。

资源出处: Ultimate Magic pg. 157

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Sunlight%20Summons

Sunlit Strike.name: Sunlit Strike
Sunlit Strike.description:
Your melee blows deal extra damage to creatures sensitive to light, making you adept at hunting foul monsters of the night.

Prerequisites
Arcane Strike, able to prepare or cast daylight.

Benefits
Whenever you successfully hit an enemy that is vulnerable to light (such as by the light blindness, light sensitivity, or sunlight powerlessness universal monster rules) with a melee weapon you've imbued with your Arcane Strike feat, you deal an additional 1d6 points of damage to the target of your attack. The struck creature must also succeed at a Fortitude saving throw (DC 10 + your character level + your Strength modifier) or become staggered for 1 round.

Superintendent.name: Superintendent
Superintendent.description:
You have a nearly endless arsenal of tricks and methods to keep your buildings in top shape.

Prerequisites
Own at least one room.

Benefits
When a room you own gains the broken condition, you may repair it for half the normal cost in gold pieces and other capital, rounded up (see page 90 of Ultimate Campaign). Additionally, buildings and organizations you've created are not affected by capital attrition (see page 81 of Ultimate Campaign) until 1 month of your absence. From that point, capital attrition affects your buildings and organizations as normal.

Superior Dirty Trick.name: 至高阴招 Superior Dirty Trick
Superior Dirty Trick.description:
专长类型：Combat

你将一个阴招技巧练习的炉火纯青，神都恶心。

先决条件: 智力13，重击专攻，寓守于攻；精通阴招APG，高等阴招APG，基础攻击加值+8。

专长效果: 选择一个阴招战技可能造成的不良状态，如目盲或纠缠，你的阴招战技的目标在承受该效果影响时必须要花费一整轮时间来解除这个效果。

特殊说明: 你可以多次选择本专长，每次你选择本专长时，选择一种不同的不良效果。

资源出处: Dirty Tactics Toolbox pg. 15

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Superior%20Dirty%20Trick

Superior Gathlain Magic.name: Superior Gathlain Magic
Superior Gathlain Magic.description:
Your experience has enabled you to dramatically develop your innate magical abilities.

Prerequisites
Cha 17, Advanced Gathlain Magic, Greater Gathlain Magic, character level 15th, gathlain.

Benefits
You gain the following spells as spell-like abilities, each usable 1/day: liveoak, tree stride.

Superior Scryer.name: 优秀探测者 Superior Scryer
Superior Scryer.description:
你能在进行探知时看到更多的信息。

先决条件: 法术专攻（预言），至少能够施放1个探知子学派（scrying subschool）法术的能力。

专长效果: 当你施放探知系法术（scrying spell）时，无论你本身是否具有黑暗视觉（darkvision）、或者法术在正常情况下是否允许你使用黑暗视觉进行观察，你通过法术的感受器（sensor）进行观察时都会视为具有60尺黑暗视觉（darkvision）。如果法术传回的感觉信息仅限于感受器周围10尺范围之内时，比如探知（Scrying）和高等探知（Greater Scrying）法术，该专长便无法增加它能探知的范围。当你通过探知感受器进行观察时，察觉事物（notice things）的察觉检定会获得+2加值；你的窥视魔眼（Prying Eyes）与昆虫探子*（Insect Spies）也会在察觉检定中获得+2加值。

在使用探知（Scrying）或高等探知（Greater Scrying）法术时，你正在使用的法术能通过感受器运作的概率增加10%。

资源出处: Ultimate Intrigue pg. 94

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Superior%20Scryer

Superior Summoning.name: 高等召唤 Superior Summoning
Superior Summoning.description:
你可以召唤更多的生物。

先决条件: 增强召唤，施法者等级3级。

专长效果: 每当你施法一个召唤法术并且召唤出超过一个生物时，所召唤生物的总数增加一个。

资源出处: Ultimate Magic pg. 157

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Superior%20Summoning

Supernal Feast.name: Supernal Feast
Supernal Feast.description:
You sup on the blood of your ancestors to fuel your fury.

Prerequisites
Con 15, aasimar.

Benefits
Whenever you are adjacent to a good outsider that takes bleed or blood drain damage, you gain 1 temporary hit point as you bathe in the celestial being's gore. Furthermore, as a full-round action, you can feast on the fallen body of a good outsider that has been dead no longer than 24 hours. When you do, you regain 1 temporary hit point per Hit Die the outsider possessed at a rate of 1 hit point per minute. Temporary hit points gained from this feat last 1d4 hours.

Supernatural Spy.name: Supernatural Spy
Supernatural Spy.description:
Your familiarity with magic drives you to discover a great supernatural secret. You might work with an eldritch organization, which could be a school of magic such as the Arcanamirium or part of a government with strong ties to magic such as that of Irrisen, or you might attempt to keep your magical inquiries hidden from your employers.

Prerequisites
Alchemist discovery, arcane discovery, arcanist exploit, or magus arcana class feature and you must either have observed a created magical effect you could not understand or have the Master Craftsman or the Unquenchable Hunger for Knowledge background.

Benefits
Treat your Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma score as 2 higher for the purpose of calculating the effects and save DCs of one of the following class features: alchemist discoveries, arcane discoveries, arcanist exploits, or magus arcana. You select both the ability score and class feature to be affected when you select this feat, and the choice cannot be changed. This increases the potency of the abilities but does not grant access to additional abilities.

Goal
Learn a great supernatural secret, connected in some manner to an aspect of the class feature you selected with this story feat. You must evade or thwart a challenging foe in the process.

Completion Benefit
When calculating the effect of the class feature selected with this feat, you treat your class level for the relevant class as 2 higher.
