For example, if you applied this feat to arsenic (which has a frequency of 1/minute for 4 minutes), you could increase the frequency to 1/round for 4 rounds or decrease the frequency to 1/hour for 4 hours.

Tracer Fire.name: Tracer Fire
Tracer Fire.description:
You highlight the path of your projectile with light, allowing your allies to better spot the target.

Prerequisites
Point-Blank Shot, Precise Shot.

Benefits
As a standard action, you can make a single ranged attack at your highest base attack bonus with an illuminated throwing weapon or piece of ammunition, such as a flaming shuriken or an arrow imbued with a magical light effect. If the attack hits its target, attacks against the same target gain a +2 circumstance bonus for 1 round, so long as those attacks originate in dim light or darker areas. The target counts as being in bright light until the projectile is removed or extinguished. Removing the projectile is a move action that provokes an attack of opportunity.

Trade Initiative.name: Trade Initiative
Trade Initiative.description:
You're an expert at helping your partner respond faster, and vice versa.

Benefits
After initiative is rolled but before enemies' initiative is revealed, you may trade the results of your die roll (not including modifiers) with an adjacent ally who also possesses this feat.

Traditional Weapons.name: Traditional Weapons
Traditional Weapons.description:
You're a master of utilizing simple, time-trusted arms against strange or technological weapons.

Prerequisites
Int 13.

Benefits
You receive a +2 bonus on combat maneuver checks against creatures wielding exotic weapons, firearms, or technological weapons (see Pathfinder Campaign Setting: Technology Guide). You also receive a +2 bonus to your CMD whenever an opponent attempts any combat maneuver against you while wielding such a weapon. You gain these bonuses only if you are not wielding an exotic weapon, firearm, or technological weapon.

Trailblazing Channel.name: 寻路引导 Trailblazing Channel
Trailblazing Channel.description:
先决条件：引导能量3d6，信仰戴斯娜

先决条件: 引导能量3d6，信仰戴斯娜。

专长效果: 每天一次，当你引导正能量治疗活物时，你可以使他们无视困难地形的影响，效果持续相当于你的魅力调整值分钟。

资源出处: Inner Sea Gods pg. 217

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Trailblazing%20Channel

Train Plants.name: Train Plants
Train Plants.description:
After years of practice, cautious experiments, or sheer stubbornness, you have gained the ability to teach unintelligent plant creatures to follow simple commands.

Prerequisites
Handle Animal 5 ranks, Knowledge (nature) 5 ranks.

Benefits
A character with this feat treats creatures of the plant type with Intelligence scores of 3 or lower as animals for the purposes of the Handle Animal skill. Plant creatures without an Intelligence score are treated as animals with an Intelligence of 1 for these purposes. Ordinary plants lack Wisdom and Charisma scores--they aren't creatures and can't be trained.

Trample (Mythic).name: 践踏(神话) Trample (Mythic)
Trample (Mythic).description:
先决条件：践踏

你驯养的坐骑能够使用双蹄践踏地上的敌人。

神话专长效果：若敌人被你的闯越击倒，你的坐骑能够对他进行两次蹄击（hoof）攻击，以取代原本的1次。当这些蹄击攻击引起1次或更多次重击时，你能够花费1次神话之力。若你这么做，重击会自动确认。若两次都引起重击，花费1次神话之力会使两次都自动确认。

资源出处: Mythic Adventures pg. 75

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Trample

Trap Wrecker.name: 陷阱破坏者 Trap Wrecker
Trap Wrecker.description:
别人解除陷阱，你砸烂陷阱。

先决条件: 猛力攻击，解除装置1级，兽人。

专长效果: 你可以通过一次近战武器攻击而不是解除装置检定来拆除陷阱。以一个整轮动作，进行一次对抗AC为陷阱的解除装置DC的近战攻击。若你命中，进行伤害检定。若伤害至少为陷阱解除装置DC的一半，你成功解除该陷阱。若伤害低于陷阱解除装置DC的一半，陷阱被触发。你只能对非魔法陷阱进行如是尝试。你的攻击必须能够触及陷阱的一部分才能使用该专长。根据GM的描述，某些陷阱不适用于该专长。

资源出处: Advanced Race Guide pg. 142

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Trap%20Wrecker

Trapper's Setup.name: 陷阱师设置 Trapper's Setup
Trapper's Setup.description:
你在等待时机、在恰当时分触发陷阱这一点上颇有天分。

先决条件: 工艺（陷阱）5级。

专长效果: 当你手动触发一个针对敌人的陷阱时，该陷阱的攻击检定或豁免DC获得+2环境加值。

资源出处: Ultimate Combat pg. 122

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Trapper's%20Setup

Traumatic Spell.name: 创伤法术 Traumatic Spell
Traumatic Spell.description:
专长类型：Metamagic

被你的法术伤害的生物会在夜间重温它的恐怖。

专长效果: 创伤法术会让受术生物承受无法忘却的痛苦。当一名生物在对抗创伤法术的豁免检定中失败后，则当它再次入睡（sleeps）时，必须进行一次DC与原始法术的DC相同的意志豁免，失败则会如同受到梦魇（Nightmare）法术一般。每当目标在该豁免中失败后，则必须在接下来的夜晚再次进行豁免，失败则会受到另一个梦魇（Nightmare）法术影响，不过该豁免DC在第一夜之后每夜会递减2点。这个超魔专长仅能应用至具有情绪（emotion）或恐惧（fear）描述符的法术。创伤法术使用比法术的实际环级高2级的法术位。

资源出处: Occult Adventures pg. 141

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Traumatic%20Spell

Traumatic Spell-Like Ability.name: Traumatic Spell-Like Ability
Traumatic Spell-Like Ability.description:
Your spell-like ability causes affected targets to relive their torments in nightly terrors.

Prerequisites
Spell-like ability at caster level 6th or higher.

Benefits
Choose one of your spell-like abilities, subject to the restrictions described in this feat. You can use the chosen spell-like ability as a traumatic spell-like ability three times per day (or less, if the ability is normally usable only once or twice per day).

When you use a traumatic spell-like ability, affected targets must succeed at an additional Will saving throw the next time that they sleep (DC = the spell-like ability's DC) or be affected as per nightmare. Each time the target fails its save, it must save again the following night or be affected by another nightmare, though the save DC decreases by 2 each night after the first. This feat can be applied only to spelllike abilities with the emotion or fear descriptor. Targets that avoid the spell-like ability's effects avoid this feat's effect as well.

You can only select a spell-like ability duplicating a spell with a level less than or equal to 1/2 your caster level (round down) - 2. For a summary, see Table 3-1.

Special
This feat can be taken multiple times. Each time it is taken, you can apply it to a different spell-like ability.

Spell Level Caster Level1 Caster Level2
0 2nd 4th
1st 4th 6th
2nd 6th 8th
3rd 8th 10th
4th 10th 12th
5th 12th 14th
6th 14th 16th
7th 16th 18th
8th 18th 20th
9th 20th -

1 Bouncing, disruptive, intensified, lingering, or scarring ability.
2Fearsome, sickening, or traumatic ability.

Treacherous Toxin.name: 阴损之毒 Treacherous Toxin
Treacherous Toxin.description:
你在敌人的伤口中翻转涂毒的武器，让它快速流入血液系统。

先决条件: 基础攻击加值+5，偷袭（Sneak Attack）职业能力。

专长效果: 每当你使用一件施加了毒药的武器进行偷袭攻击时，你都可以选择放弃偷袭造成的额外伤害而选择强化毒药的威力。你的偷袭伤害每有+1d6，这个换取的DC就增加+1。但是，本专长的效果不会让毒药的DC增加到超过15+你的角色等级的一半。

资源出处: Dirty Tactics Toolbox pg. 6

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Treacherous%20Toxin

Treant's Call.name: Treant's Call
Treant's Call.description:
You have learned some words of the mystic language treants use to call trees to their defense.

Prerequisites
Cha 17, ability to cast speak with plants, character level 13th, gathlain.

Benefits
You can cast liveoak once per day as a spell-like ability, but its duration is only 10 minutes.

Tree Hanger.name: 挂树功 Tree Hanger
Tree Hanger.description:
专长类型：Combat

你可以使用尾巴挂在附近的突出物上来避免摔绊攻击。

先决条件: 特技1级，灵猴族。

专长效果: 你在对抗所有绊摔攻击时的CMD获得+2加值。如果你所在的方格有树枝或者其他能够让你挂在其上的坚固粗大的物体的话，你能够以一个迅捷动作进行DC为15的特技动作检定，以此向上跳起并用你的尾巴挂在该物体上。在悬挂期间，你不会被绊摔，同时你忽略你所在方格的困难地形效果；此外在对抗冲撞、拖拽以及移位战技时的CMD获得+2加值。如果你离开该方格（包括受迫移动），你的尾巴会松开悬挂的物体并且不再处于悬挂状态。当你悬挂的时候无法使用尾巴做别的事情。

资源出处: Advanced Race Guide pg. 207

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Tree%20Hanger

战策增益：当你向上跳起并把你的尾巴挂在一个物体上时，你可以消耗至多5点耐力。你会在特技检定上获得等同于你消耗耐力点数的加值。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 134

Tree Leaper.name: Tree Leaper
Tree Leaper.description:
You use the flexibility of tree branches to aid in making arboreal leaps.

Benefits
When you are in a tree, you count as having a running start when you jump.

Normal
You must have at least 10 feet of space for a running start.

Trepanation.name: Trepanation
Trepanation.description:
Through careful study and practice, you have learned how to relieve pressure in the brain to balance the humors, promote health, and ward off outside influence.

Prerequisites
Heal 5 ranks, Knowledge (arcana) 2 ranks.

Benefits
You can perform the faith healing occult skill unlock even if you can't use psychic magic. If you can cast psychic spells or have the Psychic Sensitivity feat, you can use faith healing one additional time per day.

So long as you have a healer's kit or surgeon's tools, you can spend 1 hour performing a full trepanation on a creature. This procedure requires a Heal check (DC = 20 + the target's Hit Dice). If you're successful, the target gains a +2 insight bonus on saving throws against curses, possession, and spells from the enchantment (compulsion) school. These effects persist for 1 day per character level you possess. If you fail the check, the target takes 1d3 points of Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma damage. You can perform this procedure on yourself, but the DC increases by 5.

Triangulate.name: Triangulate
Triangulate.description:
Your distrust of magic has forced you to develop tactics to fight witches, fey, and other supernatural foes. No matter how clever they think they are, they can't hide.

Prerequisites
Blind-Fight, Greater Blind-Fight, Improved Blind-Fight, Perception 15 ranks, human (Kellid).

Benefits
Whenever both you and an ally who also has this feat are within 30 feet of an invisible foe of whose presence you're aware, you automatically pinpoint the foe's location. Whenever both you and an ally who has this feat are within 30 feet of a creature and you miss that creature because of its concealment, you can reroll your miss chance percentile roll.

Tribal Hunter.name: Tribal Hunter
Tribal Hunter.description:
From watching pack animals hunt, you learned to take down large prey as part of a group.

Prerequisites
Animal Affinity.

Benefits
When either you or an ally with this feat is adjacent to and flanking an opponent that is larger than either of you, you both are considered to be flanking the opponent as long as you remain adjacent to it.

Normal
You must be positioned opposite an ally to flank an opponent.

Tribal Scars.name: Tribal Scars
Tribal Scars.description:
You endured the grueling coming-of-age rituals of your tribe or following, and proudly bear the scars that grant you the blessings of your tribe's ancestors or totem.

Benefits
You gain one of the following benefits, depending on which Mammoth Lord following you belong to. (At the GM's discretion, other options of her own design could exist for different tribes.)

Bearpelt
You gain a +1 bonus on Fortitude saves and a +2 bonus on Intimidate checks.

Greattusk
You gain a +2 bonus on checks to perform bull rush or overrun combat maneuvers and a +2 bonus on Ride checks.

Ice Chasm
You gain a +1 bonus on Reflex saves and a +2 bonus on Climb checks.

Night Hunt
You gain a +2 bonus on Perception and Survival checks.

Raptorscale
Your base land speed increases by 5 feet, and you gain a +2 bonus on Acrobatics checks.

Slothjaw
You gain a +1 bonus on Will saves and a +2 bonus on Handle Animal checks.

Tribe Mentality.name: Tribe Mentality
Tribe Mentality.description:
You and your tribemates grant each other mental strength.

Benefits
When you're simultaneously subject to the same enchantment (compulsion) or [emotion] effect as another ally with this feat, you both roll saves but can use either result.

Trick Riding.name: 骑乘技巧 Trick Riding
Trick Riding.description:
专长类型：Combat

你不仅仅善于在战斗中控制马匹；甚至将其看起来就像一种艺术。

先决条件: 骑术9级，骑乘战斗。

专长效果: 当你身着轻甲或不穿甲时，就不需要为了进行骑术技能中列出的任何DC为15或更低的项目而进行技能检定。当你骑乘无马鞍的坐骑时，骑术检定不会受到-5减值。你可以每轮使用“骑乘战斗”专长进行检定、忽略2次对你的坐骑的攻击而非原本的1次。

资源出处: Advanced Players Guide pg. 173

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Trick%20Riding

战策增益：只要你的耐力池中还有1点耐力，你就能在穿着中甲时获得这个专长的效果。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 134

Trick Shooter.name: 诡诈射手 Trick Shooter
Trick Shooter.description:
专长类型：Combat

你诡异的瞄准技术可以让你在不伤害目标的情况削弱目标。

先决条件: 敏捷13，致命瞄准，BAB+1。

专长效果: 你的远程战技检定获得+2加值。当你尝试远程战技时，可以选择不造成伤害而无需承受罚值。

资源出处: Ranged Tactics Toolbox pg. 9

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Trick%20Shooter

Trick Spell.name: 诡诈法术 Trick Spell
Trick Spell.description:
专长类型：Metamagic

你信仰的女神赐予你的法术以混乱与困惑之力，使被它影响的敌人自己折腾自己。

先决条件: 可以施放1环法术，混乱中立阵营，信仰卡莉斯翠。

专长效果: 只有影响单个目标，可以被成功的意志豁免检定无效化的附魔系法术才能成为诡诈法术。当你的目标在对抗诡诈法术的豁免检定上失败时，除了承受法术的正常效果外，目标还会尝试撸自个儿。你可以命令目标立刻进行一次特殊的战技攻击（骰1d20+你的施法者等级+你的魅力调整值）对他自己进行一次阴招战技攻击，任何你拥有的增强阴招战技的效果（如精通阴招）同样会影响这个战技攻击。诡诈法术占用比正常高1环的法术位。

资源出处: Dirty Tactics Toolbox pg. 17

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Trick%20Spell

Triple-Baron.name: Triple-Baron
Triple-Baron.description:
The Three have seen your offerings and proclaimed them satisfactory, even before you actually had the chance to show those offerings to them.

Prerequisites
Fey creature type or Fey Obedience (Magdh), you must have collected three gifts worth at least 100 gp each from three different planes across the Great Beyond. At least two of the planes must be diametrically opposed to one another in terms of planar traits.

Benefits
Three times per day as an immediate action, when you are about to roll for an attack, saving throw, or skill check, you can roll three d20s and use the middle of the three results. This ability cannot be combined with other effects that involve rerolling dice or involve rolling twice and taking either the higher or lower result.

Tripping Staff.name: 木棍绊摔 Tripping Staff
Tripping Staff.description:
专长类型：Combat

你能用你的木棍发起绊摔攻击。

先决条件: 智力13，寓守于攻，精通绊摔，武器专攻（木棍）。

专长效果: 你能将木棍当作有绊摔特性的武器使用。

特殊说明: 如果你是魔剑士变体的法杖士（Staff Magus, UM），你可以在使用木棍进行绊摔的时候发动【法术战斗】。

资源出处: Ultimate Magic pg. 158

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Tripping%20Staff

战策增益：即使在你没有满足属性先决条件（智力13）的时候你也能选择这个专长。只有当你的耐力池中还有1点耐力时你才能获得这个专长的效果。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 134

Tripping Staff (Mythic).name: 木棍绊摔(神话) Tripping Staff (Mythic)
Tripping Staff (Mythic).description:
先决条件：木棍绊摔

你手中的木棍可攻可守、可进可退。

神话专长效果：当你对抗摔绊战技时，CMD获得等同于你的阶层的一半的加值。此外你使用木棍（quarterstaff）进行摔绊战技时，也获得上述加值。当你持用木棍时，若1名被你威胁的敌人对你进行摔绊的尝试而且失败的话，他会引起你的借机攻击。你必须使用木棍进行此次借机攻击。

资源出处: Mythic Adventures pg. 75

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Tripping%20Staff

Tripping Strike.name: 绊摔重击 Tripping Strike
Tripping Strike.description:
专长类型：Combat

你的重击中所蕴含的力量能够将敌人击倒在地。

先决条件: 智力13，寓守于攻，精通绊摔，基本攻击加值+9。

专长效果: 当你的近战攻击成功重击时，除了攻击正常造成的伤害之外还能够绊摔敌人。如果你的重击确认检定超过了敌人的CMD，那么你能够将敌人摔倒，就如同进行了绊摔战技检定一般。这不会引起借机攻击。如果你在自身的绊摔尝试中被绊摔，你能够放开武器来避免被绊摔。

特殊说明: 你只能将后述专长中的一个应用在一次确认的重击上：冲撞重击，移位重击，破武重击，卸武重击或者绊摔重击。你可以在重击确认检定之后选择使用该专长。

通常状况: 你必须进行绊摔战技检定才能绊摔敌人。

资源出处: Advanced Players Guide pg. 173

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Tripping%20Strike

战策增益：当你在近战攻击上的重击确认失败时，你仍可以获得2点耐力来尝试一次绊摔。当你这样做时，重投重击股并用它来决定绊摔尝试是都能够超过对手的CMD。该重投只能用于绊摔战技，它不能使重击确认。你仍不能对一个免疫重击的目标做此尝试。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 134

Tripping Twirl.name: 绊摔旋风 Tripping Twirl
Tripping Twirl.description:
专长类型：Combat

你可以用木棍绊摔所有邻接你的敌人。

先决条件: 智力13，寓守于攻，精通绊摔，木棍绊摔，武器专攻（木棍），武器专精（木棍），基本攻击加值+12。

专长效果: 当你以双手武器的方式使用木棍时，以一个整轮动作，你可以用木棍绊摔所有邻接你的敌人，你必须对每一个敌人分别进行绊摔检定。

特殊说明: 如果你是魔剑士变体的法杖士（Staff Magus, UM），你可以在任一次绊摔中使用【法术战斗】。

资源出处: Ultimate Magic pg. 158

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Tripping%20Twirl

战策增益：即使在你没有满足属性先决条件（智力13）时你也能选择这个专长。只有当你的耐力池中还有1点耐力时你才能获得这个专长的效果。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 134

Triton Portal.name: 特里同之门 Triton Portal
Triton Portal.description:
你能够引导体内的魔力以召唤盟友。

先决条件: 角色等级5，‘水流冲击’类法术能力，水元素裔。

专长效果: 每天一次，你可以消费你的水流冲击种族能力，以此来以类法术能力施放召唤自然盟友III，施法者等级等同于你的人物等级。以此能力只能召唤出1d3小型水元素（Small water elemental）、1d4+1只海豚（dolphins）、一条鲨鱼或一只电鳗。使用该能力时一个整轮动作。

资源出处: Advanced Race Guide pg. 178

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Triton%20Portal

Troth of the Forgotten Pharaoh.name: Troth of the Forgotten Pharaoh
Troth of the Forgotten Pharaoh.description:
You've pledged your body to the Forgotten Pharaoh, and are willing to sacrifice yourself to keep his secrets even in death.

Prerequisites
Must be a member of the Cult of the Forgotten Pharaoh.

Benefits
Upon taking this feat, you undergo a ritual wherein the cartouche of Pharaoh Hakotep I is carved into your flesh (typically on the chest or back), and then embellished with painful crimson and ocher tattoos. The ritual takes 1 hour to complete, and you take 3 points of damage from the wound (see Special, below). Upon completion of the ritual, you gain the feat's benefits.

As an immediate action, or when you die, you can cause white-hot fire to burst from the tattooed cartouche on your flesh, immolating your body in a bright flash and instantly reducing it to ash. If you are still alive, you are immediately slain. Spells such as raise dead or speak with dead cannot be used on your remains, but your equipment is unaffected.

As the fire consumes you, fiery snakes whip out of your body in a 5-foot-radius burst, dealing 1d6 points of fire damage + 1 point per character level. Creatures in the area can attempt a Reflex save to negate the damage (DC 10 + 1/2 your character level + your Constitution modifier). In addition, creatures within a 10-foot burst must succeed at a Fortitude save (DC 10 + 1/2 your character level + your Constitution modifier) or be blinded for 1 round. Blind or sightless creatures are unaffected by this blinding effect.

Special
You permanently lose 3 hit points when you take this feat. This damage can be healed only with a miracle or wish spell, but doing so causes you to lose all benefits of this feat.

True Breed.name: 纯种 True Breed
True Breed.description:
先决条件：两个亚种，精灵血脉或兽人血脉种族特性。

先决条件: 两个亚种，精灵血脉或兽人血脉种族特性。

专长效果: 在断判所有基于亚种的效果时（例如游侠的宿敌和破敌武器），你不被视作任何你的亚种，在断判与种族相关的效果时你也不被视作你父母的种族。

资源出处: Inner Sea Races pg. 209

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=True%20Breed

True Deception.name: 弄假成真 True Deception
True Deception.description:
长时间钻研伪装技巧的你能够在平日假扮成任何人。

先决条件: 魅力 17，易容17级，忍法·千面相（master disguise）高等忍者忍术或易容大师（Master of Disguise）高级盗贼天赋，忍者等级10级或盗贼等级10级。

专长效果: 当你使用忍法·千面相（master disguise）高等忍者忍术或易容大师（Master of Disguise）高级盗贼天赋来呈现出特定个人的外貌时，能够愚弄定位（locate）你所易容的对象的预言系魔法和效果，就如同侠客的一人千面*（Any Guise）社交天赋一般。此外，你的唬骗检定还会在模仿特定个体的举止时获得+10加值。

资源出处: Ultimate Intrigue pg. 95

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=True%20Deception

True Love.name: 真爱不死 True Love
True Love.description:
专长类型：Story

你找到了爱恋，却发现自己被关在紧闭的命运大门之前。

先决条件: 你必须恋上一个无法与之结合或已有配偶的对象；或拥有“一见钟情（Current Lover）”、“为爱而歌（For Love）”、“梦中情人（The Lover）”等角色背景之一。

专长效果: 你所施放的带有〔情绪〕描述符的法术，其豁免DC和CL+1。此外，你的察言观色检定+2。如果你在察言观色技能受训10级以上，该加值升至+4。

专长目标: 找到与你的恋人在一起的方法。

完成收益: 深知爱人正等待着你的归来，你在HP处于最大值25%以下时（不计算临时HP）攻击、豁免和技能检定+2。若你们的恋情以任何形式结束——包括死亡，你失去此项完成收益。

特殊备注：根据GM的指示，你也许会发现自己的真爱并非选择此专长时指定的初见之人。这种情况下，你原先的选择是个错误，但这只让你更加清楚地理解真爱为何物。

资源出处: Ultimate Campaign pg. 73

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=True%20Love

Truth in Wine.name: Truth in Wine
Truth in Wine.description:
In refining your palate and experiencing the food, drink, and meal rituals of myriad cultures, you have learned to divine truths about human behavior and use intoxication to break down psychological barriers.

Prerequisites
Appraise 3 ranks.

Benefits
You can perform the psychometry occult skill unlock even if you can't use psychic magic, though you must consume a drink of high-quality alcohol (costing at least 10 gp per drink) to do so. If you can cast psychic spells or have the Psychic Sensitivity feat, you can use psychometry one additional time per day.

If you consume a drink of high-quality alcohol, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus on Appraise and Sense Motive checks for 1 minute and can increase the caster level of the next divination spell you cast within 1 minute by 1. If you are addicted to alcohol, as described on page 236 of the Pathfinder RPG GameMastery Guide, these bonuses increase by 1, but so too does the save DC for your addiction.


Pathfinder Society
The Truth in Wine feat does not grant any additional benefit to addicted characters.

Truth-Seeker.name: Truth-Seeker
Truth-Seeker.description:
A tantalizing secret from the past calls to you, and you intend to discover it.

Prerequisites
You must have visited a ruin or forgotten place that has been abandoned for at least five times as long as you've been alive.

Benefits
You gain a +2 bonus on all Knowledge (history) checks. If you have 10 or more ranks in Knowledge (history), this bonus increases to +4.

Goal
You must discover, explore, and publicly reveal an important secret that has been unknown to the world for at least 100 years.

Completion Benefit
Whenever you pass within 10 feet of a secret door, you receive an immediate Perception check to notice the passage. This check should be made in secret by the GM. In addition, whenever you attempt a Will save to disbelieve an illusion, you may roll twice and take the better result.

Suggested Traits
Avid Reader, Mystery Initiate, SkepticAPG.

Possible Truth-Seeker Quests

d12 Quest
1 You dream of braving the flooded ruins of Lirgen in the Sodden Lands in order to discover the secret that drove many of the now-defunct Saoc Brethren utterly insane (page 174).
2 The secret of how the Pactmasters of Katapesh came to power is within your reach, if only you could go to that nation to truly discover it (page 91).
3 Seeing the pathetic mess of politics that paralyzes the once-great nation of Nex, you have vowed to discover what really happened to that kingdom and bring proof (or the mysterious archwizard himself) to the world at large (page 130).
4 Clues point you toward the Arcadian Ocean to discover why the aboleths ever became involved with the ancient Azlanti in the first place (page 211).
5 The god-kings of Ancient Osirion demonstrated magic little-seen today, some say powered by the supplication of their slaves. How they fell from power is still a mystery (page 212).
6 You intend to learn just what the elven refuge Sovyrian is and how to get there, even if you have to coax the secret out of one of the reclusive rulers of Kyonin (page 94).
7 You yearn to discover the secrets of Shory aeromancy, which supposedly now lay hidden in the jungle depths of the Mwangi Expanse (page 212).
8 The rulers of the Technic League in Silver Mount have long kept their alien methods and practices a secret from the outside world, but you’ve set to remedy that (page 145).
9 You’ve heard tale of ancient warriors now frozen in time beneath the Stasis Fields of Sargava, and curiosity beckons you to determine what secrets these paralyzed prisoners of war may hold from eons long past (page 169).
10 The mysteries of Hyrantam, drowned capital of the nowdefunct nation of Lirgen, call to you. If you can excavate the flooded halls of the city’s famed observatories and soaring towers, glory and gold surely await (page 177).
11 The exact workings of the dragon-ruled island of Hermea in the Steaming Sea has long befuddled sailors and other Avistani explorers, who are constantly rebutted by the powerful entity that supposedly dwells there. Perhaps by revealing the secrets of that paradisiacal island you can share in the fame of Hermea’s enigmatic ruler (page 179).
12 The secret to how the Worldwound formed may lie buried in Sarkorian ruins that have fallen into the Abyss, and you’re determined to discover the cause behind the extraplanar rift (page 198).

Tumbling Upset.name: Tumbling Upset
Tumbling Upset.description:
You nimbly dodge beneath your opponent, creating an opportunity to upend your foe.

Prerequisites
Int 13, Combat Expertise, Improved Trip, Acrobatics 7 ranks.

Benefits
When you succeed at an Acrobatics check to move through an enemy's space, you can spend a swift action to attempt a trip combat maneuver check against the opponent. Even if you fail this check by 10 or more, you do not fall prone.

Normal
If you fail a trip combat maneuver check by 10 or more, you are knocked prone.

Tumultuous Spell.name: Tumultuous Spell
Tumultuous Spell.description:
You can pour the churning chaos of the Maelstrom into your magic, causing foes to scatter unpredictably, pushed apart in random directions as the unknowable whims of chaos itself, bringing with it strange and unexpected sounds and flashes of unnatural color.

Benefits
You can enhance any spell that targets a single creature to become a tumultuous spell. A creature hit by a tumultuous spell (if the spell requires an attack roll) or that fails its saving throw against a tumultuous spell immediately moves 1d4 x5 feet in a random direction. This movement does not provoke attacks of opportunity. If this movement would force a creature into a solid object or another creature, the movement ends harmlessly just before impact.

A tumultuous spell uses a spell slot 1 level higher than the spell's normal spell level. Spells with the lawful descriptor can't be tumultuous spells.

Tundra Stride.name: Tundra Stride
Tundra Stride.description:
Whether as predator or prey, you have learned to move like the arctic wind when survival is at stake.

Prerequisites
Acrobatics 5 ranks.

Benefits
While charging, running, or withdrawing, you gain a +10-foot enhancement bonus to your base speed. This bonus also applies to your speed when calculating overland movement in any plains terrain. You lose the benefits of this feat while you are wearing heavy armor or carrying a heavy load.

Tunnel Rat.name: 坑道鼠 Tunnel Rat
Tunnel Rat.description:
你是在狭窄空间战斗的大师。

先决条件: 鼠族，【群居】种族特性。

专长效果: 当你挤入狭小空间时体型视为比正常小一级。

资源出处: Advanced Race Guide pg. 154

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Tunnel%20Rat

Turbulent Takeoff.name: Turbulent Takeoff
Turbulent Takeoff.description:
When you take off, you create a burst of wind that keeps foes from attacking you.

Prerequisites
Fly 5 ranks.

Benefits
When you use your fly speed to leave the ground, you can create a blast of wind. Each creature that threatens you cannot make attacks of opportunities as you move away unless it succeeds at a Reflex save (DC = 10 + your skill ranks in Fly + your Dexterity modifier). A creature that fail this Reflex save by 10 or more is knocked prone. You must begin your move action standing on the ground to use this ability.

Turn Undead (Mythic).name: 驱散死灵(神话) Turn Undead (Mythic)
Turn Undead (Mythic).description:
先决条件：驱散死灵

你的神圣能量不光能够让死灵落荒而逃，还能够彻底抹消它们的存在。

神话专长效果：当你使用驱散死灵专长时，范围增加每阶层10尺，而且非神话不死生物会在豁免中受到等同于你的阶层的减值。

当你使用驱散死灵专长时，能够花费1次神话之力摧毁不死生物。取代原本的恐慌状态，豁免失败的不死生物会被摧毁。你能够摧毁每阶层2d4个生命骰的不死生物。HD最低的不死生物会先受到影响；对于HD相等的不死生物，最接近能量爆发起始点的会先受到影响。拥有9个或更高HD的不死生物不会被影响，不足矣影响1名不死生物的HD会被浪费。

资源出处: Mythic Adventures pg. 75

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Turn%20Undead

Twilight Tattoo.name: 暮光纹身 Twilight Tattoo
Twilight Tattoo.description:
你拥有一个特殊的纹身，当你说出特定的命令词时就可以证明你是一名暮光之爪

先决条件: 感知13，隶属于暮光之爪。

专长效果: 你获得一个隐形的魔法纹身，可以证明你是暮光之爪的一员。当你说出命令词时，这个纹身会在重新褪色之前显形一轮。这个纹身在不显形时没有魔法灵光，并且不是幻术，它不能通过魔法手段观察。（命令词会使纹身显形而不是结束隐藏它的魔法。）此外，你在易容检定、在身上隐藏小型物品的巧手检定，以及对抗尝试探知你或者阅读你思维的意志豁免上获得+2加值。

资源出处: Adventurers Guide pg. 76Andoran, Birthplace of Freedom pg. 31

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Twilight%20Tattoo

Twilight Words.name: Twilight Words
Twilight Words.description:
Snowborn half-elves often inherit their parents' incurable curiosity about other cultures and are particularly good at relating to new groups.

Prerequisites
Diplomacy 3 ranks, snowborn half-elf.

Benefits
You can attempt a Diplomacy check to improve someone's attitude even if you do not speak a common language, though the other party must still have an Intelligence of 3 or higher.

Normal
You cannot attempt a Diplomacy check to improve someone's attitude if you do not speak a common language.

Twin Fang Lunge.name: 贰牙突 Twin Fang Lunge
Twin Fang Lunge.description:
专长类型：Combat

你以蛇突之力发动攻击。

先决条件: 敏捷15，快速备战，贰牙击，贰牙流，双武器战斗，特技动作8级，BAB+8或8级武僧等级。

专长效果: 使用贰牙流时，你可以用整轮动作移动至多等同你速度两倍的距离，接着如同你进行了攻击动作般使用贰牙击。

资源出处: Villain Codex pg. 105

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Twin%20Fang%20Lunge

Twin Fang Strike.name: 贰牙击 Twin Fang Strike
Twin Fang Strike.description:
专长类型：Combat

你同时以两把武器打击敌人。

先决条件: 敏捷15，快速备战，贰牙流，双武器战斗，特技6级，BAB+6或6级武僧等级。

专长效果: 使用贰牙流时，若你在持握两把匕首或两柄单镰时进行攻击动作，你可以同时用你的主手武器与副手武器发动攻击。若你这么做，两次攻击皆须承受-4减值，而且即便你两次攻击皆命中，也只能附加一次精准伤害与命中时发动的效果。

资源出处: Villain Codex pg. 105

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Twin%20Fang%20Strike

Twin Fang Style.name: 贰牙流 Twin Fang Style
Twin Fang Style.description:
专长类型：CombatStyle

你手中成对的利刃能轻易地撕裂甲胄。

先决条件: 敏捷15，快速备战，双武器战斗，BAB+1，特技1级。

专长效果: 每当你用一对匕首或一对单镰进行全力攻击，并且同时用两把武器命中一名生物时，你可以使其护甲AC降低1点，此效果持续到你下回合开始。此减值可以叠加到将对方的护甲加值降至+0。举例来说，若你用两次主手攻击与两次副手攻击命中一名穿着链甲衫的敌人，那么你会将其护甲AC从+4降至+2。

资源出处: Villain Codex pg. 105

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Twin%20Fang%20Style

Twin Thunders.name: 雷霆双击 Twin Thunders
Twin Thunders.description:
专长类型：Combat

当你与巨人战斗时，你混合了先人智慧的有力重击效果拔群。

先决条件: 矮人或侏儒，【防御训练】种族特性，双武器格斗或【疾风连击】职业特性，武器专攻（当前持用的两种武器）。

专长效果: 每轮1次，当你两手各用一件钝击武器攻击具有巨人亚种的生物时，若你在主手武器命中后又以副手武器命中，副手武器的伤害可在应用加值前双骰累加。额外伤害不会因重击加倍。

资源出处: Ultimate Combat pg. 123

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Twin%20Thunders

战策增益：你可以消耗2点耐力来在对一个体型至少大你一级的非巨人亚种生物时获得这个专长的好处。在你下一回合开始之前你都能获得该好处。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 134

Twin Thunders Flurry.name: 雷霆连击 Twin Thunders Flurry
Twin Thunders Flurry.description:
专长类型：Combat

你的双重钝击在面对巨人时效果拔群。

先决条件: 矮人或侏儒，【防御训练】种族特性，进阶双武器格斗、双武器格斗或【疾风连击】职业特性，雷霆双击，武器专攻（当前持用的两种武器），基本攻击加值+6。

专长效果: 你能够绊摔体型最大为超大型的巨人亚种生物，并对他们的伤害+2。此外，每当你在主手武器命中后又以副手武器命中巨人亚种生物，你都能应用“雷霆双击”专长带来的副手武器伤害加成。

资源出处: Ultimate Combat pg. 123

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Twin%20Thunders%20Flurry

战策增益：你可以消耗2点耐力来对一个没有巨人亚种的超大型生物尝试绊摔战技。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 134

Twin Thunders Master.name: 雷霆大师 Twin Thunders Master
Twin Thunders Master.description:
专长类型：Combat

你能以雷霆之击压倒最强大的巨人。

先决条件: 矮人或侏儒，【防御训练】种族特性，进阶双武器格斗、双武器格斗或【疾风连击】职业特性，雷霆双击，雷霆连击，武器专攻（当前持用的两种武器），基本攻击加值+9。

专长效果: 每当你通过“雷霆双击”专长造成额外伤害，对手颤栗1轮，且须通过DC为“10+1/2你的等级+力量修正”的强韧豁免，否则恍惚1轮。若你对已经处于恍惚的对手成功使用本专长，他将晕眩1轮。你还能类似地让已经晕眩的对手震慑。

资源出处: Ultimate Combat pg. 123

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Twin%20Thunders%20Master

战策增益：当你使用雷霆双击UC专长来对一个对手造成额外伤害时，你可以消耗2点耐力来让对手战栗1d4轮。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 134

Twinned Feint.name: 双发诱敌 Twinned Feint
Twinned Feint.description:
专长类型：Combat

你卖个破绽，两个对手就一起上钩。

先决条件: 魅力13。

专长效果: 以一个标准动作，你可以对一个处于你的触及范围内的敌人进行一次虚招检定。如果你的虚招成功，你可以立刻对另一个邻接目标，且处于你触及内的敌人发动虚招尝试，你最多只能额外发动一次虚招。每当你使用这个专长时，你会在防御等级上承受-2减值。

特殊说明: 如果你拥有精通虚招专长，你可以以一个移动动作发动本专长的效果。

资源出处: Advanced Class Guide pg. 158

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Twinned%20Feint

战策增益：当你在使用该专长时的第一次虚招成功时，你可以消耗2点耐力来对你触及内的任一敌人尝试第二次虚招，即使它没有邻接第一个敌人。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 134

Twist Away.name: 神奇姿势 Twist Away
Twist Away.description:
你拥有让他人希望暂停学习的神姿势，足以规避最猛最恶的打击。

先决条件: 反射闪避。

专长效果: 当你着轻甲或不着甲时，每当你需要进行一个强韧豁免检定，你都可以以一个直觉动作，进行一次反射豁免检定（使用相同的DC）作为检定结果。如果你的豁免检定成功且正常情况下可以减免一部分该能力的效果，那么你可以完全避免整个效果。无论你是否成功通过豁免检定，你都会在下一轮陷入恍惚状态。如果你不会陷入恍惚，你就无法使用该专长。你也不能忽视该专长的恍惚效果，也无法提前解除它。

资源出处: Advanced Class Guide pg. 158

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Twist%20Away

Twisted Love.name: Twisted Love
Twisted Love.description:
An evil person or entity has become obsessed with your resemblance to a lost loved one.

Prerequisites
You resemble a lost loved one of an evil creature who would otherwise be a challenging foe. The likeness is close enough for you to be mistaken as the former loved one's reincarnation, or you might be that loved one reborn in a new life. Alternately, the creature might be a former lover who has become evil and wishes to resume the relationship. This unwanted relationship must be contrary to your alignment or long-term goals. Thematically appropriate backgrounds include Born out of Time, Current Lover, Reincarnated, The Lover, and Troubled First Love (all of which are found in Ultimate Campaign).

Benefits
You gain a +2 bonus on saving throws against enchantment effects and a +2 bonus on Bluff and Diplomacy checks to influence your would-be love or her minions and servants.

Goal
You must break the heart of your pursuer in a dramatic and significant manner. This requires you to interact closely and frequently enough with the entity to cause her to become emotionally compromised or vulnerable. A simple rebuff or refusal of her affections is insufficient to satisfy this

Goal
and might only further drive the obsessed creature to capture you, cast charm spells upon you, corrupt you, or transform you in a way that would make you more sympathetic to her.

Completion Benefit
You retain your +2 bonus on saving throws against enchantment effects. If you succeed at a Will save against such an effect, the caster does not learn that you succeeded at your saving throw (effects such as detect magic and analyze dweomer still work normally). However, this benefit doesn't inform you of the nature of the effect cast upon you. The spurned entity might later seek revenge for the humiliation but is no longer obsessed with you. You also receive the completion benefit even if the formerly obsessed entity is slain, though you never receive the benefit if the entity perishes before you can achieve your goal.

Two-Handed Thrower.name: 双手掷者 Two-Handed Thrower
Two-Handed Thrower.description:
专长类型：Combat

你双手猛力地投出武器，有时会采用回旋身体等技巧来加大投掷物体的速度。

先决条件: 力量15。

专长效果: 当你用双手投掷一件单手或双手武器时，伤害检定获得1.5倍力量修正。双手投掷武器对你而言都是标准动作。若你同时拥有“即时备战”专长，你能以正常全力攻击的频率投掷双手武器。

通常状况: 无论用几只手，投掷武器伤害检定添加力量修正。投掷双手武器是一个整轮动作。

资源出处: Ultimate Combat pg. 123

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Two-Handed%20Thrower

战策增益：当你使用双手投掷一把单手投掷武器或者投掷一把双手投掷武器时，你可以消耗2点耐力来将你两倍而不是1.5倍的力量加值加到那次攻击的伤害上。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 134

Two-Weapon Defense (Mythic).name: 双武器防御(神话) Two-Weapon Defense (Mythic)
Two-Weapon Defense (Mythic).description:
先决条件：双武器防御

攻击与防守间行云流水般的切换使得你难以被命中。

神话专长效果：当你使用双武器防御专长时，你能够将两把武器中最高的增强加值加到该专长赋予的盾牌加值上。

资源出处: Mythic Adventures pg. 76

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Two-Weapon%20Defense

Two-Weapon Drunkard.name: Two-Weapon Drunkard
Two-Weapon Drunkard.description:
You effortlessly wield tankards in your off hand, and can use them to drink from and as deadly weapons in a battle with equal ease.

Prerequisites
Catch Off-Guard, Two-Weapon Fighting.

Benefits
When you wield a tankard as an improvised weapon in your off hand, it functions as a light mace, including for the purpose of determining the effects of feats like Weapon Focus. If you worship Cayden Cailean, your off-hand tankard functions as a divine focus and does not interfere with somatic spell components.

When you fight with two weapons and have the sickened condition, you do not apply the penalties from being sickened to attack rolls or weapon damage rolls.

Normal
A tankard wielded as an improvised weapon normally functions as a gauntlet.

Two-Weapon Feint.name: 双武器虚招 Two-Weapon Feint
Two-Weapon Feint.description:
专长类型：Combat

你用一件武器吸引敌人注意，而另一件武器则穿透防御进袭。

先决条件: 敏捷15，智力13，寓守于攻，双武器格斗。

专长效果: 当你通过近战武器使用“双武器格斗”专长时，你能通过放弃主手武器的第一次攻击来对敌人进行唬骗以使用虚招。

资源出处: Ultimate Combat pg. 123

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Two-Weapon%20Feint

战策增益：即使在你没有满足属性先决条件（智力13）时你也能选择这个专长.只有当你的耐力池中还有1点耐力时你才能获得这个专长的效果。当你使用双武器格斗做出近战攻击时，你可以消耗5点耐力来放弃你其中一次近战攻击（而不限定是你第一次主手攻击）来尝试唬骗检定来对一个对手进行虚招。该虚招尝试在你的所有攻击之前进行，即使你放弃的是之后的攻击。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 135

Two-Weapon Fighting (Mythic).name: 双武器格斗(神话) Two-Weapon Fighting (Mythic)
Two-Weapon Fighting (Mythic).description:
先决条件：双武器格斗

通过灵巧的打击，你能够在与敌人战斗时获得优势。

神话专长效果：以直觉动作，你能够花费1次神话之力，以此在等同于你的阶层的轮数中忽略双武器战斗给攻击检定带来的减值。

资源出处: Mythic Adventures pg. 76

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Two-Weapon%20Fighting

Two-Weapon Grace.name: 优雅双武 Two-Weapon Grace
Two-Weapon Grace.description:
专长类型：Combat

先决条件：敏捷 15；优雅挑刺，优雅挥砍或优雅繁星；双武器格斗；武器娴熟

先决条件: 敏捷 15；优雅挑刺，优雅挥砍或优雅繁星；双武器格斗；武器娴熟。

专长效果: 你在双武器战斗的时候也可以适用优雅挑刺，优雅挥砍或优雅繁星。的好处（前提是你拥有该专长）。当你这么做时，你从双武器战斗中获得的减值增加2，且你不能使用任何能力将该减值降低到2以下。你副手武器的伤害掷骰适用0.5倍的敏捷调整值而非力量调整值。如果你不使用副手武器进行攻击，你仍然可以在另一只手被占用的情况下使用上述专长。

在判断双武器撕裂专长的先决条件时，本专长视作双重切割。

通常状况: 你在没有空闲手时无法适用优雅挑刺，优雅挥砍或优雅繁星。

资源出处: Villain Codex pg. 224

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Two-Weapon%20Grace

Two-Weapon Rend (Mythic).name: 双武器撕裂(神话) Two-Weapon Rend (Mythic)
Two-Weapon Rend (Mythic).description:
先决条件：双武器撕裂

完全同步的两次打击会产生更高的伤害，并留下持久的创伤。

神话专长效果：双武器撕裂专长所造成的伤害增加至2d8 + 2倍力量调整值。你能够花费1次神话之力，以此使得该伤害获得加值，数值等同于你的阶层的两倍。

资源出处: Mythic Adventures pg. 76

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Two-Weapon%20Rend

Tyrant's Rebuke.name: 暴君怒斥 Tyrant's Rebuke
Tyrant's Rebuke.description:
专长类型：Conduit

奉阿斯摩蒂斯之令，地狱与自由意志势不两立，地狱之力使得击败强敌对你来说易如反掌，也使他们更容易被你的怒斥所伤。对于被你严加斥责之辈来说，仿佛地狱本身亦对其举止加以蔑视

先决条件: 知识（位面）5级。

专长效果: 以一个标准动作，你能进行一次近战接触攻击。被该种接触攻击成功击中的生物必须成功通过DC＝10+你等级的一半+你的魅力调整值的意志豁免，否则该生物陷入恍惚直到你下一轮行动结束。如果你对一个已经因本专长陷入恍惚的生物使用暴君怒斥且该生物再次未通过意志豁免，那么除了陷入恍惚之外其还会额外受到1d4点魅力伤害。你每天可使用一次本专长，此外你在知识（位面）上每增加5个等级，本专长每日使用次数+1。

资源出处: Planar Adventures pg. 33

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Tyrant's%20Rebuke

Ultimate Mercy.name: 至高恩赐 Ultimate Mercy
Ultimate Mercy.description:
通过使用圣疗，你可以使死者苏生。

先决条件: 魅力19，高等恩惠，【圣疗】和【恩惠】职业特性。

专长效果: 通过消耗10次【圣疗】使用次数，你可以将一个接触的死亡生活复活，如同你施展了一个CL等同于你圣骑士等级的‘死者复活’。你必须选择支付‘死者复活’法术所需要的材料成分，或者获得一个暂时的负向等级。这个负向等级会在24小时后失去，并且绝不会变为永久性的负向等级，但也不会被任何方式克服除非直到持续时间结束。

资源出处: Ultimate Magic pg. 158

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Ultimate%20Mercy

Ultimate Resolve.name: 至高虔诚 Ultimate Resolve
Ultimate Resolve.description:
你的虔诚灵光不会随着你一同倒下。

先决条件: 【虔诚灵光】职业特性。

专长效果: 你的【虔诚灵光】为20尺散发，并且不会随着你的倒下而无效。

通常状况: 【虔诚灵光】对10尺内的队友生效，并且当你失去知觉或者死亡时将失去作用。

资源出处: Ultimate Magic pg. 158

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Ultimate%20Resolve

Umbral Scion.name: 黑耀传人 Umbral Scion
Umbral Scion.description:
当你在卓尔族群中越发具有权势的时候，你会得到新的类法术能力。

先决条件: 魅力13，感知13，卓尔贵族，高等卓尔贵族，进阶卓尔贵族，能够使用卓尔的类法术能力，卓尔。

专长效果: 在下列法术选择其一：‘解除魔法’，‘神恩’，‘暗示术’。你获得每天以类法术能力使用该法术1次的能力。CL等同于你的角色等级。

资源出处: Advanced Race Guide pg. 106Pathfinder #15: The Armageddon Echo pg. 59Pathfinder #18: Descent into Midnight pg. 14

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Umbral%20Scion

Umbral Shift.name: Umbral Shift
Umbral Shift.description:
Your shadows dance in the darkness, carrying you with them swiftly and silently so that you're able to swap places with your kindred.

Prerequisites
Darkness racial spell-like ability.

Benefits
Whenever you and an ally with the darkness racial spell-like ability who also has this feat are each in an area of darkness within 20 feet of an object radiating darkness from a darkness spell, you can swap places with that ally as a swift action. Your ally must be willing and must spend an immediate action to complete the swap.

Umbral Spell.name: 辐影法术 Umbral Spell
Umbral Spell.description:
专长类型：Metamagic

你的黑暗法术的目标会辐射出黑暗。

先决条件: 晦暗法术（Tenebrous Spell）。

专长效果: 辐影法术会获得黑暗描述符（darkness descriptor）。只要法术仍旧生效，受到影响的生物或物体就会辐射出半径10尺的黑暗，以类似黑暗术（darkness）的效果降低光照。诸如火把或提灯的非魔法光源无法在该区域内提高光照等级（light level）。魔法光源只有在等级比辐影法术的未调整法术等级（unmodified spell level）高时，才能增加被辐影法术影响区域内的光照等级。该效果与自身或其他创造黑暗的效果相互之间不会叠加。辐影法术占用高于原本法术等级2级的法术位。

你无法将该专长应用于持续时间为立即，或者不以生物或物体为目标的法术。

资源出处: Inner Sea Magic pg. 15

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Umbral%20Spell

Unaging.name: Unaging
Unaging.description:
You take after your long-lived elven parent more than other half-elves. While your life-span is not any longer than usual, age weighs less heavily on your shoulders.

Prerequisites
Half-elf.

Benefits
You gain a +4 racial bonus to resist any effect that would magically age you or otherwise displace you in time. In addition, you reduce all penalties gained from magical aging by 1.

Unbalancing Blow.name: Unbalancing Blow
Unbalancing Blow.description:
With a forceful strike, you throw your foe off-balance.

Prerequisites
Dex 13, Wis 13, Improved Unarmed Strike, base attack bonus +4.

Benefits
When using this feat, in addition to dealing damage normally, you force a foe damaged by your unarmed attack to attempt a Reflex saving throw (DC = 10 + half your character level + your Wisdom modifier). A creature that fails this saving throw is flat-footed, and if it is larger than Medium size, it loses any special size modifier to its CMD against effects or combat maneuvers that would move it until its next turn. It is also knocked out of any stance associated with a style feat. You must declare that you are using this feat before you make your attack roll; if your attack roll fails, the target is unaffected and your attempt is wasted. You can attempt to use Unbalancing Blow once per day for every 4 character levels you have, but no more than once per round. Creatures immune to tripping are immune to this effect.

Unblinking Flame Feint.name: 业火袭 Unblinking Flame Feint
Unblinking Flame Feint.description:
专长类型：Combat

你的行动如同闪烁的火焰一般迅捷而又不可预测，从而把敌人打得措手不及。

先决条件: 智力13，感知13，寓守于攻，无瑕流，BAB+9或9级武僧等级。

专长效果: 若你正在使用无瑕流，则能够在尝试使用唬骗检定进行虚招时，使用感知调整值替代魅力调整值。你能够以迅捷动作花费1点气，来在1轮内获得精通虚招的好处。

资源出处: Adventurers Guide pg. 106Inner Sea Combat pg. 13

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Unblinking%20Flame%20Feint

战策增益：你可以在使用业火袭时消耗2点耐力而不是1点气。

战策资源出处: Weapon Master's Handbook pg. 25

Unblinking Flame Fist.name: 业火灼身 Unblinking Flame Fist
Unblinking Flame Fist.description:
专长类型：Combat

你能够如同肆虐的火焰一般充分利用敌人防守上的破绽。

先决条件: 智力13，感知13，寓守于攻，无瑕流，震慑拳，业火袭，BAB+13或13级武僧等级。

专长效果: 若你正在使用无瑕流，措手不及的目标在对抗你的震慑拳时，震慑拳DC提高2点。当你你花费1点气来在1轮内获得精通虚招的好处时，可以在冲锋时将虚招的尝试作为移动的一部分。

资源出处: Adventurers Guide pg. 106Inner Sea Combat pg. 13

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Unblinking%20Flame%20Fist

战策增益：你可以在使用业火灼身时消耗2点耐力而不是1点气。

战策资源出处: Weapon Master's Handbook pg. 25

Unbound Bravery.name: Unbound Bravery
Unbound Bravery.description:
Your firm dedication to the principles of courage and freedom allows you to escape your bonds more easily.

Prerequisites
Bravery class feature, worshiper of Cayden Cailean.

Benefits
You can add the bonus from bravery to Escape Artist checks and combat maneuver checks to escape a grapple. If your bonus from bravery is +2 or higher, then once per day, you can grant that bonus to an ally within 30 feet on a Will save against a fear effect, an Escape Artist check, or a combat maneuver check to escape a grapple. Granting this bonus to an ally is an immediate action and must be declared before the result of your ally's check is revealed.

Unbreakable.name: 坚不可摧 Unbreakable
Unbreakable.description:
专长类型：Combat

作为一名身经百战的灰少女，你可以忍受数目惊人的刑罚。

先决条件: 魅力13，坚忍，健壮，战士等级4。

专长效果: 每当你因为战士天赋职业奖励获得1点生命值时，你可以额外获得1点生命值。并且在决定你是否因生命值伤害的死亡的负体质值时，你的体质会视为比原本高4点。这些效果可回溯。

资源出处: Adventurers Guide pg. 86

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Unbreakable

Uncanny Activation.name: Uncanny Activation
Uncanny Activation.description:
You can coax greater power out of magical devices.

Prerequisites
Use Magic Device 12 ranks.

Benefits
If you exceed the Use Magic Device DC to activate a spell completion or spell trigger item by 5 or more, you can increase the item's caster level by 1 for determining the spell's effect. Alternatively, if you exceed the Use Magic Device DC by 10 or more when activating a magic item with charges, you can expend an additional charge to increase the caster level by 2 levels. Regardless, you can't increase an item's caster level to one that is higher than your own caster level.

Uncanny Alertness.name: 离奇警觉 Uncanny Alertness
Uncanny Alertness.description:
对奥术与自然的研究使得你的感官更为敏锐。

先决条件: 警觉。

专长效果: 这个专长给予你在感知和察言观色上额外的+1加值，并且在对抗睡眠和魅惑法术的豁免上获得+2加值。

资源出处: Ultimate Magic pg. 158

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Uncanny%20Alertness

Uncanny Ally.name: Uncanny Ally
Uncanny Ally.description:
You have learned to use your senses to protect others.

Prerequisites
Alertness, uncanny dodge class feature.

Benefits
When you are conscious and able to move freely, allies adjacent to you who can see and hear you gain the benefit of your uncanny dodge. If you have improved uncanny dodge, as a free action at the beginning of your turn, you can designate one adjacent ally to receive the benefit of that ability as well. The ally can be sneak attacked by foes with 4 more rogue levels than your character level or your ally's character level, whichever is lower.

Uncanny Concentration.name: 离奇专注 Uncanny Concentration
Uncanny Concentration.description:
你学会了如何在施法时进入明镜止水的状态，让你摆脱烦躁、伤害、恶劣的天气甚至是其他法术的影响。

先决条件: 战斗施法。

专长效果: 你不必在恶劣天气所造成的有力振动、剧烈振动或是恶劣天气的影响下做专注检定。你在其他所有的专注检定上获得+2加值。

资源出处: Ultimate Magic pg. 158

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Uncanny%20Concentration

Uncanny Defense.name: 本能防守 Uncanny Defense
Uncanny Defense.description:
专长类型：Combat

你的自我保护本能给予你很多强项。

先决条件: 谨慎战斗，基本攻击加值+3，半身人。

专长效果: 当你防御式战斗或完全防御时，你的反射豁免和CMD得到奖励，该奖励数值等同于你从完全防御中得到的AC闪避加值的一半。

资源出处: Advanced Race Guide pg. 67

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Uncanny%20Defense

战策增益：当你防御式战斗或者使用全防御动作时，如果你尝试了一次反射豁免或者成为了一次战技的目标，你可以消耗点数至多为你的敏捷加值的耐力来在你的反射豁免或者你的CMD上获得等同于你消耗耐力点数的加值。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 135

Uncertainty.name: Uncertainty
Uncertainty.description:
When you draw a foe's blood in combat, that creature begins to doubt its skills.

Prerequisites
Int 13; Bluff, Diplomacy, and Intimidate 5 ranks.

Benefits
As a full-round action, you can diminish the confidence of a creature you've dealt damage to within the last minute. That creature must succeed at a Will save or take a -6 penalty on skill checks for one of the following skills of your choice: Bluff, Diplomacy, or Intimidate. This ability lasts until the subject is healed of all hit point damage, up to a maximum of 1 hour.

Special
A shaman or witch with this blood hex can use it as a standard action. Additionally, if a shaman or witch uses this blood hex, the target takes the penalty on Bluff, Diplomacy, and Intimidate checks.

Uncivilized Tactics.name: Uncivilized Tactics
Uncivilized Tactics.description:
You've never had the luxury of allowing your enemies a fair fight, as fighting in the wild is often fighting for your very survival.

Prerequisites
Str 13, Power Attack.

Benefits
As a standard action, you can attempt a combat maneuver check against a creature no more than one size category larger than yourself. This provokes an attack of opportunity from the target of the maneuver. If the check is successful, you can prevent the target from using one arm (or similar limb) or one natural attack of your choice for 1 round. For every 5 by which your check result exceeds the target's CMD, the affected arm or natural attack is unusable for 1 additional round. The target can regain the use of its disabled limb or natural attack by taking a standard action to do so.

Unconquerable Resolve.name: Unconquerable Resolve
Unconquerable Resolve.description:
Each time you tap into your inner strength, your bodily strength is renewed, making you much more resilient than you might look.

Prerequisites
Resolve class feature, samurai level 1st (Pathfinder RPG Ultimate Combat 18).

Benefits
Whenever you spend a daily use of the resolve class feature, you gain 1 temporary hit point per Hit Die you have. These temporary hit points are lost first when you take damage, disappear after 1 minute, and are replenished each time you use the resolve class feature. Temporary hit points gained in this way persist for 24 hours and then, if you haven't lost them, they disappear.

Special
This feat can be taken multiple times. Each time you take it, the number of temporary hit points you gain each time you spend a daily use of the resolve class feature increases by 1 per Hit Die you have.

Undaunted Bravery.name: Undaunted Bravery
Undaunted Bravery.description:
It takes more than the average threat to intimidate you, and you've mastered the art of menacing your foes by implying violence through your cheerful smile.

Prerequisites
Bravery class feature, worshiper of Cayden Cailean.

Benefits
You can add your bonus from bravery to Intimidate checks and to the DC to intimidate you.

Undead Master.name: 亡灵之主 Undead Master
Undead Master.description:
你可以统帅亡灵大军为你所用。

先决条件: 法术专攻（死灵），能够施放‘操纵死尸’或者‘命令死灵’。

专长效果: 当你施放‘操纵死尸’法术或者使用‘命令死灵’专长时，你可以在决定HD数量时将有效等级提高4级。当你施放‘命令死灵’法术时，你的持续时间翻倍。

资源出处: Ultimate Magic pg. 158

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Undead%20Master

Undead Master (Mythic).name: 亡灵之主(神话) Undead Master (Mythic)
Undead Master (Mythic).description:
先决条件：亡灵之主

利用自身那让人战栗的神话本质，在用于制御亡灵时，你有着无与伦比的力量。

神话专长效果：当你施放操纵死尸（animate dead）法术或者使用命令死灵（Command Undead）专长时，将你的阶层加到你的施法者等级上，用于确定你能够操控的不死生物的生命骰数量。这与亡灵之主专长增加的施法者等级叠加。当你施放命令死灵（command undead）时，持续时间为原本的3倍，用于取代非神话版的亡灵之主专长的2倍。

资源出处: Mythic Adventures pg. 76

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Undead%20Master

Under and Over.name: 过犹不及 Under and Over
Under and Over.description:
专长类型：Combat

你可以从尝试抓你的敌人身旁滑过，让他摔个趔趄。

先决条件: 灵巧武艺，体型小型或更小。

专长效果: 如果一个比你大的敌人尝试擒抱你却失败了，你能以直觉动作对该名目标进行绊摔攻击，并且在这次攻击中获得+2加值。这不会引发借机攻击。

资源出处: Advanced Players Guide pg. 173

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Under%20and%20Over

战策增益：当你使用这个专长时，你可以消耗点数至多为你的敏捷加值的耐力来在你的绊摔尝试上提供加值，每1点耐力提供2点加值。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 135

Underfoot.name: 钻胯而过 Underfoot
Underfoot.description:
专长类型：Combat

你可以在敌人的身体下方和周围腾挪翻转。

先决条件: 闪避，灵活移动，体型小型或更小。

专长效果: 只要敌人的体型比你大，那么当你进行尝试穿过这些敌人而不受借机攻击的特技检定时，检定获得+4闪避加值。此外，当你在比你体型更大的敌人的威胁范围内移动，你的AC在对抗由此动作引起的借机攻击时获得+2闪避加值（这个加值与灵活移动提供的+4加值叠加，总计为+6）。

资源出处: Advanced Players Guide pg. 173

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Underfoot

战策增益：你可以消耗2点耐力来在对抗一个与你体型相同的对手时使用这个专长，持续到你的回合结束。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 135

Underhanded Teamwork.name: Underhanded Teamwork
Underhanded Teamwork.description:
You and your allies know how to use coordinated maneuvers to set up an enemy with an unfair disadvantage.

Prerequisites
Combat Expertise, Improved Dirty Trick.

Benefits
Whenever an ally who also has this feat performs a dirty trick combat maneuver against a foe you both threaten, you can use an immediate action to increase the inflicted condition's duration by 1 round.

Undermine.name: Undermine
Undermine.description:
You and your allies take advantage of shifting terrain to unbalance enemies.

Benefits
When you use a combat maneuver to move a creature into or through a square adjacent to an ally with this feat, your opponent treats all squares adjacent to that ally as difficult terrain during his next turn. In addition, the DC of any of your opponent's Acrobatics checks in the affected squares increases by 2 for each of your allies with this feat who are adjacent to him.

Undermining Exploit.name: 深地行者 Undermining Exploit
Undermining Exploit.description:
先决条件：在知识（地城）上拥有4个等级

先决条件: 在知识（地城）上拥有4个等级。

专长效果: 你对处于碎石，岩地或台阶困难地形上的目标发动的战技攻击拥有+4洞察加值。

资源出处: Inner Sea Gods pg. 217Faiths of Purity pg. 25

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Undermining%20Exploit

Undersized Mount.name: 小型坐骑 Undersized Mount
Undersized Mount.description:
专长类型：Combat

骑一只小马对你来说并没有什么困难。

先决条件: 骑术技能1级。

专长效果: 你可以骑乘体型等同于你的坐骑生物，但它可能会因此而获得额外的负重或类似限制。

通常状况: 你的坐骑体型至少要比你大一级。

资源出处: Gallows of Madness pg. 26Advanced Class Guide pg. 159

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Undersized%20Mount

战策增益：当你的耐力池中还有至少1点耐力，你在骑乘和你体型相同的坐骑时的纵马跳跃以及快速上下的骑乘检定DC将会降低5点。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 135

Underworld Connections.name: Underworld Connections
Underworld Connections.description:
You know people and things that interact with the underworld, whether through crime syndicate connections or friends that literally dwell beneath the surface.

Benefits
You gain a +2 bonus on all Knowledge (dungeoneering) checks and Survival checks while underground or in urban terrain. Additionally, while within a settlement and attempting a check modified by that settlement's corruption, crime, or economy modifiers (see Pathfinder RPG GameMastery Guide 205), you can use your knowledge of local contacts to gain a +4 bonus on that roll. However, if the check fails, anyone witnessing your attempt sees you committing some violation of local law.

Unfair Grip.name: 盘身扭 Unfair Grip
Unfair Grip.description:
专长类型：Combat

你在那些全无规则可言的格斗场——比如阿巴萨罗姆的黑街——上磨练自己的摔角技，被你抓住的对手极难挣脱。

先决条件: 力量13，敏捷13，精通擒抱猛力攻击，基础攻击加值+1。

专长效果: 当你发动擒抱战技攻击时，你在维持擒抱的战技检定上获得+1加值，你的对手在挣脱你的擒抱的战技对抗检定上承受-1减值。

资源出处: Advanced Class Origins pg. 27

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Unfair%20Grip

Unfettered Familiar.name: 远行魔宠 Unfettered Familiar
Unfettered Familiar.description:
你并不需要靠近你的魔宠就可以靠它来传递接触法术。

先决条件: 施法者等级5，魔宠职业能力。

专长效果: 每天一次，你可以施放一个接触法术，但以你的魔宠为接触者来传递它，且你不需要接触你的魔宠。你不需要看到你的魔宠，但是它必须距离你30尺以内。如果你不能看到或者听到你的魔宠那么你必须可以以语言指挥它行动。

特殊说明: 你可以多次选择本专长，每次你选择本专长时，你的魔宠在传递接触法术时距离你的范围就可以增加10尺。

通常状况: 如果你需要你的魔宠来传递接触法术，那么你必须接触到它。

资源出处: Advanced Class Guide pg. 159

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Unfettered%20Familiar

Unfettered Rage.name: Unfettered Rage
Unfettered Rage.description:
When no allies are nearby, you can safely unleash the full extent of your fury.

Prerequisites
Rage class feature, base attack bonus +6.

Benefits
While raging, when you make a full attack with a melee weapon, you can expend an extra round of rage and make one additional attack at your highest base attack bonus, taking a -2 penalty on all of your attacks and a -2 penalty to your AC until your next turn. You cannot use this ability if there are any allies within 5 feet of you or of any squares you threaten. This benefit does not stack with similar effects, such as haste.

Unfolding Wind Rush.name: 八风流转 Unfolding Wind Rush
Unfolding Wind Rush.description:
专长类型：Combat

你所掷出的武器犹如狂风助力，你走过的道路会产生盘旋的凌风。

先决条件: 敏捷13，感知13，灵活移动，无瑕流，即时备战，八风涌，BAB+13或13级武僧等级。

专长效果: 若你正在使用无瑕流而且持用投掷武器，那么你能够将全力攻击和单个移动动作相结合。你必须放弃最高加值的那次攻击，但是可以在你移动的任意一点如常做出剩余的攻击。你能够以迅捷动作花费1点气，以此来沿着你移动的路径造出一道风，这被视为风墙术，持续1轮；该效果不会影响你的远程攻击。

资源出处: Adventurers Guide pg. 106Inner Sea Combat pg. 13

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Unfolding%20Wind%20Rush

战策增益：你可以在使用八风流转时消耗2点耐力而不是1点气。

战策资源出处: Weapon Master's Handbook pg. 25

Unfolding Wind Strike.name: 八风涌 Unfolding Wind Strike
Unfolding Wind Strike.description:
专长类型：Combat

你所掷出的武器在经过风的指引后，或直取敌人，或重回手中。

先决条件: 敏捷13，感知13，无瑕流，即时备战，BAB+9或9级武僧等级。

专长效果: 若你正在使用无瑕流，则能够让你所持用的任何投掷武器的射程增量翻倍。你能够以迅捷动作花费1点气，来向数把武器灌入你的真气，受影响的武器数量等同于你的感知调整值，这些武器会在1轮内获得回力或寻踪武器特殊能力。

资源出处: Adventurers Guide pg. 106Inner Sea Combat pg. 13

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Unfolding%20Wind%20Strike

战策增益：你可以在使用八风涌时消耗2点耐力而不是1点气。

战策资源出处: Weapon Master's Handbook pg. 25

Unforgotten.name: 莫失莫忘 Unforgotten
Unforgotten.description:
专长类型：Story

你在追寻着自己的重要之人——你衷心地期盼他/她尚在人间。

先决条件: 你必须有一位近亲、配偶或其他贴心人在一次旅行中未归、被绑走或以其他形式消失得无影无踪；或你拥有“劫后余生（Major Disaster）”角色背景。

专长效果: 你的坚定信念令你受到的非致命伤害降低1点，最低降至1点。同时你的意志豁免+1。

专长目标: 找到你的所爱之人，并在追寻的过程中完胜一个阻挠你们的强大敌手。

完成收益: 取代意志豁免+1，你的全豁免+1。如果你发现所爱之人已逝，你将失去本专长的所有收益，直到你给予遗体和灵魂适当的安息。葬下遗体后你可获得本完成收益，但依然失去降低非致命伤害的能力。

资源出处: Ultimate Campaign pg. 73

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Unforgotten

Unhindering Shield.name: 自由之盾 Unhindering Shield
Unhindering Shield.description:
专长类型：CombatShield Mastery

你习惯于装备盾牌战斗。

先决条件: 盾牌专攻，BAB+6或者战士4级，擅长小圆盾。

专长效果: 在使用装备小圆盾的手做其他事情的时候，你也能获得小圆盾的AC。当你装备了小圆盾，在考虑施法，持用武器和其他需要有一只空闲手或与你的盾牌相互作用的能力（如游荡剑客的精确刺击炫技或武器娴熟专长）时，持盾手视为空闲无碍的。

特殊情况：拥有此专长的武僧在考虑获得AC加值，快速移动或疾风连击职业能力时不视作装备盾牌。

资源出处: Armor Masters Handbook pg. 19

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Unhindering%20Shield

Unimpeachable Honor.name: 不破的荣耀 Unimpeachable Honor
Unimpeachable Honor.description:
让你作出与坚守原则和背叛盟友的行为几乎是不可能的。

先决条件: 钢铁意志。

专长效果: 当你正处于魅惑（charm）或胁迫（compulsion）效果的影响时，如果该效果会迫使你采取的行动包含后述内容，你就会在抵抗该命令或者打破效果的任何豁免检定或对抗性魅力检定中获得+4加值，具体的行为包括：违背你的本性（fundamental nature）的行为、明确违反了你的宗教限制的行为、或者与你的阵营完全相反的行为（举例说明，让守序善良的你执行邪恶或混乱的行为）。每当你被迫（compelled）攻击盟友时，你的攻击检定与伤害检定均会受到-4减值。

资源出处: Ultimate Intrigue pg. 95

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Unimpeachable%20Honor

Unraveler of Secrets.name: Unraveler of Secrets
Unraveler of Secrets.description:
You have a knack for learning what others would like to remain hidden.

Prerequisites
Int 15, Knowledge (history) 1 rank, gloomkin half-orc.

Benefits
You gain a +2 circumstance bonus on Knowledge (history) checks. In addition, you can cast object reading once per day as a spell-like ability, attempting a Knowledge (history) check in place of an Appraise check.

Unraveling Blood.name: Unraveling Blood
Unraveling Blood.description:
Your toxic blood has the power to destroy both flesh and foul curses.

Prerequisites
Dispelling Blood, Knowledge (arcana) 9 ranks, vishkanya.

Benefits
As a swift action, you can alter the effects of your vishkanya venom to function as break enchantment when striking a creature, using your character level as your caster level. This dispelling effect affects creatures even if they are immune to poison effects.

Normal
Vishkanya venom deals Dexterity damage.

Unsanctioned Detection.name: 不虔侦测 Unsanctioned Detection
Unsanctioned Detection.description:
你将你侦测邪恶的能力用在一些世俗的场合。

先决条件: ‘侦测邪恶’职业特性。

专长效果: 以一个迅捷动作，你将赏赐于你的【侦测邪恶】的能力用于提高你其他的察觉能力。你在1轮内于察觉和察言观色检定上获得+10神圣加值。这将花费掉你接下来24小时内【侦测邪恶】职业特性。

资源出处: Ultimate Magic pg. 158

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Unsanctioned%20Detection

Unsanctioned Knowledge.name: 禁忌学识 Unsanctioned Knowledge
Unsanctioned Knowledge.description:
你研读那些禁书，习得那些强大而又禁忌的魔法。

先决条件: 智力13，能够施展1级圣骑士法术。

专长效果: 从吟游诗人、牧师、审判者或者先知的法术列表中选择一个1环法术、一个2环法术、一个3环法术和一个4环法术，将他们添加进你的圣骑士法术列表中对应的环级。这些法术一旦被选定就无法更改。

资源出处: Ultimate Magic pg. 159

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Unsanctioned%20Knowledge

Unseat (Mythic).name: 落马击(神话) Unseat (Mythic)
Unseat (Mythic).description:
先决条件：落马击

你能够使用可怕的冲击力把敌人击落至马下。

神话专长效果：当你成功以落马击专长使用冲撞将敌人从他的坐骑上击落时，你每拥有2个阶层，你的敌人就会受到1d6点坠落伤害。减少坠落伤害的物品或能力，比如成功的特技动作检定，能够减少这次冲击造成的伤害。

资源出处: Mythic Adventures pg. 76

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Unseat

Unseen Poison.name: 无色无味 Unseen Poison
Unseen Poison.description:
你可以隐蔽随身毒物的魔法灵光。

先决条件: 唬骗技能5级，手艺（制毒）技能5级，那个施放法术回避侦测（Nondetection）。

专长效果: 每当一个生物尝试使用魔法手段探测你携带的毒药时，他就必须通过一个DC=10+你的角色等级的施法者等级检定。如果该检定失败，此生物将在法术有效期间不能用它探测出任何你携带的毒物。

资源出处: Dirty Tactics Toolbox pg. 9

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Unseen%20Poison

Unspoken Bond.name: Unspoken Bond
Unspoken Bond.description:
You've gained the ability to read your most trusted companions' nonverbal acts.

Prerequisites
Bluff 4 ranks, Sense Motive 4 ranks.

Benefits
You can communicate with another ally who has this feat without speaking, instead using nearly imperceptible gestures. This message can relate basic instructions like 'attack this person' or 'be ready to fight' and cannot be used to discuss complex tactics or plans.

Unstoppable Esotery.name: 无尽奇特 Unstoppable Esotery
Unstoppable Esotery.description:
专长类型：Esoteric

当你使用奇特施法材料来施展法术时，你会强化你的法术的魔法建模，使其难以停止或移除。

专长效果: 当你使用一个使用奇特施法材料的法术时，你可以在施展这个法术的专注上获得+2加值，并且你在对抗尝试解除法术效果时施法者等级视为高2级。这个加值独立于由于高等材料效果或是有限施法效果而带来的加值。

资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 154

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Unstoppable%20Esotery

Untwisting Iron Skin.name: 金刚霸体 Untwisting Iron Skin
Untwisting Iron Skin.description:
专长类型：Combat

经过训练之后，你的肉体能如同经过千锤百炼的钢铁一般抵御打击。

先决条件: 力量15，感知13，无瑕流，健壮，金刚劲，BAB+13或13级武僧等级。

专长效果: 若你正在使用无瑕流，就会获得DR/精金，伤害减免的数值为你的等级的1/3（最高6点）。此外，每当你击破至少硬度为10的物品时，就会获得DR1/－，持续的轮数等同于物品生命值的一半（最高10轮）；物品的硬度每比10高5点，这个伤害减免就会增加1点。你能够以迅捷动作花费1点气来使该专长所赋予的伤害减免中的一种加倍，持续1轮。

资源出处: Adventurers Guide pg. 107Inner Sea Combat pg. 13

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Untwisting%20Iron%20Skin

战策增益：你可以在使用金刚霸体时消耗2点耐力而不是1点气。

战策资源出处: Weapon Master's Handbook pg. 25

Untwisting Iron Strength.name: 金刚劲 Untwisting Iron Strength
Untwisting Iron Strength.description:
专长类型：Combat

你精通了断金折铁的武艺，你的拳头就如同精金铁锤一般，能够打破坚硬的物体。

先决条件: 力量15，感知13，无瑕流，BAB+9或9级武僧等级。

专长效果: 若你正在使用无瑕流，则能够忽略一定量的硬度，数值与你的角色等级相等。此外，你在破坏物体的力量检定中获得+4加值。若你以迅捷动作花费1点气，则能够在1轮内获得精通破武的好处。

资源出处: Adventurers Guide pg. 107Inner Sea Combat pg. 13

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Untwisting%20Iron%20Strength

战策增益：你可以在使用金刚劲时消耗2点耐力而不是1点气。

战策资源出处: Weapon Master's Handbook pg. 25

Unusual Heritage (Changeling).name: Unusual Heritage (Changeling)
Unusual Heritage (Changeling).description:
Your heritage is strange or difficult to trace, and people fear your otherworldly powers.

Prerequisites
Changeling.

Benefits
Your mother was part of a powerful hag coven, and it shows when you are near your kin. As long as you are within 30 feet of at least two other changelings, you gain a +2 bonus on concentration checks and dispel checks. If at least two of these changelings also have this feat, these bonuses increase to +4.

Special
This version of Unusual Origin is a teamwork feat.

Unusual Heritage (Dhampir).name: Unusual Heritage (Dhampir)
Unusual Heritage (Dhampir).description:
Your heritage is strange or difficult to trace, and people fear your otherworldly powers.

Prerequisites
Dhampir.

Benefits
Your undead progenitor left you with more than a hint of vampiric nature. You gain a natural bite attack that deals 1d4 points of damage. Once per day upon making a successful bite attack, you can choose to deal an additional 1d4 points of bleed damage to the creature struck.

Special
You can only select this feat at 1st level.

Unusual Heritage (Fetchling).name: Unusual Heritage (Fetchling)
Unusual Heritage (Fetchling).description:
Your heritage is strange or difficult to trace, and people fear your otherworldly powers.

Prerequisites
Fetchling.

Benefits
You have the mysterious ability to see into the Shadow Plane, but only in your dreams. Once per day while sleeping, you can create a magical sensor, as arcane eye except this sensor can view only your current location as it exists on the Shadow Plane. This effect lasts for 1 minute per character level, and can be used during any point while you sleep.

Unusual Heritage (Gillman).name: Unusual Heritage (Gillman)
Unusual Heritage (Gillman).description:
Your heritage is strange or difficult to trace, and people fear your otherworldly powers.

Prerequisites
Gillman.

Benefits
As a so-called 'Low Azlanti,' you have abilities supposedly tied to mysterious ancestors who still watch over you and your ilk. Your divination spells and spell-like abilities manifest at 1 caster level higher. In addition, once per day while fully immersed in water, you can cast augury as a spell-like ability.

Unyielding Ferocity.name: Unyielding Ferocity
Unyielding Ferocity.description:
When near the brink of death, you fight ferociously until the bitter end.

Prerequisites
Con 19, ferocity.

Benefits
When you are reduced to 0 or fewer hit points, if you remain conscious from your ferocity monster ability, you can make a full attack on your next turn (or your current turn if you are reduced to 0 hit points on your own turn). If you do, you push your body to the point that your mind becomes more primitive, and you can no longer use any Charisma-, Dexterity-, or Intelligence-based skills except Acrobatics, Fly, Intimidate, or Ride, or any ability that requires patience or concentration (such as spellcasting) until your hit points are raised above 0.

Normal
When using the ferocity ability, you are staggered while you have fewer than 0 hit points and thus can't make a full attack.

Upsetting Shield Style.name: 强击流 Upsetting Shield Style
Upsetting Shield Style.description:
专长类型：CombatStyle

你能通过击打敌人的武器来扰乱敌人的进攻。

先决条件: 敏捷13，擅长小圆盾。

专长效果: 你能够使用小圆盾进行盾击，如同它是轻盾一样。你能用小圆盾满足任何正常情况下适用轻盾的专长或能力。开启此流派后，每当你用小圆盾盾击敌人造成伤害时，该敌人在对你的所有攻击骰上获得-2减值，直到你的下一轮开始。

资源出处: Armor Masters Handbook pg. 12

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Upsetting%20Shield%20Style

Upsetting Strike.name: 强击·返 Upsetting Strike
Upsetting Strike.description:
专长类型：Combat

对于晕头转向的敌人你能逆转攻防。

先决条件: 敏捷15，战斗反射，精通盾击，强击流，擅长小圆盾。

专长效果: 开启强击流后，如果敌人因强击流的效果而在对你的攻击骰上承受减值，并且他对你攻击失手，且至少少于你的AC5点或以上时，该敌人会引起你的借机攻击。每轮你只能像这样对一个敌人进行一次借机攻击。

资源出处: Armor Masters Handbook pg. 13

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Upsetting%20Strike

Upsetting Vengeance.name: 强击·绝 Upsetting Vengeance
Upsetting Vengeance.description:
专长类型：Combat

对于那些凶猛进攻却又失败的敌人，你能给予他们回敬。

先决条件: 敏捷15，战斗反射，精通盾击，强击流，强击·返，擅长小圆盾。

专长效果: 开启强击流后，因你的盾击而在攻击骰上承受减值的敌人，在攻击任何目标时都承受减值。如果你邻接的敌人承受减值攻击任何一个目标，且失手至少少于该目标AC5点或以上，将会引起你的借机攻击。每轮你只能以本专长或强击·返专长对一个敌人进行一次借机攻击。

资源出处: Armor Masters Handbook pg. 13

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Upsetting%20Vengeance

Urdefhan Bladebreaker.name: Urdefhan Bladebreaker
Urdefhan Bladebreaker.description:
You can use your rhoka sword to destroy your foes' blades.

Prerequisites
Base attack bonus +1, proficiency with the rhoka sword, urdefhan.

Benefits
When wielding a rhoka sword, you can attempt to sunder an opponent's sword or other slender-bladed weapon without provoking an attack of opportunity. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus on the combat maneuver check to do so.

Ursurping Spell.name: Ursurping Spell
Ursurping Spell.description:
Like Daronlyr the Overthrower, you lay such brazen claim to power that you force targets of your spells to act as though they were your allies.

Benefits
A creature that fails its saving throw against a usurping spell counts as your ally rather than your enemy for the purpose of flanking other creatures and cannot make attacks of opportunity against you. This effect lasts for the duration of the spell or for 1 round, whichever is longer. A usurping spell uses up a spell slot 1 level higher than the spell's actual level.

Usurper's Guard.name: Usurper's Guard
Usurper's Guard.description:
You work with your allies to create a defensive guard to facilitate spellcasting.

Prerequisites
Base attack bonus +3 or ability to cast 2nd-level spells.

Benefits
When an adjacent ally with this feat attempts a concentration check to cast a spell or use a spell-like ability defensively, you can attempt a combat maneuver check as an immediate action to guard that ally. Your ally can use either the result of her own concentration check or the result of your combat maneuver check to determine whether she succeeds at casting the spell or using the spell-like ability.

Valiant Steed.name: Valiant Steed
Valiant Steed.description:
Your courage is unnaturally strong.

Prerequisites
Animal or magical beast.

Benefits
You gain a +4 morale bonus on saves against fear and emotion effects. If you can serve as a mount, your rider gains a +4 morale bonus on Handle Animal, Ride, and wild empathy checks to force you within range of a creature with the unnatural aura universal monster rule. In addition, the DC to push you with the Handle Animal skill does not increase if you are wounded or have taken any nonlethal damage or ability score damage.

Normal
The DC to push an animal increases by 2 if the animal is wounded or has taken any nonlethal damage or ability score damage.

Vampiric Companion.name: 血之仆役 Vampiric Companion
Vampiric Companion.description:
你的不朽本质同样改变了追随你的伙伴，它们的扭曲形态展现着你所承受的诅咒。

先决条件: 吸血鬼或吸血裔，非善良阵营，在拥有魔宠或动物伙伴的职业上拥有10个等级。

专长效果: 你的动物伙伴或魔宠的生物类型转变为不死生物，它将获得快速医疗5，以及你的吸血鬼或吸血裔弱点。如果你是吸血鬼，那么它还会获得以下特殊能力，具体的能力取决于你的吸血鬼类型。

僵尸：当你的伙伴处于你的邻接位置时，它获得你的护尸符能力的效果，在被摧毁时会化为尘土（如同僵尸一样），但如果没有妥善的处理的话它也会像僵尸一样复活。

茉莉血族：当你的伙伴处于你的邻接位置时，每当你使用气化形体能力，你的伙伴也会同时变形，并在你结束变形时恢复正常状态。如果你的伙伴被伤害至0点生命值，它会立刻化为气态并潜回你的棺材。

诺斯费拉图血族：当你的伙伴处于你的邻接位置时，每当你使用集群形态能力，你的伙伴也会同时变形，并在你结束变形时恢复正常状态。这个生物可以和你一样使用蛛行术能力，即使它的形态并不适合攀爬（比如马）

特殊说明: 如果你的动物伙伴或魔宠被摧毁，解散或丢失，你可以将本专长的效果应用到新获得的伙伴身上。如果你拥有超过一个动物伙伴或魔宠，你只能将本专长的效果应用到它们中的一个身上。

你可以多次选择本专长，每次你选择本专长时，它将影响你的另一个动物伙伴或魔宠。

资源出处: Monster Codex pg. 237Blood of the Night pg. 28

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Vampiric%20Companion

Vandal.name: Vandal
Vandal.description:
Even other goblins admire your talent for mindless destruction.

Prerequisites
Goblin, sneak attack class feature.

Benefits
You treat unattended objects as if they were vulnerable to your sneak attack, but you only deal half as much damage as you would against an actual creature. For instance, if you rolled 12 extra damage from the sneak attack you would deal an extra 6 damage to the object. This only applies when attacking unattended objects.


Pathfinder Society
Only legal goblin PCs are allowed to choose anything from this book

Vanguard Hustle.name: 先锋·佑 Vanguard Hustle
Vanguard Hustle.description:
专长类型：Combat

你能够保护远处的盟友。

先决条件: 敏捷13，保镖APG，战斗戒备APG，战斗反射，灵活移动，盾牌掩护APG，先锋流，先锋·盾，擅长轻盾或重盾。

专长效果: 在使用盾牌掩护专长时，将盾牌增强加值的一半加到盾牌掩护提供的盾牌AC加值上。开启先锋流后，当你通过战斗戒备专长增加你的威胁范围，只要你使用先锋流所保护的盟友在你的威胁范围内，他就获得先锋流的加值；并且只要你威胁范围内一个盟友成为一次攻击的目标，你就可以使用保镖，盾牌掩护和先锋流来保护他。

资源出处: Armor Masters Handbook pg. 13

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Vanguard%20Hustle

Vanguard Style.name: 先锋流 Vanguard Style
Vanguard Style.description:
专长类型：CombatStyle

你使用你盾在前方护卫盟友。

先决条件: 保镖APG，战斗反射，擅长轻盾或重盾。

专长效果: 开启此流派后，若你一个邻接盟友需要骰反射豁免，你可以使用借机攻击来尝试进行援助他人，来增强你的盟友的反射豁免。在你的下一轮开始前，你的盟友在与你邻接时获得+2加值在所有反射豁免上。

资源出处: Armor Masters Handbook pg. 13

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Vanguard%20Style

Vanguard Ward.name: 先锋·盾 Vanguard Ward
Vanguard Ward.description:
专长类型：Combat

你能有力地护卫盟友。

先决条件: 保镖APG，战斗反射，先锋流，擅长轻盾或重盾。

专长效果: 开启先锋流后，若你一个邻接盟友被攻击或者需要骰反射豁免，你可以使用借机攻击来同时使用保镖专长和先锋流来保护他。只要他在反射豁免上有先锋流的加值，你就可以舍弃你自身的盾牌AC加值，来为该盟友添加相同的盾牌AC。

资源出处: Armor Masters Handbook pg. 13

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Vanguard%20Ward

Vanth's Scythe.name: Vanth's Scythe
Vanth's Scythe.description:
You've seen the reapers many times, and have learned something of their methods.

Prerequisites
Character level 9th, duskwalker, ghost hunter racial trait.

Benefits
When you use your ghost hunter racial trait to grant a scythe, quarterstaff, whip, or bow the ghost touch weapon special ability, you also grant the undead-bane weapon special ability. You also gain an additional daily use of ghost hunter.

Vaporous Potion.name: Vaporous Potion
Vaporous Potion.description:
You know how to brew potions that can be delivered as a gaseous cloud.

Prerequisites
Brew Potion.

Benefits
When you brew a potion, you can brew it in such a way that when exposed suddenly to air and force, it diffuses into a cloud of vapor that can be inhaled. The potion can still be consumed normally, but it can also be delivered by throwing it at another creature as a splash weapon. The potion vial has a range increment of 10 feet and is considered an improvised weapon. On impact, the vial breaks and a cloud of barely visible potion vapor fills the square it lands in (this vapor does not obscure normal sight in any way). If a creature is in that square, it gains the benefits of the potion immediately as though it had imbibed the potion.

Otherwise, the vapor persists for 1d3+1 rounds in only that square before dissipating, and the first creature to enter the square before the vapor dissipates gains the potion's benefits. A creature entering the vapor's space can hold its breath to refrain from inhaling the potion. No more than one creature can benefit from a potion's vapor, and if more than one creature is in the potion's space after it is thrown, the potion is wasted and has no effect. The thrown potion deals no damage to creatures or objects it hits. A spell brewed into a potion this way does not use up a higher-level spell slot than the spell's actual level.



Versatile Brewing
The above feat allows potion brewers to concoct unusual variations in their potions, altering the potions' effects in strange and useful ways. This feat functions similarly to metamagic feats, though it affects the creation of potions instead of the normal casting of spells. Level limits for potions apply to their level after the application of any relevant metamagic feats (if the feat affects the component spell's level).

Variant Prayer Scroll.name: Variant Prayer Scroll
Variant Prayer Scroll.description:
You have learned the secret to changing the powers granted by your prayer scroll.

Prerequisites
Jiang-shi.

Benefits
You gain the ability to create a different type of prayer scroll. You may create a prayer scroll with this ability by using any strip of parchment and a writing instrument, but doing so requires 10 minutes of uninterrupted work. Swapping your current prayer scroll for a different prepared one is a standard action. When wearing a different prayer scroll, you gain its special abilities, but lose your normal prayer scroll's immunity to spell completion and spell trigger magic items. Your prayer scrolls can be used only by you, and have no effect when used by other jiang-shis. When you choose this feat, select one of the following prayer scroll types.

Embalmed Form
This prayer scroll alters your physical form to how you looked 1 day before your death. Treat this as an alter self spell that affects you regardless of your original or current type; your caster level is equal to your Hit Dice. Your speed increases by 10 feet, but you lose your immunity to trip attacks and your ability to move through difficult terrain unhindered. These effects persist indefinitely as long as you wear the prayer scroll, but end immediately if you use a different prayer scroll or 24 hours after you remove this prayer scroll.

Enduring Dust
If you crumble into dust from hit point damage, you reform after 1 round instead of 1 minute. Scattering your dust does not prevent you from reforming as long none of your dust is more than 30 feet from any other part of your dust. Storing a portion of your dust in an air-tight container prevents you from reforming. If you are unable to reform after 1 minute, you are destroyed.

Positive Energy Immunity
You become immune to positive channeled energy used to harm undead. This does not protect you against positive energy from other sources such as cure spells or lay on hands.

Spell Immunity
The prayer scroll grants you immunity to a spell, as if you were using spell immunity. You decide which spell when you create the prayer scroll, and can choose a different spell each time you create a new spell immunity prayer scroll. If you have 15 or more Hit Dice, this functions as greater spell immunity. Creating this type of prayer scroll costs 100 gp x the spell level of the spell keyed to the scroll.

Special
You may select this feat multiple times. Each time you do so, choose another ability granted by the feat.

Varisian Tattoo.name: 瓦瑞西安刺青 Varisian Tattoo
Varisian Tattoo.description:
你身上所负有的刺青激发并增强你自身的魔法力量。这些刺青时刻提醒你是古老而又传统的瓦瑞西安（Varisian）魔法传承者。传统的瓦瑞西安刺青通常由一长串瑟西隆语（Thassilonian）字母表中的字符组成。

先决条件: 法术专攻。

专长效果: 选择一种你已经拥有对应的法术专攻专长的魔法学派（预言系之外的）——你施放该学派的法术时施法者等级+1级。此外，你获得一种每日可以使用3次的类法术能力。对应学派的类法术能力（以及它的瓦瑞西安名称）如后述所述：

防护系（avidais）：提升抗力（resistance）

咒法系（idolis）：酸液飞溅（acid splash）

附魔系（carnasia）：晕眩术（daze）

塑能系（ragario）：舞光术（dancing lights）

幻术系（vangloris）：幻音术（ghost sound）

死灵系（voratalo）：疲乏之触（touch of fatigue）

变化系（avaria）：法师之手（mage hand）

资源出处: Inner Sea World Guide pg. 289Rise of the Runelords Players Guide pg. 15Pathfinder Campaign Setting pg. 147

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Varisian%20Tattoo

Vast Hatred.name: 剧烈仇恨 Vast Hatred
Vast Hatred.description:
专长类型：Combat

你的怒火已经超越了正常的界限。

先决条件: 侏儒，仇恨种族特性。

专长效果: 从游侠的宿敌职业能力列表中选择两种生物类型（或者适当的子类）。你的仇恨种族特性获得的加值同样适用于你所选类型（或子类）的生物。

特殊说明: 你能够多次选择该专长。其效果不叠加。每次你选择该专长，可以使仇恨种族特性适用于额外两种类型的生物。

资源出处: Advanced Race Guide pg. 37

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Vast%20Hatred

战策增益：你可以消耗5点耐力来指定一个来自游侠的宿敌职业能力列表中生物种类（或者适当的亚种）。直到你的下一回合开始，来自仇恨种族特性的攻击加值也能应用到你所选定的生物种类（或者适当的亚种上）。

战策资源出处: Pathfinder Unchained pg. 135

Vast Spell.name: 广域法术 Vast Spell
Vast Spell.description:
专长类型：Metamagic

你的法术覆盖更大的区域中的目标。

先决条件: 施法者等级3级。

专长效果: 你能调整一个目标为任意两者间距离不超过30尺的多个生物的法术（如加速术）。该法术目标间两两最大距离提高到60尺。广域法术占用比原法术环级高1级的法术位。

资源出处: Magic Tactics Toolbox pg. 5

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Vast%20Spell

Veiled Contempt.name: 暗藏蔑视 Veiled Contempt
Veiled Contempt.description:
你擅长隐藏你对政权或权威的不满。

先决条件: 唬骗3级。

专长效果: 以你为目标进行预测的察言观色检定的DC等于20+你的唬骗等级，而不是正常的20。如果察言观色检查是专门来评估你的忠诚和诚信，DC = 20+双倍你的唬骗等级。

资源出处: Heroes of the High Court pg. 18

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Veiled%20Contempt

Vengeance.name: 君子报仇 Vengeance
Vengeance.description:
专长类型：Story

为所爱之人复仇是你前进的巨大驱动力。

先决条件: 你必须有一位近亲或其他所爱之人被一个特定的强大敌手或其爪牙杀害；或你拥有“惨遭劫掠（Raiders）”、“绝命复仇（Vengeance）”等角色背景之一。

专长效果: 你对特定的敌手与其爪牙的豁免、攻击和伤害检定+1。

专长目标: 妨害你的目标敌手。

完成收益: 你的全豁免+1。若你的敌手仍然存活，该加值可在与其对抗时与即时收益叠加。

资源出处: Ultimate Campaign pg. 73

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Vengeance

Vengeful Banisher.name: Vengeful Banisher
Vengeful Banisher.description:
You've witnessed demons and their madness firsthand, likely in one of the lands detailed in this section, or perhaps some other demon-marked region such as the Worldwound or the Abyss. Since then, you've sworn to send these wretched fiends back to whence they came, and you've become an expert at rooting out their kind and their servants.

Prerequisites
You witnessed at least one family member or a close friend being killed by demons or demonic cultists, or you have the Hated Foe or An Eye for an Eye background (see Ultimate Campaign).

Benefits
You gain a +2 bonus on saving throws against spells or effects originating from demon worshipers and from creatures of the demon type.

Goal
Convince the leader of a demon cult to renounce her Abyssal lord and seek atonement for her actions. Alternatively, if you kill the cult leader, you must also decisively defeat at least half of the cultists and have the cult's base of operations consecrated by a well-known local priest.

Completion Benefit
When a demon damages you with an attack, spell, spell-like ability, or special ability and reduces you to fewer than 0 hit points, you may allow righteous energy to pour through you and into the demon, instantly sending it to another plane of existence (as dismissal) if it fails a Will save (DC = 10 + 1/2 your Hit Dice + your Charisma modifier). This dismissal takes place after you are damaged but before you fall unconscious, so you can use this ability even if the demon kills you. You can use this ability once per day. Once you have used this ability, you must be healed to your maximum number of hit points before you can use the ability again.

Vengeful Death Vow.name: Vengeful Death Vow
Vengeful Death Vow.description:
Your death vow strikes terror into the hearts of your enemies, making them less likely to hit you in combat.

Prerequisites
Death vow class feature.

Benefits
Targets of your dmth vow take a -2 penalty on attacks made against you.

Venomous Spray.name: 喷毒 Venomous Spray
Venomous Spray.description:
专长类型：Combat

你恶毒地喷了别人一脸

先决条件: 蛇人。

专长效果: 你可以用喷吐毒液作为一次射程为5尺的次要远程攻击，这是一次天生武器攻击且不引发借机攻击。被你的毒液喷到敌人需要通过一个（DC=你的毒素DC）的强韧豁免检定否则目盲1d4轮并同时受到你的毒素影响。你不能在使用过你的啮咬攻击的同一轮内使用喷吐毒液（反之亦然），并且在此之后，你在1d4轮内无法使用啮咬攻击的毒素效果或是进行另一次喷吐毒液。

资源出处: Monster Codex pg. 200

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Venomous%20Spray

战策增益：当你喷吐毒药时，你可以消耗5点耐力。你消耗的每点耐力都会将这次攻击的距离提升5尺。

Venomous Stare.name: Venomous Stare
Venomous Stare.description:
Your stare is toxic to your enemies.

Prerequisites
Mesmerist level 11th, painful stare class feature.

Benefits
When you trigger your painful stare, the target immediately becomes envenomed by the following poison: painful stare--injury; save Fort DC = 10 + 1/2 your mesmerist level + your Charisma modif ier; frequency 1/round for 6 rounds; effect 1d3 Dex; cure 2 saves. Whether your target succeeds at or fails its save, you can't use Venomous Stare against that particular foe for 24 hours.


Pathfinder Society
Only available to Nagaji characters

Verbose Performer.name: Verbose Performer
Verbose Performer.description:
The range of your bardic performances increases.

Prerequisites
Bardic performance class feature, Extra Performance, Master Performer, bard level 8th, Kitharodian Academy 15 TPA.

Benefits
Double the range of any bardic performance ability that possesses a range in the ability description.

Verdant Spell.name: 青翠法术 Verdant Spell
Verdant Spell.description:
专长类型：Metamagic

你与大自然的神奇联系允许你去引诱、愚弄和误导植物和真菌，就如同它们是人一样。

先决条件: 法术专攻（附魔），知识（自然）6级。

专长效果: 青翠法术可以影响植物（甚至是无心智的植物生物）就如同他们并不免疫影响心灵的效果一样，但对其他类型的生物没有影响。一个青翠法术消耗高2个环级的法术位。本专长只能用于影响心灵的法术。

通常状况: 植物生物免疫心灵影响效果。

资源出处: Ultimate Wilderness pg. 119Heroes of the Wild pg. 26

原文索引: https://www.aonprd.com/FeatDisplay.aspx?ItemName=Verdant%20Spell

Verdant Step.name: Verdant Step
Verdant Step.description:
You can travel between magic plants and plants with which you have an affinity.

Prerequisites
Con 13, character level 7th, plant type.

Benefits
Once per day, you can step into an adjacent plant with which you share affinity, then exit from a plant of the same kind.
